Ne gamenela nene evene' ma sikalahu' golosoli'mo lulou' mino vele do like-do vele hize langolo' o-davo gamazi lamive ma Izesuda ele'mizi ikevo do lamine' o-davo a'mine ve nene gamazi laa' ido' vele ningaa' ine'.

Ne'mine ogavo evene' muki' a'mido' minave ingine nene ningi gopo ga'ine gili ti' li lani': Zuda ve leli' avotemoti guve'inesi ve naba Davidi' a'vopilemo' ezelo' medelo guvelesi ve naba lolo' ilive lani' ma nene nolihee.

Ne'mine lani'za Halisaio' mono' laa' ave ingine gili ti' li lani': O've. Ve mene sikalahu' goloso do nohuline' nene a'mine sikalahu' golosoliti guve'inesi ve naba Belezebulo' ne'mo amuzo imidotikovo' do nohuline' ve.

Ne'mine likevo Izesu' aza lu'ningu' gamazi gili minani' nene ningo gelo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Misubo mau' aleve ingine nene hizi ho'li mini lovo hizilizani' nene mo evene' sime' nikevo ebe' nene ga'me pizeleseive. Ido' ebe' naba mauti' nehe numuno ngomo mauti' nehe evene' hamo' zuho ingine ho'li vi eza ema vilizani' ingine nene ele'vole' igi minami gopo'napa ilisave.
Ido' Satani ne'mo eze zuho ngimiselo do huli-diniko azasi eze zuhosi ho'li mini ngelami di'mozi vi gopo' napa adine.

Ido' nenikumu' nene Belezebulodati' amuzo dosa sikalahu' goloso nene ngimiselo do nohulive nilahe. Ido' lengi' zuholite sikalahu' goloso ngimiseli hulaa' ani' ma nene amuzo zahidati' disa neve. Lingine engikumu' nene Belezebulodati' amuzo disa sikalahu' goloso nene ngimiseli nihulave li ma li-ngidadiniko lengi' nene di gonito' i-lingidadine. O'ove. Ingine Belezebulodati' amuzo damaa' ani' ne'mino nazasi ezelati' damo O'mosolatikovo' amuzo daa' nouve.

Ido' ne'mine oga' nouvoni' nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo nele'mize aka ivo sikalahu' goloso ngimisele hulaa' nooloni' nene O'moso'mo evene'velo' gizebo ogo amuzo've nene do soto' ogo nolengelebizive.

Evene' mali'mo ve ma gasava daa' ive mineliveli'mi numu'veu' dizo a'mine gasava daa' ive'mo gizebo ogo minine' inite've ipe' ogo daline' nene haza dizo ipe' ogo damoloseive. Asi a'mine gasava daa' ive nene gomu' ivile' ogo nala' do-mikosavo' nene dizo inite've ipe' ogo daloseive. A'mine'mine ogo naza nene Satani ivile' ogosa evene' eitati' nene do nenita oga' nouve.

Ido' ve ma ingine nenita gi'mizi minamave nene neni' lovo i nimaa' ave nene nizave. Ido' ve ma ingine nenikisi maka' mino evene' do nenita amunive nene evene' ngimiseli di hutile' i huli-ngidaa' nave.

Nemu' nene lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. Evene' ingine goloso inite' ato ato' iga' ani' ne'mi lihime ido' O'mosomu' ido' evenekumu' divi ledivi' iga' ani' ne'mi lihime nene O'moso'mo ha hulo-ngedeleseiha O'moso'mi Sikalahu' divi ledivika ma i-dilizani' nene lihimetine mo keke' hulo-lengedamoloseive.

Ee, ve ma ingine gamazi goloso li O'mosolati' ve gihile neni' divi ledivika li-nidilizani' lihime nene O'moso'mo ha hulo-ngedeleseiha gamazi goloso li O'moso'mi Sikalahu' divi ledivika li-dilizani' lihime nene apase-ngedamivo alinge' gamene nabau' lihime'ine apase-ngedo goni' o-ngedeli gameneu' nesi ha minivo mine do vo mineleseive.

Evene' ingine za nene lamine' nolihe goloso nolihe nene zali'mi gihile'veloti' nene lubamu ningi gililisave. Nemu' nene za mali'mo goloso noline' nene gihile'vesi goloso mineleseive. Ido' za mali'mo lamine' noline' nene gihile'vesi lamine' mineleseive. Ido' eveneliti monovo nene a'mine'mine ogo ningo gelelesane.

Lingine Satali'mi izipahala zuho nene nizave. Evene' lu'ningu' go'zikani' inite' nene ve'ninguti' li hulaa' nanako lingine lutingu' golososi minivo nizani' nete gamazi lamine' nene ngeli mo lamilisave.

Evene' lamine' ne'mi lulou' nene gamazi lamineli'mo vai' lo neinako ne'mo nene monovo lamine' do soto' oga' neive. Ido' evene' goloso ne'mi lulou' nene gamazi goloso ne'mo vai' lo neinako ne'mo nene monovo goloso do soto' oga' neive.

Ido' ma lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. Gamazi goloso gidini muki' nene haza gamazi nehe li gopo ma li nilizani' nene a'minemu' O'moso'mo gamene nabalo' goni' o-ngedo longo' o-ngedavo evene' muki' a'mine lani' gamazi nene li soto' ikevo ne'mi lihime ngemeleseive.

Gei' gamazika liline' ne'mo ogo molo iline' monovoka nene do soto' ogavo lamine' o noline' nene ve lisihe' ve lo O'moso'mo lo-gedeleseive. Ido' goloso o noline' nene ve goloso ve lo-gedo lihime gemeleseive.

Ne'mine lo lo-ngemavo mono' monovo apizi ngimaa' ave ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' ave linge ingine gamazi ti' li li-imani': Tisazo, gaza O'moso'mo amuzo gimine' nene lelebizo atoli'mine suno ma do soto' oganivo ningelone.

Likevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Mene gamenelo' nizave lingine evene' golosovo' mini vene' ma va'ningine huli ve gohi malo' vi lihime daa' nani' ne'mine igi O'mosotine huli lihime daa' nave. Lingine nenikumu' atoli'mine suno do soto' ogo O'moso'mo amuzo nimine' nene lengelebizelongumu' nilani'za ma lengelebizamolosuve. O'moso'mo gozopo' eze veleti' gamazi lo soto' oga' ive Zonada inite' do soto' ogo amuzo've ngelebizine' ne'mine inite' ma nenita soto' ogavo nevo' ningilisave.

A'mine ningilizani' inite' nene ne'mino neive: Zona'ni nene alaha' nabali'mo do mikile' ogavo ne'mi gatunou' gamene sitohamo minine' ne'mino O'mosolati' ve gihile naza nene misubo'mi lulou' gamene sitohamo minelesuve.

Ido' Nineve aleve ingine Zona' mono' gamazi lo-ngimine' nene gilii lu'ine di velepe' izani'za lingine gili' nalo. Naza Zona'ni ivile' ogo minuve mene ogo lengi' vovotingu' mela soto' ogo mino gamazi lo-lingimuvodo' nene gili lutine di velepe' izamanako gamene nabala nene Nineve aleve nete oti lengi' lihimetine li soto' i-lingidi gonito' lengele'mize milalisave.

Ido' guvelesi vene' naba aza emala misubo monovo liginela gizebo o minine' misubo Seba nene hulo avotemoti guve'inesi ve naba Solomoni' laa' ine' gamazi lamine' nene gelelesa aka ha'na ha'na goloso ani'za neni' nene Solomoni'ni ivile' ogo mino mela lengi' vovotingu' soto' ogo mino gamazi lamine' noluvoni' nene lingine gilisa'mave. Nemu' nene gamene nabala a'mine guvelesi vene' naba ne'mo nene oto lihimetine lo soto' ogo goni' o-lengedeleseive.
Sikalahu' goloso mali'mo ve mali'mi lulou' mininguti' hulo-do viline' nene mine gelo mineline' ebekumu' nene ebe' gokota viseto' voloseive. Vise' iline'za ma ningamiline' nene
ti' lo loloseive: Naza gana' hulo uvoni' numu'nela tine' molo volove. Ne'mine lo tine' molo ogo ningeline' nene pipia' gisi di lisihe' ikeni' neiha a'mingu' evene' ma ingamani' neivo ningeleseive.

Ningo gohi vo sikalahu' goloso seveni eze ivile' igi goloso naba gehepeve minani' nene ngele'mizo ogavo a'mingu' dizi a'mine ve'mi lulo nene ingine numu'ine lolo' ogavo minilizani' nene gomu' a'mine ve minaa' ine' nesi ivile' ogosa goloso nabalo' mine molo mineleseive. Ido' ne'mine monovo nene lingine ve goloso idise nizani' aleve lengita soto' oloseive losa noluve.
Izesu' aza di gese' ave muki' nene gamazi ha lo-ngemo neivo izeleho ido' akunolo zuho ingine gamazi li-imilisa igi heta oti minani'.
Igi oti nizavo ve mali'mo ti' lo lo-imine': Gelezo. Izaho ido' nakuna zuho ingine gamazi lo-gemelone li heta home igi oti nizave.
Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo lo-imine': Ize'nehinemukisi ido' naku'nemotinemukisi nolabe. Nemu' naza lolove.

Ne'mine lo e'meti monani' alevela nene ana hisu' noogo ti' lo line': Ize'nemote naku'nemote nene mene nizani' ve. Nene nanitekumu' noluve. Okulumoku' me'nehi lulolo' igi mili iga' nave engi' nene ize'nemote naku'nemote ne nizani' nenako nemu' nene noluve.
Neloti' a'mine gameneu' nene Izesu' aza numuno nene hulo nGalilaia noso ohuno gahevela nene lemo vo mito' minine'.
A'mida nene evene' vai' goloso di nubo adi'mo sipiu' dizo mito' minavo evene' muki' ingine noso gahevela oti minani'.

Nizavo Izesu' aza inite' mukikumu' nene aneza gamaziuti' lo-ngemo minine'. Lo-ngemo mino aneza gamazi ma ti' lo line': Lingine gili'nalo. Ve ma zuho inite' tile' oga' iveli'mo zuho inite' tile' olosa vine'.
Vo tile' o'mo novivo zuho inite' linge ma nene akalo' di'mozikevo nama nete igi di nani'.
Ido' linge ma nene gehedo' misubo naba minamido' di'mozi misubo nene naba nomine' ne'mo zuho inite' nene lite' li gala ho'li dizani'za
ho' nene dizo amuzo molo lavo luhive vai' damani' nenako ne'mo gulugulu izani'.
Ido' ma nene gasava guvise huki hulikevo luhive ha minido' di'mozi gala ho'li dizani'za gasava guvise ne'mo dizo molo-ngidine'.
Ne'mine ani'za linge ma misubo lamineku' di'mozani' nete nene gala ho'li dizi gihile izani' nene hamo hamolite vanu hadeti (100) ido' sigisiti (60) ido' teoti (30) ne'mine izi'mi vani'.
Gatine ngolo' live ma nii ma nene gili lamine' ilo.
Ne'mine ogavo alinge' izipahala zuho ingine ezela vi ti' li longo' i-dani': Evene' initekumu' lo-ngemelesa aneza gamaziuti' lo-ngemaa' naine' nene nanitekumu' lo-ngemaa' nane.

Ne'mine likevo Izesu' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Okulumoku' minive O'moso ne'mo gizebo o-ledelingumu' suno' gamazi nene lengi' ha gililisave lavo lo soto' o-lengemaa' nouvoni'za evene' linge mala nene gililizave lamive.

Ido' nanimu' ve. Ve ma ingine mono' ma di nilizani' nene O'moso'mo gohi ma ngemavo di vai' li di minilisave. Ido' mono' ma di minamilizave nene engita mono' ngomo ma noline' nene a'minesi gohi ipe' ogo do voloseive.
Nemu' nene ingine ningii ningi guni isa'manako ido' gilii gili guni isa'manako nemu' nene naza aneza gamazivo' nene lo-ngemaa' nouve.
Ido' ne'mo nene O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi lo soto' oga' ive polohete Isaia'ni O'moso'mo ti' lo lo-imine' gamazi line' ma nene engito' vo gihile izave:
Gatinedunu' nene ha gililisani'za gili vevesamilizado' o neive.
Ido' vetinedunu' nene ningaa'ni ha ningilisaha
inite' ma ningamilizado' o neive.
Ne'mine losa imine' molo Isaia'ni ti' lo lo-imine':
Ido' mene aleve nene
ve'ine liko ga'ine ngi lo lu'ine hize tile vine' nizave.
Ne'mo nene ve'inedunu' inite' ma ningisa'mave.
Ido' ga'inedunu' gamazi ma gilisa'mave.
Ido' lu'inedunu' gamazi gili hehe lisa'mave.
Ingine nene ne'mine amadiniko lu'ine di velepe' izikevo
ha do lamine' o-ngiduvodine.

Gomu' polohete muki' minani' netesi ido' mono've lisihe' lamine' muki' netesi ingine neni' ogo molo nouvoni' inite' idise lingine niningani' memu' nene ningelobo li gilani'za ma ningamani' ve. Ido' laa' nouvoni' gamazi idise lingine gatinedunu' nigilani' nene gelelobo li minaa' ani'za gilamani' ve. Nemu' nene a'mine ningi gili nizani' inite' nene O'moso'mo inite' gihile nene lengeme neize. Longolize izi minilo.
Nemu' nene aneza gamazi zuho inite' tile' ine' ne'mi monovo ma nene mene gililo.

Ve ma zuho inite' tile' ogavo linge ma akalo' di'mozave luvoni' ma'mi monovo nene ne'mino neive: O'moso'mo gizebo o-ledeli gamazi lamine' nene gilii gili lamine' amave engitati' nene goloso meleho aza ogo O'moso'mo evene' lu'ningu' zuho' ine' gamazi nene do vaa' neive.
Ido' zuho inite' linge ma gehedo' di'mozave luvoni' ma'mi monovo nene ne'mino neive: Evene' ma ingine O'moso'mo gamazi've tile' ine' nene gilii lite' li gili lanite' igi di go'zaa' naha

a'mine gamazi ne'mo lu'ningu' luhise do minelido' mini mili minamavo gamene ha'namu' gili di minisa'mave. Ido' gamene ha'namu' gili di minisa'mani' nene ingine a'mine gamazi nene gili-nidavo ne'mo engita geni soto' o ngemelihe goboni mala' mala' ngemelihe. Ine' nene geti hulaa' nave.

Ido' zuho inite' linge ma nene gasava guviseu' di'mozi gala ho'li dizani'za gasava guvise goloso ne'mo molo hite-ngidine' nene evene' ma ingine O'moso'mi gamazi nene mo gili di go'zani'za oko'ine'mi initekumu' ga'ine a'midokovo' gili minaa' ido' monimu' ngumo hilivo minaa' ani' ne'mo dizo O'moso'mi gamazi inginela lemo minine' nene molo hite-davo inginela dizo gihile izamaa' neive.

Ido' zuho inite' linge ma misubo lamineku' di'mozave luvoni' ma nene evene' malite O'moso'mo gamazi tile' ine' nene gilii gili vevesi di minave engita nene gihile izaa' neive. Ee, gihile hamototi' gihile vanu hadeti (100) izaa' neine' ne'mino ve malitida nene vauve goloso elosa izaa' neive. Ido' zuho nite' hamototi' gihile sigisiti (60) izaa' neine' ne'mino ve mala nene vai' goloso izaa' neive. Ido' zuho nite' hamototi' gihile teoti (30) izaa' neine' ne'mino ve mala nene muki' izaa' neive.

Ne'mine lo Izesu' aza aneza gamazi gohi ma lo-ngimine' nene ne'mine lo lo-ngimine': Okulumoku' minive'mo eveneto' gizebo oga' ine' ne'mi monovo nene ve mali'mo mi'veu' viti gihile lamine' nene zuho' ogo nelo' gizebo oga' neine' ne'minosa nene neive.
Gamene ma holuka' mine melehosi ido' eze zuhosi ingine ingi hilikevo lovo o emaa' iveli'mo ogo viti gele vine' guvise goloso nene viti zuho' ingu' nene tile' o'mo voloseive.
Ne'mine ogavosa alinge' viti nene dizo gihile izelesa neivosa viti gele vine' guvise masi nene a'mingu' golo dizo soto' ine'.

Ne'mine ogavo agove izipe ingine mine melehine vi ti' li li-imani': Guvekasi ve gaza mingau' nene viti laminekovo' ma zuho' aine' ma nene a'mingu' viti gele vine' guvise goloso masi nene dizako nadosa dizive.

Likevo mine meleho ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lovo vete mali'mo nene zuho' o noloseive. Ne'mine lavo agove izipe ingine ti' li li-imani': Nemu' nene gaza a'mine guvise goloso nene leli' kiselilizave losa gele nabe.
Ne'mine likevo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine viti gele vine' guvise nene nokiselube li vitisi kiselikelizanako nemu' o've noluve.

Nemu' nene a'mine guvise goloso nesi maka' dizi nizavo viti hukiliza gamene nene alitelive. Viti hukaa' gamene aliteline' nene viti hukaa' ave ti' lo lo-ngedelesuve: Gomu' nene guvise goloso nene oloku' gizeloningumu' huki di go'no izi ato' di nubo i-ngidi alinge' vitila nene huki di vi neni' mino molo oga' uvoda milalizave lolosuve.

Ido' Izesu' aza aneza gamazi gohi ma ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ve mali'mo mi'veu' naba'mine sakave' zuho hamo' ma do zuho' ogavo gala ho'lo dizo naba iline' ne'mino O'moso'mi gizebou' vi hilaliza aleve engi' neti mulise'ine nene vo naba oloseive.

A'mine zuho inite' nene ngomo lasolo mino zuho inite' ato ato' muki' nene ngivile' ogo ngomo minine'za zuho' ogavo gala ho'lo dizo mingu' zuho' iga' nani' inite' muki' nene ngivile' ogo inite' naba lolo' ogo za ne'mine mineleseive. Ne'mine ogavo namalite igi a'mine initeli'mi a'navau' nene numuno gizi ingaa' nave. A'mine'mine igi O'moso'mi evenele zuho nene vi naba ilisave.

Ido' O'moso'mo gizebo o-ngedeli alevetingu' nene mono' vo naba ilingumu' aneza gamazi gohi ma ti' lo lo-ngimine': Gizebo o-ngedeline' alevetingu' Okulumoku' minive O'moso'mo gono daa' neine' nene beleti do lulu izaa' ine' inite' zisiti ne'mine neive. Vene' mali'mo beleti lolo' olosa palauva' beki ngomo sitohamo nene do nososi do gopo ogo a'mingu' zisiti ngomosi do gopo ogavo ne'mo beleti nene lulu izo naba ine'.
Evene' muki' di gese' ani' gameneu' Izesu' aza inite' muki' lo-ngemelesa ine' nene aneza gamaziutikovo' lo-ngimine'.
Ne'mino lo-ngimine' ne'mo nene O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi lo soto' oga' ive mali'mo gamazi ma ti' lo line' ma nene gihile izine':
Ve'neuti' nene aneza gamaziutikovo' nolo-ngemo
gozopo' aka'mila misubo olihe soto' amivo haleko minine' gamazi nene lo soto soto' olosuve.

Neloti' nene Izesu' aza di gese' ave muki' nene hulo-ngedo numungu' dizo minine'. Neivo izipahala zuho ezela igi viti mingu' guvise goloso dizive lo aneza gamazi laine' ma'mi monovo ma lo ngolo' lo lo-lemanivo gelelone li Izesu'ni li-imani'.
Li-imikevo Izesu' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Evene' viti gihile zuho' ive nene O'mosolati' ve gihile naza nene nouve.

Ido' mine neve nene misubo mukikumu' nene neive. Ido' viti gihile lamine' neve nene O'moso'mo gizebo ingu' mini mili minani' alevemu' nene neive. Ido' viti gele vine' guvise goloso ve luvoni' nene ve goloso Satanila mini mili minani' aleve nemu' nene neive.

Ido' lovo ve guvise goloso zuho' ive nene Satani nemu' luve. Ido' viti hukaa' gamene alitelingu' ve luvoni' nene evene' misubou' mini mili miniliza gamene osu' lavo gamene naba alitelingumu' nene luvoni' ve. Ido' viti hukilizave ve luvoni' nene angelokumu' luvoni've.
Ido' guvise goloso nene huki di nubo igi oloku' gizilisave luvodi'mine ogo evene' misubou' mini mili minilizani' gamene nene osu' lavo gamene naba alitelingu' nene ne'mine ilisave.

O'mosolati' ve gihile naza angelo'ne zuho nene ngimiselekuvo ingine vi evene' neze gizebolo' mini mili minangu' nene evene' ngele'mize goloso iga' nani' inite' muki' nesi ido' O'moso'mo lo hukine' gamazi gili huli goloso inite' daa' ave muki' nesi nene ngele'mizi vi di nubo i-ngidi
olo' nabau' huli-ngidilisave. Huli-ngidikevo a'mingu' nene mini agae agae li ive nama igi mulumo alumo gili ve'ine ingihi langolo' igi minilisave.
Ido' evene' lisihe' lamine' ingine nene me'nibo O'moso'mo gizebo o-ngidingu' nene ho' ne'minisa labana' ili minilisave. Nemu' nene evene' ma lingine gili nge li gilaa' ave ma nii ma nene gililo.

O'moso'mi gizebou' minaa' nene lamine' goloso neine' nenako evene' ingine inite' mata'ine a'minemu' huli a'mingu' vi hilalizani' monovo nene ne'mino neive: Ve mali'mo meni've dizo minine' inite' haleko misubo mau' minine' nene ningo do soto' ogo huloko olize ize'mo numu'vela tine' molo vo inite' mata've nene meni do osu' lo gohi tine' molo ogo meni've dizo minine' inite' haleko minine' misubo ma'mi melehine nene meni emo misubo do eita oga' neine' ne'minosa ne neive.

Ido' ma nene Okulumoku' minive'mi gizebou' minaa' nene lamine' goloso neine' nenako inite' mata' muki' nene hulo osu' lo a'mingu' vo holaa' ne'mi monovo nene ne'mino neive: Ve ma situva' molaa' ive mali'mo gonolise inite' laminekumu' vise' o'mo moningu' nene

vise' o'mo monine' inite' muki' ngivile' ogo lamine' goloso mino meni've nabalo' goloso minine' ma ningosa tine' molo vo inite' mata've muki' nene meni do osu' lo gohi tine' molo ogo gonolise initeli'mi melehine nene meni emo a'mine inite' do eita ine' ne'minosa ne neive.

Ido' ma nene Okulumoku' gizebo o minive'mo a'mine gizebo o miningu' vo holaloningumu' evene' ize' molo-ngedeli monovo nene ne'mino neive: Ve ma alaha' daa' ive'mo alaha' daa' golaleze' nene hulo nosou' ogavo ato ato' alaha' nene a'mingu' dizi minaa' nave.
Dizi mini vai' likevo alaha' daa' ive ne'mo gelelehe' ogo hulo gahevela ogo mito' mino lamineta nene gizeka' ogo goku' go'zo golosola do hulaa' neine' ne'minosa ne neive.

Nemu' nene evene' misubouko mini mili iliza gamene nene osu' lavo gamene nabala soto' iline' inite' nene ne'minosa soto' oloseive: Angelo' ingine igi evene' lisihe' lamineliti vovo'ningu' evene' goloso mini'mi monani' nene ize' mili huli ato' i-ngidi
di vi olo' nabau' huli-ngidikevo a'mingu' nene ve'ine ingihi langolo' igi agae agae li ive nama igi minilisave.
Nemu' nene lingine inite' muki' mene luvoni' nemu' mo gilikehe lo Izesu' lavo izipahala zuho ingine ti' li li-imani': Ee, mo gelekune.

Ne'mine likevo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Nemu' nene numuno me'ninge ma inite' milikanguti' inite' gosohokisi litehesi di soto' igi engi' numu'ningu' minave ngimaa' nani' ne'minisa linginesi mono' monovo apizi ngimaa' nave muki' nesi Okulumoku' minive'mo eveneto' gizebo o-ngedeli monovomu' gili vevesave muki' nene mono' gosohokisi litehesi di soto' igi evene' apizi ngimilisave.
Izesu' aza ne'mino aneza gamazi muki' nene lo-ngemo osu' lo a'mine ebe' nene hulo

ei' numuno ebe've gihile Nasaletela vo heteline'. Vo hetelo a'mida vene' vemoho' nene mono' numu'ningu' O'moso'mi gamazi nene lo-ngimine'. Ne'mine ogavo evene' muki' ingine vo'ine goloso vavo ti' li lani': Ne'mine mana'mine suno nesi ido' gamazi nesi zaukoti' do ave.
Aza ha kamuda ma'mi gipele neive. Izeleho nene Malia' ve li-daa' nani' vene' ne neive. Olo. Nakunolomote nene Zakobole Zosehele Simonile ido' Zudale nene nizave.

Ido' alunolo zuho nesi maka' lelikisi mene none. Aza ha a'ne'mine ve neine' nenako nemu' nene mono' laa' ido' ato' suno do soto' oga' neine' monovo nene zalati' do ave. Do ani' aka nene ma ningamuniko.

Ne'mine li Izesu'nimu' nene mulu'ningu' goloso gilani'za aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi li soto' iga' ave polohete engikumu' nene evene' muki' gilavo dizisa minaa' naha engi' zuho gihile lamine' netesi ido' misubo'ningu' aleve netesi nene engikumu' gilavo dizesa'mine' ne'minosa nazasi nouve lo line'.
Ido' Izesu' numu've ebe'veloti' aleve ingine ezemu' gili ele'vole' isa'mani' nenako nemu' nene engita O'moso'mi amuzo do soto' ogo ato ato' suno nene muki' do soto' osa'mine'.
A'mine gameneu' nene Izesu' guvele monivo guvelesi ve Helode' nene giline'.

Gelo gelekele' izipahala nene ti' lo lo-ngimine': Mene ve nene mono' noso holo-ngedaa' ive Zohane' noloseive. Bele helekuvoni' mauti' otine' ne'mo ato ato' suno daa' amuzo nene ezela neivosa ato ato' suno nene nodaloseive line'.

Ne'mine line' nene hazamu' lamive. Gomu' gala'muda vomine Helode' aza akunolo Hilipo' elenaho Helodia'ni gumine dani'. Gumine davo mono' noso holo-ngedaa' ive Zohane' ne'mo akuna'mi elenahine daine' nene lisihe' amive lo Helode'ni lo-eme'mo vo minine'. Ne'mine lo lo-eme'mo vo minivo nemu' Helode' aza Helodia'nimu' ogo a'mine Zohane'ni nene vi dalizave lo evene' ma ngimiselavo vi analo' di nalava imi ele'mizi di vi nala' numungu' huli-dani'.
Helode' aza Zohane'ni bele helelesa giline'za evene' nete Zohane'nimu' nene polohete neive li gili nizanako lo ehelele izavo hulo-mikine'.

Ne'mine ogavo neivo Helode' soto' ine' gamene ogavo ei' numungu' di gese' igi noso' nite' ni nizavo evene' muki' neti ve'nido' Helodia' aluvo ne'mo denisi ine' nene Helode' ningine' umo goloso hiline'.
Umo helavo a'mine alu ne'mo inite' ma geleline' inite' nene ha emelesuve lo O'moso'mi velelo' nolo hukuve lo lo hukine'.
Ne'mine lo lo hukavo alungo nene izeleho gala do lido' lido' ogo Helode'ni ti' lo lo-imine': Mono' noso holo-ngedaa' ive Zohane' godolo nene giti lapeseu' mili di nimilo.
Lavo guvelesi ve Helode' aza eii lo gelo agae lo giline'za aza mo O'moso'mi velelokisi ezesi maka' minaveti ve'nidokisi gamazi lo huko lo neine' ma nenako Zohane' godolo nene di di alo lo
evene' ngimiselavo vi nala' numungu' luvono giti
godolo nene di igi alungo nene imikevo do vo izelehine imine'.
Ne'mine ikevo Zohane' izipahala zuho ingine oko'no've nene di vi galese izi-di Izesu'ni vi li-imani'.

Li-imikevo gelo Helode' ezemu' line' gamazi nesi mo gelo a'mine minine' ebe' nene hulo sipiu' dizavo izipahala zuho a'mingu' ele'mizi vi angise'inevo' minilizada ebe' ga'meta vani'. Ido' nivavo evene' muki' nemu' gili tauniti' tauniti' misubou' e'meti vilida vi vi hukani'.
Ne'mine ikevo Izesu' aza a'mine ebe' ga'meta nene vo hetelo sipiuti' lemo a'mida evene' vai' di gese' igi nizavo ningo mulumo'ine gelo engikuti' inite' ngisive nene do lamine' o-ngidine'.

Ne'mine ogo neivo nivenga' molavo izipahala zuho ingine Izesu' neida igi ti' li lani': Mene ebe' nene evene' nizamani' hadivelo' nonivo nivenga' mo molaze. Evene' muki' mene vi avita minani' numuno ebekuti' angise'ine naliza noso' nite' meni hizilizangisi ngimisele hulozo.
Ne'mine likevo Izesu' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Nanimu' vilizave. Lengi' nene noso' nite' di ngimilevo.
Ne'mine lo lo-ngemavo izipahala zuho ingine lani': Noso' nite' lelita nene sikoni faefusi alaha' sitakisi moda a'nevo' neive.
Likevo aza line': Nene di nouvoda alo.

Ne'mine lo evene' nene guviselo' mito' minilizave lo Izesu' lavo li-ngidikevo minani'. Nizavo Izesu' aza sikoni faef nesi alaha' sita' nesi nene do Okulumoto' vonu' noogo O'moso opo'ni lo a'mine noso' nite' nene gito apilo izipahala zuho ize' molo ngemavo evene' nene di moni ngimani'.
nGimikevo evene' mukito' ni gatu'ine ani'. Gatu'ine ogavo izipahala zuho ingine lumo sama hulani' nene gosuvaha' tuvelu (12) ne'mine go'zi vai' lani'.
Noso' nite' nani' nene vemoho' faef tauseni (5,000) ne'minelite nani'za vene' izipe nene gatamune.

Ido' evene' nene noso' nite' ni osu' likevo neloti' Izesu' aza izipahala zuho nene sipiu' dizi noso helala gomu' nivilizave lo ngimiselo aza nene evene' muki' numu'nida ngimisele hulo hulo' ogo minine'.
nGimisele hulo osu' lo golola eikovo' O'mosola lolosa dizo vine'. Eikovo' dizo vo a'mida mino O'mosola lo neivo liti'muso izine'.
Liti'muso izavo izipahala zuho nene misubo huli hoto' igi noso olusoto' nivavo hepe' naba ne'mo ve'nidati' ogo noso nene sipilo' beleka' beleka' ivo vivi' vivi' igi minani'.
Ne'mine i'mi nivavo go' lo'mo lomo nedenga' fo kiloku he faef kiloku he nela nene Izesu' aza noso avilelo' lise lise nizada ani'.
Nizada noso avilelo' navo ningi golise goloso gili mene holoso neive li ngehelele izavo geke' lani'.
Geke' lani'za a'mido' geto Izesu' gamazi lo-ngemo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Neni' ma ne nouze. Lengehelele izamivo mini ngi li minilo.
Ne'mine lavo Petolo' ti' lo line': Guvekasi ve gaza nene mo gei' lamine' noo ma nene lanivo nosolo' nene ogo gei' nanida alove.
Ne'mine lo lavo anevo lo Izesu' lavo Petolo' aza sipiuti' lemo api' ogo noso avilelo' lise lise Izesu' neida volosa ine'.
Volosa ine'za novo hepeli'mo noso biline' nene ningo vono vavo golise giline' ne'mo nosoli'mo do su'mize-delesa ine'. Ne'mine ogavo Petolo' asi lo ti' lo line': Guvekasi ve do nu' izevo.
Lavo Izesu' geto ogo ana hulo do hozi nolo-do ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza nenikumu' gele ele'vole' amo noso'mo nebelelihe nebelamilihe lo nanimu' gaka sita' gelane.
Ne'mine igi sipiu' dizikesivo hepe' nene zou lo matine'.
Hepe' nene matavo sipiu' minave ingine opo'ni li gubi' izi imi lamineto' gei' nene mo O'moso'mi gipele nane li li-dani' ve.
Ne'mine igi noso helala vii nGenesalete misubouko heteli sipiuti' limani'.
A'mida nene evenelite Izesu'ni nene ningi guni ani'. Ne'mine igi a'midoti' numudo' numudo' gamazi hulikevo evene' inite' gizi dave nene do lamine' o-ngedelive li ngele'mizi ezela igi

amuzo mili ti' li li-imani': Okongalo' inite' lolovolokovo' nevone di gililizadotikisi nene lamine' ilizani' nenako nemu' nene gele ngemanivo di gililizave li lani'. Ido' oko'nolo' inite' lolovolo' di gilave muki' nene mo lamine' ani' ve.
Neloti' nene Halisaio' mono' laa' ave linge masi avo'ningelite lani' mono' apizi ngimaa' ave linge masi Zelusalemi numudati' Izesu' neida ani'. Igi ti' li longo' i-dani':
Gei' izipaha zuho ingine noso' nite' nalisa a'ine noso izamaa' nani' nene avotemote e'metilo li li-limaa' ani' gamazi nene avuto' iga' nani' nene ne'mine amilizanako nanimu' avuto' iga' nave.
Likevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ido' langisetine avotemotidati' monovote nene do minelone li O'moso'mo lou' gamazi lo huko-lidine' nene avuto' iga' nani' nene nanimu' nave.

Ne'mine noluvoni' mene lingine ti' iga' nangumu' noluve: O'moso'mo lingine izetingine metinginemu' gilavo dizavo gelekele' lamine' i-ngidivo' minilo. Ido' ma nene ve mali'mo izelehingi melehingi gamazi goloso lo-ngedeline' nene bilikevo helelive lo line'.

Line'za lingine ti' li laa' nave: Ve mali'mo izelehinemupe melehinemupe inite' molo nouvonguti' nene ma gimuvodiba a'mine inite' nene mo O'mosomu' ogo molo nouvonako gei' gemamolosuve lo lo-emeline' nene a'mine line' inite' nene izele mele ngemamiline' nene lamine' ve. Ne'mine laa' nani' nene izelehine melehinemu' gelekele' lamine' amiline' aka nene si'zi-daa' nave. A'ne'mine ani' nene avotingidati' di minani' gamazi ne'mo O'moso'mo line' gamazi neve haza nite' lolo' oga' neive.
Lingine lutine goloso o vine' nene di halekisa evene' lamine' gili monaa' nave, polohete Isaia' O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi ti' lo line' ma nene lengikumu' lamine' lani' neive:
Mene aleve ingine ve'ine avileloti' nopo'ni li
neni' gulive di hozi laa' nani' nene
lu'ine nezela milamavo lu'ine've nene hoto' minaa' neive.
Haza eveneliti gamazi nene neze gamazi gidini lolo' ogavo
li-ngimi ngimi' igi minaa' nani' nenako
nenikumu' nopo'ni laa' nani' nene gopo hazamu' laa' nave.
Ne'mine lo Izesu' aza evene' muki' nene asi lo-ngemo ti' lo lo-ngimine':

Lingine inite' ma nikevo ne'mo evene' lu'ine do goloso o-ngedaa' neive li gilaa' nahe. Gamazi mene gilii gili nge li gililo. Evene' lu'ine do goloso o-ngedaa' neine' inite' nene ve'ningu' mili naa' nani' inite' nene nevoba lu'ninguti' dizo ve'ninguti' soto' ogo leme heta oga' neine' inite' ne'mo nene lu'ine do goloso o-ngedaa' neive.
Ne'mine lavo alinge' nene izipahala zuho ingine Izesu' neida igi ti' li longo' i-dani': Halisaio' mono' laa' ave ingine gei' gamazi laningumu' mulu'ningu' goloso ogavo upuho' ani' nene ningabe.

Ne'mine likevo Izesu' aza gamazi ti' lo lo-ngimine': Okulumoku' me'nehi evenele nene ei' mi've ne'mine nizanako aza me'neho zuho' amivo a'mine mi'veu' gopo dizani' inite' muki' nene kiselo do huloloseive.

A'mine Halisaio' mono' laa' ave nene ningi mati-ngimikilo. Minilizaze. Ingine evene' mono' akalo' ngele'mizi vaa' ave nizani'za angise'ine aka ningi guni isa'manako ve'ine likivete ve'ine likive ma nene aka ngelebizi vani' gelave. Nemu' nene vele likive mali'mo vele likive ma ele'mizo viline' nene sitato' galeseu' velehe' limilisasive.
Ne'mine lavo Petolo' ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza gamazi monovo've haleko minine' gepe' gamazi ne'mine laine' ma nene lo ngolo' lo lo-lemevo.
Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo line': Izipaha'ne zuho lingine gili nilisave lo giluvoni'za linginesi olihe gili guni amahe.
Inite' muki' nene ve'ningu' nikevo gatu'ningu' lemo ise galeseu' vaa' neine' nene lingine ningi gilamahe.
Ne neine'za ve'ninguti' leme heta oga' neine' inite' nene lu'ninguti' dizo oga' neinako ne'mo nene evene' lu'ine do goloso o-ngedaa' neive.

Inite' lu'ninguti' dizaa' neine' inite' nene ne'mino neive: Ga'ine goloso gilaa', evene' ngebele helaa', vene' vemoho' alungo umungive gopo ingi monaa', gumine damine oga', soza sakupo gamazi laa' ido' evene' dovo ledevo' ogo ngemenga laa' monovo ne neive.
Mene inite' muki' ne'mo nene evene' lu'ine do goloso o-ngedaa' neive. Evene' a'ine noso izami noso' nite' gopo nani' ne'mo nene lu'ine do goloso o-ngedesa'mive.
Ne'mine ogo Izesu' aza a'mine minine' misubo nene hulo vo Tilo numuno ebe' ido' Sidoni numuno ebe' neti gahevela minine' misubou' volosa vine'.

A'mine numuno ebe' gahevelati' Zuda vene' minamine' Kanaha vene' mali'mo ogo gamazi nabati' ti' lo lo-imine': Guvekasi ve, gozopo' guvelesi ve naba Davidi' a'vopilemo' ezelo' medelo minanive make, gaza mulumo'ne ningevo. Alune nene sikalahu' goloso lulouko neivo mo goloso ogo neive.

Ne'mine line'za a'mine gamazi'velo' nene Izesu' gamazi hamokisi mo lo-emamine'. Ne'mine ogavo izipahala zuho ingine ezela igi ti' li lani': Vene' mene gamazi lo'mo lo'mo le'meto ogo minine' nenako nemu' imiselo huliline lo nogilune.
Likevo Izesu' ti' lo line': Naza nene nimiselive nene Isilaele' aleve sipisipi ne'mine mini vi tolovo igi moni minani' engita vo gono daline lo nimiselavo uvoni' nouve.
Ne'mine line'za vene' aza ogo gizeneu' golo hizo ongo ti' lo line': Guvekasi ve, ogo gamazi'ne gelo hize apase-nedelibo.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' aza ti' lo line': Izipeliti noso' nite' ipe' ogo gulo hulo-ngemaa' nene edamive. O'moso'mi izipahala zuho Isilaele' aleve do lamine' o-ngedaa' nouvoni' nene heta ato' ve geita oloni' nene a'mine'mine ogo edamilihe lo gele nouve.

Lavo vene' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Guvekasi ve, izipeliti noso' nite'ine ipe' ogo gulo hulo ngemaa' nene edamive lo lamine' laine'za me'ninge noso' nite' naa' ani' holomoloti' lana do'mozine' nene gulo nete ha naa' nave. Nemu' nene heta ato' vene' nenikisi nene gele nemeline' nene ha lamine' oloseive.

Ne'mine lavo gelo Izesu' ti' lo lo-imine': Aizo, vene' mene gaza gele ele'vole' aineka nene mo gele ele'vole' ogo gelane. Nemu' nene gele ele'vole' aine' initeka nene ha soto' o gemeleseive. Lavo noline' velesi aluvo nene lamine' ine' ve.
Izesu' aza a'mine minine' ebe' nene hulo tine' molo nGalilaia noso ohuno gahevela nene lemo vo gololo' dizo vo minine'.

Ne'mine ogavo evene' muki' ingine gebili mini gize'ine a'ine goloso o vine' ido' ve'ine like vine' ido' gamazi lamilizani' o vive ido' inite' gizi dave masi masi muki' nene ngele'mizi Izesuda vi gizenela ingi-ngidikevo aza do lamine' o-ngidine'.

Ne'mine ogavo vene' vemoho' muki' ingine ningi negi nete gamazi api' igi lani', oko'nido' goloso ine' aleve lamine' ani', gize'ine goloso o vine' aka monani', ido' ve'ine likive gohi ve'ine ningani' nene ningi vo'ine goloso vavo mini engi' Isilaele' aleveti O'moso'ine nene opo'ni li gulive've di hozi lani'.

Ne'mine ogo Izesu' aza izipahala zuho asi lo-ngemavo ikevo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Mene aleve nene nazasi gamene sito hamo maka' minunidi'mo noso' nite'inesi nomivo engikumu' mulu'ne hukave. Akalo' ga'na'mo ve'ine ga'ine monavo di'mozikelizave lo noso' nite' namavo haza ngimiselamolove lo gele nouve.

Ne'mine lavo izipahala zuho ingine ti' li lani': Ebe' hadivelo' noune' nenako nemu' nene noso' nite' vai' ado' evene' vai' me'minelite nalizani' votigilelo' nene zalati' dalone. Dalone' akate nene ma nomive.
Likevo Izesu' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lengita sikoni nanike' neve. Lavo ingine lani': Seveni ve ido' alaha' ngomosikisi ma neive.
Likevo evene' muki' nene mito' minilizave li li-ngidilizave lo Izesu' lavo li-ngidikevo mito' minani'.
Minikevo sikoni seveni nesi alaha' nesi do O'moso opo'ni lo noso' nite' nene gito apilo izipahala zuho ize' molo ngemavo evene' nene di moni ngimani'.
nGimikevo mukito' ni gatu'ine ani'. Gatu'ine ogavo lumo sama hulani' nene izipahala zuholite gosuvaha' naba seveni ne'mine go'zi vai' lani'.
Noso' nite' nani' nene vemoho' fo (4) tausenilite nani'za vene' izipe nene gatamune.
Ne'mine ikevo Izesu' evene' muki' nene ngimisele huloko sipiu' dizo izipahala zuhosi Magadani misubola vani'.

Halisaio' mono' laa' ave linge masi Sadukaio' mono' laa' ave linge masi Izesu' neida igi emengu' mili ti' li lani': Gaza O'moso'mo geikisi neive laa' naine' nene lamine' labe gosoho' labe ne'mi monovo nene ningelonge. Okulumoku' minive O'moso aza amuzo gemavo gaza atoli'mine suno do soto' ogo lelebizanivo ningelone li li-imani'.
Ti' li li-imikevo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Nivenga' molavo guhizangi' iline' nene lingine ningi aize' nene ho' lo gamene lamine' oloseive li laa' nave.

Ido' nedenga' go' lalosa guhizangi' elo limuso gonobu' hitine' nene lingine ningi goline izo hepe' eleleseive li laa' nave. Ne'mine igi Okulumota ningisa ne'mine inite' soto' oloseive li ningi gilaa' nani'za soto' iline' inite' ato atokumu' O'moso'mo molani' gamene aliteline' monovo nene ningi gili minisa'mave.

Mene gamenelo' nizave lingine evene' golosovo' mini vene' ma va'ningine huli ve gohi malo' vi lihime daa' nani' ne'mine igi O'mosotine huli lihime daa' nave. Lingine nenikumu' atoli'mine suno do soto' ogo O'moso'mo amuzo nimine' nene lengelebizelongumu' nilani'za ma lengelebizamolosuve. O'moso'mo gozopo' eze veleti' gamazi lo soto' oga' ive Zonada ato' suno do soto' ogo amuzo've ngelebizine' ma'minevo' ma nenita soto' ogavo nevo' ningilisave. Ne'mine lo hulo-ngedo vine'.
Ido' izipahala zuho ingine Izesukisi sipiu' dizi noso ohuno helala vani' nene beletimu' ga'ine molavo ma di vamani'.

Ne'mine ikevo Izesu' aza evene' maliti ngemeni damenimu' beleti do lulu izaa' ine' inite' zisitilo' lo molo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Halisaio' mono' laa' ave ido' Sadukaio' mono' laa' ave engitati' zisiti nene dikelizaze. Nemu' ningisa minilo.
Ne'mine lavo ingine li volelo' melo' igi ti' li lani': Laza beleti ma do amune' nenako nemu' lave.
Izesu' aza gamazi li volelo' melo' ani' nemu' nene mo ningo gelo ti' lo line': Lingine gili ele'vole' amave mene beleti di amani' nemu' nene nanitekumu' gamazi li volelo' melo' nave.
Naza beleti faef (5) do gito ize' molo evene' faef (5) tauseni ngemekuvo nisa lumo sama hulani' nedunu' nene lingine gosuvaha' tuvelu go'zi vai' lani' mamu' gatine molahe.
Ido' beleti seveni do gito ize' molo evene' fo (4) tauseni ngemekuvo nisa lumo sama hulani' nene lingine gosuvaha' naba gidini seveni go'zi vai' lani' mamu' gatine molahe.

Beleti nene ne'mine ogo ha do soto' olosuvonako beletimu' lamuvoni' nene lingine gili nilisave lo giluvoni'za gilamani' neive. Halisaio' mono' laa' ave ido' Sadukaio' mono' laa' ave engitati' zisiti nene dikelizaze. Nemu' ningisa minilo.

Ne'mine lavo neloti' alinge' nene beleti do lulu izaa' initekumu' lamo zisitimu' lo molo line' ma nene Halisaio' mono' laa' avelite ido' Sadukaio' mono' laa' avelite gamazi ladeni igi evene' apizi ngimaa' ani' monovo nene do minalone li ningi minilizangumu' line' ma nene alinge' mo gili ngolo' lani' ve.
Izesu' aza Kaesalea Hilipi misubola vo hetelo izipahala zuho ti' lo longo' o-ngidine': O'mosolati' ve gihile nenikumu' nene zaho ve li laa' nave.

Ne'mine lo longo' o-ngedavo ingine ti' li lani': Evene' linge ma nete mono' noso holo-ngedaa' ive Zohane' hilinguti' otosa noloseive li laa' nave. Ido' linge ma nete gozopo' polohete Elia' aza gohi soto' oloseive ma nene tine' molo abe li laa' nave. Ido' ma nete polohete Zelemia' ma helaninguti' otosa nolibe polohete ato' ma minaine' helanive nolibe li laa' nave.
Ne'mine likevo Izesu' gohi ti' lo longo' o-ngidine': Ido' ingine nene mo ne'mine laa' nani'za lingine nenikumu' nene zaho neve li laa' nave.
Ne'mine lo longo' o-ngedavo Simoni' Petolo' aza a'mido' ti' lo line': Minevo' minevo' O'moso'mo do lu' izelove lo gipele do kegeso gimiselive ma ne nane.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo lo-imine': Zona' gipele Simonizo, haza evenelite a'mine monovo'ne nene li-gimikevo lamane. Okulumoku' me'neho veka do lapa nomine' o-gedavo lange. Nemu' nene lamine' iline' akalo' mine molo nange. Golizesi minezo.

Ido' ti' lo nolo-gimuze. Gelezo. Gaza guliveka Petolo' nane. Ido' Petolo' ne'mi monovo nene ele'vole' geheni ve lo nenako nemu' evene'ne zuho do soto' o-ngedo ele'vole' igi minilizave lo a'mine ele'vole' gehedo' do gi'mize-ngedekuvo ve goloso'mi amuzo've ne'mo ngelo ngivile' amivo helaa' ne'mo mudise hele osu' laa' akalo' ma ngele'mize molamoloseive.

Naza Okulumoku' minive'mi gizebou' vi hilalizani' amuzo gemekuvo evene' ngele'mizo O'moso'mo gizebo ingu' vo holalosane. Ido' misubouko gaza evene'ne zuho gamazi inite' mamu' lo huko lo-ngemo ne'mine amilo lo o've lo-ngedeline' nene Okulumokuko O'moso ne'mosi a'mine initekumu' o've lo lo huko-ngedeleseive. Ido' misubouko gaza inite' mamu' nene ne'mine oga' ve lo lo-ngedeline' nene Okulumokuko O'moso ne'mosi a'mine initekumu' mo ne'mine oga' ve lo lo-ngedeleseive.
Ne'mine lo Petolo'ni lo-emosa Izesu' aza eikumu' nene O'moso'mo do kegeso imiselelesa live neive li eze monovo mo keke' evene' masi li-ngimamilo lo amuzo molo lo izipahala zuho nene ga'ine dani'.

Ido' a'mine gamene neloti' Izesu' aza api' ogo ti' lo lo-ngeme'mo vo minine': Neni' gono ne'mo gihile've do soto' ilingumu' naza Zelusalemi numuda vokuvo a'mida mono' gizebo vesi ido' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi ido' Zuda vete gozopotati' laa' nani' mono' apizi ngimaa' avesi ingine goboni mili-nidi mulumo gono nimi nibili hililisave.

Ne'mine ikevo helo gamene sitohamo minekuvo O'moso'mo do ote-nedeleseive. Ne'mine lavo Petolo' aza do gahevela o-miko elemo ti' lo line': Guvekasi ve, ne'mine lamozo. O'moso'mo do gu' izavo laine' inite' mo keke' gei' okongalo' soto' amoloseive.

Ne'mine lo line'za Izesu' aza velepe' izo Petolo'ni ti' lo lo-imine': Satani gaza akalo' nene golise ozo. Gaza gaka gele naine' nene O'moso'mo gilidi'mino gelamo me misubou' evenelite gilaa' adi'mino gele naine' nenako volodo' o neine' aka'nela ogo hizo notilange. Satani gaza olovo' ozo.

Ne'mine lo Izesu' aza eze e'metaa' ave gamazi ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ve ma ingine ne'meto alone li gilii ma gomu' nene minevo' alevo'ine gizebo iga' nani' monovo'ine nene huli alami neni' ne'metilizangumu' ve goloso nizave li lohoto' zalo' ngibili hililizangumu' nene gili hulisa ne'meti alizave.

Ido' ne'mine igisa ne'meti alizave lo noluvoni' nene nanitekumu' luhe. Lingine mene gililo. Ve ma ingine neni' ne'metelone' nene geni initeli'mi lulou' vo minevo' alevote hulalone li ne'metamilizave nene minevo' minevo' minaa' ngemeni dameni nene ma damilisave. Damilisaha ve ma ingine ne'meti vilizangu' ngibili hilikevo minevo' alevo'ine hulilizani' nene alinge' minevo' minevo' ngemeni dameni dalisave.

Ee, misubouko mene minevo' alevo' igi mini misubou' inite' vai' di engita igi minilizangu' nene minevo' minevo' minaa' ngemeni'ine hulilizani' nene a'mine inite' vai' nete nene ma hize ele' i-ngidamilisave. Ee, evene' ma ingine minevo' minevo' minaa' ngemeni dameni ma hulilizani' nene a'mine ngemeni dameni di engita olone li a'mido' golo hizilizani' inite' hamokisi ma minamoloseive.

Ido' O'mosolati' ve gihile naza me'nehi emeni dameni lamine' nene do ti' ogo mino angelo'ne zuhosi ngele'mizo alosuve. Ido' aloni' nene naza evenelite hamo' hamo' inite' golososi ido' laminekisi igi mili minani' votigilelo' nene meni ngemelesuve.
Lamine' lo-lengemelesuve. Melo' nizave lengikuti' linge ma hilami ha nizavo naza O'mosolati' ve gihile Guve'nesi ve lolo' ogo evene'ne zuho gizebo o-ngedelesa soto' ogo lemo nouvo ingine ningilisave.
Gamene sigisi ogo vavo Izesu' aza Petolo'ni ve Zakobo'ni ve ido' nakunolo Zohane'ni nesi ngele'mizo golo ha'nalo' dizo vavo a'mida nene engikovo' mini
ningi nizavo Izesu' nene oko'no do atoli'mine ogavo golo veleloti' nene ho' ne'mine hulo mino oko'nolo' initeto' nene labana' elo mokono' goloso elo minine'.
Ne'mine neivo nelo' nene Moseki Eliakisi soto' i ngimi Izesu' nesi gamazi li volelo' melo' igi minani'.

Ne'mine igi nizavo Petolo' Izesu'ni ti' lo lo-imine': Guvekasi ve, maka' melo' minune' nene lamine' ogave. Nemu' gaza gele nemanivo azibe sitohamo gizelove. Ma nene geikumu' ve. Ma nene Mose'ni ve ido' ma nene Elia'ni ve line'.

Ti' lo gamazi nolivo silingenge'ne hulo minine' limuso'mo ogo molo hite-ngidine'. Molo hite-ngedavo a'minguti' gamazi ma ti' lo soto' ine': Me ve nene neni' gipe'ne lu'ne eme nouvoni' ne neive. Eikumu' lanite' goloso nogiluve. Lingine eze gamazi've gili dalo.
Izipahala zuho sitohamo a'mine gamazi gili ngehelele izavo go'ine hizi ingi minani'.
Ne'mine igi nizavo Izesu' aza ogo oko'nido' do nogelo ti' lo line': Lingine lengehelele izamivo otilo.
Ne'mine lavo ingine oti ningani' nene evene' ma ningami Izesukovo' neivo ningani'.

Ne'mine igi gololoti' maka' limi niigi Izesu' ti' lo ga'ine dani': Lingine a'mine ningani' inite' nemu' evene' hamokisi li-ngimamavo O'mosolati' ve gihile naza nene helekuvo me'neho do ote-nedavo ma nene ha li soto' ilizave lo ga'ine dani'.

Ne'mine lavo izipahala zuho ti' li longo' i-dani': Ido' do lu' izelive lo O'moso'mo do kegeso imiselelesa live nene a'mine gozopo' minine' polohete Elia' ne'mo gomu' molo-do tine' molo aloseive li avotemoti mono' gamazi apizi limaa' avete laa' nani' ma nene nanimu' laa' nave.
Ne'mine li longo' i-dikevo aza ti' lo line': Elia' inite' muki' do veveselesa O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live gomu' molo-do aloseive lani' nene mo lamineto' nilave.

Ido' naza lamineto' noluve. Elia' nene mo gomu' ani' ma nene ingine Elia' ve li ningi guni ami angise ga'ine gilani' inite' i-di bili hilani'. Ido' O'mosolati' ve gihile nenikisi nene a'mine'mine ogo engi' a'ningu' okuvo ingine mulumo gono nimi eze i-dadi'mine i-nidilisave.
Ne'mine lavo izipahala zuho ingine nene mono' noso holo-ngedaa' ive Zohane'nimu' nene nolo-limive li gili nge li gilani'.
Ido' Izesule golo gizeneu' limi evene' muki' di gese' ado' navo ve mali'mo ogo Izesu'ni obuvolo hize emo ti' lo line':
Guvekasi ve, neze gipe'ne nene lemo lise-davo goloso ogo mino oloku' lemo pou' laa' ido' nosou' lemo pou' laa' oga' neive. Nemu' nene muhele've ninge-devo.
Geze ge'metaa' avela ele'mizo uvoni'za ma ngeli di lamine' i-damave.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo line': Eii, lingine ngeli imiseli hulisa'mani' nehe. O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' amani' zuho lutine zovo' ize vine' mene lengikumu' gosele' nebele'mo novivo lengi' vovotingu' gamene gohi ma imine' molo mino langamuzo hize'mo vo mineloni' nemu' nene agae lo noluve. A'mine gipe ele'mizi alo lo lavo
ele'mizi ikevo izipe do goloso o-do minine' sikalahu' goloso nene Izesu' ganu' elemavo izipe nene hulo-do lemo vavo izipe nene a'midoti' lamine' ine'.
Ne'mine ogavo alinge' angisevo' mini izipahala zuho Izesuda igi ti' li longo' i-dani': Sikalahu' goloso nene laza naniteli'mo imisele hulamolonido' ine' neve.

Likevo Izesu' ti' lo line': Naniteli'mo ve. Lengi' O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' ani' nene naba minamidi'mo ve. Sakave' zuho nene inite' ngomo lasolo neine'za lingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' anitine ngomo nene a'mine zuho nite' ngomo ne'mine votigilelo' vo lisihe' oti' oti' iline' nene alinge' inite' lamine' ma ilisa navo inite' ma aka hize tile-lengedo golo ne'mine mineline' nene a'mine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' anitine ngomo nedunukisi a'mine golomu' olovo' ogo ebe' mala vozo lilizani' nene ha olovo' ogo voloseive. Ido' inite' mamu' ne'mine olone li lilizani' nene amilizavoba ha ilisave.
Gamene ma izipahala zuhosi nGalilaia misubou' mini'mi nivavo Izesu' aza izipahala zuho ti' lo lo-ngimine': O'mosolati' ve gihile neni' nene evene' maliti a'ningu' nele'mizi milikevo
nibili hilikevo helo gamene sitohamo minekuvo O'moso'mo gohi nele'mize oteleseive. Ne'mine lavo izipahala zuho ingine mulu'ine gitihine' ogavo mulumo goloso gili-di minani' ve.

Ido' Izesu' ve izipahala zuho ve ingine Kahanaumi numuda igi hetelikevo O'moso'mi gono mono' numuno nabala daa' nani' nene hize ele' ilive li takisi moni daa' ave ingine Petolo' neida igi ti' li longo' i-dani': Lengi' tisatine nene takisi moni hulaa' nooloseive. Olo.

Ne'mine li longo' i-dikevo oo, hulaa' neine' ve line': Ne'mine lo numunguko dizo olihe gamazi lamivo Izesu' ti' lo line': Simonizo, misubou' misubou' guve'inesi vete takisi moni daa' nani' nene zamotidati' daa' nave. Engi' zuholati' daa' nahe ato' vetidati' daa' nave. Nemu' gaza nadive lo gele nane.

Lavo Petolo' ti' lo line': Ato' vetidati' daa' nave. Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo lo-imine': Ato' vetidati' takisi moni daa' ve nene lamine' lainako nemu' nene guvelesi veti zuho nene takisi moni meni hizisa'mave. Nemu' nene me'nehi gonomu' hulaa' nani' takisi moni nene gipele naza hulamoloni' o neine'za

evene' ingine goloso gilikelizave losa ha hulolove. Gaza vo noso ohunguti' alaha' belaa' nala' nene hulo nosou' ogo alaha' gana' ma beleline' nene vele do aa' o-do ningeline' nene moni nevo ma neivo ningelesange. A'mine nene do vo nenitokisi geitokisi takisi moni ngemezo.
A'mine gamenelo' izipahala zuho ingine neida igi ti' li longo' i-dani': Okulumoku' minive'mo gizebo o-lidingu' mene zaho livile' ogo dizosa neive.
Ne'mine likevo Izesu' aza izipe ma asi lo vovo'ningu' do ote-miko
ti' lo line': Naza lamine' nolo-lingimuve. Lutine di velepe' izi lutine di limi izipe ngomo me'mine minamilizani' nene Okulumoku' minive'mo gizebo ingu' nene vamilisave. O've. Vi hilamilisave.
Ido' ve ma ingine izipe ngomo me'mine igi engi' oko'inemu' gilikevo lemo mine do vaa' neine' ne'mini minilizave nete nene Okulumoku' veli'mo gizebo ingu' minave linge ngivile' igi dizisa minilisave.
Ido' ve ma ingine nenikumu' ve li izipe ngomo me'mine ma ngele'mize lamine' ilizani' nene neni' nele'mize lamine' ani' geleleseive.

Ido' nenikumu' gili ele'vole' igi minaa' nani' izipaha'ne zuho limi minani' engikuti' hamo' ma evene' mali'mo goloso nite' daline' akau' ele'mize molalosa neivo ma a'mine ve nene O'moso'mo mulumo gono naba' naba emalinako nemu' nene goloso nite' daline' akau' nene olihe ele'mize molamivo gomu' nene luvonou' geni'vesi geheni naba nene nalava izi-di noso ohuno nabau' ehuso' i hulikevo a'mingu' lemo heleline' nene lamine' oloseive.

Me misubou' nene evene' ngimimise' igi aka golosolo' ngele'mizi milaliza inite' nene soto' amilizavoba mo vai' soto' ilisanako nemu' nene me misubou' alevemu' mulumo nogele-lingiduve. Ido' a'mine evene' ngimimise' igi aka golosolo' ngele'mizi milaliza inite' di soto' ilizave nene O'moso'mo lihime naba ngemeleseinako engikumu' agae lo mulumo nogele-ngiduve.

Ido' anga sitakisi gizenga sitakisi nanivo O'moso'mo lihime gemo lihizami oloku' hulo-gedavo lemo minalinge. Anga nehe gizenga nehe netise lihime daa' akalo' gele'mize nimilasivo ma ne'mine amilizo lo angasi gizengasi nene huko hulaine' gilivosa minezo. Ne'mine ogo gizenga anga gebili do minaine' gilivo minevo' minevo' ebekuko viline' nene ede voloseive.

Ido' vega sitakisi nanivo O'moso'mo lihime gemo lihizami oloku' hulo-gedavo lemo minalinge. Vega ne'mo lihime daa' aka ma nogelebizivo ma nene ne'mine amozo lo vega nene kuluhize hulaine' gilivosa minezo. Ne'mine ogo vega hela gebili do minaine' gilivo minevo' minevo' ebeku' viline' nene ede voloseive.
Lingine izipaha'ne zuho ngomo ngomo engi' neti angelo'ine nene gamene gamene me'nehi velelo' minaa' nanaze. Lingine a'mine izipemu' gilavo haza nite' ogalive. Nemu' nene ehee noluve.

Ido' lingine nadive li nigilave. Ve mali'mi sipisipi ize vanu hadeti (100) minilizanguti' hamo' ma vo halekeline' nene a'minemu' vise' amilihe. Ne'mino nomive. Sipisipi ize naedi naeni (99) nene a'mida golola hulo-ngimiko hamo' vo halekine' nemu' nene vise' o'mo voloseive. Olo.

Ee, aza vise' ogo do soto' iline' nene naza lamineto' nolo-lingimuve. Olize goloso izeleseive. Olize izeline' nene sipisipi vi halekami mela naedi naeni (99) minani' mamu' olize izine' ma nene ivile' ivosa olize izeleseive.
A'mine'mine ogo izipaha'ne zuho ngomo ngomo nizanguti' mene Okulumoku' Metibo ne'mo hamokisi vo halekilive lo lu'veu' gelesa'mive.

Ido' evene' mali'mo gei' mulunga do goloso o-gedo lihime davo ma gaza a'mine ve neida vanivo lengi' sitakovo' mini a'mine lihime dani' monovo nene elebizanivo ningelive. Ningo gele gemeline' nene a'mine ve nene gohi aka lamineta nene mo ele'mizo ogane.

Ido' gele gemamivo ma nene evene' gohi sitape sitohamo he do gi'mizo maka' vi lihime dani' monovo nene elebizilo. Ne'mine ilizani' nene mono' godolou' minine' gamazi mau' nene vo daloseive. A'mine gamazi nene ti' lo neive: Gamazi gono nidavo lihime dave'mi monovo nene evene' sitape sitohamo he ne'minete likevo gamazi lilizani' vo hamo' iline' nene lisihe' oloseive.

Ido' ngele'mizo vaniveti gamazi'ine nesi gele hulavo ma ei' lihime dani' monovo nene mono' aleveti muliseu' lo soto' oganivo ingine liliza gamazi nesi gele hulavo ma gaza gelanivo evene' ato' nene mono' gilamavetingutipe takisi moni daa' ave goloso engikutipe minine' gelavo ezesi bizamanivo atokovo' monaa' ilive.

Ido' naza lamine' nolo-lingimuve. Misubouko lingine evene'ne zuho gamazi inite' mamu' li huki li-ngimi ne'mine amilo li o've li-ngidilizani' nene Okulumokuko O'moso ne'mosi a'mine initekumu' nene o've lo lo huko-ngedeleseive. Ido' misubouko lingine inite' mamu' nene ne'mine oga' ve li li-ngidilizani' nene Okulumokuko O'moso ne'mosi a'mine initekumu' mo ne'mine oga' ve lo lo-ngedeleseive.

Ido' gohi ma imine' molo lo-lengemeloze: Evene' setape setohamohe ne'minete neni' aleve minani' di gese' igi nopo'ni nilavo ma naza engi' vovo'ningu' hize ele' o-ngedo mineloni' nenako lengikuti' sitalitise inite' mamu' lu'ine mili hamo' igi mini O'mosola lilisine' nene Okulumoku' neive Me'neho ne'mo ha gele ngemeleseive.

Ne'mine ogo Petolo' aza Izesu' neida ogo ti' lo longo' o-dine': Guvekasi ve, evene' mali'mo lihime neme'mo vo mineline' nene lihime hulo-deloni' nene gamene nanike' hulo-delove. Gamene seveni (7) avo' lihime've hulo-miko ha minelohe. Olo.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Gamene seveni (7) avo' lihime've hulo-deline noluvoba lihime've hulo-de'mo vo mineline' nene gamene sevedi seveni (77) nesi ivile' ogo mo lihime doka' doka' neivo ma hulo-dakovo' olosane.

Nemu' nene Okulumoku' minive'mo eveneto' gizebo ogo lihime'ine hulo-ngedeline' monovomu' nene ne'mino lo molo lo-lengemelove: Guvelesi ve mali'mo gelekele' izipaha'ne zuho dina' o-ngiduvoni' nene do lisihe' olove lo gelo
api' ogo do lisihe' neivo gelekele' izipe ma nene ele'mizi guvelesi ve neida ani'. Gozopo' a'mine gelekele' izipe nene teni (10) milioni kina dina' ogo guvelesi velati' dani'.

Ne'mine ine'za aza nene a'mine monilo' golo hizo emeline' moni nene ma molamine' nenako nemu' guvelesi ve aza ti' lo line': A'mine ganalalo' apaselingumu' nene ezesi venele izipahalasi inite' mata'vesi maketi ebeta ngele'mizi di vikevo meni hizi-ngidi osu' likevo moni dalove line'.
Lavo a'mine gelekele' ve lo-imine': Agae, gaza ise'ne ize'mo novanivo dina' o-nidanido' golo hize'mo vo osu' loloho.
Ne'mine lavo guvelesi ve aza mulumo've ningo alinge' dina' o-giduvoni' monilo' nene golo hizo nemamolosane lo lo-do imisele huline'.

Imisele hulavo heta lemo vine' nene gelekele' izipe ezesi gono makato' daa' asive nene ningine'. A'mine ve nene guvelesi ve'mo moni naba imive ne'mo dina' o-do vanu hadeti (100) kina imive minine' nene ningo luvono do nohoto ti' lo line': Gaza nenitati' moni dina' aine' malo' nene alo' golo hizezo.
Ne'mine lavo gono makato' daa' asive ne'mo lemo gizeneu' obuvolo hize emo ti' lo line': Gaza ise'ne ize'mo novanivo alinge' a'mido' golo hize-gedeloho.
Ne'mine line'za gele hulo o'ove lo gonito' ele'mize molo ti' lo line': Nala' numungu' huli-dikevo mino dina' nene apaso moni neme osu' lavosa kuluhizi-dikevo vilive. Lavo nala' numungu' huli-dani'.
Ne'mine ogavo ezesi makato' gono daa' ave ingine ne'mine ine' nene ningi mulu'ningu' goloso gili vi guve'inesi ve nene a'mine gelekele' ve nene ogo molo ine' initekumu' nene li-imi osu' lani'.
Li-imikevo guvelesi ve'mo gelekele' izipe nene asi lavo dizine'. Dizavo ti' lo lo-dine': Gelekele' izipe goloso mene gaza muhele' gamazi lo-nemanivo dina' o-giduvoni' ma apase-gedekuve.
Ne'mine o-giduvoni' ne'mino gazasi makato' gono daa' asive nene mulumolo ningo dina' o-daine' nene apase-delinako apase-damane.

Ne'mine lo izebolo' molavo guvelesi ve ti' lo line': Nala' numungu' mino mulumo gono imi'mi vi nizavo dina' o-duvoni' nene golo hize'mo vo minevo' minevo' ilive. Ido' ne'mine lo nala' numungu' gizebo iga' aveti a'ningu' molani'.

Ne'mine lo Izesu' ti' lo line': Lingine hamo' hamo' evene' lihime lutinguti' gehepeve huli-ngidamilizani' nene guvelesi ve'mo gelekele' izipahala o-didi'mino Okulumoku' Me'neho aza a'mine'mine o-lengedo lihimetine nene hulo-lengedamo mulumo gono lengemeleseive.
Ido' Izesu' aza gamazi muki' mene lo-ngemo osu' lo nGalilaia misubo hulo vo Zudaia misubouko Zodani noso helala vine'.
A'mingu' novivo evene' muki' e'meti nivavo engikuti' inite' gizi dave nene do lamine' o-ngede'mo vine'.

Halisaio' mono' laa' ave linge ma ingine Izesuda igi emengu' mili ti' li longo' i-dani': Gaza Zuda veti lou' gamazitemu' gelanivo ele'ningine inite' ngomo' nabakumu' ngimisele hulaa' nene lisihe' o neihe lisihe' amive.

Ti' li longo' i-dikevo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Mono' godolou' gamazi ma ti' lo minine' nene lingine mo gati gili nizani' ma nene gilamani' nehe: Gomu' inite' muki' do soto' molaa' ive'mo vegi veneki lolo' o-ngidine' ve.

Ne'mine ogo ti' lo line': Nemu' nene ve nene izelehingi melehingi hulo elenahida bizo minavo ingine hamo' lolo' asine' gelavo minilisasive. Nemu' nene ingine nene sita' nizasive ma lo-ngedamolosune. Mo hamo' nene nizasive.
Nemu' nene O'moso'mo inite' do hamo' ogo molo neinguti' ve malike do ize' molaa' nene nomive.

Lavo ingine ti' li lani': Ido' ne'mine lo ma Mose' aza gamazi ne'mine lo line' nene nanitekumu' line' neve: Ve mali'mo elenahine hulo-delove lo ma vene' mene mo hulo-dekuve lo luhuvo gize emosa hulo-davo vilive.

Ne'mine likevo aza ti' lo line': Lingine gamazi gilami peleseve' izaa' angumu' nene Mose' vene' ngimisele hulaakumu' gele lengemave. Ne'mine ine'za O'moso'mo vene' vemoho' do soto' ogo do bize-ngidine' gamenelati' nene ele'ningine hulo-ngedaa' monovo nomine' ve.
Ido' naza ne'mine lo nolo-lingimuve: Ve ma elenaho aza ve gohi masi monamivo inite' atokumu' hulo-do vene' gohi ma daline' nene O'moso'mi lou' gamazi avuto' ogo lihime naba daloseive.
Ne'mine lavo izipahala zuho ingine ti' li li-imani': Vesi venekisi bizo nonivo inite' ne'mine mana'mine ilizangumu' huli-ngidamilizave lainako vene' damo ha minaa' nene lamine' neive.
Ne'mine likevo Izesu' ti' lo line': Mene gamazi nene evene' mukilite gili dalizado' nomive. Evene' linge ma O'moso'mo lu'ine ga'ine hize ele' o-ngedavo engikovo' dalisave.

Ido' linge ma a'mine gamazi gili dalizave noluvoni' nene nemu' nene noluve: Evene' linge ma ize'ningi mulu'ninguti' gizeho'ine nevo'mine nomine' soto' ani' ne'mo vene' damaa' ani' ve. Ido' ve ma nene evenelite gizeho'ine ili huli-ngidikevo vene' dami minaa' nave. Ido' linge ma nene O'moso'mo gizebo ingu' gono neine' nemu' lu'ine milalisa vene' daa' nene angise'ine o'ove li haza minaa' nave. Ve ma ingine vene' damaa' amuzo engita mineline' nete nene gamazi mene gili dalisave.
Neloti' nene evene' ingine izipe ngomo ngomo nene Izesu' ana godo'nido' hito O'mosola lo no'noho' ize-ngedelive li ngele'mizi neida navo izipahala zuho ingine ngelemi o've li-ngidani'za
Izesu' aza ti' lo line': Izipe ngomo ngomo me'mine minave nene O'moso'mo gizebo o neingu' ngele'mize molaa' neinako huli-ngimikavo nenita ha alizaze. O'ove li-ngidamilo.
Ne'mine lo ana godo'nido' hito mino no'noho' ize-ngedosa vo mala vine'.
Ido' novivo ve ma aza Izesu' neida ogo ti' lo longo' o-do line': Tisazo, naza inite' lamine' nani'mine olodi'mo nene minevo' minevo' nemeni dameni daloni' o neive.

Ne'mine lo longo' o-do line'za Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Monovo lamineli'mi Meleho nene hamokovo' neine' nenako neni' nene monovo lamine' ogakumu' nene nanitekumu' longo' o-nedane. Minevo' minevo' gemeni dameni nene dalove lo ma aka gamazi e'metaa' olosane.

Ne'mine lavo aza ti' lo line': Aka gamaziuti' nene ado' za' ma e'metelongumu' nolane. Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo line': Lingine evene' ngibili hilamilo. Ido' vene' vemoho' lili' ikeni' nete lingine bizivo' mini vene' nehe vemoho' nehe gohi masi gopo ingamilo. Ido' gumine amilo. Ido' evene' mamu' gopo' napa gamazi li-ngidi sakupo gamazi li-ngidamilo.
Ido' izetingine metinginemu' gilikevo dizavo gelekele' i-ngidi minilo. Ido' lingine lengikumu' gilaa' nani' ne'mini avito' gidini ingi monavemukisi nene a'mine'mine igi gilii lutine ngimilo.
Ne'mine lavo ve goso've aza ti' lo lo-imine': A'mine gamazi muki' nene mo e'metaa' nouvoni'za olihe vo damivosa nanite' gohi ma e'meteloni' neve.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza mo evene' lisihe' lamine' gehepeve minelo ma nene vo henenika inite' mataka maketi molo moni daline' nene ize' molo goho' gahali' ize' molo ngemezo. Ne'mine iline' ne'mo Okulumokuko henenika ma mineleseive. Ido' ne'mine ogo ogo ne'metezo.
Ne'mine lavo goso've aza heneni've vai' goloso mininako a'minemu' gilivo geni belavo muhele' ogo vo ha ha ine'.
Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' aza izipahala zuho ti' lo lo-ngimine': Heneni ve minanguti' linge ma Okulumoku' minive'mo gizebo ingu' vi hilalizani' nene ge'nebe igisavo' a'mingu' vi hilalisave.

Ido' gohi nolo-lingimuve: Kamela' ize nene naba neine' nenako nemu' nene inite' ongotilisa nakeseu' nala' loloso' iga' ani' veleu' nene ma volosa iline' nene ge'nebe goloso oloseine'za heneni ve nete a'mine nene ivile' ivosa O'moso'mo gizebo o neine' ebeku' vilisa ge'nebe goloso ilisave.

Ne'mine lavo izipahala zuho ingine upuho' goloso igi vo'ine gohi vavo ti' li lani': Laza nene O'moso'mo umo hilive nene heneni ve lolo' o-ngedaa' neihe lo gilune'za gaza heneni ve netesi O'moso'mo gizebo o neine' ebeku' mo vi hilamilisave lo lainako nemu' nene O'moso'mo evene' hamokisi mo ma do lu' izamivo eze gizebo ingu' vo holamolobe lo nogilune.

Ne'mine likevo Izesu' aza vonu' ngebelo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Evene' angise'nidati' lukuvo ngeli ma namilisaha O'moso nene inite' muki' oga' amuzo do neine' nenako nemu' evene' do ngu' izelido' lisihe' o neive.
Ne'mine lavo Petolo' ti' lo line': Gaza gelezo. Laza neve inite' matate muki' nene hulo osu' lo noge'metuniko ne'mine nounido' nene nanite' dalone.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lamine' ma lo-lengemelove: Alinge' O'moso'mo inite' mata' muki' do gosoho' ogavo O'mosolati' ve gihile naza labana'ne do soto' ogo Guve'nesi ve naba mineloni' mo'mosi'nelo' mino evene'ne zuho gizebo o-ngedo nouvo neze ne'metaa' ave linginesi guvetinesi ve lolo' igi guve'inesi ve minaa' ani' mo'mosi' tuvelu nelo' mini Isilaele' aleveti mulise tuvelu nene gizebo i-ngidi minilisave.

Ido' evene' ma ingine neni' ne'metilisa numu'ine ebe'ine nehe uvo'ningine naku'ningine nehe ate'ningine aluno'ningine nehe ize'ningine me'ningine he izipaha'ine nehe ido' misubo'ine nehe muki' huli ne'metave nene O'moso'mo gohi a'mido' imine' molo ngemavo muki' goloso dalisave. Ido' O'moso'mo gohi minevo' minevo' ngemeni dameni nesi ngemavo dalisave.
Ne'mino neine'za dizi nilizani' aleveuti' linge muki' nene limi minilisave. Ido' limi nilizani' aleve nene dizi minilisave.

Ido' Okulumoku' minive'mo gelekele' i-daa' avelo' gizebo ogo gono dado' meni ngemeline' monovomu' nene ne'mino lo molo lo-lengemelove: Gamene ma nedenga' go' lavo ve ma misubo've naba minive'mo oto vaini mi'veu' gono dalizavemu' viseto' monine'.
Mono evene' ma ningo mi'neu' gono dalizangumu' nene gamene hamo hamoto' tu (2) kina tu (2) kina lengemelove lavo lamine've likevo mi'vela ngimiselavo vi gono di minani'.
Ido' gono di nizavo ho' dizo naeni (9) kiloku ne'mine ogavo mine meleho vo evene' gohi ma maketi ebeku' haza nizavo ningo ti' lo lo-ngimine':
Linginesi vi mi'neu' gono dalo. Vi dikevo meni a'mido' lisihe' iline' nene lengemelesuve.

Ne'mine lavo vi gono di minani'. Ido' ingine gono di nizavo mine meleho holise' gamene tuvelu (12) kiloku ne'minelokisi ido' tili (3) kiloku ne'minelokisi gohi vo evene' gohi ma ningo a'mine'mine ogo gono'velo' ngimiselavo vani'.

Vi gono di nizavo nivenga' molalosa faef (5) kiloku ne'mine ogavo ihe' vo evene' gohi ma minani' nene ningo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine nedengati' gono dami haza mini'mi vi idise nivenga' molalosa neidokisi haza nizani' nene nanimu' nave.
Ne'mine lavo ingine ti' li li-imani': Evene' ma gono ma limamanako ne'mo haza none. Ne'mine likevo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Linginesi mi'neu' vi gono dalo.

Lavo vi gono dikevo nivenga' molo sigisi (6) kiloku ogavo mine meleho gusikusi've ti' lo lo-imine': Gonolo' ve asi lo-ngemezo. Gono huli ikevo meni ngemelinge. Gono alinge' dave nene gomu' ngemo a'midoti' a'midoti' dave ngemeka' ngemeka' ogo gomu' dave alinge' ngemelesane.
Ne'mine lavo ne'mine ogo neivo faef (5) kiloku ne'minelo' api' igi gono dave ikevo tu (2) kina tu (2) kina ngemavo dani'.
Ido' neloti' gono gomu' dave igi ingine aza tu (2) kina tu (2) kina lemosa a'mido' gohi ma imine' molo lemelihe li gilani'za ne'mine amo tu (2) kina tu (2) kina nene ngemavo a'minevo' dani'.
A'minevo' di mine melehine elemi ti' li lani':

Holi'mo amuzo molo nolivo gohise helo gono naba dovo' dovo' ogo minunive meni lemo gono ngomovo' dave ngivile' ogosa meni naba lemelinako gaza engikisi lelikisi do lisihe' ogo hamo' votigilelo' meni lemane.

Ne'mine li elemani'za aza mine meleho engikuti' ve mamu' ti' lo lo-imine': Zogone ve, naza monovo goloso o-gedamuve. Gono dalinido' tu (2) kina gemelove lokuvo gaza lamine' ve lanivo gamazite do hamo' ogo lusido' mo gimuvoni' nenako
a'mine menika nene dosa vozo. Gei' gimuvoni' ne'mine alinge' igi gono davesi hamo' meni ngemelesuve lo gele nouve.
Ido' neni' moni'nedunu' olosa giluvoni' inite' nene neni' lu'nelo' oga' nene ha neive. Naza evene' ma do lamine' o-ngiduvoni' nemu' nene gei' lukehe nebelelinido' o neihe line'.
Ne'mine lo Izesu' ti' lo line': Ido' a'mine'mine igi gomu' milaa' nave ingine nene mine alinge' ilisave ido' alinge' milaa' nave ingine nene gomu' milalisave.
Ido' Izesu' aza Zelusalemi numuno ebeta dizelesa izipahala zuho tuvelu nene ngele'mizo novo ngele'mize abaza' ogo akalo' nivangu' ti' lo lo-ngimine':

Gililo. Laza nene Zelusalemi numuno ebeta dizo novune. A'mida nene O'mosolati' ve gihile neni' nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi ido' avotemote mono' lani' apizi ngimaa' avesi engi' a'ningu' milikevo ingine goni' i-nidi lihimeka apaso helelinido' o neive li

Zuda ve minamani' heta ato' aleveti a'ningu' mili-nidikevo ingine gize zohi' i-nidi gasavasi nalatunu' nene mehe'ne izivi' ledivi' igi lohoto' zalo' nibili hililisave. Ne'mine ikevo helo galeseu' lemo gamene sitohamo minekuvo O'moso'mo do ote-nedeleseive lo line'.
Neloti' nene Zebedaio' gipele sitalitisi ize'nibo ne'mo a'mine gipele sita' nene ngele'mizo Izesuda ogo gubi' ize emo opo'ni lo inite' ma ilive lo lo-imine'.

Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' ti' lo longo' o-do line': Gaza nadi' olongumu' nolane. Lavo ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza alinge' Guvekasi ve lolo' ogo evene' gizebo o-ngedo mineline' gameneu' nene nei' gipe'ne sita' mene gezeloti' limi evene' lingesi ma ngivile' igi guve'inesi ve lili' igi mini anga zamelasi adavalasi minilisive lo gele nemeline losa gele nouve.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine longo' i-nidasine' initeli'mi monovo nene gilami gopo likeve. Inite' goloso i-nidilizani' nene ekese' noso ne'mino nenako a'mine i-nidilizani' inite' nene ha gehelesa nouve. Ido' linginesi neni' geheloni' inite' ekese' noso ne'mino minine' nene ha gihilisido' i nizasihe. Ne'mine lavo ti' li lasine': Ee, laza ne'mine ha olosido' o nosive.

Likesivo aza lo-ngimine': Lamine' lingine neni' geheloni' mulumo geni nene gihilisine'za zamelasi adavalasi minaa' mo'mosi' nene neni' inite' neivosa lengemelohe. Me'neho dalisive lo do va'va' o-ngidive nene engikovo' nene dalisasive.
Ido' uvolohoi akunoloi ne'mine asine' nemu' izipahala zuho linge teni nene gilii engikumu' nene mulu'ningu' goloso ine'za

Izesu' aza a'mine zuho asi lo-ngemavo ezela ikevo ti' lo lo-ngimine': O'moso'mi zuho minamani' heta ato' ve engi' gizebo ve'ine evene'ine nene gelekele' i-ngidilizave li amuzo mili li-ngidaa' nave. A'mine evene' engita evene' naba minave nete nene a'mine evene'ine zuho nene ngivile' igi amuzo ve goloso minisa gizebo i-ngidaa' nave. Ne'mine iga' nani' nemu' nene lingine mo gili nizani'za
lengi' muliseu' nene ingine iga' nani' ne'mine nene amilisave. Lengikuti' ve mali'mo guve'nesi ve lolo' olove lo gelo ma aza nene lengi' gelekele' vetine ne'mine lolo' ogo mineleseive.
Ee, ve ma aza gomu' molo lengemo evene' naba minelove lo gelo ma lengi' goboni izipetine ne'mine lolo' ogo mineleseive.

Ee, a'mine ve aza O'mosolati' ve gihile oga' nouvoni' ne'mine oloseive. Naza evene' gelekele' i-nidi nele'mizi lamine' ilizave losa lemamuve. Asi gelekele' o-ngedo ngele'mize lamine' olosa ogo evene' muki' nene meni hizo do ngu' izo do tine' molo-ngedelove lo engikumu' oko'ne hulo helelesa limuvoni' ve line'.
Ido' Izesu' aza izipahala zuho ngele'mizo vo Zeliko ebe' hulo novivo evene' muki' goloso e'meti vani'.

Ne'mine navo ve'ine likive sita' aka gahevela mini Izesu' ogo volosa nave li-ngimikevo gili asi naba li ti' li lasine': Guvelesi ve naba Davidi' a'vo ezelo' medelo minanive make, gaza leli' mulumote ningevo.
Nilasivo evene' muki' nene gamazi hulilisive li ngelemani'za ingine gohi amuzo mili asi lasine': Guvekasi ve, Davidi' a'vo make, leli' mulumote ningevo.
Ne'mine li nilasivo gelo Izesu' aza akalo' minido' ha mino asi lo-ngemavo ikesivo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine nadi' o-lengedelove lisa nigilasive.
Ne'mine lavo ingine ti' li lasine': Guvekasi ve, vete do lamine' o-ledanivo vete gohi ningelosive losa nolusive.
Likesivo Izesu' aza muluno hukavo ve'nido' do gelavo a'mido' lite' lo ve'ine lamine' ogavo ve'ine gohi ningi e'meti vasine'.
Ido' Zelusalemi numuno di avito' igi Oliva golola Betehage ebeta igi hetelani' nene Izesu' aza izipahala zuhouti' ve sita' ma ngimiselo

ti' lo lo-ngimine': A'mine ningi nizasine' numuno ebeku' volene vi nidizi ningilisine' nene dongi ize ma na'nava izikani' nene angale've naba nesi nizasivo ningilisasize. A'mine dongi ize nene vakesi di nouvoda alizo.

Ido' ne'mine nasivo evene' mali'mo a'minemu' longo' nolingidivo ma ti' li li-imilizo: Guvelesi ve'mo eze gono neivo dongi ize memu' limiselavo nousive. Likesivo lite' lo gele lengemo ize ne di vilizo loloseive.
Ido' Izesu' aza dongi izemu' ngimiseline' nene O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi lo soto' oga' ive polohete mali'mo O'moso'mi gamazi ma ti' lo gizine' ma nene gihile izelingumu' line' ve:
Zioni golola Zelusalemi ebeku' alevemu' nene ti' li li-ngimilo:
Ningilo.
Guvetinesi ve naba aza lengita nave.
Hongu emeni damenisi lemo mino dongi izeli'mi mehenelo' nave.
Ee, gono daa' ine' ize'mi angale ma'mo noohikivo lengita nave.
Ido' Izesu' aza ngimiselavo izipahala sita' vi lo-ngimidi'mine igi
dongi izesi angale'vesi di asine'. Ido' saketi'ine apasi mehe'nido' hitikevo Izesu' aza dongi ize ngomo'mi mehenelo' dizo a'mido' minine'.
Neivo evene' vailite genegana'ine kuluhizi apasi akalo' mili-dani'. Ido' linge ma nete zavile davile ledi avilise' i-dani'.
Ne'mine ikevo evene' linge ma vi velela vave netesi ido' alinge' mili ave netesi asi naba li ti' li lani':
Agae, gozopo' guvelesi ve naba Davidi' a'vopilemo'
ezelo' medelo mo'mosi've dalinive
Guvetesi ve O'moso'mi velemu' anive naine' ma nene no'noho' geita minivo.
Agae, O'moso Okulumoku' veleta opo'ni lolone li lani'.
Ido' Izesu' aza Zelusalemi numuda nodizivo numuno me'ninge ingine upuho' igi lani': Me ve nene zaho neve.
Ti' li likevo evene' e'metave ingine lani': Me ve nene polohete Izesu' nGalilaia misubou' Nasalete numudati' ve ma ne neive li lani'.

Ido' Izesu' aza mono' numuno nabala dizine'. Dizo a'mingu' inite' maketi milaa' meni hizaa' igi minave nene ngeleto do hulo-ngedo mono' numungu' hulaa' moni senisimi iga' aveliti holomo'ine nene do tululu lo do hulo-ngedo nama viluso O'moso lehizi-dilizangumu' maketi mili minavete holomo'inesi do velepe' izo hite-ngidine'.
Ne'mine ogo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': O'moso'mo line' gamazi ma Mono' Godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' ve:
Neni' numu'ne nene evene' nete dizi
nopo'ni li-nimaa' numuno ve losa mineleseive.
Ne'mine li gizi nizani'za lingine a'mingu' igi mili minaa' nani' inite' ne'mo nene guminelo' vete igi mili minaa' numuno lolo' ogave.
Ido' mono' numungu' neivo ve'ine likive ido' gize'ine a'ine goloso ive ingine ezela ani'. Ikevo do guno o-ngidine'.

Ido' ne'mine neivo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba nesi ido' Zuda ve gozopotati' lani' mono' apizi ngimaa' avesi ingine Izesu' ngehelele izaa' inite' ato' ato' ogo molo ine' nene ningi ido' a'mingu' izipe ngomo ngama nete gozopo' guvelesi ve naba Davidi' a'vopilemo' ezelo' medelo minanive make, lolize ize gemelone li geke' geke' li-di minani' nesi ningi gili mulu'ningu' goloso gili ngizebolo' molani'.

nGizebolo' molavo ti' li li-imani': Ne'mine lamilizani' gamazi nilani' nene gele nabe. Likevo Izesu' ti' lo line': Naza gele nouvoni'za mono' godolou' gamazi ma O'mosomu' ti' lo neine' ma nene lingine gati gilahe gilamave: Gaza ve'ine do lapa nomine' o-ngedanivo izipe angale ngomo olihe amine ninani' nete gopo'ni li-gimilizangu' nene ladanga ma lamilisave.
Ne'mine lo lo-ngemo hulo-ngedo Zelusalemi numuno ebe' hulo Betani numuno ebeta vo ongani'.
Nedenga' go' lavo oteko numuno nabala novivo ga'na olani'.

Ga'na olavo novo akalo' gohuno za ma ningine'. Ningo gihile ize neihe lo a'mida vo ningine'za haza avilevo' ningine'. Ningo ti' lo line': Gohi ma gihile izamilido' o neive. Ne'mine lo lavo a'mido' geto gohuno za ma api' ogo gulugulu izo goko' line'.
Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' izipahala zuho ingine ningi upuho' igi ti' li lani': Za me ve ne nadi'mine ogosa lite' lo gulugulu izive.

Ne'mine likevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lamineto' nolo-lingimuve. Lingine inite' ma ilisa gili O'mosola lunivo hize ele' o-ledavo ha olosune li gili ele'vole' igi gatine sitakisi gilamilizani' nene a'mine inite' ha ilisave. Ido' neni' gohuno zalo' uvoni' inite' ne'minesi ha igi a'mine ne'mine inite' ivile' igisa evene' amiliza inite' gehepeve ha ilisave. Ado' mene golomu' nene ngutoko guvo nosou' lemelive lilizani' nesi nene gihile ha izeleseive.
Ee, O'mosola lolone' inite' nene ha lemeleseive li ezemu' gili ele'vole' igi mini ezela li nanite' nanitekumu' lilizahe a'mine inite' nene ha lengemeleseive.

Ido' Izesu' aza mono' numuno nabau' dizo evene' mono' lo-ngemo neivo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi ido' eveneliti gizebo ve'inesi igi heteli ti' li longo' i-dani': Inite' mene oga' naine' nene zahi velemu' oga' nane. Ido' zaho lavosa oga' nane.
Likevo Izesu' aza lo-ngimine': Nazasi inite' mamu' longo' o-lengedekuvo li-nimilizani' nene a'mine'mine ogo nazasi ha zahi velemu' inite' oga' nouhe nemu' nene lo-lengemelesuve.

Mono' noso holo-ngedelive lo Zohane'ni zaho imiselive. O'moso'mo imiselihe ido' haza misubou' velite imiselave. Ne'mine lavo ingine angise'inemu' li volelo' melo' igi ti' li lani': Laza O'moso'mo imiselive loso' nene nanitekumu' gili imisa'mave loloseive.
Ido' evenelite ve loso' nene eveneliti golise gelelesune. Evenelite Zohane' nene polohete ve li gili nizanako nemu' ngehelele izine'.

Ne'mine li gili ngehelele izavo Izesu'ni ti' li li-imani': Ma gelamune. Likevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine li-nimamani' nemu' nene nazasi ogo molo oga' nouvoni' inite' mene iline lo nimiselivemu' nene ma lo-lengemamolosuve.
Ne'mine lo imine' molo line': Lingine gililo. Ve mali'mo gipele sita' gedekine'. A'mine ve aza gipele gana've neido' vo ti' lo line': Gipe'ne make, idise nene vaini mingu' vo gono dozo line'.
Lavo gipele aza vamolosuve line'. Ne'mine line'za alinge' lu've do velepe' izo gele do vine'.
Me'nibo aza ihe' vo alingeni gipele neida vo a'mine'mine line'. Lavo gipele aza Ahono, volosuve lo line'za vamine'.

Ne'mine lo Izesu' ti' lo longo' o-ngidine': A'mine gipele sitakuti' nene me'nibine gelekele' lamine' zaho o-dive. Ne'mine lavo ingine gana've'mo ve lani'. Likevo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ido' a'mine'mine ogo Zohane' lengita ogo lamine' igi mili minilizani' aka lengelebizine'za lingine gili imamani'. Ee, lingine gili imamani'za inite' goloso palasa iga' ave, takisi moni daa' ave ido' pasidiato' monaa' ani' vene' alu nevo'minete gili imani'. Ne'mine ani' nene lingine ningikeni' neine'za ningisa alinge' lutine di velepe' izi gili imamani' neive. Lingine langisetinemu' nene laza Okulumoku' minive'mo gizebo ingu' vo holalonive nene la'lisete ado' nene none li gilaa' nahe. Naza lamineto' ma lo-lengemelove. A'mine takisi moni daa' ave golososi ido' pasidia' vene' nesi lengi' lingivile' igi a'mingu' vi hilalizave lili' ilisave.

Aneza gamazi gohi me gililo. Ve mali'mo misubo've naba minavo a'mingu' vaini mine ma zuho' ine'. Zuho' ogo a'mido' gesi hize vodo vodo ogo vaini gihile hite mi' izo lipeline' galese nesi elo a'mingu' mini mi'velo' gizebo iliza numuno ha'na nesi do dizo gizo evene' ma mine gizebo i-dilizave lo hulo-ngedo misubo mala vo minine'.
Vo neivo za gihile elaa' gamene alitavo a'mine za gihileti' ma vi di-nidi alo lo gelekele' izipe ngeletavo vi a'mine minelo' gizebo i-davela vi lani'.
Vi lani'za mingu' gono daa' avete gelekele' izipe nene a'nido' di gili' li ma ne gesebe' izi bili ma nene bili hili ma nene geheni huli huli' igi bilani'.
Ne'mine ikevo gelekele' ve gomu' ngimiseline' nene ngivile' ogo gelekele' ve gohi ma muki' ngimiseline'. Ngimiselavo vikevo gohi a'mine'mine sunovo' di-ngidani'.

Ne'mine ikevo alinge' mine meleho aza ne'mine ikeni'za neni' gipe'ne gihile mene imiselekuvo vavo ei' gipele ogaze li ningi nene ele'mizi lamine' ilizahe lo gelo a'mine gipele nene engita imiselavo vine'.
Novivo minelo' gizebo ve ingine ningi ei' gipele gehepeve navo ningi ti' li lani': Me ve'mo alinge' melehido' medelo mine mene dalive neinako mo bele helo ei' minelo' nene leli' molalone.
Ne'mine li mo gelelehe' igi ele'mizi vaini gesi heta vi bili hilani'.
Ne'mine ani' nemu' mine meleho ogo ningo minelo' gizebo ve nadi' o-ngedelive.

Ne'mine lo longo' ogavo ti' li Izesu'ni li-imani': A'mine evene' goloso nene do goloso ogo ngebele gese' oloseive. Ido' vaini mine nene mine gizebo iga' ave ato' ngemavo gizebo igi nizavo minguti' za gihile daa' gamene viline' nene a'mine gihile mine melehine di imika' imika' igi minilisave.
Ti' li likevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine Mono' Godolou' gamazi ne'mine lo neine' ma gati gilisa'mahe:
Numuno gizilizani' geheni mukikuti' geheni ma nene numuno gizaa' avete ningi
goloso o vive li di kegesi hulani' geheni ne'mo
geheni muki' ngivile' ogo numuno do amuzo molaa' geheni lolo' ogave.
Guvelesi ve'mo a'mine inite' do soto' ogaze.
Evenelite ningekunivo lamine' gehepeve ogave.
Nemu' naza lo-lengemelove: O'moso'mo lengito' gizebo oga' neine' nene ipe' ogo evene' zuho gohi ma ei' gizebou' minali'mi monovo gihile igi mili gelekele' i-di minilizave ma do ngemeleseive. [
Ido' evene' ma nete a'mine gehedo' velehe' limi ingalizani' nene izi iti hupi' izilisave. Ido' a'mine geheni ne'mo lemo evene' ma ngebeleline' nene izo lanahana o-ngedeleseive.]
Aneza gamazi lo oku' lavo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba nesi ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' avesi a'mine aneza gamazi ne gili lelikumu' nolive li gilani'.
Ne'mine li gili analo' di bililizani' akamu' vise' igi minani'za evene' muki' Izesu'nimu' nene O'mosolati' polohete neive li gilanako ne'mo engikumu' golise gili huli-mikani' ve.
Izesu' aza ihe' imine' molo aneza gamazi nolo-ngemo ti' lo line':

Okulumoku' minive'mo ei' gizebo ingu' vi hilalizave lo elese molave ingine a'manapa igi amavo ato' aleve ngele'mize molaline' monovo ne'mino neive: Guvelesi ve mali'mo gipelelo' vene' hukolosa noso' nite' do va'va' ine'.
Do va'va' noogo gelekele' izipe ngimiselavo elese molavelo' vi alo li li-ngidani'za a'mine elese molave ingine gilii a'manapa igi amani'.

Ne'mine ikevo aza ihe' gelekele' izipe ngimiselo ti' lo line': Elese muluve malo' gohi vi ne'mine li-ngimilo: Noso' nite' nene mo do va'va' okuve. Bulumaka' ido' ize ato ato' gehesi minani' mo ngebelo gize vata' ogo noso' nite' ato atokisi do va'va' ogo molo nouve. Nemu' nene a'mine lo vine' noso' niteto' nene alo' alo.
Ti' lo lavo ingine ihe' vi li-ngidikevo gosele' ngebelo voso' ga'ine ngisamivo gili huli ve ma ne mi'veuko vavo ve ma ne bisinisi'vela vo gonou' vine'.
Ido' linge ma nete guvelesi ve'mi gelekele' izipe nene a'nido' di linge ma goboni mili-ngidi linge ma nene ngibili hilani'.
Ne'mine ikevo guvelesi ve aza izebolo' goloso molavo ami lovou' monaa' ave ngeletavo vi gelekele' izipe ngibili hilave vi ngebele gese' igi numu'ine ebe'ine vite' vite' igi ngibilani'.
Ne'mine ikevo guvelesi ve aza ihe' gelekele' izipe ti' lo lo-ngimine': Noso' nite' nene mo do va'va' o none'za elese muluve nene ngemeni dameni golososi a'mingu' amosolovo' minani'.
Nemu' nene vi aka ngomo' nabaku' moni ningilizani' evene' muki' ngele'mizi ikevo noso' nite' mene nalizave.
Ne'mine lavo a'mine gelekele' izipe aka ngomo ngomou' moni evene' golososi laminekisi ngele'mizi ikevo noso' nite' di va'va' ani' numungu' nene giki' lamine' ani' ve.
Evene' vai' giki' ikevo guvelesi ve aza ningelesa dizine'. Dizo ningine' nene ve mali'mo noso' nite' nalisa gonolise lamine' iga' adi'mine amo haza ogo minine' nene ningine'.

Ningo guvelesi ve'mo ti' lo longo' o-dine': Zogone, gaza noso' nite' nalisa genegana lamine' ngilaa' ani' ma ngolamo meu' nanitekumu' dizane. Ne'mine lavo a'mine ve gamazi liline' nomivo vise' ogo minine'.

Ne'mine ogavo guvelesi ve aza gelekele' izipe lo-ngimine': Gizene analo' nala' di-miki huli heto' liti'muso naba ize miningu' nene huli-dilo. Nelo' mino mulumo alumo gelo ive nama ogo vele ongoho langolo' ogo mineleseive.
Ti' lo lo-ngemo Izesu' aza ne'mine line': O'moso'mo evene' muki' elese molo neine'za a'minguti' nene evene' hamo pamokovo' nevo gizeka' ogo do anau' oloseive.

Ne'mine lavo Halisaio' mono' laa' ave vi ti' li lovo gizi lani': Evene' ma ngimiselekunivo vi Izesu'ni golo izikevo goni' o-deloine' gamazi lilingumu' ve lani'. Ne'mine li engi' izipaha'ine zuhoutikisi guvelesi ve Helode'ni hize ele' i-daa' aveutikisi evene' linge ma ngimiselikevo

Izesuda igi heteli ti' li li-imani': Tisazo, gaza ve lisihe' lamine' naine' nene mo gele none. Gamazi lo-ngemeline' aleve nene nani'mine aleve nilizahe nemu' gaza gaka muki' gelesa'mane. Evene' naba mini gei' liline' gamazimu' mulu'ningu' goloso gili gelemilizadokisi nilizani' nemu' gelamo O'moso'mi aka lelebizo gamazi gihilevo' lo lemaa' nane. Nemu' nene gei' gaka gele naine' nene lo lemezo. Gelelonge. Ne'mine li ti' li longo' i-dani': Loma veti guve'inesi ve naba Kaesale' aza takisi moni huli-nidilizave lo neido' nene e'meto Zuda ve laza ma hulo-deso' nene lisihe' o neihe. Lou' gamazite avuto' o neive.

Ti' li lani'za Izesu' aza engi' monovo goloso ningo gelo ado' lingine Kaesale'ni takisi moni imilo liline' ne'mo Zuda ve nene ngizebolo' molavo ganala dalive. Ido' imamilo liline' nene Loma ve ngizebolo' molavo ganala dalive li gilani' nene gelo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine evene' vevesi minani' gili moni lutine goloso o vine' nene di halekani' mene
nanimu' nemengu' nimilave. Takisi milaliza moni nene ningeloze. Di alo. Ne'mine lavo a'mine geheni ne di igi elebizani'.
