Elebizikevo ningo ti' lo longo' o-ngedo line': Me monilo' eveneli'mi golo velesi gulivesi neine' nene zahi golo velesi gulivesi neive. Longo' o-ngedavo nene Kaesale' ma ve lani'.

Ne'mine likevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ti' li ma a'mine moni nene ngamani gizebo ve ei' Kaesale' inite've noloseinako a'minemu' nolivo ma nene ha imilo. Ido' a'mine'mine igi O'moso'mo lingimine' initeto' nene ha golo hizi imilo.
Ne'mine lavo engi' gamazi'ine ne'mo ivile' amivo ingine ve'ine gahava nomine' mini huli-miki vi ha ha ani'.
Ido' a'mine gameneu' nene Sadukaio' mono' laa' ave ingine helaakuti' otaa' ne nomive laa' ave engikuti' linge ma Izesuda igi longo' i-di lani':

Tisazo, Mose' aza luhuvo ti' lo gizo lemave: Uvo'ninge naku'ninge ma minilizanguti' mali'mo vene' do mino izipe gedamo helavo ma engikuti' mali'mo a'mine vene' gevono' nene do a'mine hilivemu' nene izipe gedo molo-delive.
Ne'mine o neinako uvo'ninge naku'ninge seveni ma minani'. Uvo'nibo gana've ne'mo vene' do mino izipahala soto' amavo hiline'. Helavo nakunolo a'midoti' ne'mo elenahine dani'.

Ido' a'mine nakunolo a'mine vene' do a'mine'mine ogo izipe gedamo helavo nakunolo a'midoti' ne'mosi a'mine vene' do izipe gedamo hiline'. Ee, a'mine uvo'ninge naku'ninge seveni a'mine vene' nene dika' dika' igi izipe gidami hili osu' lani'.
Hili osu' likevo alinge' vene' aza hiline'.
Ne'mine ogavo a'mine uvo'ninge naku'ninge seveni nete a'mine vene' nene mukilite dani' ma nenako evene' muki' hilanguti' otiliza gameneu' zahi elenaho lolo' ilive.
Likevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine O'moso'mi gamazi Mono' Godolou' gizi nizani' nene gili vevesami O'moso'mi amuzomukisi gili lamine' isa'mani' ne'mo gili gopo ikeve.
Hilanguti' otaa' gameneu' nene vene' daa' ido' velo' vaa' monovo nene ma minamoloseive. Evene' O'moso'mi angelole ha minaa' nani' ne'mini inginesi ha minilisave.
Ne'mine o neine'za evene' hilanguti' otaa' nemu' lo-lengemelove. Lingine O'moso'mo me gamazi lo-lingimine' nene Mono' Godolou' gize neine' ma gati gilahe gilamave.

Ti' lo gize neive: Naza Abalahamule Isakale Zakobole engi' O'moso'ine ne nouve line'. Ido' a'mine ve hili osu' ladiniko engi' O'moso'ine nouve ngelo ma lamidine. Engi' O'moso'ine nouve line' ne'mo mo hili osu' lami ha nizave lo gelelesune.
Ti' lo Izesu' line' nemu' evene' ingine upuho' igi vo'ine ga'ine vine' ve.
Ido'Izesu' line' gamazi nene ivile' igi Sadukaio' mono' laa' avete a'mido' gamazi ma li-imamilizani' o vivo gili Halisaio' mono' laa' ave Izesu' neida vi di gese' ikevo
engikuti' ve ma Zuda vete mono' gozopotati' laa' nani' nene apize ngemaa' ive ma minine' ne'mo emengu' molo ti' lo longo' o-dine':
Tisazo, O'moso'mo lou' gamazi lo huko-lidine' neuti' lou' gamazi muki' ngivile' ogo nani gamazi'mo dizo neive.
Lavo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Dizo neine' gamazi nene ne'mine lo neive: Lutine gatine vodinesi Guvelesi ve O'mosotida nene mili lutine imivo' minilo.
Ido' a'midoti' lemo minine' gamazi ma a'mine gidini mino ti' lo neive: Lingine lengi' okodinemu' gilaa' nani' ne'mine igi evene' avita gidini nizavemukisi nene gili lutine ngimilo.

Mose' lou' gamazi linge gizine' nesi ido' O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi li soto' iga' ave polohetelite gizi nizani' gamazi muki' nesi a'mine lou' sita' gele daa' monovo nene ha li ngolo' lilisa imine' mili gizi nizani' ve.
Ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' ave ingine di gese' igi nizavo Izesu' aza longo' o-ngedo
ti' line': Lingine O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa livemu' gilikevo zahi a'vopilemo' nolive. Lavo ingine avotemoti guve'inesi ve naba Davidi' a'vopilemo' ve li li-imani'.
Li-imikevo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ti' li ma O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo do ote-davo Davidi' aza a'mine vemu' Guve'nesi ve ve line' nene nanimu' lave. Davidi' aza ti' lo line':
Okulumoku' ve aza Guve'nesi vemu' ti' lo lo-imine':
Nezeloti' gei' ne nange. A'ne hulaa' uvoda minezo.
Nanivo biluvaka nene gizengala do'mo leme-ngedekuvo
gelekele' i-gidi minilisave.
Ne'mino Davidi' ne'mo Guve'nesi ve ve lo line' nenako nemu' a'mine do lu' izelive lo O'moso'mo imiselelesa live aza Davididati' leme mino ha a'vovo' nado minelive.
Ne'mine lo longo' o-ngedavo evene' a'mingu' mo ngeli li-imamilizani' ogavo a'mine gameneloti' nene ngehelele goloso izavo inite' gohi mamu' longo' i-damani'.
Izesu' aza evene' mulisesi ido' izipahala zuhosi gamazi nolo-ngemo

ti' lo line': Ingine Zuda vete mono' gozopotati' laa' nani' apizi lingimaa' navesi ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' avesi Mose' ogo molo ine' monovo di a'ningu' igi O'moso'mo lou' gamazi lo huko-limingumu' nene li-lingimaa' nave.

Nemu' nene gili ngimii ingine li-lingimilizani' gamazi muki' nene gili di minilo. Ti' o neine'za li-lingimaa' nani' gamazilo' nene angise'inesi e'metisa'manaze. Nemu' ingine igi mili iga' nani' ngemeni dameni ne'mine nene lingine amilo.

Ingine lou' gamazi ngomo' naba' di nubuho igi gili dalizave li a'mine geni'vesi lou' gamazi vai' nene eveneliti gata'nido' gihi-ngidaa' nave. Gihi-ngidaa' nani'za a'mine geni'vesi lou' gamaziuti' lou' hamo' ma ngomo lasolo ne'minesi angise'ine ma gihisa'mave.

Inite' muki' igi mili iga' nani' nene evenelite ningi lopo'ni lilizave lisa iga' nave. Ido' ngopo'ni lilizangumu' nene Mono' Godolo avile di gangi bokisi ngomou' miliki golihi'nido' nehe a'ningu' nehe nala' izika' ani' nene evene' linge ngivile' igi engi' di naba igi izika' nave. Ti' igi Mose' lou' molani' nene gate molalive li gili go' gala ne'mine genegana'ine gahevela hela hela na'nava izikani' ne'mo evene' ma ngivile' igi di naba igi izika' nave.
Ne'mine iki noso' nite' naba nada nehe ido' mono' numungu' nehe nevo'mingu' vilizani' nene evene' nabalitevo' minaa' ani' holomolokovo' minilisa gili minaa' nave.
Ido' maketilo' evene' muliseu' siza li-lidilizave li ido' tisazo li di hozi li-lidilizave li gilaa' nave.
Ingine ne'mine iga' nani'za O'moso'mo hamo' lengi' tisatine neivo lingine eze izipahala zuho mini linge ma dizi minikevo linge ma limi minamanako nemu' evene' mamu' Tisazo li-ngidamilizave.
Ido' me misubouko evene' ma di hozi li-di ezemu' meteho ve lamilo. Okulumokuko neive O'moso ei' hamo' Metibo ne neive.
Ido' lengikumu' gizebo ve ve likelizave. O'moso'mo do lungu' izelive lo imiselelesa live eikovo' hamo' lengi' gizebo vetine neive.
Ido' a'mine'mine ogo lengikuti' ve ma dizo noline' nene gelekele' o-lengedo minelive.
Ido' ve ma engi' gulive'ine di dizi minilizani' nene engi' gulive'ine do'mo leme-ngedeleseive. Ido' ingine engi' di'mi limi minilizani' nene O'moso'mo do'mo dize-ngedo hize ele' o-ngedeleseive.

Lingine Zuda vete mono' gozopotati' laa' nani' apizi ngimaa' navesi ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' navesi nene ehetine ve. Lingine evene' vevesi minave gili monaa' naha lutine goloso o vine' nene di halekaa' nave minani' neive. Ne'mine igi mini Okulumokuko minive'mo gizebo ingu' vi hilalisa naveti aka hizi tilaa' nave. Langisetine nene a'mingu' ma dizisa'mave. Ido' evene' ma dizilisa navo ha nevo dizilizave li ningi huli ngimikavo ma dizisa'mave. Ne'mine iga' nanako nemu' agae, mulumotine gelekuve. O'moso'mo lihime lengemelesa neive.

Ee, Lingine Zuda vete mono' gozopotati' laa' ani' apizi ngimaa' navesi ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' navesi ehetine ve. Lingine evene' vevesi minave gili monaa' naha lutine goloso o vine' nene di halekaa' nave minani' neive. Ne'mine igi mini lingine numudo' namado' moni evene' hamo' nevo ne lengita gi'mizilizahe li lingine lelita le'metilizave li li-ngimii evene' ga'ine dalisa amuzo goloso milaa' nave. Ido' ma lenge'meti izipahatine zuho lili' igi ma lingine lani' gamazitine gili dalizadi'mo lengi' lingivile' igi aka golosolo' moni mulumo ebeku' vi hilalizave lili' ilisave. Ne'mine iga' nanako nemu' agae, mulumotine gelekuve. O'moso'mo lihime lengemelesa neive.

Ido' lingine mono' aka ngelebizaa' ave nizani'za vetine likine' gelavo a'mine aka ningi vevesami evene' mono' nili-ngimi gopo gamazi ti' li li-ngimaa' nave: Gamazi'ine di amuzo milalisa gamazi lamine' nolune li a'ine di dizi mono' numuno nabalo' li mili lilizave nene ingine haza gamazivo' lilisave. Soza lilizanikisi engita gamazi ma minamoloseive. Ne'mine li lingine ti' li li-ngimaa' nave: Ne neiha lamine' nolune li a'ine di dizi mono' numuno nabau' minine' ngolimonilo' li mili lilizave ingine gamazi laminekovo' lilizani' o neive. Soza lilizani' nene O'moso'mo lihime ngemeleseive. Lingine gopo gamazi ne'mine li evene' ngele'mizi gopo iga' nanako nemu' ehetine ve.

A'mine ngolimoni nene mono' numuno nabau' minidi'mo kekeize line' nenako nemu' nene mono' numuno naba ne'mo ngolimoni ivile' ogo inite' naba neive. Olo. Neine' nenako nemu' lingine a'mine mono' numuno nabalo' lo molaa' nene haza nite' neivo mono' numuno nabau' minine' ngolimoni nelo' lo molaa' nene inite' gihile neive li laa' nanako nemu' nene vetine like vine' gelavo evene' dingani goloso nizave.

Ido' lingine gopo gamazi ne'minesi li-ngimaa' nave: Gamazi'ine di amuzo milalisa gamazi lamine' nolune li a'ine di dizi O'moso imani' inite' molaa' holomo nelo' li mili lilizave ingine haza gamazivo' lilisave. Soza lilizanikisi engita gamazi ma minamoloseive. Ne'mine li lingine ti' li li-ngimaa' nave: Ne neiha lamine' nolune li a'ine di dizi a'mine holomolo' O'moso imaa' nani' initeto' li mili lilizave ingine gamazi laminekovo' lilizani' o neive. Soza lilizani' nene O'moso'mo lihime ngemeleseive li li-ngimaa' nave.

Ido' mono' numuno nabau' O'moso imani' inite' molaa' holomo ne'mo a'mine O'moso imani' inite' nene kekeize lo neine' nenako nemu' O'moso imani' inite' nene holomo ne'mo ivile' ogo inite' naba neive. Olo. Neine' nenako nemu' lingine a'mine holomolo' lo molaa' nene haza nite' neivo a'mine holomolo' mili O'moso imani' initeto' lo molaa' nene inite' gihile neive li laa' nanako nemu' nene vetine likine' gelave.

Gililo. Ingine lamine' nolune li a'ine di dizi O'moso imani' inite' molaa' holomolo' li milalizani' nene a'mine holomolokisi ido' O'moso imaa' nani' inite' muki' a'mido' neine' nemukisi li mili lilizani' geleleseive.
Ido' ingine a'ine di dizi mono' numuno nabalo' li mili lilizani' nene a'mine mono' numuno nabalokisi a'mine mono' numuno melehinelokisi li mili lani' geleleseive.

Ido' ingine a'ine di dizi Okulumoto' li mili lilizani' nene O'moso'mo a'mido' mino inite' mukito' gizebo oga' neine' mo'mosi've nelokisi li mili a'mido' minivelokisi li mili lani' geleleseive. Nemu' nene nanite' naniteto' li mili adine di dizi lilizahe. Ha gamazi laminekovo' lilisave.

Lingine Zuda vete mono' gozopotati' laa' nani' apizi ngimaa' navesi ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' navesi nene ehetine ve. Lingine evene' vevesi minave gili monaa' naha lutine goloso o vine' nene di halekaa' nave minani' neive. Ne'mine igi mini lingine Mose' lou' gamaziuti' gamazi ngomo malo' e'meti midingu' minine' initekuti' linge ngomo ma ize mili O'moso imaa' nangu' nene inite' ngomo ngomo ado' noso nite' do lanite' oga' ine' inite' nevo'mingutikisi ize' mili O'moso imaa' nani'za Mose' aza evene' monovo lisihekovo' i-ngidilizangumukisi ido' mulumo'ine gili ngele'mize lamine' ilizangumukisi ido' go'ine izamilizangumukisi lou' gamazi line' nene dizo mino inite' naba neine' nene gili hulaa' nave. A'mine lemo minine' lou' gamazi ngomo ngomo damilizavoba gili dalizado' o neine'za a'mine luvoni' lou' gamazi naba nesi gili dalizanako mo gili disa'mave. Agae, mulumotine gelekuve. O'moso'mo lihime lengemelido' o neive.

Lingine vetine like vine' gelavo mono' aka ngelebizilisa igi a'mine aka ningi vevesami lihime ngomo ngomo daa' monovo hulani'za lihime naba' naba daa' monovo nene hulamanako evene' ma nalizani' initekuti' inite' ngomo lasolo ne'mo do goloso alive li di huliki inite' goloso naba nene mikile' iga' nani' gili vani' nizave.

Ido' lingine Zuda vete mono' gozopotati' laa' ani' nene apizi ngimaa' navesi ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' navesi ehetine ve. Lingine evene' vevesi minave gili monaa' naha lutine goloso o vine' nene di halekaa' nave minani' neive. Ne'mine igi mini lingine okodine losuvo di guni iki lamine' noube li iga' naha lutine ne'mo guminelo' ve gelo mo inite' golosovo' dalisa gili nizave. Lingine kapu ido' lapese heta noso iziki lulouko ha hulika' nani' ne'mine nizanako nemu' agae, mulumotine gelekuve. O'moso'mo lihime lengemelesa neive.
Halisaio' ve vetine like vine' giline' mene okodine losuvo nene mo lamine' ilive li ma gomu' nene lutine di lamine' ilisave.

Lingine Zuda vete mono' gozopotati' laa' ani' apizi ngimaa' navesi ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' navesi ehetine ve. Lingine evene' vevesi minave gili monaa' naha lutine goloso o vine' nene di halekaa' nave minani' neive. Ne'mine igi mino lingine gonoso galese heta luhuvo izi di guni ikani' ne'mine igi nimonaha lulouko nene gonoso amuzo'mo sihononi initeli'mo vai' lo ongo neive. Evene' okodine losuvolo' ningikevo ve lisihe' lamine' nizahe li ningaa' naha lutingu' nene soza saza laa' monovosi ido' peleseve' izaa' monovosi di naba igi daa' nave. Ne'mine iga' nanako nemu' agae, mulumotine gelekuve. O'moso'mo lihime lengemelesa neive.

Ido' lingine Zuda vete mono' gozopotati' laa' nani' apizi ngimaa' navesi ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' navesi nene ehetine ve. Lingine evene' vevesi minave gili monaa' naha lutine goloso o vine' nene di halekaa' nave minani' neive. Ne'mine igi mini lingine ti' li laa' nave: Laza avotemote minani' gameneu' makato' minunidini ingine O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi li soto' iga' ave polohete nene ngibili nihilavo laza a'mine avotemotine hize ele' o-ngedamunidine. Ne'mine lii laa' naha a'mine avotinge api' ani' gono nene imine' mili di a'mine ngibilani' polohete ido' ve lisihe' lamineliti gonoso amuzo'ine mili-ngidani' numuno gizikani' nene imine' mili di guni igi gonoso mili-ngidani' galese'ine nene di lamine' iga' nave.
Ido' ne'mine igi lingine polohete ngibili hilaveti zuho minikevo engi' ngemeni dameni lengita minine' nene di soto' igi lengi' monovotine langisetine li soto' iga' nave.
Lingine avotinge ani' monovo nene di di vamilizanako ha di di vilevo. Ne'mine iga' nanako nemu' agae, mulumotine gelekuve. O'moso'mo lihime lengemelesa neive.
Satali'mi izipahala zuho, O'moso'mo gonito' lengele'mize molalidoti' ha olovo' ilizahe. O'ove. nGeli olovo' amilisave. Nemu' nene lihizamiline' oloku' vi hilalisave.

Ne'mine ilizangumu' nene naza O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi li soto' i lingimilizavesi ido' gamazi monovo ningi gili li soto' i lingimilizavesi ido' mono' apizi lingimilizavesi nene lengita ngimiselelesuve. Ne'mine okuvo ikevo lingine engikuti' linge ma lohoto' zalo' ngibili hili linge ma mono' numudingu' gavosotunu' ngibiliki numudoti' numudoti' ngimiseleka' ngimiseleka' igi minilisave.

A'mine ve ngimiseleloni' nene nemu' ngimiselelesuve: Me misubouko nene ve lisihe' lamine' muki' nene evene' malite ngibili hilika' hilika' ani' ne'mi lihime nene lengita dizeleseive lo ngimiselelove. Ee, Adamu' gipele ve lisihe' Abeli'ni uvoloho'mo bele hilidoti' nene ve lisihe' muki' ngibili hili'mi dizi Balakia' gipele Zakalia' aza O'moso lehizi-dani' inite' oloku' gizaa' ani' holomosi ido' mono' numuno naba nesi oluso' neivo bili hilado' ivo a'mine ngibili hilani' neti lihime'ine nene lengita dizeleseive.
Lamineto' nolo-lingimuve: Evene' muki' ngibili hiladi'mi lihime muki' nene me misubou' idise nizave lengita dizeleseive.

Agae, Zelusalemi alevekizo, lingine polohete ngibili hilii ido' O'moso'mo lengita gono dalizave lo ngeletivesi nene geheni gavoso ngibili hilaa' ave lengi' nene okoloholi'mo goduvo' do holoke'ne'veko do nubuho o-ngidine' ma'mine ogo gamene gamene lengele'mize lamine' olosa uvoni'za lingine gosele' lengebelave.
Lingine gililo. Numuno nabatine minine' ebetingu' nene O'moso aza gohi minamo mo hulo-lengedavo ga'meto' ne'mine ogo mineleseive.

Ido' mene noluvoni' gamazi ne'mi monovo ti' lo nolo-lingimuve. Idise meloti' nene neze oko'nelo' ningami mini'mi dizi alingeta gohi soto' nouvo ti' li li-nimilisave: Guvetesi ve O'moso'mi velemu' anive naine' ma nene no'noho' geita minivoo. Ne'mine li li-nimilizani' gameneu' nene neze ningilisave lo lo-ngimine' ve.
Izesu' aza mono' numuno naba nene hulo novivo izipahala zuho eita igi mono' numungu' numuno lamine' tamine' nene elebizani'.

Elebizikevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ti' iha me ningilo. Agae, lamineto' lo-lengemelesuve. Numuno naba me geheni naba' nabadunu' gizi nizani' ningahe. A'mine geheni nene bili ngululubizi hulikevo a'minguti' geheni sita' ne'minesi ma bizi minamilisasive.

Ne'mine losa Oliva gololo' vo mito' neivo izipahala zuho engikovo' nene neida igi ti' li longo' i-dani': Idi'ne lo-lemaine' inite' nene nanihe' soto' ilive. Ido' gei' tine' molo aline' gamene nesi ido' misubou' inite' mata' muki' osu' liline' gamene nesi nene mo alitave lo ningeso' nene nanite' soto' ogavo ningelone.

Ne'mine likevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Evene' muki' nete nene igi neni' gulive'ne lii O'moso'mo do lungu' izelive lo nimiselelesa live nene na'mo nouve li lika' lika' igi go'ine izikevo evene' muki' nete gili ngimikevo di gopo i-ngidilisave. Ne'mine ilisanako nemu' nene engikuti' mali'mo lengi' gotine izavo linginesi gili imikelizave. Ehe, gizebo lamine' igi minilo.

Ido' lovo soto' neivo gili ebe' mala mala lovo soto' neivo ne'mi gamazi ma gililisave. Gili ma upuho' igi golise gilamilo. A'mine nene soto' oloseiha inite' vai' osu' liline' gamene naba nene a'mido' olihe soto' amive.

Ido' misubo mau' vete misubo mau' vesi lovo hizilisave. Ido' guvelesi ve naba mali'mi zuhote guvelesi ve naba mali'mi zuhosi lovo hizilisave. Misubo ato atota ga'na naba helaa' gamene ido' mimi' naba soto' oka' oka' oloseive.

Venelite izipe gidilisa mulumo api' igi gilii gilika' gilika' i'mi i'mi navo alinge' izipaha'ine soto' oga' neive. A'mine'mine ogo mulumo inite' muki' mene soto' iline' nene ha api' ine' nenako nemu' nene gilika' gilika' i'mi i'mi navo alinge' naza soto' olosuve.

A'mine mulumo nite' api' ogo soto' ogavo evenelite gonito' lengele'mizi mili goboni mili-lingidi linge ma lingibili hililisave. Lingine nenita gi'mizi minilisanako nemu' evene' zuho ato ato' muki' ingine lukehe lingibililisave.
Ne'mine aningumu' nene evene' muki' gili nimi nenita gi'mizani' nene huli ge lo soto' o ne lo soto' o li ngibililizani' aleveti a'ningu' mili ingine lukehe ge nebele ne gebele li minilisave.
Ido' evene' ma nete engikumu' soza li O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' oga' nouve polohete ma ne nouve lii evene' muki' go'ine izi ngele'mize gopo ilisave.
Ido' monovo goloso daa' suno nene hutile' ogo naba ogavo ne'mo evene' muki' ingine lu'ine ge neme ne geme li guni amavo a'mine monovo ngomo oloseive.
Ti' iha evene' ma nenikumu' ha gili ele'vole' igi mini huli-nidamavo gamene naba iline' nene O'moso'mo do ngu' izeleseive.

Ido' O'moso'mo ei' gizebo ingu' vi hilaliza evenele do ngu' izo gizebo o-ngedelingumu' gamazi lamine' nene gililizave li di vi misubou' misubou' li-ngimika' li-ngimika' igi evene' zuho ato ato' muki' nene li-ngimi osu' lilisave. Ido' idise mene noluvoni' inite' nene soto' i'mi nivavo a'mine gamazi li-ngimi osu' nilavo gamene naba soto' oloseive.

Gozopo' minine' polohete Danieli' line' inite' ado' ebe' do goloso iline' inite' gosele' inite' goloso gehepeve nene kekeize lo neine' numungu' di soto' milikevo ningilisave. (A'mene gizuvoni' gamazi mene gato nogelo ma gatelinive gaza gele ngolo' lo gelezo.) A'mine inite' nene di soto' milikevo lingine niningi ma Zudaia' misubou' nilizave nene golise golola nivilo.
Ehe, a'mine gameneu' nene silibe ogo minaa' nene nominako ve ma ingine numu'ine avitasi nilizadoti' nene ihe' numu'ninguko vi inite' mata'ine a'mingu' neine' nene di vamilisave.
Ido' mingu' nilizadoti' nene oko'nido' inite'ine dalisa tine' mili numunguko amilisave.
Agae, a'mine gameneu' nene Izipaha'ine minine' venekumukisi ido' izipe amido' nizani' venekumukisi mulumo gele-ngedekuve. Ge'nebe goloso ilisave.
A'mine inite' nene goline gameneu' soto' ogo ido' monokumu' mini gililizangumu' ve li aka monamilo li li huki lingimilizani' gameneu' soto' ogalize li O'mosolavo' li minilo.

Nanitekumu' ve. O'moso'mo inite' mata' do soto' idoti' idise mene none' gamenelo' mulumo alumo nite' naba ne'mine gomuta soto' amine' nenako api' ogo a'mine gamenelo' soto' oloseive. Ido' soto' ilidoti' nene alingeta gohi ma ne'mine soto' amoloseive.

Ido' Guvelesi ve'mo a'mine gamene nene mine ha'na ogalive lo bele hukolove ma lamidiniko evene' hamokisi ve'inesi ma minamadine'za Guvelesi ve aza do kegesine' evenekumu' gelo a'mine gamene nene mine ha'na ogalive lo bele hukolosa neive.
Ido' a'mine gameneu' nene ve mali'mo O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live aza mela neive lo ido' ningilo. Holela neive lo nolo-lingimivo ma nene gili imamilo.

Evene' ma nete soto' ika' ika' igi soza saza li do lungu' izelive lo O'moso'mo imiselelesa live ma nene nouve ido' O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' oga' nouve polohete ma ne nouve li O'moso'mo ngele'mize kegesine' evene've ingine le'metilizahe li gotine izi ato' nite' golize laa' nite' masi masi di soto' mili lengelebizilisave.
Ehe, mene inite' olihe soto' amivo inite' mukikumu' gomu' lo-lengemekuve. Nemu' gizebo lamine' ilo.
Ido' ti' li ningilo. O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live aza ebe' hadivela vo neive nilavo ma a'mida vamilo. Ido' numuno lulouko dize neive lii nilavo ma gili ngimamilo.

Ingine O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live zegeno omo neive lilizani'za O'mosolati' ve gihile naza aloni' gameneu' nene gopa'na ledo ogo vaa' neine' ne'mine ogo numudo' namado' ve muki' ningi nizavo alosuve.
Ido' evene' hilani' gonoso nolida nene gonoso naa' ani' namalite a'mida nene lite' li igi di gese' igi minilisave.

A'mine mulumo soto' ogo mineline' gamene nene osu' lavo lite' lo holi'mi labanala nolihizivo ike'ni'mi labana'vesi osu' loloseive. Ido' sonohi' nene Okulumokuti' suludi'mozi' mozi' navo Okulumoku' amuzo'inesi inite' nene mo'mongo' i gese' ilisave.

Ne'mine ikevo neloti' nene O'mosolati' ve gihile alongumu' soto' iline' maki nene Okulumoto' soto' ogavo misubou' misubou' minani' evene' zuho ato ato' muki' ingine ningi agae agae lii ive nama igi minilisave. Ee, O'mosolati' ve gihile naza amuzo'nesi ido' labana'ne nabasi do soto' ogosa limuso avilelo' nolimuvo ningilisave.

Ido' pikuli nolo naba nomolavo naza angelo'ne zuho ngimiselekuvo ingine limi ngele'mize kegesuvoni' evene'ne nene misubo ato' atoku' mini'mi monani' ebe' mukikuti' nene moni ngele'mize nubuho ilisave.
Ido' gohuno zalo' lo molaloni' nene gili lamine' igi gililo. Lingine Zuda veti misubotida mene gohuno zaloti' sisive ho' lavo mo ho' gamene alitave li ningi gilaa' nave.
Ido' a'mine'mine ogo nolo-lingimuvoni' nite' nene soto' neivo ma aza avito' ogo mo nene hetelelesa neive li ningi gililisave.
Lamineto' ma lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. A'mine gamenelo' aleve nene ha mini olihe hili osu' lamavosi a'mine inite' muki' nene soto' ilisave.
Okulumoki misubogi nene ha vi osu' lilisasine'za a'mine gamazi'ne nene mo osu' lamo ele'vole' ogo mineleseive.

Ne'mine o neine'za a'mine soto' iline' gamenemu' nene ve hamolitesi ma gelamune. Ido' Okulumokuko angelo' nesi nene gilamave. Ido' O'moso'mi gipele nazasi nene ma gelamuve. Me'neho ei' hamo' ne gele neive.
Noa' minine' gameneu' nene evene' gopo minani' ne'mini neni' O'mosolati' ve gihile aloni' gameneukisi a'mine'mine igi minilisave.
Noa' minine' gameneu' nene noso naba velamivo evene' ingine ngolize izi noso' nite' ni noso ni ido' vene' velo' vavo vene' di huki mili nizavo Noa' aza sipiu' dizavo

ingine noso velo lebeleleseive li gilami gopo nizavo noso naba velo ogo a'mine aleve nene giso gilito do vine'. Ido' evene' a'mine'mine igi aloseive li gilami gopo nizavo O'mosolati' ve gihile naza a'mine'mine ogo ogo hetelelesuve.
Ido' a'mine gameneu' evene' sita' ma mingu' gono di minilisine' nene evene' ma nene O'moso'mo do vavo ma ne ha mineleseive.
Ido' vene' sita' viti gihile sege daa' initetunu' sege di minilisinguti' ma nene O'moso'mo do vavo ma ne ha mineleseive.
Guvetinesi ve nani gamenelo' alohe. Lingine gilamanako nemu' nene lingine gizebo lamine' igi minilo.

Ido' lingine mene gili' nalo. Guminelo' ve'mo bedine' numuno ne'mi meleho aza guminelo' ve olihe amivosa holuka' aline' gamenemu' nene ma gele minidiniko numu'velo' nene gizebo ogavo guminelo' ve ne'mo nene ma bedamidine.
O'mosolati' ve gihile naza aloseive li gilamilizani' gamenelo' alosuze. Nemu' lingine nene a'mine'mine igi di nene igi gizebo lamine' minilo.

Ido' Guvelesi ve'mo gelekele' izipe ma ele'mize molo gelekele' izipaha'nelo' gizebo ogo noso' nite' naliza gamenelo' gamenelo' noso' nite' ngemeka' ngemeka' ogo minelive lo ele'mize molavo peleseve' izamaa' ive otohato o minive noline' nene nadi' o'mo vo mineline' o neive.

A'mine ele'mize molani' gelekele' izipe ne'mo a'mine meleho imine' gono nene dovo' dovo' ogo neivo Guvelesi ve ogo hetelo ningeline' ne'mo gelekele' izipe nene lamine' iline' akalo' mine molo mineleseive.
Lamineto' nolo-lingimuve. Guvelesi ve aza ogo a'mine gelekele' izipe nene monovolo ningo inite'ne mukito' nene gizebo o-nedelive lo lo-emavo gizebo o-deleseive.
Ee, ne'mine iline'za gelekele' izipe aza lulo golososi mino lulouko neni' gizebo ve'ne ma nene mo lite' lo amiko mino gamene alingeta alihe lo gala gelo
api' ogo ezesi maka' gono daa' ave nene ngebeledo' ngebeledo' ogo mino noso ni sipaki igi monaa' avela vo gi'mizo engikisi maka' noso' nite' ni noso ni'mi moni minaa' navo
a'mine gelekele' izipe aza gizebo ve'ne nene ne gamenelo' aloseive lo gelamo ngelo amoloseive lo gelo mineline' gamenelo' nene gizebo ve've ogo hetelo
oko'no belevo' hukovo' ogo monovo'ine goloso di halekaa' ave hulo-ngedaa' ida hulo-davo a'mida mulumo alumo gili ive nama igi ve'ine ingihi langolo' igi nilizada ezesi vo a'mine'mine ogo mineleseive.

Ne'mine lo Izesu' imine' molo ti' lo line': Noluvoni' gamenelo' nene evene' O'moso'mo gizebo ingu' vi hilalizani' monovomu' lo molaloze. Gililo. Alungo teni (10) ne'mine ingine vene' dalive nene vi ele'mizi alisa gizebo i minilisa vani' ne'mine gele voloseive.
A'mine alungo teni (10) neti' faef (5) nene ga'ine ngolo' line' ido' linge faef (5) nene ga'ine ngolo' lamine' negi minani'.
Ido' ingi ga'ine ngolo' lamine' negi alu faef (5) nene lamu'ine di vani'za a'mingu' noso lumo olo' lihizelingumu' ve li mo di vamani'.
Ti' aha ga'ine ngolo' line' alu ingine olo'ine lihizelingumu' noso lumo gomiseu' lepi lamu'inesi di vani'.
Ido' vene' dalive geto amiline' ogavo alungo teni (10) mukito' ve'ine hihi' ogavo ingani'.
Ingi nizavo go' lo'mo lomo olo'mudise holuka' nene vene' dalive mo naze. Vi ele'mizi alo li asi likevo
alungo muki' okiseti' oti lamu'ine di guni igi enge vite' ani'.
Ne'mine igi ga'ine ngolo' lamine' negi alu nete ga'ine ngolo' line' alumu' ti' li lani': Lamuteu' noso oku' lo lihizelesa neize. Lengi' nosotinguti' ma leki limilizani' o neive.

Ne'mine likevo ga'ine ngolo' line' alu nete ti' li li-ngimani': Lengemeso' o neiha linginesi lezesi dalonido' lisihe' amize. Situvaku' vi langisetine hizisa lamutingu' lepi di alizani' ne lamine' oloseive.

Ne'mine likevo ingine meni hizilisa vikengumu' nene vene' dalive ogo hetelavo lamu'ine di va'va' i minani' alungo ezesi maka' vene' dalingumu' noso' nite' gizi vata' angu' nene vani'. A'mingu' dizi vikevo akahe hizi tilani'.
Akahe hizi tilikevo alinge' alungo lingela igi heteli Guvekasi ve make, mo okunge. Akahe si'ze-ledevo li lani'.
Likevo guvelesi ve ti' lo line': Lamineto' nolo-lingimuve. Lingine ningamuvoni' alevete nilave.
Ne'mine lo Izesu' imine' molo line': Ehetine ve. Nani gamenelo' alohe. Lingine mo keke' gilamanaze. Nemu' gizebo lekeseve igi minilo.

Ido' aloni' gameneu' gelekele' izipaha'ne meni ngemeloni' monovomu' lo molaloze. Gililo. Ve mali'mo ebe' mala volosa gelekele' i-daa' ani' izipahala zuho eita do nubuho o-ngedo gizebo i-nidilizave lo inite've muki' nene ngimine'.

Ido' ne'mine noogo gono daa' ado' gele mine' mine' ogo moni ize' molo ngimine'. Gelekele' izipe ma ne faef tauseni kina (K5,000) imine'. Ido' ma ne tu tauseni kina (K2,000) imine'. Ido' ma ne vanu tauseni kina (K1,000) imine'.

Ne'mine ogo guvelesi ve mo vavo gelekele' izipe faef tauseni kina (K5,000) dave'mo lite' lite' lo vo a'mine faef tauseni kina (K5,000) nedunu' moni gono do gohi faef tauseni kina (K5,000) ma do soto' molani'.
Ido' gelekele' izipe aza tu tauseni kina (K2,000) dave a'mine'mine ogo moni gono do ihe' tu tauseni kina (K2,000) ma do soto' molani'.
Ido' vanu tauseni kina (K1,000) dave aza vo misubou' galese elo a'mine vanu tauseni kina (K1,000) nene galese izekine'.
Ne'mine ikevo guve'inesi ve aza gamene ha'na goloso mino alinge' monidati' ogo izipahala zuho moni ngemekidunu' gono dani' ningo do lisihe' olosa ani'.

Gelekele' izipe aza faef tauseni kina (K5,000) dave guvelesi ve'mi velela ogo oto ti' lo line': Guvekasi ve, gaza faef tauseni kina (K5,000) nemeko vaine' matunu' moni gono do ihe' faef tauseni kina (K5,000) ma do soto' uvoni' ne neive lo do ogo elebizine'.

Elebizavo guvelesi ve aza gelekele' izipe ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza peleseve' izamanive gelekele' izipe lamine' goloso nane. Gonolo' gizebo lamine' goloso ogane. Gono ngomolo' gizebo lamine' goloso aine' nemu' inite' naba mukito' gizebo ve hulo-gedelesuve. Guvekasi ve naza nolize izo nouvongu' dizanivo makato' lolize izo minelesusize. Ano.

Ido' aza tu tauseni kina (K2,000) dave'mosi ogo ti' lo line': Guvekasi ve, gaza tu tauseni kina (K2,000) nemaine' a'mine matunu' gohi tu tauseni kina (K2,000) ne ma do soto' uvoni' ne neive lo do ogo elebizine'.

Elebizavo guvelesi ve aza ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza peleseve' izamanive gelekele' izipe lamine' goloso nane. Gonolo' gizebo lamine' goloso ogane. Ido' gono ngomolo' gizebo lamine' goloso aine' nemu' inite' naba mukito' gizebo ve hulo-gedelesuve. Guvekasi ve naza nolize izo nouvongu' dizanivo makato' lolize izo minelesusize. Ano.

Ido' aza vanu tauseni kina (K1,000) dave nesi ogo guvelesi ve neida ogo ti' lo line': Guvekasi ve, gei' monovoka nene gele nouvoni' ma neive. Gaza ve amuzo malehe mino gasika zuho' amaninguti' noso' nite' nene ha dolize daa' nanive mino gasika gono damaninguti' evene' maliti gonouti' nesi gihile izavo ipe' ogo ha daa' nanive nane.

Gaza a'ne'mine ve nane' nenako nemu' gei' moni nemaninguti' ma vo tolovo iline' nene nelemaline lo golise gelo vo misubou' galese elo a'mine vanu tauseni kina (K1,000) nemaine' nene a'mingu' do haleko molo hitekuvoni' ve. Ido' ningezo. Idise gei' monika mene do-gedo nouve.

Ne'mine lavo guvelesi ve ti' lo lo-emo line': Gaza gelekele' izipe goloso, gonomu' gosele' gebele vine' mene, nenikumu' nene aza zuho' amidoti' nene noso' nite' dolizo daa' ive ve ido' gono daminguti' nene gihile izavo ma nesi ipe' ogo daa' ive ve lo gelo nolabe.

Ti' lo ma moni'ne nene beni numungu' molo-nedanidini naza tine' molo ogo a'mine moni'nesi ido' a'mido' imine' mili-nidilizani' polopeti masi duvodine' nemu' a'mine moni'ne nene beni numungu' molo-nedelinako molo-nedamane.

Ne'mine lo gelekele' izipahala a'mida minani' nene ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ido' ve ma ingine inite'nelo' gizebo lamine' igi ma di minilizave nene imine' molo gohi ma ngemekuvo vai' livo di minilisave. Ido' inite'nelo' gizebo lamine' igi di minamilizave engita inite' ngomo ma noline' nene a'minesi gohi ipe' ogo dalosuve. Ne'mino neine' nenako nemu' lingine a'mine vanu tauseni kina (K1,000) do neine' nene ipe' igi teni tauseni kina (K10,000) do minivela di imilevo.
Ne'mine igi gelekele' izipe gulupese mene huli heta i-dikevo liti'muso gehepeveu' vo mino ive nama ogo mulumo alumo gelo vele ongoho langolo' ogo mineleseive.
Ido' O'mosolati' ve gihile naza labana'ne do soto' ogo angelo' muki' ngele'mizo aloni' nene Guve'nesi ve naba mineloni' mo'mosi'nelo' minelesuve.

Ido' a'mido' nouvo evene' zuho ato ato' muki' nene neni' ve'nelo' ngele'mize nubuho ilisave. Ne'mine ikevo izelo' gizebo ve ne'mo sipisipi ize'vesi meme' izesi gopo igi minanguti' nene do kegese-ngedo sipisipi ize mulise ato' hulo-ngedo meme' ize mulise ato' hulo-ngedaa' ine' ne'mine naza evene' do kegese-ngedo sipisipi ize ne'mini minilizave nene a'ne hulaa' uvoda ngele'mize molo meme' ize ne'mini minilizave nene a'ne hulamaa' uvoda hulo-ngedelesuve.

Ne'mine ogo Guve'nesi ve mino naza a'ne hulaa' uvoda minilizavemu' ti' lo lo-ngemelesuve: Me'neho no'noho' ize-lingidive mate, alo. Naza ga'na hele nouvo lingine noso' nite' nimaa' ikeni' ve. Ido' naza nosomu' nisavo lingine hepe' noso ohizi nimaa' ikeni' ve. Ido' venenga ve mino naza lengita okuvo lingine igi nele'mizi lamine' iga' ani' ve. Ido' genegana'ne nomivo lingine ma di ngili-nidaa' ani' ve. Ido' inite' gize dokuvo lingine igi nasahili' lamine' i-nidi minaa' ani' ve. Ido' nala' numungu' huli-nidikevo nouvo lingine igi hizi ele' i-nidaa' ani' ve. Ne'mini i-nidi minani' nenako nemu' nene O'moso'mo Okulumo' misubo do soto' idoti' nene lengi' ebetine ei' gizebo ingu' salani molo-lengede neine' nene igi di minilo.

Ne'mine lo lo-ngemekuvo ingine ti' li lilisave: Guvekasi ve make, laine' inite' nene gei' o-gedamune' ve lo gele none. Nemu' nene gei' ga'na helane lo ningo noso' nite' nanihe' do gimuningumu' nolane. Ido' gaza nosomu' nisave lanivo gelo noso nanihe' ohizo gimuningumu' nolane.
Ido' gaza venenga ve nane lo ningo laza nanihe' gele'mize lamine' uningumu' nolane. Ido' geneganaka nomivo ningo nanihe' ma do ngolo-giduningumu' nolane.
Ido' gaza inite' gize danivo laza nanihe' ogo nasahili' o-giduningumu' nolane. Ido' gaza nala' numungu' huli-gidikevo nanivo laza nanihe' ogo hize ele' o-giduningumu' nolane.

Ti' li longo' i-nidikevo naza guve'nesi ve mino ti' lo lo-ngemelesuve: Lingine evene'ne zuho ma nene o-ngidube li gilani'za ne'mine inite' i-ngidani' nene neni' i-nidani' gelave. Ee, neze evene'ne zuho minanguti' lemo minivesi ne'mine i-dikevo neni' i-nidani' gelave.

Ido' ne'mine lo a'ne hulamaa' uvoda minilizavemukisi ti' lo lo-ngemelesuve: Lingine me'neho usi' ize-lingidivete nouvodati' vi haha igi lihizami olo' lovo' lovo' ogo neine' nene me'neho do soto' ogo Satanisi eze angelole zuhosi a'mingu' vi hilalizave lo engikumu' salani molo-ngidingu' vi hilalo.
Ne Nanitekumu' ve. Naza ga'na helo nouvo lingine noso' nite' nimamani' ve. Ido' nosomu' nonisivo lingine noso ohizi nimamani' ve.

Ido' venenga ve mino lengita okuvo lingine nele'mizi lamine' amani' ve. Ido' genegana'ne nomivo lingine ma di ngili-nidamani' ve. Ido' naza inite' gize dokuvo ido' nala' numungu' huli-nidikevo nouvo lingine igi nasahili' i-nidamani' ve.

Ne'mine lokuvo ingine ti' li longo' i-nidilisave: Guvekasi ve make, gaza ga'na hele nanivo he nosomu' gise neivo he ido' venenga ve minanivo he geneganaka nomivo he ido' inite' gize do nanivo he ido' nala' numungu' nanivo nanihe' ningo nasahili' o-gedo gele'mize lamine' amune.

Ne'mine likevo naza ti' lo lo-ngemelesuve: Lamineto' lo-lengemeloze. Lingine evene' ma ne'mine i-ngidamani' ne'mo neni' i-nidamani' gelave. Ee, neze evene'ne zuho minanguti' lemo minivesi ne'mine i-damavo neni' i-nidamani' gelave.

Ido' ne'mine lo lo-ngemekuvo ingine vi mulumo ebeku' vi mulumo gono divi' divi' igi nizavo apasi-ngidamilisave. Ingine ne'mine ilisaha evene' lisihe' lamine' ingine ele'vole' ngemeni dameni dii minevo' minevo' ebeku' vi hilalisave.
Izesu' aza a'mine gamazi lo-ngeme osu' lo a'mine gamenelo' izipahala zuho ti' lo lo-ngimine':

Lingine mo gili nizani' ma neive. Isilaele' aleveti avotemote Aigita misubou' minani' gameneu' O'moso'mo isi'ine izingumu' gelo holise' mino noso' nite' naa' noune' gamene ma ne okozo' api' oloseive. Ne'mine ogo O'mosolati' ve gihile neze nene biluvaliti a'ningu' mili-nidikevo lohoto' zalo' nibili hililisave line'.

Ido' a'mine gameneu' nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi ido' eveneliti mono' gizebo ve'inesi igi eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba gulive Kaiaha' ne'mi numu've nabau' igi di gese' ani'.
Di gese' igi gamazi li gele ha gele igi mini Izesu'ni nene zegeno bele helelone li lovo gizani'.
Ne'mine li lovo gizani'za holise' gameneu' nene evene' vai' di gese' igi ningi nizavo analo' dalone' nene lovo di soto' ikelizanako holiseku' nene alamolone li lani'.
Ido' Izesu' aza Betania numuda mino ganadise gozopo' ma gize dave Simoni' ne'mi numu'veu' neivo
minida nene vene' mali'mo luhuvo laminekisi gehenidunu' lili' ani' botolo' nene unuvo uveli lamine' meni've nabasi nene a'mingu' neivo do ogo Izesu' noso' nite' nonavo godololo' leke-dine'.
Ido' Izesu' izipahala zuho ingine ningi mulu'ningu' goloso ogo ngizebolo' molavo ti' li lani': Unuvo lamine' oga' ine' uveli nene nanitekumu' do labuluvo neive.
A'mine unuvo lamine' oga' ine' uveli nene do vo hizilizave ngemekunivo hizi moni naba limikevo a'mine moni nene goho' aleve ngimunidine.
Ti' li nilavo Izesu' aza gamazi lani' nene mo gelo ti' lo line': Vene' mene aza nanite' do goloso ogavosa geni'vesi gamazi nili-imave. Aza nene inite' lamine' noo-nidivo ede vive.
Lingine nene goho' alevesi mini di vi minikelizaha nezesi nene mudive ma mini di vi minamilisave.
Vene' aza a'mine unuvo lamine' oga' ine' uveli nene holo-nididi'mo galese izi-nidilizangumu' gomu' oko'ne nene do lamine' o-nedo holo-nedave.

Naza lamineto' lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. Mono' gamazi lamine' mene di misubou' misubou' moni li-ngimilizadaa eze guvele nene ha gili minilizave li aza inite' o-nidine' nemukisi li soto' igi li-ngimilizave.
Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' izipahala zuho tuvelu engikuti' Kelioto numudoti' ve ma gulive Zuda' aza eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabala vo ti' lo lo-ngimine':
A'mine ve ma nene naza do vo hulo vetingu' okuvo nanite' ma nimilizave. Lavo ingine siluva' moni teoti (30) ne'mine imani'.
Imikevo a'mine gameneloti' nene aza Izesu'ni ngelebizeli akamu' vise' o minine'.

Zuda vete lulu izamine' beleti naa' noune' holise' nene api' neivo Izesu' izipahala zuho ezela igi ti' li longo' i-dani': O'moso'mo avotemotine ise'ine ize-ngidingumu' gelo naa' noune' noso' nite' naliningumu' nene zala vo do va'va' o-gedelone lo nolane.

Likevo Izesu' aza nongimiselo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Numuno nabala vi a'mida lo-lingimuve ma neida vi ningi ti' li li-imilo: Tisa' ma'mo neni' gamene mo alitave lo a'mine O'moso'mo avotemotine ise'ine ize-ngidingumu' gelo mino naa' noune' noso' nite' nene gei' numungau' neni' izipaha'nesi nalone nolive.
Lo-ngemavo izipahala zuho ingine lo-ngimidi'mine igi a'mine noso' nite' di va'va' ani'.
Di va'va' ikevo mo nivenga' molavo Izesu' izipahala zuho tuvelu nesi mini noso' nite' nani'.
A'mine noso' nite' ni nizavo Izesu' aza ti' lo line': Lamineto' ma lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. Lengikuti' mali'mo nenikumu' me neive lo biluvaliti a'ningu' molaloseive.
A'mine gamazi nene lingumu' izipahala zuho mulumo goloso gili-di api' igi hamo' hamo' oti lani': Guvekasi ve, nenikumu' lamo nolosane. Olo.
Likevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lapeseu' ana nenikisi hulo molave ne'mo biluvaliti a'ningu' do hulo-nedeleseive.

Ee, O'mosolati' ve gihile nenikumu' polohetelite gizi nizani' ma'mino heleloni' akalo' novuvoni'za biluvalite neni' dalizave lo do soto' o-nedelive nene agae, mulumo gono atoli'mine daloseinako nemu' a'mine ve aza izeleho ma gedamidiniko a'mine mulumo gono goloso soto' o-delesa neine' akalo' mine molo ma minamivo lamine' o minidine.
Ne'mine lavo Zuda' aza alinge' biluvaliti a'ningu' ele'mize molave'mo ti' lo line': Tisazo, nenikumu' nene ma lamane. Olo. Lavo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-imine': O'ove. Gasika mo ne nolane lo line'.
Noso' nite' ninavo Izesu' aza beleti do O'mosola opo'ni lo gito izipahala zuho nongemo ti' lo line': Di nalo. Mene neni' me'mele'ne ma ne neive.

Ne'mine lavo di nikevo vaini gomise do O'mosola opo'ni lo nongemo ti' lo line': A'mingu' nene O'moso'mo lo huko-lidine' gamazi nene do ele'vole' iline' vanise'ne mene evene' mukikumu' lihimetine apase-lengedelove lo lekeloni' mene neinako nemu' a'minguti' lingine mukito' nalo.
Ido' ti' lo nolo-lingimuve. Idise meloti' naza vaini gihile'mi novozouti' mo namo mino alinge' Me'neho gizebo o-lengedeline' gameneu' nene a'mine novozo atoli'mine nene lengikisi mino nalosune.
Ne'mine lavo mono' nama lisa limi heta igi Oliva gololo' dizi vani'.

Oliva gololo' dizi nizavo Izesu' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Mono' Godolou' O'moso'mo line' gamazi ma ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive: Gizebo ve'ine belekuvo sipisipi ize mulise nene hutile' igi vilisave. Ti' li gizi nizani' nenako nemu' idise holuka' lingine mukito' nenikumu' goloso giladi'mo huli-nidi vilisani'za
helekuvo O'moso'mo nele'mize otavo gomu' molo lengemo nGalilaia misubouko vo minelesuve.
Lavo Petolo' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Ingine muki' geikumu' goloso gili huli-gidi vilizanikisi naza nene mo keke' hulo-gedo vamolosuve.
Lavo Izesu' ti' lo lo-imine': Lamineto' nolo-gimuve. Idise holukakisi okoloho nolo olihe molamivo gaza gamene setohamo ataize lo-nedelesane.
Lavo Petolo' ti' lo lo-imine': O'ove. Ge gibili hili nesi nibili hililisa lilizanikisi nene ataize lo-gedamolosuve. Lavo Izesu' izipahala zuho mukito' Petolo' lidi'mine igi hamo' gamazivo' lani'.
Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' aza izipahala zuhosi ebe' ma gulive Gesemani neu' vani'. Vo hetelo izipahala zuho ti' lo lo-ngimine': Naza holelo' vo O'mosola nololongumu' lingine melo' minilo.
Ido' ne'mine lo Petolokisi ido' Zebedaio' gipele sitakisi nene ngele'mizo novo Izesu' aza api' ogo muluno hukavo mulumo naba giline'.
Gelo ne'mine lo lo-ngimine': Naza mo mulu'neu' mulumo goloso ogo geni naba idi'mo heleloni' akalo' mine molokuve. Lingine makato' neni' olodi'mine igi melo' gizebo igi ningi minilo.

Izesu' aza ne'mine lo ngomo ma hoto'ile novo misubolo' golo hizo O'mosola nolo ti' lo line': Me'neho make, ha ilinido' neivo ma a'mine di soto' i-nidilisa nani' ekese' inite' nene nenita amilive lo do hulo-nedelinibo. Ne'mine ha olosaine'za neni' lu'nelo' do molamo asi gei' lukalo' do molozo.

Ne'mine lo Izesu' aza tine' molo ogo ningine' nene izipahala zuho okise ingi minani' nene ningo Petolo'ni ti' lo lo-dine': Nadive. Lingine amuzo milami neni' uvodi'mine igi makato' gamene li'nibe ngomo vanu aua ne'mine vetine ningi minamahe.
Lengemengu' milalizangu' nene gopo ikelizaze. Gizebo igi O'mosola li minilo. Ee, lutine ne'mo gono dalosa neiha okodine ne'mo nene geni o neive.

Ne'mine lo ihe' gohi vo O'mosola nolo ti' lo line': Me'neho make, gei' gelanivo a'mine di soto' i-nidilisa nani' ekese' inite' nene hulo-nedelido' amivo geheloni' o neivo ma gei' lukalo' do molo gehelesuve.
Ne'mine lo Izesu' aza tine' molo ogo ningine' nene ve'ine hihi' ogavo okise ingi nizavo ningine'.
Ningo ihe' hulo-ngedo vo O'mosola lo gomu' line' ma'mine ogo line'. Ne'mine ogo vo O'mosola line' nene gamene sitohamo ine'.

Ne'mine ogo ihe' izipahala nizada ogo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Okise ingi mine gililisa gili nizahe. Ningilo. O'mosolati' ve gihile neni' nene di soto' igi ve golosoliti a'ningu' milalizani' gamene mo ogaze.
Otilo. Mo volonge. Ningilo. Biluvalite dalizave lo neze do soto' ilive nene mo avito' ogave.

Ti' lo nolo-ngimivo izipahala zuho tuvelu engikuti' nene ve gono'nibo Zuda' aza ogo heteline'. Ido' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi mono' gizebo vesi mini evene' muki' ngimiselikevo bainati mitekisi gavososi dii Zudalesi maka' ani'.
Ido' olihe igi hetelami Izesu'ni do soto' o-ngidive ne'mo gomu' ti' lo lovo gize ngimine': Golo elo nalove nene a'mine ve mineleseize. Dalo.
Ogo hetelo Zuda' aza Izesu' neida lite' lo o-duvo Tisazo, ne nabe lo golo elo nani'.
Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Zogone, gaza ogo olosa aine' inite' nene alo' ozo. Ti' lo nolivo biluvalite ingine Izesu' neida igi analo' di minani'.

Ne'mine navo Izesulesi monaveuti' ve mali'mo ana do patelo bainati mite' gokuti' gelelehe' ogo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba'mi gelekele' izipe ma belo gala hela hasa' o huline'.
Hasa' o hulavo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Bainati miteka nene ihe' daninguko do molozo. Evene' malike bainati mite' do lovo olosa ilinive nene ve malite bainati mitedunu' gibilikevo helelesane.

Gaza gelaine' me'nehida lokuvo alete mili-nidilizave ma ngimiselamilive lo gele nabe. O've. Lokuvo angelo' mulise naba ato ato' tuvelu ado' angelo' sevedi tu tauseni (72,000) ne'mine ivile' ogo ma ngimiselavo igi ha alete mili-nidilisave.

Ne'mino neiha ne'mine oloni' nene mono' godolou' nene a'nelo' di goni' i-nidi nibili hililizave li gizi nizani' gamazi nene ngelo gihile izamiline' nenako nemu' nene alete mili-nidilizavemu' lamolosuve.

Ido' a'mine gamenelo' Izesu' aza evene' mulise ti' lo lo-ngimine': Gizengize ve ma dalisa iga' adi'mine igi bainati mitekisi gavososi di neni' dalisa ahe. Naza gamene gamene mono' numuno nabau' mono' apize ngemaa' uvoni' malo' nene a'nelo' damani' nehe.

Gomu' ne'mine ami idise ne'mine navo soto' neine' nene O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi li soto' iga' ave polohete nete gizi nizani' gamazi ma gihile izelive losa nene soto' neive. Ne'mine lavo izipahala zuho Izesu'ni huli-di mukito' golise vani'.

Ido' Izesu' analo' di minave ingine ele'mizi eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba Kaiaha' neida vani'. A'mida Zuda vete mono' gozopotati' laa' ani' apizi ngimaa' avesi ido' Zuda veti gizebo ve'ine nesi mulise mili nizavo a'mingu' ele'mizi vani'.

Ne'mine navo Petolo' aza hoto'ile e'mete-do ogo a'mine eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba ne'mi gesi mingu' ogo dizi minani' numuno nene vodo vodo ogo minavo oluso' omo' naba minido' nene dizo Izesu'ni goni' i-di nadi' i-dilizahe lo ningelesa pilisi vesi makato' minani'.
Ne'mino neivo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi engi' kanisole'ine mukikisi nani lihimemu' Izesu'ni belelone li soza saza li lihime've li soto' ilizavemu' vise' ikevo

evene' muki' eze lihime ma li soto' ilisa igi soza saza gamazi lani'za ingine gilado' vo daline' gamazi ma lamavo eze lihime li soto' ilizave ma di soto' amani'. Di soto' ami vise' i'mi vi nizavo alinge' nene ve sita' ma igi ti' li lasine':
Me ve'mo na'nise'ne O'moso'mi mono' numuno naba nene ngu'voso gamene sitohamo ogo novivo ihe' gizelesuve lo live lasine'.

Ne'mine likesivo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba aza oto ti' lo line': Gaza nilasine' gamazilo' mene do velepe' izo lo-ngemeline' gamazi ne nomihe. Mene ve netise geikumu' nilasine' gamazi mene gelanivo nadi' o neive.

Ne'mine line'za Izesu' aza gamazi lamo minine'. Neivo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba aza ti' lo line': Idi'nise minevo' minevo' ogo minaa' ive O'moso'mi velelo' lo soto' ogo liline lo noluve. O'moso'mi gipele O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live nabe lo lemezo.

Lavo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Mo ne laine'za lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. O'mosolati' ve gihile naza amuzo'vesi minive O'mosoloti' lemo nouvoni' nenako nemu' ana hulaa' ida mito' nouvo ningilisave. Ido' Okulumoto' limuso avilelo' nolimuvo ningilisave.

Ne'mine lavo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba ne'mo Izesu' aza O'moso ivile' olosa gamazi goloso lihe lo gala giline' nene ngelebizelesa asi've ngolokine' genegana've nene do nohikelo ti' lo line': Asi've O'moso ivile' olosa gamazi goloso laanako nemu' lihime've li soto' ilizavemu' nene nanimu' gohi vise' olone. O'moso ivile' o-do gamazi goloso line' nene langisetine mo gilikeve.
Nemu' lingine gilikevo nadi' o neive. Lavo ingine ti' li li-imani': Aza nene mo lihime naba danako mo helelido' ogave.
Ne'mine li golo veleu' gituho' i-di a'inedunu' bilii a'ine gatapa' gavoso bilani'.

Ne'mine igi nibili ti' li lani': Gei' neke O'moso'mo evene' do ngu' izeline lo gimiselelesa live nouve nolabe. Olo. Ne ma nigibilaze. Geze monovoka ningelone. Zaho gibilihe. Gaza polohetelite laa' adi'mine ogo lo soto' ogo lo-lemevo.

Ne'mine igi nizavo Petolo' aza numuno vodo vodo minavo oluso' omo' naba minido' neivo gelekele' alu mali'mo eita ogo ti' lo line': Gaza nene nGalilaia misuboti' ve Izesukisi monaa' asive ma ne nolosane.
Lavo aza evene' mukiliti ve'nido' ataize lo nolaine' gamazi ne ma gelamuvongumu' nolane line'.
Ne'mine lo gesi gateda lemo novivo gelekele' alu gohi mali'mo ningeko evene' a'mida minave lo-ngimine': Me ve nene Nasalete numudati' Izesulesi monaa' ave ma ne neive.
Lavo gohi ataize lo line': O'moso'mi velelo' a'ne dizo noluve. Mo ningamuvemu' nilave.

nGomo lasolo ma nimini a'mida minave nete Petolo' neida igi ti' li li-imani': Engi' gamazi laa' adi'mino nolainako nemu' mo lamineto' a'mine zuhouti' nolosane. Gaza gamazi nolaine' ne'mo do soto' o-gedave.

Likevo aza gosoho' noluvo ma O'moso'mo usi' ize-nidivo lo mo lamineto' noluve line'. O'moso'mi velelo' lo huko noluve lo ti' lo line': Ningamuvemu' nilave. Petolo' ne'mine nolivo okoloho lite' lo nolo molani'.
Ido' okoloho nolo molavo Petolo' aza Izesu' okoloho'mo olihe nolo gedamivo nenikumu' gamene sitohamo ataize lo-nedelesane line' gamazi nene gohi gala gelo heta lemo vo ive nabalo' goloso ine' ve.
Nedenga' go' nolivo eveneto' medeli O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba muki' ido' Zuda veti gizebo ve'ine nesi ingine mulise mili Izesu'ni bili hililizangumu' gamazi li li volelo' melo' igi minani'.
Li mini analo' nala' di ele'mizi vi Zuda veti misubola Loma vete di soto' milani' ngamanilo' gizebo o minine' guvelesi ve Pilato' neida ele'mizi vi ei' anau' milani' ve.

Vikevo Zuda' aza Izesu'ni hulo biluvaliti a'ningu' ive'mo Izesu'ni goni' i-di helelive lani' nene ningo gelo muluno do velepe' izo a'mine siluva' moni teoti (30) nene ihe' do vo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi ido' Zuda veti gizebo ve'inesi do tine' molo nongemo
ti' lo line': Naza lihime do ve lamine' lihime've nomine' mene hulo biluvaliti adingu' okuvo bili hililisa naze. Lavo ingine olo. Lihime dabe. Neve ne leli' gono nomive. Gei' gonoka ve lani'.
Likevo Zuda' aza a'mine siluva' moni nene mono' numungu' hulo molo mono' numunguti' lemo vine'. Lemo vosa vo nala' ine'.

Ne'mine ogavo ingine eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba a'mine moni di ne'mine lani': Mene moni nene evene' ma bele helelone lo hulune' nenako nemu' ne'mi lihime a'mido' neinako nemu' O'moso'mi gonomu' hulani' monisi do hamo' ogo molalonido' nomive.
Ne'mine li a'mine monimu' gamazi li volelo' melo' igisa misubo somo lolo' oga' ive'mi misubo've ma hetati' ve ma a'mida hililiza aleve galese izilizani' ebe' meni hizani'.

Meni hizi a'mine misubo nene evene' ma bele helo vanise've leke-delone li hulani' monidunu' meni hizanako nemu' nene a'mine misubo nene vanise misubo ve li milani'. Ne'mine li milikevo idisesi nene vanise misubo ve lo ha laa' none.

Ne'mine ikevo O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi lo soto' oga' ive gozopo' ma minive Zelemia' aza gamazi mono' godolou' gizekine' ma nene gihile izine'. Ti' lo gize neive: A'mine siluva' moni teoti (30) nene Isilaele' aleve malite a'mine dize minivemu' ei' oko'nolo' meni hizilizangumu' ei' meni've ve lani' moni nene di
Guvelesi ve'mo lo-nimido' a'mine monitunu' nene misubo somo lolo' oga' ive'mi misubo ma meni hizani'.

Ido' Izesu'ni ele'mizi vi ngamanilo' gizebo ve naba'mi velelo' di vi oti-dani'. Oti-dikevo ve naba ne'mo longo' o-do ti' line': Gaza nene Zuda veti guve'inesi ve naba nabe. Olo. Ne'mine lavo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Mo gasika nene nolaine' ve.
Ido' ingine eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi evenelite gizebo ve'inesi inite' mukikumu' goni' i-dani'za aza gamazi hamokisi mo lo-ngemamine'.
Ne'mine ogavo Pilato' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Gamazi ma lo-ngemamaine' nenako gamazi muki' geito' li mili nilani' nene mo gelabe gelamane
Ne'mine line'za aza gamazi hamokisi a'mido' mo lo-emamine'. Gamazi lo-emamivo ngamanilo' gizebo ve Pilato' aza gala muki' goloso giline'.

Ido' kilisimasilo' kilisimasilo' O'moso'mo Zuda veti avotemotine ise'ine izingumu' geloo holise' minaa' une' gamenelo' gamenelo' nene evenelite galapuso ve muki' minanguti' nene hamo' ma heta vilive li gulive ikevo ngamanilo' gizebo ve naba ne'mo a'mine ve nene nala' numunguti' hulo heta o-ngedaa' ine' ve.
A'mine Izesu'ni goni' i-dani' gamenelo' nene Izesu' abalaho ma gizengize ve ma guvele buu lo monive gulive gohi ma Balabasi' aza nala' numungu' minine'.

Neivo evene' mulise milikevo Pilato' aza ti' lo longo' o-ngidine': Lingine gilikevo zahine iseve izo hulo lengita olove. Izesu' evene' do ngu' izelive alosa neive lave ma nehe abalaho Balabasi' ma neve.

Ido' Pilato' ne'mine lo longo' o-ngidine' nene nanitekumu' ve. Evene' vai' Izesu'ni e'metani' nenako nemu' nene ingine ezemu' mulu'ningu' goloso gilani' nemukovo' nene nezela gonito' ele'mizi milikeve lo giline' nemu' longo' o-ngidine'.

Ido' Pilato' aza zasite minaa' ani' holomolo' mino Izesu' goni've nogilivo elenaho gamazi eita hulo molo line': Gaza ne mo a'mine ve lamine' lisihe' ogo neive'mi oko'nola mo gamazi lo molamiline' o neive. Holuka' eikumu' vamu' ma ninge emo mulumo naba goloso nogele-duve lo line'.

Pilato' aza zahine apase lengemelove lo longo' o-ngedavo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi mono' gizebo ve'inesi ingine mulu'ningu' hizikevo evenelite Balabasi'ni nene apase-ledo Izesu'ni bele helelesane li li-imani'.
Li-imikevo ve naba'mo gohi longo' o-ngedo line': A'mine ve sitakuti' mene zahine apase hulo-lengedekuvo lengita vilive. Lavo ingine Balabasi' ve lani'.

Likevo Pilato' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ido' evene' O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live ve lave Izesu'ni mene nadi' o-delove. Lavo evene' mukilite ti' li lani': Gaza lanivo lohoto' zalo' bili hililizave.
Likevo aza lo-ngimine': Nanitekumu' lohoto' zalo' bele helelone. Inite' goloso ine' nene nanite' nolive. Ti' lo lo-ngimine'za ingine amuzo mili lohoto' zalo' bele' navo li gohi geligelinga lani'.

Likevo Pilato' aza gamazi line' mo ana damivo a'mingu' lovo naba mo soto' iline' ogavo nene ningo lihime ezela minamilive lo ngelebizelesa noso ma do eveneliti ve'nido' ana noso' noizo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Mene lengi' initetine ve. Lingine lihime've nomive lisihe' lamine' mene bililizaha nenita ei' lihime minamoloseive.
Ne'mine lavo evene' mukito' lani': Bele helelone' nene a'mine lihime lelitasi mino leze zuho alinge' soto' ilizavelasi havo' mine do vo mineleseive.

Ne'mine likevo Pilato' aza Balabasi'ni hulo heta o-davo engita vine'. Ne'mine ogo Pilato' aza lavo ngibilaa' ani' gavosodunu' Izesu'ni mehene izivi' ledivi' igi bilikevo di vi lohoto' zalo' bililizave lo Loma veti ami pilisi ve neti a'ningu' molani' ve.

A'ningu' molavo a'mine ngamanilo' gizebo ve naba'mi ami pilisi velite Izesu'ni ele'mizi ngamani numuno naba'mi lulou' dizi vi a'mingu' minani' ami pilisi ve linge mamu' vise likevo mukito' Izesu' velelo' di gese' ani'.
Ne'mine igi a'mine ngolokine' genegana ne di huli-di guve'inesi ve naba nete ngilaa' ani' ne'mine gele minelive li lehoko' ne'mine gulehe' lavolavo di ngili-di

uhoni nala' di gangi guve'inesi ve nabalite madu'nido' gihaa' ani' inite' ne'mine apa nite' igi lili' igi madunolo' gihi-di ana zamela angaba gavoso ne'mine imani'. Imi velela obuvo'ine hizi imi Zuda veti guve'inesi ve ma gopo'ni nolo-gimune li golo izi gize zohi' i-dani'.
Gize zohi' i-di gituho' i-di a'mine angaba gavoso imikadunu' godololo' bili minani'.
Ne'mini golo izani' ne osu' lavo genegana di ngili-dani' nene apasi di huli-di ei' oko'nolo' inite've nene gohi di izi-di lohoto' zalo' bililisa ele'mizi vani'.
Ele'mizi vi numuno ebe' nihuli Kilene ebekuti' ve ma gulive Simoni'ni nene ningi Izesu' lohoto' za'velo' gehe-delive li amuzonga li-imikevo gihine'.
Gehavo vi ebe' ma minine' gulive Goligota nene leli' gamazikoti' godolo amuzo ebe' nela vi hetelani'.
Vi heteli vaini noso a'mingu' mulumo mate-ngedaa' inite' ekese' ine' nene di gopo ikeni' nene nalive li imani'za ngomo no geleko namolosuve lo o'ove line'.
Ne'mine ogavo lohoto' zalo' bili gili' li di oti badani'. Di oti badi genegana've ize' mili dalisa zohi' igi geheni mulo ngomo ma hulika' hulika' ikevo ngivile' ogo hulive'mo doka' doka' ine'.
Ne'mine igi a'mida mini gizebo i-di minani'.
Ido' lohoto' zalo' bilisa goni' i-dani' lihime ne li soto' igi me ve Izesu' nene Zuda veti guve'inesi ve ve li luhuvo gizi godolo veleto' nene di badani'.
Ido' gizengize ve sita' ezesi maka' lohoto' zalo' ngibili ma ne ana zamela di oti-di ma ne ana adavala di oti-dani'.
Ne'mine ikevo evene' igi vigi ave nete ungumu' izi divi' ledevika li-di
ti' li lani': Mono' numuno naba izo kuso hulo gamene sitohamo novivo gohi gizelove laa' anive gaza O'moso'mi gipele noo ma gei' okonga nene do gu' izo lohoto' zaloti' apaso lemevo.
Nilavo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi mono' apizi ngimaa' avesi mono' gizebo ve'inesi ingine a'mine a'mine igi gize' i-di li volelo' melo' igi ti' li lani':

Aza evene' linge ma nene do ngu' izive lani'za ei' oko'no nene ngelo do u' izamiline' ogave. Isilaele' aleveti guvetesi ve naba ma ne ngelo minelihe. Lohoto' zaloti' lemo ano lovo. Lemavo eito' gele ele'vole' olone.
O'mosolo' gele medele mino O'moso'mi gipele nouve laa' neine' nenako nemu' nene O'moso'mo ezemu' umo helavo ma alo' do u' izezo lovo.
Likevo gizengize ve sita' lohoto' zalo' maka' ngibilavesi a'mine a'mine igi gamazi goloso li-dasine' ve.
Ido' holise' tuvelu (12) kilokuloti' ebe' mukiku' nene liti'muso ize gese' ogo mine do vo tili (3) kiloku nivenga' ogavo gohi labana' iline'.

Ido' tili kiloku ne'mido' nene Izesu' aza amuzo molo asi naba lo ti' lo line': Eli, Eli lema sabahatani. Leli' gamazikoti' nene ne'mi monovo ne'mino neive: O'mosoo O'moso'ne make, nanitekumu' hulo-nedane.
Lavo eze minine' gahevela minave linge ma nete nene gili ti' li lani': Polohete Elia'nimu' asi nolive.
Likevo ve mali'mo a'mido' geto loti' izo vo nosou' lupizisa lipi naa' ani' inite' ma do ekese' oga' ine' vaini noso mau' lupizo vai' lavo viliki' viliki' lo nalive lo ngongo'nolo' izo imine'.
Emavo evene' malite ti' li lani': Elia' lemo do u' izelihe ninge minelone.
Likevo Izesu' aza gohi asi naba nolo Sikalahu've nohulo hiline'.
Nohilivo mono' numuno nabau' izi hukikani' lavolavo nene veletati' gala'muda limivo izo ho'lo sita' neivo misubo mimi' noogo meni naba lemo geheni naba nene izivi' ho'livi' ani'.
Ne'mine neivo gonoso galese ma nene ngolo' lani' nene O'moso'mi evenele zuho gozopo' hili minanguti' muki' ma oti gese' ani'.
Oti gese' ikevo alinge' Izesu' hilinguti' otavo a'mine gomu' hilave gonoso galese huli Zelusalemi numuda vi evene' muki' soto' pizi ngimani'.

Ido' a'mine mimi' ogavo ami pilisi veti gizebo ve'inesi ido' a'mida ami pilisi ve Izesu'nimu' gizebo minavesi mimi' ine' nene niningi a'mida inite' ine' nene ningi ngehelele goloso izavo ti' li lani': Lamineto' me ve nene mo O'moso'mi gipele gihile minani' neive lani'.
Ido' vene' muki' nGalilaia misubokoti' Izesu'ni e'meti vi nasahili' idi'mi vani' nete hota gidini mini ningi minani'.
A'mine vene' muki' minangu' nene Mangadala numudoti' Malia' nene minine' ido' Malia' abalaho Zakobongi Zosehengi ize'nibosi ido' Zebedaio' gipele zuhoti ize'nibosi nene minani'.
Nivenga' molavo Alimataia ebetati' heneni ve ma gulive Zosehe' nene aza Izesu'ni e'metaa' ive nene ani'.
Aza Pilato' neida vo Izesu' oko'nomu' longo' ine'. Longo' ogavo Pilato' aza Zosehe'ni di imilizave lo ami pilisi ve lo-ngedavo
gonoso nene Zosehe'ni mo imikevo aza do lavolavo mokono' lamineku' do molo asese ize-dine'.
Ize-do asi've Zosehe' lavo ei' gonoso galese've gosoho' gehengu' ma golo'vati-mikangu' nene do vo molo-do a'mine gonoso galese velelo' nene geheni naba ma do velehe' molo do tileko vine'.
Ne'mine neivo Malia' Mangadala numudoti' nesi Malia' ma nesi a'mine gonoso galese gahevela nene mini ningi minasine'.

Ido' aize' holise' gamene ve li a'mine gamenemu' nene noso' nite' di va'va' iga' ani' gamene vavo gamene malo' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi ido' Halisaio' mono' laa' avesi vi Pilato' neidaa di gese' igi
ti' li lani': Guvekasi ve, velesi ha mino a'mine O'moso'mo evene' do ngu' izeline lo nimiselelesa live nouve lo gote izaa' ive'mo helo gamene sitohamo mino gohi otelesuve line' nene ha gele none.

Nemu' nene izipahala zuhote igi a'mine gonoso nene gumine di vi gonoso galeseti' mo otave li evene' li-ngimikevo gomu' gote izo O'moso'mo nimiselelesa live nouve line' gamazi nene ivile' ogo ingine alinge' soza lilizani' ne'mo evene' ngele'mize gopo ogalive. Nemu' nene lo-ngemanivo ami pilisi vete vi a'mine gonoso galeselo' gamene sitohamo mini gizebo lamine' ilizave losa nolune.

Ne'mine likevo Pilato' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ti' li ma a'mida gizebo ilizave ami pilisi ve ne'mine ma di a'mida huli-ngidi lingine a'mine gonoso galeseti' nene gonoso gumine di vikelizave li aka'ine hizi tililizani' aka ma gili nii ma ha hizi tililisave.
Ido' ne'mine lavo vi gonoso galese velelo' hizi tilani' gehedo' nala' di gili' li humo izi a'mido' kekeize luhuvo bili gi'mizi a'mido' gizebo minilizave li ami pilisi ve huli-ngidani' ve.
A'mine Zuda vete mine gelo minaa' une' holisete Salele nene ogo vavo Sadeu' go' lolosa neivo Malia' Mangadala numudati' nesi ido' Malia' ma nesi a'mine gonoso galese nene vi ningilisa vasine'.
Ido' nivasivo a'mine gonoso galesela mimi' naba goloso ine'. Neivo Guvelesi ve'mi angelo' ma lemo ogo a'mine gonoso galeselo' geheni naba nene ehuso' ogo do hulo a'mido' mito' minine'.
A'mida nene gopa'na gopa'na oga' ine' ne'mine labanalasi neivo genegana'veloti' nene mokono' goloso elo silingenge'ni hulo minine'.
A'mine angelo' ningadi'mo ami pilisi ve ingine ngehelele goloso izo luvoluvo goloso izi amuzo'ine gulu' gelavo hilave ne'mine igi minani'.
Ne'mine ikevo angelo' aza vene' sita' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lengehelele izamivo. Lingine nene Izesu' lohoto' zalo' bili hilavemu' vise' nasine' nene gele nouvoni'za
aza nene meu' nomive. Mili-dangu' me igi ningilizo. Gomu' lo-lingimine' ma'mino aza mo oto vave.

Nemu' nene lite' li vi ei' izipahala zuho nene ti' li li-ngimilizo: Hiline' mati' mo oto lengi' lingivile' ogo nGalilaia misubola gana' vo hetelo neivo a'mida ningilisave li li-ngimilizo. Mo a'ne lo-lengeme nouve.
Lavo ngehelele izine'za ngolize goloso izi a'midati' lite' mate' li Izesu' izipahala zuho li-ngimilisa loti' izi vasine'.
Ido' Izesu' aza vene' sita' nene akalo' nivasivo votene' ogo ne nasihe lavo ingine vene' sita' igi oso'molo izi-di opo'ni lasine'.
Ne'mine ikesivo Izesu' aza lo-ngimine': Lengehelele izamivo. Vi neze zuho nGalilaia misubola vi a'mida neze ningilisave li vi li-ngidilizo.
Api' igi nivasivo ami pilisi ve gonoso galeselo' gizebo minave ingine Zelusalemi numuda vi eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba nene a'mine inite' soto' ingumu' nene li-ngimani'.
Ido' a'mine eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba nesi ido' mono' gizebo ve nesi mulise mili gamazi li volelo' melo' igi ami pilisi ve moni ningimi ti' li lani':
Evenelite hilinguti' mo otave li gilikelizave. Ne'mine li-ngimilo: Okise ongo noningumu' izipahala zuhote igi gonoso ma gumine di vikeve li li-ngimilo.

Ido' guvetinesi ve ngamanilo' gizebo ve naba ne'mo a'mine gamazi geleline' nene gono dami okise ingangumu' goni' o-lengedo lihime lengemalive lo gamazitunu' mulunou' hizekunivo isetine izavo linginela gamazi ma minamoloseive.
Likevo a'mine moni di li-ngimani' ne'mine igi ami pilisi ve nete Izesu' izipahala zuho igi gonoso gumine di vikeve likevo a'mine lani' gamazi nene Zuda vetida buu lavo idisesi ha gili nizave.
Ido' Izesu' izipahala zuho leveni (11) nene nGalilaia misubouko vi Izesu' lo-ngimine' golo ma minida vi
Izesu'ni ningani'. Ido' eze ningave nete gubi' izi imi opo'ni lani'za linge ma nete hele neinguti' ngelo alihe li ga'ine sita' gilani'.

Ne'mine ikevo Izesu' aza izipahala zuho nizada ogo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Okulumokuko minavesi ido' misubouko minavesi ingine muki' neze nene gelekele' i-nidi minilizave lo O'moso'mo amuzo mo neme neine' ma ne neive.

Nemu' nene misubou' misubou' moni evene' zuho ato ato' muki' nene neni' evene'ne zuho lili' igi ne'metilizave li mulu'ningu' hizi Me'neho ido' gipele neni' ido' Sikalahu've lamine' nesi leli' gulivetelo' noso mili-ngidi mono' noso hili-ngidilo.

Hili-ngidi naza ne'mine igi, igi mili minilo lo lo-lingimuvoni' initekumu' li-ngimi inginesi a'mine sunovo' igi mili minilizani' aka nene ngelebizi apizi ngimilo. Ne'mine igi nizavo naza nene hize ele' o-lengedo linginesi gamene gamene havo' mine do vo me misubou' minilizani' gamene osu' lavo gamene naba alido' nesi nene lengikisi ha minelesune lo lo-ngimine'.
Moda ve
O'moso'mi gipele Izesu' Kilisito' ezemu' gamazi lamine' nene gana' api' ogo soto' ine' ma ti' lo neive:
O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' o-ngemaa' ive polohete ma gulive Isaia' aza luhuvo ma gizingu' O'moso'mo guvelesi vemu' gamazi lo-imine' nene ti' lo gize neive:
Gelezo. Naza neze gamazi lo-ngeme ngeme' ilive imiselekuvo
aza do gomu' molo akaka vele-gedeleseive.
Ebe' hadivelati' ve mali'mo asi naba ma ti' lo nolive:
Guvelesi ve alingumu' ve li aka've di va'va' igi di lisihe' i-dilo.

A'mine ne'mine lido' e'meto evene' mono' noso holo-ngedaa' ive Zohane' aza misubo hadiveu' vo soto' ogo evene' ti' lo lo-ngimine': O'moso'mo lengi' lihimetine hulo-lengedelingumu' ve li lutine di velepe' izi mono' noso hilalo lo lo-ngeme ngeme' ogo minine'.
Minavo Zudaia misubokotikisi Zelusalemi numungutikisi evene' muki' ezela vi heteli lihime'ine li soto' ikevo Zodani nosou' noso holo-ngidine'.
Zohane' aza kamela ize zopovodunu' lili' ani' genegana've izo ize losuvodunu' lili' ani' leti ma gopololo' izine'. Ido' noso' nite've naa' ine' nene ma'nabuso ido' himoni novozo nesi no minaa' ine'.

No mino evene' ti' lo lo soto' ogo lo-ngeme ngeme' ogo minine': Evene' mehe'nela alinge' ma nave nene nezesi nivile' o-nedosa ve naba ve. Naza a'ne'mine'mine goboni gono do-do ei' suu'veloti' nala've nesi nene gubi' izo apase hulo-delodo' nene mo lisihe' amuve.
Naza noso holo-lingiduvoni' nene haza nosotunu' holo-lingiduve. Ne neiha a'mine ve ne'mo noso ne'mine holo-lengedeline' nene O'moso'mi Sikalahukisi ne neive.
A'mine gamene neu' Izesu' aza nGalilaia misubou' numuno ngomo ma Nasalete nene hulo vo hetelavo Zohane' aza Zodani nosou' holo-dine'.
Holo-davo nosouti' dizosa a'mido' ningine' nene okulumo' ne ngolo' lavo Sikalahu' ne'mo nama viluso ne'mino lulou' dizelesa nolimivo ningine'.
Ne'mine ogavo Okulumokuti' gamazi ti' lo limine': Gaza nene vo'nelo' gipe'ne hamo' nene nane. Gezemu' nene mo mulu'neu' lamine' nogiluve.
Ido' neloti' geto Sikalahuli'mo Izesu'ni nene hadive misubou' imiselavo vine'.
Vavo a'mida nene Satani'mo emengu' molo'mo novivo gamene foti (40) vine'. Ido' a'mida nene Izesu' aza loposo nama gaha minaa' ada neivo angelo' nete nasahili' i-dii hize ele' i-di minani' ve.
Ido' Zohane'ni nalato' huli-dikevo neivo Izesu' aza nGalilaia misubou' vo O'moso'mi gamazi lamine' lo soto' ogo ti' lo lo-ngimine':
Gamene nene mo ogave. O'moso'mo gizebo o-ledeline' gamene alitave. Nemu' nene lingine lutine di velepe' izi gamazi lamine' mene gili ele'vole' ilo lo lo-ngimine'.

Ido' Izesu' aza nGalilaia noso ohuno naba'mi gahevela nomono Simoniki nakunolo Adeleaki ingine alaha' daa' asive minasinako alaha' daa' asine' golaleze'ine nene alaha' dalisa nosou' nihulasivo ningine'.
Ningo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine igi ne'metilizo. Alaha' daa' nasine' ne'mini evene' di nenita iga' ilisive lo lengele'mize molaloze.
Ne'mine lavo ingine lite' li alaha' daa' asine' golaleze'ine hitiki e'meti vasine'.
Ve sita' nene do gi'mizo ngomo ma novo aza Zebedaio' gipele sita' Zakoboki nakunolo Zohaneki sipiu' mini alaha' daa' ani' golaleze'ine nene ongoti di lamine' nasivo ningo
asi lo-ngemavo gili me'nibo Zebedaio'nisi agove'vesi sipiu' huli-ngimiki e'meti vasine'.
Ingine vi Kahanaumi numungu' mini holise' gamene naba ogavo mono' numungu' dizi Izesu' mono' gamazi apize ngimine'.

Ido' apize ngimine' gamazimu' nene vo'ine vavo upuho' ani'. Ee, aza mono' apize ngimine' nene avo'ningeliti mono' gamazi apizi ngimaa' avete apizi ngimaa' ani' ne'mino apize ngemamo asi gamazi meleho ne'mine'mo apize ngimine' gelavo nemu' vo'ine vavo upuho' ani' ve.
Ne'mine nilavo a'mine mono' numu'ningu' nene ve ma minine'. A'mine ve'mi lulou' nene eveneliti luteu' do goloso oga' ive Satanilati' sikalahu' nene minavo aza geke' lo ti' lo line':
Nasalete ve Izesuvo, leli' nonida mene nanimu' ane. Gaza do goloso o-ledelesa abe. Geze nene naza mo ningo gele nouve ma nene nane. Gaza nene O'mosolati' kegeso lamine' minanive ma nene nane.
Ne'mine line'za Izesu' aza elemo ti' lo lo-imine': Gamazi lamo zegene' oko mino evene' hulo-do lemo ogo vozo.
Ne'mine lavo a'mine sikalahu' goloso nene vauve elo evene' do upuho' ogo do gesevase ize-do geke' naba lo lulouti' lemo vine'.

Ne'mine ogo lemo vavo evene' ingine ningi upuho' igi angise oko'ningu' longo' i huli volelo' melo' igi ti' li lani': Mene nani suno ve. Ve mene amuzo ve mino sikalahu' goloso gamazi lo-ngemavo gamazi've gili daa' nave li li volelo' melo' ani'.
Ne'mine ikevo guvele nene hutile' ogo nGalilaia misubou' numudo' namado' mone osu' line'.
Ne'mine ogavo mono' numunguti' limi Simoniki Adeleaki numu'ningu' Zakobole Zohanelesi dizani'.
Simoni' elenahi izeleho nene oko'nolo' olo' ahu' lavo ongo neivo nemu' Izesu'ni geti li-imani'.
Li-imikevo aza neida vo analo' do do ote-davo oko'nolo' olo' ahu' line' nite' nene a'mido' geto hulo-davo lamine' gelo noso' nite' gize vata' o-ngedo nasahili' o-ngidine'.
Ido' nivenga' ho' lemavo inite' gizi davesi lu'ningu' sikalahu' goloso minivesi muki' ezela ngele'mizi di ika' ika' ani'.
A'mine numudoti' aleve muki' nene igi gatedo' di gese' ani'.

Ne'mine ikevo aza inite' ato atoli'mine gizi dave muki' do lamine' o-ngedo sikalahu' goloso muki' evene' maliti lu'ninguti' ngimiselo do huline'. Ido' Sikalahu' goloso ingine eze ningi lamine' igi gili nizani' nenako gamazi lamilo lo lo-ngemo ngimiselo do huline' ve.
Nedenga' go' olihe lamivo Izesu' aza oto guviseu' evene' nizamangu' vo O'mosola lo minine'.
Ti' neivo Simoni' nene gonolomotesi ingine vise' i'mi vani'.
Ningi ti' li li-imani': Evene' muki' gezemu' vise' nave.
Li-imikevo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Naza mono' lo soto' ogo lo-ngemelongisi numuno ebe' avito' minani' nela vukele'zo. Naza nene mo ne'mine olove losa uvoni' ve lo lo-ngimine'.

Ne'mine lo aza mono mono' numu'ningu' mono' lo soto' o-ngeme'mo vo ido' sikalahu' goloso evene' maliti lu'ningu' dizi minani' nene ngimiselo hulo'mo vo nGalilaia misubou' minani' ebe' mukiku' nene mone osu' line'.

Ido' ganadise gize dave mali'mo ezela ogosa obuvolo hize emo amuzonga lo ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza do lamine' o-nedeline' amuzokasi naine' nene naza mo gele mino do lamine' o-nedeline lo gele nouve. Gaza do lamine' o-nedelesa gele nabe.
Ne'mine lavo Izesu' muluno hukavo ganadise gizi dave i-ngidisa'mani' inite' o-do ana hulo molo oko'nolo' hito ti' lo lo-imine': Naza do lamine' o-gedelesa gele nouve. Nemu' gaza lamine' ozo.
Ne'mine lavo ganadise ne'mo lite' lo oko'noloti' hulo-do vavo lamine' giline'.
Lamine' gelavo Izesu' aza geto gamazi amuzo molo lo-emo imiselo nohulo ti' lo line':

Gele nabe. Gaza lamine' aine' monovo nene evene' hamokisi lo-ngemamozo. Eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive ne'mo ganadise okongaloti' hulo-gedo vine' nene ningo lo soto' ogavo gaza lamine' aine' nemu' nene evenelite ningi gililizangumu' ve lo ne'mine ozo: Ganadise gizi dave ingine lamine' igi ma ize inite' ne'mine ne'mine O'moso imilisave lo Mose' lo huko lido' nene e'meto eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive nene inite' ma O'moso oloku' gize emelingumu' nene do vo emezo lo lo-imine'.

Ne'mine lo lo-imine'za ve aza vo a'mine gamazi api' ogo vetete' ogo do hutile' ine'. Ne'mine ogavo nemu' nene evene' gili Izesu'ni lisilizani' o vivo aza nene numuno ebeku' soto' vamilido' ogavo haza guvisela neivo numudo' namado' ve nene ezela igivo' minani' ve.
Gamene ma ogo vavo Izesu' aza Kahanaumi numuda tibizo ogo a'mida numu'vela neivo nemu' evene' ingine gili
igi di gese' igi giki' goloso adi'mo gatedokisi vovosi ma minamine'. Ne'mine ikevo aza mono' gamazi lo-ngemo minine'.
Ti' neivo inginelati' ve sita've sita've nete gebili ma ngakato' mili di navo evene' malite ezela ngele'mizi alisa ani'za
evene' muki' giki' ikevo ne'mo neida di vamilizani' ogavo nubito' dizi Izesu' minine' lisihelelo' numuno nubiku' bili heteli gebili ongo minine' ngaka' nene nalato' hulikevo limine'.
A'mine hulave nete ha do lamine' o-deleseive li gili ele'vole' ani' nene ningo gelo Izesu' aza gebili ve nemu' ti' lo line': Gipe'neho gei' lihimeka nene mo apase-gedekuve.
Lavo avo'ningeliti mono' apizi ngimaa' ave ma a'mida minave nete ga'ningu' ti' li gili minani':
Evene' me ve nene nanimu' ne'mine nolive. O'moso ivile' o-daa' gamazi lave. O'moso'movo' lihimete hulo-ledaa' ive ne neive li gili minani'.
Ti' li gilani' nene Izesu' aza lulouko gelo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine nanimu' gatingu' ne'mine li nigilave.

Lingine nenikumu' nene sozavo' laa' neive li gilaa' nahe. Gebili nemu' lihimeka mo hulo-gedekuve luvoni' nene soza lolohe lamine' lolohe ma gilamilisave lo lapa nomivo noluvoni'za sozalo' ve minuvodini ve gebili nemu' naza oto vozo nolo-duvo oto vamivo soza luvoni' nene soto' ogavo novozo helalove lo gelo oto vozo lo ma lamuvodine.

Ne neiha O'mosolati' ve gihile naza misubouko lengi' lihimetine apase-lengedaa' amuzo do nouve luvoni' nene soza lamo mo lamineto' noluvoni' nene ningi gililizangumu' naza idise ogo molo oloni' inite' nene ningilo. Ne'mine lo gebili nemu' ti' lo lo-imine':
Ti' lo nolo-gimuve. Gaza oto ngakaka do geho numungala vozo.
Lavo mukito' ningi nizavo geto oto ngaka've do geho vine'. Ne'mine ine' nemu' evene' muki' ingine golize li O'moso opo'ni li ti' li lani': Laza gomu' inite' ne'mine ma ningesa'mune' ve li lani'.
Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' aza noso ohuno gahevela tibizo vine'. Vavo evene' muki' ezela ika' ika' navo aza mono' apize ngeme'mo vo minine'.
Ne'mine o'mo novo Alahaio' gipele Levi' aza takisi moni daa' ine' opisi'veu' gono do neivo ningo ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza ne'meto ano. Ne'mine lavo aza oto e'meto vine'.

Vi eze numu'veu' Izesulesi noso' nite' ni nizavo monovo goloso igi takisi moni daa' avesi ido' Zuda veti lou' gamazilo' e'mete lamine' isa'mave gohi ma nesi muki' e'meti vani' nenako eze izipahala zuhosi mukito' makato' noso' nite' ni minani'.

Ne'mine igi nizavo Halisaio' eveneliti mono' apizi ngimaa' ave ingine Izesu' nene takisi moni daa' avesi ido' Zuda veti lou' gamazilo' e'mete lamine' isa'mavesi noso' nite' maka' ninavo ningi izapahala zuho ti' li longo' i-ngidani': Aza takisi moni daa' ave golososi ido' lihime daa' ave lingesi maka' mini nanimu' noso' nite' ninave.

Likevo gelo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Luso ve aza lamine' haza minave do lamine' o-ngedelesa osa'miha inite' gizi davemukovo' nene oga' neive. Naza a'mine a'mine ogo evene' lisihe' i minavemu' amuvoni'za evene' lihime'inesi vemu' uvoni' ve.

Gamene ma Zohane' izipahala zuhosi Halisaio' evenekisi mono'inemu' gili noso' nite' malise igi nizavo evene' linge ma Izesuda igi ti' li longo' i-dani': Zohane' izipahala zuhosi Halisaio' eveneliti izipaha'ine zuhosi ingine noso' nite' malise igi nizaha geze izipaha zuho noso' nite' malise amave. Ne nanimu' nave.

Longo' i-dikevo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ve mali'mo vene' di imiliza gameneu' olize izo noso' nite' gize vata' ogo eze zuho molo-ngedavo ingine aza a'mingu' neivo mulumo gili-di noso' nite' malise ilizado' nehe. Ne nomive. Vene' dalosa ive a'mingu' ha neivo ma noso' nite' ngeli malise amilisave. A'mine a'mine igi naza nouvosa nene lamine' gili nizanako noso' nite' malise amilizaha
engi' vovo'ninguti' biluvalite neze nele'mizi di vilizani' gamene nene mo aliteleseive. A'mine gamene alitavo mulumo gilisa noso' nite' malise ilisave.

Ido' lavolavo gosohototi' ngomo ma huki saketi litehe hukido' mili ongotilizani' nene lavolavo gosoho' ne'mo gelelehe' ogavo saketi litehe nene naba hukalinako lavolavo ngomo ma olihe ngingili lamine' nene saketi litehelo' mili ongotisa'mave.

Ido' a'mine'mine igi lingine vaini noso gosoho' ne'mo meme' ize losuvodunu' lili' ani' gomise nene izo pou' lavo vaini noso nene lepo vo gomise'vesi nene goloso ogalive li vaini noso gosoho' gituho' galakala' neidi'mo nene lulu izavo gomise liteheli'mo gipu lo hukiline' o miningu' nene ma ohizi milisa'mave. Vaini noso gosoho' gituho' galakala' neivo nene meme' ize losuvo gosohotunu' lili' ani' gomise gosohoku' nene ohizeso' o neive. Ne'mine line' nene aza mono' lo-ngemaa' ine' nene gosoho' nenako izipahala zuho igi mili ilizani' monovo ne'mo a'mine Zuda veti monovo litehe malo' vo damingumu' nene line' ve.
Holise' gamene mau' Izesu' izipahala zuhosi viti mingu' nivavo izipahala zuhote viti godololati' gihile ili ni'mi vani'.
Ne'mine i'mi vani' nemu' Halisaio' evene' malite Izesu'ni ti' li li-imani': Ningezo. Leze lou' gamaziteu' nene holise' gameneu' gono damilo li nizani' mako ne'mine nanimu' nave.
Likevo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Davidi' eze evenele zuhosi noso' nite'ine nomivo ga'na hili nizado' aza inite' ine' nemu' gati gilisa'mahe.

Ado' Abiatala' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba minine' gameneu' Davidi' aza O'moso'mi numungu' dizo O'moso'mi velelo' milaa' ani' beleti nene do azasi maka' monavesi ngemavo nani'. A'mine beleti nene haza ve namilizave li eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehize-daa' avetevo' nalizave li li hukikani' beleti nene gopo nani' ma ve.

Ne'mine lo ti' lo lo-ngimine': O'moso'mo evene' do soto' molani' nene holise' gamene hize ele' ilizangumu' ve lo do soto' molani' nomive. Asi holise' gamene ne'mo nene evene' hize ele' o-ngedaa' ilive losa evenekumu' do soto' molani' ve.
Nemu' nene naza O'mosolati' ve gihile naza nene holiseli'mi melehosi mino a'mine holiseku' iliza initekumu' ido' amiliza initekumu' laa' uve nene nenikovo' nouve lo line' ve.
Mino mono' numungu' gohi dizine'. A'mida ve ma ana hamo' ma goloso ogo gilizevo o vine' nene omo neivo
evene' ma nete holise' gamene neinako Izesu' do lamine' o-deline' nene holisekumu' lani' lou' gamazi ma nene avuto' oloseinako nemu' goni' o-delone li ningilisa gizebo igi minani'.
Ti' igi nizavo Izesu' aza ana goloso o vivemu' ti' lo line': Vovoteu' ote minezo.

Lo evene' longo' o-ngidine': Leze lou' gamazite ne'mo nadive lo neive. Holise' gameneu' nene monovo lamine' ilo lo neihe. Monovo goloso ilo lo neive. Ado' evene' di lamine' i-ngidilo lo neihe. Evene' ngibili hililo lo neive lo longo' ogo line'za gamazi di tibizi lamavo

izebolo' molavo vele do eza ema ogo vonu' goloso ngebelo lu'ine ga'ine ngi lo tile vine' minangumu' mulumo'ine ninge-ngidine'. Ne'mine ogo ana goloso o vive ma nene ti' lo lo-imine': Anga do pehe lozo. Ne'mine lavo ana do pehe lavo gohi lamine' ine'.
Ne'mine ogavo Halisaio' evene' ingine limi bililizani' aka di soto' ilisa a'mido' geti Helode' zuhosi mulise mili gamazi di hamo' ani'.

Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' aza a'mine ebe' hulo izipahala zuho ngele'mizo noso ohuda limine'. Lemavo nGalilaia misubokoti' nene evene' vai' goloso e'meti ani'. Ido' evene' Zelusalemi numudotikisi Zudaia misubo lingelatikisi ma avo ido' Idumaia misubokotikisi ma avo ido' Zodani noso helalatikisi ma avo ido' linge ma Tilo numudotikisi Sidoni numudotikisi ani'. A'mine evene' vai' goloso ani' nete Izesu' ogo molo minine' inite' nemu' nene gilani' nenako nemu' ezela ani'.
Ne'mini ikevo di gese' ave ingine giki' giki' igi di langolo' i-nidikelizave lo sipi ma di igi di mili-nidilo lo izipahala zuho lo-ngimine'.

Ido' sipiu' minelove line' nene nemu' line' ve: Evene' muki' do lamine' o-ngedo miningumu' nene inite' gizi dave vai' ingine oko'nolo' do gelelone li ezela igi oko'nido' oko'nido' igi di langolo' i-dilizani' ine'.
Ido' ne'mine navo evene' lu'ningu' minani' sikalahu' goloso nete eze ningi gizenela limi ingi geke' naba li ti' li lika' lika' igi minani': Gaza O'moso'mi gipele ma ne nane.
Likevo aza nene ne'mo ma ve li neze monovo li soto' soto' igi li-ngimamilo lo amuzo molo lo huko lo-ngimine'.
Ido' Izesu' aza gololo' dizo ei' gala gilido' evene' ma vise lo-ngemavo ezela ani'.
Ikevo aza ve tuvelu do kegeso nenikisi monelone lo ido' ngimiselekuvo mono' li soto' igi li-ngimilizave.
Ido' amuzo ngemekuvo di mini evene' lu'ninguti' sikalahu' goloso ngimiselilizave lo do kegese-ngidine'.
Do kegese-ngidive ve tuvelu nete gulive'ine nene ne'mino neive: Simoni' gulive gohi ma nene Petolo' ve lo molo-dine'
ido' Zebedaio' gipele Zakobolesi akunolo Zohanelesi gulive'ine Boanelegesi' ve lo molo-ngidine'. Leze gamaziteuti' nene go' ngilili gili vasine' ve losa ve.
