Gamazi mene nolo-lingimuvoni' nene lingine nenikumu' gili ele'vole' ani' nene hulii limi ingikelizave losa nene nolo-lingimuve.
Zuda ve nete mono' mulise'ninguti' nene huli heta i-lingidilisave. Ee, gamene ma alosa neive. A'mingu' nene lengi' lingibili hililizave muki' nete O'moso'mi gono nodube li gilii lingibili hililisave.
Inite' nevo'mine nene ingine me'nehinesi nenikisi nene ningi gilamani' nenako ne'mo nene ne'mine ilisave.

Naza a'mine soto' iline' initekumu' do gomu' molo nolo-lingimuvoni' nene a'mine inite' alinge' soto' iline' gamenela nene lingine neni' lo-limine' malo' nene soto' neive li gili minilizangumu' nene nolo-lingimuve.
Naza nene lengikisi mine do ogo nouvoni' nenako nemu' nene naza idise nolo-lingimuvoni' initekumu' gana' ma lo-lengemamuvoni' ma neive.
Ee, gomu' lengikisi mine do ogo minuvoni'za idise nene mo nimiselivela nene novuve. Novuvoni'za lengikuti' hamoli'mosi nene zala novane lo longo' ma o-nedamive.
Ne neiha gamazi mene lo-lingimuvoni' ne'mo nene mulumo alumo lutingu' do vai' lo-lengedavo vai' lo neive.

Ne neiha naza mo lamineto' ti' lo nolo-lingimuve: Naza hulo-lengedo ma vamoloni' nene a'mine hize ele' o-lengedelive nene ma alido' minamoloseiha naza voloni' nene lengita imiselekuvo aloseinako nemu' voloni' ne'mo nene hize ele' o-lengedeleseive.

Ido' a'mine hize ele' o-lengedelive aline' nene lihime'ine'mi monovo nesi ido' lihime nomine' lisihe' lamine' minaali'mi monovo nesi ido' O'moso'mo goni' o-ngedo lihime ngemeline' monovo nesi nene do soto' ogo me misubou' aleve nene lu'ningu' hizivo ningi gililisave.
Ee, ingine nenikumu' gili ele'vole' ami minaa' naadoti' nene lihime engita neine' nene ngelebizeleseive.
Ido' lingine neni' nene gohi ningamilizada me'nehida volodoti' nene aza lihime've nomine' mino ve lisihe' lamine' minine' ve li ningilizave lo nesi ngelebizeleseive.

Ido' me misubou' aleveti guve'inesi ve lolo' ogo minive nene naza mo ivile' okuvo O'moso'mo goni' o-do lihime emelingumu' lo huko-didoti' nene me misubou' aleve mono' gilamave engikisi O'moso'mo goni' o-ngedo lihime ngemeline' o neine' nesi nene ngelebizeleseive.
Agae, naza idise nene gamazi vai' goloso ha lo-lengemeloni' o neine'za lingine idise a'mene lite' li di lutingu' milalizado' lisihe' amilisave.

Ne neiha a'mine luve gamazi gihile do soto' oga' ive O'moso'mi Sikalahu' aline' nene lengele'mize gamazi gihile mukili'mi akalo' molaloseive. Ne'mine iline' nene nanitekumu' ve. Aza nene ei' galauti' gelo lilivoba asi me'nehidati' geleline' initekovo' nene lo-lengemo ido' alinge' soto' iline' initekumu' nene lo soto' o-lengemeleseive.
A'mine luve ne'mo nene neni' gamazi'neuti' ma dosa lengi' lo-lengemeline' nene a'mine ne'mo neni' nene do hozi lo-nedeleseive.

Naza a'mine luve ne'mo lo-lengemaa' neine' inite' nene nenitati' daline' initekovo' nene lo-lengemeleseive noluvoni' nene neni' me'nehida neine' inite' muki' nene neni' inite'ne neine' nenako nemu' nene noluve.
Ido' gamene li'nibevo' gehepeve ogo vavo neni' nene gohi ma ningamilisave. Ido' a'midoti' nene gamene li'nibevo' gehepeve gohi ogo vavo neni' nene ningilisave.

Ne'mine lavo izipahala zuho linge ma nete nene angise'ine li volelo' melo' igi ti' li lani' ve: Aza nene gamene li'nibe ogo vavo neni' ningamilisave ido' gamene li'nibe gohi ma ogo vavo neni' nene ningilisave line' ve. Ido' gamazi ma me'nehida voloni' nenako nemu' noluve lo nesi nene line' ve. Ido' a'mine ne'mine gamazi line' nene nanitekumu' live. Laza gelamune.
Ne'mine li gohi ti' li lani': Gamene li'nibe ve line' ne'mi monovo nene nado nolive. Laza nene nadive nolihe nemu' nene ma gelamolonido' ogave.

Ne'mine nilavo Izesu' nene ingine longo' i-dilisa gili minani' nemu' nene mo ningo gelo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Lingine langisetine longo' tongo' igi li volelo' melo' nani' nene naza nene gamene li'nibe gehepeve ogo vavo neni' ningamilisave ido' gamene li'nibe gehepeve gohi ogo vavo neni' nene ningilisave luvongumu' nene nilahe.

Naza lamineto' ti' lo nolo-lingimuve: Lengi' nene vetinguti' ive novozo do'moze' moze' neivo ive nama igi nizavo me misubou' aleve nene ngolize izilisave. Lingine muhele' igi mulumo alumo gililisaha a'mine mulumo alumo gililizani' nene do velepe' izo longoloze izaa' lolo' oloseive.

Veneli'mo nene izipe gedeline' gamene ogavo izipe nogedo mulumo alumo gelaa' neiha alinge' nene izipe soto' ogavosa evene' ma nene me misubou' soto' ogave lo olize izosa a'mine mulumo giline' mamu' nene gohi ma gele minesa'mive.

Ido' a'mine'mine igi lingine idise mulumo nigilani'za alinge' naza gohi lengi' ningeloni' gameneu' nene lutingu' gulumo avile lise minivo longolize izi minilisave. Ee, ido' a'mine lutingu' longolize izilizani' nene evene' gohi malitesi nene ngeli ma di hulamilisave.

A'mine gamene aline' nene lingine inite' hamokumukisi longo' ma i-nidamilisave. Naza mo lamineto' ti' lo nolo-lingimuve: Neni' ve'nemu' igi lingine me'nehida inite' mamu' lilizani' nene aza a'mine inite' nene mo lengemeleseive.

Ne'mine o neine'za voku' lilizado' minamivo ganakuti' nene neni' ve'nemu' inite' mamukisi voku' lamavo mine do ogo idisesi nene ha none. Voku' lilo. Voku' lilizani' nene lengita longolize ne'mo nene vai' goloso lo minelive lo a'mine voku' liliza inite' nene ha lengemavo dalisave.

Naza gamazi nolo-lingimuvoni' mene lo soto' lamine' amo ha gepe' gamaziuti' lo-lingimuvoni'za gamene ma nani' a'mine gamenelo' nene gepe' gamaziuti' lo-lengemamo asi haza gamaziutikovo' nene lisihe' ogo lamineto' gehepeve me'nehinemu' lo-lengemelesuve.

A'mine gameneu' nene neni' ve'nemu' igi inite' mamu' voku' lilizani' nene naza lengito' medelo mino a'mine initekumu' nene me'nehine longo' o-delesuve lamolosuve. Nene nanitekumu' ve. Lingine nene lutine nimi O'mosolati' ave ve li gili gili ele'vole' igisa minani' nenako nemu' nene me'neho asi've nene lulo lengeme neine' nenako langisetine eita lilizani' nene ha gele lengemeleseive.
Ee, naza nene me'nehidati' ogo me misubou' ogo hetelosa a'mingu' mene mino mo me misubo hulo me'nehida tine' molo volosa nouve.
Ne'mine lavo izipahala zuho ingine ti' li li-imani': Gaza idise gamazi nolaine' nene do haleko gepe' gamaziuti' lamo gamazi gihile lamine' nolo-lemane.

Idise ne'mine nolanidoti' nene laza ti' lo gele osu' lo none: Evene' lelita longo' minine' a'minemu' nene gaza longo' o-gedamunivosi nene a'mine longo' nene mo ningo gelaa' nane. Ne'mine oga' naningumu' gei' nene mo O'mosolati' anive ma ne nane losa gele ele'vole' o none.
Ne'mine likevo Izesu' a'mido' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine idise mo gili ele'vole' ikehe. O'ove.

Lingine gili' nalo. Gamene atoli'mine ma aline' nene idise mo soto' o neinako lingine huli-nidi hutile' igi numudida numudida vikevo nenikovo' minuvodiba mo me'neho nene nenikisi neine' ne'mo nene nenikovo' ma minamolosuve.

Lingine mene gamazi nolo-lingimuvoni' nene nenitati' hongu lo lamino minaa' monovo di minilizave losa nene nolo-lingimuve. Ne neiha me misubou' minilizangu' nene geni initeli'mi lulou' lengele'mizi milalisave. Ne'mine ilisaha naza me misubou' aleve nene mo ngivile' o nouvoni' nenaze. Lingine a'mine genili'mi lulou' minilizangu' nesi nene ha amuzo milivo' minilo.

Izesu' aza a'mine mene gamazi nene lo-ngemo osu' lo vokene' ogo Okulumokuko noningo ti' lo line': Ahonoo, gamene molo-nedaine' ma nene mo ogave. Nemu' gipa neni' nene gei' nene do naba o-gedelesuze. Gaza gipa neni' nene do naba o-nedezo.
Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene gaza nemaine' evene' muki' nene minevo' minevo' ngemeni ngemeline lo evene' ato ato' mukito' nesi gizebo oloni' amuzo nene mo neme nane' nenako nemu' nene noluve.

Ido' minevo' minevo' ngemeni dameni daa' nene gei' O'moso gihile hamo' nemu' ningi gili hehe laatoti' nesi ido' evene' do ngu' izeline lo nimiselanive Izesu' Kilisito' nenikumu' ningi gili hehe lilizadoti' nesi nene dalisave.
Naza nene gei' nemaine' gono do piluvodi'mo nene me misubou' gei' nene do naba o-gedekuve.
Nemu' nene naza gomu' misubo mene olihe soto' amingu' geikisi mino guve'nesi ve naba minuvodi'mine ogo idise geikisi gohi nouvo a'mida nene do naba o-nedezo.

Me misubou' aleveuti' evene' ma do kegese-ngedo neni' nemelove lo nemanive engi' nene gei' monovoka ngelebizekuvo mo ningi gili nizave. Ingine nene gei' eveneka minadoti' nene neme nenita ogane. Ido' gei' gamazika nene mo gili di nizave.
Gei' nemaine' inite' muki' nene geitatikovo' ani' ma neive li mo gili nizave.

Ido' ne'mine li gili nizani' nene gei' lo-nemaine' gamazi nene lo-ngemekuvo di lu'ningu' milisa neni' nene lamine' geitati' uvoni' nemu' nene gili osu' li gei' nimiselaningumu' nene gili ele'vole' ani' nenako nemu' nene ne'mine li gili nizave.

A'mine evene' nemaine' nene gei' eveneka nizani' nenako nemukisi ido' a'mine aleveloti' nene neni' guve'ne monaa' neine' nenako nemukisi nene engikumu' geita noluve. Me misubou' aleve gei' gelekele' i-gidisa'mangumu' nene geita noluvoba asi a'mine nemaine' evenekumukovo' nene noluve.
Ee, ido' gei' eveneka nizave luvoni' nene nenita neine' inite' muki' nene gei' initeka neivo geita neine' inite' muki' nene neni' inite'ne neine' nenako nemu' nene luvoni' ve.

Naza nene me misubou' gohi imine' molo minamo geita alosa nouha a'mine aleve nete nene me misubou' mini'mi igi nizave. Nemu' nene lamine' atoli'mine ogo minanive me'neho make, gazasi nazasi bizo hamo' nosine' ne'mino inginesi bizi hamo' minilizangumu' ve lo gei' amuzoka do soto' ogo nedunu' nene alete molo-ngedezo. A'mine nemaine' amuzoka mamu' nene noluve.

Naza me misubou' engikisi maka' minuvoni' gameneu' nene gei' nemaine' amuzo do soto' ogo nedunu' alete molo-ngedo gizebo lamine' o-ngedekuvo engikuti' nene hamokisi ma vi tolovo amavo vo tolovo ilido' lisihe' o minive neevo' nene vo tolovo ogave. Ido' a'mine vo tolovo ine' nene mono' godolou' gizi nizani' gamazi nene gihile izelive losa vo tolovo ine' ve.

Ido' idise nene naza mo geita nouve. Ido' naza me misubouko ha mino vekisine mene gamazi mene nolo-ngimuvoni' nene ingine lu'ningu' gulumo avile lisivo minaa' monovo nenitati' nene dikevo engita vai' lilive losa nene nolo-ngimuve.

Naza vekisine mene gei' gamazika nene lo-ngemekuvo me misubou' aleve nete nene biluva' i-ngidi nizave. Ido' biluva' nii-ngidani' nene naza a'mine me misubou' aleveti muliseuti' minamuvoni' ne'mino inginesi nene a'mine muliseuti' minamani' nenako nemu' nene biluva' nii-ngidave.
Gaza nene a'mine vekisine meve nene me misuboukoti' do viline losa geita noluvoba asi ve goloso ngemengu' molavo goloso ikelizave losa alete molo-ngedeline losa noluve.
Naza nene me misubou' aleveti muliseuti' minamuvoni' ne'mino engikisi nene me misubou' aleveti mulise'ninguti' minamave.

Gamazi gihile lamine' nene apize ngemo nedunu' gono dalizado' do lisihe' o-ngedo do kegese-ngedezo. Ido' gamazi gihile laminekumu' noluvoni' meve nene gei' gamazika nene gamazi gihile lamine' neine' nenako nemu' nene noluve.
Gaza me misubou' alevetingu' nimiselanivo uvoni' ne'mino nazasi nene vekisine mene me misubou' alevetingu' nene ngimiseluve.
Ido' gamazi gihile lamine' ne'mo gono'inemu' do lisihe' o-ngedavo mini kegesi minilizado' o neize. Nemu' nene naza engikumu' ve lo oko'ne hulolodo' na'nise'ne nene mine kegese nouve.
Ido' geita noluvoni' mene engikumukovo' noluvoba asi engi' gamazi'ine gilisa nenikumu' gili ele'vole' ilizavemukisi nene geita noluve.

Ido' geita engikumu' noluvoni' nene ingine bizi hamo' minilizave losa geita noluve. Ee, me'neho make, gaza nenita nanivo naza geita nouvo nosine' ne'mine igi inginesi lelita bizi minikevo neloti' nene me misubou' aleve nete nene nenikumu' gei' nimiselaine' neive li ningi gili gili ele'vole' ilizave losa nemukisi nene geita noluve.
Ido' gaza nemaine' amuzo ma nene laza hamo' lolo' ogo nosine' ne'mine igi inginesi hamo' lili' igi minilizave lo engi' ngemekuve.

Ee, naza engita nouvo gaza nenita nanivo ne'mo engi' nene bizi hamo' gehepeve lili' igi minikevo neloti' nene me misubou' aleve nete nene gei' nimiselaine' ve ido' gaza luka nemaa' naine' ne'mino vekisine nene luka ngeme naine' neive li ningi gililizave losa a'mine amuzo nene vekisine ngemekuve.

Ahonoo, misubo mene olihe do soto' amosa luka nemosa nemu' amuzo atoli'mine ogo minine' nemaine' nene ningilizangumu' nene a'mine gei' do nemaine' evene' nene neni' mineloda nenikisi maka' minelone losa gele nouve.

Ahonoo, ve lisihe' gehepeve ve. Me misubou' aleve nete nene geikumu' ma ningi gilamani'za neni' neevo' nene mo ningo gele nouvoni' nenako vekise nete nene gei' nimiselaine' neive li ningi gili nizave.

Ido' naza gei' monovoka nene mo lo-ngemekuvo gilikeve. Ido' gohi ha lo-ngemelesuve. Nanitekumu' ve. Gaza nenito' luka naba goloso nemaa' naine' monovo ma nene engita neivo nazasi engita mine molo minelongumu' ve losa nene gei' monovoka gohi lo-ngemelesuve.
Izesu' aza gamazi mene lo osu' lo izipahala zuhosi Zelusalemi numuno ebekuti' limi heta igi Kidiloni gi'mize nosou' nene ledi vi za zuho ma minida a'mingu' dizi minani' ve.
Izesukisi izipahala zuhosi nene a'mingu' igi di gese' ika' ika' iga' ani' nenako biluvaliti a'ningu' molo-dive Zuda' azasi nene a'mine ebekumu' nene ha ningo gele minine' ve.

Ne'mine o neine' nenako nemu' nene Zuda' nene Loma veti ami linge ma do ido' eveneliti lihime'ine apaselive li O'moso guno gizi imaa' ave nabasi Halisaio' vesi mini ngimiselani' pilisi ve linge masi nene lovou' initekisi ido' lamusi livikisi davo ngele'mizo a'mine za zuhouko nene ani' ve.
nGele'mizo ogavo Izesu' aza ezela soto' iline' inite' mukikumu' nene mo gele mino engi' nizada ogo hetelo zahinemu' vise' i'mi nave lo longo' o-ngidine' ve.

Ne'mine lo longo' o-ngedavo laza Nasalete ve Izesu'ni nene vise' o'mo noune li ingine lani'. Ne'mine likevo Izesu' ti' lo lo-ngimine': A'mine ve ma nene nouve. Ido' a'mine Izesu'ni biluvaliti a'ningu' molave nene engikisi a'mida ote minine' ve.
Ido' Izesu' aza a'mine ve ma nene nouve nolivo analo' dalisa ave nene mehe'nidati' nene lomi limi misubolo' pou' li ingani' ve.
Ne'mine ikevo zahinemu' vise' i'mi nave lo gohi longo' o-ngedavo laza Nasalete ve Izesu'ni mamu' vise' o'mo noune li lani' ve.

Ne'mine likevo Izesu' a'mido' ti' lo line' ve: A'mine vise' i'mi nave ma nene nouve lo lo-lingimuvoni' ma ve. A'mine vise' i'mi nave ma nene nouvonaze. Lingine vekisine menesi nene a'nido' dami ha huli-ngidikevo vilizave.
Ne'mine lo line' nene gomu' melehinemu' nene gaza nemaine' evene' hamokisi ma vo tolovo amive lo line' gamazi ma nene gihile izelive losa nene line' ve.

Ne'mine lavo Simoni Petolo' ne'mo nene bainati mite' do minine' nenako a'mine nene go'veuti' gelelehe' oko eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti ve nabali'mi gelekele' ve belo gala zamela nene hasa' o huline' ve. A'mine gelekele' ve ne'mi gulive nene Malakusi' ve.

Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' aza Petolo'ni nene ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza nene me'neho geheline losa nimine' geni ekese' noso ne'mine nene geheloni' o neine' ma nene gelamabe. Gaza aka hize tile-nedamo a'mine bainati miteka nene go'veu' go'zekezo.
Ne'mine lavo amisi ido' engi' guve'inesi ve naba nesi ido' Zuda veti pilisi vesi nene Izesu'ni analo' di nala' di-disa
a'mine kilisimasiu' nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti ve naba'ine minive Kaiaha' izemo Anasi' neida nene gomu' ele'mizi vani' ve.
A'mine Kaiaha' nene Zuda ve naba ga'ine do evene' mukito' medelo ve hamokovo' heleline' nene lamine' o neive live minine' ve.

Simoni Petolo' nene Izesu' izipahala masi Izesu'ni e'meti vasine' ve. A'mine Izesu' izipahala ma neve nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti ve naba ne'mosi nene mo ninge neive minine' nenako Izesu'ni ele'mizi a'mine eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti ve naba'mi numuno vodo vodo ogo minavo oluso' omo' naba miningu' dizangu' nene azasi a'mingu' dizine' ve.

Dizine'za Petolo' nene dizamo heta gatedo' ha ote minine' ve. Nemu' nene a'mine Izesu' izipahala ma ve naba ne'mosi ninge neive minive nene lemo gatedo' gizebo ogo minine' gelekele' alu ma nene Petolo'nimu' lo-emosa ele'mizo dizine' ve.

Ne'mine ogavo gatedo' gizebo ogo minine' alu ne'mo nene Petolo'ni ti' lo longo' o-dine': Geikisi nene a'mine Izesu' izipahala zuhouti' nomo nolosane. Olo. Ne'mine lo longo' o-davo aza nene o'ove. Engikuti' nomuve line' ve.

Ido' a'mine gamenelo' nene mo hepe' noilivo gelekele' vesi ido' pilisi vesi nene olo' si'nibulo' nene ingi vite' iki lahizi minani' ve. Ne'mine igi nizavo Petolo' nesi nene a'mida ote mino lahizo minine' ve.
Ido' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti ve naba'ine Anasi' ne'mo Izesu'ni nene izipahala zuhomukisi ido' evene' gamazi apize ngemaa' ine' nemukisi nene longo' o-davo

Izesu' a'mido' ti' lo lo-imine': Naza evene' mukiliti ve'nido' nene gamazi sotokovo' laa' uvoni' ma ve. Ee, Zuda ve muki' di gese' iga' ada mono' numuno ngomo ngomoukisi mono' numuno naba' nabaukisi nene gamazi apize ngemaa' uvoni' ma ve. Ido' haleke mino gamazi ma losa'muvoni' ma ve.
Neni' neve nene nanitekumu' longo' noo-nedane. Gamazi noluvo gilave nete a'mine luvoni' gamazi nene gili nizani' nenaze. Engi' nene longo' o-ngedevo.

Ne'mine lavo a'mida pilisi ve minanguti' mali'mo nene ana gavoso golo veleu' belo ti' lo line': Gaza eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti ve nabamu' nene ne'mine gamazi lo-emamilinako nanimu' ne'mine lo-emane.

Ne'mine lavo a'mido' nene Izesu' ti' lo lo-dine': Naza gamazi goloso ma luvoni' neivo ma nene a'mine gamazi goloso ne'mi monovo nene lo soto' ozo. Ido' naza nene mo laminetokovo' noluvoni' noline' nene gaza hazamu' nanimu' nonebelane.
Ne'mine lavo nala' di-dikani' ha neivo Anasi' nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti ve naba Kaiaha' neida ele'mizi vilo lo a'mida ngimiseline' ve.

Ido' Petolo' nene olo' lahizo neivo ti' li longo' i-dani': Geikisi nene a'mine ve'mi izipahala zuhouti' nomo nolosane. Olo. Ne'mine likevo aza nene a'mido' o'ove. Naza nene engikuti' nomuve lo ataize line' ve.

Ne'mine lavo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti ve nabali'mi gelekele' ve Petolo' gala huko hulive'mi zuho minive mali'mo nene ti' lo line' ve: Gaza nene Oliva golo za zuhou' Izesulesi nizavo ninguve ma ne nane. Olo.
Ne'mine lavo Petolo' gohi ataize line'. Lavo a'mido' lite' lo okoloho nolo molani' ve.

Ne'mine ogavo Zuda ve nete nedenga' holuka' nene Kaiaha' numu'veuti' nene Izesu'ni ele'mizi Loma ve Zudaia misubou' ngamani naba lolo' o minive'mi numu'vela nene vani' ve. Ne'mine ani'za laza avotemote Aigita misubou' minani' gameneu' O'moso'mo ise'ine izingumu' gelo mino naa' noso' nite' nene aize' nalosunako heta ato' veti numungu' dizekunivo a'mine velati' inite' goloso ne'mo okodelo' dizavo ne'mo a'mine noso' nite' nalonido' lisihe' amo minalone li a'mine numungu' nene mo dizamani' ve.
Ne'mine igi dizami nizavo ngamani naba Pilato' nene heta lemo ogo ti' lo longo' o-ngidine': Ve meve nene nani monovo goloso ingumu' gonito' ele'mizi nave.
Ne'mine lavo ingine ti' li li-imani' ve: Aza nene monovo goloso daa' ive minamidiniko laza nene gei' nanida ma ele'mizo amunidine.

Ne'mine likevo Pilato' aza ti' lo line' ve: Langisetine nene ele'mizi vi lengi' lou' gamazitine'mo lido' e'metisa goni' i-di lihime imilo. Ne'mine lavo Zuda ve ingine ti' li lani': Ne neiha leli' lou' gamazite'mo lido' nene mo bele helelonido' lisihe' o neiha Loma ve lingine evene' lihime ngimi ngibili hilaa' nene leli' Loma vevo' ne'mine olosune li mo o'ove li-lidi nizani' ma neive li lani'.
A'ne'mine lani' nene Izesu' aza Loma vetevo' ngibili hilaa' ani' monovolo' e'metisa bili hililizangumu' gomu' lo soto' ine' gamazi di gihile izisa lani' ve.
Ne'mine likevo Pilato' nene gohi ngamani numuno nabauko dizo vo Izesu'ni vise lo-do ti' lo longo' o-dine': Gaza nene Zuda veti guve'inesi naba ma nene nabe.
Ne'mine lavo Izesu' a'mido' ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza ne'mine nolaine' nene gasika gakauti' gelo nolabe ido' evene' malite nene nenikumu' li-gimikevosa nolane.

Ne'mine lavo a'mido' nene Pilato' ti' lo lo-imine': Naza nene Zuda ve nouhe. Zuda ve nomuvoni' nenako gei' monovoka nado gelelove. Gei' zuholitesi ido' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba netesi nene gonito' gele'mizi neni' nouvoda nani' nenako gaza nene nani monovo goloso ane.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo line': Guve'nesi ve nouvoni' nene me misubo'mi monovolo' do molosa guve'nesi ve minamuve. Naza me misubou' monovolo' do molo guve'nesi ve minuvodiniko neze gelekele' i-nidaa' ave ingine neni' nene Zuda veti a'ningu' vamilive li alete mili-nidi lovo di soto' adine. Ne'mine adine'za guve'nesi ve nouvoni' nene melo' monovolo' do molosa nomive.

Ne'mine lavo Pilato' aza ti' lo line': Ne'mine laine' nene gaza mo guvekasi ve nouve nolabe. Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo line': Gaza nenikumu' nene guvekasi ve lo gasi nene nolane. Naza nene nemu' me misubou' soto' ogo nouvoni' ve. Naza gamazi gihilemu' lo soto' soto' ogo hize ele' olosa nene me misubou' soto' ogo nouvoni' ve. Gamazi gihilelo' medeli minave muki' nene neni' gamazi'nelo' nene gili daa' nave.
Ne'mine lavo Pilato' aza ti' lo line': Gamazi gihile nene nado nolive. Nemu' nene gelamolosune.
Ne'mine lo Pilato' aza gohi Zuda ve nizada heta lemo vo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ei' nene goni' o-deloni' monovo've nene vise' ogo ningamuve.

Ido' neni' monovo nene ne'mino ma neine' ma neive. O'moso'mo avotingine ise'ine izingumu' gili noso' nite' naa' ani' gamenelo' gamenelo' nene lengi' muludine do lamine' o-lengedo nalato' ve hamo' kuluhize-lengedaa' nouvoni' ma neive. Nemu' nene lingine gilavo naza Zuda veti guvetinesi ve naba nene kuluhize-lengedelohe.
Ne'mine lavo ingine gohi geke' li ti' li lani' ve: Ve neve nene kuluhize-damo Balabasi'ni nene kuluhize-dezo. A'mine Balabasi' nene ngamani lovo o ngemaa' ive minine' ve.
Ido' neloti' nene Pilato' aza lavo Izesu'ni nene nala' gavosodunu' mehenela soga' saga' izi bilani' ve.

Ne'mine igi amilite uhoni nala' nene di gangi guve'inesi ve nabalite gihaa' ani' inite' ne'mine apa nite' igi lili' igi godololo' gihi-di gulehe' lavolavo guve'inesi vete ngilaa' ani' ne'mine nene di ngili-dani' ve.
Ne'mine igi mini ezela ika' ika' igi Zuda veti guve'inesi ve naba ma nene gopo'ni nolo-gidune lika' lika' igi a'ine gatapa' gavoso bilika' bilika' igi minani'.
Ido' Pilato' nene gohi heta lemo ogo Zuda ve ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Ningilo. Naza goni' o-deloni' monovo've nene vise' ogo mo ningamuvongumu' nene ningilizave losa lengi' vetida ele'mizo nolimuve.
Ne'mine lavo Izesu' nene uhoni di gangani' nene godololo' geho ido' gulehe' lavolavo nene ngoloko heta lemo ani' ve. Nolimivo Pilato' ti' lo line': A'mine ve ma nene me neize. Ningilo.

Ne'mine nolivo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveti ve naba'ine netesi ido' Zuda veti pilisi ve netesi Izesu'ni niningi geke' li lohoto' zalo' belezo belezo lani' ve. Likevo Pilato' aza a'mido' ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Ne'mine lii ma naza neve nene eze goni' o-do lihime emeloni' monovo've nene vise' ogo ma ningamuze. Neni' nene ne'mine amolosuze. Langisetine di vi lohoto' zalo' bililo.

Ne'mine lavo Zuda ve nete ti' li li-imani': Lelita lou' gamazi nene mo ma neine' ma neive. Aza nene O'moso'mi gipele nouve lo a'mine lou' gamazi nene avuto' ine' nenako a'mine lou' ne'mo lido' e'meto mo helelido' lisihe' o neive.
O'moso'mi gipele nouve lo Izesu' line' gamazi li soto' ani' nene Pilato' gelo ehelele izine' nene gohi naba goloso ehelele izavo
ngamani numunguko nene gohi dizo Izesu'ni ti' lo longo' o-dine' ve: Gaza nene zalati' aine' neve. Ne'mine line'za Izesu' a'mido' gamazi hamokisi ma lo-emamine' ve.

Ne'mine ogavo Pilato' nene ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Gaza nene gamazi neni' lo-nemelesa gelamaniko neni' gehepeve nene kuluhize-gedeloni' amuzosi ido' lohoto' zalo' gebeleloni' amuzosi do nouvongumu' nene gelamabe.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' nene a'mido' ti' lo line' ve: A'mine amuzoka nene vozeu' ve'mo ma gemamidiniko gaza nene inite' hamokisi o-nedeline' amuzoka nene mo keke' geita ma minamidine. Ne'mine o neine' nenako gei' angau' molo-nidive neve nene gei' lihime idise nodaine' nene ivile' ivosa lihime naba nodave.

Ne'mine lidoti' nene Pilato' aza Izesu'ni kuluhize-delesa aka vise' o'mo vine'za Zuda ve ingine geke' geke' li ti' li li minani' ve: Gaza ve mene ma kuluhize-deline' nene ve ma ingine guve'inesi ve lolo' ilisa ave nene Kaesale' mo'mosi've dalisa biluva' i-daa' nani' nenako gei' nene Kaesale'ni hize ele' i-daa' aveti zuhouti' nomo nolosane.

Ne'mine lani' nene gelo nemu' Pilato' aza Izesu'ni ele'mizo heta lemo ogo ebe' ma gulive Geheni Omo' ido' gulive gohi Zuda veti gamaziuti' nene nGabata ve laa' ada zasilite minaa' ani' mo'mosito' nene mito' minine' ve.

Ne'mino lemo mito' minine' nene avo'ninge Aigita misubou' minani' gameneu' O'moso'mo ise'ine izingumu' nene Zuda ve nete gili noso' nite' nalizangumu' di va'va' ilizani' gamene holise' beloto' mito' minine' ve. Ne'mino mito' minosa Zuda ve ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Ningilo. Guvetinesi ve ma nene me neive.

Ne'mine line'za ingine geke' li ti' li lani' ve: Osu' lo-dezo. Lohoto' zalo' belezo. Likevo Pilato' a'mido' ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Guvetinesi ve meve nene lohoto' zalo' mo belezo nili-nidahe. Ne'mine lavo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti ve naba'ine nete a'mido' ti' li li-imani' ve: Leli' guvetesi ve nene gohi ma nomine'. Asi Kaesale' ei' hamokovo' nene neive.
Ne'mine likevosa Pilato' aza Izesu'ni lohoto' zalo' bililizave lo do ngimine' ve.
Ne'mine ogo do ngemavo di vani' ve.
Di vada nene Izesu' asi've ei' lohoto' za've geho numuno ebekuti' leme heta ogo vo ebe' ma gulive Godolo Amuzo Ebe' ado' Zuda veti gamaziuti' nene Goligota ve laa' ado' nene hetelavo
a'mida nene lohoto' zalo' bili di otani' ve. Ido' Izesu' oluso' minavo a'mida hela hela nene ve sitakisi lohoto' zalo' ma ngibili di oti-ngidani' ve.
Ido' Pilato' ne'mo nene gamazisi ma luhuvo gizavo Izesu' lohoto' za'velo' nene badikani' ve. A'mine luhuvo nene ti' lo minine' ve: Ve meve nene Nasalete ve Izesu' ve. Zuda veti guve'inesi ve.

Izesu'ni bilani' ebe' nene numuno ebe' nabali'mi avito' ne'mine minine' nenako Zuda ve muki' a'mine luhuvo nene gatani' ve. A'mine luhuvo nene Zuda veti gamaziutikisi Loma veti gamaziutikisi ido' nGiliki veti gamaziutikisi minine' ve.

Ne'mine ogavo ningisa Zuda velo' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti ve naba'ine nete nene Pilato'ni ti' li li-dani' ve: Meve nene Zuda veti guve'inesi ve naba ve lo gizamo asi meve ne'mo nene Zuda veti guve'inesi ve nouve live lo gizezo.
Ne'mine likevo Pilato' aza a'mido' ti' lo line' ve: Naza luhuvo gize nouvoni' nene mo gizosa gize nouve.

Ido' Izesu'ni nene mo lohoto' zalo' bili badisa ami nene sita've sita've minani' nenako Izesu' genegana've nene ize' sita've sita've mili ize' hamo hamo dika' dika' ani' ve. Ne'mine ani'za lulou' ngolaa' ine' inite've nene olusoku' no'novo've nomine' mo veletati' gala'muda home limivosa lolo' ani' minine' ve.

Ne'mine ikeni' neivo ami nete angise'ine ti' li li volelo' melo' ani' ve: Laza a'mine mene hikelo damolone. Asi a'mine inite' mene zahida minelihe do soto' oloningumu' nene geheni ngomo ngomo hulaa' zohi' ogo livile' ilive nene emelone. Ido' ne'mine ani' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' gamazi ma nene gihile izelive lisa ne'mine ani' ve:
Neni' genegana'ne nene angise'ine ize' mili dave.
Ido' oko'nelo' inite' nene zaho dalihe li geheni zohi' ave.
Ee, ami nene gilamisa ne'mine ani' ve.
Ido' Izesu'ni bili badikani' lohoto' za avita nene izelehosi ido' izelehi alunolosi Kelopasi' elenaho Maliakisi ido' Mangadala numudoti' vene' Maliakisi nene oti minani' ve.
Nizavo Izesu' aza a'mida nene izelehosi ido' izipahala zuhouti' vonolo' izipesi oti nizasivo ningo izelihinemu' nene ti' lo line': Alungoo, nesee ve nene gei' gipa nene lolo' o neive.

Ne'mine lo a'mine izipahala zuhouti' minive mamu' nene ti' lo line': Ningezo. Meve nene gei' izaho lolo' ogave. Ne'mine lo line' gameneloti' nene a'mine Izesu' izipahala zuhouti' minive ne'mo Malia'ni nene ei' numu'veuko do molo gizebo o-dine' ve.
Neloti' nene Izesu' aza ilido' o minine' inite' muki' nene mo ogo osu' gehepeve lokuve lo gelo mono' godolou' gamazi ma gizikani' ma nene do gihile izelesa nosomu' nonisive line' ve.

Ne'mine lavo a'mida gomise ma minine' a'mingu' vaini noso ekese' ine' nene vai' lo neivo nosou' lupizisa lipi naa' ani' inite' ma disa lupizikevo vai' lo neivo hisopu ve laa' ani' gavosolo' hizi di dizi velelo' mili-dani' ve.
Mili-dikevo a'mine vaini noso nene noosa Izesu' ti' lo line' ve: Gono'ne nene mo do pelekuve. Ne'mine losa luvono nene vage lavo sikalahu've hulosa hiline' ve.

A'mine gamenelo' sigisi kilokuloti' holise' minilizangumu' di va'va' iga' ani' gamene neivo ido' a'mine holise' nene holise' naba goloso neine' nenako Zuda ve nete a'mine holiseku' nene a'mine ngibilave lohoto' zalo' ha minikelizave li Pilato' lavo gize'ine amuzo di ledisa lohoto' zaloti' apasi di mili-ngidilizave li ezela lani' ve.
Ne'mine likevo Pilato' aza gele ngemo a'mine ami nene lo-ngedavo igi Izesukisi maka' ngibilave ma ma nene gizene amuzo bili ledi ma nesi a'mine'mine i-dani'za
Izesudo' igi ningani' nene mo helani' neivo ningi gizene ma izi ledamani' ve.
Izi ledamani'za asi ami engikuti' mali'mo nene gohodunu' Izesu' losono gahevela nene hizo ngolosavo a'minguti' nene vanisesi nososi nene lite' losa limine' ve.

A'mine inite' soto' neivo ningive ne'mo nene mo mene lo soto' neive. Ne'mine neine' nenako a'mine nene mo lamineto' neive. Ido' a'mine ve ne'mo nene aza lamineto' noline' nene mo gele minosa linginesi a'minemu' gilisa Izesu'nimu' gili ele'vole' ilizave losa nolive.
Ido' inite' mene soto' ine' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizikani' gamazi ma nene gihile izelive losa soto' ine' ve:
Amuzo've hamokisi ma di ledamilisave.
Ido' mono' godolou' gamazi gohi ma ti' lo neine' mesi ve:
Oko'nou' hizavelo' nene ve'ine huli ningi minilisave.

Ne'mine ogavo neloti' nene Alimataia numudoti' ve Zosehe' nene Izesu'ni e'metaa' ive minine'za Zuda vemu' golise gelo suno' e'metaa' ive ne'mo nene Izesu' oko'no dalove lo Pilato'ni a'minemu' nene longo' o-davo gele emavo ogo a'mine Izesu' oko'no nene do vine' ve.

Ido' gomu' Izesu' velesi ha neivo gamene ma holuka' ezela vo hetelive Nikodemo' nene za setalitisi novozo unuvo lamine' oga' ine' do gopo ine' geni've teoti fo (34) kilo (75 pauni) ne'mine nene davo Zosehekisi vasine' ve.
Ve sita' ingine vi a'mine unuvo initekisi nene a'mingu' milisa oko'nolo' nene banisi ne'minedunu' nene asabu' izi-dasine' ve. Ne'mine asine' nene Zuda vete iga' ani' monovolo' e'metisa asine' ve.
Ido' a'mine Izesu'ni lohoto' zalo' biladaa nene za zuho ma miningu' nene evene' hamokisi ma mili-ngidamani' gonoso galese nene ma minine' ve.

Miningu' nene holisekumu' di va'va' iga' ani' gamene nene mo oku' losa holise' minilizani' gamene sigisi kiloku nene olosa mo alite neivo gonoso galese avito' miningumu' Izesu'ni nene a'mingu' mili-dani' ve.

Holise' gamene osu' lavo Sadeu' nedenga' holuka' olihe go' lalosa neivo Mangadala numudoti' vene' Malia' aza gonoso galesela vo ningine' nene gonoso galese veleloti' geheni nene di hulikeni' neivo ningine' ve.

Ne'mine ogo tine' molo loti' izo ogo Simoni Petolo' ve ido' Izesu' izipahala zuhouti' vonolo' ve minive engi' sita' nizasido' ogo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Guvelesi ve nene gonoso galeseuti' di vikeni' neine'za di vi mili-dani' ebekumu' nene ma ningo gelamune.
Ne'mine lavo Petolokisi ido' Izesu' izipahala ma nesi gonoso galesela vilisa di aka milasine' ve.
Ne'mine igi setato' nene loti' izi vasine'za Izesu' izipahala ma ne'mo nene amuzo molo loti' izo Petolo'ni ivile' ogo gonoso galesela gomu' vo heteline' ve.
Gomu' vo hetelo gubi' izo gava hizo gonoso galese lulou' ningine' nene Izesu' oko'nolo' asabu' izani' banisi nene a'mingu' haza neivo ningine'za lulou' nene ma dizamine' ve.
Dizamo neivo e'meto ave Simoni Petolo' nesi ogo hetelo ei' neve nene mo gonoso galese lulou' hozi dizo ningine' nene banisi nene a'mingu' haza neivo ningo
ido' godololo' asabu' izi-dani' lavolavo nene banisi minida minamo asi lisihe' ogo gangosa abazata minine' ve.
Ne'mine o neivo Izesu' izipahala gonoso galesela gomu' ave masi nene a'mingu' dizo ningosa Izesu' mo otave lo gele ele'vole' ine' ve.

Ingine gonoso galeseu' dizi ningisa gili ele'vole' asine' nene mono' godolou' O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live hilinguti' otelido' o neive li gizikani' gamazi ma nene olihe gili guni amasidi'mo nene ve'inetunu' ningasidoti' gili ele'vole' asine' ve.
Ne'mine igisa gohi tine' mili numu'nida vasine' ve.
Numu'nida vikesivo Malia' nene gonoso galese heta nene ha ote mino ive ogo minine' ve. Ive ogo mino gubi' izo gava hizo gonoso galese lulou' ningine' nene

angelo' sita' genegana'ine mokono' ngilikasine' nene Izesu' oko'no gomu' minine' malo' mito' minasine' nene ma ne'mo godolo minida minivo ma ne'mo nene gizene minida minivo minasine' nene ningine' ve.

Ne'mine ogavo ingine ti' li longo' i-dasine': Alungoo, gaza nene nanitekumu' ive ogo nane. Ne'mine likesivo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Guve'nesi ve nene di vikeni' neiha di vi mili-dani' ebekumu' nene ma ningo gelamuve.
Ne'mine losa mehenela velepe' izo Izesu' a'mida ote neivo ningine'za Izesu' ve lo ningo gelamine' ve.

Ne'mino neivo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Alungoo, nanitekumu' ive ogo nane. Gaza zahinemu' vise' nane. Ne'mine lavo Malia' aza ve mene za zuho me'mi gizebo ve'mo nololoseive lo gelo ti' lo lo-imine': Ve meloo, ei' nene gei' do vaine' neivo ma nene gaza molo-de noline' ebekumu' lo-nemanivo naza nene vo do volosuve.
Ne'mine lavo Izesu' aza Maliazo lavo velepe' izo vonu' belo Zuda veti gamaziuti' ti' lo lo-imine' ve. Labouni, leli' gamaziuti' nene Tisazo line' ve.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' nene vene' aza oko'nolo' do gelalive lo ti' lo lo-imine': Naza nene me'neho neida olihe dizo vamuze. Oko'nelo' do gelamozo. Asi neze zuho nizada voosa nene ti' lo lo-ngemezo: Neni' ma nene neni' me'nehosi lengi' metibosi minive ido' neni' O'moso'nesi ido' lengi' O'mosotinesi minive neida nene dizo novive lozo.
Ne'mine lo-davo Malia' aza Izesu' izipahala zuho nizada vosa Guvelesi ve nene mo ningekuve lo a'mine Izesu' lo-imine' gamazi nene lo-ngimine' ve.

A'mine gamene Sadeu' nivenga' nene izipahala zuho ingine Zuda veti golise gilisa ingine minani' numuno nene akahe muki' gizi gili' lisa minangu' nene Izesu' aza ogo vovo'ningu' ote mino ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lengi' muludingu' nene lamine' hongu lo minivo.
Ne'mine lo anau' nili bilani' nesi ido' losonou' hizani' nesi nene ngelebizine' ve. Ne'mine ogavo izipahala zuho ingine a'mine Guvelesi ve ningani' nemu' nene ngolize naba goloso izani' ve.
Ne'mine navo gohi ti' lo lo-ngimine': Muludingu' nene lamine' hongu lo minivo. Me'neho neze nimiseline' ne'mino lingine nene naza nolingimiseluve.
Ne'mine losa vele mu'nive hubu lo-ngedo ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: O'moso'mi Sikalahu' mene dalo.

Lingine evene' maliti lihime'ine nene ma di huli-ngidilizani' nene mo a'mine lihime'ine nene gohi minamivo minilisave. Ido' evene' maliti lihime'ine nene lingine ma di huli-ngidamilizani' nene a'mine lihime'inesi ha minilisave.
Ido' Izesu' engita ani' gamenelo' nene izipahala zuho tuvelu engikuti' lobe' izipe ve li-daa' ave Tomasi' nene a'mingu' minamine' ve.

Minamine' nenako Izesu' izipahala linge nete Guvelesi ve ma nene mo ningekune li li-imani'za aza ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: A'mine lani' gamazi nene ma gele ele'vole' amolosuve. Asi ve'nedunu' anau' nili'mo hulo molo-dine' nene ningo a'mingu' nene a'ne do gelo ido' losonouko nesi nene a'ne molo geleloni' nene mo gele ele'vole' olosuve.

Ido' gamene eiti (8) ne'mine ogo vavo Izesu' izipahala zuho nene gohi a'mine numungu' nene akahe vai' gizi gili' li minangu' nene Tomasikisi a'mingu' neivo Izesu' nene gohi ogo vovo'ningu' ote mino ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Muludingu' nene lamine' hongu lo minivo.

Ne'mine loosa Tomasi'ni nene ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Gaza a'ne mene ningezo. Anga do ogo a'neu' hu'ne mene hizo gelo loso'nela hu'neukisi nene anga molo gele' nazo. Gaza gele ele'vole' amaine' nene hulo gele ele'vole' ozo.
Ne'mine lavo a'mido' Tomasi' ti' lo Izesu'ni lo-dine' ve: Agae, Guve'nesi ve, O'moso'ne gehepeve ve.

Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Gaza gele ele'vole' naine' nene oko'nelo' ningosa gele ele'vole' nabe. Evene' ma ingine neze oko'nelo' ningamisa gili ele'vole' i nilizave nene mo O'moso'mo do lamine' o-ngedeli akalo' mini mili minilisave.
Ido' izipahala zuhoti ve'nido' nene Izesu' aza eze monovo ngelebizo ato ato' suno vai' do soto' ine'za linge muki' nene me bukuu' ma gizamuve.

Linge ma gize nouvoni' neve nene Izesu' nene O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live O'moso'mi gipele ma nene neive li gili ele'vole' ilizave losa gizuvoni' ve. Ido' lingine a'mido' gili ele'vole' ilizani' nene lingine minevo' minevo' lengemeni dameni nene eitati' dalizave losa gizuvoni' ve.
Neloti' alinge' nene Izesu' aza Tibelia noso ohuno gahevela nene izipahala zuhola gohi soto' o ngimine' nene ne'mino soto' o ngimine' ve.

Ado' Simoni Petolo' ve, lobe' izipe ve laa' ave Tomasi' ve, nGalilaia misubou' numuno ebe' ma gulive Kana numudoti' ve Nataniele' neeve ido' Zebedaio' gipele sita' neeve ido' izipahala zuhouti' ve gohi ma seta' nesi nene makato' minani' ve.

Minadoti' nene Simoni Petolo' nene ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Naza nene alahato' nosou' novuve. Ne'mine lavo ingine ti' li li-imani': Lazasi nene geikisi makato' volone. Ne'mine likevo vaito' vi sipiu' dizi alahato' vani'za a'mine holuka' nene alaha' hamokisi ma damani' ve.
Ne'mine ani'za nedenga' holukati' ho' olihe nodizivo Izesu' nene noso gahevela ote minine'za izipahala zuho ingine nene Izesu' neive li ningi gilamani' ve.
Ne'mine ani'za Izesu' nene ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Vekizo, lingine nene alaha' hamokisi ma dami nilisave. Ne'mine lavo ingine nene ee, mo ma damune li lani' ve.

Ne'mine likevo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Alaha' mo ma dalisaze. Alaha' daa' golalezetine nene huli hela zamela ilo. Ne'mine lavo hulisa ingine gelelehe' ani'za a'mingu' nene alaha' vai' goloso likevo ngeli gelelehe' amani' ve.

Ne'mine ikevo Izesu' vonolo' izipahala ne'mo Petolo'ni ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Meve nene Guvelesi ve ma nene neive. Guvelesi ve ma nene neive line' nene Simoni Petolo' aza gelosa aza nene oko'nolo' inite' do huloko minine' nenako lite' lo oko'nolo' inite' do izo nosou' oluto izosa vine' ve.
Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' izipahala zuho linge nene noso gaheveloti' nene naedi (90) mitas (300 fiti) ne'mido' avito' minani' nenako a'mine alaha' golaleze'inesi sipiu' gelelehe' i di noso gahevela ani'.
Ne'mine igi sipiuti' limi hazala igi ningani' nene sinibotunu' gizikani' olo' ma lo minido' nene alahakisi beletisi neivo ningani' ve.
Ne'mine ikevo Izesu' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine idise dani' alahakuti' nene ma dalo.

Ne'mine lavo Simoni Petolo' aza sipiu' dizo golaleze' nene gelelehe' ogo noso gahevela do ani' ve. A'mine golaleze' nene alaha' naba vai' goloso vanu hadeti fifti tili (153) ne'mine minani' ve. Ido' ne'mini alaha' vai' lani'za a'mine golaleze' nene hukamine' ve.

Ne'mine ogavo Izesu' ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: Noso' nite' mene nalonge. Alo. Ne'mine line'za ingine nene Guvelesi ve ve li gili mini ingine muki' nene zaho nane li longo' i-dilisa ngovozo ogavo engikuti' hamoli'mosi ne'mine lo longo' ma o-damine' ve.
Ne'mine igi nizavo Izesu' aza ogo beleti do ngemo a'mine'mine ogo alahakisi nene do ngimine' ve.
Ido' Izesu' hilinguti' otidoti' nene ha soto' o ngemeka' ngemeka' ine'za idise mene soto' o-ngimine' ne'mo nene gamene setohamo neive.
Noso' nite' ni osu' likevo Izesu' aza Simoni Petolo'ni nene ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Zohane' gipele Simonizo,

Ne'mine lo gohi ti' lo lo-dine' ve: Zohane' gipele Simonizo, gaza nene mo luka neme lamine' o nabe. Ne'mine lavo Petolo' ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Ee, Guvekasi ve, naza lu'ne geme nouvoni' nene mo gasi gele nane. Ne'mine lavo ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Sipisipi ize'nelo' nene gizebo lamine' ozo.

Ido' gohi gamene sitohamo' ivo ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Zohane' gipele Simonizo, gaza nene mo luka neme nabe. Ne'mine lo luka neme nabe neme nabe gamene sitohamo' line' nemu' nene geni belavo ti' lo line' ve: Guvekasi ve, gaza nene inite' mukikumu' nene ha gelaa' naine' nenako naza lu'ne geme nouvoni' nemu' nene ha gele nane. Lavo aza ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Sipisipi ize'nelo' nene noso' nite' ngemo gizebo ozo.

Naza lamineto' ti' lo nolo-gimuve: Gaza goso'velo' minanido' nene gopokalo' leti nene gasika do izosa volosa gaka gelaine' ebeta nene ha vaa' aine' ve. Ne'mine oga' aine'za ozoho molanido' nene anga nene do hozi lo do patelanivo gopokalo' nene leti ne'mini nala' di-gidi volosa gelamiline' ebeta nene gele'mizi vilisave.
Ido' Izesu' aza ne'mine line' nene Petolo' O'moso'mi gulive do hozi losa heleline' monovo nene do soto' ogosa line' ve. Ido' ne'mine losa ne'meto minezo lo lo-dine' ve.

Ne'mine lavo Petolo' mine velepe' izo ningine' nene Izesu' vonolo' izipe minive Izesu'ni dalizani' gamene avito' ogavo noso' nite' nani' gameneu' Izesuda mine lehete ogo gei' nene biluvaliti a'ningu' zaho do ngemelive lo longo' o-dive nene nge'meto navo ningine' ve.
A'mine ve ningo Petolo' aza Izesu'ni ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Guvekasi ve, vole ve nene nanite' soto' o-delive.
Ne'mine lavo Izesu' ti' lo lo-imine' ve: Naza ei' nene velesi ha neivo tine' molo alove loloni' nene ha lolosuha gei' gonoka neivosa longo' o-nedabe. Ne'meto minezo.

Ido' Izesu' nene ha ne'mine line' nenako a'minemu' nene gamazi ma ti' lo hutile' ogo vine' ve: A'mine Izesu' izipahala nene mo helamoloseive. Gamazi ne'mine lo vine'za Izesu' nene helamoloseive livoba asi ei' nene velesi ha neivo alove loloni' nene ha lolosuve line' ma neive.

A'mine Izesu' izipahala zuhouti' minive meve nene a'mine initekumu' mene lo soto' soto' ogo luhuvo gizive nene neive. Ido' laza nene a'mine ei' lo soto' soto' ine' gamazi nene mo lamineto' neive lo gele none' ma neive.

Ido' Izesu' nene inite' ato ato' muki' nesi nene ha ogo molo ine'za a'mine inite' muki' nene luhuvo ma gizi miladiniko a'mine gizani' buku nene me misubou' molalone' ebe' nene vovosi minamivo ma vo damidine losa gele nouve. Moda a'nesi' ve.

O Teohilo', Naza luhuvo nite' lingela ma gomu' gize-giduhe. A'mine luhuvo niteku' nene Izesu' api' ogo gono do minine' ne'mi gamazisi ido' evene' apize ngimine' gamazi nesi nene gize osu' luvoni' ma neive. Ido' a'mine gamazi nogizo Izesu' aza gono do evene' apize ngeme'mo dizosa do kegese-ngidive aposolo gono dalizani' gamazi nene O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo lido' lo-ngemavo O'moso'mo Izesu'ni Okulumoku' ele'mizo dizine' nene gizosa gamazi gohi ma gizamo luhuvo nite' nene hulo-giduvoni' ma ve.

Ee, lohoto' zalo' bili badikevo mulumo gelo helo oto velesi mino aposolo soto' o ngimine' ve. Neze ha neive li gilikevo gihile izeleseive lo ele'vole' nite' muki' nene ogo ngelebizo neivo gamene foti novivo eze ningika' ningika' navo ezesi gamazi li volelo' melo' igi lani' ve. Ido' aza nene O'moso'mo gizebo o-ledeline' gamazi lo-ngimine' ve.
Ne'mine ogo engikisi mino ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine Zelusalemi numuno ebe' mene hulamilo. Me'neho Sikalahu've imiselelove lingumu' lo-lingimuvoni' mamu' nene gizebo igi minilo.
Zohane' aza evene' noso holo-ngedavo ingine haza nosovo' dani'za lingine gamene ha'na ogo vamivo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' neve nene dalisave lo lo-ngimine' ve.

Gamene ma izipahala zuhosi di gese' igi mini Izesu'ni ti' li longo' i-dani': Guvekasi ve make, guve'inesi ve nabalite avotemotine gizebo i-ngidi minaa' ani' ma'mine ogo gaza Guvetesi ve naba lolo' ogo leze Isilaele' ve gizebo o-ledeline' gamene nene idise nehe. Olo.

Ne'mine li likevo Izesu' aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Naza olihe ne'mine amuvo gamene ma ogo viline' nene nehe ido' gomu' soto' iline' inite' nene nehe neve nene lengi' initetine ne nominako lingine ma gilamilisave. Nanitekumu' ve. Me'neho asi've amuzo'velo' molo gelo mino lo hukine' nemu' ve.

Ne neine'za O'moso'mi Sikalahu' lengita lemo amuzo molo lengemavo neni' gamazi'ne nene Zelusalemi numudoti' api' igi li Zudaia misuboukosi Samalia misuboukosi vi li soto' ikevo misubo lumolasi vo osu' lilive.
Ti' lo lo-ngemavo ingine vonu' bili nizavo Okulumokuko dizo volosa nodizivo limuso'mo molo hite-davo vo halekavo ma ningamani' ve.
Okulumoku' vo halekavo ingine okene' igi ningi nizavo ve seta' genegana'ine mokonokisi lite' mate' li vovo'ningu' soto' asine' ve.

Soto' igi ti' li li-ngimasine': nGalilaia ve lingine nanimu' okene' igi ningi nizave. Izesutine lengikisi minidoti' O'moso'mo Okulumokuko ele'mizo dizive nene ningi nizavo dizine' ne'mine ogo lemo aloseive li li-ngimasine'.
Ne'mine ikesivo aposolo nene Oliva gololoti' tibizi aka alite minida vi Zelusalemi numuda hetelani'.

Heteli numuno mulolo' ma minine' numungu' ingi minaa' ani' numungu' nene dizi minani'. Engi' gulive'ine nene Petolo' ve Zohane' ve Zakobo' ve Adelea' ve Hilipo' ve Tomasi' ve Batolomaio' ve Mataio' ve ido' Alahaio' gipele Zakobo' ve ido' Simoni aza Loma ve ngimiselelone lo amuzonga laa' ive neve ido' Zakobo' gipele Zudakisi ve.
Vekise nesi ido' vene' linge masi Izesu' izeleho Maliakisi ido' Izesu' akunolomotesi di gese' igi mini lu'ine mili hamo' igi O'mosola li minani' ve.
A'mine gamene neu' nene Izesu' evenele zuho evene' vani hadeti tuvedi (120) ne'mine nene igi mulise mili nizavo Petolo' aza vo'ningu' ote mino ti' lo lo-ngimine':

Zogone zuhokizo, gililo. O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo Davidi'ni do ote-davo Davidi' aza Zuda' ado' Izesu'ni dalizave gomu' molo ngemo ngelebizive mamu' line' gamazi gizikani' nene gihile izeline' ogavosa gihile izine' ve.
Lezesi maka' gono dalive lo Izesu' aza Zuda'ni do kegeso ele'mize molani' nenako aza Zuda' leli' aleve minine' ve.

A'mine ve nene monovo goloso ogo Izesu'ni nene adeu' molalive li biluvalite moni imani' nedunu' nene misubo ma meni hizo a'mido' vo mino godololati' velepe' izeko lemo gatuno izo ho'lavo iseve nene dulungizo do'mozine' ve.
Nemu' Zelusalemi aleve muki' gili a'mine ebeli'mi gulive nene engi' gamazi'ninguti' Akeledama ve li milani' ve. Ido' a'mine gulive nene leli' gamaziuti' vanise ebe' ve lo neive.
Ido' O'moso opo'ni li nama laa' ani' nama mono' godolou' ma ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive.
Numu've nene hulavo zupo' molo neivo evene' mali'mo a'mingu' minamoloseive li gizi nizave.
Ido' ma nene ti' li gizi nizave:
Ei' gono velelo' nene ve mali'mo do ti' ogo dalive li gizi nizani' ma neive.

Nemu' nene Izesu' hilinguti' ote neine' gamazi lo soto' ilive lo ve ma do kegeso leli' aposoloku' do gi'mize-do ele'mize molalone' ogave. Ado' Izesu' ha neivo Zohane' noso holo-dine' gameneloti' api' ogo mine do dizo O'moso'mo vovoteuti' Izesu'ni Okulumoku' do dizo vine' gameneu' ezesi maka' minuniveuti' ma do kegeso ele'mize molalone' ogave.

Petolo' ti' lo lo-ngemavo Izesu' evenele zuho ingine ve sita' ma Zosehe' ado' gulive ngomo Balasaba' ve lo mininekisi ido' gulive ma Zusito' ve lo mininekisi ido' ve ma gulive Matatia' nesi nene di soto' i-ngidi

O'mosola ti' li opo'ni lani' ve. Agae, Guvetesi ve make, evene' muki' luteu' ningaa' anive neke, Zuda' aza aposolo gono hulo O'moso gei' do va'va' ogo molo-daine' ebeta vo mo gopo ogaze. Eze gono velelo' dalive lo mene ve sitakuti' ma do kegeso lelebizezo.
Ti' li opo'ni li O'moso gelavo di kegesaa' zohiku' ngele'mizi milikevo Matatia' ivile' ogavo aposolo leveni minangu' nene di gi'mizi-dani' ve.

Zuda veliti avo'ningine O'moso'mo ise'ine izingumu' gili minaa' ani' holise' nene osu' lavo neloti' salele seveni ogo vavo noso' nite' api' igi di naa' ani' holise' mo ogavo Izesu' evenele zuho ingine numuno hamoku' ma mulise mili nizavo
hepe' naba amuzo'vesi gugu laa' neine' ne'mine Okulumokuti' nene lite' mate' lo gugu lo lemavo gugu line' ne'mo minani' numungu' nene amuzo molani' ve.
Ne'mine ogavo ningi nizavo olo' vele gele vine' nene soto' pizo evene' godo'nido' hamo' hamo' mine hutile' ogo minavo
O'moso'mi sikalahu' ne'mo lu'ningu' lemo gono do do lapa nomine' o-ngedavo ato ato' gamazi gilamani' gamaziuti' api' igi li'mi vani'.
Ti' igi nizavo a'mine gameneu' nene Zuda ve mono' gilaa' ave numudo' namado' ve Zelusalemi ebeta igi mini
gugu line' nene gili nemu' mulise mili aposolo ingine gamazi'ninguti' gamazi'ninguti' likevo gili gopo ga'ine gilani'.
Gili golize li sizaga li ti' li lani': Mene gamazi nilave ingine nGalilaia misubokotikovo' nizani' ve.
Ne nadi' isa leze note gihile izete metetidati' gilune' nene likevo gilune.
Laza misubo ato atokuti' none. Palatia ve ido' Mede ve ido' Elame ve ido' Mesopotamia misubouti' ve ido' Zuda ve ido' Kapadokia ve ido' Podo ve ido' Asia ve
Piligia ve ido' Pamahilia ve, Aigita ve ido' Libia misubo ebekuti' Kilene ve ido' Loma ebetasi ungunive ne none.
Ido' laza Zuda ve gehepeve noube ido' monokumu' Zuda vela do gi'mizunive noube ido' Keleta ve nehe Alabia ve nehe laza muki' gelo leli' noteti' noteti' O'moso'mi ele'vole' sunomu' likevo gelekune.
Ne'mine lii golize li gili gopo igi agae, mene nani suno ve li lani'.
Ti' li lani'za ve linge ma nete a'mine di ledi mini gize' i-ngidi ti' li lani': Vaini noso gosoho' nisa sipaki igi mini nilave.

Sipaki igi mini nilave likevo Petolo' aza gonolomote levenisi ne ote mino gamazi naba lo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Vekizo, lingine Zelusalemi alevesi ido' Zuda ve mukikisi naza gamazi ma lo-lengemeloze. Gatine huli gili minilo.
Lengi' nene gili ladani ikeve. Nedenga' naeni kiloku nene olihe aminako me ve ne sipaki amave.
Sipaki amani'za soto' neine' initekumu' mene O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' oga' ive Zoele' luhuvo gizine' ne'mi gihile nene me neive. Ti' lo gize neive:
O'moso'mo ti' lo line':
Mino alinge' gamene alitavo Sikalahu'ne evene' muki' lehize-ngedekuvo
a'mine Sikalahu'ne ne'mo nene zatuho' o-ngedavo
gipe alu langa'vopilemo' nete neni' ve'neti' gamazi li soto' igi
li-lingimilisave.
Ido' a'mine Sikalahu'ne ne'mo do soto' o-ngedavo
inite' ato ato' nene goso' vetineliti ve'nido' o molavo
ningika' ningika' navo ozohotinelitesi vamu' ningi'mi vi minilisave.
Ee, a'mine gameneu' Sikalahu'ne nene
a'mine gelekele' alu izipe'ne nesi lehize-ngedekuvo
neni' gamazi'ne nene li soto' igi evene' li-ngimilisave.
Ido' ne'mine navo hoze okulumo' veletasi ido' misubo gala'mudasi nene
ele'vole' inite' muki' noso molo lengelebizelesuve.
Ado' misubola nene vanisesi olokisi soto' ikesivo
sokile'mo limuso ne'minosa soto' ogavo ningilisave.
Ido' Guvelesi ve'mi gamene naba olihe alitamivo
ho' velelo' nene hitavo liti'muso ize mineleseive.
Ido' a'mine'mine ogo ike'nisi nene gulehe' kulehe' lizo
vanise ne'mine geleleseive.
Ido' Guvelesi ve'mi gulive di minilizave nene
O'moso'mo do ngu' ize-lengedeleseive lo gize neive.

Ne'mine lo Petolo' imine' molo ti' lo line': Isilaele' alevekizo, ma lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. O'moso'mo lingine nezelati' ve ve li ningilizave lo Nasalete ve Izesu'ni do amuzo molo-do hize ele' o-davo ele'vole' nitekisi golize nitekisi ogo noso molani' nene lengi' vovotingu' ine' nemu' gili nizani' ma neive.

Eze nene O'moso'mo gozopo' gelo lo huko gele neido' ogo aka elebizo adingu' molani' ve. Adingu' molavo lingine bilani' ve. Ee, lingine likevo biluva've gamazi gilamavete lohoto' zalo' nilidunu' bilikevo hiline'.
Ne'mine ikeni'za gonoso milaa' angu' mine gili' lamiline' ogavo nemu' mulumo gelo hilinguti' O'moso'mo do ote-dine' ve.
Davidi' ezemu' ti' lo gizine' ve:
Guvelesi ve nezesi gamene gamene minaa' neive lo
a'mine nene ga'neu' soto' o neivo naza gele minaa' uvoni' ve.
Aza inite' mali'mo do goloso o-nedalive lo neni' a'ne zamela minaa' neive.
Nemu' lu'neu' lamine' gelo
mulu'neu' gulumo avile lisavo nolize gamazi noluve.
O'moso'ne make, vo'nehaza nene hilavetida minelive lo mudise hulamolosane.
Ido' lu'ne geita molo gelekele' o-giduve neni' nene hulo-nedanivo
oko'ne geleso unuvo amoloseive.
Nemu' nene gele hamo' ogo hongu lo gizebo ogo minelesuve.
Naza minevo' minevo' ogo lu'ne gosoho' do mineloni' aka nene nelebizanivo
gezesi minusidi'mo lu'neu' gulumo avile liso minavo
ne'minovo' minelesuve lo gizine' ve.
Neni' zuhokizo, naza avoteho Davidi'nimu' nene mo lamineto' lo-lengemelesuve. Aza helavo galese izi-dani' ve. Gonoso galese've nene idisesi soto' neivo ningo minaa' noune.

Ne neiha aza O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' oga' ive polohete minine' nenako a'mine line' gamazi nene O'moso'mo gamazi've do amuzo molo lo huko-dine' gamazimu' gelo mino line' ve. Ado' ezelo' medelo eze a'vopilemo' zuhouti' mali'mo eze mo'mosi've dalive lo lo huko-dingumu' gele minosa line' ve.

Ee, aza alinge' soto' iline' initekumu' gele mino O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live nene hilinguti' do ote-delingumu' line' ve. Ado' O'moso'mo a'mine ve hilavetida mudise hulo-damivo oko'no gelesamilive line' nene O'moso'mo hilinguti' do ote-delingumu' line' ve.
O'moso'mo Izesu'ni do ote-dine' nene eze izipahala zuho laza vete gihiletunu' ninge none' ma neive.

Ido' meleho O'moso'mo evene' muki' livile' ogo dize minive ve li ningilizave lo ana zamela ele'mize molo gozopo' lo huko-dido' e'meto eze Sikalahu've emavo lehize-lidine'. Ido' idise gili ningi nizani' inite' ado' eze Sikalahu've lehize-lidine' nene gili ningi nizave.
Ido' Davidi' aza oko'no losuvosi Okulumoku' dizamine'za aza gamazi ti' lo line':
Vozeu' ve'mo aza Guve'nesi vemu' ti' lo lo-imine':
Gaza evene' nabavo' minaa' ada a'ne hulaa' uvoda minezo.
Mine do vo nanivo biluvaka nete gelekele' i-gidi minilizave lo
gizengauko do'mo leme-ngedelesuve line'.

Nemu' lingine Isilaele' zuho muki' gili lamine' ilo. A'mine ve ma lingine bilikevo hilive Izesu' nene O'moso'mo Guvelesi ve ve lo ido' do lu' izelive imiselelesa live ve lo ele'mize molavo neive lo Petolo' lo-ngimine'.
Ne'mine lavo evene' gili mulu'ine hukavo mulumo gili Petolo' ve aposolo linge ma nesi longo' i-ngidi ti' li lani': Zogole zuhokizo, nadi' okunivo lamine' ilive.

Ne'mine likevo Petolo' ti' lo lo-ngimine': O'moso'mo lihimete hulo-ledelingumu' ve li lingine hamo' hamo' igi lutine di velepe' izilo. Ne'mine ikevo laza Izesu' Kilisito' gulivelo' mono' noso holo-lengedekunivo O'moso'mi Sikalahu've nene lehize-lengedeleseive.
Linginesi langa'vopilemo' hota nizavesi elese molo-lengemavo aliza aleve muki' nene eze Sikalahu've lehize-lengedelesa lo huko neine' ma ve.

Petolo' aza ti' lo lo-ngemosa gamazi muki' imine' molo ga'ine do ti' lo lo-ngimine': Evene' zuho goloso minani' mene O'moso'mo goni' o-ngedo ngebelelingu' nene lengikisi lengebelamivo lukuvo nalizangisi olovo' ilo lo lo-ngimine'.
Ti' lo lo-ngemavo eze gamazi gili dave gohi tili tauseni (3,000) nene imine' milavo mono' noso hili-ngidani' ve.
Ne'mine ogavo gamene gamene amuzo mili di gese' igi gili hamo' igi aposolo apizi ngimani' gamazi gili haza noso' nitekisi lebeni initekisi ni O'mosola li minaa' ani'.
Ti' igi nizavo aposolo ingine O'moso'mi amuzo ningilizave li ei' velemu' ato ato' initekisi golize nitekisi di soto' ikevo evene' muki' ngehelele izivo minani'.
Izesu'ni gili imaa' ave ingine muki' hamo' zuho lili' igi inite' mata' di minani' nene mukito' inite' ogavo di minani' ve.
Misubo'ine nehe heneni nganeni'ine nehe nene meni hizi a'midoti' moni dani' nene inite'ine nomivo vise' iga' ave ize' mili engi' votigilelo' ngimani' ve.
Lu'ine ga'ine mili hamo' igi mono' numuno nabau' mulise milaa' ani'. Ido' numungu' numungu' di gese' ika' ika' igi mini noso' nite' naa' ani' nene mulu'ningu' lamine' gili balu i-ngidi
ni mini O'mosola opo'ni li minikevo evene' muki' ningi lamine' i-ngidani'. Ne'mine navo Guvelesi ve ne'mo gamene gamene evene' gohi ma do ngu' izo ei' evenele zuhou' do imine' molo-ngedaa' ine' ve.
Gamene ma Petoloki Zohaneki nivenga' gamene tili kilokulo' nene O'mosola laa' ani' gamene ogavo mono' numuno nabau' dizilisa nivasivo

ve ma izelehi mulunouti' gebili soto' ive nene mono' numuno ne'mi gateni ado' lamine' goloso neive laa' ani' gatenilo' nene gamene gamene ele'mizi di huli-dikevo a'mido' mino evene' dizi limi ave nene monimu' voku' voku' lo-ngedo minaa' ine' ve.
Petoloki Zohaneki mono' numuno nabau' dizilisa nivasivo ningo monimu' voku' lo-ngidine'.
Voku' lo-ngedavo Petoloki Zohaneki vonu' bili Petolo' ti' lo lo-imine': Vonu' lebelezo.
Ti' lo lo-emavo ve gebili aza giline' nene inite' ma nemelesa lihe lo vonu' ngibiline'.
Ne'mino neivo Petolo' ti' lo lo-imine': Nezela moni heneni'ne nomine'za inite' hamo' ma neine' nene gemekuvo dalosane. Nasalete ve Izesu' Kilisito' ei' velemu' lo-gemekuvo oto aka monezo.
Ne'mine lo-emo ana zamela do do ote-davo lite' lo gizene luhisesi omuvosi amuzo molavo
lite' lo ote pehe lo aka mono oluto' dize dize' ogo mono O'moso opo'ni nolivo engikisi mono' numungu' maka' dizani'.
Dizikevo aka nomono O'moso opo'ni nolivo evene' muki' ningi
gateni lamineku' mino monimu' voku' voku' lo-ledo minaa' ive ma neive li gilii lamine' ingumu' sizaga li geke' li-dani' ve.

A'mine di lamine' i-dasive nene Petoloki Zohaneki engita vo gi'mizo neivo evene' muki' ningi mono' numuno neu' he' numuno naba gizikani' gulive Solomoni' ve langu' nene loti' izi vi di gese' igi ve'ine gahava nomivo minani'.

Petolo' evene' ningo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Isilaele' alevekizo, ve mene ningi sizaga goloso nilani' nene leli' amuzotedunu' nomive. Ido' leli' laminetemu' ogo ma do lamine' o-damusive. Nemu' vonu' vonu' libilamilo.

O'moso ado' avotemote Abalahamule Isakale Zakobole ido' avotemote muki' gelekele' i-daa' ave nene aza gipele Izesu' gulive do hozi lo amuzo've do soto' ogavo niningave. A'mine ve Izesu'ni nene lingine guvelesi ve Pilato' anau' ele'mizi milikevo Pilato' aza iseve ize-delove lo nolivo lingine Pilato' velelo' mehedine imi belelive lani'.

Ee, a'mine lulo laminekisi ve lisihe' lamine' nene ezemu' gosele' lengebelavo o've li-di evene' bele hilive ma gomukuti' nalato' neivo lingine Pilato' iseve ize-davo a'mine evene' bele hilive lezesi minelone lani'.
Ne'mine igi minevo' alevo' ne'mi melehine bili hilani' ve. Bili hilani'za O'moso'mo hilinguti' do ote-dine'. Ido' do ote-dine' nene la'lisete ninge none' ma ve.
Izesu' gulivelo' gele ele'vole' ogo minosa ningaa' ave mene do lamine' o-dusivo aza Izesu'nimu' gele ele'vole' idi'mo lamine' ine' ve.
Zogone zuhokizo, linginesi gizebo vetinesi Izesu'ni i-dani' nene gili lamine' ami ladani igi minani' nemu' i-dani' ne gele nouve.
Do lu' izelive lo O'moso'mo imiselelesa live mene aza mulumo gelo heleleseive lo O'moso'mo line' gamazi ado' polohete mukilite li soto' ikeni' gamazi nene ne'mine ogo do gihile ize-dave.
O'moso'mo lihimetine gilite-lengedelingumu' ve li lutine di velepe' izi goloso nitetine hulilo.

Ne'mine ikevo O'moso'mo hongu lo lamine' minaa' nene do soto' o-lengedo do lungu' izelive lo imiselelove lo lo huko salani molo-lidive nene lengita imiseleleseive. A'mine do lu' izelive nene Izesu' ma ve.

Eze nene Okulumoli'mo asabu' o-davo a'mida mineline' ogave. Mino O'moso'mo inite' mata' do gosoho' iline' gamene nene alitavo ma tine' molo aloseive. A'mine gamenemu' nene O'moso'mo gamazi've ve'ningu' molavo gozopo' aka'milati' ei' polohete've kekeize li minani' nete li soto' ani' ve.
Ido' Mose' aza gamazi ma ti' lo line':
Guvetinesi ve O'moso aza lengi' zuhouti' ve ma
eze gamazi lo soto' ilive polohete neni' ne'mine do ote-do hulo-lengedeleseive.
A'mine veli'mo gamazi lo-lengemeline' nene gili dalo.
Ido' a'mine polohete'mo liline' gamazilo' ve mali'mo gele damiline' nene
bilikevo O'moso'mi evenele zuhou' minamo osu' lilive lo line'.
Ee, gamazi li soto' igi minani' polohete ado' Samuvelikisi ido' ezeloti' alinge' milavesi muki' idise mene gamenemu' li soto' ani'.

Lingine polohete minaveti gize'nido' lisi nimonaze. O'moso'mo avotingine gamazi lo huko lo-ngimine' nene linginemukisi line' ma ve. Nemu' neve Abalahamu'ni ti' lo lo-imine': Ga'vopilemo' ma misubou' zuho ato ato' nene no'noho' ize-ngedeleseive lo line'.
Gana' Zuda ve lengikumu' ve lo gipele do ote-do imiselavo lingine goloso nite' di'mi vi minanguti' nene lengi' hamo' hamo' do ti'ne-lengedo no'noho' ize-lingidine' ve.

Petoloki Zohaneki gamazi ne'mine li evene' li-ngimi nizasivo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi mono' numuno nabau' gizebo iga' ave pilisi veti guve'inesi ve nabasi Sadukaio' evene' masi engita igi heteli nizavo
evene' apizi ngimi O'moso'mo Izesu'ni hilinguti' do ote-dine' ne'mine ogo evene' masi do ote-ngedeleseive li lasingumu' gili goloso igi
a'nido' diki ti' li lani': Nivenga' mo molako aize' goni' o-ngedelone li na'nava numungu' huli-ngidani'.
Ne'mine i-ngidani'za lasine' gamazi gilave muki' nene gili ele'vole' ani'. Ido' ne'mine ikevo gili ele'vole' ave nene imine' milikevo naba'ine nene faef tauseni (5,000) ine'.
Ingi go' lavo Zuda veliti guve'inesi vesi mono' gizebo vesi mono' apizi ngimaa' avesi Zelusalemi numuda mulise milani'.

Ee, eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba Anasi' ve Kaiaha' ve Zohane' ve Alekisade' ve ido' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba'mi zuho mukikisi mulise mili mini
aposolo ngele'mizi di igi vovo'ningu' di oti-ngidi ti' li longo' i-ngidani': Ve a'ne'minelitise lingine zahidati' amuzo di ido' zahi gulivelo' me suno dasive.
Ti' li longo' i-ngidikevo O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo Petolo' lulou' gono davo aza ti' lo lo-ngimine': Evene' guvetesi vekizo, ido' gizebo vekizo,
ve gebili ma do lamine' o-dusine' mamu' nene nadi' igi di lamine' i-dasive li longo' nii-lidahe.

Linginesi Isilaele' aleve mukikisi gililizave lo lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. Nasalete ve Izesu' Kilisito'ni langisetine lohoto' zalo' bilikevo O'moso'mo hilavetidati' do ote-dive ne'mi amuzo'velo' me ve nene lamine' ogosa vetida ote neive.
Mono' godolou' gamazi ma ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Numuno gizaa' geheni lingine numuno gizaa' ave nete ningi hulani' ne'mo nene geheni muki' ngivile' ogo numuno do amuzo molaa' geheni
lolo' ogo neive.
A'mine geheni nene Izesu' ve. Numudo' namado' ve lelikuti' do lu' izelive gohi ma nomive. Ado' eze gulivelo' lamine' olonive gohi ma nomive. Ei' hamokovo' nene neive lo lo-ngimine'.

Ne'mine lavo Petoloki Zohaneki ngehelele izamivo gamazi livi' kiselivi' igi lasine' nemu' ingine sukulu ma lamasive haza ve matise ve li gili sizaga li Izesukisi maka' minasive matise lasi nave li gilani'.
Ne'mine igi di lamine' i-dasive nene engikisi minavo ningi ngelemilizani' gamazi vise' igi hulani'.
Vise' igi huli goni' numunguti' ngele'mizi heto' igi engikovo' ti' li li gili ha gele ani':
Ve mene nadi' o-ngedelone. Ingine ato' suno dikesive li Zelusalemi aleve muki' nene gili osu' likenako laza nadi' ogo ataize lo-ngedelone. Ne nomive.
Nemu' a'mine gamazi hutile' ogavo evene' masi gilikelizave lii Izesu' gulive ihe' gohi li soto' igi li-ngimamilizo lo ga'ine dalone lisa
alizo li asi li-ngidani'. Asi li-ngidikevo ikesivo Izesu'nimu' li-ngimi eze gulive gohi li soto' amilizo li o've li amuzonga li li huki-ngidani'.
Li huki-ngidikevo Petoloki Zohaneki di velepe' izi ti' li li-ngimasine': Langisetine gili ningilevo. Lengi' eveneliti gamazi gele do O'moso'mi gamazi gele hulokusivo O'moso'mo gilivo lamine' ilihe.
La'lisete ningo gilusine' inite' nene nanitekumu' hiteko minelesive. Lo soto' soto' ogo minelesusive.

Ne'mine likesivo gizebo ve naba' naba ingine ngehelele izine' gani gohi li-ngimi soto' ine' initekumu' nene evenelite O'moso opo'ni li minanako lilimikelizave li ngibililizani' akamu' vise' igi haza ngimiseli hulikevo vasine'.
Golize inite' di di lamine' i-dasive nene kilisimasi've foti (40) ivile' ogo minine' nenako nemu' evenelite O'moso opo'ni li minani'.
nGimiseli hulikevo limi ingine zuho nizada vi eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ave nabasi mono' gizebo ve nabalitesi li-ngidani' gamazi nene vetete' igi li-ngimikesivo
gili lu'ine mili hamo' igi O'mosola li ti' li lani': Vozeu' ve Guvekasi ve, Okulumo' misubo guvo noso ido' a'mingu' minani' inite' muki' do soto' aniveke,
Sikalahuka ne'mo geze gelekele' gipa avoteho Davidi'ni nene do ote-do gamazi veleu' molavo ti' lo line':
Evene' heta ato' ve nene ngizebolo' molavo gopo gani lani' nene
ido' evenelite haza gopo igi gamazi goloso li hukani' nene nanimu' neve.
Misubou' misubou' veti guve'inesi ve ido' gizebo ve'ine ingine,
Guvelesi vesi ido' ve naba ve lo do kegese-divesi nene lovo o ngemelone li
di nene igi di gese' ave lo line'.

Ee, lulo laminekisi gelekele' gipa Izesu'ni nene do lu' izelive ve lo eze do kegese-danive nene lovo imilisa Helode' ve Podio' Pilato' ve heta ato' vesi Isilaele' alevesi ingine lamine' mene ebeku' di gese' igi
gasika gozopo' gaka gelo amuzokalo' molo gelo salani molo-dane' inite' nene i-dani' ve.
Ne'mine ani'za Guvetesi ve make, lehelele izine' gamazi lani' nemu' gele mino gamazika livi kiselivi' igi lilizave lo gelekele' veka leli' nene vete do lapa nomine' o-ledo
amuzoka lemanivo inite' gizi dave do lamine' o-ngedo eze monovo ningilizave lo gelekele' gipa lulo laminekisi Izesu' gulivelo' ato' suno do gono dalone lo nolune li lani'.

Ne'mine li O'mosola likevo di gese' igi minani' numuno nene gulukulu' ogo mo'mongo' ogavo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo lu'ningu' gono do ve'ine do lapa nomine' o-ngedavo O'moso'mi gamazi livi' kiselivi' igi golise gilami li-ngimika' i'mi minani' ve.
Ido' gili ele'vole' igi minani' aleve ingine lu'ine ga'ine mili hamo' igi inite' mata'ine di minani' nene gei' initeka ve neni' inite'ne ve lami mukito' inite'ine di minani'.

Ne'mine igi nizavo aposolo ingine Guvelesi ve Izesu' hilinguti' otine' gamazi nene amuzo mili li soto' i ngimi' ngimi' igi minikevo O'moso'mo hize ele' o-ngedavo evenelite ingine mukikumu' ningavo lamine' ine'.

Numuno nehe misubo nehe inite' me'ninge nete meni've di di vi aposolo ngimikevo evene' linge ma inite' mamu' vise' ikevo ma vise' ani' votigile ngimaa' avo engikuti' ve mali'mosi initekumu' ma vise' amaa' ine' ve.

Ido' ne'mine suno nene Zosehe' nesi dani' ve. A'mine Zosehe' nene aposololite gulive gohi ma Banabasi' ve li mili-dave Levi' a'vopilemo' zuho mono' gono daa' aveuti' minive ado' Kipilo ailaniu' soto' ivemu' noluve. Ido' a'mine gulive Banabasi' ne'mi monovo nene do ngu' izaa' ive ve lo neive.
A'mine ve aza ebe' za zuho've ma do minine' nene meni hizikevo moni do aposolo do vo ngimine' ve.

Banabasi' ne'mine ine'za ve ma gulive Ananiakisi elenaho Sahilakisi angise'ine gamazi li gili ebe' za zuho'ine evene' ma ngimi a'midoti' moni dasine' nene lingela di halekisa lingela Anania' do vo aposolo ngimine'.
nGemavo Petolo' ti' lo lo-imine': Ananiazo. Gaza Satani'mo lemo lukau' gono davo nanimu' O'moso'mi Sikalahu' soza gani lo-emo misubo'mi meni lingela do halekekane.

Misuboka geita minelinako gasika gelo ngemaine' ma ve. Ido' ngemo meni daine' nene gei' monika neine'za la'lise voku' lo-gedamune. Nedunu' do inite' mataka dalo ma dalinako gei' luka'mo goka izavo nanitekumu' ne'mine ane. Evene' soza lo-limuhe lo O'moso soza lo-emo golo izane.
Ti' lo nolo-imivo Anania' nogelo nogelo lemo pou' lo ongo hiline'. Helavo ningi gilave nene ngehelele naba izine'.
Izipe goso've minani' nete gonoso nene lavolavotunu' asabu' izi di vi galese izi-dani' ve.
Galese izi-dikevo gamene tili aua ne'mine ngomo mine ha'na noogo elenaho a'mine gamazi gelamo vanaho ha neihe lo ogo heteline'.
Hetelavo Petolo' ti' lo longo' o-do line': Olo. Misuboloti' meni've mo a'nevo' dasine' nehe. Ne'mine lavo aza ti' lo line': Oo. Mo a'nevo' ve.

Lavo Petolo' ti' lo lo-imine': Lingine nanitekumu' gamazi li halekiki Guvelesi ve'mi Sikalahu' golo izasive. Vangahine di galese izi-dave ma nesu gateda lidi lidi li niigi lanako gezesi a'mine a'mine igi di vi galese izi-gidilisave lo nolo-imivo
nogelo galinali lo gizeneu' lemo pou' lo ongo hiline'. Helavo goso've nete dizi gonoso ne ningi di vi vanahine galese izi-dado' galese izi-dani' ve.
Galese izi-dikevo noso hilave mukikisi evene' linge ma a'mine gamazi gilave mukikisi nene ngehelele naba izivo minani' ve.

Aposolo ingine ato ato' suno di eveneta inite' ato ato' muki' di soto' iga' ani'. Ido' Izesu'nimu' gili ele'vole' iga' ave muki' lu'ine di hamo' igi mini mono' numuno naba'mi he' numuno ma gizikani' ma gulive Solomoni' ve lo minine' neu' nene di gese' igi minaa' ani'.
Nizavo evene' heta minavete engikumu' sizaga li di naba i-ngidani'za ngehelele izavo vi engita gi'mizamani'.
Vi gi'mizamani'za vene' vemoho' muki' vanu hizi igi gili ele'vole' igi Guvelesi vela igi imine' mili gi'mizaa' ani'.

Ne'mine ikevo gebili nabili inite' gizi davesi ngele'mizi vi Petolo' ogo novivo mumuno'mo nesi linge ma avuto' ngebelavo lamine' ilizahe li holomosi ingaa' ani' initekisi di vi akalo' huli ngimika' ani'.

Zelusalemi ebe' gahevela ingani' aleve mukikisi igi engita inite' gizi dani' alevesi ido' lu'ningu' sikalahu' golosoli'mo mino do goloso o-ngedo minivesi ngele'mizi ikevo di lamine' igi osu' li-ngidani' ve.
Ne'mine igi nizavo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive nabasi ezela igi gi'mizave muki' ado' Sadukaio' aleve a'mido' mulise milaa' ave engikuti' minikevo ngizebolo' goloso molavo
aposolo a'nido' di gili' li ngele'mizi di vi evene' mukiliti nala' numuno gizikangu' huli-ngidani'.
Huli-ngidikevo nizavo holuka' liti'musou' Guvelesi ve'mi angelo' mali'mo ogo nala' numunguti' akahe si'ze-ngedo ngele'mize heto' ogo ti' lo line':
Vi mono' numuno nabau' oti mini O'moso'mo do lu' izavo minevo' minevo' ogo minaa' gosoholi'mi monovomu' gamazi muki' nene li soto' igi evene' li-ngimi minilo.

Ne'mine lavo gili go' lolosa neivo mono' numuno nabau' dizi a'mine gamazi li soto' i-ngimi minani'. Nizavo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive nabasi ezela gi'mizi minavesi di nubo igi engi' Isilaele' aleveti gizebo veti kanisole naba'ine vise li di mulise mili-ngidi a'mine ve ngele'mizi alizave li pilisi ve ma nala' numuda ngimiselani'.
nGimiselikevo vi ningani'za nala' numungu' nene nizamavo vise' igi di tibizi vi ti' li li-ngimani':
Vune'za nala' numuno'mi akahe nene gizi gili' likevo gatedo' gizebo iga' ave nene ha oti nizavo ningune'za akahe si'zune' nene evene' hamokisi ma nizamavo ningune' ve.

Likevo mono' numuno nabau' gizebo iga' ave ado' pilisi veti guve'inesi ve nabasi eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi gili aposolo nadi' ahe li gopo ga'ine gili alinge' nene inite' ma nadi' ogo soto' ilihe li lani'.
Ne'mine li nizavo ve mali'mo ogo hetelo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Mene gililo. Lingine nala' numungu' huli-ngidave nene mono' numuno nabau' mini evene' mono' li-ngimi nizave.

Lavo pilisi veti gizebo ve'ine aza pilisi ve ma ngele'mizo vo aposolo ngele'mizo ani'. A'mine pilisi ve nete ngele'mizi ani'za evenelite gehenidunu' libilikelizave li golise gili ngibilami zou li ngele'mizi ani' ve.
nGele'mizi kanisoleti vovo'ningu' huli-ngidikevo nizavo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba ne'mo ti' lo longo' o-ngidine':

Laza a'mine ve'mi gulive igi li-ngimi' ngimi' amilo lo amuzo molo lo-lengemamune' nehe. Olo. Lingine peleseve' izi a'mine gamazi nene Zelusalemi numungu' li hutile' ikevo buu line' ma ve. Ne'mine igi a'mine ve bilaveliti lihime'ine nene leli' okodela dizelive lisa nahe.
Lavo Petolole aposolo linge masi di velepe' izi gamazi ti' li li-imani': Eveneliti gamazi gele do O'moso'mi gamazi gele hulaa' ne ma nomive.
Lingine Izesu'ni lohoto' zalo' bili hilikevo avotemoteliti O'moso'ine ne'mo do ote-dine' ve.
Otavo Isilaele' aleve lingine lutine di velepe' izikevo lihimetine hulo-lengedelive lo Guvetesi ve ve lo ido' do lu' izaa' ive ve lo O'moso'mo ei' amuzodunu' do dize-davo neive.

Ido' a'me luvoni' inite' nene ningo gelosa a'minemu' lo soto' o lengemelonive nene leli' ne none. Ido' lelikovo' nomive. O'moso'mi Sikalahu've nesi nene lo soto' oga' neive. A'mine Sikalahu've nene O'moso'mo eze gamazilo' gele daa' unive nene leme neine' ma neive lo lo-ngimine'.
Ti' lo lo-ngemavo ngizebolo' goloso molavo mo ngebelelone li gilani'.

nGebelelone li gilani'za Zuda veliti kanisole mulise nabauti' ve ma Halisaio' ve aza Mose' lou' gamazi gize ngimine' nene apize ngemaa' ivo evene' muki' ezemu' gilavo dize minive ne'mi gulive Gamaliele' ne'mo oto aposolo vi heta igi gamene ngomo minilizave lavo vi minikevo
kanisole alevemu' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Isilaele' aleve neze zuhokizo, lingine a'mine ve nadi' i-ngidilizahe. Gatine gili nge li minisa i-ngidilo.

Gamene gozopo' aka'mila ve ma gulive Teuda' aza oto ve guve'nesi ve naba nouve lavo evene' fo hadeti (400) ne'mine ezela gi'mizani'za alinge' ngamani nete me'nibine bili hilikevo ezela gi'mizave nene hutile' igi vi haha ikevo a'mine inite' osu' line'.

Ido' alinge' gulivete gizani' gamenela nGalilaia ve ma gulive Zuda' ve lo minive ne'mo oto evene' linge ga'ine do lovo do soto' ogo ngamani ngebelelone lavo gili imikevo lovo hizangu' nene Zuda'ni bili hilikevo eze aleve muki' vi hutile' igi vi halekani'.

Nemu' ne mene vemu' lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. Lingine huli-ngimikavo haza minilizave. Ingine di soto' ani' inite' nene haza evenelite ga'ine gili gono di di soto' ani' noline' nene mo gopo ogo haha oloseive.

Ido' O'moso'mo hize ele' o-ngedo minivo di soto' ani' noline' nene lingine O'moso ivile' igi ingine gono nidangumu' nene ngeli o've li li-ngidilizahe. O'mososi lovo i imi minikelizave lo nemu' nolo-lingimuve lo lo-ngimine'. Lo-ngemavo ingine gili di
aposolo gohi ngele'mizi numunguko dizi lobuno gavosodunu' ngibilivi' ngibilivi' igi Izesu' gulive igi evene' li-ngimamilizave li li huki-ngidi ngimiseli hulani'.

Ido' ngimiselikevo a'mine kanisole alevesi minadoti' huli-ngidi ngolize izi'mi limi vani'. Ido' ngolize izi'mi limi vani' nene ingine O'moso'mo lelikumu' gelavo lamine' ogavo ingine Izesu' gulive di minangumu' ve li biluvalite di'mi limi-ngidi ngibililizani' nene monoku' amuzo'ine nene a'mine geni ha gihilizado' lisihe' o neive lo giline' noloseive li ngolize izi'mi vani' ve.

Ne'mine ogavo gamene gamene mono' numuno nabaukisi numudasi O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live nene Izesu' minine' nenako nemu' gamazi lamine' nene di halekami li soto' igi apizi ngimi' ngimikovo' igi minani' ve.

A'mine gameneu' nene Izesu' evenele zuho mo imine' mili'mi nivavo engikuti' evene' ma ado' nGiliki eveneliti gamazi'ninguti' laa' ave nete ti' li li mulu'ningu' goloso gilani'. Gamene gamene noso' nite' ize' mili ngimaa' angu' leze muliseuti' minani' geto' vene' ne ningi huli-ngidi noso' nite' mili-ngidisa'mave li mulu'ningu' goloso gili Zuda veti gamazi'ninguti' laa' ave ngelemilisa lani'.

Ne'mine ikevo aposolo tuvelu ingine Izesu' evenele zuho muki' vise li di mulise mili-ngidi ti' li li-ngimani': Laza noso' nite' ize' molo ngemo minelesa O'moso'mi gamazi lo-ngemaa' noune' nene hulolone' ne edamoloseize.

Leze zuhokizo, lingine lengikuti' evene' seveni O'moso'mi Sikalahu' gili imi nizavo lu'ningu' gono daa' neive ido' gamazi noso'vesi laminekovo' laa' ave evene' ningi gamangi mili-ngidaa' ave di soto' ikevo laza gono mene dalizave lo ngele'mize molalone.
Ido' ne'mine ogo la'lise O'moso opo'ni lo ido' evene' O'moso'mi gamazi lo-ngemo lute hamo' minavo amuzo molo minelone.

Likevo Izesu' evenele zuho muki' gamazi lamine' ve li Setehano' nene O'mosola amuzo molo gele emo minavo Sikalahu've'mo lulou' vauve elo gono davo minive nesi ido' Hilipokisi ido' Polokolokisi ido' Nikanolokisi ido' Timonakisi ido' Palamenakisi ido' Nikolao' ado' Adiokia ebekuti' monokumu' Zuda vela gi'mizive nesi nene di kegesi-ngidi
aposolo nizada ngele'mizi milikevo ingine a'mine gono ngimilisa O'mosola li a'ine godo'nido' hitani' ve.

Ne'mine ikevo O'moso'mi gamazi hutile' ogo novivo Zelusalemi ebeta Izesu' evenele zuho vanu hizi imine' mili muki' goloso soto' navo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave linge muki' ma Izesu'ni gili imi gamazi've gili dani' ve.
Ido' O'moso'mo Setehano'ni ninge lamine' ogo hize ele' o-do amuzo muki' emavo O'moso'mi amuzo ningilizave lo eveneta ato ato' suno doo do soto' ogo minine'.

Ne'mine ine'za evene' malite oti gamazi lido' nene e'menga li-imani'. Ingine Zuda veti mono' mulise hamokuti' minani' ve. Ado' goboni gelekele' ve minanguti' kuluhizi-ngidikevo minaveliti mulise'ine ve languti' nene minani' ve. Engikuti' ve ma Kilene misubouti' ve minavo ido' ve ma Alekisadalia ebekuti' ve minavo ve ma Kilikia misubouti' ve minavo ve ma Asia misubouti' ve minavo minani' ve. Ingine oti Setehano' gamazi lido' nene e'menga li-imani'za
Sikalahu' ne'mo hize ele' o-davo Setehano' gamazi laminekovo' lavo ingine eze gamazi ngeli ivile' amilizani' ogavo
evene' ma di ezemu' soza gamazi li-ngimilizani' nene suno' li-ngimisa di oti-ngidikevo ingine me ve nene Mose'nisi O'mososi dovo ledevo' ogo gamazi nolivo gelekune li lani'.
Likevo ingine haza vesi gizebo ve'inesi mono' apizi ngimaa' avesi go'ine izi di upuho' i-ngidikevo lite' mate' li vi analo' di engi' kanisole aleve nabala gonito' ele'mizi vani'.
Ele'mizi vikevo sakupo gamazi laa' ave soza li ti' li lani': Me ve nene mono' ebe' memukisi O'moso'mo lavo Mose' lo huko-lidine' gamazi mamukisi dovo ledevo' ogo lo minaa' neive.
Aza ti' lo gamazi nolivo gele noune' ma ve. Nasalete ve Izesu' aza ebe' mene do goloso ogo Mose' gize limine' gamazilo' ogo molo oga' une' monovo nene do gopo' napa' oloseive line' ve li lani'.
Likevo kanisole numungu' minave muki' nete vonu' bili ningani' nene golo velelo' ne angeloli'mi golo vele gele neivo ningani' ve.
Ne'mine ogavo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba'mo ti' lo longo' o-dine': Mene gamazi nilani' nene mo lamine' nehe.

Lavo Setehano' ti' lo lo-imine': Lingine gono'nemote ido' neze zuho gamazi lokuvo gililo. Avoteho Abalahamu' olihe Halana' misubouko vo minamo Mesopotamia misubouko ha neivo labana'vesi minaa' neine' O'moso ne'mo soto' omo
ti' lo lo-imine': Geze misubokasi ido' geze zuhosi nene hulo-ngedo misubo ma gelebizeloni' nelo' nene vo mineline.
Lavo gelo a'mine Kaladia' misubo hulo Halana' misubou' ne vo minine'. A'mida mino meleho helavo Abalahamu' aza O'moso'mo lavo leli' none' misubou' meuko nene ani' ve.

Ogavo do goto' misubo lolo' ogo minamine'. O'moso'mo misubo ngomo ha nitekisi ma emamine'. Ee, misubo ma emamine'za azasi ido' a'vopilemo' zuhosi di minilizani' misubo ve lo salani gamazi lo-emo a'mine misubo lengemelove lo lo huko lo-dine' ve. Ido' a'mine ga'vopilemo' zuhosi lengemelove lo line' gameneu' nene Abalahamu' aza izipahala ma nomivo minine' ve.

Ido' a'mine gamazi lo gamazi gohi ma ti' lo lo-imine': Ga'vopilemo' vi misubo mala minikevo a'mida goboni izipe lili' i-ngidi mulumo gono ngimi di goloso i-ngidi nizavo kilisimasi fo hadeti (400) ogo voloseive line'.

Ne'mine lo gohi imine' molo ti' lo line': Kilisimasi ne'mine ogo vavo a'mine goboni izipe lili' i-ngidiliza aleve nene na'nise'ne goni' o-ngedelesuve. Ne'mine okuvo ngimiselikevo ga'vopilemo' me misubouko di tine' mili igi nopo'ni li gelekele' i-nidi minilizave lo lo-imine'.

Ido' O'moso'mo salani molo-ngidine' inite' dalizave eze zuhouti' minilizangumu' nene Abalahamukisi ido' ei' a'vopilemo' zuhosi engi' gipe'ine oko'ine lolovo huki huli-ngidi O'moso'mi noso mili-ngidilizave lo lo huko lo-dine' ve. Ido' lo huko-davo gipele Isaka' soto' idoti' nene gamene seveni ogo vavo eiti malo' ne O'moso'mi noso molo-dine'. Molo-davo Isaka' aza mino naba ogo Zakobo'ni gidine'. Ido' Zakobo' ne'mo avotemotine tuvelu ne gidine' ve.

Ne'mine ogavo a'mine avotemote ingine naku'ine ma Zosehe'nimu' livile' ogalinako li lukehe bili evene' ma ngimisa ei' oko'noloti' meni dani'. Dikevo a'mine ve nete ele'mizi Aigita misubosuko vani'za O'moso'mo Zosehe'nisi mininako ne'mo

mulumo alumo nite' muki' soto' o-dingu' nene gizebo lamine' o-davo goloso amo minine'. Ne'mine ogo minavo Aigita misubou' veti guve'inesi ve naba Halao' aza Zosehe'ni ningine' gamazi noso'vesivo' linako ninge lamine' o-do ne eze zuho ido' Aigita aleve mukikisi do nubuho ogo mukiliti guve'inesi ve minelive lo ele'mize molani'.
Ele'mize molavo neivo Aigita misuboukisi Kanaha misuboukisi ga'na naba soto' ogavo evene' muki' ga'nali'mo goloso ani'. Goloso ikevo avotemotesi noso' nitekumu' vise' ani'.
Ne'mine igi mini alinge' evene' malite Aigita misubou' noso' nite' neive likevo Zakobo' gelo gana' api' ogo avotemotine ngimiselavo vi tine' mili ani'.

Ido' gohi Aigita misubola vani' gameneu' nene ingine Zosehe'nimu' Aigita ve nehe li ha gili nizavo aza nakunotine Zosehe' ma ne nouve lo uvolomotine lo-ngemo Halao' neida ngele'mizo vavo engikumu' nene Zosehe' zuho ve lo Halao' ningo giline'.
Ne'mine ogavo Zosehe' melehine Zakobo'nisi eze zuho mukikisi elese molo ngemavo evene' sevedi faef (75) ne'mine Zakobokisi Aigita misubouko vi minani'.
Vi mini Zakobo' helavo ido' leli' avotemote minave ei' gipele zuho nesi hilika' hilika' igi osu' lani'.
