Hilikevo engi' izipaha'ine zuho nete gonoso'ine nene di vi Sekemi numuda galese izi-ngidani'. Ado' Abalahamu' aza Hamola' zuho meni ngemo gonoso ebe' meni hizingu' nene galese izi-ngidani' ve.

Ne'mine lo Setehano' imine' molo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Ne'mine ikevo mino O'moso'mo Abalahamu'ni lo huko-dine' gamazi gihile izeline' gamene avito' ogavo leze avotemote zuho Aigita misubou' mini vanu hizi mine hutile' ani'.
A'mine gamene neu' nene guve'inesi ve naba gohi ato' ma Zosehe'nimu' gelamive Aigita misuboko soto' ogo minine'.
A'mine Aigita ve aza leze zuho go'ine izo do goloso o-ngedo hililizave lo izipe namuno heta di huli' hulikovo' i-ngidilo lavo di huli' hulikovo' i-ngidaa' avo hilani'.
A'mine gameneu' nene Mose' soto' ine'. O'moso'mo ningine' nene noso'vesi izipe lamine' minine'. Minavo melehi numungu' gizebo i-di nizavo
ike'ni seto hamo' vavo di heta huli-dikevo Halao' aluvo'mo ningo do ti' ogo ei' gidine' gelavo gizebo o-dine'.

Gizebo o-do neivo Aigita aleve ningi gilani' inite' mukikumu' apizi li-imikevo gele osu' lo amuzo ve lolo' ogo mino gamazi line' nehe ido' inite' ogo molo ine' nehe muki' inite' nene amuzovo' molo minine' ve.
Ne'mine ogo mino kilisimasi've nene foti (40) ogo vavo eze zuho Isilaele' aleve vo ninge-ngedelove lo gelo lulo otavo vine'.
Vo ninge neivo Aigita ve mali'mo Isilaele' ve ma do goloso o-do neivo ningo eze zuho alete molo-do Aigita ve'mo monovo do goloso o-dido' nene golo hizo a'mine Aigita ve nene bele hiline'.
Ido' Mose' aza a'mine Aigita ve bele hiline' nene aza ne'mine okuvo neze zuho do ngu' izelove lo O'moso'mo nimiselave li ningi gililizave lo gelo bele hiline'za ingine ne'mine li ningi gilamani' ve.
Ongo go' lavo vo Isilaele' ve sita' ma lovo nihizasivo ningo kuku holo-ngedo do hongu lo-ngedelesa ti' lo line': Velizo, hamo' zuho nizasine' nenako ge nebele ne gebele nanimu' nilasive lo line'za
eze zuho do goloso o-do minive ne'mo Mose'ni vasa ize-do ti' lo line': Geze nene lelito' gizebo iline lo zaho do ote-gedavo guvekasi ve lolo' ogosa leze gonito' lele'mize nomolane.
Gaza ne'mine ogo aize' Aigita ve ma bele helaine' ma'mino nezesi a'mine'mino nebelelesa nolabe. Olo.
Ne'mine lavo Mose' aza gelo golise Midiani misubou' vo venenga ve gelo minine'. Mino vene' do gipele sita' gidine' ve.
Mino kilisimasi ihe' foti (40) ogo vavo vo Sinae golo ne'mi gizeneu' ebe' hadivelo' neivo za li'nibe hamo' ma mininguti' olo' gulumo ogo neivo a'mine'mi lulou' angelo' ma soto' ogo neivo ningine'.
Ningo a'mine initekumu' nanite' soto' neive lo gelo ninge veveselove lo avito' vine'. Avito' vavo a'mine zauti' Guvelesi ve'mi nolo soto' ogo ti' lo line':

Naza avamote nopo'ni li gelekele' i-nidaa' ani' O'moso'ine nene nouve. Ado' Abalahamule Isakale Zakobole engi' O'moso'ine nene nouve. Ne'mine lavo Mose' aza gelo luvo luvo izo ningelesa ehelele izine'.
Ne'mine ogo neivo Guvelesi ve'mo ti' lo lo-imine': Nolisane' misubo nene do kegeso neni' ve lokuvo neine' nenaze. Gizengalo' nite' nene kuluhizo hulozo.

Neze evene'ne zuho Aigita misubou' nizavo Aigita aleve nete goboni mala' mala' i-ngidi minikevo goloso igi minani' nene ningo agae agae li minani' nene ga'nelo' ogavo giluvoni' ve. Nemu' do ngu' izelove losa lemekuve. Idise gei' nene Aigita misubou' nogimiseluze. Vozo lo lo-imine' ve.

Ee, a'mine ve Mose' nene ingine geze zaho do ote-gedavo guvekasi ve lolo' ogosa leze gonito' lele'mize nomolane li vasa izi-dave ve. Ido' a'mine ve Mose'ni O'moso'mo a'mine Isilaele' aleveti guve'inesi ve ido' do ngu' izelive lolo' ogo minelive lo engita imiseline'. Ado' angelo' ma O'mosolo' medelo mino za ngomou' olo' gulumo o miningu' soto' o-dine' ne'mo nene imiseline' ve.

Imiselavo vo Isilaele' aleve Aigita misubou' minanguti' ngele'mizo Aigita misuboukosi guvo noso ma gulive Gulehe' Noso ve ladokisi ebe' hadive maukisi ngele'mizo novo kilisimasi foti (40) novivo ato ato' suno do minine'.
Eze gamazi lo soto' ilive polohete ma neni' ne'mine ma lengi' zuhouti' do ote-do O'moso'mo imisele-lengedeleseive lo Isilaele' zuho lo-ngimive nene idise luvoni' Mose' ma ne neive.

Avotemote Isilaele' aleve ebe' hadiveu' mulise mili nizavo a'mida Sinae gololo' a'mine ve azasi engikisi angelo' ma O'moso'mi gamazi lo-imivesi nizavo minevo' minevo' lemeni ne'mi gamazi do lemelove lo O'mosolati' dani'.
Ne dani'za avotemote ingine eze gamazi gele damolone li vasa izi-di Aigita misubouko do ti'no voloninako li lu'ine nela milani'.

Ne'mine igi Mose' uvoloho Aloni'ni ti' li li-imani': Mose' nene Aigita misubouti' lele'mizo ave aza vo gopo ihe vo hadene ihe laza gelamunako gaza leze o'mosote gohi lolo' o-ledanivo gomu' molo limivo volone.
Likevo ne gameneu' bulumaka' angale naba avazaha ne'mine lili' igi a'mine avazaha o'moso nene guno gizi imilizani' inite' di igi imi mini engi' a'inedunu' lili' ani' initekumu' ngolize izi minani'.

Ne'mine igi Okulumoku' labana' elaa' ine' inite' muki' o'moso'ine lili' igi ngopo'ni lilisa igi minikevo O'moso'mo ti' igi minilizave lo velepe' izo mehene ngemo hulo-ngidine'. Ne'mine ani' nemu' O'moso'mo line' gamazi nene polohete luhuvo gizani' neu' ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Isilaele' alevekizo, lingine ebe' hadive mau' moni nizavo
kilisimasi foti (40) novivo ize ato ato' bili guno gizika' gizika' igi minani' nene
nenikumu' nehe. Ne nomive.
Lingine mono' numuno ado' seli numuno gele vine' di monani' nene
avazaha o'mosotine Moloko'nisi ido' gohi ma sonohi' avazaha'vesi minine'
Lehana'nisi ngopo'ni lilisa di monani' ma ve.
Lolize izo a'mine inite' ngopo'ni lo minelone li avazaha inite' lili' igi
di minani' nemu' nene na'nise lokuvo Kanaha misubo huli vi
Babelonia misubo nesi huli misubo mauko vi mini mulumo gili minilisave line' ve.
Ido' di minilizave lo O'moso'mo Mose'ni avazaha ogo elebizidi'mine lili' ani' mono' numuno selitunu' gizangu' O'moso'mi gamazi minine' nene avotemote ebe' hadiveu' di minani'.

Ido' me'ninge ngimikevo avotemote zuho engitoti' minani' netesi a'mine seli numuno di minani'. Ido' Zosua' ngele'mizo novivo O'moso'mo gomu' molo ngemo a'mine misubou' minani' zuho ato ato' nene ngeleto do nohulivo a'mine avotemote zuho Kanaha misubo di ti' ani' gameneu' nene a'mine mono' numuno nene di ani' ve. A'mida nene a'mine numuno ha di nizavo mini di igi guvelesi ve naba Davidi' soto' ogo neivosasi nene ha di minani' ve.

Davidi'ni nene O'moso'mo ninge lamine' dani' ve. Ido' O'moso'mo ninge lamine' davo Davidi' aza Zakobo' nga'vo pilemo' zuho gelekele' i-dani' O'moso'inemu' numuno gosoho' do soto' o-delesa gelo ne'mine o-delingumu' nene longo' o-dine'za
O'moso'mi numuno gosoho' gize-dive nene Davidi' gipele Solomoni' gize-dine' ve.
Ee, numuno gize-dine'za Vozeu' ve dize neive O'moso nene evenelite a'inedunu' gizani' numungu' minevo' dovo' osa'mive. O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' ive polohete ma ti' lo gize neine' ma ve:
Guvelesi ve aneza gamazi lo ti' lo laa' neive:
Okulumo' nene neze mo'mosi'ne ve.
Ido' misubo nene gize'ne lise minaa' uvoni' inite' ve.
Nemu' nene numuno nani'mine numuno gizi-nidikevo lisihe' ilive.
Nani holomolo' mine geleloni' o neive
Na'nise'ne a'netunu' Okulumo' Misubo do soto' muluvoni' ma gilamani' nehe
lo gize neine' ve.
Ne'mine lo Setehano' aza kanisole aleve lo-ngemo imine' molo ti' lo line':
Lingine a'manapa igi gamazi gilamaa' igi mini lutine gatine ngolo' lamivo avotinge igi mili iga' ani' suno ma'mine igisa lingine O'moso'mi Sikalahu' lovo i imaa' nave.

Avotinge ingine polohete soto' ani' muki' goboni mili-ngidisa hamokisi ise'ine izi-ngidani' ma nehe. Ne nomive. Ve lisihe' lamine' ma soto' ilive li li soto' igi lave polohete nene ingine ngibili osu' likevo mini lingine a'mine ve lisihe' bili hililizave li biluvaliti a'ningu' milikevo bili hilani' ve.
Ido' O'moso'mo lo hukine' gamazi nene angelole neve nete avotemotine ngimikevo dikevo imine' mili gizebo ilizave lo lengita ogani' neiha lingine gili damani' neive.
Setehano' ti' lo lo-ngemavo gili ngizebolo' goloso molavo ve'ine ingihi gili' lani'za
Setehano'ni lulou' O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo gono davo aza Okulumoku' vokene' ogo ningine'. Ningo O'moso'mi labana've ningo Izesu' O'moso'mo ana hulaa' ida neivo ningo
ti' lo line': Okulumo' ngolo' lavo ve gihile O'mososi mino ana hulaa' ida neivo ningekuve.
Ne'mine lavo gili gamazi goloso nolihe li a'mine gelalone li ga'nido' hiti mini geke' li-di vi abuti' izi gili' lani'.

Abuti' izi ehuso' igi di vi numuno si'mingala huli-di vi eze lihime'vemu' li soto' ave nete geheni huli bili' bili' ilisa ingine oko'nido' inite' ha'na ha'na ne kuluhizi gipe goso've ma minine' gulive Saulo' ne'mi gizeneu' di mulise milani'.
Setehano'ni gehenitunu' nibilavo aza vise lo Guvekasi ve Izesuvo, gaza sikalahu'ne dozo lo
alabuvolo hize mino gamazi naba lo Guvekasi ve mene lihime nidani' nene do minamo hulo-ngedezo lo hiline'.
Bili hilikevo Saulo' a'minemu' lamine' giline' ve.

A'mine gamene nene Izesu' evenele Zelusalemi ebeku' mulise milaa' ave api' igi goboni naba mili-ngidi minani'. Goboni mili-ngidi nizavo hutile' igi vi Zudaia misuboukosi Samalia misuboukisi vi osu' likevo aposolo angise'inevo' Zelusalemi ebeku' minani'.
Ido' mono' gili lamine' ave linge ma Setehano'ni ive nama naba i-di mini galese izi-dani'.
Galese izi-dikevo Saulo' aza Izesu' evenele zuho ngebelo osu' lolosa ogo lovo o ngemo numu'ningu' numu'ningu' dizo vene' vemoho' gelelehe' malelehe' ogo do lemo na'nava numungu' hulo-ngedaa' ine'.
Ne'mine neivo hutile' igi vave ingine hutile' igi vado' vado' vi numudo' namado' Izesu'nimu' gamazi lamine' li-ngimi' ngimi' igi minani'.
Mini Hilipo' Samalia ebeku' lomo vo O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live nene Izesu' ve lo lo-ngemo minine'.
Lo-ngemo neivo evene' muki' nene gamazi line' gili hamo' igi gili lanite' gili ato ato' suno dani' nene ningani'.
Evene' lu'ningu' minani' sikalahu' goloso muki' ngimisele hulavo geke' naba li limi vani'. Ido' lavo evene' gizeho' numuno avesi gebili nabilisi muki' lamine' ani'.
Ne'mine ogavo Samalia ebeku' evene' ngolize naba izani'.
Ido' a'mine ebe' nabau' ve ma minine' gulive Simoni'. Aza gamene ha'na luso ve lolo' ogo mino naza guve'nesi ve nouve lo Samalia aleve muki' go'ine izaa' ine'.

Ne'mine neivo dizi minani' ido' limi minani' nene ezemu' gilavo dizine'. Ado' aza nene O'moso'mi amuzo malehe monovo've ato ato' minanguti' monovo ma ngivile' ogo amuzo molo minine' ve li laa' nani' nene dosa O'moso gele vine' neive li gili lani'.
Ne'mine li gamene ha'na avazaha nite' dangumu' sizaga li'mi vi eze gamazi gili di vi eita gi'mizani'.

Ne'mine igi minani'za Hilipo' aza O'moso'mo gizebo o-ledeline' mamukisi ido' O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live nene Izesu' neingumukisi mono' gamazi lamine' nene lo-ngemavo gili ele'vole' igi vene' vemoho' muki' noso hilani'.
Simoni' asi'vesi gele ele'vole' ogo noso holani'. Holo Hilipoda vo gi'mizo mono Hilipo' ato ato' suno do soto' ine' nene ningo sizaga lo-do minine'.
Samalia aleve O'moso'mi gamazi gili dikevo Zelusalemi ebeku' minani' aposolo nete a'mine gamazi gili Petolongi Zohanengi engita ngimiselikevo vasine'.

Vi heteli a'mine Samalia aleve ingine Guvelesi ve Izesu' gulivelo' noso hilani'za O'moso'mi Sikahalu' olihe engita lemamivo haza minani' nenako nemu' O'moso'mi Sikalahu' engita lemo minelive li O'mosola lasine'.
Ne'mine igi a'ine godo'nido' hitikesivo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' engita lemo ogo minine'.
Aposolo netise a'ine godo'nido' hitikesivo O'moso'mo Sikalahu've ngimine' nene Simoni' ningo engita moni do vo ti' lo lo-ngimine':
Moni ma lengemekuvo dalisize. Nazasi ve ma zahi godololo' a'ne hitelohe. Hitekuvo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ezela lemo minelingumu' a'mine di nizasine' amuzo ma nimilizo line'.
Lavo Petolo' ti' lo lo-imine': O'moso'mo amuzo've haza lehize-ledaa' neine' nene moni hulo dalove lo nolabe. Nemu' gei' monikasi okongasi labuluvo oloseive.
O'moso'mo gei' luka ningine' nene lisihe' amivo dusine' gono nene gei' dalinido' lisihe' amiline' ogako nemu' damolosane.

Gaza lukau' lihime neine' ne'mi gihile ekese'vesi nalinido' mino ido' monovo goloso ne'mo angalo' do gili' lo neivo ogo molo mineline' akalo' nene nane lo ningo gele nouze. Nemu' nene gaza goloso nite' daine' mene hulo luka do velepe' izo lukatunu' gelaine' lihime mene hulo-nedelive lo Guvelesi vela amuzo molo lozo.
Ti' lo lavo Simoni' ti' lo line': Lingine nenikumu' nene lasine' inite' nenita soto' amilive li O'mosola lilizo lo line'.
Aposolo ingine Izesu' monovo've li soto' igi Guvelesi ve'mi gamazi li-ngimi osu' li Zelusalemi ebeta di tine' mili nivi Samalia vetida ebe' mukiku' mono' gamazi lamine' nene li-ngimi'mi vasine'.

Ne'mine nasivo Guvelesi ve'mi angelo' mali'mo Hilipo'ni ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza oto aka ma Zelusalemi ebetoti' eza gahevela lomo vo ebe' ma Gaza nela heteleline' akalo' nene lomo vozo. A'mine aka nene ebe' hadivela viline' akamu' noluve.

Ne'mine lo lo-emavo Hilipo' nene oto lomo vine'. Novivo Etiopia misubou' ve naba zunoku' ma minine' aza ve naba lolo' ogo Etiopia aleveliti vene' guve'inesi vene' naba engi' no'ninguti' Kadake ve lani' ei' ne gelekele' o-do moni heneni'velo' gizebo o-do minaa' ine'. Aza Zelusalemi ebeta O'moso opo'ni lo-emelesa dizidoti'
tine' molo nolemo hosi izelite gelelehe' iga' ani' kalisiu' dizo novo O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' oga' ive polohete Isaia' gizine' gamazi nogativo
Sikalahuli'mo Hilipo'ni ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza volene kalisilo' avito' vozo.
Lavo loti' izo avito' vo polohete Isaia' gizine' gamazi gato neivo gelo ti' lo longo' o-dine': Gamazi nogatane' nene monovo've gele nabe.
Lavo ve mali'mo lo-neme' neme' amiline' nene monovo've nado gelelove lo kalisiu' dizanivo nezesi minelesive lo Hilipo'ni lo-emavo kalisiu' dizavo maka' minasine'.
Mono' godolouti' gamazi gatine' nene ti' lo minine':
Belelone li sipisipi ize di iga' ani' ne'mini ezesi ele'mizi ani'.
Ido' zopovo'ine nihukavo
sipisipi angale ingine no'ine mili geke' lisa'mani' ne'mine ogo
azasi gamazi gopo lamive.
Mulumo ido' ovozo inite' di-di ei' lihime nomido' di lisihe' i-dami
goni' gopo i-dani'.
Misubou' ogo molo iline' gamene nene izi huki-di bilikenako
eze zuho mamu' zaho lo soto' ilive.
Gamazi ti' lo minine' nene gato a'mine ve nene ti' lo Hilipo'ni longo' o-dine': Gaza lo-nemezo. Geleloze. Polohete zahingumu' line' neve. Asi'vemu' line' nehe ve gohi mamu' line' neve.
Lavo Hilipo' nene a'mine mono' godolouti' gamazi apizo lo'mo novo Izesu'nimu' gamazi lamine' imine' molo lo-imine'.
Ne'mine igi akalo' nivi nosolo' ma hetelasine'. Heteli ve naba aza Hilipo'ni lo-imine': Ningezo. Noso me ma neive. Noso holo-nedeliningumu' nene o've loso' ne nomive. Olo.
Ne'mine lo dalavamu' kalisi do minezo lavo kalisi do neivo Hilipokisi ve nabasi makato' nosou' limasine'. Limi Hilipo' ne'mo ve naba nene noso holo-dine'.
Holo-davo nosouti' dizikesivo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo Hilipo'ni geto ele'mizo vavo ve naba aza eze nene gohi ningamine'za akalo' nene olize ize'mo vine'.
Ido' Hilipo' nene Azoto ebeku' soto' ogo gomu' a'mine vine' akala minani' numuno mukiku' nene Izesu'nimu' gamazi lamine' ne lo-ngemeka' ngemeka' o'mo vo Kaesalea numuda vo heteline' ve.
Ido' Saulo' Izesu' evenele zuho ngebelelesa lovo gani lo minine' nene hulamo lovo' mino

eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba neida vo ti' lo lo-imine': Izesu' vine' akalo' e'meti viliza venepe ido' vemohope ma ningo ma na'nava ngemo ngele'mizo Zelusalemi numuda gohi alosuve lo luhuvo nite' gizanivo do vo Damasiko ebeta Zuda veti mono' mulise mini'mi monani' nene ngemelesa noluve.
Lavo luhuvo gizo emavo akalo' do novo Damasiko ebe' do noalitivo Okulumokuti' labana' ma lite' mate' lo ezela lemo hize vodo vodo o-davo
misubolo' lemo pou' lo ongani'. Ongo neivo gamazi ma ti' lo line' giline': Saulo, Saulo, gaza nanitekumu' goboni nomolo-nedane.
Ne'mine lavo aza ti' lo longo' ine': Guvekasi ve, gaza zaho nane. Lavo aza lo-emo ti' line': Gaza goboni molo-nedaa' anive naza Izesu' ma ne noluze.
Otezo. Numuno ebe' nabala dizo vaanivo inite' ogo molo iline' ne'mi gamazi li-gimilisaze line'.
Ido' ezesi maka' vave nene gamazi'vevo' gilaha evene've ne ningami vo'ine vavo gamazi'inesi nomivo ha oti minani'.
Ne'mine i nizavo Saulo' aza misuboloti' oto vele pupuso ningine' nene vele lenge lenge lavo inite' ningamine'. Ningamo neivo eze zogo ve zuholite analo' di Damasiko numuda ele'mizi vani'.
Ne'mine ikevo a'mida gamene setohamo nene vele ningamiline' ogo liti'musovo' izo minavo noso' nitekisi ido' nososi namo haza minine' ve.
Ne'mine ogavo Damasiko numungu' Izesu' gelekele' izipe've ma minine' gulive Anania'. Guvelesi ve a'mine ve'mi velelo' o molo Ananiazo lavo aza Guve'nesi ve, me nouvoni' ve lavo
Guvelesi ve'mo gamazi ma ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza oto aka ma gulive pehe ve lo minida nene vo Zuda' numu'veu' dizo Taliso numudoti' ve ma gulive Saulo'ni ne vise' ogo ningezo. Aza nenita lo neive.
Ne'mine neivo avazaha inite' velelo' o molavo ningine' nene ve ma gulive Anania' nene Saulo' neida dizo ogo vele gohi ninge lamine' ilive lo ana godololo' nohitivo a'mine ve ningive.
Ne'mine lavo Anania' velepe' izo ti' lo lo-imine': Guvekasi ve make, evene' muki' a'mine ve'mi monovo likevo gelekuve. Aza Zelusalemi ebeta geze eveneka zuho ngele'mizo goloso palasa ogo minine' ve.
Ido' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba nete gei' guliveka di nizave nene na'nava ngemo ngele'mizo vilive li li-di luhuvo nite' gizi imikevo ogo mela neive.

Ne'mine lavo Guvelesi ve ne'mo ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza vozo. A'mine ve ne'mo vo neze monovo'ne evene' zuho ato ato' minanikisi ido' guve'inesi ve naba minanikisi ido' Isilaele' aleve engikisi lo soto' o ngemelive lo nenikumu' gono dalive lo do kegese-dekuve.
Ne'mine gono doo nenita gi'mizo neze gulive'ne lo-ngeme ngeme' ilingumu' goboni mili-dikevo mulumo naba geleline' ne'mi monovo elebizelove.

Ne'mine lavo Anania' lemo vo numungu' dizo ana godololo' hito ti' lo lo-imine': Saulo, neze zuho make, Guvetesi ve Izesu' nene gaza mela anido' akalo' soto' o gimive ne'mo veka gohi ninge lamine' oganivo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' lemo lukau' mino gono dalive lo nimiselavo nouve.
Ti' lo nolo-imivo lite' lo inite' ma lihuvolo gele vine' inite' nene vele gihileloti' do'mozavo ninge lamine' ogo otavo mono' noso holo-dine'.
Holo-davo noso' nite' no amuzo dani'.
Ne'mine ogo Saulo' nene Izesu' evenele zuho Damasiko ebeku' inginesi gamene ngomo ma nomino
geto Zuda veliti mono' numu'ningu' dizo Izesu' monovo'vemu' lo-ngemo aza nene mo O'moso'mi gipele ve lo lo soto' o ngimine'.

Ti' lo lo-ngemavo line' gamazi gilave muki' gopo ga'ine gili ti' li lani': Ve meve nene Zelusalemi ebeku' a'mine line' gulive laa' ave ngele'mize goloso palasa oga' ive ma nehe Olo. Aza nene mela ogo galapuso ngemo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabala ngele'mizo volosa ani' ma neive. Nadi' ogosa eze monovo've do velepe' izive.

Ne'mine li lani'za Saulo' aza gamazi nene amuzo molo lo-ngeme'mo vo Izesu' nene do lu' izelive lo O'moso'mo imiselelesa live ve lo do lamine' ogo lo-ngemavo Damasiko ebeku' minani' Zuda ve ingine a'mido' di velepe' izi li-imilizani' gamazi nomivo gopo ga'ine gili minani'.
Gamene ha'na gono do do novivo Zuda ve ingine Saulo'ni bililisa li huki
numuno ebeli'mi gesi gatedo' igi gohoni niingavo Saulo' aza a'mine gamazi nene gelo lavo
eze evenele zuholite holuka' basiketi naba ma di Saulo' a'mingu' lemo minavo basiketilo' nala' izi nalato' di hulika' hulika' igi numuno ebeli'mi lave ha'nalo' Saulo'ni huli-dikevo heta lemo vine'.
Saulo' lemo vo Zelusalemi ebeta heteline'. Hetelo Izesu' evenele zuhou' vo gi'mizelove lo engita gi'mizelesa ine'za ingine Izesu' izipahala lolo' uve line' nene soza lihe li ezemu' ngehelele izine'.

nGehelele izavo Banabasi' ne'mo Saulo'ni do gi'mizo aposolo nizada ele'mizo vo Saulo' Guvelesi ve akalo' ningine' gamazi ido' Damasiko numuda Izesu' monovo danava lovo' kisilevo' ogo lo-ngimine' gamazi nene Banabasi' vetete' ogo lo-ngemavo
inginesi Zelusalemi ebeta mino dizo lemo ogo mino Saulo' aza ehelele izamivo Izesu' monovo danava've lovo' kiselevo' ogo lo-ngemaa' ine'.
Ne'mine ogo Zuda ve linge ma nGiliki gamazi laa' ani' aleve inginesi lo-ngemavo mono' gamazi li volelo' melo' igi gamazi'ine'mo lovo'ningu' ogavo bili hililiza akamu' vise' ani'.
Ti' ikevo Izesu' evenele zuho gili Saulo'ni Kaesalea ebeta ele'mizi vi huli-dikevo vo Taliso ebeta heteline'.

Ne'mine ogavo noso hilave Zudaia misubou' ido' nGalilaia misubou' ido' Samalia misubou' minave engita hongu soto' ine'. Soto' ogavo hongu li mini O'moso'mo amuzo ngemavo O'moso'mi gamazi gili di nizavo O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo hize ele' o-ngedavo mulise'ine naba ine'.
Petolo' aza Izesu' evenele zuho ninge-ngedelesa mone mone o'mo vo Lida ebeta nizadasi lemo vo heteline'.
Hetelo a'mida ve ma gulive Ainea'ni ne ningine'. Aza ve gebili mino holomolo' ongo neivo kilisimasi eiti (8) ogo vine'.
Ningo Petolo' aza ti' lo lo-imine': Aineazo, Izesu' Kilisito' do lamine' o-gedaze. Oto aviliseka gango molozo. Ne'mine lavo lite' lo a'mido' otine'.
Otavo Lida aleve ido' Saloni alevesi ningi lu'ine di velepe' izi Guvelesi vela vi gi'mizani' ve.

Ne'mine ikevo Zopa ebetati' Izesu' evenele zuhouti' vene' ma minine' gulive Tabita'. nGiliki gamaziuti' a'mine Tabita' gulive nene Toloka' ve laa' nave. Aza nene evene' hize ele' o-ngedaa' monovo lamine' mangi o-ngedaa' ine' vene' minine'.
Ne'mine oga' ine'za a'mine gamenelo' nene inite' gize do hiline'. Helavo gonoso nene noso' izi numuno mulolo' lumu gohi ma miningu' di dizi ingi-mikani'.

Lida ebe' nene Zopa ebe' gahevela avita neivo Izesu' evenele zuho ingine Petolo' nela neive lani' nene gili evene' sita' ma ti' li ngimiselikevo ezelo' vasine'. Vi ee, ane'nazo li ti' li li-imasine': Gaza geto otanivo leli' ebetela volone lo nosive.

Likesivo Petolo' gelo otavo engikisi vani'. Vi Petololesi hetelikevo gonoso ingi-mikangu' ele'mizi dizani'. Dizo ningine' nene vene' geto' natokovo' di mulise mili ive nama igi Toloka' velesi mino vene' kolosu ato atoli'mine ongote-ngidine' nene Petolo'ni elebizi osu' lani' ve.

Ti' ikevo Petolo' nene evene' muki' ngimisele hulo heta ogo alabuvolo hizo O'mosola line'. O'moso opo'ni lo osu' lo velepe' izo gonoso nene ti' lo lo-imine': Tabita, otezo. Lavo vele pupuso Petolo'ni ningo oto mito' minine'.
Neivo Petolo' analo' doo do ote-dine'. Ne'mine ogavo Petolo' aza vene' gevonokisi ido' Izesu' evenele zuho lingesi asi lo-ngedavo ikevo Tabita nene gohi vele gizo ha neivo engi' a'ningu' molani'.
Ne'mine ogavo ne'mi guvele Zopa misubou' buu lo vavo evene' Guvelesi vemu' gili ele'vole' ani'.
Ne'mine ikevo Petolo' nene ve ma gulive Simoni' aza ize losuvo do lamine tamine' oga' ive ei' numungu' maka' Zopa ebeku' gamene ha'na minine'.
Kaesalea ebeku' Loma amiliti gizebo ve ma minine' gulive Konelio'. Italia misuboukoti' ami vanu hadeti (100) neti gizebo ve minine'.

Aza O'mosola gelekele' ogo ezela lulo molo minaa' ive minine'. Ido' eze zuhosi a'mine'mine igi minani'. A'mine ve nene Zuda ve nasahili' o-ngedo hize ele' o-ngedo mino O'mosola gamene gamene lo minaa' ine'.
Ne'mine ogo minavo gamene ma tili kiloku ogavo O'moso'mi angelo' mali'mo velelo' o molo neida dizo Konelioo lavo ninge lamine' ine'.

Ningo gisili hizo ningo ehelele izavo ti' lo line': Guvekasi ve make, nadive. Lavo aza ti' lo lo-emo line': O'moso opo'ni laa' naine' ido' evene' nasahili' o-ngedo hize ele' o-ngedaa' naine' ma ne'mi guvele likevo O'moso'mo ningo gelavo lamine' ogave.
Nemu' gaza ve ma Zopa ebeta ngimiselanivo vi ve ma gulive Simoni' ado' gulive gohi ma Petolo' ve lo minine' nene ele'mizi alizave.
Aza abalaho ma Simoni' ize losuvo do lamine tamine' oga' ive'mi numuno ado' guvo noso gahevela neingu' neine' ma ne ele'mizi alizave.
Angelo' aza ti' lo lo-emeko vavo Konelio' nene gelekele' izipe setakisi ido' eze nasahili' o-do minaa' ine' ami ma lulo O'mosola molo minaa' ive nesi asi lo
a'mine gamazi muki' lo-ngemo Zopa ebeta ngimiselavo vani'.
Ingi go' lavo ingine akalo' nivi a'mine ebe' di alitilisa navo holise' Petolo' aza numuno mulolo' O'moso opo'ni lolosa dize minine'.
O'moso opo'ni lo mino noso' nitekumu' isavo a'minemu' lavo gizi vata' i-di nizavo vele gala monavo ongo mino vamu' ti' lo ningine'.
Okulumo' ne godavo inite' ma lavolavo naba gidini minine' ne lumolati' lumolati' di uhu'vizi hulikevo misubola zou zou lo nolimivo ningine'.
A'mine'mi lulou' nene gaha nama ido' gosihe' ido' nama ato ato' gopo' napa minani'.
Ne'mine ogavo ezemu' gamazi ma ti' lo soto' ine': Petoloo, oto ma belo novo.
Lavo Petolo' ti' lo line': O've. Guve'nesi ve make, ne nomive. Ha nitekisi goloso nitekisi mosune' nene gopo nosa'muve.
Ti' lo lavo gamazi ma imine' molo ti' lo line': O'moso'mo inite' mamu' goloso nite' do hulo do lamine' ogavo ma a'mine inite' nene mo ha nite' ve goloso nite' ve lamo ha dalosane.
Ne'mine lo line'za a'mine gamazi li volelo' melo' igi likesivo gamene setohamo ogavo a'mido' geto a'mine inite' nene gelelehe' ogo Okulumoku' dizo vine'.
Dizo vavo Petolo' vamu' ningine' ne'mi monovo vise' ogo ne nani vamu' ninguhe lo gopo gala giline'.

Gopo gala gelo neivo Konelio' ngimiselive ingine Simoni' numu'vemu' longo' longo' i'mi vi di soto' igi gatedo' mini asi li ti' li lani': Simoni' ado' gulive've gohi ma Petolo' ma nene mene numungu' neihe.
Likevo Petolo' aza vamuto' ningine' initekumu' nene gala gelevo' gelevo' ogo neivo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo ti' lo lo-imine'. Gelezo. Ve setohamo geikumu' nave.
Oto lemo gaka muki' gelamo engikisi maka' vilo. Na'nise'ne neve geito' ngimiseluvoni' ve.
Lavo Petolo' aza oto a'mine ve nizada lemo ti' lo line': Lingine vise' nave ne mene nouve. Ido' nanitekumu' nave.

Lavo ingine ti' li lani': Ami ve vanu hadeti (100) neti gizebo ve Konelio' aza ve lamine' mino O'moso gelekele' o-daa' ive Zuda ve mukilite gamangi mili-daa' ave aza nene O'moso'mi angelo' mali'mo lo-emavo gei' nene gele'mizo numu'vela vokunivo Konelio' nene vekati' gamazi gelelove lo limiselavo noune.
Likevo Petolo' ngele'mizo numungu' dizo holomo ngemavo mini ingani'.
Ingi go' lavo oti Petolo' ve Izesu' evenele zuho Zopa misubou' minani' linge masi a'mine avesi maka' vani'.
Akalo' ingi oti Kaesalea ebeta vi hetelani'. Hetelikevo Konelio' eze zuhosi ido' ei' zogo lamine' molavesi do mulise molo-ngedavo Petolo'nimu' gizebo igi nizavo
vi heteli Petolo' numungu' nodizivo Konelio' gubi' ize emo opo'ni line'.
Opo'ni lavo Petolo' aza ti' lo line': Otezo. Nasi haza evene' nouve lo do ote-dine'.
Do ote-davo gamazi li volelo' melo' igi dizi evene' muki' mulise mili nizavo ningo

Petolo' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine Zuda ve leli' monovo mo gili nizave. Lezesi ido' venenga aleve linginesi do volelo' melo' ogo bizo minamolone li li huki nizani' ma neine'za evene' mamu' ne ha nite' ve ido' goloso ve lo lo-ngedamozo lo O'moso'mo nelebizo lo-nemavo gelekuve.
Nemu' lingine asi likevo a'manapa amo okuve. Lingine nanitekumu' asi li-nidave. Ne'mi monovo likevo gelelove.

Lavo Konelio' lo-emo ti' lo line': Inite' ti' ogo soto' o-nididoti' gamene setohamo ogo vave. Naza numu'neu' mino tili kilokulo' O'mosola noluvo ve ma genegana'veloti' silingenge'ne hulo minivo ve'nelo' o molo
ti' lo line': Konelioo, O'mosola laine' ma ido' evene' nasahili' o-ngedo hize ele' o-ngedaa' ane' ma O'moso'mo gele lamine' ogave.

Nemu' gaza Zopa misubouko evene' ngimiselanivo vi Simoni' ado' gulive gohi ma Petolo'ni ma ne ele'mizi alizave. Aza nene abalaho ize losuvo do lamine tamine' oga' iveli'mi numungu' ado' guvo noso gahevela ne neive.

Ti' lo lo-nemavo nemu' nene geto ngimiselekuvo geita vikevo gaza gamazi'ine gelo oganivo mulu'neu' lamine' gelekuve. Idi'nise nene O'moso'mo lo-gidine' gamazi lanivo gelelone lo O'moso'mi velelo' mene do gese' ogo geikumu' gizebo none.
Ne'mine lavo Petolo' api' ogo ti' lo line': O'moso'mo nene evene' muki' leli' okodemu' gilivo ivile' avile' osa'mive. Nemu' nene idi'ne gelekuve.
Numudo' namado' ve engitati' ezemu' opo'ni li gelekele' i-di inite' lisihekovo' igi mili lamine' minave muki' nene ninge lamine' o-ngedaa' neive.
Gamazi ma Isilaele' alevemu' huline' nene Izesu' Kilisito' ne'mo evene' mukiliti Guvetesi ve O'mososi do bize-ledo do hongu lo-ledelive lo lo soto' ogo gamazi lamine' line' nene gili nilisave.
Ido' Zohane' aza noso hilalizave lo lo soto' ogavo nGalilaia misubou' api' ogo Zudaia misubo mukiku' hutile' ogo soto' ine' inite' nene gili nilisave.

A'mine inite' ne'mino neive. O'moso'mo Nasalete ve Izesu' ne'mo gono dalive lo Sikalahu've emo amuzo emavo O'moso'mo ezesi mininako evene' hize ele' o-ngedo Satani'mo ngele'mize goloso palasa ivo minave muki' nene do lamine' o-ngedo minine'.
Aza inite' muki' ine' nene Zudaia misuboukosi Zelusalemi ebekukisi ine' ne la'lisete ninge none' ma ve. Lohoto' zalo' bilani'za
helavo gamene setohamo ogo vavo O'moso'mo gohi do ote-do eze evenele linge nene do ngelebizavo ningani' ve.
Evene' mukilite ningavoba asi eze ningo gamazi lo soto' olosune lo gozopo' aka'milati' do kegese-lidive lelikovo' eze ningo hilinguti' oto neivo ezesi noso' nite' maka' nune' ve.
Ido' leze vetesi ha nonivesi ido' hilavesi gonito' okunivo gonito' gizebo ogo goni' gelelive lo O'moso'mo do kegeso ele'mize molave ve loo lo soto' o ngemo minelone lo O'moso'mo lo huko-lidine' ve.

Ido' O'moso'mi gamazi've li soto' iga' ave mukilite eze gamazi've ne'mine li gizi milani' ma neive: Ezemu' gili amuzo milaliza aleve muki' O'moso'mo Izesungumu' ve lo lihime'ine apase-ngedeleseive lo Petolo' line'.
Petolo' aza mene gamazi nolivo a'mine gamazi gili minavela O'moso'mi Sikalahu' limine'.

Lemavo ato ato' gamaziuti' li O'moso opo'ni nilavo gilani' nenako nemu' nene Izesu'nimu' gili ele'vole' ani' Zuda ve ado' Petolokisi ave ingine O'moso'mo Sikalahu've nene haza heta ato' vesi lehize-ngidingumu' nene upuho' igi O'moso di naba i-dani'. Ne'mine ikevo Petolo' ti' lo line':
O'moso'mi Sikalahu' lelita limine' ma'mino me ve inginelasi lemanako laza nene noso holo-ngedamolone lo o've lo-ngedamolone' ogave. Olo.
Ne'mine lo Izesu' Kilisito' gulivelo' noso hilalo lavo mono' noso hili-ngidikevo ingine gamene ngomosi' Petolo' engita minelive li likevo ngomosi' ma minine' ve.
Ne'mine ogavo aposolokisi Izesu' zuho linge ma Zudaia misubou' minanikisi ingine nene heta ato' vesi O'moso'mi gamazila vi gi'mizani' ne'mi gamazi vogavo gilani'.

Nemu' Petolo' Zelusalemi numuda tine' molo duvavo Izesuda alisa gilave gomu' oko'ine lolovo huko hulo-ngedo O'moso'mi noso've molo-ngedelone li amuzonga laa' ave nete Petolo'ni elemi ti' li li-imani':
Gaza O'moso'mi noso've nomine' alevetida vo engi' a'ninguti' noso' nite' no naine' nene nanimu' nane.
Ne'mine likevo Petolo' aza api' ogo ti' lo lo-ngemo ne'mine ine' aka nene lo ngolo' lo lo-ngimine':

Naza Zopa numuno ebeku' mino O'mosola noluvo madu'ne gopo ogavo mino vamu' ti' ogo ninguve: Inite' ma lavolavo naba gidini minine' nene lumolati' lumolati' di uhu'vizi hulikevo Okulumokuti' zou zou lo nolimivo ninguvoni'. Lemo nouvodo' minavo
a'mine'mi lulou' gisili hizo ninge lamine' uvoni'. Gaha nama ato atoli'mine gize'ine a'ine neine' nominekisi ninguve.
Ne'mine ogo gamazi ma ti' lo soto' o nimine': Petoloo, gaza oto ma belo novo.
Ti' lo soto' o nemavo naza ti' lo luve: O've. Guve'nesi ve make, ne nomive. Ha nitekisi goloso nitekisi nene gopo nosa'muve.
Ne'mine lokuvo Okulumokuti' gamazi imine' molo line': O'moso'mo inite' mamu' goloso nite' do hulo do lamine' ogavo ma a'mine nite' nene ha nite' ve goloso nite' ve lamo ha dalosane.
Ne'mine lo line'za a'mine gamazivo' lo volelo' melo' ogo lokusivo gamene setohamo ogavo a'mine nite' mata' nene gelelehe' ogo ihe' Okulumoku' dizo vine'.
Dizo vavo a'mido' geti evene' setihami Kaesalea numudoti' elese igi minuvoni' numuda hetelani'.
Hetelikevo O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo ti' lo lo-nimine': Gaza geni gebelamivo inginesi vozo. Lavo nazasi ido' Izesu' zuho sikisi nesi vo a'mine ve'mi numungu' dizekunivo

gamazi ti' lo lo-limine': Neni' numu'neu' angelo' mali'mo dizo soto' o nemo ti' lo lo-nimive: Gaza Zopa ebeta evene' ma ngimiselanivo vi Simoni' gulive ado' gohi ma Petolo' ve lo minine' nene ele'mizi ikevo
gezesi ido' gei' numungau' ingani' zuhosi O'moso'mo do lungu' izeline' gamazi lo-lengemavo lamine' ilisave lo line'.
A'mine gamazi lo-nemavo gamazi api' ogo nolo-ngimuvo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' nene gana' lemo lelita minidi'mino inginelasi lemo minine'.
Lemavo ne ningo Guvetesi ve'mo Zohane' aza evene' noso holo-ngedavo haza nosovo' dani'za lingine nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' neve ne dalizave line' gamazi malo' gohi ga'ne gele molo giluve.

Laza Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' okunivo O'moso'mo leze lehize-lidine' inite' Sikalahu've nene a'mine ma'mino engikisi lehize-ngidine' ma ve. Nemu' naza amuzo malehe noosa eze o've lo-delohe.

Ne'mine line' nene gili mulu'ningu' hongu lavo gamazi gohi mo li-dami O'moso opo'ni li ti' li lani': Oho, O'moso'mo gele ngemavo heta ato' vesi lu'ine di velepe' izikevo minivi' minivi' ilizani' ngemeni damenisi O'moso'mo ngeme noloseive li lani'.

Setehano'ni bili hilisa goboni mili-ngidikevo Izesu' zuho hutile' igi vanguti' ingine linge ma Hoinikia misubou' vi minani'. Ido' linge ma sipiu' dizi vi ailani ma gulive Kipilo nela vi minani'. Ido' linge ma vi Adiokia ebeta minani'. Ingine muki' vi mini evene' ato' ma li-ngimami Zuda vevo' Izesu' gamazi've li-ngimani'.
Ne'mine ani'za inginelati' ve linge ma Kipilo vesi Kilene vesi ingine Adiokia ebeku' vi mini nGiliki aleve nene Guvetesi ve Izesu'nimu' gamazi lamine' nene li-ngimani'.
Nili-ngimavo O'moso inginesi mino amuzo ngemavo evene' muki' engi' gamazi gili Guvetesi vemu' gili ele'vole' igi ezela vi gi'mizani'.
Engikumu' nene gamazi lamine' ma vo Izesu' zuho Zelusalemi ebeku' mulise milaa' aveti ga'ningu' ogavo Banabasi'ni a'mine Adiokia numuno ebeta imiselani'.
Imiselikevo vo hetelo O'moso'mo ise'ine izo do lamine' o-ngidine' nene ningo gelo mulunou' lamine' gelo Guvelesi vela lu'ine mili ele'vole' ilizave lo ga'ine dani'.

Ido' Banabasi' ne'mine ine' nene aza ve lamine' mino O'mosomu' amuzo molo gele ele'vole' ogavo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' lulou' gono do minaa' ine' nenako nemu' nene ne'mine ine' ve. Ido' evene' muki' gamazi've gili Guvelesi vela vi gi'mizani'.
Ne'mine ikevo Banabasi' vo Saulo'ni vise' ogo ningelesa Taliso ebeku' vine'.

Vo ningo Adiokia ebeta ele'mizo ogavo Izesu' zuho di mulise mili mini evene' muki' mono' apizi ngimi ngimi' igi nizasivo kilisimasi hamo' vine'. Ido' Adiokia ebeku' gana' api' igi Izesu' evenele zuho mamu' gulive'ine mili Kilisiteni aleve ve lani'.
A'mine gamene neu' O'moso'mi veleuti' gamazi li soto' ave polohete linge ma Zelusalemi numudati' lomi Adiokia ebeta vi hetelani'.

Heteli engikuti' ve ma gulive Agabo'ni nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo do ote-davo misubo mukiku' ga'na naba soto' olosa neivo ne'mi gamazi lo-ngimine'. Ido' alinge' Kalaudio' Loma veti guve'inesi ve naba lolo' ogo neivo a'mine ga'na naba soto' ilingumu' line' gamazi gihile izine'.

Lo-ngemavo gili Izesu' evenele zuho ma ga'ine gili ti' li gamazi di hamo' igi lani': Laza hamo' hamo' ogo inite' neine' votigilelo' hulo-ngedo leze zuho Zudaia misubou' minave noso' nite' nevo'mine ngemelone li lani'.
Ido' laado' igi a'mine inite' nene Banabasikisi Saulokisi di vi mono' gizebo vetine ngimilisive li ngimiselikevo vasine'.
A'mine gameneu' guvelesi ve naba ma minine' gulive Helode' aza Izesu' zuho linge ma ne lovo zatuho' o ngemo
ei' lavo Zohane' uvoloho Zakobo'ni luvono gitani'.

Ne'mine ikevo Zuda ve mulu'ningu' lamine' gilani' nene ningo gohi lavo O'moso'mo Zuda veti avo'ningine ise'ine izingumu' gili mini lulu izamine' beleti naa' ani' holiseku' nene Petolo'ni nala' numungu' huli-dani'.

A'mine holise' osu' lavo Zuda veti a'ningu' molokuvo goni' i-di bililizave lo gelo analo' do nala' numungu' ele'mize molo pilisi ve sita've sita'velite gizebo i-dika' i-dika' ilizave lo pilisi ve sigisitini (16) ngele'mize molani'.
Ne'mine ogavo Petolo' nene nala' numungu' neivo gizebo i-di nizavo Izesu' evenele zuho ezemu' O'mosola amuzo mili li minani'.

Helode' aza Petolo'ni do eveneliti a'ningu' ngemelesa ine' gamene alitavo a'mine holuka' nene Petolo' ana helala nene di pilisi ve mali'mi anasi di hamo' igi senitunu' izi-ngidi ido' ana helala nene a'mine'mine igi pilisi ve mali'mi anasi di hamo' igi izi-ngidani'. Ne'mine iki ingi nizavo pilisi ve linge ma nala' numuno'mi gatedo' gizebo igi minani'.

Ti' igi nizavo Guvelesi ve'mi angelo' mali'mo lite' mate' lo soto' neivo numuno lulou' labana' iline'. Ne'mine ogavo angelo' aza Petolo'ni gapilelo' izo u'muko' o-do ti' lo line': Geto otezo. Lavo Petolo' analoti' seni ne apase'mozavo
angeloli'mo ti' lo lo-imine': Letika do izezo. Ido' gizengalo' nite' do izezo. Lavo ne'mine ogavo ti' lo line': Okongalo' inite' ha'na ma do izo ne'meto ano.
Lavo do izo angelo' ogo molo ine' nene ningo gele lamine' amo haza vamu' noninguhe lo gelo e'meto vine'.

Vi pilisi ve gizebo igi nizavo ngivile' iki pilisi ve gohi ma a'mine'mine igi gizebo igi nizavo a'minesi ngivile' igi gateni naba ainidunu' lili' ani' a'mingu' ebe' nabala limi vaa' ani' gatedokisi hetelikesivo a'mine akahe ne'mo asi've engikumu' si'zeko vavo limi aka hamo' huliki neloti' lite' lo angelo' nene Petolo'ni hulo-do vo haha ine'.

Ido' vo haha ogavo Petolo' galau' ngolo' lavo ti' lo giline': Naza Guvelesi ve'mo angelo've imiselo Helode' anauti' apase-nedo Zuda vete i-nidilisa gilanguti' kuluhize-nidine' nene gihile izavo idise gelekuve.
Ti' lo ningo gelo Zohane' ado' gulive naba Maleko' ve lo minine' ne'mi izeleho Malia' numu'veu' vo heteline'. A'mingu' evene' muki' di gese' igi mini O'mosola li minani'.
Li minangu' vo hetelo aza gatedo' vo okoho' izavo gelekele' alu ma minine' gulive Loda' nene akahe si'ze-delesa ogo
Petolo' nolo gelo mulunou' lamine' gelo akahe si'zamo velepe' izo loti' izo vo evene' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Petolo' nene gatedo' omo neive.
Ne'mine lo lo-ngemavo ingine ti' li lani': Dudu gamazi nolabe. Likevoo o've. Lamine' noluve lo amuzo molo lavo angelo've noloseive li lani'.
Ne'mine nilavo Petolo' gatedo' okoho' ha izo neivo akahe si'zi eze ningi vo'ine vavo upuho' goloso ani'.

Ne'mine ikevo anatunu' avazaha ogo gamazi o've lo-ngedo Guvelesi ve'mo nala' numunguti' kuluhize-dine' monovo lo-ngemo mene gamazi nene Zakobokisi leze zuho linge masi li-ngimilo lo velepe' izo ebe' mala vine'.
Vavo go' lavo pilisi ve Petolo'ni nadi' i-dave li gopo ga'ine gili angise'ine no'ningu' gamazi muki' li volelo' melo' ani' ve.

Ne'mine ikevo Helode' vise' ilizave lavo vise' igi igi di soto' amavo Petolo'ni gizebo ani' pilisi ve longo' minge' o-ngedo ngibili huli huli' ilizave lo lo huko-ngidine'. Lo huko-ngedo Zudaia misubo hulo lemo Kaesalea ebeku' vo minine'.

A'mine gamene neu' Tilo alevemukisi ido' Sidoni alevemukisi Helode' izebolo' goloso molavo lovo gize ngimine'. Lovo gize ngemavo a'mine misubo ne'mi me'ninge nete gamazi'ine di hamo' igi ingine zuho noso' inite'ine guvelesi ve'mi misuboloti' meni hizi ni minani' nenako nemu' nene vi gomu' lele'mize lamine' ilingumu' ve li Helode' oko'nolo' niteto' gizebo o-daa' ive ma gulive Bilasito'ni gala di Helode' neida dizi igi zogo imi mulunou' do hongu liline' gamazi li-imani' ve.
Ne'mine ikevo Helode' aza gamene molani' gamene alitavo ei' guvelesi ve'mo ngolaa' ine' inite' nene do ngolo mino guvelesi ve'mo minaa' ine' mo'mosi'velo' mino eze zuho gamazi lo-ngimine'.
Nolo-ngimivo evene' ingine eveneli'mo lamive. O'mosoli'mo line' ma ve li gamazi naba lani'.
Ne'mine likevo aza nene neni' nopo'ni lami O'mosovo' opo'ni lilo lamivo O'moso'mi angeloli'mo belavo oko'no ginine hizavo hiline' ve.
Ido' O'moso'mi gamazi ne'mo hutile' ogo hilulu' pilulu' izo vine'.
Zelusalemi ebeta gono ngimine' nene di osu' li Banabasiki Sauloki Adiokia ebeta tine' mili vilisa niigi Zohane' ado' gulive naba Maleko' ve lo mininekisi nene ele'mizi vasine' ve.

Izesu' evenele zuho ma Adiokia ebeku' minani' nete vovo'ningu' O'moso'mi gamazi li soto' igi apizi ngimaa' ave linge minani' nene gulive'ine Banabasi' ve ido' Simeoni' ado' gulive gohi ma Gonobu' ve lo minine' nesi ido' Lukio' aza Kilene ebekuti' ve ido' Manaeni' aza guvelesi ve Helodekisi uvoloho akunolo gili gana gana naba asive nesi ido' Saulokisi ve.

A'mine ve nete monokumu' noso' nite' malise igi mini O'moso opo'ni li gono've nidavo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Banabasiki Sauloki gono dalisive lo do nenita uvongumu' nene a'mine ve ne di kegesi mili-nidilo.
Lavo noso' nite' malise igi O'mosola li mini a'ine godo'nido' hiti di kegesi-ngidi ngimiselikevo vasine'.
Ingine O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo ngimiselavo Seleukia ebeta lomi vi sipiu' dizi Kipilo ailaniu' vasine'.

Kipilo ailaniu' vi heteli a'midaa minine' ebe' Salami neu' vi Zuda veti mono' numuno minido' minido' O'moso'mi gamazi li soto' igi li-ngimasine'. Ido' ne'mine igi nizasivo Zohane' ado' gulive've gohi ma Maleko' ve lo minine' ne'mo gelekele' o-ngedo hize ele' o-ngedo minine'.
Ne'mine igi Salami ebe' huli Kipilo ailani lumola ivile' igi vi Pahosi ebeku' hetelani'.

Heteli nela Zuda ve ma aza mino soza gamazi lo soto' ogo minaa' ive ma gulive Bala Izesu' ve lo minine' ma ningani'. A'mine ve nene Kipilo aleveti guve'inesi ve naba gulive Selegio' Paulo' aza galau' vevese minine' minani' neivo maka' minasine'. Guvelesi ve Selegio' aza Banabasingi Saulongi elese molo ngemo O'moso'mi gamazi gelelesa longo' longo' o-ngidine'.

Ne'mine ogavo a'mine ve nene Elimasi' (mene gulive'mi monovo ti' lo neive: Ani' amani' ogo minaa' ive ve.) A'mine ve aza engi' gamazi lasido' nene guvelesi ve'mo gele ele'vole' olosa giline' nene hulilive lo a'mine gamazilo' e'menga lo-ngimine'.
Ne'mine ine'za Saulo' gulive gosoho' Paulo' ve lo minine' nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu've ne'mo lulou' gono davo vonu' gisili hize-de mino

ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza Satani'mi gipele mino soza saza lo evene' go'ine gohi izo lisihe' amani' inite' mata' ogo inite' lamine' muki' lovo o-ngemaa' anive gaza Guvelesi ve'mi aka lisihe' nene do gopo' napa' oga' naine' nene alo' hulamane.

Nemu' Guvelesi ve'mo amuzolotunu' gebelavo veka likavo gamene ma alingu' holi'mi labanala ma ningamo haza minelesane. Nolivo noline' velesi lite' lo limuso ne'mine gele vine' ne'mo velelo' liti'muso izavo analo' di monilizavemu' vise' ogo minine'.
Ne'mine ogavo soto' ine' inite' ningo misubou' veti guvelesi ve aza Guvelesi ve'mi monokumu' giline' gasava hizavo gele ele'vole' ine'.
Paulo' ve ido' ezesi monavesi Pahosi ebe' huli sipiu' dizi Pamahilia misubou' Pelega ebeta vi hetelani'. Heteli Zohane' aza hulo-ngedo Zelusalemi numuda do tine' molo vine'.
Ne'mine ogavo ingine Pelega ebe' huli vi Pisidia misubo'mi gahevela Adiokia ebeta nene vi hetelasine'. Heteli mini holiseku' nene Zuda veti mono' numungu' dizi minasine'.

Nizasivo Mose' gizine' gamaziuti' gati O'moso'mi gamazi li soto' iga' ave polohetelite gizikani' gamazi mauti' gati mono' gizebo ve ingine elese mili ngimi ti' li li-ngimani': Zogole zuho matise evene' leze mulude do gili' lo-ledeline' gamazi lengita ma neivo ma ma li-limilizo.
Ti' li li-ngimikevo Paulo' aza oto elese' iki minilizave lo ana do oto avazaha ogo ti' lo line':
Isilaele' alevesi ido' evene' linge ma O'mosomu' golise gilaa' nani' masi lingine gililo.

O'moso aza Isilaele' aleve lezemu' eze zuho minilizave lo avotemotine do kegese-ngedo Aigita misubouko venenga ve gili nizavo do amuzo molo-ngedo neivo hizi hutile' ani'. Ne'mine ikevo goboni mili-ngidi minanguti' amuzo molo ngele'mizo ebe' hadivelo' novivo
ingine goloso nite' i'mi vangumu' gosele' belamivo gizebo o-ngede'mo vo neivo kilisimasi foti (40) ogo vine'.

Ne'mine ogo Kanaha misubou' evene' gulive'ine ato atokisi zuho seveni nene ngebele gese' ogo engi' misubo'ine nene avotemotine ize' molo ngemavo go'nido' go'nido' di nizavo kilisimasi fo hadeti fifti (450) ogo vine'.
Ogo vavo gizebo ve do kegese-ngedo hulo-ngedavo mini'mi nivavo alinge' O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' ilive Samuveli soto' ine'.

Soto' ogo neivo avotemote ingine guvelesi ve naba lolo' ili ve mamu' longo' ikevo O'moso'mo Benizamini' a'vopilemo' zuhouti' ve ma Kisi' gipele Saulo'ni do soto' o-ngedavo Saulo' aza guve'inesi ve lolo' ogo neivo Kilisimasi foti (40) ogo vine'.

Alinge' nene Saulo'ni do hulo-do Davidi'ni do soto' ogo guve'inesi ve lolo' ogo minelive lo do ngimine'. Ido' ezemu' ti' lo line': Naza Zesai' gipele Davidi' nene neni' vo'nelo' minive minavo ninguvoni' ve. Aza na'nise giluvodo' inite' ogo molo oloseive lo line'.
Ido' O'moso'mo Davidi'ni lo huko-dine' gamazi ma do gihile izo a'mine ve'mi a'vopilemo' zuhouti' ve ma Izesu'ni nene Isilaele' aleve do lu' izelive minelive lo ele'mize molani'.
Ido' Izesu' nene olihe gono've api' ogo damivo Zohane' aza gomu' ogo lo soto' ogo Isilaele' alevekizo, lingine lutine di velepe' izi lihimetine huli mono' noso hilalizave lo lo-limine'.

Ti' lo lo-lemo gono've do pelelesa noogo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine nenikumu' gili O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live nehe li laa' ani' ma nene o've naza a'mine ve ne nomuve. Eze nene alinge' nave. Naza lemo minuvoni' a'nemineli'mine eze dizo minive'mi gizeneloti' suu've nene ngelo apase hulo-delohe lo line'.
Zogone zuhokizo, Abalahamu' a'vopilemo' mate, ido' lingine heta ve mini O'mosomu' golise gili ezela gi'mizi minaa' nani' nene leze do lu' izelive lo mene gamazi lelikumu' ogo huline' ma ve.

Zelusalemi alevesi engi' gizebo ve'inesi Izesu' monovo ningi gili lamine' ami O'moso'mi gamazi li soto' iga' ave polohetelite gizikani' gamazi nene holise' mukiku' gataa' nani' nesi gili lamine' ami Izesu'ni gonito' ele'mizi mili helelive lani' ne'mo a'mine gizikani' gamazi di gihile izani'.
Lihime've nomivo ingine heleline' ne'mi monovo ma di soto' milamani'za hazamu' Pilatoda ti' li lani': Gaza bililo lanivo amilite bililizave lani'.
Ne'mine igi mono' godolou' ne'mine i-dilizave li ezemu' gamazi gizi nizani' malo' nene i-dikevo helavo lohoto' zaloti' apasi di galese izi-dani'za
O'moso'mo hilave engi' mulise'ninguti' do ote-dine'.

Do ote-davo engita soto' oka' oka' ivo ezesi maka' nGalilaia misubolati' duvi Zelusalemi ebeku' vi minave eze ningika' ningika' igi nizavo gamene muki' ine'. Ido' a'mine ve nete ningangumu' idisesi eze gamazi've li soto' igi evene' li-ngimaa' nave.

Li-ngimaa' navo lazasi gamazi lamine' mene lo-lengemo O'moso'mo Izesu'ni do ote-do avotemotinemu' gamazi lo huko lo-ngidine' nene nga'vopilemo' lelikumu' ogo mo do gihile izani' ma ve losa nemu' nolo-lingimusive. Do ote-dingumu' nene mono' godolou' Sam naba tu neu' ti' lo gize neine' ma neive:
Idise naza gei' maho lolo' ogo neni' gipe'ne gei' nene nane lo
do ote-giduvoni' ve.
Ido' Izesu'ni hilinguti' do ote-davo a'minguko gohi tine' molo vo gelesamiline' o neive. Nemu' nene O'moso'mo line' gamazi ma ti' lo gize neive:
Ele'vole' gamazi lo
Davidi'ni lo huko lo-duvoni' inite' lamine' nene lehize-lengedelesa nouve.
Nemu' ne gamazi gohi ma Davidi' aza O'mosomu' line' mene ti' lo neive:
Lu'ne geita molo gelekele' o-giduve neze hulo-nedanivo
oko'ne geleso unuvo amoloseive.
Davidi'nimu' mo gele none. Aza minine' gameneu' O'mosomu' ogo gelekele' o emo gono gamazi lo-dine' nene do osu' lo helavo avolomotine galese izi-ngidado' galese izi-dikevo oko'no geleso unuvo ine'za
geleso unuvo amive nene zaho neve. O'moso'mo do ote-dive ma ve.

Neze zuhokizo, nemu' lo-lengemeloze. Gili guni i minilo. A'mine ve'mo aka've do soto' ine' mamu' nene O'moso'mo lihimetine hulo-lengedelive lo gamazi've nolo-lingimusive. Ido' a'mine ve Izesu'nimu' gili ele'vole' ilizani' nene lihimetine muki' Mose' lou' gamazi gizingu' gilite-lengedamiline' o minine' nene O'moso'mo gilite osu' lo-lengedeleseive.

Ehe, O'moso'mi gamazi li soto' iga' ave polohetelite gizani' gamazi mau' gize neine' nene lengita soto' ogo gihile izalive lo nolo-lingimusize. Gizebo igi minilo. O'moso'mo line' gamazi ma ti' lo gize neive:
Agae, neni' gono'nemu' nene ha nite' ve li gilaa' nave lingine gililo.
Lingine nizani' gameneu' mene amebe gono dalosuvonako
a'minemu' nene li ngolo' li li-lingimilizanikisi
a'minemu' nene ngeli gili ele'vole' amilizani' nenako
nemu' nene lengehelele izivo mini sizaga li hili minilo lo gize neine' ma ve.
Paulo' ne'mine lavoo mono' numunguti' limi nasivo evene' nete holise' mau' nene igi idise lasine' initekumu' ihe' li-limilisine' nehe li longo' i-ngidani'.

Ido' evene' mono' numunguti' limi hutile' igi nivi Zuda ve linge masi ido' Zuda veti monoku' vi hilave linge masi evene' muki' Paulongi Banabasingi nge'meti nivavo ingine O'moso'mi mulumo nasahiliku' nene ele'vole' igi minilizave li ga'ine dasine'.
Ne'mine ikevo holise' mau' ebe' me'ninge ngomosi' ma numuda nizavo vai' goloso O'moso'mi gamazi gililisa ani'.

Vai' goloso ikevo Zuda ve nete evene' muki' ani' ningi ve'ine mulolo' ingihi Paulongi ido' Banabasingi lukehe naba ngibili Paulo' line' gamazi nesi ataize li di'mi limi-ngidi divi' ledivika li minani'.

Divi' ledivika li minikevo Pauloki Banabasiki gamazi livi' kiselivi' igi ti' li lasine': Lingine Zuda vemu' gomu' api' ogo O'moso'mi gamazi lo-lengemelone' o neivosa lo-lingimune'za lingine a'mine gamazi vasa izi hulikenako lingine O'moso'mo minevo' minevo' lengemeni dameni nene o've lo lengemamili inite' igi minani' nene langise idise di soto' ikeve. Nemu' nene laza heta ato' vela volosusive.
Nemu' nene Guvelesi ve'mo ti' lo lo leme neine' ve:
Gaza nene
heta ato' veliti lamu livi'ine ne'mine lolo' ogo mineline lo
gele'mize molokuve.
Ado' misubo lumola minave nesi lukuvo nalizani' aka nene gei' ngelebizeline lo
gele'mize molokuve.

Ti' li likesivo heta ato' ve ingine gili mulu'ningu' lamine' gili O'moso'mi gamazi'vemu' opo'ni li sizaga li-dani'. Ne'mine ikevo minevo' minevo' ngemenisi minilizave lo O'moso'mo gelo do gizeka' ine' aleve ingine gili ele'vole' ani'.
Ne'mine ikevo a'mine misubou' nene Guvelesi ve'mi gamazi ne'mo buu lo monine'.

Buu lo monine'za Zuda ve ingine a'mine ebeku' vene' ma dizi mini Zuda veti mono' numungu' mono' gili minani' nesi ve naba minanikisi mulu'ningu' hizikevo Paulongi Banabasingi gobonga li-ngidi numuno ebe'ninguti' ngimiseli hulikevo vasine'.
Vilisa nivi monovo'ine gililizave li avazaha igi hungo' mili gize'nidoti' u'musupo nene okoho' izi huli Ikonio ebeta vasine'.
Nivasivo Izesu' evenele zuho Adiokia ebeku' minani' ingine O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo lu'ningu' gono do neivo mulu'ningu' lamine' gili ngolize izi minani'.
Ne'mine ikevo Ikonio ebeku' heteli a'mine'mine igi Zuda veti mono' numungu' dizi mono' lasine'. Ne'mine lasingumu' evene' mulise naba Zuda vesi nGiliki aleve netesi gili ngeho lani'.
Ne'mine ani'za Zuda ve linge ma ve setalitisi gamazi gili hulave nete a'minguti' ve linge maliti mulu'ningu' hizi guvelesi ve'mi evenele zuhomu' gili goloso ilizave li ga'ine dani'.

Ne'mine ikevo nemu' nene Paulokisi Banabasikisi gamene ha'na a'mida ha mini ngehelele izamivo Guvelesi ve'mo nasahili' o-ledo do lu' izaa' neine' gamazi nene livi kiselivi' igi li-ngimi' ngimi' igi minasine'. Ne'mine igi nizasivo Guvelesi ve'mo mangi o-ledo do lu' izaa' neine' evene' gilavo gihile izeleseive lo Guvelesi ve'mo a'mine lasine' gamazi hize ele' ogo amuzo ngemavo ingine oso' amoso' nite' ato' ato' di soto' asine'.
Ne'mine ikesivo a'mine ebe' nabalo' minani' aleve ingine ho'li lingela Zuda vetida gi'mizekevo lingela nene aposolo setata vi gi'mizani'.
Ne'mine ikevo alinge' nene misubo me'ningesi Zuda vesi ido' engi' gizebo vesi di nubo igi aposolo divi ledivi' igi geheni hulo hulo' ogo ngebelelone li li hukani'.
Li hukikevo Pauloki Banabasiki a'mine gamazi gili golise vi Likaionia ebe' nabau' Lisitila numuda ido' Delebe numuda ido' a'mida numuno ngomo ngomo mine'mo moningu' nesi vi
mono' gamazi lamine' nene li-ngimika' li-ngimika' igi moni minasine'.
Ido' Lisitila numuda ve ma gizene hela hela gebili do minine'. Ido' aza nene izeleho gana' gidinguti' gizene goloso o vine' gedavo aka monamo hu'mo hu'mo ogo minaa' ine'
Neivo Paulo' mono' nolivo nogilivo Paulo' aza gisili hizo vonu' belo ningine' nene a'mine ve ne'mo O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo neivo lamine' ozo lokuvo lamine' ilive lo ningo giline'.
Ne'mine lo gelo gamazi naba lo ti' lo lo-imine': Gaza ote pehe lo minezo. Ti' lo lavo upuho' ogo oto aka mone mone ine'.
Ne'mine ogavo evene' muki' nete Paulo' ine' inite' ne ningi engi' Likaionia aleveti gamazi'ninguti' gamazi naba li ti' li lani': O'mosolitise evene' oko'ine di otuhi lelita limi nizasive li lani'.

Banabasi'nimu' engi' o'moso nite' mali'mi gulive li Zeuse' ve li mili-dani'. Ido' Paulo' aza gamazi gamazi laa' ive mininako leli' O'moso nite' Heleme' oga' ine' ne'mine azasi neive li gulive a'mido' Heleme' ve li mili-dani'.

Ne'mine ikevo ebe' naba ne'mi velela Zeuse'nimu' ve li mono' numuno gizikani' ma minine'. A'minguti' Zeuse'ni mabanuho gizo emaa' ive aza gonolise inite' lolo' ogo bulumaka' izeliti luvo'ningu' molo-ngedo ebe' nabali'mi gatedo' do do vo azasi evene' mukikisi mabanuho gize ngemelone li nilavo

aposolo seta' Pauloki Banabasiki ingine gili upuho' goloso igi inite' lolo' ilizani' nene goloso nite' ve li evene' ningi gililisave li genegana'ine di boloti loti' izi vi evene' mulise nizangu' heteli geke' li

ti' li lasine': Vekizo, lingine nanitekumu' ne'mine ilisa nave. Laza nene lingine gidini haza evene' nosive. Lingine nene o'mosotine soza sazali'mine haza nite' nene mehedine ngimi mine'mo dizovo' minaa' neine' O'moso ezela vi gi'mizilizave lo mene gamazi lamine' nene nolo-lingimusive. Aza a'mine O'moso nene Okulumo' misubo ido' guvo noso ido' muki' inite' neine' nene do soto' molani' ve.
Gamene gala'mudati' evene' linge muki' ingine ani' amani' i'mi nidizavo gele ngemavo engi' lu'ine'mo lido' aka ato ato' di soto' mili'mi dizani'.

Lamine' nenako aza nene eze monovo ngelebizamo haza minine' nevoba eze monovo ningilizave lo do lamine' o-lengedo Okulumokuti' nene goline gamenesi noso' nite' vai' laa' ine' gamenesi lingimivo nivi' nivi' igi mini muludingu' lamine' gilaa' nave.
Ne'mine lasine'za nesi nene evene' nete mabanuho gizi ngimilisa ha amuzo mili gili minikevo ge'nebe goloso igi o'ove li-ngidikesivo gili ngimi mabanuho gizi ngimamani' ve.

Ne'mine ani'za Zuda ve ma Adiokia ebekutikisi ido' Ikonio ebekutikisi igi evene' muki' go'ine izikevo Paulo'ni geheni huli huli' igi bilikevo helavo mo hilihe li numunguti' gelelehe' igi di heta limi si'mingala huli-dani'.
Huli-dani'za Izesu' evenele zuholite igi hize vodo vodo i-dikevo oto vo numuno nabau' dizine'. Dizo ongo go' lavo Banabasikisi Delebe numuno ebeku' vasine'.

Vi a'mine ebeku' minani' aleve mono' gamazi lamine' nene li-ngimikesivo evene' muki' gili di Izesu' evenele zuho lili' ani'. Ne'mine ikevo asine' akala tine' mili vi Lisitila ebeta vi Ikonio ebeta vi Adiokia ebeta vi hetelasine'.

Nivi Izesu' evenele zuho a'mine ebeku' mini'mi vani' nene monoku' amuzo mili minilizave li ga'ine di'mi di'mi moni igi lu'ine di amuzo mili-ngidi ti' li li-ngimasine': Mulumo nite' muki' soto' o lemelido' o neine' nenako a'mine mulumo nite' gehelonidotikovo' nene O'moso'mo gizebo o neine' ebeku' mo'mosite dalosune li li-ngimasine'.

Ne'mine igi Izesu' evenele zuho mulise mili'mi monangu' numudo' numudo' evene' linge ma di kegesi gizebo ve'ine minilizave li ngele'mize mili'mi vi monokumu' gili noso' nite' malise igi O'mosola li Guvelesi vemu' gili ele'vole' ikeze nemu' aza gizebo o-lingidivo li lasine' ve.
Ne'mine igi Pisidia misubo huli vi Pamahilia misubouko hetelasine'.
Heteli Pelega ebeku' mono' li-ngimi Atalia ebeta limi vasine'.

Limi heteli sipiu' dizi a'mingu' Adiokia ebeta hetelasine'. Ado' a'mine di osu' lasine' mono' gono nene olihe api' igi dalisa nasivo Izesu' evenele nete O'mosola li a'mine gono nidasivo O'moso'mo nasahili' o-ngedo hize ele' o-ngedo minelive li a'mine gonou' ngimiselani' ebeta igi hetelasine'.

Ido' a'mido' igi heteli Izesu' evenele zuho di mulise mili-ngidi O'moso'mo hize ele' o-ngidivo gono dasine' gamazi li-ngimi ido' O'moso'mo akahe si'ze-ngedavo heta ato' ve ma Izesu'nimu' gili ele'vole' ani' nemu' vetete' igi li-ngimi osu' lasine'.
Ne'mine igi Izesu' evenele zuhosi mini gamene ha'na minasine' ve.

Zudaia misuboukoti' ve linge ma ingine Adiokia ebeta limi Izesu' evenele zuho ti' li li-ngimi ngimi' igi minani': Lingine Mose' lo huko-lidine' ma'mine igi O'moso'mi noso mili okodine lolovo huki hulamilizani' nene O'moso'mo do lungu' izamoloseive.

A'mine lani' gamazi nene gili Pauloki Banabasiki a'mine vesi gamazi languti' lovo'ningu' ogavo lovo lolize naba hizani'. Ne'mine ogavo Pauloki Banabasiki ido' engikuti' ve linge masi Zelusalemi numuda duvikevo a'mine gamazimu' nene aposolokisi ido' gizebo ve lingesi ingine engi' ve'ninguti' gamazi lilizani' gililizave li gamazi di hamo' ani'.

Gamazi di hamo' igi Izesuda gi'mizi mulise milaa' ani' aleve ingine ngimiselikevo vani'. Nivi heta ato' ve lu'ine di velepe' izi O'mosola gi'mizani' gamazi nene vetete' igi Hoinikia misuboukisi ido' Samalia misuboukisi li-ngimikevo Izesu' zuho mukilite gili ngolize izi minani'.

Ido' ne'mine ikevo Paulolesi vi Zelusalemi numuda hetelani'. Hetelikevo Izesu' evenele mulisesi gizebo ve'inesi ido' aposolokisi mulise mili lamine' ikeve li-ngidikevo Pauloki Banabasiki ingine O'moso'mo hize ele' o-ngidivo gono dasine' gamazi nene vetete' igi li-ngimasine'.

Li-ngimikesivo Halisaio' zuhouti' evene' linge ma Izesuda gi'mizi minavelite oti ti' li lani': A'mine gono nidasivo heta ato' ve Izesu'nimu' gili ele'vole' ani' ingine O'moso'mi noso mili oko'ine lolovo huki hulilizani' o neive. Ido' Mose' lou' gamazi lo huko-lidine' nene gili dalizave lo lo-ngemelone' o neive li lani'.
Likevo aposolokisi gizebo vesi a'mine gamazimu' lo volelo' melo' ogo lolone li di gese' ani'.

Di gese' igi li volelo' melo' igi gamazi muki' likevo Petolo' oto ti' lo lo-ngimine': Vekizo, lingine neze zuho gililo. Evene' heta ato' ve Izesu' gamazi lamine' mene neni' ve'neti' gilii gili ele'vole' ilizave lo leli' vovoteti' O'moso'mo gozopo' gamene gala'mudati' vomine lingine zuho neni' nele'mize molani' nene mo gili nizave.
Ne'mine ogavo O'moso luteu' ningaa' ive'mo Zuda ve leli' eze Sikalahu' limine' ma'mino heta ato' ve nongemo ninge goloso o-ngedamaa' ine' monovo nene lelebizine'.
Ingine aka atoto' ngele'mize molamo a'mine a'mine do hamo' o-ledo heta ato' ve inginesi ezemu' gili ele'vole' ikevo engi' lu'ningu' goloso o minine' nesi gilite-ngidine' ma neive.

Oko'ine lolovo huki huli Mose' lo huko line' gamazi muki' gili dalizave ingine genivesi gono naba daa' nave. A'mine gonoli'mo avotemotine ngivize vivo lezesi livize vine' ve. Nemu' nene lingine O'moso'mo lamido' ivile' igi a'mine genivesi gono nene heta ato' ve Izesu' evenele zuho lili' ani' engi' ngimi O'moso golo izilisa nilahe.

Ne'mine amolone. Laza ti' lo gelaa' noune' ma neive. Ezemu' ha gele ele'vole' une' nemu' Guvelesi ve Izesu' aza nasahili' o-ledo do lu' izine' a'mine'mine ogo heta ato' vesi ezemu' gili ele'vole' ikevo nasahili' o ngemo do ngu' izeleseive.

Petolo' aza ti' lo lavo evene' muki' ingine lolize gani lami ve'ine bizi mini Pauloki Banabasiki ingine heta ato' vetida vi gono dasingu' nene O'moso'mo engikisi gono nodo amuzo ngemavo oso' amoso' nite' ato ato' di soto' asingumu' nene vetete' igi nilasivo gili minani'.
Li-ngimi osu' likesivo Zakobo' ti' lo lo-ngimine': Vekizo, neze zuho mate, gamazi ma loloze. Gililo.
O'moso'mo heta ato' ve engikumu' gelo lulo otavo eze zuho lili' ilizave lo aka vele-ngedo linge ma ngele'mize kegesine' gamazi nene Simeoni' vetete' ogo lo-lemavo gelekune' ma neive.
A'mine gamazisi ido' O'moso'mi gamazi li soto' iga' ave polohete nete gizi mili nizani' gamazi nesi nene vo milise' o neive. Ido' polohete malite O'moso'mo line' gamazi gizani' ma ti' lo neive:
Guvelesi ve
ado' gono daline' monovo nene gozopo' aka'milati' lo soto' ive'mo ti' lo nolive:
Naza nene tine' molo ogo
guvelesi ve Davidi' evenele zuho ingine
numuno gaza' hulupo elo lemo ongani' ne'mine igi limi ingi minani' nene
gohi do ote-ngedelesuve.
Ee, a'mine numuno gaza' zupo' o minine' nene
ngu'voso gohi gizo do gosoho' olosuve.
Ido' ne'mine olodoti' nene
evene' gohi lumo minani' nete
ado' neni' ve lo lo-ngiduvoni' heta ato' ve muki' nete
Guvelesi ve nenita igi gi'mizilizani' aka ma
vise' ilisave lo line'.
Ti' li gizi nizani' nenako naza ti' lo nogiluve. Heta vetidati' lu'ine di velepe' izi O'mosola nave ingine geni'vesi gono ngemamolone.

nGemamolone'za avazaha o'moso niteliti noso' nitekuti' nene namii vene' vemoho' gopo ingamii ize gulo nala' i-ngidanguti' namii ize guloliti vanise'ine namii malise igi kekeize li minilizave lo luhuvo nite' gizelone lo nogiluve.

Ne'mine okunivo Mose' lo huko line' gamazi linge ma minine' nene vo halekalive losa nolabe. Nene vo halekamoloseive. Gozopo' gala'mudati' avotemote ani' amani' igi leze Zuda veti mono' numude mini'mi monangu' holise' gameneu' gameneu' nene Mose' lo huko line' gamazi gati limaa' nanako ngelo vo halekamoloseive.

Ne'mine lavo gili aposolosi gizebo vesi ido' Izesu' evenele mukikisi ti' li lani': Laza lelikuti' evene' sita' do kegese-ngedo ngimiselekunivo Paulole Banabasilesi maka' Adiokia ebeta vilizave. Ne'mine li Zuda' ado' gulive gohi ma Balasaba' ve lo minine' nesi ido' Silasi'nisi nene di kegesi-ngidani'. A'mine ve sita' ingine Izesu' zuholiti vovo'ningu' ve naba gidini minasine'.

Ne di kegesi-ngidi luhuvo ti' li gizi a'ningu' ngimi ngimiselani': Lengi' zuho aposolosi gizebo vesi laza lingine heta ato' ve leli' zuho Adiokia ebekukisi ido' Silia misuboukisi ido' Kilikia misuboukisi nizave lengikumu' isetine ve lo luhuvo nite' mene gizo nolingimune.
Laza lamunido' melati' ve linge ma lengita vi gamazi li-lingimi lengele'mize gopo ikevo gili gopo ani'. Ne'mine ikevo laza gelo

mulise molo ve seta' do kegeso lute ngeme nonive Banabasiki Pauloki engikisi ngimiselekunivo nesene maka' nivave. A'mine ve ingine Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' gilii ngibililizangumu' oko'ine hukamivo eze gono nene gopo di'mi vasine'.
Nemu' nene Zudangi Silasingi ngimiselekunivo ingine ve'ninguti' a'mine gamazi nene li-lingimikevo gililisave.

O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo aza ti' lo lavo lazasi a'mido' ve lo nolo hukune: Gono geni'vesi ma lengemamolosune. A'ne lo-lengemelone' gamazi nene lingine gili dalizado' o neivosa ha gili dalizaha Mose' lou' gamazi vaito' gili dalizave lo genivesi gono gohi ma gehe-lengedamolosune.

Lingine avazaha o'moso initeli'mi noso' nite' vata' ilizanguti' namilo. Ido' nala' i-ngidiliza ize guloti' namilo. Ido' ize guloliti vanise'ine namilo. Ido' vene' vemoho' gopo ingamilo. Ne'mine inite' mehedine imi malise gehepeve ilizani' nene vevesi minilisave. Lamine' ve. Moda ve.
Luhuvo nite' ti' li gizi ngimi di aka i-ngidikevo vani'. Vi Adiokia ebeku' heteli Izesu' evenele zuho muki' di mulise mili-ngidi luhuvo nite' ngimani'.
nGimikevo gati gili luhuvo gizani' gamazi ne'mo do ngi lo-ngedavo ngolize izi minani'.
Ne'mine ikevo Zudaki Silasiki ingine O'moso'mi gamazi li soto' iga' asive polohete minasine' nenako gamazi muki' li ngele'mize hongu li di ngi li-ngidasine'.
Ne'mine igi inginesi mineti' niigi ngimiselavela tine' mili vilisa nasivo Izesu' zuho ingine lingine muludingu' hongu lo minivo vilizo li mese' aseka li-ngidi di aka i-ngidani'.
Ido' Pauloki Banabasiki ingine Adiokia ebeku' mini inginesi ve lingesi Guvelesi ve'mi gamazi li soto' igi apizi ngimi ngimi' igi minani' ve.

Gamene ma ogo novivo Paulo' aza Banabasi'ni ti' lo lo-imine': Laza vo Guvelesi ve'mi gamazi lo soto' o ngemaa' usine' numudo' numudo' leze zuho soto' ani' ingine nadi' nadi' igi nizahe nemu' vo ninge-ngedelesive.
Ti' lo lavo Banabasi' aza Zohane' ado' gulive ma Maleko' ve lo minine' nesi ele'mizo volosive lo line'za
Maleko' gomu' ogo Pamahilia misubou' heteli gono a'mido' api' igi dalisa navo damolove lo-ngedo tine' molo ani' nenako Paulo' aza a'ne'mine ve ele'mizo volone' amive lo gele mino o've line'.

Paulo' aza Maleko' vamilive lavo nemu' nene Banabasikisi lovo lolize naba asine'. Ido' ne'mine asidoti' nene gohi makato' monamilisine' ogavo mine eze ema asine'. Ado' Banabasi' aza nene Maleko'ni ele'mizo vo sipiu' dizi vi golo gohilo' Kipilo ailaniu' vasine'.
Paulo' aza Silasi'ni do kegese-davo Izesu' zuho ingine Guvelesi ve'mo nasahili' o-ngedelive li O'mosola likevo vasine'.
Vi Silia misubouko ido' Kilikia misubouko heteli Izesu' evenele zuho mulise mili'mi monadaa moni monoku' di amuzo mili-ngidi'mi vasine' ve.

Pauloki Silasiki ingine Delebe ebeta vi Lisitila ebeta hetelasine'. Ido' Izesu' evenele zuho a'mida minanguti' ve ma minine' nene gulive Timoteo'. A'mine veli'mi izeleho nene Zuda vene' mino Izesuda gi'mizo minine' ido' meleho nene nGiliki ve minine'.
Izesu' zuho Lisitila ebeku' ido' Ikonio ebeku' minave ingine Timoteo'nimu' gamangi mili-daa' ani'.

A'mine ve nene Paulo' aza ele'mizo volosa giliha a'mine ebeta Zuda ve muki' minani' nete meleho nene nGiliki misuboukoti' ve minine' nene gili osu' li minani' nenako aza nene lukehe ikelizave lo Timoteo'ni ele'mizo vo O'moso'mi noso molo-do oko'no lolovo huko hulo-dine'.
Ne'mine ogo numudo' namado' vi aposolokisi gizebo vesi ingine Zelusalemi ebeta li hukani' gamazi nene gili dalizave li li-ngidi'mi li-ngidi'mi vani'.
Ne'mine igi gono dikevo Izesu' evenele zuho ingine monokumu' gili ele'vole' ani' ne'mo amuzo molavo gamene gamene vi kilika' kilika' avo muki' hizi hutile' ani'.
Ne'mine ikevo Asia misuboukosi mono' li-ngimamilizave lo O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo aka hize tile-ngedavo Piligia misuboukosi ido' Galatia misuboukosi mono' gamazi lamine' li-ngimi' ngimi' i'mi vani'.
Vi Misia misubo gahevela igi Bitinia misubouko volone likevo Izesu' Sikalahuli'mo a'mine'mino gele ngemamivo
Misia misubo ivile' igi lomi vi Toloasi ebeta hetelani'.
Hetelikevo me luhuvo gizuve nazasi makato' minune. Minuningu' holuka' Paulo' vamu' ti' lo ningive: Makedonia ve mali'mo ote mino amuzonga lo ti' lo line': Gaza Makedonia misubouko ogo do lu' izezo.
Aza vamu' ne'mino ningavo nemu' O'moso aza Makedonia misubouko vi mono' gamazi lamine' nene li-ngimilizave lo lo-limine' nene ningo gelo a'mida volone' akamu' vise' une.

Ne'mine ogo sipi do soto' molo a'mingu' dizo Toloasi ebe' hulo lisihe' ogo vo guvo noso huko guvo noso oluso' ailani ma minido' Samotalaka nelo' vo hetelune. Hetelo ongo go' lavo guvo noso huko'mo vo Neapoli ebeta hetelune.

Nelo' Sipiuti' lemo vo Hilipi ebeto' hetelune. A'mine numuno ebe' nene Makedonia misubo nene ize' milanguti' guvelesi misubo dizo minine' ve langu' nene minine'. Ido' Loma ve ingine igi a'mine ebe' me'ninge lili' igi gizebo ani'. A'mine ebeku' nomonunivo gamene ma ogo vine'.

Ogo vavo holise' gamene alitavo a'mine veliti gesi minguti' leme heta ogo noso gahevela nene O'mosola laa' ani' ebe' nolihe lo gelo lemo vune. A'mido' nene vene' ma di gese' igi nizavo ningo laza misubolo' lemo mito' mino mono' lo-ngimune'.

Lo-ngemekunivo engikuti' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ine' vene' ma gulive Lidia' minine'. Aza Tiatila ebekuti' vene' mino gumi kala pepoli live laa' nani' lavolavo ne'mine maketi molavo meni hizaa' ani'. Aza Paulo' line' gamazi nogilivo Guvelesi ve'mo lulo do ngolo' lo-davo Paulo' line' gamazi nene gele dani'.

Gele do azasi ido' ei' numungu' maka' ingaa' ani' alevesi mono' noso hili aza ti' lo lo-limine': Lingine neze ningavo Guvelesi vela lamine' mine molokuvo ma lingine neni' numungu' dizi minivi' divi' ilizave lo amuzonga lavo gele emo dizune' ve.

Gamene ma O'mosola laa' ani' ebeta nolimunivo gelekele' alu ma neivo a'minesi votene' une. A'mine alu'mi lulou' nene sikalahu' goloso minavo alinge' soto' o-ngedeline' initekumu' lo soto' ogo evene' lo-ngemaa' ine' nemu' eze gizebo i-daa' ave meni ngimikevo a'midoti' moni naba daa' ani'.

A'mine alusi votene' ogo Paulo'nisi lezesi le'meto noogo asi lo ti' lo line': Ve mene O'moso dize minive'mi gelekele' izipahala mini O'moso'mo do lungu' izeline' aka ma li soto' igi li-lingimaa' nave.

A'mine gamazi nene gamene gamene asi lo laa' ivo nemu' Paulo' gosele' belavo velepe' izo sikalahu' goloso nene ti' lo lo-dine': Izesu' Kilisito' velemu' ogo nolo-gimuve. Sikalahu' goloso gaza alungo hulo-do dizo ogo vozo. Ti' lo nolivo noline' velesi geto dizo ogo vine'.

Ne'mine ogavo a'mine alu gizebo i-di minave ingine eze gonoloti' meni daa' ilizani' aka'ine nene tilavo ningi gili nemu' Paulongi Silasingi a'nido' di gelelehe' malelehe' igi di vi mulise ebe' nabala zasi nabaliti mo'mosi'nida ngele'mizi vani'.
Zasila ngele'mizi mili goni' nii-ngidi ti' li lani': Ve seta' mene Zuda ve nizasive. Ingine leze mene ebeku' aleve di gopo nii-lidasivo ningo do une.
Ingine monovo gohi atokumu' dalizave li gate di li soto' i limikesivo a'mine monovo gele do e'metelone' nene leze Loma veti lou' gamazite avuto' olone' ogavosa ngele'mizo noune.
Ne'mine likevo mulise mili minavetesi lovo gamazi li-ngimikevo genegana'ine divi' bolotivi' igi huli ngibililizave li zasilite likevo ne'mine ani'.
Vauve ili izivi' itivi' igi ngibili nala' numungu' huli-ngidi nala' numudo' gizebo ve lamino gizebo ilive li li-dani'.

Ne'mine li-dikevo gelo nemu' nene ngele'mizo nala' numungu' lulo oluso' gehepeveu' hulo-ngedo gize'ine za lulou' loloso' ogo hulo ngimikivo minasine' nene hanigati ne'mine lolo' ogo ne'mine o-ngidine'.
Holuka' ongo velepeto' Pauloki Silasiki ingine O'mosola li opo'ni li mono' nama li nizasivo nalato' ve lingelite a'minemu' lubamu nigilavo
mimi' naba lite' lo ogavo nala' numuno nene muki' do mo'mongo' ine'. Ne'mine ogavo gete geto nala' numungu' akahe muki' si'zo osu' lavo nalato' veti a'nido' seni nala' dani' nene apase osu' line'.

Ne'mine ogavo nala' numudo' gizebo ve okiseti' oto ningine' nene nala' numungu' akahe muki' si'ze osu' lo neine' neivo ningo nalato' ve muki' limi vi haha ahe lo ei' do minine' bainati mite' nene gelelehe' ogo asi've oko'no bele helelesa neivo
Paulo' aza amuzo molo asi lo line': Gasika okonga do goloso amozo. Laza muki' meuko haza nonge lo line'.
Lavo gizebo ve aza livikumu' lavo imikevo nizasida loti' izo dizo vo luvo luvo noizo engikumu' lamine' giline' nenako nemu' Paulongi Silasingi gize'ningu' lemo pou' lo ongo
ngele'mizo heta ogo ti' lo longo' o-ngidine': Ve naba matise, naza nadi' ogosa lukuvo nalove.
Longo' o-ngedavo ingine ti' li lasine': Guvetesi ve Izesu Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' iline' gezesi maka' nizavesi do lungu' izeleseive.
Ne'mine li Guvelesi ve'mi gamazi nene a'mingu' minani' alevesi ezesi li-ngimasine'.

Li-ngimikesivo nala' numudo' gizebo ve aza a'mine holuka' mo a'mine gamenelo' gehepeve ngele'mizo do vo gavoso ngibilado' nene noso izo do hongu lo-ngidine'. Ne'mine o-ngedavo a'mido' geti azasi ido' eze zuhosi mono' noso hilani'.
Ne'mine ikevo azasi eze zuhosi O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' ani' nemu' ngolize izi minani'.
Ingi go' lavo zasi ingine ti' li li pilisi ve ngimiselani': Ve seta' ma kuluhizi-ngidilo.

Likevo nala' numudo' gizebo ve gelo Paulo'ni vetete' ogo lo-emo ti' lo line': Naza kuluhize-lengedekuvo vilisive li zasilite gamazi hulikevo nenita naze. Nemu' lingine muludingu' hongu lo minivo vilisasive.

Lavo Paulo' aza pilisi ve ti' lo lo-ngimine': Laza nene Loma ve lengi' muliseuti' nosine'za Loma ve i-ngidisa'mani' inite' ma i-lidi goni' i-lidilisa gilani' nene leze monovo vise' igi lihimete di soto' mili lami haza evene' mukiliti ve'nido' gavoso libili nala' numungu' huli-lidani' ma nemu' nene suno' limiselilisa nilahe. Ne'mino nomive. Angise'ine igi lele'mize heta ikevo volosine' o neive.
Lavo pilisi ve ingine vi a'mine gamazi zasi li-ngimikevo ve seta' ingine Loma veti muliseuti' gidani' minasine' nene gili upuho' igi golise gilani'.
Upuho' igi vi ve setakumu' agae li isetine ve li di hongu li-ngidi ngele'mizi di heto' i-ngidi numuno ebe'ine huli vilisive li zou li ngimiselani'.
nGimiselikevo ingine nala' numunguti' limi heta igi Lidia' numu'veu' vi Izesu' zuho ningi mono' li-ngimi di amuzo mili-ngidi vasine' ve.
Hilipi ebe' huli vi Amihipoli ebekisi Apolonia ebekisi ivile' igi Tesalonika ebeku' hetelasine'. A'mine ebeku' nene Zuda veti mono' numuno ma minine'.
Neivo Paulo' aza oga' idi'mine ogo holise' gameneu' mulise milangu' dizeka' dizeka' ogo minine'. Gamene setohamo dizo mino inginesi mono' godolouti' gati li gili ha gili ani'.

Ne'mine igi mono' luhuvo gizani' linge ma ne'mi monovo lo-ngemo ti' lo line': O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live nene helo gohi kululu' izo oteleseive li monoku' gizi mili nizani' ma neive. Ido' ezemu' nolo-lingimuve nene gulive've Izesu' aza do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live nene neive.

Ti' lo lavo Zuda ve linge malite a'mine gamazi gilani' nene gihile ogavo Paulongi Silasingi nge'metani'. Ido' nGiliki ve ingine O'moso opo'ni li gelekele' i-di minaa' ave muki' inginesi ido' vene' dizi minani' mukikisi nge'metani'.

Ne'mine ikevo nemu' Zuda ve nete Paulongi Silasingi lukehe ngibili ve goloso maketi ebeku' gopo minaa' aveuti' ma ngele'mizi di mulise mili-ngidi a'mine ebeku' aleve muki' mulu'ningu' hizii vi Zasoni' numu've di vodo vodo igi mini a'minguti' Paulongi Silasingi ngele'mizo evene' mukiliti ve'nido' do soto' molalone li eze akahe've izivi' apasivi' ani'.

Ve seta' ingine numungu' nizamasivo ningami Zasoni'nisi Izesu' evenele linge masi a'nido' di gelelehe' igi ebeto' gizebo igi goni' gilaa' avela ngele'mizi igi ele'voleka li ti' li lani': Ve seta' mene numudo' namado' ve di gopo i-ngidaa' asive ma mela hetelikesivo
Zasoni' aza ei' numu'veuko ngele'mize molave. Ido' ingine guvetesi ve naba Loma ebeku' minive Kaesale' gamazi've ma avuto' igi Guvelesi ve gosoho' ma Izesu' soto' ogave li laa' nasive.
Ne'mine li go'ine izikevo evene' mukikisi goni' gilaa' avesi upuho' igi gamazi gopo' napa vai' lani' ve.
Ne'mine igi goni' gilaa' ave ingine Zasoningisi ido' eze zuho lingesi ti' li li-ngimani': Pauloki Silasiki vilisive li oko'ine meni hizilo. Likevo moni ngimikevo ngimiseli hulani'.

Ne'mine ikevo a'mine gameneu' holuka' Izesu' evenele zuho nete Paulongi Silasingi geti ngimiseli hulikevo Belia numuda vasine'. A'mida vi heteli Zuda veti mono' numungu' dizi Izesu' gamazi vetete' igi li-ngimasine'.

Li-ngimikesivo a'mine ebekuko Zuda ve ingine Tesalonika ebekuko minani' ne'mine minami lu'ine laminekisi ve hongu ve mini ngivile' igi mini vo'ine ngilingili ivo mono' gamazi gili Pauloki Silasiki lasine' gamazi nene lamine' nehe soza nehe li gamene gamene mono' godolouti' mono' monovomu' gize'neka' hizi minani'.
Ne'mine igi engikuti' evene' mukikisi ido' nGiliki vene' dizi minanikisi ido' vemohokisi ingine Izesu'nimu' gili ele'vole' ani'.

Ne'mine ikevo Paulo' nene Belia ebekukisi O'moso'mi gamazi lo hutile' ine' nene Tesalonika ebeku' minani' Zuda ve ingine gili Belia ebeta igi evene' muki' nene go'ine izi lovo hizilizangumu' mulu'ningu' hizi lani'.
Ne'mine ikevo Izesu' zuho Paulo'ni di aka i-dikevo a'mine ebe' hulo guvo noso gahevela vo heteline'za Silasiki Timoteoki ingine Belia ebeku' minasine'.
Nizasivo evene' nete Paulo'ni ele'mizi vi Atena ebeta huli-dani'. Huli-di vi Paulo' line' gamazi nene Silasingi ido' Timoteongi ti' li li-ngimani': Lengikumu' moda lite' li alizo nolive.
Ne'mine ikevo Paulo' aza Atena ebeta gizebo mino avazaha o'moso nite' vanu hizi minikevo ningo mulunou' olo' line'.

Mulunou' olo' lavo Zuda veti mono' numungu' dizo Zuda vesi ido' heta ato' ve O'moso opo'ni li gelekele' i-di minaa' ave nesi a'mine mulunou' olo' line' initekumu' nene li volelo' melo' iga' ani'. Ne'mine igi gamene gamene do gese' ebeto' evene' muki' igi di gese' ado' nesi a'mine'mino mono' gamazi lo-ngimine'.

Ne'mine ogavo a'mine ebeku' evene' ma minanguti' malite Epikulo' mono' gilaa' ani'. Ido' malite nene Sitoiki aleveti mono' gilaa' ani'. A'mine aleve Paulolesi gamazi di velepe' alepe' izi li linge malite Paulongumu' ti' li lani': Hokolize' ve mene gamazi gihile've nominekovo' gohi liline' nenako nadi ve lo lo-lemelesa neive li likevo malite ti' li lani': Aza neve ato' aleveti o'moso'ineliti monovomu' noline' gelave. Ne'mine lani' nene Paulo' aza Izesu'nimukisi ido' hele noloninguti' otakumukisi lo soto' o ngimingumu' nene ne'mine lani'.
Ne'mine li analo' di Aleopago gololo' kanisole nizada ele'mizi igi ti' li lani': Gaza gelamune' gamazi gosoho' evene' muki' lo-ngeme'mo monaa' naine' ma idi'nise nene lo-lemanivo gelelobo.
Laza gei' laine' gamazi nene gilune' atoli'mine oganako nemu' ne'mi monovo nado nehe. Lanivo gelelone li lani'.

Ne'mine li Atena alevesi ido' engi' vovo'ningu' venenga ve minanikisi ingine muki' nete gamene gamene inite' malokisi lu'ine milami gamazi gosoho' gamazimu' nene li gili ha gili igi a'minemukovo' gili minaa' ani'.
Ne'mine likevo Paulo' aza Aleopago gololo' minani' kanisoleti ve'nido' ogo oto ti' lo line': Lingine Atena vekizo, gililo. Lingine monotinemu' gili ngilingili goloso iga' navo noninguve.

Naza numudida ogo vogo noogo o'moso initetine ato ato' ningaa' uvongu' inite' hamo' ma ninguvoni' nene mabanuho gizaa' holomo ma ninguve. Ido' a'mine initeto' nene luhuvo ti' li gizikave: Laza ma ningo gelamune' o'moso ma nolingumukisi ve li gizikani' ningo gatuve. A'mine O'moso nene lingine gilami gopo gubi' izi imi opo'ni laa' nani' neve ezemu' lo lo-lengemeloze. Gililo.

O'moso aza okulumo' misubo do soto' molo a'mido' minani' inite' matakisi do soto' molo osu' line'. Do soto' molani' nenako asi've nene okulumo' misubo engi' Guve'inesi ve naba mino mono' numuno evenelite gizangu' nene dizo minevo' dovo' osa'mive.

Asi've nene evene' muki' minevo' alevo' ngemo ido' mutive daa' ani' ngemo ido' inite' muki' lehize-ngedaa' neine' nenako nemu' aza nene inite' matakumu' vise' osa'mive. o've. Nemu' nene evenelite gono've do inite' ma do soto' ogo emelonido' nomive.

Ne'mine o neine'za aza neve evene' hamo' do soto' molo lavo ezelati' evene' zuho ato ato' soto' ogo misubou' misubou' hutile' ogo none. Ido' soto' ogo misubou' minelone' gamenesi misubotesi asi've laka'ni molo-lede neine' ma neive.
Nemu' nene lu'inedunu' vise' i'mi igi O'moso neni' nouvoda igi hetelilizave lo gelo ne'mine ine'. Ido' laza vise' olosuba aza hoto' minamo leli' hamo' hamokisi maka' avito' neive.
Lengitati' gili vevesi mini luhuvo gizaa' ave linge malite ti' li lani':
Ei' mumunou' vo holo mino ogo molo oga' noune.
Ne'mine li likevo linge malite ti' li lani':
Laza O'mosolati' soto' une' ve.
Laza O'mosolati' soto' une' nenako O'mosomu' nene aza evenelite ga'ine gili ngolitunupe ido' siluvatunupe ido' gehenitunupe lili' ani' inite' gidini nolihe lo gelo lamolosune.
Gomu' O'moso'mi monovo gilamani' gameneu' nene lihime'ine molo-ngedamo ninge huline'za idi'nise nene numudo' namado' ve mukito' lu'ine di velepe' izilisave lo lo-ngede neine' ve.

Nemu' nene aza numudo' namado' ve monovote do soto' molo do lisihe' ogo lihime lemeline' gamene molo neive. Ido' a'mine gameneu' goni' gelelive nene do kegeso hulo-dine'. Ido' a'mine do kegese-dive ma nene neive li numudo' namado' ve gililizave lo hilinguti' do ote-davo neive.
Paulo' aza hele noloninguti' otaakumu' lavo gilii ve linge ma nete gize abelenga likevo malite nene gamene ma a'mine gamazi lanivo gohi gelelone li lani'.
Ne'mine likevo Paulo' aza hulo-ngedo lemo vine'.

Vavo evene' linge nene ezela vi gi'mizi Izesu'nimu' line' gamazi nene gili ele'vole' ani'. Gili ele'vole' angu' Aleopago gololo' kanisole minaa' anguti' ve ma gulive Dionisiokisi gele ele'vole' ine'. Ido' vene' ma gulive Damalikisi ido' linge masi gili ele'vole' ani' ve.
Ne'mine ogavo Paulo' aza Atena ebe' hulo Kolidi ebeku' vine'.

Nela Zuda ve ma do soto' molo ningine' nene gulive Akuila'. Eze nene Podo misubouko gidave minine'. Podo misubo hulo vo elenaho Pilisikilakisi Italia misubouko nizasivo Guvelesi ve naba Kalaudio' aza Zuda ve Loma ebeku' minamilizave lo lo huko-ngedo ngimiselo do hulavo ingine a'mine ebe' huli Kolidi ebeku' vi minasine'. Olihe mini guni amasivo Paulo' aza engita vo heteline'.
Azasi inginesi hamo' gono di seli numuno gizaa' ave minani' nenako engi' numungu' dizo mino gono makato' di minani'.

Ne'mine navo Paulo' aza holiseku' holiseku' Zuda veti mono' numungu' dizo Zuda vesi ido' nGiliki vesi do upuho' o-ngedekuvo gili ele'vole' ilizahe lo O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live nene Izesu' ma ve loo lo ngolo' lo lo-ngemeka' ngemeka' ogo minine'.

Ne'mine ogavo Silasiki Timoteoki ingine Makedonia misubouti' asine' gameneu' nene Paulo' mono' gono gamene gamene amuzo molo do mino O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live ma nene Izesu' ve lo eze monovo've lo soto' ogo Zuda ve lo-ngemo minine'.

Minavo eze gamazi lido' e'menga li-imi eze divi' ledivika li minikevo hungo' molo genegana'veloti' u'musupo tile' ogo do hulo ti' lo lo-ngimine': Lingine labuluvo ilizani' nene lihime nenita minamoloseive. Lengitavo' mineleseive. Nemu' mehe'ne lengemo heta ato' vetida volosuve.
