Ne'mine igi mini ingine leli' nene gate gele nge lo nonive none li minani'za ingine ne'mini ma minami negi hizi mini

emeni dameni lamine' atoli'minesi mino helamo minevo' minevo' ogo minaa' ive O'moso nene huli ezelo' medeli evene' minivi' minivi' ami hilaa' nani' neti avazaha nehe ido' nama gaha ize guloti avazaha nehe gosiheliti avazaha nehe ne'mine nite' lolo' igi ngopo'ni laa' ani' ve.

Ne'mine igi mini O'moso mehe'ine imikevo nemu' O'moso aza nene ele'ninge va'ninge ingalizani' monovo di gopo igi lu'ine do goloso iline' monovo goloso nene di mini engi' oko'ine di gopo ilisa evene' ingine lu'ningu' lanite' gilado' nene e'metamilizanako lu'ine'mo lanite' gilido' nene ha e'metilizave lo hulo-ngidine' ve.

Ingine O'moso gihile nene huli-di ezelo' medeli soza o'moso di soto' igisa inite' muki' do soto' molave O'moso nene gubu' izi imi opo'ni li-dami O'moso asi've lolo' ine' initeto' nene gubu' izi ngimi ngopo'ni li minaa' ani' ve. Ne'mine ani'za inite' mata' do soto' ive O'mosovo' nene laza gamene gamene opo'ni laa' olonido' o neive. Nemu' nene ne'mino minivo.

Ido' evene' ne'mine igi O'moso huli-di soza o'moso ngopo'ni li minani' nemu' O'moso aza ninge mate ngimikivo ingine monovo goloso ado' ne'mine igi minani' ve: Vene' nete va'ningesivo' ingalizani' monovo O'moso'mo ganakuti' ngelebizine' ma nene huli O'moso'mo ngelebizamine' monovo goloso di soto' igi engi' vene' oko'ningu' inite' iga' ani' ve.

Ido' a'mine'mine igi vemoho' ingine O'moso'mo venekisi ingaa' monovo ganakuti' ngelebizine' nene mehe'ine imi ve malite ve mamu' ma duvo lo oko'ningu' olo' lavo ngovozo nite' goloso di soto' igi angise'ine oko'ningu' inite' iga' ani' ve. Ne'mine adoti' lihime dani' votigilelo' do molo O'moso'mo lihime ngemavo oko'ine nene goloso oga' neive.

Ee, ingine O'mosomu' gili minilizani' nemu' nene levelenga li huli-dikevo O'moso aza nene evene' ingine goloso monovomu' gohi gili minikevo a'mine ga'ine gilado' nene e'meti evenelite amilizani' o minine' monovo goloso ato ato' igi mili minilizave lo ninge mate-ngidine' ve.

Ne'mino ninge mate-ngedavo evene' ingine lisihe' amine' monovo danava goloso vai' lihime daa' monovo nene engita vai' goloso soto' ivo minani' ve. A'mine monovo goloso nene ne'mini nizave: Mumuzo' iga', evenekumu' lukehe iga', evene' mala inite' lamine' ma soto' o ngemavo ma a'mine vemu' ngizebolo' gohi molaa', evene' ngibili hilaa', lolize hizaa', evene' go'ine izaa',
evene' dovo ledevo' ogo ngemenga laa', O'moso'mi biluva've minaa', hokolize' igi hokolizeka li engi' oko'ine di dizaa', monovo goloso di soto' iga', ize'ninge me'ninge lani' gamazi gili hulaa',
negi suno suno daa', gamazi angise li hukisa a'mido' e'metamaa', lu'ine ngimamaa', ido' evene' muhele'ine ningamaa' ave muki' ne'mine nene nizave.

Ne'mino neivo O'moso'mo evene' ne'mine monovo goloso ilizadoti' nene golo hizi meni've helaa' nene dikevosa lisihe' oloseive line' nemu' nene mo gili minisasi a'mine luvoni' ne'mine monovo goloso nene ha igi mili minaa' nave. Ido' ne'mine iga' nani' nene goloso neine'za ingine a'mine monovo goloso a'nevo' nene ma amave. Ingine ningavo evene' malitesi a'mine luvoni' monovo goloso nene igi mili nizavo ma nene ingine lamine' ve li siza li-ngidaa' nave. Ingine a'ne'mine iga' nani' ne'mo nene goloso gehepeve oga' neive.

Ido' a'mela luvoni' ne'mino ne'mine monovo goloso iga' nave muki' nene O'moso'mo lihime molo ngimika' neine' nenako nemu' evene' ma lingine evene' mamu' lihime dikeve li-ngidaa' nave muki' lingine a'mine lihime dikeve li-ngidaa' navete iga' nani' inite' goloso ne'mine nene linginesi iga' nani' nenako O'moso'mo evene' lihime ngemeline' gamenelo' nene lingine lengi' isetine izelive li-imilizani' gamazi ma minamoloseive.
Ido' O'moso'mo evene' ne'mine iga' ave goni' o-ngedo lihime ngemeline' nene mo monovo lisihe' lamine' ogo lihime ngemeleseive losa gele none.

Gele none'za lingine nene langisetinesi a'mine monovo goloso nene ha igi mili minaa' niigisa evene' ma a'mine monovo goloso iga' navemu' ize' mili-ngidi lihime dikeve li-ngidaa' nave lingine nene O'moso'mo evene' lihime ngemelinguti' nene ha olovo' olosune li gilaa' nahe. O'ove. Olovo' ngeli mo amilisave.

Ido' ma nene ti' li gilaa' nahe: O'moso'mo isetine izo nasahili' o-lengede'mo ogo minaa' neine' ne'mo do akalo' o-lengedavo lutine di velepe' izi monovo goloso hulilizave losa nasahili' o-lengedaa' neingumu' nene lingine ha gililizanako gili hulisa O'moso'mo atoli'mine ogo nasahili' o-lengedo geto lihime lengemo lengebelamo isetine ize'mo vo minaa' neine' nemu' nene lingine gilavo haza nite' lolo' ogahe.

Evene' ma lingine lutine di velepe' izami lutine di a'manapa i'mi vi minaa' nangumu' nene O'moso aza izebolo' moloka' moloka' o'mo vo minaa' neine' nene naba o'mo vo minaa' neive. Ido' O'moso'mo monovo lisihe' lamine' e'meto evene' ize' molo-ledo lihime lemeline' gamene soto' ogavo ma a'mine izebolo' molani' votigilelo' nene do molo lihime ngemeleseive.
A'mine evene' ize' molo-ledeline' gamenelo' nene evene' ingine monovo goloso nehe lamine' nehe igi mili i nilizani' votigilelo' do molo meni ne'mino ngemeleseive:

Ve ma ingine nene O'moso'mi monovo danava lamine' goloso neine' nene dalizangumukisi ido' ninge lamine' do-ngedo do naba o-ngedeline' nemukisi ido' helamaa' ngemeni dameni dalizangumukisi nene aka vise' ogo do soto' olone li geni initeli'mi lulou' minilizahe mulumo alumo initeli'mi lulou' minilizahe nemu' nene gilami gili huli geli geli igi monovo laminekovo' igi mili minilizani' nene O'moso'mo minevo' minevo' ngemeni dameni lehize-ngedeleseive.
Ido' ve ma ingine O'moso biluva' i-di O'moso'mi gamazi gihile nene gili huli e'metami monovo golosolo' e'meti vi minave engikumu' nene O'moso'mo izebolo' molavo lihime atoli'mine ogo ngemeleseive.
Ne'mine ogavo mulumo nite' goloso ato ato' nene goloso nite' daa' avela soto' o ngemeleseive. Gana' nene Zuda vela soto' o ngemosa neloti' nene Zuda ve minamani' ato' vela soto' o ngemeleseive.

Ne'mine oloseine'za monovo lamineto' e'meti minaa' avela nene O'moso'mo do hozi lo do naba o-ngedo hongu lo minaa' monovo lehize-ngedeleseive. Ido' ne'mine o-ngedeline' nene O'moso aza evene' muki' nizanguti' nene linge mavo' do kegeso do lamine' o-ngedesa'mine' nenako nemu' nene Zuda ve gomu' ne'mine o-ngedosa neloti' nene Zuda ve minamani' ato' ve nesi nene ne'mine o-ngedeleseive.

Ido' O'moso'mo gopo hazamu' evene' linge ma do lamine' o-ngedo linge ma do goloso o-ngedesa'mive luvoni' nene nemu' noluve: Evene' ma O'moso'mo lou' gamazi've lo-ngemamivo haza minave ado' Zuda ve minamave nete lihime dalizani' nene O'moso'mo louto' do molo ize' ma molo-ngedamoloseiha nesi mo ha vi tolovo ilisave. Ido' O'moso'mo lou' gamazi've lo-ngemavo gili minave Zuda ve nene lou' di minisasi lihime dalizave nene O'moso'mo a'mine louto' do molosa ize' molo-ngedo lihime ngemeleseive.

Ee, O'moso'mo evene' mamu' ve lisihe' ve lo lo-ngedaa' neive nene evene' ma ingine lou' gamazi nene ha ga'inedunukovo' gilaa' avemu' nene losa'mive. Asi lou' gamazi'mo lido' iga' avevo' nene ve lisihe' ve lo lo-ngedaa' neive.

Ido' naza luvoni' ma nene me gililo: Zuda ve minamave ado' O'moso'mo lou' gamazi've lo-ngemavo damave ingine engi' ngemeni damenilo' di mili igi mili iliza inite' nene lou' gamazi'mo lido' vo milise' o mineline' ne'mo nene mo O'moso'mi lou' nene engi' lu'ningu' neive.

Ido' engi' ne'mine igi mili minaa' nani' ne'mo nene lou' gamazi'mo lo neine' gamazi lu'ningu' neine' nene do soto' ogo lelebize neive. Ingine iga' nani' initekumu' nene engi' lu'ine ga'ine ne'mo gamene ma nene di lamine' ikeve laa' ido' gamene ma nene di goloso ikeve lo lo-ngemaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene a'mine ne'mine lu'ine ga'ine engita minaa' neine' ne'mo nene naza lamine' luvoni' nene do soto' ogave.

Ido' O'moso'mo lavo Izesu' Kilisito' nene ezelo' medelo mino evene' laza suno' ogo molo oga' noune' inite' ize' molaline' gamenelo' nene neni' mene noluvoni' ne'mino mineleseive. Ee, naza gamazi lamine' lo soto' soto' oga' nouvoni' ne'mo nene a'mine gamazi mene lo soto' neive.

Ido' gaza Zuda ve nolinive nene gelezo. Zuda ve nouve losa O'moso'mi lou' gamazi Mose' gizo limine' ne'mo nene O'moso'mo goni' o-ledelinguti' nene ha do nu' izeleseive lo gelo a'mido' gele medele mino okonga do dizo O'moso'mi evenele nouve laa' nane.

O'moso'mi lou' gamazi nene apize gimikevo gele naine' nenako nemu' nene O'moso'mo gei' iline lo lulou' gele neine' nene gaza mo ningo gelosa monovo ma ivile' ogo monovo lamine' gehepeve nene do kegeso ningaa' nane.

Ne'mine anidi'mo nene gaza ti' lo laa' nane: Mose' gizine' lou' gamazi nenita neingu' nene gamazi monovo vaikisi gamazi gihile lamine' vaikisi neivosa nene naza lu'ine'mi vele likavo nizave aka ngelebizelodo' mino liti'musou' minave neti livi'ine ne'mine mino ido' gamazi gilamave ngele'mize hehe lolodo' mino mono' gilami izipe ngomo ne'mine minave inite' apize ngemaa' olodo' mo lisihe' o nouve lo amuzo molo gelaa' nane.
Nemu' nene gaza evene' ma apize ngemaa' naine' gamazilo' nene geikisi gele dalinako gele dosa'mane. Ee, gaza gumine amozo lo evene' lo-ngemaa' noogosa gaza nene gumine oga' noolosane.

Ido' vene' vemoho' lili' ikeni' nete vene' vemoho' masi gopo ingamilo laa' noogosa gei' nene ne'mine oga' noolosane. Gaza soza o'mosomu' nene muso gaka dizavo olovo' oga' noogosa soza o'mosoliti numunguti' inite' gumine oga' noolosane.
Ido' gaza O'moso'mi lou' gamazi nene gele nouve lo okonga do dizaa' nanive neke nene a'mine lou' nene avuto' ogosa O'moso'mi gulive do lemaa' noolosane.
Ne'mine noluvoni' nene mono' godolou' gamazi ma ti' li gizi nizani' nene lengito' vo davosa noluve:
Zuda ve lengi' monovotine nene heta ato' ve ingine ningisa
O'moso nene divi ledivi' iga' nave.

Zuda veti okodido' O'moso'mi noso mili-lingidaa' nani' ne'mo nene lingine O'moso'mi lou' gamazilo' e'meti minilizani' nene mo hize ele' o-lengedeleseive. Ido' okodida O'moso'mi noso neivo mini lou' gamazi avuto' igi minilizani' ne'mo nene O'moso'mi noso lengita neine' ma nene haza nite' lolo' ogavo nomivo nizani' geleleseive.
Ne'mine o neine' nenako ve ma ingine oko'nida O'moso'mi noso nomivo nilizadite O'moso'mi lou' gamazi gili di minaa' niilizani' nene O'moso'mo gilivo ei' noso've nene mo engi' oko'nida mineleseive.

Ido' ve ma oko'nida O'moso'mi noso nomivo mini O'moso'mi lou' gamazilo' e'meti osu' lilizadite nene lengi' mono' godolo di minisasi ido' O'moso'mi noso okodida mili-lingidikevo minisasi O'moso'mi lou' gamazi avuto' iga' nave lengi' nene losuvotine ilavo monovotine nene soto' oloseive.

Ee, O'moso'mi evenele gihile Zuda ve minaa' ne'mi gihile nene okode losuvoloti' nene ma soto' osa'mive. Ido' a'mine'mine ogo O'moso'mi noso do minaa' ne'mi gihile nene O'moso'mi noso ve li okode lolovo huki hulaa' nadoti' nene ma soto' osa'mive.

Asi O'moso'mi evenele Zuda ve minaa' ne'mi gihile nene luteu' haleko minine' lemeni dameniloti' nene soto' oga' neive. Ido' O'moso'mi noso gihile nene lou' gamazi gizi nizado' nene ha okode losuvoloti' e'meto okode lolovo huko hulaa' neve nene nevoba asi O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo luteu' molo-ledaa' neine' lemeni dameni nene neive. Ne'mine lemeni damenisi Zuda ve gihile minelonivemu' nene evenelite lopo'ni lilizavoba asi O'moso'mo loloseive.

Ido' naza nene ne'mine luvoni' nemu' nene Zuda ve lingine lutingu' nene gopo gatine gili longo' ne'minisa ilizani' o neive: O'moso'mo ningivo Zuda vesi ido' heta ato' vesi nene mo lisihekovo' o minaa' noune' noline' nene laza Zuda ve minuningumu' Zuda ve minamave ngivile' ogo hize ele' o-ledaa' neine' nene nanitedunu' hize ele' o-ledaa' neive. Ido' laza O'moso'mi noso okodela molaa' noune' neloti' nene inite' lamine' nene nanite' soto' o-ledaa' neive li longo' ilisave.
Ne'mine ilisaha inite' lamine' vai' goloso vauve elosa lelita neive. Inite' naba gana' nene O'moso'mo lo huko lo-lidine' gamazi've nene Zuda ve leli' nene di minilizave losa lehize-lidine' ve.

Ne neiha Zuda ve linge ma nete nene a'mine O'moso'mo lehize-lidine' gamazilo' nene e'metamani' ve. Nemu' nene ve malite nene ti' li longo' ilisa gili nilisave: Ingine gamazi'velo' e'metamani' nemu' O'moso'mo a'mine gamazilo' e'meto amilido' o neihe.

O'ove. E'metamilivoba asi a'mine gamazi'velo' nene ha mo e'meteleseive. Evene' vai' nene sozalo' vevo' minilisaha O'moso neve nene gamazi gihile laminekovo' laa' ive mineleseive. Ne'mine neingumu' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Ne'mino neine' nene nanitekumu' ve.
O'mosoo, gaza gamazi lisihekovo' liline' o neine' nene mo
soto' neivo goniku' nesi nene gasika ngivile' olosane lo neive.

Nemu' nene naza mene evenelite iga' nani' monovolo' do molo ti' lo noluve: Laza monovo goloso ogo molo oga' noune' ne'mo nene O'moso'mi monovo lisihe' lamine' nene do soto' o-daa' neine' nenako O'moso aza monovote golosomu' lihime lemeline' nemu' nene monovo do goloso ogave lo ha lo-delonido' o neihe.
O've. Mo keke' ne'mino nomive. Ido' ne'mine minidiniko O'moso'mo me misubou' ve muki' ize' molo-ledeline' nenako nado ize' molo-ledelido' lisihe' o minidine.

Ido' ve ma ti' lo loloseive: Naza soza gamazi luvodiniko O'moso'mo nenikumu' lihimelo' ve minane lo lihime nimidine. Ne neiha evene' nete a'mine soza gamazi'nemu' gililizadoti' nene O'moso'mo gamazi gihile laminekovo' laa' neine' monovo've nene soto' gehepeve ogavosa ezemu' nene gohi opo'ni li di naba igi li-dilizado' idine. Ido' ne'mine idiniko naza inite' lamine' do soto' uvoni' gilidine. Nemu' neni' nene lihimelo' ve ve lo lihime nene nanimu' nimidine.

Ee, ve malite lelikumu' nene divi ledivi' igi ti' li laa' nave: Paulole laa' nani' nene ne'mino neive: Monovo goloso ne'mo monovo lamine' do soto' iline' nenako nemu' ne'mine ilingumu' ve lo laza nene ha monovo goloso ogo molo minelesune. Ido' ne'mine laa' nene mo lamine' nehe. O'ove. O'moso'mo ne'mine laa' ave nene lihime ngemelido' lisihe' i nizave.

Neloti' nene laza nadive lo gelelone. Zuda ve leli' nene evene' linge muki' ngivile' ogo lamine' nobe. O'ove. Ne'mino minamune. Mo Zuda vesi a'mine Zuda ve minamavesi nene mo lihime monovoli'mo nene adelo' do minivevo' none lo naza mo lo-lengemekuvoni' ma ve.
A'mine me luvoni' gamazi ne'mo nene mono' godolou' gamazi ma ti' li gizi nizado' vo do neive:
Me misubou' nene evene' lisihe' lihime'vesi nomive nene
mo keke' hamokisi ma nomive.
Aka laminekumu' ningi gilave nene hamokisi ma nizamave.
Ido' O'moso ningelone li ezemu' vise' iga' ave nene mo keke' ma nizamave.
Ido' evene' muki' nene aka lamine' huli zovo' izi visa vi goloso nave.
Ve ma monovo laminekovo' i di vi minaa' ave nene
mo keke' hamokisi nizamave.
Lu'ninguti' vomine gamazi laa' nani' nene
gonoso galese ngolo' lo mininguti' unuvo goloso oga' neine' ne'minosa nene neive.
Ido' gamazi laa' nani' nene evene' go'ine izisavo' nene laa' nave.
Ido' sata' ume nete evene' ongovuso' ngibilaa' nani' ne'mino
ingine gamazi laa' nani' ne'mo nene ngebelaa' neive.
Ido' engita gamazi goloso ekese' lo-ngedaa' monovo nene ve'ningu' vai' lo neive.
Ido' gize'ine ne'mo nene evene' ngebelaato' lite' lo ngele'mizo vaa' neive.
Ido' zaa' zaa' akalo' vilizahe a'mida nene
inite' mata' di goloso gehepeve iga' ido' evene' geni ngimaa' ne'mine iga' nave.
Ne'mine igi minisa ingine hongu lo lamino minaa' aka nene mo keke' ningamave.
Ido' O'mosomu' golise gelaa' monovomu' nene mo ningi gilisa'mave.

Ido' O'moso'mi lou' gamazi'mo ne'mine line' nene a'mine lou' gamazi'mi gesi mingu' minunivemu' line' nene mo gele none. Ne'mine line' nene me misubou' aleve muki' laza lolone' gamazi nomivo lu' izo mino O'moso'mi velelo' goni' o-ledelido' lisihe' ogo mineloningumu' nene ne'mine line' ve.

Nemu' nene O'moso'mi lou' gamazilo' e'metelesa olonidoti' nene evene' hamokisi O'moso'mi velelo' nene gamazite nomine' ngelo minamolosune. Nanitekumu' ve. A'mine lou' gamazi ne'mo nene lihime daa' monovo danava nene do soto' gehepeve ogosa lelebizaa' neive.

Ne neiha O'moso'mi velelo' evene' lisihe' mineloningumu' nene louto' e'metaa' aka ne'mo nene vo damivo O'moso'mo a'minemu' gele hulo aka ato' nene idise do soto' o-lede neive. A'mine akamu' nene O'moso'mi gamazi ne'mosi livo ido' polohetelite gizani' gamazi ne'mosi livo setato' a'minemu' nene li soto' asine' ve.

A'mine aka nene ne'mino neive: O'moso'mo evene' lisihe' ve lo-ngedeline' nene ingine Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' i nizangumu' ve lo Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' ave mukikumu' nene loloseive. Ee, evene' muki' nene lihime daa' noune' nenako O'moso'mi emeni dameni lamine' goloso nene do ti' olonido' lisihe' amune. Nemu' nene O'moso'mo Zuda ve nene ve lisihe' ve lo-ngedeline' aka nene ato' ma neivo Zuda ve minamave nene ve lisihe' ve lo-ngedeline' aka nene ato' ma neivoba asi mo aka hamokovo' nene neive.

Ne'mino neine' nenako O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-ledeline' nene laza ne'mine lo-ledelido' lisihe' amuba haza ei' lulolo' do molo nasahili' o-ledo ve lisihe' ve lo-ledeleseive. Ne'mine lo-ledeline' nene Izesu' Kilisito' aza lihimetemu' golo hizo helo kuluhize-ledaa' aka do soto' ine' nemukovo' nene ve lisihe' ve lo-ledeleseive.

Ido' O'moso'mo kuluhize-ledeline' aka Izesu' Kilisito' do soto' ine' nene aza leli' lihimetemu' nene ei' vanise've hulo hilingumu' nene gele ele'vole' okunivo ne'mo nene O'moso'mi izebolo've lelikumu' nene do mate-delive losa ele'mize molavosa kuluhize-ledaa' aka nene do soto' ine' ve. Izesu' ne'mine ilive lo O'moso'mo ele'mize molani' nene gomukuti' lihime daa' ani' mamu' nene gelo geto lihime ngemamo hongu lo mino ninge mate-ngidine' nenako nemu' nene ei' monovo've lisihe' o neine' nene ningi gililizave lo lelebizelesa ele'mize molani' ve. Ido' ele'mize molani' nene idise gamenela ei' monovo've lisihe' nene ado' ve lisihe' minosasi ido' Izesu'nimu' gele ele'vole' nolonivemu' nene ve lisihe' ve ha lo-ledelido' lisihe' o neine' nene lelebizelesa ele'mize molani' ve.

Ne'mino laza ve lisihe' ve lo-ledelido' lisihe' minamosa haza Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' unidotikovo' O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-ledaa' neine' nenako laza okode do dizelonido' nene lisihe' amive. Okode do dizelone' aka nene mo hize tile lamine' ogave. Nene nanitekumu' ve. La'lisete lou' gamazilo' e'metekunivosa O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-lididiniko a'mine aka nene hize tilamidine'za asi Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' okunivosavo' nene ve lisihe' ve lo-ledaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene leli' okode do dizaa' aka nene mo hize tile lamine' ogave.

Ee, laza ti' lo gele none: O'moso'mo evenekumu' ve lisihe' ve lo-ledeline' nene lou' gamazilo' e'mete osu' lube lamube nemu' gele hulo Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' okunivosavo' nene ve lisihe' ve lo-ledeleseive.

Lingine gilavo O'moso nene Zuda ve minamaveti O'moso'ine minamo Zuda veti O'mosotevo' neihe. O'ove. O'moso nene hamokovo' neine' nenako nemu' nene aza mo Zuda ve minamave neti O'moso'inesi nene mino O'moso'mi noso okodela mulunive Zuda ve nene a'mine Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' okunivo ne'mo nene ve lisihe' ve lo-ledaa' ogo ido' O'moso'mi noso oko'nida milisa'mave heta ato' vesi nene a'mine Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' ikevosavo' nene engikisi O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-ngedeleseive.

Nemu' nene malite ti' li longo' ilisave: Ne'mino neine' nenako Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' oga' ne'movo' nene O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-ledelido' lisihe' o neive li likenako lingine nene louli'mi gono nene mo osu' lave lisa nilahe. O'ove. Laza mo keke' ne'mine lamune. Asi laza ne lou' nene hize ele' noo-dune.
Nemu' nene laza leli' Zuda veti zuho do soto' ive avoteho Abalahamu'nida soto' ine' inite' mamu' nene laza a'mido' do molosa lo gele ha gele ogo gelelone.
Abalahamu' nene aza monovo laminekovo' ogo molo minidoti' O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-didiniko aza nene ei' oko'no do dizelido' lisihe' o minidine'za O'moso'mi velelo' nene aza ne'mino ma minamidine.
A'minemu' nene mono' godolou' nene nadive li gizi nizani' neve. Mene gililo:
Abalahamu' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' o minavo
aza nene ve lisihe' ve lo-dine' ve.
Ve mali'mo ve malo' gono davo a'mine ve meni emeline' nene haza gidini noimuve lo gelosa emelivoba asi nenito' gono nodavo dina' neine' nene golo nohizuve lo gele minosa meni nene emeleseive.

Ido' a'mine'mine ogo laza ogo molo olone' ne'mo O'mosolo' gono nodune' gilivo mino monovo lamine' gehepevelokovo' e'metunidiniko O'moso'mo a'mido' golo hizo meni ne'mine lemo ve lisihe' ve lo-lididine'za mo ne'mino nomive. Nemu' nene ve ma laza a'mine ogo molo olone' initetoti' nene menite ne'mine ve lisihe' ve lo-ledelido' nomive lo gelosa ido' O'moso aza nene lihime'inesi vemukisi ve lisihe' ve lo-ngedaa' ive ve lo laza ogo molo olone' initeto' nene gele medelamo ezemu' haza gele ele'vole' olone' nene aza ezemu' gele ele'vole' oloningumukovo' nene ve lisihe' ve lo-ledeleseive.
Ido' neni' luvoni' ne'mino Davidi' aza O'moso'mo evene' igi mili minani' monovomu' nene gele hulo ve lisihe' ve lo-ngedelive nene ngolize izilizado' lisihe' i nizave lo ti' lo line' ve:
Ve ma lou' gamazi've avuto' angumu' nene
O'moso'mo gele hulo lihime'ine hulo-ngedelive nene
ngolize izilizado' lisihe' i nizave.
Ee, ve ma lihime'ine O'moso'mo do-ngede minamilive nene
ngolize izilizado' lisihe' i nizave.

Lingine gilavo a'mine ne'mino lolize izelonido' lisihe' oga' monovo mene O'moso'mi noso okodela mulunive Zuda velavo' soto' oga' neine' nehe ido' O'moso'mi noso oko'nida milisa'mave Zuda ve minamavelasi soto' oga' neine' neve. Nemu' nene lo gele ha gele olonge. Gililo. Laza ti' lo laa' none: Abalahamu' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ine' ne'mo O'moso ezemu' ve lisihe' ve lo-dine' ve. Nemu' nene a'mine luvoni' monovo nene O'moso'mi noso oko'nida milisa'mavelasi soto' oga' neive lo ningo gele none. Nanitekumu' ve.

O'moso'mo lihime'vemu' gele hulo Abalahamu'ni ve lisihe' ve lo-dine' monovomu' nene gohi gelosa gelelone. Abalahamu' oko'nola O'moso'mi noso molosa neivo O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-dine' nehe olihe O'moso'mi noso oko'nola molamivosa lo-dine' neve. O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-dine' nene oko'nola O'moso'mi noso neivosa nevoba asi olihe nomivosa ve lisihe' ve lo-dine' ve.

Ne'mine ogo Abalahamu' oko'nola O'moso'mi noso nomine' mino O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' nemu' nene O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-dine' nene do soto' olosa a'mine noso nene ei' oko'nolo' nene molani' ve. Ne'mine ine' nenako Abalahamu' aza O'moso'mi noso oko'nida nomine' minisa O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' ilizadoti' nene O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-ngedeliveti me'nibo lolo' ine' ve.

Ne'mino engi' me'nibo lolo' ogo minine' nene laza O'moso'mi noso okodela mulunive linge maliti meteho nesi neive. Ado' laza nene avoteho Abalahamu' O'moso'mi noso oko'nola nomivo mino gele ele'vole' ogo minine' monovo'velo' e'meto mino O'moso'mi nosovo' nene okodela mulunivoba asi gele ele'volekisi o noniveti meteho nesi nene neive.

Ido' naza ne'mine noluvoni' nene memu' luve: O'moso'mo Abalahamu'ni misubo muki' nene ei' a'vopilemokisi salani molo-lengedekuve lo lo huko-dine' nene lou' gamazi gomukuti' ma minido' e'meto miningumu' nevoba asi O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo miningumu' nene O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-dine' nenako nemu' nene a'mine salani gamazi lo huko-dine' ve.

Ee, lou' gamazilo' e'metelonidoti' nene a'mine salani inite' nene ma dunidiniko O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' oga' monovo nesi ido' a'mine O'moso'mo Abalahamu'ni lo huko-dine' gamazi nesi nene vi haza nite' lolo' asidine.

Naniteli'mo ve. Lou' gamazilo' e'metaa' ne'mo nene O'moso'mo izebolo' molavo lihime lemeli akalo' lele'mize molaa' neive. Ne neiha lou' gamazi ma minamilidokovo' nene lou' gamazi avuto' olone' aka ma minamoloseive.

Nemu' nene a'mine salani inite' dalone' nene mo O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' olonidotikovo' nene haza gidini doso' o neive. Ee, a'mine lo huko-lidine' inite' nene O'moso'mo haza nasahili' o-lididi'movo' nene Abalahamu' a'vopilemo' zuho muki' ado' Mose' lou' gamazi'mi gesi mingu' nonivesi ido' a'mingu' minami Abalahamu' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' idi'mine igi gili ele'vole' ilizavesi nene laza mukito' dalonido' lisihe' o minelive losa lehize-lidine' nenako gele ele'vole' olonidotikovo' nene haza gidini doso' o neive. Abalahamu' nene a'mine ne'mino dalonive mukiliti meteho nene neive.
Ne'mino meteho minine' nene a'minemu' O'moso'mo line' gamazi mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Naza nene evene' zuho ato ato' mukiliti avo'nibo mineline lo
gele'mize molokuve.

Ee, O'moso'mi velelo' nene a'mine lo huko line' gamazi nene mo ele'vole' o neive. Ido' O'moso aza nene hilavemu' gohi ve'ine gizilizave lo hilanguti' nene gohi do ote-ngedaa' ive mino ido' olihe soto' amani' inite' nene mo soto' ani' gilivosa a'minemu' nene ha lo soto' oga' ive nesi neive.

Ido' Abalahamu' nene O'moso'mo lo huko-dine' inite' soto' o-deline' aka nene nomine'za aza nene a'mine inite' soto' iline' aka nene mo ninge minine' gelavo mino aza nene O'moso'mo ga'vopilemo' nene ne'mini muki' soto' ilisave lo lo-nimido' nene gihile izavo evene' zuho ato ato' mukiliti avo'nibo ha lolo' olosuve lo gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ve.

Ido' ne'mino gele ele'vole' ogo minine' nene aza kilisimasi've vanu hadeti (100) ne'minesi mino oko'no've nene gilisupo molangumu' nesi nene ha gele mino ido' Sala' aza nesi nene eleni molavo izipe gedeline' gamene nene osu' lavo minine' neemukisi nene mo ha gele minine'za gele ele'vole' ogo minine' nene matamine'.
A'mine ne'mino O'moso'mo lo-dine' nemu' nene gele hepe' lizo gala seta' gelamine'za gele ele'vole' ine' ne'mo amuzo molo minavosa O'moso nene opo'ni laa' ine' ve.
Ido' a'mine gamazi lo huko-nidive O'moso ne'mo a'mine gamazi nene do gihile izelido' mo lisihe' o neine' nenako ha do gihile izeleseive lo gele mu'musi' gehepeve ogo minine' ve.
Ne'mine ogo minine' nenako a'neemu' nene O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-dine' ve.
Ido' O'moso'mo ne'mino ve lisihe' ve lo-dine' mono' godolou' gizi nizani' nene eikumukovo' neive li gililizave lisa gizi nizani' nevoba
asi Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' hilinguti' do ote-dive O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minunivo O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-ledelive lelikumukisi nene gizi nizani' ma neive.
A'mine Guvetesi ve Izesu'ni nene leli' lihimetemu' medelo helelive lo O'moso'mo eveneliti a'ningu' molavo helavosa leli' nene ve lisihe' ve lo-ledeline' aka velo hilinguti' nene gohi do ote-dine' ve.

Nemu' nene ezemu' gele ele'vole' unidoti' nene O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-ledavo mino O'moso'mo lelikumu' izebolo' molani' nene mateline' aka Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' velavo ne'mo nene O'mososi lezesi vovoteu' nene gamazisi nomivo lamine' none.

Ee, idise mela O'moso'mo nasahili' noo-lidivo none' aka nene a'mine Guvetesi ve ne'mo vele-ledavosa a'mingu' none. Ido' a'mingu' mino O'moso'mi emeni dameni lamine' nene mudise do leli' olosune lo a'minemu' nene gilingili ogo gizebo ogo lolize izo minaa' noune.

Ido' nemukovo' lolize izesa'mune. Laza geni initeli'mi lulou' minelone' ne'mo nene O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo mino geni gehe do dizo minelone' amuzote do naba o-ledaa' neive lo gele mino geni inite' lelita miningu' nesi nene a'mine genimu' nene ha lolize izo minaa' noune.

Ido' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo mino geni gehe do dizo minelone' ne'mo nene O'moso'mo ninge lamine' iline' lemeni dameni nene do soto' o-ledeleseive. Ido' O'moso'mo ninge lamine' iline' lemeni damenisi minelone' ne'mo leli' nene O'moso'mo do eita oloseive lo laza gele mu'musi' olonido' nene do lisihe' o-ledaa' neive lo nesi nene gele none.

Ido' a'mine gele mu'musi' une' inite' nene vo haza ogavo lovozo ngelo ma helamolosune. Nene nanitekumu' ve. O'moso'mo ei' Sikalahu've lehize-lidine' ne'mo nene luteu' gono do O'moso'mo vauve elo lulo limine' ne'mi monovo nene do soto' ogo lelebizaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene a'mine gele mu'musi' une' inite' nene vo haza ogavo lovozo ngelo ma helamolosune.

Ido' O'moso'mo lulo vauve elo limive luvoni' nene neemu' luve: Laza nene O'moso e'metelonido' minamo lute gilizevosi ha nonivo O'moso'mo molani' gamene nene lisihe' ogavo Kilisito' nene a'mine O'moso e'metamunivemu' nene medelo hiline' ve.

Evene' lisihe' gehepeve nene bililisa navo ma evene' hamoli'mosi ezelo' medelo helelove lo ngelo ma lamoloseiha ma liline' nene laza amoso' inite' nene olosa lave lo ha gelelesune. Ido' evene' lamine' gehepevelokisi nene medeli evene' muki' nete ngeli ma hilamavo hamo hamolitevo' nene helaakumu' golise gilani' nene gili huli amuzo mili ma hililizahe lo gele nouve.
Ne neiha O'moso'mo lulo atoli'mine ogo leme neine' nene ne'mino do soto' ogo lelebizave: Laza nene ha lihimelo' ve nonivo Kilisito' aza evene' amiliza inite' gehepeve ogo lelito' medelo hiline' ve.

Nemu' nene ti' lo gelelesune: Kilisito' aza lelito' medelo lihimetemu' vanise've hulo helavo nemu' nene O'moso'mo idise ve lisihe' ve lo-ledavo none' nenako nemu' O'moso'mo evenekumu' izebolo' molani' nene Kilisito' do matosa lihime lemelinguti' do lu' izelingumu' nene mo gele mu'musi' olonido' o neive.

Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve: Laza O'mososi biluva' ogo noningu' nene ei' O'moso'mi gipele nene lelikumu' helo O'mososi do hamo' o-lidine' nene mo amoso' inite' dani' nenako nemu' nene laza O'mososi do hamo' o-ledavo noningu' nene aza hilinguti' gohi minevo' alevo' o neine' ne'mo nene haza ilido' o neine' inite' ogo mudise do lu' izeleseive lo gele mu'musi' gehepeve olosune.
Ido' neevo' nevoba asi Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' ne'mino idise O'mososi do hamo' o-ledavo none' ne'mo nene O'mosomu' lolize izo minaa' noune.

Nemu' nene laza ti' lo gele none: Me misubou' lihime soto' ine' nene ve hamoli'mo do soto' ogavo a'mine lihime ne'mo nene helaa' monovo do soto' ine' ve. Ne'mine ogavo evene' muki' nene lihime daa' noune' nenako helaa' nene leli' mukita soto' o limine' ve.
Ee, Mose' lou' gamazi olihe soto' amivosa me misubou' nene evene' lihime daa' ani'za lou' nomida nene O'moso'mo lihime do molo-ngedamaa' neine' ve.

Ne neiha lou' nomine' gameneu' nene ado' Adamu' minidoti' mine do dizo vo Mose' lou' gamazi dani' gamenela nene evene' soto' igi mini'mi ave muki' ingine Adamu'ni O'moso'mo lo huko-dine' gamazi avuto' idi'mine igi lihime ma damani'za inginesi nene helaali'mi gesi mingukovo' mini hilaakovo' ani' ma neive. Ido' Adamu' neve nene alinge' soto' ilivemu' ha avazaha've ne'minosa nene soto' ine' ve.

Ne neiha a'mine evene' hamoli'mo api' ogo O'moso'mo lo huko-dine' gamazi avuto' ogo lihime dadoti' nene evene' muki' helaa' noune'za a'mine Adamu' lihime dani' nene ivile' goloso ivosa O'moso'mo nasahili' o-lidine' nene evene' hamo' Izesu' Kilisito' ne'mo haza gidini vauve elo a'mine nasahili' nene evene' mukito' do soto' o-lidine' nenako nemu' nene Adamu'ni O'moso'mo lo huko-dine' gamazi avuto' ine' ne'mi gihile nene atoli'mine ogo neivo ido' O'moso'mo nasahili' o-lidine' ne'mi gihile nene atoli'mine ogo neivo ato atoli'mine igi nizasive.

Ee, a'mine evene' hamoli'mo lihime dani' ne'mi gihile nene atoli'mine ogo neivo O'moso'mo haza gidini o-lidine' initeli'mi gihile nene atoli'mine ogo neive noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve: A'mine lihime hamo' dani' ne'mo nene O'moso'mo goni' o-ledo lihime lemaa' neine' nene do soto' ine'za laza gamazi've avuto' vai' oga' noune' neivosa O'moso'mo nene haza gidini o-lidine' inite' ne'mo nene aza gamazite do helo ve lisihe' ve lo-ledaa' neine' nene do soto' ine' ve.

Lamine', evene' hamoli'mo O'moso'mo lo huko-dine' gamazi gana' avuto' idoti' nene evene' laza helaali'mi gesi mingukovo' mino helaa' noune' nenako ido' ve hamo' Izesu' Kilisito' o-lidine' inite' ne'mo helaa' nene ivile' goloso ogavosa O'moso'mo vauve elo nasahili' o-ledelidoti' ve lisihe' ve lo-ledelive laza nene guvetesi ve ne'mine lolo' ogo minevo' minevo' ogovo' minelesune.

Nemu' nene ti' lo gelelesune: Ve hamoli'mo O'moso'mi gamazi avuto' idoti' nene evene' muki' nene O'moso'mo goni' o-ledo lihime lemelido' o none' ne'mino ve hamoli'mo monovo lisihe' gehepeve ogo molo idoti' nene O'moso'mo gamazite do helo ve lisihe' ve lo-ledavo evene' muki' minevo' minevo' ogo minelonido' o none' ma neive.

Ee, evene' hamoli'mo O'moso'mi gamazi gele hulidoti' nene evene' muki' lihimelo' vevo' lolo' une' ne'mino ve hamoli'mo O'moso'mi gamazi gele do osu' lidoti' evene' muki' nene ve lisihe' lolo' olosune.

Ne'mine o neiha O'moso'mo lou' gamazi've do soto' ine' nene lou' avuto' oga' monovo nene naba o'mo vo minelive losa do soto' ine'za lihime daa' monovo naba o'mo vo minida nene a'mine naba o'mo vine' votigile nene ivile' goloso ivosa O'moso'mi nasahili' nene atoli'mine ogo soto' ogo minine' ve.

Ido' ne'mine ine' nene nanitekumu' ve. Lihime daa' monovo ne'mo helaali'mi gesi mingu' hulo-ledavo a'mingu' mino helaa' noune' ne'mino Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' gono dani' ne'mo nene evene' lisihe' lolo' o-ledo O'moso'mi nasahilili'mi gesi mingu' hulo-ledavo a'mingu' mini minivo' minivo' ilizave losa ne'mine ine' ve.

Ido' lihime daa' monovo naba o'mo vo minida nene a'mine naba o'mo vine' votigile nene ivile' goloso ivosa O'moso'mi nasahili' nene atoli'mine ogo soto' ogo minine' nenako nemu' nene laza nadive lolone. O'moso'mo nasahili' gohi vauve elo o-ledeline' aka nene do soto' oloseize. Lihime nene daakovo' ogo minuke'zo lolobe.

Mo keke' ne'mine ma lamolosune. Laza nene hilunive gelo mino hilave nete inite' hamokumukisi upuho' isa'mani' ne'mino upuho' ogo lihime gohi damolonido' mine molo nonive nete nene lihime daa' monovo nene gohi do oto ogo molo minelonido' nene mo keke' nomive.
Ido' Kilisitoda gi'mizo minelone lo noso hulunive laza muki' ne'mino noso huluningu' nene ezesi maka' lohoto' zalo' hilune' gilivo none' nenako nemu' nene lingine gilamahe.

Ne'mino neine' nenako nemu' nene laza noso huluningu' nene ezesi maka' helosa ezesi maka' gonoso galesela vo minune' gele neive. Ido' noso huluningu' ne'mine ine' nene Kilisito'ni nene meleho O'moso'mo amuzo've atoli'mine ogo minine' nene do soto' ogo hilinguti' do ote-davo neine' ne'mino lazasi nene a'mine'mine ogo ezesi maka' otosa minevo' alevote nene gosoho' lolo' ogavo igi mili minilizave losa ne'mine ine' ve.
Ee, ezela gi'mizo mino ei' hilidi'mine ogo lazasi maka' hilune' giline' nenako nemu' nene aza hilinguti' otidi'mine ogo lazasi nene ha ote none' gilivosa minelesune.

Laza ti' lo gele none: Lihime monovo goloso ne'mo okodela gono daa' ine' nene osu' lavo laza lihime monovolo' gohi gelekele' ogo minamoloningumu' nene lemeni dameni litehe nene Kilisito'nisi lohoto' zalo' bili nizani' ma neive.

Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve: Ve'inesi mini lihime monovolo' gelekele' igi mini hilangu' nene a'mine monovosi huko vavosa hilave nene lihime monovo'mi gelekele' ve gohi ma minami haza minaa' nave.
Laza nene Kilisitolesi maka' hilune' ma nenako laza nene ezesi maka' minevo' alevo' ogo minelesune lo mo gele mu'musi' gehepeve o none.

Ido' ne'mine lo gele mu'musi' o none' nene Kilisito' hilinguti' otine' nene aza helaali'mi gesi minguti' nene mudise lemo heta ogani' nenako gohi helamoloseive lo gele minosa nene laza gele mu'musi' o none.
Ido' hiline' nene lihime monovoli'mi amuzo nene mudise do nohulosa hiline' ve. Ido' gohi minevo' alevo' neine' nene O'moso'mine nene minevo' alevo' o do neive.

Ido' lingine lengikumu' nesi nene ti' li gili minilo: Laza nene mo hilune' gilivo mino lihime nene gohi ma damolone. Ido' minevo' alevo' ogo minelone' nene mo Izesu' Kilisitoda gi'mizo mino O'moso'mine nene minevo' alevo' o do minelesune.
Nemu' nene okodine heleline' akalo' mine molo neine' ne'mo nene lanite' gelo dalosa giline' goloso nite' nene mo di minilizave lo lihime monovo ne'mo nene do eita ogo do gelekele' o-lengedalize.

Lingine okodidoti' gizedine adine ne'mine nehe nanitetine nolihe inite' hamokisi nene goloso nite' dalive li lihime monovoli'mi gono daa' inite' ne'mine nene lolo' i-damilo. Asi hiluninguti' nene otosa gosoho' lemeni damenilo' minevo' alevo' ogo none' nenako nemu' nene laza okodelati' gizede ade nevo'mine nehe ido' nanitete nolihe neve nene O'moso'mine emekunivo ei' gono daa' ine' inite've ne'mine lolo' ogavo monovo lisihe' laminekovo' ilive lii okodine muki' nene O'moso imilo.
Ee, lingine nene Mose' lou' gamazi'mi gesi mingu' nene minami O'moso'mi nasahilili'mi gesi mingu' imi nizani' nenako nemu' lengi' nene lihime monovoli'mo eita do gelekele' o-lengedelido' minamave.

Ne'mino neine' nenako nadolone. Laza nene lou' gamazi'mi gesi mingu' minamo O'moso'mi nasahilili'mi gesi mingu' none' nenako lou' gamazi nene avuto' ogo ha gopo lihime daakovo' olobe. O'ove. Mo keke' ne'mine amolosune.

Lingine ve mali'mi gelekele' ve lolo' ogo ei' gamazi've gele dalone li vi gi'mizi eito' gelekele' i-di'mi vi minilizani' ne'mo nene mo ei' gelekele' ve gehepeve nene nizave. Ido' lihime monovolo' gelekele' igi minilizani' ne'mi gihile nene helaa' nene do soto' o-lengedeleseive. Ido' O'mosolo' gelekele' igi minilizani' ne'mi gihile nene O'moso'mo evene' lisihe' ve lo-lengedeleseive. Ne'mino neingumu' nene lingine gilamani' nehe. Mo gili nilisave.

Ne neiha lingine gomu' nene lihime monovoli'mi gelekele' ve minani'za Kilisito' gonou' velite apizi lingimi di gelekele' i-lingidani' gamazi'mi monovolo' lutine milisa e'metani' nenako nemu' nene O'mosomu' tangezo' ve lolone.
Ee, lingine nene lihime monovolo' gelekele' igi minanguti' nene O'moso'mo do kuluhize-lengedavo monovo lisihe' lamineli'mi gelekele' ve lili' ikeve.

Ne'mine noluvoni' nene lingine nene haza evene' leli' ne'mine mini naza gamazi gihilelo' e'meto ma loloni' nene lingine a'mine'mi monovo gililizado' lisihe' amani' nenako nemu' nene ne'mine amo ha eveneliti gamazilo' do molo ne'mine noluve. Ido' lingine gomu' nene okodido' gizedine adine ne'mine initetine muki' nene lou' avuto' igi lutine do goloso oga' monovolo' di gelekele' i-ngidisa lou' avuto' iga' ave gehepeve lili' ani' ma'mine igi O'moso'mi evenele gehepeve minelonido' do lisihe' oka' oka' okunivo lute lisihe' lamine' gehepeve ilive li monovo lisiheto' nene a'mine okodine nene di gelekele' i-dilizave.
Ne'mine ilizave luvoni' nene nanitekumu' ve. Lingine gomu' nene lihime monovoli'mi gelekele' ve mini monovo lisiheto' nene gelekele' isa'mani'za
ne'mine adoti' nene gihile've nanite' soto' oga' ine' neve. A'mine lingine ne'mine iga' adoti' idise longovozo hilaa' nani' inite' ne'mo nene mo helaa' nene do soto' neive.

Ne'mine oga' neine'za idise lingine lihime monovolo' gelekele' oga' aka nene mudise huli O'mosolo' gelekele' igi minadoti' nene gihile've nene lutine lisihe' o'mo vo osu' lavosa ne'mo nene mo minevo' minevo' minaa' lengemeni dameni dalisave.

Ee, lihime monovoli'mo nene meni've meni hizaa' neine' nene mudise helaa' monovo ne neiha Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisitoda vo gi'mizekunivo O'moso'mo haza gidini lehize-ledaa' neine' inite' nene minevo' minevo' minaa' lemeni dameni ne neive.
Neze zuhokizo, lingine louli'mi monovo gili minavemu' nene noluvoni' nenako nemu' nene evene' laza louto' gelekele' olone' nene vetesi none' gameneukovo' nene gelekele' olosune lisa gili nilisave.

Nemu' nene naza gamazi ma ti' lo lo molo noluve: Vene' di minani' vene' neve nene ve malo' vamoloseive lo minine' lou' gamazi ne'mo nene vanaho velesi ha mineline' gamenelokovo' nene analo' do minaa' neine'za vanaho ma heleline' nene vanahidokovo' minelive lo minine' lou' ne'mo nene kuluhize-davo haza mineleseive.

Ido' nemu' nene vanaho velesi ha neivo ve gohi malo' viline' nene vene' vemoho' bizivo' minaakumu' minine' lou' ma nene avuto' oga' ine' vene' ve li-dilisave. Ne'mine li-dilisaha vanaho helavosa ve gohi malo' vamilive lo minine' lou' ma'mo nene kuluhize-dine' nenako nemu' nene ve gohi malo' viline' nene a'mine lou' ma avuto' amoloseive.

Nemu' nene neze zuhokizo, a'mine'mine igi linginesi nene Kilisitolesi hamo' lili' igi mini maka' hilikevo gomu' vadibo ne'mine minive ado' lou' gamazi ne'mo nene gohi adido' do minamivo minikeve. Ido' ne'mine ani' nene ve gohi malo' vi gi'mizilizangumu' nene ne'mine ani' ve. Ee, O'mosola gihile di soto' ilizangumu' hilinguti' otive Izesu'ni eita nene vi gi'mizilizangumu' nene ne'mine ani' ve.

Laza lemeni dameni litehelo' e'meto minune' gamenela nene laza lihime monovomu' lanite' gelaa' une' monovo nene lou' ne'mo do ote-davo okode mukita gono davo a'mido' e'metunidoti' gihile've nene helaa' akalo' mine molo minune' ve.

Ne'mine une'za Kilisitolesi maka' hilune' ne'mo nene louli'mo adelo' do minine' nene idise kuluhize-ledavo laza a'mine litehe molo vine' lou' gamazi gizani' malo' nene gelekele' amo O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo lemeni dameni gosoho' do soto' o-lidido' nene gelekele' ogo gono daa' noune.

Nemu' nene laza nadive lolone. Lou' gamazi nene inite' goloso lihime ne'mine neive lolobe. Mo keke' ne'mine neive lamolosune'za lou' nene ma minamidiniko naza lihime monovo nene mo ningamuvodine. Ee, lou' ne'mo mumuzo' amozo lamidiniko naza mumuzo' oga' monovo nene ma ningo gelamuvodine.

A'mine lou' gamazi ne'mo nene aka velo do upuho' o-davo lihime monovo ne'mo nene mumuzo' oga' monovo muki' nene vauve elo lu'neu' do soto' o-nidine' ve. Ee, lou' nene ma minamidiniko lihime monovo ne'mo nene ogo molo monaa' initekisi ma amo hilive ne'mino haza minidinako nemu' nene noluve.

Gomu' lou' ne'mo nenita olihe amivosa naza nene ha gopo minevo' alevo' ogo ve'nesi minuvoni'za O'moso'mi lou' gamazi ogo hetelidoti' nene lihime monovo ne'mo nene hiline' gelavo lu'neu' mininguti' nene gilelo otavosa

naza ma nene mo hiluvoni' gelo minekuve. Ne'mine ogo mino naza giluvoni' nene O'moso'mi lou' gamazi ne'mo minevo' minevo' oloni' akalo' nene nele'mize molalosa minine'za asi helaa' akalo' nele'mize molaave lo giluvoni' ve.
Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve: A'mine lou' gamazi ne'mo nene aka velo lihime nene do upuho' o-davo lihime monovo ne'mo nene go'ne izavo lou' nene avuto' okuvosa ne'mo nene nebele helave.
Nemu' nene O'moso'mi lou' gamazi nene mo lihime'vesi nomine' lamine' gehepeve neivo ido' gamazi hamo' hamo' a'mingu' nizani' nesi nene lihime'vesi nomine' mino mo lisihe' laminekovo' ne neive.

Nemu' nene naza hiluvoni' ma nene a'mine inite' lamine' gehepeve ne'mo nene nebelavosa hiluvoni' nehe. O'ove. Ne'mo nomive. Lihime monovo neve nene inite' goloso minine' nene mo soto' ogo minelingumu' nene a'mine lihime monovo ne'mo gono do a'mine inite' lamine' lou' gamazi nedunu' nene nemengu' molavo ne'mo nene lihime dosa hiluvoni' gelavo nouve. Ido' ne'mino neine' nene lou' ne'mo nene lelebizavo lihime monovo atoli'mine ogo inite' goloso gehepeve minine' nene ningeloningumu' nene ne'mino neive.

Ee, laza ti' lo gele none: O'moso'mi lou' gamazi neu' nene O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mi emeni damenisi neive. Ne neiha neni' nene haza eveneliti lemeni damenisi mino lihime monovo'mi gelekele' ve ne'mine ne nouve.

Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve: Naza nene olosa gelamuvoni' inite' monovo goloso nene ogo molo ogo mino naza gosele' gehepeve nebelaa' neine' inite' nene ha oga' nouve. Ne'mine oga' nouvoni' nene nanimu' nouhe nemu' nene mo gelesi amuve.

Ido' naza nene lou' avuto' ogo olosa gelamuvoni' inite' goloso ma oloni' nene ha oloha olosa gelamuvoni' ne'mo nene a'mine nene amaa' inite' ve lo giluvoni' nene do soto' oloseive. Ido' lou' ne'mosi nene a'mine inite' amaa' inite' ve lo neine' nenako naza giluvoni' nesi nene lou' ne'mo lido' vo milise' ogavo ne'mo naza lou' nene mo lamine' neive lo giluvoni' nene do soto' oloseive.
Ne'mino neine' nenako naza inite' goloso oloni' nene neni' gehepeve olovoba asi neni' lu'neu' minine' lihime monovo ne'mo nene oloseive.

Naza lamineto' noluve. Neniku' nene ado' nemeni dameni litehesi nouvongu' neve nene monovo lamine' ma minamive lo gele nouve. Nanitekumu' ve. Naza nene monovo lamineto' e'metelesa ha gelelesuha e'metaa' nene mo ngelo ma amolosuve.
Ne'mine noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve: Inite' lamine' olosa gelaa' nouvoni' ma nene mo osa'muve. Asi monovo goloso olosa ma gelesa'muvoni' ma nene ha o'mo vo minaa' nouve.
Ido' naza nene olosa gelamuvoni' inite' ma oloni' nene neni' gehepeve olovoba asi neni' lu'neu' minine' lihime monovo ne'mo nene oloseive.
Nemu' nene monovo nenita ne'mino ma neine' nene mo ningekuve: Naza nene monovo laminekovo' ogo molo minelove lo nogiluvo a'mido' nene goloso monovo neve nene nenita mo omo minaa' neive.
Ee, neni' lu'neu' gehepeve vomine O'moso'mi lou' gamazimu' nene lanite' gelaa' nouha

oko'ne mukita nene ato' monovosi minaa' neivosa nene mo ningekuve. A'mine monovo ne'mo nene lu'ne ga'neu' minine' monovo lamine' nene lovo o emo mino a'nelo' nesi nene do mino a'mine oko'nela minine' lihime monovolo' nene do gelekele' o-nedaa' neive.
Agae, minevo' alevo'ne lihitehe' o vive naza helaali'mi akalo' mine molani' oko'nesi mene nouvonguti' nene zaho do nu' izelive.
Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' asi've nene mo do nu' izaa' neive. Nemu' nene O'mosomu' tangezo' ve lo nolo-duve.

Ido' gamazi muki' mene luvongumu' nene gelo ti' lo lolosuve: Neni' nene ga'nedunu' O'moso'mi lou' gamazilo' nene gelekele' oga' nouvoni'za nemeni dameni litehe ne'mo nene lihime monovolo' do gelekele' o-nedaa' neive.
Nemu' nene Izesu' Kilisitoda gi'mize minuniveti okodela nene lihime gohi ma nomivo O'moso'mo lihime lemelido' minamune.

Nene nanitekumu' ve. Naza Izesu' Kilisitoda gi'mizosa minevo' minevo' minaa' do soto' o-ledaa' ive O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mi anau' ogo nouvoni' ne'mo nene helaato' lele'mize molaa' neine' monovo lihime daali'mi anau' minuvonguti' nene mo kuluhize-nedave.

Ee, evene' leli' lemeni dameni nene amuzo molamine' nenako ne'mo nene lou' gamazilo' ngelo e'metamolone' ogavo lou' gamazi ne'mo lihime'mi anau' minuninguti' nene ngelo ma kuluhize-ledamine' ve. Ne neiha lou' gamazi ne'mo ngelo mo lolo' amine' inite' nene O'moso'mo nene mo ha ine' ve. A'mine inite' ine' nene ei' gipele nene leli' lihime daa' univeti okode ne'minesi nene leli' lihimete apase-ledelingumu' ve lo imiseline' ve. Ne'mine ogavosa leli' lihimete muki' nene a'mine oko'no hamoto' nene dizavo O'moso'mo lihime imine' ve.

Ido' ne'mine ine' nene lemeni dameni litehe'mo lido' e'metamosa asi O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo lido' e'meto ogo molo oga' nounive nene louli'mo lidi'mine igi evene' lisihe' lamine' minilizangumu' ve losa ne'mine ine' ve.

Ee, evene' ma ingine ngemeni dameni litehelo' e'metaa' ave nene ngemeni dameni liteheli'mi initekumukovo' gili minaa' nani'za Sikalahuli'mo lido' e'metaa' nave ingine nene a'mine Sikalahu' ne'mo giline' initekumukovo' nene gili minaa' nave.

Lemeni dameni litehe'mo gilido' e'metaa' ne'mo nene helo vo tolovo olonido' lele'mize molaa' neine'za Sikalahuli'mo gilido' e'metaa' ne'mo nene minevo' minevo' ogo mino hongu lovo' minelonido' lele'mize molaa' neive.

A'mine lemeni dameni liteheli'mo gilido' e'metaa' ne'mo nene O'moso'mi lou' gamazi'mo lido' nene gele damo mino gele daline' amuzo'vesi nomivo mo keke' ngelo gele damoloseinako ne'mo nene O'moso biluva' o-daa' do soto' oga' neive.
Ee, ngemeni dameni liteheli'mi gelekele' ve minave nete nene O'moso'mo ninge lamine' daline' inite' hamokisi nene mo keke' ngeli ma amilisave.

Ne neiha lengi' lutingu' O'moso'mi Sikalahu' nene ma minevo' dovo' ogo noline' nene lingine lengemeni dameni litehe'mi gelekele' ve minami asi Sikalahu' ne'mi gelekele' ve nene nizave. Ido' ve ma ingine Kilisito' Sikalahu've di minamave nene Kilisito' zuho minisa'mave.
Ee, okodine nene lihime monovoli'mo mo helelido' o neine'za evene' lisihe' lili' igi minani' ne'mo lutine nene vele gizo neive.

Izesu' hilinguti' do ote-dive'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo lutingu' mo minevo' dovo' ogo noline' nene a'mine Sikalahu' ne'mo lengi' lutingu' minevo' dovo' ogo neingumu' nene Kilisito' hilinguti' do ote-dive aza helelido' o neine' okodine nesi nene gohi ha do vele gizeleseive.

Nemu' nene neze zuhokizo, a'mido' nene golo hizo inite' ma olonido' o neine'za a'mine inite' nene lemeni dameni litehe neve eito' golo hizelonido' nene nomive. Ee, a'mine lemeni dameni litehe ne'mo gilido' nene e'meto ogo molo olonido' nene nomive.

Nene nanitekumu' ve. Lingine lengemeni dameni litehe'mo gilido' e'meti minilizani' nene mo mudise helaato' mini mili nizave. Ne neiha lingine O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mi amuzodunu' nene okodine'mo monovo goloso ogo molo oga' ine' nene ma bili hililizani' nene mudise minevo' minevo' ogato' mini mili nizave.
Ee, O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo lido' e'metaa' ave muki' nene O'moso'mi izipahala nizani' nenako nemu' nene mudise minivi' minivi' ilisave.

Ido' O'moso'mi izipahala nizave luvoni' nene nemu' luvoni' ve: Lingine di ti' ani' Sikalahu' ne'mo nene golise gohi gili'mi vi minilizave lo do gelekele' ve lolo' o-lingidine' nevoba asi O'moso'mi izipahala lolo' o-lingidine' ma neive. Ido' ne'mine o-lidine' ne'mo laza O'mosomu' nene meteho ve lo Ahono lo vise laa' noune.
O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo nene leli' lute'mo lo-limine' gamazi hize ele' ogo lelikumu' nene O'moso'mi izipahala nizave lo lo soto' ogo lo-lemaa' neive.

Ido' O'moso'mi izipahala none' nenako O'moso'mo salani molani' inite' dalonive nene none. Ee, ido' Kilisito'ni O'moso'mo do naba o-delingu' lezesi makato' do naba o-ledelingumu' nene Kilisito' mulumo alumo nite' gihine' ne'mino lazasi makato' ma geheso' nene Kilisito' salani inite've nene ezesi makato' dalosune.

Naza idise mela nene geni mulumo alumo nite' gehaa' noune' nemu' nene amuzo molo ti' lo gele nouve: Alinge' soto' o-ledeline' inite' ado' O'moso'mo do naba o-lidivo lamine' minelone' monovo ne'mo nene inite' naba goloso neine' nenako a'mine genimu' nene mo gele hulolonido' lisihe' o neive.
Ne nanitekumu' ve. O'moso'mo do soto' molani' inite' muki' nete nene O'moso'mo izipahala zuho Okulumo' lemeni damenisi do soto' o-ledelingumu' nene mo soto' iliho li gizebo lekeseve igi nizave.

Ne'mini a'mine gamenemu' gizebo igi nizani' nene a'mine gamene alido' nene O'moso'mo a'mine do soto' molani' inite' nene gihile izamilizado' ngele'mize molavo minadoti' nene kuluhizilizani' nenako nemu' nene gizebo igi nizave. Ido' O'moso'mo gihile izamilizado' ngele'mize molani' nene ingine ne'mine o-ledelive li gilangumu' nevoba asi ei' lulolo' do molosa gihile izamilizado' ngele'mize molani' ve. Ee, aza gihile izamilizado' ngele'mize molani' nene aza ti' lo gele mu'musi' ogo minosa nene ne'mine ine' ve: Alinge' vo tolovo oga' ne'mi anau' minilizanguti' nene kuluhizi O'moso neni' izipaha'ne zuho nene inite' mali'mi anaukisi minami atoli'mine igi haza gehepeve nizani' ne'mini haza minilisave lo gele mu'musi' ogo minine' ve.

Ee, laza ti' lo gele none: O'moso'mo do soto' molani' inite' muki' nete nene vene' izipe gidilisa mulumo gilaa' nani' ne'mini ganakuti' mulumo gili le' goloso izi mini di dizi idise gamenelasi mene ha ne'mine igi nizave.

Ido' inginevo' nene ne'mine igi nizavoba asi O'moso'mo lehize-ledeline' initekuti' gana' dalone' inite' O'moso'mi Sikalahu' mo do nonive lazasi nene O'moso'mo izipaha'ne ve lo do eita ogo okode nene helo vaa' akalo' minidoti' do kuluhize-delingumu' gizebo ogo nonida mene luteu' le' izo minaa' noune.

Ee, ne'mino hele vaa' okode nene do kuluhize-delive lo a'minemu' gele mu'musi' ogo nonivosa nene do lu' izine' ve. Ido' inite' ma soto' oloseive lo gele mu'musi' ogo gizebo minaa' noune' inite' ma soto' iline' nene laza gele mu'musi' o minelone' ma nene gohi gele mu'musi' ve lamolosune. Ido' mo ningikeni' initekumu' nene gili mu'musi' igi mini gizebo a'minemu' nene ma isa'mave.
Ne neiha olihe ma ningamune' initekumu' gele mu'musi' ogo minelone' nene mo a'minemu' gizebo o do dizo minelesune.

Ido' gele mu'musi' oga' noune' ne'mo hize ele' o-ledaa' neine' ne'mino O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mosi nene monoku' gilizevo ogo minaa' nouninguti' nene hize ele' o-ledaa' neive. Ido' hize ele' o-ledaa' neine' nene laza O'mosola lolone' o neine' monovo nene gele guno amune' nenako nemu' nene asi've nene lelito' medelo laza gamazi vise' ogo le' izo luteu' gelaa' noune' monovo nene hize ele' o-ledo O'mosola lo-ledaa' neive.

Ne'mine oga' neine' nene Sikalahu' ne'mo gala giline' nene luteu' minine' inite' vise' ogo do soto' oga' ive O'moso ne'mo nene mo ningo gelaa' neive. Nene nanitekumu' ve. A'mine Sikalahu' ne'mo nene O'moso'mi lulolo' do molosa O'moso'mi evenelelo' medelo lelikumu' O'mosola laa' neine' nemu' ve.

Ido' laza ti' lo gele none: Lute O'moso eme nonive ado' ei' gala gilido' ogo ei' ve lo lele'mize molavo nonivemu' nene aza lelita soto' iliza inite' muki' nene di laminekovo' i-lidilizado' nene do molaa' neive.

Ido' ne'mine ine' nene aza ganakuti' ninge lamine' dani' aleve nene ei' gipele'mi emeni dameni ne'minesi lili' igi minikevo a'mine gipele nene nakunolo vai' neti uvo'nibo naba minelive losa engi' nene do kegeso ngele'mize molani' ve.

Ee, a'mine do kegeso ngele'mize molani' aleve nene elesesi molo-ngedo do eita ine' ve. Ido' a'mine elese molo-ngedo do eita ine' aleve nene ve lisihe' ve losasi nene lo-ngidine' ve. Ido' a'mine ve lisihe' ve lo-ngidine' aleve nene eitati' monovo lamine' atoli'mine ogo minine' nesi nene lehize-ngidine' ve.
O'moso'mo ne'mino do lu' ize neine' nenako nemu' nene ti' lo gelelesune: O'moso nene lelita molo hize ele' noo-lidine' nenako inite' malitesi nene ngeli livile' gehepeve amilisave.
O'moso'mo ei' gipele gehepeve nene do a'manapa amo leli' mukikumu' nene lehize-lidine' ve. Ido' ne'mine ine' nenako inite' muki' nene lehize-ledamilivoba mo ezesi do lehize-ledeleseive.
Ido' ei' ve lo do kegese-lede neivemu' nene O'moso'mo asi've ve lisihe' ve lo-lede neine' nenako zaho goni' o-ledelive. Mo ma nizamave.

Lelikumu' hilive ado' gohi hilinguti' otive Izesu' Kilisito' O'mosolati' leme mino ana zamela mino lelito' medelo gamazite hize ele' o-ledo neine' nenako zaho lihime lemelido' o neive. Mo ma nizamave.

Ido' Kilisito' lulo leme neivo none' ne'mi lulouti' nene inite' mali'mosi nene gelelehe' ogo hulo heta ma o-ledamoloseive. Ado' geni inite' ne'mo nehe, lihitehe initeli'mi lulou' minelone' ne'mo nehe, goboni mala' malali'mi lulou' minelonidi'mo nehe, ga'na naba helelonidi'mo nehe, okodelo' initekumu' vise' olonidi'mo nehe, ganala daato' mine molo minelonidi'mo nehe, ido' evenelite libililisa navo luno mite' velelo' ningelonidi'mo nehe, nene ma gelelehe' ogo ma hulo heta o-ledamoloseive.
Ido' mene noluvoni' inite' nevo'mine nene lamineto' mo soto' i-lidaa' nani' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizado' nene vo dave:
Guvekasi ve, geita gi'mizo minuningumu' nene
gamene gamene evenelite nene libili hili hili' iga' nave.
Ne'mine nani' nene lelikumu' evene' ingine gilavo
laza nene sipisipi ize ne'mine nene nizave li giliisa libilaa' nave.
Ne neiha a'mine mene luvoni' inite' nete nene mo keke' livile' amavo a'mine lulo leme neive Kilisito' ne'mo hize ele' o-ledaa' neine' ne'mo nene ngivile' gehepeve okune.

Naza ngivile' gehepeve okune luvoni' nene nanitekumu' ve. Naza nene ti' lo gele ele'vole' o nouve: O'moso'mo lulo leme neine' Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' do soto' o-lidine' ne'mi lulou' noninguti' nene inite' mali'mosi ngelo hulo heta o-ledamoloseive. Ado' helelone' ne'mo nehe, minevo' alevo' ne'mo nehe, angelolitesi nehe, guve'inesi ve ato atolite nehe, idise soto' o-lede neine' inite' nehe, alinge' soto' o-ledeline' inite' nehe, amuzo malehe inite' ato atolite nehe, veleta nizani' initelite nehe, gala'muda nizani' initelite nehe, ido' O'moso'mo do soto' molani' inite' gohi ma nilizani' netesi nehe, nene mo ngelo nomive.

Kilisito' evenele nouvoni' nenako nemu' nene loloni' gamazi mene soza lamo lamineto' lolosuve. Ee, O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo nene neni' lu'ne ga'neu' hize ele' ogo neivo a'mine mene loloni' gamazi nene mo gamazi laminekovo' neive lo gele nouve.
Naza neni' zuho Isilaele' alevemu' mulumo naba gelo muhele'ine gele'mo gele'mo vo nouve.

Nemu' nene naza giluvo me misubou' maka' none' aleve neze zuho Isilaele' aleve hize ele' o-ngedaa' aka nene ma minidiniko engi' mukikumu' nene O'moso'mo do ngu' izelive lo Kilisitoda gi'mizo nouvonguti' nene izo huko O'moso'mo usi' ize-nedavo vo tolovo uvodine.

A'mine aleve nene Isilaele' aleve nene nizave. Engi' a'mine zuho gehepeve nene O'moso'mo neni' izipaha'ne zuho ve lo do ti' ive nene nizave. Ido' O'moso'mi amuzo labana've ningave nesi nene nizave. Ido' O'moso'mo igi mili ilizangumu' lo huko-ngidive nesi nene nizave. Ido' eze lou' gamazi've ngimive nesi nene nizave. Ido' O'moso opo'ni lilizani' aka gihile ngelebizo ido' inite' do lisihe' o-ngedelesa salani gamazi lo-ngidive nesi nene nizave.

A'mine Zuda ve nene gomu' guve'ine gelaa' unive muki' Abalahamule Mosele engikuti' nene soto' ani' ve. Ido' Kilisito' nene O'mosolati' soto' ine'za helala evenetati' soto' ine' nene mo a'mine zuhoti vaniseuti' soto' ine' ve. Ido' Kilisito' aza inite' mata' mukito' Guvelesi ve minive mino mo O'moso ne neive. Eze opo'ni lo'mo vo mineso' nene mo huko vamivo opo'ni lo mine do volonive ne neize. Mo ne'mino miniliho.

Ido' naza Isilaele' aleveuti' muki' nene Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' amave noluvoni' nene O'moso'mo a'mine Isilaele' alevemu' line' gamazi nene vo haza ogave noluvoba asi Isilaele' aleveti vaniseuti' soto' iga' ave muki' nene Isilaele' aleve gehepeve nene ma minisa'mangumu' nene luve.

Ido' ma nene Abalahamu' a'vopilemo' zuho muki' nene izipahala zuho gihile muki' nizavoba asi O'moso'mo Abalahamu'ni ti' lo lo-imido' nene neive: Isaka' a'vopilemokovo' nene gei' izipaha zuho gihile ve lo-ngedelone.

Ne'mine lo-ngedelone' nene ado' evene' muki' soto' iga' adi'mine igi haza soto' iga' ave nene O'moso'mi izipahala ve lo-ngedelonivoba asi O'moso'mo lo huko line' gamazilo' e'meti soto' ave engikovo' nene O'moso'mi izipahala ve lo-ngedelesune.
Ido' a'mine O'moso'mo lo huko line' gamazi nene ti' lo neive: Idise mene minosa gamene mau' nene tine' molo gohi okuvo Sala' aza nene gipele gedeleseive.

Ido' Abalahamu' a'vopilemokutikovo' nene O'moso'mi zuho do kegese-ngidine' nevoba Isaka' a'vopilemo' zuhoutikisi nene ma do kegese-ngidine' ve. A'mine avoteho Isaka' aza Lepeka'ni nene lobe' izipe gede imine' ve. Ido' a'mine izipeti me'nibo nene hamo' minine'za
ingine soto' igi monovo lamine' nehe monovo goloso nehe nesi nene olihe amasivoo O'moso ne'mo nene Lepeka'ni ti' lo lo-imine' ve:
Gana' ve neve nene alingeni izipe'mi gelekele' ve minelive.

Ido' O'moso'mo ne'mine line' nene eze evenele do kegese-ngedelesa evene' igi mili ilizani' monovolo' gele mino do kegese-ngedamo asi ei' ngele'mize molaa' neive'mi lulolo' do molo do kegese-ngedaa' neine' monovo've nene soto' ogo minelive losa nene ne'mine line' ve.
Ido' neve nene mono' godolou' O'moso'mo ti' lo line' gamazilo' nene vo daave:
Naza lu'ne've nene Zakobo'ni eme nouvoni'za
Esau'nimu' nene gosele' okuve.
Ido' O'moso'mo nene ne'mine oga' neine' nenako nemu' nene nadive lolone. O'moso'mo oga' neine' nene mo lisihe' amive lolobe. O'ove. Mo keke' ne'mine ma lamolosune.
Asi've O'moso ne'mo Mose'ni nene ti' lo lo-imine' ma ve:
Naza ise'ine ize-ngedelove lo gelelove nene
ha ise'ine ize-ngedelesuve.
Ee, muhele'ine ningo hize ele' o-ngedelove lo gelelove nene
ha muhele'ine ningo hize ele' o-ngedelesuve.

Nemu' nene O'moso'mo evene' mamu' neni' ve lo do kegese-ngedeline' nene angise'ine giladoti' nehe ido' ingine igi mili minaa' naadoti' nehe nene ma do molo do kegese-ngedesa'mive. Asi O'moso'mo evene' muhelete ningosa isete izaa' neine' monovo've ne'movo' nene ei' ve lo do kegese-ngedeleseive.
Ido' mene noluvoni' nene O'moso'mo Halao'ni lo-imine' gamazi mono' godolou' ti' li gizikani' gamazi malo' nene vo dave:
Gei' evene' naba do ote-giduvoni' nene

ado' ne'minemu' do ote-giduvoni' ve: Geita nene amuzo inite' ma ogo do'mo leme gehepeve o-gedekuvo ne'mo nene neni' amuzo'ne do soto' ogavo misubou' misubou' nene neni' guve'ne gililizangumu' ve losa do ote-giduvoni' ve.

Ne'mino neine' nemu' nene O'moso'mo ise'ine ize-ngedelove lo gelelive nene ise'ine ize-ngedosa aza gamazi've gili hulilizangumu' lu'ine do a'manapa o-ngedelove lo gelelive nene ha lu'ine do a'manapa o-ngedeleseive.

Ne'mino neine' nenako lingine ti' li li-nimilisave: O'moso'mo ne'mine oga' neine' nenako evene' laza nene ei' lulou' gelaa' neine' initeto' nene do peleseve' izaato' lisihe' amo a'mine gelaa' neidokovo' nene e'meto vaa' noune' nenako nemu' nene nanitekumu' goloso gelo lihime molo-ledaa' neive.

Vekizo, lingine nene ne'mine li li-nimilisani'za lingine nene haza vetesi O'moso neve nene e'menga li-imilizado' lisihe' i nizahe. Ido' inite' ma lolo' iline' nene a'mine initeli'mo lolo' o-delivemu' nene ha ti' lo lo-delihe: Gaza nene ne'mino lolo' o-nedamilinako nanimu' ne'mino lolo' o-nedane lo ha lilihe.

Ido' misubo somo lolo' oga' ive misubo do va'va' ogo molokidoti' nene linge ma do somo lamine' gidi nani' nene ma lolo' ogosa a'mine hamo' misubo mauti' linge ma do haza somo meni've lemo minine' nesi nene lolo' iline' nene lisihe' amilihe. O'ove. Ei' lulolo' nene inite' laminekisi golososi nene ha lisihe' o neivo lolo' oloseive.

Ido' O'moso'mo a'mine'mine oga' neive. Aza nene neni' nizebolo' molani' nene ngelebizekuvo evene' nete neni' amuzo'ne nene ningi gililizave lo gele mino a'mine somo goloso ne'mine mini ei' izebolo' molaa' neine' aleve vi tolovo ilizado' do soto' ine' aleve nene gozopoti' ha ninge mate ngimikoo hongu lo minine' ve.

Ne'mino minine' nene evene' somo lamine' ne'mine minikevo ise'ine ize-ngedelive ado' gomukuti' ei' emeni dameni lamine' atoli'mine ogo minine' nene dalizado' do va'va' o-ngidive nete nene a'mine O'moso'mi emeni dameni lamine' tamine' vai' giki' ogo neine' nene ningilizave losa ne'mino minine' ve.
Ei' ve lo elese molo lele'mize molave lelikumu' nene noluve. A'mine elese molo-lidive nene Zuda ve lelikutikovo' nomive. Asi heta ato' veutikisi nene ma ne'mine o-ngidine' ve.
Ne'mine ine' nene ei' line' gamazi polohete Hosea' ti' lo gize neido' nene vo dave:
Evene' neni' zuho minamani' alevemu' nene
neni' zuho ve l o ha lo-ngedelesuve.
Ee, naza lu'ne ngemesa'muvoni' alevemu' nene
lu'ne ngeme nouvoni' aleve ve lo-ngedelesuve.
Ido' lengi' nene neni' evene'ne zuho nizamave lo lo-ngimuvoda nene
minevo' dovo' oga' ine' O'moso neni' izipaha'ne zuho ve lo-ngedelesuve.
Ido' polohete Isaia' aza Isilaele' alevemu' nene ti' lo lo soto' ine' ve:
Isilaele' aleve nene noso gahevela gepe minaa' neine' ne'minisa vai' goloso minilizaha a'minguti' nene ngomosikovo' ma lukuvo nalisave.
Ne'mino evene' ngomosi' do ngu' izavo lukuvo nalizani' nene Guvelesi ve'mo lite' lo ei' misubo'veu' aleveliti goni'ine gele osu' lo lihime ngemo osu' lilidi'mo nene ngomosikovo' ma lukuvo nalisave.
Ee, Isaia' gamazi ma gomukuti' ti' lo lo soto' ido' nene vo dave:
Amuzo'vesi mino
inite' mulise ato ato' mukito' gizebo oga' neine' Guvelesi ve'mo nene
Isilaele' aleve leli' nene ha mini di dizivo' minilizave lo
evene' ngomosi' nene ma hulo-ledamidiniko
laza nene Sodomi alevesi ido' Gomola alevesi osu' gehepeve lani' ne'mine ogo
mo osu' gehepeve lunidine.

Ne'mine ogo neine' nenako neloti' nene laza ti' lo gelelesune: Ve lisihe' lili' ilizani' akamu' vise' amave heta ato' ve ma nete a'mine aka nene ningi ikeve. A'mine aka nene ezemu' gele ele'vole' okunivo O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-ledaa' neine' akamu' nene noluve.

A'mine heta ato' ve nene ne'mine ikeha O'moso'mi evenele zuho Isilaele' aleve nete nene lou' gamazilo' e'metelonidoti' nene ve lisihe' lolo' olobe li ne'mine ilizani' aka nene vise' ani'za mo keke' ma di gihile izamani' ve.

Nanitekumu' di gihile izamave. Di gihile izamani' nene O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogosavo' nene do gihile izeso' o neive lamisa asi leli' gono dalonidotikovo' nene do gihile izelesune li di gihile izilisa ani' ne'mo nene mo di gihile izamani' ve. Ingine mono' godolou' evene' zodoho' izi limi ingalizani' gehenimu' gizi nizado' nene zodoho' izi limi ingani' ve.
A'minemu' O'moso'mo line' gamazi nene ti' li gizi nizave:
Lingine gililo.
Naza Zuda veti goto' numudida Zaioni golola nene
evene' zodoho' izi limi pou' li ingalizani' geheni gehepeve nene
ma nomuluve.
Ido' ve ma ingine a'mine geheni minivelo' ma gili ele'vole' ilizave nene
a'mine gili ele'vole' ilizadoti' nene gihile've dami ngovozo hililizavoba
asi mo hilamilisave.
Neze zuhokizo, naza Zuda vemu' nene lu'neu' amuzo molo gelaa' nouvoni' nene ado' ti' lo gelo O'mosola a'minemu' laa' nouve: O'moso'mo do ngu' izeliho lo a'minemukovo' laa' nouve.
Nene nanitekumu' ve. Engi' monovo nene mo ninge lamine' o nouve. Ingine nene gilingili igi O'mosomu' gilaa' nani'za eze e'metilizani' aka nene ninge nobe li ningi gili guni amave.

Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve: Ingine O'moso'mo evenekumu' evene' lisihe' ve lo-ngedaa' neine' monovomu' nene gili imami mini angise'ine di soto' ani' monovolo' di mili evene' lisihe' ilisa igi mili minaa' nani'za O'moso'mo evene' lisihe' ve lo-ngedeline' monovolo' nene gelekele' amave.

Ne'mine iga' nani'za ezemu' gili ele'vole' igi minave nene ve lisihe' ve lo-ngedosa Kilisito' aza lou' gamazilo' e'metaatoti' evene' lisihe' lolo' oga' aka nene mo mudise hize tiline' nenako nemu' ingine nene mo ladani nave.
Naza mo lamineto' noluve. Ingine ngelo amoso' inite' ilisa nani' neine' nene Mose' aza lou' e'metaatoti' evene' lisihe' lolo' ogakumu' ti' lo gizidoti' nene ha gelelesune:
Ve ma ingine a'mine lou' gamazi vaito' e'meti lamine' ma ilizani' nene a'mine ne'mine ilizadoti' nene mine lamine' igi ha minivi' minivi' igi minilisave.
Ne neiha O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogatotikovo' nene evene' lisihe' lolo' oga' neve nene lapa nomivo ha lolo' olonido' neine' nene gamazi ma ti' lo neidoti' nene gelelesune:
Lingine a'mine nene mo amoso' nite' neive lisa lutingu' ti' li gilamilo: Okulumokuko zaho dizelive. Mo ma dizamilisave. Ido' home galese golosou' zaho lemelive. Mo ma limamilisave.

Ne'mine lilizani' nene Kilisito'ni Okulumokukoti' ele'mizi limilizangumukisi ido' hilinguti' di oti-di ele'mizi dizilizangumukisi lilizani' nenako ido' Kilisito' aza mo Okulumokuti' lemosa hilinguti' nene mo otosa neine' nenako nemu' nene amoso' inite' ma nomine' nenako ne'mine li gililizado' ma nomive lo neine' ma neive.
Ne neiha a'minemu' nene gamazi ma ti' lo neive:
A'mine mono' gamazi nene hota ne'mine ma minamive.
Asi avito' mino
lingine ha vetinedunu' lilizado' mino lutingu' gililizado' neive.
A'mine mono' gamazi nene O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogali'mi gamazi leli' lo soto' o ngemaa' noune' gamazi nene neive.
Ado' lingine vetinedunu' nene Izesu' aza Guvetesi ve naba ve li li soto' igi ido' lutingu' nene O'moso'mo hilinguti' do ote-dine' ve li gili ele'vole' ilizani' nene O'moso'mo do lungu' izeleseive.
Ee, lutedunu' a'mine gamazi gele ele'vole' oso' nene O'moso'mo evene' lisihe' ve lo-ledelive. Ido' vetedunu' a'minemu' lo soto soto' oso' nene O'moso'mo do lu' izeleseive.
Ido' mene noluvoni' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizado' nene vo milise' ogave:
A'mine vemu' gili ele'vole' ilizave muki' nene
a'mine gili ele'vole' ilizadoti' nene gihile've dami ngovozo hililizavoba
asi hilamilisave.

Ido' ingine muki' ngovozo hilamilisave noluvoni' nene Zuda vesi heta ato' vesi nene ato atoli'mine minamavo engi' sitato' gizebo oga' ive nene Guvelesi ve ei' hamokovo' mino hize ele' o-ledelive li ezela laa' nave ato ato' muki' nene atoli'mine ogo nasahili' o-ngedaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene noluve.
Ee, evene' muki' ingine Guvelesi ve'mi gulive igi ezela lilizave ato ato' muki' nene do ngu' izeleseive li mono' godolou' gizi nizani' ve.

Ne'mino neine'za ingine Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' amani' nenako nadiisa ei' gulive igi ezela lilizave. Mo ne'mine ma amilisave. Ido' ezemu' li-ngimavo ma gilamani' nenako haza nene nadiisa gili ele'vole' ilizave. Mo ngeli ne'mine ma amilisave.

Ido' O'moso'mo eze gamazi li soto' igi li-ngimilizave ma ngimiselamiline' nene nadiisa vi li soto' igi li-ngimilizave. Mo ne'mine ma amilisave. Gamazi lamine' li-ngimilizave ngimiselingumu' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizave:
Gamazi lamine' li soto' igi li-limilizave ani' nene mo ede vine' inite' ikeve lo lolize izekune.
Gamazi lamine' li soto' ilizave nene mo ne'mino ngimiselavo igi li soto soto' ani'za
Isilaele' aleve muki' gidini nete a'mine gamazi lamineto' nene gili damani' ve. Ne'mine ani' nene mono' godolou' polohete Isaia' gamazi ma ti' lo lido' nene vo dani' ve:
Guvekasi ve, laza lo-ngimune' gamazilo' nene
mo ma gili ele'vole' amave.

Nemu' nene laza ti' lo gele none: Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' olone' nene gamazi lamine' gelosavo' nene gele ele'vole' olosune. Ido' gamazi lamine' gelelone' nene Kilisito' gamazi've nelotikovo' nene gamazi lamine' gelelesune.
Ne'mino neine'za naza ti' lo noluve: Ingine nene a'mine gamazi mene gilamavoba asi mo gili nizave. Mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' malo' vo dave:
Ve'ninguti' gamazi ne'mo nene mo misubou' misubou' vo osu' lave.
Ee, gamazi'ine nene evene' minani' misubo ne'mo vo sididasi nene
buu lo vine' ma neive.
Ido' naza gohi ti' lo noluve: Isilaele' aleve ingine gili vevesamilizado' minavoba asi gili vevesilizado' minani' ve. A'mine nemu' nene gana' Mose' O'moso'mo line' gamazi ti' lo gizine' ve:
Evene' ma neni' zuho nizave li gilamave haza ve engikuti' nene
ma do nenita okuvo
lingine Isilaele' aleve a'minemu' nene lavodine nalisave.
Ee, ga'ine gili vevesamave nene ma do nenita okuvo
nemu' nene mo lingizebolo' molaloseive.
Ido' Isaia' aza O'moso'mo line' gamazi gohi ma lovo' kiselevo' ogo ti' lo gizine' ve:
Nenikumu' vise' isa'mave nete nene nenikumu' mo ningi gilikeve.
Ee, neni' monovo'nemu' gililisa longo' isa'mavela nene
neni' monovo'ne do soto' ogo ngelebizekuvo
mo ningikeve.
Ne neiha Isilaele' alevemu' aza ti' lo line' ve:
Naza nene haza minamo
gamene gamene a'ne do patelo nenita alo alo lo-ngede'mo vovo' minaa' nouvoni'za
ingine nene gamazi'ne gili huli e'menga laa' ave mini
mo gilisa'mave.

Isilaele' aleve ingine ne'mine igi minani' nenako naza ti' lo gelo longo' nouve: O'moso'mo a'mine evenele zuho mo mudise vasa ize-ngede neine' nolihe. O'ove. Mo keke' ne'mine amilihe losa gele nouve. Naza mudise vasa ize-ngedamive noluvoni' nene nenikisi a'mine Isilaele' aleveuti' nouvoni' nenako nemu' noluve. Ee, naza Abalahamu' a'vo mino Zakobo' gipele Benizamini' a'vopilemo' zuhouti' gehepeve ne nouve.

O'moso'mo gomukuti' ninge lamine' do eze zuho lolo' o-ngede neine' aleve've nene mo keke' mudise vasa ize-ngedamive. O'ove. Ido' nemu' nene lingine Elia' gamazi've mono' godolou' neine' ma nene gilamani' nehe. Isilaele' alevemu' nene ti' lo O'mosola lipoti molani' ve:

Guvekasi ve, gei' vekauti' gamazi laa' ave polohete vai' nene ngibili gese' igi gopo'ni lo inite' molo-gedaa' une' holomo muki' nesi neve nene izi ngu'vosi hulikevo geita mili ge'metaa' ave nene gohi masi nizamavo nenikovo' nene lumo nouvo nenikisi nibililisamu' nene vise' i'mi nimonave.
Ne'mine line'za a'mido' O'moso'mo lo-imine' gamazi mene gililo:

O'ove. Gaza nene geikovo' gehepeve nene lumo minamane. Vemoho' seveni tauseni (7,000) ne'mine nene soza o'moso inite' Baali'ni nene gubi' izi imi opo'ni lisa'mave neni' evene'ne gehepeve nene nenikumu' ve lo lumo ha hulo-ngede nouve.
Ne'mine line' nenako a'mine'mine ogo idisesi nene evene' ngomosi' nene haza gidini inele ogosa ei' ve lo do kegese-ngedavo nizave.

Ei' ve lo do kegese-ngidine' nene inele oga' ne'mine ogo haza gidini do kegese-ngidine' nenako ne'mine o-ngidine' nene gono ma dikevosa ne'mine o-ngidine' nene nomive. Asi gono ma dikevosa ne'mine o-ngidine' neidiniko inele haza gidini ogo do eita o-ngidine' ma nene inele ne'mine ine' gelamidine.

Nemu' nene laza nadive lolone. Ti' lo lolosune: Isilaele' aleve O'mosolati' vise' ani' inite' nene ado' ve lisihe' ve lo-ngedeline' mukilite ma damavo O'moso'mo do kegese-ngidive netevo' nene dikevosa linge ma nene a'manapa igisa damani' ve.
Ne'mino soto' ine' inite' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizado' nene soto' neive:
O'moso'mo lu'ine nene do negi hize-ngedavo
ve'inedunu' nene inite' ma ningami
ga'inedunu' nene gamazi ma gilami mini
idisesi ne'minivo' igi nizave.
Ido' Davidi' nene ti' lo line' ve:
Ido' lanite' gilani' inite' ne'mo nene
gelevuso ne'mine gehepeve lolo' ogo ngebelavosa
lihime dalizaho.
Ee, ve'ine nene do gopo o-ngedavo initekisi ma ningamilizaho.
Ido' geni initeli'mo gamene gamene mehe'ine nene
do hilingize-ngede miniliho.

Nemu' nene naza ti' lo gohi longo' nouve: Isilaele' aleve ingine ladani igisa mo mudise limi pou' li ingani' nehe. O'ove. Mo keke' ne'mine amani'za asi ingine aka laminetoti' nene zovo' izi vani' ne'mo nene O'moso'mo heta ato' ve do ngu' izeline' aka nene velave. Ido' ne'mine aka vele-ngidine' nene a'mine Zuda ve ningi lezesi ne'mine o-ledeliho lilizave losa vele-ngidine' ve.

Ido' ingine aka laminetoti' nene zovo' izi vi gopo ani' ne'mo nene O'moso'mo heta ato' ve vai' nene do lamine' o-ngedelido' ngele'mize molo inite' lamine' gehepeve do soto' ine' nenako Zuda ve ingine nene alinge' mudise aka lamineto' tine' mili alizani' ne'mo nene mo ivile' ivosa inite' lamine' goloso do soto' oloseive.
Ido' heta ato' ve lengikumu' nene ti' lo noluve: Naza nene heta ato' ve lengi' aposolo nouvoni' nenako nemu' nene naza heta ato' ve lengita gono daa' nouvongumu' nene do naba oga' nouve.

Ido' lengita ne'mino aposolo gono daa' nouvongumu' do naba nouvoni' nene neze zuho Isilaele' aleve nene ningi ingine heta ato' ve ne'mine gono do-ngidine' nene leli' do-ledelinako li minikevo engikuti' linge ma nene O'moso'mo do ngu' izeline' akalo' ngele'mize molaloho lo a'mine gono'nemu' nene do naba oga' nouve.

Ido' engi' nene O'moso'mo do ngu' izeline' akalo' ngele'mize molaloho lo noluvoni' nene ti' lo gelosa noluve: O'moso'mo vasa ize-ngidine' ne'mo nene misubou' aleve linge lovo i imi minanguti' nene gohi ei' O'mososi do hamo' o-ngidine' nenako nemu' nene a'mine Isilaele' aleve nene gohi do gatulo o-ngedeline' ne'mo nene atoli'mine ogo inite' lamine' goloso do soto' o-ledavo mo helaa' ne'mine ogo noninguti' nene gohi oto minevo' dovo' ogo none' geleleseive.

Ido' Isilaele' alevemu' nene aneza gamazi ti' lo lo-lengemelesuve: Beleti lolo' ogosa gomu' nene a'midoti' linge ngomo ma do O'moso emekunivo O'moso'mi inite' lolo' iline' nene a'mine beleti linge naba nesi nene O'moso'mi inite' lolo' oloseive. Ido' zali'mi luhive ne'mo O'moso'mi inite' ma mineline' nene a'mine zali'mi a'nava nesi nene O'moso'mi inite' mineleseive.

Ido' Isilaele' aleve ingine O'moso'mi oliva za ne'mine minani' nene O'moso'mo a'mine za'mi a'nava linge nene huko hulosa oliva za hadeneloti' a'nava ma nene do ei' oliva za'velo' nene do gi'mizine' nenako Isilaele' aleveti avo'ningidati' soto' ine' mono' lamine' nene lingine heta ato' vesi nene makato' di nizaze.

Lingine nene O'moso'mo oliva za'veloti' a'nava've linge ma huko huline' mamu' nene ningedo' hangedoka li-ngidi lengi' okodine di dizamilo. Lingine nete nene a'mine zali'mi luhive've nene di ngi li-ngidisa'mave. Asi ei' a'mine za ne'mi luhive nete lengi' nene di ngi li-lingidaa' naani' nenaze. Okodine nene di dizamilo.
Ido' a'minemu' nene lingine ti' li lilisave: Ido' nadiive. Leli' nene O'moso'mi oliva za'velo' nene do gi'mize-ledelesa ei' a'nava've nene huko hulo do gi'mize-ledave.

Ehe, mo lamineto' nilani'za engi' huko hulo-ngidine' nene ingine ezemu' gili ele'vole' amavosa huko hulo-ngidine' ve. Ido' lingine ei' za'velo' do gi'mize-lengedavo nizani' nene lengi' gili ele'vole' i minangumu' nene ei' za'velo' nene do gi'mize-lengedavosa nizave. Nemu' nene lengikumu' gilavo dizalize. O'moso'mo a'mine za've'mi a'nava've gehepeve nene ise'ine izamine' nenako lengikisi nene isetine izamoloseize. Golisesi nene ha gili minilizani' o neive.

Ido' O'moso'mo ne'mine oga' neidoti' nene helala nasahili' lamine' oga' neine' nene ningo ido' helala amuzo molo lihime ngemaa' neine' nene ningo gelelesune. Ee, monokuti' limi ingave nene amuzo molo lihime ngemosa lengi' nene nasahili' o-lengedo neive. Ido' aza nasahili' o-lengedelido' lisihe' i minilizangumu' nene mo nasahili' o-lengedeleseiha ne'mine ma ami minilizani' nene linginesi za'veloti' nene huko hulalize. Ningiisa minilo.

Ido' a'mine za'veloti' a'nava huko huline' ne'minisa minani' Isilaele' aleve ingine gili ele'vole' ami minadoti' nene huli gili ele'vole' ma ilizani' nene O'moso'mo gohi za'vela do gi'mize-ngedaa' amuzo nene ha do neinako gohi ha do gi'mize-ngedeleseive.

Ido' ne'mino gohi do gi'mize-ngedeline' amuzo do neine' nene nadosa ningo gelelone. Aza nene amoso' inite' gehepeve ogo heta ato' ve lingine nene oliva za hadeneloti' a'nava ne'mine minave nene ei' oliva za've lamineku' nene do gi'mize-lingidine' nenako nemu' nene ei' za'veloti' gehepeve minani' aleve Zuda ve nene ha lapa nomine' inite' ogo gohi a'mine za'velo' nene ha do gi'mize-ngedeleseive lo ningo gelelesune.

Neze zuhokizo, mene loloni' gamazi nene gilami minilizani' ne'mo lingine laza otohato ve nene none lisa okodine di dizi minikelizave losa suno' gamazi mene lo-lengemelouze. Gililo: Isilaele' aleve linge nene a'manapa igi Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' amani'za neve nene mudise nomive. Asi heta ato' ve ingine O'moso'mo gele neine' votigilelo' O'mosola imi hilalizani'
neloti' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizado' nene e'meto Isilaele' aleve muki' nene do ngu' izeleseive:
Isilaele' aleveti goto' numu'ine Zaioni gololoti' nene
do ngu' izelive ma soto' oloseive.
Soto' ogosa aza mono' gelamaa' monovo
Zakobo' a'vopilemo' zuho Isilaele' alevetingu' minine' nene
do huloloseive.
Naza gamazi meve nene ma nolo huko-ngiduve.
Engi' lihime do hulo-ngedeloni' gamene nene ma gihile izo soto' oloseive.

Izesu'nimu' gamazi lamine' nene gili hulisa Isilaele' aleve nene O'moso'mi biluva've lili' ani' ve. Ne'mo nene heta ato' ve lingine O'moso'mo do lungu' izeline' akalo' lengele'mize molave. Ne neiha ganakuti' nene O'moso'mo ei' ve lo do kegese-ngidine' nenako nemu' nene engi' avo'ninginemu' gele minosasi nene lulo ha ngeme neive.

Ido' lulo ha ngeme neive noluvoni' nene ado' O'moso'mo evene' ma elese molo-ngedo do eita ogo inite' ma ngeme noline' nene a'minemu' gamazi gohi senisi ogo o've a'va losa'mine' nenako nemu' nene luve.

Ee, gomu' nene heta ato' ve lingine O'mosolo' gelekele' ami minani'za Isilaele' aleve ingine nene idise O'mosolo' gelekele' amavo ne'mo nene O'moso'mo lengi' heta ato' ve nene isetine izo do eita ogave.

A'mine'mine ogo O'moso'mo lengi' isetine izo do eita ine' ne'mo nene Isilaele' aleve idise O'mosolo' gelekele' amave. Ido' ne'mine monovo soto' ine' nene O'moso'mo engi' Isilaele' aleve nene ise'ine izelingumukisi ve losa ne'mino soto' ine' ve.
Ee, O'moso'mo evene' ato ato' muki' nene ise'ine izelido' lisihe' i minilizangumu' ve lo evene' muki' nene ezelo' gelekele' amaa' monovo'mi gesi mingu' nene hulo-ngidine' ve.

Aizoo, O'mosote nene atoli'mine ogo minive neive. Ado' gamazi gele neine' nene atoli'mine ogo gele mino otohato oga' neine' nesi nene voso' vamoso' vaa' neive. Ido' lo hukaa' neine' gamazi'mi monovo nene evene' malitesi ngelo lo ngolo' lo osu' lamolosune. Ido' eze gono dalosa gala gelaa' neine' nemu' nene ve malitesi ngelo gelamolosune.
Mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' nenako mo lamineto' noluve:
O'moso'mo gelaa' neine' maduno nene
evene' hamolitesi ngelo ma gelamolosune.
Ido' evene' hamolitesi nene
ogo molo iline' monovomu' ngelo ma apize emamolosune.
Ido' evene' hamolitesi nene
O'moso'mo alinge' do tibizo lemelive lo
dina' ogo inite' nene ngelo ma emamolosune.

Nanitekumu' ve. Inite' muki' nene eitokovo' gelekele' i-dilizave losa asi'vevo' inite' muki' do soto' ogavo mo eitokovo' lehete i minaa' nave. Nemu' nene O'moso opo'ni lo minelone' nene huko vamivo ha miniliho.

Nemu' nene neze zuhokizo, O'moso'mo ne'mino muhelete ningo isete izaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene naza agae lo do upuho' o-lengedo gatine do ti' lo nolo-lingimuve: Ize ato ato' ngibili O'moso lehizi-daa' ani' ne'mine igi lingine okodine nene di kekeize li O'moso'mi monovolokovo' di milikevosa O'moso'mo lanite' gelelido' lisihe' o minivo a'mine okodine nene lehizi-dilo. Ido' lehizi-dilizani' okodine nene hele neivosa nevoba asi velesi ha minevo' dovo' neido' nesi nene lehizi-dilo. Ne'mine ilizani' neve nene mo madu'ningu' gamazi neivete iga' ilizani' o neine' inite' nenako a'mido' nene ha ilisave.

Me misubou' minine' monovo danava goloso nene di otuhi minamilo. Asi O'moso'mo lutine gatine do gosoho' o-lengedavo ne'mo nene a'mine gomu' lengemeni dameni do hulosa nene do ato' o-lengedavo minilo. Ne'mine ilizani' nene O'moso'mo igi mili minilizave lo gele neine' monovo ado' monovo lamine' ei' gilido' gehepeve vo daa' neine' monovo ado' aza a'minemu' lanite' gelelido' lisihe' o neine' monovo nene igi mili minilizani' nenako neloti' nene ei' gelaa' neine' monovo nene ningi gililisave.
