Ido' a'ne'mine luhuvo nene evene' ma ngemeloningumu' nene lingine ma gizi limilizado' o neihe.

O'ove. Leli' monovote lo soto' iline' luhuvo nite' ne'mine nene mo lengi' nene nizave. Ido' a'mine leli' monovote lo soto' iline' luhuvo nite' gizahe' nene leli' luteu' do nonivo evene' muki' nete nene a'minemu' ningisa gilaa' nave.

Leli' mono' gono nodune' ne'mi gihile've lengi' nene Kilisitodati' luhuvo nite' ne'minisa nizani' nene mo soto' gehepeve o neive. A'mine luhuvo nite' nene ingi noso ne'minedunu' gizani' nomive. Ido' gehenilo' luhuvo mili gizani' ne'minesi nene nomive. Asi minevo' minevo' O'moso ne'mi Sikalahu' nedunu' nene evene' lengi' lutingu' nene luhuvo ne'minosa gize neive.
Ne'mine nolune' nene Kilisito' gono dani' ne'mo nene O'mosolo' gele mu'musi' o none' nenako ne'mine gamazi lamine' nene laa' noune.

Ido' ne'mine laa' noune' nene gihile ne'mine do soto' olonido' nene laza mo lisihe' o none losa nevoba ne'mine amuzo nene lelita ma nomive. Asi O'moso ei' nene amuzo lemo a'mine gono dalonido' nene do lisihe' o-ledaa' neive.

Aza nene lo huko-lidine' gamazi gosoho' ne'mi gonou' ve minelonido' nene do lisihe' o-lede neive. A'mine gono nene gizikani' neine' lou' gamazi malo' nevoba asi O'moso'mi Sikalahuto' nene neive. Nene nanitekumu' ve. A'mine gizikani' neine' lou' gamazilo' nene ngelo e'metamune' ne'mo nene lute helavo a'mine louli'mo lebele helaa' neine' giline'za O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo nene minevo' minevo' lemeni dameni lemo do upuho' o-ledaa' neive.

Ee, ido' a'mine gehedo' gizikani' neine' lou' gamazi'mi gonoloti' nene helaa' noune'za a'mine lou' gana' soto' ine' nene mo vode gade viline' inite' amuzo'vesi labana'vesi nene soto' ine' ma neive. Ido' a'mine amuzo labana've nene vo Mose' golo veleloti' nene silingenge'ni hulo minine' nene gopo oka' oka' o'mo vo minine'za a'minesi nene Isilaele' aleve ningavo ve'ine lenge lenge lavo vonu' bililizado' lisihe' amani' ve.

A'ne'mine inite' nene ne'mino minine' nenako O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo do soto' o neine' mono' gono ne'mo nene a'mine litehe mono' nene ivile' nabalo' goloso ivosa leli' vode gade goloso viline' monovo'vesi soto' oloseive.

Ee, gonito' ngele'mize molaa' ine' mono' litehe ne'mo nene inite' naba mino vode gade viline' monovo'vesi minine' nenako O'moso'mo evene' lisihe' ve lo-ledelido' lele'mize molaa' neine' mono' gono gosoho' ne'mo nene ivile' goloso ivosa inite' naba goloso mino vode gade atoli'mine goloso ogosa viline' monovo'vesi noloseive.
Ee, mono' gosoho' ne'mi monovo've vode gade vaa' neine' ne'mo nene ivile' ogo dizo minidi'mo nene mono' litehe labana'vesi mino vo'ine ga'ine vaa' neine' monovo've ma nene mo vo halekave.

Ee, a'mine mono' liteheli'mi labana've nene vo gopo oka' oka' o'mo vo osu' line'za a'mine nesi nene vo'ine ga'ine vaa' neine' inite' minine' nenako osu' lamo minevo' minevo' monovo've laminekisi minine' mono' gosoho' ne'mo nene ivile' ogo vode gade goloso viline' inite' mineleseive.

Ido' a'mine noluvoni' monovomu' mene mo gele mu'musi' o none' nenako nemu' nene laza gamazi laa' noune' nene do hito gepe' gamazi ne'mingutikisi lamo asi mo gamazi lamine' sotokovo' lovo' kiselevo' ogo laa' noune.

Laza nene Mose' ne'mine nene minamune. Aza nene ei' veleloti' silingenge'ni hulo minine' vo gopo oka' oka' o'mo vo osu' nolivo Isilaele' aleve nene a'mido' gisili hizi ningi minikelizave losa velelo' nene lavolavo do hitine' ma neive.

Ne neiha Mose' golo velelo' lavolavo do hitine' ne'mino Isilaele' aleve nene O'moso'mo lo huko-ngidine' mono' litehe gatangu' gatangu' monovo've gilisa'mani' nenako nemu' nene idisesi engi' lu'ine ga'nido' nene ha hite neine' gele neivo lu'ine ga'nine nene ha ngi lo neive. A'mine lute gatelo' hite mineline' inite' nene mo Kilisitoda vo gi'mizekunivosavo' nene do hulo-ledeleseive.

Ee, idise mene gamenelokisi nene Mose' gizine' mono' gamazi evene' gati ngimaa' naani' gamenelo' gamenelo' nene Isilaele' aleveti lu'ine ga'ine nene initeli'mo ma hite neine' gele neivo minaa' nani'za

mono' godolou' Mose'nimu' ti' li gizi nizani' ma nene engitokisi ha gihile izelido' o neive: Ido' Guvelesi vela mine velepe' izine' gamenelo' gamenelo' nene velelo' hitine' inite' nene do hulaa' ine' ve. Ado' Guvelesi vela mini velepe' izilizani' gamenela nene a'mine lu'ine'mi velelo' hitine' nene do hulo-ngedeleseive.
Ido' Guvelesi ve ve noluvoni' nene Sikalahu'vemu' noluve. Ido' Guvelesi ve'mi Sikalahu' lelita minive nene inite' mali'mosi nalava ize-ledamivo apase-ledavo haza minaa' noune.

Ee, laza mukito' Mose' inite' velelo' hitosa minaa' ine' ne'mino minamo asi mukito' nene vete haza soto' o neivo mino gapogapoli'mo silingenge'ni gohi do tine' molo hulo mala oga' neine' ne'mino Guvelesi ve'mi monovo've vode vaa' neine' monovo've nene lelitati' hulo evene' mala oga' noune. A'mine monovo've lamine' goloso lelita minine' nene vo naba o'mo voovo' neivo laza nene ei' Guvelesi ve'mi emeni damenilo' gehepeve lisihe' ogosa medelo minaa' noune. Ido' ne'mine noune' nene O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo nene oga' noune.
Ne'mino neine' nenako O'moso'mo asi've lulo lamine' lemosa a'mine mono' gono lamine' mene lemavo do do vo minaa' nouningu' nene gosele' ogo muludeu' goloso ogavo ma hulosa'mune.

Laza nene monovo goloso suno' daa' naani' ne'minemu' nene mo amolosune lo mo mehede emekune. Laza evene' ma nene go'ine izo O'moso'mi gamazi lamineli'mo lido' lamo do ato' ogo lo-ngemesa'mune. Asi evene' muki' leli' monovote nene ize' mili ningi hehe lilizangumu' ve lo O'moso'mi velelo' mino gamazi gihile laminekovo' nene lo soto' ogo ngelebizaa' noune.
Ido' a'mine O'moso'mi gamazi lamine' lo soto' none' nene ma hito noline' nene mo vi tolovo ilizado' mini mili nizavelavo' nene hitosa mineleseive.

A'mine me misubou' aleve vi tolovo ilizave nene O'moso gihileloti' do eita medele-ngedavo gelekele' i-di nizave Satani ne'mo nene O'moso gele vive gehepeve Kilisito'nimu' guvele'vesi minine' gamazi lamine' ne'mo nene hize labana' ele-ngedavo labana've ningikelizave losa a'mine O'mosomu' gili hulaa' aveti lu'ine'mi vele nene do like-ngidine' ve.

Ido' Izesu'nimu' gamazi ve luvoni' nene nemu' luve. Laza leli' nene le'metilizave losa ne'mine gamazi nene lo-lengemaa' nounivoba asi Izesu' Kilisito' nene Guvelesi ve ne neize. Ei' nene e'metilo losa nene lo-lengemaa' noune. Ido' la'lisetemu' nene laza Izesu'nimu' gelosa lengito' gelekele' izipe ne'mine nene none losa lo-lengemaa' noune.

Ne'mine noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve. O'moso gozopo' aka'mila liti'muso izo miningu' labana' soto' ilive live ne'mo nene O'moso neni' nemeni dameni nene Izesu' Kilisito' veleloti' soto' neivosa a'midoti' nene ningi gililizangumu' ve losa luteu' nene hize labana' ele-lidine' ma neive.

Ne neiha a'mine gamazi lamine' tamine' luteu' do nonive laza nene haza nite' heneni milaa' ani' somo misubodunu' lili' ani' ne'mine nene none. Ido' somo ne'mino haza nite' none' nene lelito' minine' amuzo atoli'mine goloso neine' neve nene lelitati' minamine'za asi O'mosolati' neine' nene soto' o minelive losa nene somo ne'mino haza nite' nene none.

Laza nene geni ato ato' gehaa' noune'za ne'mo nene aka vamaato' ma lele'mize molosa'mive. Ido' geni inite' lelita minaa' neingumu' nene gate muki' gelaa' noune'za a'mine ne'mo lute gate do gopo gehepeve ogo ma hize tile-ledesa'mive.
Ido' libililisasi nene vise' i-lidaa' nani'za O'moso ne'mo ma hulo-ledesa'mive. Ido' libilikevosasi nene lemo ongaa' nouba goloso gehepeve nene ma dosa'mune.

Neve nene laza mo Izesu' helaato' mine molo mino monaa' ine' ma'minosa nene nomonune. Ne'mine oga' noune' nene lelitoti' nene Izesu' minevo' alevo've neine' ma nene evene' muki' ningilizave losa nene ne'mine oga' noune.

Ee, laza nene vetesi ha noune'za Izesu'ni do minuningumu' nene gamene gamene helaa' akalokovo' lele'mizi milaa' navo minaa' noune. Ne'mine oga' noune' nene a'mine helaa' neine' okodeloti' mene Izesu' minevo' alevo've neine' nene soto' ogavo ningilizangumu' ve losa nene ne'mine oga' noune.
Ne'mino neinako helaa' ne'mo nene lelita gono nodani'za ne'mine idi'mo minevo' minevo' oga' monovo ne'mo nene lengiku' gono nodave.
Ido' ve mali'mo gamazi ma line' mono' godolou' minine' ne'mo nene lelitokisi vo do neive. A'mine gamazi nene ti' lo lo neive:
Naza gele ele'vole' ogo nouvoni' nenako nemu' nene naza lo soto' nouve.
Lazasi nene a'mine'mine ogo Izesu'nimu' gele ele'vole' o minosa nene lo soto' oga' noune.
Ne'mine oga' noune' nene a'mine Guvelesi ve Izesu'ni hilinguti' do ote-dive ne'mo nene Izesulesi maka' do ote-ledo lengikisi nene do ei' velelo' o-ledeleseive lo gele minosa nene ne'mine oga' noune.

Ido' laza ne'mino mulumo alumo geni inite' geho none' nene ha lengi' lamine' ilizangumu' ve losa nene ne'mine ogo none. Ido' ne'mine ogo none' nene O'moso'mi nasahili' ne'mo evene' mukita nene voka' voka' ogovo' neivosa a'minete nene O'moso opo'ni lika' lika' i'mi viivo' nizavo eze guvele nene vo naba goloso o'mo vo minelive losa nene ne'mine oga' noune.
Ne'mine o neine' nenako nemu' nene laza gono daakumu' gosele' osa'mune. Ee, okode losuvola amuzote neve nene labuluvo olosa api' o'mo novivosi gamene gamene lute nene gosoho' oka' oka' o'mo novive.

Naza ne'mine noluvoni' nene laza ne'mine mana'mine geni muki' leli' gehelone' o neine' nene mo ngomo ha nite' mino gamene li'nibemukovo' ne neive. Ido' a'mine ne'mo nene inite' naba a'mine geni muki' nene ivile' ogo minine' ado' minevo' alevo' lamine' goloso osu' lamiline' nene do soto' o-lede'mo novive.

Ee, laza ninge none' inite' muki' nene gamene li'nibemukovo' minosa nene osu' laa' neine'za ningamune' Okulumoku' inite' nene minevo' minevo' inite' nizave. Nemu' nene ninge none' initeto' nene lute gate molamo asi ningamune' initeto' nene lute gate molaa' noune.

Ido' ne'mine ogo minaa' noune' nene nemu' ve: Seli numuno ngu'vosi milaa' naani' ne'mino me misubou' minine' numude leli' okode ma osu' liline' nene numude gohi ma neine' nene evenelite a'inedunu' gizamani' asi Okulumoku' minevo' minevo' iline' numuno O'moso'mo salani molo-lede neine' nene ma neive.
Ee, laza misubou' okodesi noningu' mene Okulumo' numude nene do ti' ogo saketi ne'mino do ngolaloinako lo agae, agae lo le' izo minaa' noune.
Ne'mine oga' noune' nene a'mine Okulumo' numude nene saketi ne'mino do ngolosa mineso' nene haza baka' ne'mine okodelo' inite' nomivo minamoloningumu' ve losa nene ne'mine oga' noune.

Ee, laza nene agae, agae lo le' izo minaa' noune' nene idise do none' okode mene do hulo haza minelone losa nevoba asi a'mine seli numungu' mene ha geni libilivo mino minevo' minevo' lemeni dameni ne'mo nene a'mine hele vaa' okode ne'mi ebe' dalingumu' nene Okulumo' numude saketi ne'mino ngolaloinako lo agae, agae lo le' izo minaa' noune.

Ido' asi've O'moso'mo nene minevo' minevo' lemeni dameni ne'mo hele vaa' okode'mi ebe' nene dalingumu' ve losa leli' nene do va'va' o-ledosa a'mine salani molo-lidine' inite' muki' nene damolonivoba mo dalosune li ningi gililizangumu' ve lo a'minguti' gana' dalonido' o neine' inite' ei' Sikalahu've nene mo lehize-lede neive.

Nemu' nene laza gamene gamene vode vosa'mivo lute amuzo molo minivo ti' lo gele minaa' noune: Laza nene okode meesi ha mino Okulumo' numudela minosa Guvelesi vesi maka' minelonidoti' nene hoto' haza none.

Ido' idise Guvelesi vesi maka' minamune luvoni' nene laza idise minevo dovo' ogo noningu' mene eze ninge minosa minevo dovo' ogo nonivoba asi vetedunu' eze ningamosa nene ha gele ele'vole' ogovo' nene none.
Ee, laza nene vode vosa'mivo lute amuzo molo minivo mino laza nene okode mene hulo Okulumo' numudela nene vo Guvelesi vesi maka' minelobo lo gelo minaa' noune.

Nemu' nene me misubou' okodesi ha minelobe Okulumo' numudela vo minelobe neukisi nene Guvelesi ve'mo lelikumu' geleline' lamine' ilive losa ei' gilido' ogo molo olosa nene lute molo mino a'minemukovo' nene gono amuzo molo daa' noune.

Ido' Guvelesi ve'mo lelikumu' geleline' lamine' ilingumu' ogo molo minaa' noune' nene laza mukito' Kilisito' zasi gono dalido' nene laza hamo hamo' okode losuvosi minune' gameneu' ogo molo une' initeto' inite' lamine' une' nolihe inite' goloso une' nolihe ne'mi meni've lemelingumu' nene ei' velelo' vo soto' olone' o neine' nenako nemu' nene ne'mino ogo molo minaa' noune.

Nemu' nene laza Guvelesi vemu' golise gelelonido' o neine' nemu' nene gele mino evene' ingine leli' gamazite gililizangumu' nene ga'ine hizaa' noune. Leli' monovote nene mo O'moso'mo gele neive. Ido' monovotemu' nene linginesi ize' mili gilisa a'minemu' gili guni i-lidilizaho lo gelaa' nouve.

Ne'mine nolo-lingimune' nene leli' monovote lamine' ve losa a'minemu' gohi lo-lengemelesa lamune. Asi leli' monovotemu' gilikevo lamine' ogavo longolize izilizani' aka nene do soto' o-lengedekunivo evene' ma lu'ningu' minine' monovomu' nene gili huli oko'ine losuvolokovo' lamine' i minilizangumu' nene di naba igi laa' ave nene lingine laza lo-lengemelone' gamazi nene li-ngimikevo engi' gamazi'ine do'mozelingumu' nene nolo-lingimune.

Ve malite lelikumu' nene negi hizikeve li laa' nahe. Ne'mine noolone' nene mo O'mosomu' negi hize nolosune. Ne neiha negi hizamo lute gate laminekisi nolone' nene lengikumu' ve losa nene lute gate laminekisi mino ogo molo oga' noune.

Ido' ne'mine oga' noune' nene Kilisito' lulo leme neine' monovo've ne'mo nene do ote-ledavosa nene oga' noune. Ee, laza ti' lo ize' molo gele none' nenako nemu' nene ne'mine oga' noune: Ve hamo' nene evene' mukito' medelo hiline' nenako nemu' nene evene' muki' nene mo hilani' gele neive.

Ido' evene' mukito' medelo hiline' nene evene' ingine angise'inemukovo' igi mili minaa' ani' ma nene huli gohi ne'mine ami a'mine engikumu' helosa ote neive neemukovo' nene igi mili ilizave losa nene evene' mukito' medelo hiline' ve.

Ne'mino neine' nenako nemu' nene laza idise ado' mene none' gameneloti' nene evene' ize' molo-ngedelo ma engi' oko'ine losuvolokovo' ningekosa ize' ma molo-ngedamolosune. Ido' gomu' ma nene Kilisito'ni nene oko'nolokovo' ninge mino ize' molo-dune' noline' nene idise mene a'mine'mine ogo ize' molo-desa'mune.

Ee, ne'mino neine' nenako nemu' nene evene' ma ingine Kilisitoda mini mili nilizave nene mo O'moso'mo do gosoho' gehepeve o-ngede neine' nenako ne'mo ingine gomu' igi mili minani' monovo'ine ma nene mo osu' lavo ngemeni dameni'ine nene, aizo, mo gosoho' gehepeve lolo' ogave.

Ido' a'mine noluvoni' inite' muki' nene O'mosolatikovo' soto' ine' monovo ne neive. O'moso aza nene Kilisito' gono dadi'mo nene eze biluva' o-do minuninguti' nene laza ezela ogo do hamo' ogo bizelone' akate vele-ledosa evene' linge nene ezesi di hamo' igi bizilizangumu' ve losa a'mine akalo' ngele'mize molalone' gono nene mo leli' limine' ma neive.

Ado' me misubou' aleve O'moso ei' gamazi've avuto' ani' lihime'ine nene do molo' molo' o-ngedamo Kilisito' gono dangu' nene O'moso aza eita igi di hamo' igi bizilizani' aka nene vele-ngede'mo vo mino a'mine aka'mi gamazi nene evene' muki' li-ngimilizave lo leli' nene do limine' ve.

Ido' nemu' nene Laza Kilisito' limiselavo ezelo' medelo mino asi've O'moso nene leli' gamaziteu' mine molo mino lengi' nene gatine dani' gelavo leli' nene Kilisito' liline' velemu' nene leli' medelo mino amuzonga ti' lo nolo-lingimune: O'mosola nene lingine biluva' i-di minani' monovo nene hulisa igi ezesi di bizi minilo.

Ido' evene' laza nene Kilisitoda gi'mizo minekunivo ei' O'moso'mi monovo lisihe' gehepeve nene leli' okodela dizo minelingumu' nene O'moso'mo lavo leli' lihimete vai' nene ei' Kilisito' oko'nola dizavo lihime hamokisi ma damive Kilisito' nene lelito' medelo lihimelo' ve lolo' ine' ve. Nemu' nene lingine O'moso biluva' i-di minani' nene huli eita igi di bizi minilo losa nolo-lingidune.
Ido' laza O'mososi maka' bize mino gono daa' unive nete nene gatine do ti' lo nolo-lingimune: O'moso'mi nasahili've lengemavo di minaa' nani' nene ningi hulikevo vo labuluvo ogalive losa nolune.
Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene O'moso'mo ti' lo lingumu' nene noluve:
Naza gamene lamine' muluvongu' nenita laa' nani' ma nene
mo giluve.
Ee, evene' do ngu' izelove lo gamene muluvongu' nene
hize ele' o-lingiduvoni' ve.
Gililo. A'mine gamene lamine' molani' nene idise mene gamene nene neive. Evene' do lu' izeline' gamene molani' nene idise mene gamene nene neive.

Laza nene goloso gidini geleline' monovo ngomosi nene ma okunivo a'mine mono' gono nodune' nene evene' nete divi ledivika li mono' goloso ve likelizave lo evene' hamolitesi olovo' ilizado' o mineline' inite' nene mo keke' amoovo' minaa' noune.

Asi laza nene O'moso'mi gonolo' ve ne'mine none' nene evene' do soto' ogo ngelebizelesa nene ado' ne'mine monovo lamine' nene ogo minaa' noune: Laza nene geni inite' ato ato' ne'mi lulou' minaa' noube, ido' lihitehe' inite' gehepeveli'mi lulou' minaa' noube, ido' do goloso o-ledaa' initeli'mo nene akate gize osu' lavo minaa' noube, ne'mine ogo minaa' nouningu' nene lemo ongamo amuzo molovo' minaa' noune.

Ido' di goloso igisasi nene libilaa' nave. Ido' nala' numungu' nesi nene huli-lidaa' nave. Ido' evene' gulugulunga li lovo di soto' i-lidilisasi nene iga' nave. Ido' gonosi nene amuzo molo daa' noune. Ido' okisete nesi nene do guno ma ongosa'mune. Ido' noso' nite' nesi nene do lamino nosa'mo ga'nasi nene helo minaa' noune.

Ne'mino minoosa monovo lamine' golosovo' nesi nene ha ogo mino gele nge lo minaa' monovo nesi nene do minaa' noune. Ido' laza nene hongu loovo' mino evene' nasahili' o-ngedo mino O'moso'mi Sikalahu've nesi nene lelita minevo dovo' ogo neivo mino evene' lute ngemo minaa' noune' nesi nene abeleni amo mino

Ido' gamazi gihile laminekovo' nesi nene lo mino O'moso'mi amuzo lelita minine' nesi nene do soto' o'mo vo mino monovo lisihe' lamine' gehepeve ne'mo nene lovou' initete ne'mine lolo' ogavo ade hela adavala nene lepesete ne'mine ne neivo ido' ade hela zamela nene bainati mitete ne'mine ne neivo minaa' noune.

Evene' linge ma nete nene di naba i-lidaa' naavo ido' linge ma nete nene di limi-lidaa' naavo monaa' noune. Ido' evene' linge ma nete lelikumu' nene lemenga laa' naavo linge ma nete nene lopo'ni laa' naavo monaa' noune. Ee, evene' linge ma nete lelikumu' nene evene' go'ine izaa' ave ve li laa' naaha laza nene ne'mine amo soza nite' osa'mune.

Ido' evene' ma nete lelikumu' nene gililisa ma gilisa'maha evene' muki' nete lelikumu' nene ningi gili lamine' goloso i nizave. Ido' lelikumu' nene mo hililisaave li gili minaa' naaha ido' mene vetesi ha none' nene mo haza ne none. Ido' lihimetemu' ve lo mulumo gono nene ne'mino daa' nouba a'mine ne'mo nene lebele helesa'mive.

Ido' mulumo gele minuningukisi nene gamene gamene lolize izovo' minaa' noune. Laza nene ve goho' gahali' ne'mine none'za monoku' evene' muki' nene heneni ve ne'mine lolo' o-ngedaa' noune. Henenite nomine' minaa' noune'za inite' mata' nene lelita ha neivosa minaa' noune. Ido' ne'mine ogo mine do vaa' nounidoti' nene laza O'moso'mi gonou' ve minaa' noune' nene soto' o minivo ningilizave lo ne'mine oga' noune.
Agae, lingine Kolidi alevekizo, gamazi nene ma do halekamo mo lo ngolokovo' lo lo-lengeme osu' lokune. Laza lute lengeme none' nene mo nabalo' goloso lengeme none.
Ee, leli' nene lute lengemaato' do a'manapa ma amune'za langisetine lengi' lutine nene di a'manapa igi leli' nene lutine limi lamine' amave.
Ido' lingine neni' izipaha'ne ne'mine gili nizavo ti' lo nolo-lingimune: Laza lute ne'mino lingimune' malo' nene golo hizi lutine di gili' lami limi lamine' ilo.

Ado' monovo lamine' oga' monovosi ido' monovo golosolo' vaa' monovosi nene gono di hamo' mili dikesivo monovo'ine nene lisihetokovo' vilihe vamilive. A'mine noluvoni' inite' labanakisi liti'musosi engi' monovo'ine nene hamoli'mine monovo igi mili isa'masive. Ido' a'mine'mine ogo Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' ave nesi ido' ezemu' gili hulaa' ave nesi nene hamo' akalo' ngeli ma e'metamilisaanako nemu' nene lingine Kilisito'nimu' gili hulaa' ave engikisi nene maka' moni engi' iga' ani' monovo nene lingine igi mili ikelizaze. Engikisi bize lamine' igi minamilo.

O'moso'mi kekeize numu've nesi ido' soza o'mososi di hamo' ilisido' nene ma vo damive. Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene minevo' minevo' O'mosoli'mi numu've nene leli' none' nenako nemu' noluve. A'minemu' nene O'moso'mo ti' lo lo neine' ma neive:
Naza nene engi' vovo'ningu' ogo minevo' alevo' ogo mino
mono minelesuve.
Ido' O'moso'inesi nene lolo' ogo minelesuve.
Ido' ingine neve nene neni' evene'ne zuho minilisave lo neine' ma neive.
Nemu' nene Guvelesi ve'mo ti' lo nolive:
A'mine nenikumu' gili ele'vole' amaveti vovo'ningu' minanguti' nene
lingine huli mine abaza' igi mini
goloso nite' nene damilo.
Ne'mine ikevo naza lengi' nene do nenita ogo
metibo lolo' okuvo
lingine nene neni' gipe alu minilisave lo
amuzo've atoli'minesi minive Guvelesi ve'mo nene line' ve.

Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' alevekizo, a'mine gamazi mene ne'mino O'moso'mo lo huko-lede neine' nenaze. Nemu' nene laza okodesi lutesi do goloso o-ledeline' monovo muki' gilito do hulosa O'mosomu' golise gelo mino mudise monovo lisihe' lamine' gehepevevo' nene ogo molo o'mo vo minuke'zo.

Lingine leli' nene di lutingu' milalo. Ne nanitekumu' ve. Laza lengikuti' evene' hamokisi ma do goloso o-ngedamune. Ido' evene' hamokisi nene aka golosolo' ngele'mize molamo ido' evene' hamokisi go'ine izo inite'ine nene ma do lelita amune.

Ido' ne'mine luvoni' nene lengelemosa lamuve. Helelone' nehe ha minelone' nehe, lengi' nene luteu' do molo-lengedamo mino ne'mine ogalone losa lengi' nene mo mudise luteu' do molokune lo gomu' mo ma lo-lengeme nouvoni' ma neive.

Naza lingine gamazi nene ha gililizado' i nizave losa lengikumu' nene gele ele'vole' o mino ne'mine mana'mine lo ha lo-lengemaa' nouve. Ido' lengikumu' nene nolize goloso izo mino do naba o-lengedo minaa' nouve. Lengi' monovotinemu' giluvo lamine' ogavo mulu'neu' nene lamine' goloso o neivo geni ato ato' geho minuningukisi nene lu'neu' gulumo atoli'mine ogo lisivosa nouve.

Ee, ido' Makedonia misubou' une' gamene nesi nene okode ma molo gelo mineso' nite' ogavo ma minamune'za asi ganala geni inite' ne'mo nene a'midati' a'midati' okodela nene dizovo' minive. Ado' okode losuvoloti' nene lovo lolize nene ha ogo mino luteu' neve nene golise gelo minune.

Ne'mino minune'za geni initeli'mi lulou' mini gopo ga'ine gili nizangu' do hongu lo-ngedaa' ive O'moso ne'mo nene Tito'ni aka vele-do imiselavo nonida ogo hetelidi'mo golise gelo minune' nene do hongu lo-lidive.

Ido' ne'mino do hongu lo-lidine' nene ei' Tito' adi'movo' ne nomive. Asi aza lengita vo hetelo lengita geni minine' nene di lisihe' ikeni' neivo ningosa a'minemu' geni biline' nene mate-do mulunou' lamine' ogavo a'minemu' gamazi do ani' ne'mosi nene do hongu lo-lidine' ve. Tito' nene lingine neni' ningeso' lingisivo nizani' nemukisi ido' goloso nite' soto' ingumu' agae, agae li minaa' naani' nemukisi ido' neni' gamazi'nelo' e'metilisa amuzo mili gilaa' naani' nemukisi lo-limine' nenako ne'mo nene lu'neu' gulumo lisine' nene vo naba goloso ine' ve.

Gomu' luhuvo niteku' gizuvoni' gamazi ne'mo muludingu' agae li okodido' gili mulumo gilani' noline' nesi nene naza lu'ne ga'ne nene do ato' ma amuve. Ee, a'mine luhuvo nite' nene ningi lutingu' mulumo gilani' nemu' nene mo ningo gelekuve. Ido' a'mine lutingu' mulumo nene gilani'za neve nene mo gamene li'nibemukovo' gilani' noloseive. Ido' lu'ne ga'ne do ato' amuve luvoni' nene lingine lutine di velepe' izangumu' nene naza olihe gelamosa gomu' lu'ne ga'ne do ato' uvoni'za idise nene ma do ato' amuve.

Asi idise nene mo nolize izo nouve. Ido' nolize izo nouvoni' nene lingine luhuvo ningi okodido' gili mulumo gilangumu' nevoba asi mulumo giladoti' lutine di velepe' izani' nemu' nene nolize izo nouve. Lingine okodido' gili mulumo gilani' nene O'moso'mo gele neido' vo dani' nenako a'mine gamazitemu' mulumo gilani' ne'mo nene ma do goloso o-lengedamine' ma neive.

Ne'mine noluvoni' nene O'moso'mo gele neido' ogo okodelo' gelo mulumo gelelonidoti' nene lute do velepe' izo lukuvo nalone' nenako nemu' nene a'ne'mino okodelo' gelo mulumo gelaa' noune' nene goloso ve lo lamolosune. Ne neiha O'mosomu' gilamavetida ne'mino oko'nido' gili mulumo gilaa' soto' o-ngedaa' neine' ne'mo helaa' nene do soto' o-ngedaa' neive.

Naza noluvoni' nene mo lamine' noluze. Lingine ma ningi'nalo. Ado' lingine a'mine'mine igi O'moso'mo gele neido' igi okodido' gili mulumo gilani' ne'mo nene lengita monovo lamine tamine' vai' goloso do soto' o-lengedave. A'mine nene ado' gilingili igi monovotine lisihekovo' minelive li lutine a'mido' milaa' monovo nene atoli'mine ogo do soto' o-lengedavosa lingine a'mine gamazitine nene di lisihe' ilisa amuzo mili minii goloso monovo di hulilisa lite' li upuho' igi minii golise gili minii leli' ningelobo li gili minii goloso nite' dave nene lihime imilisa amuzo mili minani' ve. Nemu' nene a'mine lengita minine' gamazi mamu' nene gilunivo a'mine luvoni' monovo muki' lingine igi mili minadi'mo nene lihime lengita minamine' nene do soto' ogave.

Ido' gomu' luhuvo nite' gize-lingiduvoni' ma nene lihime davemu' gelo gizuvoni' nomive. Ido' lihime do-divemu' gelosa gizuvoni' nomive. Asi lingine lutine lelita milani' amuzo goloso milisa milani' monovotine nene ningilizave losa O'moso'mi velelo' ne'mi monovo nene lengelebizosa gizuvoni' ve.
Ido' muludeu' lamine' gilune' nene idise mene noluvoni' initekumu' nene lamine' gilune.
Ido' lingine muki' nene Tito' lulo di hongu li-dangumu' olize izo minine' ne'mo nene a'mine muludeu' lamine' gilunido' nene imine' molo lazasi gohi lolize naba izune.

Ido' lolize izune' nene naza lengi' do naba ogosa Tito'ni gamazi gomu' lo-imuvoni' nene hazamu' nomine' nenako novozo nene ma helamuvoni' nenako nemu' nene mo lolize izune. Ee, naza lengi' gamazi lo-lingimune' nene mo gamazi gihile laminetokovo' lo-lingimune' ne'mino lengi' nene do naba o-lengedo Tito'ni lo-imune' gamazi nene laminetokovo' lo-imune' nenako a'mine nene mo lamine' gihile izave.

Tito' aza lengita ogo nohetelivo lingine muki' golise've gili luvo luvo izi mini ele'mize lamine' igi gamazi'velo' e'metani' mamu' nene aza gohi gele mino lulo've nene atoli'mine ogosa lengita hulo neive.
Ido' naza idise nene giluvoni' lingine nene inite' mukiku' monovotine nene mo lisihe' ogavo minilisave losa giluvo mo mu'musi' gehepeve ogavo nemu' nene nolize goloso noizuve.
Neze zuhokizo, ingine Izesu' evenele zuho mulise Makedonia misubou' mini'mi monavela O'moso'mi nasahili've ne'mo gono do gihile've do soto' ine' nemu' naza gililizave losa nene lo-lengemelouve:

Ingine nene geni inite' nabali'mi lulou' minangukisi ido' angise'ine nene goho' gahali' gehepeve minangumukisi nene gili huli monokumu' atoli'mine igi ngolize izi minadi'mo moni nene naba inele igi di nubo ani' ve.

Ido' ingine a'mine moni di nubo ani' nene ingine hulilizado' o minine' moni nene hulani'za a'mine votigile nesi nene ivile' ivosa vauve ili masi hulani' nemu' naza gele lamine' ogosa nolo-lingimuve. Ingine engi' lu'nido' di mili
geli geli igi amuzonga ti' li li-limani' ve: Agae, lingine gili limikevo a'mine O'moso'mi evenele hizi ele' i-ngidilisa moni di nubo ilizangu' lazasi nene ma hulolosune.
Ee, ingine ne'mine ilisave lo gilunido' avoba asi engi' nene gomu' Guvelesi ve lehizi-mikii alinge' nene lelitasi gelekele' i-lidani' ve.

Ne'mine ani' nenako ido' Tito' ne'mo nene gana' api' ogo lutine do ote-lengedavo lingine Izesu' evenele nasahili' i-ngidilisa a'mine gono nene api' ani' nenako nemu' nene Tito' aza a'mine gonolo' vo gizebo ivo di pililizave lo amuzonga lo-dekune.

Lengita mono' monovo muki' nene vauve elo neive. A'mine ado' lingine gili ele'vole' igi mini mono' gamazi di lamine' igi li soto' igi mini monokumu' gili hehe li mini a'minemu' gilingili igi mini ido' laza lutine do ote-lengedekunivo lutine leli' limi minaa' naani' ne neive. Nemu' nene a'mine nasahili' o-ngedaa' gono nesi nene amuzo mili dalizado' o neive.

Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene naza lo huko mo ne'mine ilizave losa nolo-lingiduvoba asi evene' malite a'mine gonomu' gilingili igi minani' monovo'ine nene lo-lengemekuvo ne'mo nene do ote-lengedavo lingine lutine ngimaa' naani' nene mo abeleni isa'mii mo ne'mine iga' nani' nene soto' ilive losa nene ne'mine noluve.

Ido' ne'mine ilizado' o neive noluvoni' nene lingine Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' nasahili' o-lede neine' monovo've nene gili nizanako a'mido' e'metilizado' o neive losa ne'mine nene noluve. Aza nene inite' mata' muki' do minine'za a'mine do a'manapa amo naza goho' gahali' lolo' okuvo ne'mo nene lingine inite' mata' muki' di minilizave losa lengikumu' nene goho' gahali' ne'mine lolo' ine' ve.

Ido' a'mine gamazi memu' nene naza ga'neu' giluvoni' nene ma lo-lengemelove: Ma kilisimasi mau' nene lingine ne'mine gono dalone li mo gana' api' igi dani' ma nene mo lutine laminetoti' dani' ma neive. Nemu' nene a'mine gonotine nene lingine gana' amuzo mili dalisa gili dani' ma'mine igi lengi' initetine'mi votigilelo' di milisa lite' li di osu' lilizani' nene mo lamine' oloseive.

Ido' lengi' initetine'mi votigilelo' di milisa ilisave noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve. Ve malite lu'ine otavosa inite' ma lehizi-ngidilisa gilani' noline' nene O'moso'mo gelavo ingine inite' di minani' votigilelo' lehizi-ngidani' nene mo lamine' oga' neive. Aza nene inite' masi lehizi-ngidilizanako lo gelo evene' ingine ma damani' initekumu' nene ma gelo losa'mive.
Ne'mine noluvoni' nene evene' ma hize ele' igi di ngu' izikevo lengita geni ilive losa nomive. Asi lisihe' lisihe' igivo' minilizave losa nene noluve.

Ido' idise meve lengi' initetine vai' lo neine' ne'mo nene inginela nomine' inite' nene hize ele' o-ngedeleseive. Ne'mine oloseinako ingine gamene vilido' nene ingine inite'ine vai' lo minelinguti' nene linginela nomiline' inite' nene hize ele' o-lengedeleseive. Ne'mine ogavosa lingine mukito' nene lisihe' lisihe' igivo' minilisave.
A'mine nemu' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizado' vo daloseive:
Noso' nite' vai' di nubo ave nete nene noso' nite'ine nene lumosi ma milisa'mave.
Ido' noso' nite' ngomovo' di nubo ave nete nene noso' nite'ine osu' lavo noso' nite'ine vise' ma isa'mave.
O'moso'mo Tito' lulo do ote-davo laza hize ele' o-lengedelesa gilingili ogo none' ne'mino Tito' nesi nene gilingili ogo neivo nemu' O'moso isaa' neve nolo-dune.
Ee, laza lengita vilive lokunivo gele limine'za asi've mo lengita volosa gilingili ogo gele neido' nene luune' ve.
Ido' Titokisi vilive lo leze zuho masi noimiselunive nene mono' mulise muki' mini'mi monani' nete nene mono' gamazi lamine' lo soto' soto' oga' neingumu' nene opo'ni li di naba i-daa' nave ne neive.

Ido' neevo' nomive. Ado' mono' mulise ato ato' vai' nete nene a'mine nasahili' i-ngidi moni di nubo ani' do vo ngemeloningu' nene ezesi a'mine gonolo' hize ele' ogo lelikisi maka' vilive li di oti-dani' ve. A'mine gono dalone' nene a'mine gono dokunivo a'midoti' nene evenelite Guvelesi ve di naba i-dilizave losasi ido' leli' lute ne'mo goho' gahali' hize ele' o-ngedaakumu' ote neine' nene do soto' ilive losasi nene dalosune.

Ido' lengita noimiselune' nene a'mine inele igi hulani' moni nabamu' gono daloningumu' nene evene' hamolitesi di gopo ikeve li lemenga li lelemikelizave losa a'mine aka hize tileloningumu' nene noimiselune.
Nene nanitekumu' ve. Laza ne'mino monovo lamine' oloningumu' nene O'moso'movo' gelelivoba asi mo evenekisi nene gililisave losa nene ne'mino lovo gizo do lisihe' okune.

Ido' a'mine ve sitakisi nene leze zuho gohi masi noimiselune. Gamene muki' a'mine ve nene gono ato ato' doka' doka' ingu' monovo've nene mo do ningekune. Aza mono' gonou' nene gilingili ogo minaa' neive. Ido' idise mene lengikumu' nene monoku' ele'vole' ilisave lo gele mu'musi' gehepeve o neine' nenako nemu' nene a'mine gono nene dalosa mo gilingili ogo amuzo goloso nomolave.

Ido' Tito' neve nene nezesi bizo gono makato' daa' usive nene neive. Ido' leze zuho sita' ingine nene mono' mulise ato ato' nizado' nene di medeli-ngidi a'mine gonolo' ngimiselave sita' nene Kilisito'ni di naba i-dilisido' i nizasive.

Nemu' nene ingine nivavo ma lengi' lutine ngimaa' monovotine ne'mi gihile'vesi ido' laza lengi' do naba o-lengedo lo-ngimune' gamazi ne'mi gihile'vesi nene ningilizaze. nGelebizilo. Ee, mono' mulise ato atoku' aleve nete a'mine monovotinemu' nene ningi gililizangisi ngelebizilo.

Izesu' evenele Zudaia misubola minani' nene hize ele' i-ngidi moni hulilizangumu' do ote-lengedo gamazi lo-lengemeloni' nene lingine mo a'minemu' gili nizani' nenako a'minemu' nene gohi luhuvo gize-lengedelodo' nomize.

Asi lingine ne'mine ilisa gilingili igi nizani' nemu' nene mo gele nouvoni' nenako nemu' nene lingine Akaia misubou' aleve nete gomu' kilisimasi mauti' nene ne'mine ilisa di va'va' igi nizani' ve lo Makedonia misubou' aleveti ve'nido' nene do naba o-lengedo minaa' nouve. Lingine ne'mine igi gilingili igi minani' ne'mo nene engikuti' linge muki' nene ne'mine ilizado' do upuho' o-ngedave.

Ne neiha laza lengi' do naba o-lengedo lo-ngimune' gamazi nene vo haza gamazi lolo' ogalive loosa naza lo-ngimuvoni' ne'mine igi lingine inite' muki' di va'va' igisa nizani' neivo ogo hetelelone losa a'mine leze zuho nene ngimiselekuve.

Ee, laza Makedonia aleve lingesi ogo hetelo lingine di va'va' igi minami haza nizavo ningelone' nene lingine mo di va'va' igi minilizave lo gele mu'musi' o minuune' nemu' nene lovozo helalone losa ngimiselekuve. Ido' neve nene lengikumu' lamuvoni'za linginesi nene longovozo hilamilizado' o neihe.

Nemu' nene ingine gomu' mili vi lingine inele igi ngemelone li gomukuti' li hukani' inite' nene ganakuti' di lisihe' ikevo minelive lo gelosa naza gomu' mili vilizave lo a'mine leze zuho nene lo-ngedelodo' o neive lo gelosa ne'mine uvoni' ve. Ne'mino gomukuti' di va'va' ikevo mineline' ne'mo nene lingine ngimilisa gilamado' lelitati' amuzo molokunivo ngimamani'za asi lutine laminetoti' inele igi hulilizani' nene mo soto' ogo mineleseive.

Nemu' nene naza gamazi mene lolouze. Gililo. Ve ma ingine zuho nite' ngomo lasolo zuho' ilizani' nene a'minguti' ngomo lasolovo' dolizilisaave. Ido' ve ma ingine zuho nite' vai' zuho' ilizani' nene mo vai' goloso dolizilisaave. Nemu' nene ngimiliza votigilelokovo' nene dika' dika' ilisave.

Evene' ma ingine lu'ine laminetoti' ngolize izi mini inite' ngimaa' navemu' nene O'moso ne'mo umo helaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene lutingu' hizilizado' e'meti lutingu' geni lengebele minivo ngimami lingine hamo hamo' mukito' lutingu' ne'mine ngemelone li gilani' votigilelo' nene mo lutine laminetotikovo' ngimilo.

Lingine ilizado' o neine' inite' muki' ha vo daline' votigilelo' nene inite' muki' lengita gamene gamene ha neivo gono lamine' ato ato' muki' nene ha dalizado' i minilizangumu' ve lo O'moso'mo ei' nasahili'veuti' nene inite' mata' muki' vauve elo lehize-lengedelido' lisihe' o neive.
Neve nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizikani' neine' malo' nene vo dave:
A'mine ve nene inite've ha inele ogo ize' molo
goho' gahali' lehize-ngedave.
A'mine monovo've lamine' nene mo osu' lamo
minevo' minevo' ogo mineleseive.

Mine zuho' ilizave zuho nite' nene do soto' ogo ngemosa nalizave lo noso' nite' lemaa' ive ne'mo lengitati' ngimiliza nite' nene do naba ogo do hutile' ogo monovotine lamineli'mi gihile've nene do vai' lo'mo vo mineleseive.

Ne'mine ilidi'mo nene lingine inele igi inite' ngimika' ngimika' igi minilizangumu' inite' matatine nene do vai' lo-lengedavo mini laza a'mido' do upuho' o-lingidune' gono dalizadi'mo evene' nete O'moso nene opo'ni li isaa' neve li-dilisave.

Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene lingine evene' hize ele' i-ngidaa' gono nidani' me'mo nene O'moso'mi evenele vise' iga' naani' inite' nene do soto' o-ngedaa' neine'za neevo' nomive. Asi a'mine gonomu' nene evene' muki' nesi nene vauve ili O'moso isaa' neve laa' naanako nemu' nene noluve.

Ee, lingine Kilisito'nimu' gamazi lamine' gele ele'vole' okune lani' ma nene soza nomine' lamineto' lani' nene di soto' igi a'mine gamazilo' gelekele' igi lengi' initetinguti' nene ma ize' mili inele igi engikisi ido' evene' mukikisi lehizi-ngidii a'mine gono mene dikevosa ne'mo nene evene' O'moso opo'ni lilisave.
Ido' O'moso'mo nasahili' atoli'mine ogo lengita do soto' ingumu' nene ingine lengita lu'ine mili mini lengikumu' ve li O'mosola lilisave.
Ido' O'moso'mo nasahili' o-ledo inite' ine' nemu' nene isaa' neve lo-duke'zo. A'mine inite' nene atoli'mine ogo lamine' goloso neivo a'minemu' nene lolone lo ma loso' nene mo ngelo lo pelamolosune.

Neni' Paulo' nene Kilisito' aza hongu lo muluno laminekisi minine' mamu' nene gele mino agae lo gatine do gamazi ma lo-lengemelove. Ee, lingine linge malite nenikumu' nene leli' vovoteu' mino gamazi amuzo molo lo-lemelido' minamo honguvo' lo minaa' neiha vo mala mino luhuvo gize-lidingu' nene gasava ve ne'mine lolo' ogo mino olo' lo vine' gamazivo' laa' neive li li-nidaa' ave neni' nene agae lo ti' lo nolo-lingimuve:

Neni' monovo'nemu' giluvoni' nene naza nehelele izamivo mino ve linge ma lelikumu' nene ha me misubou' veliti monovolokovo' e'metaa' nave li li-lidaa' ave nene ha do lisihe' o-ngedelodo' o nouve lo gele nouve. Ne'mino nouvoni' nenako lengita ogo gasava ve ne'mine mino amuzo molo-lengedaaloze. Ne'mine olodo' o minine' gamazi nene mo hulilo.
Lamine' laza nene mo ha misubou' ve none'za monoli'mi lovou' lovo oga' noune' nene me misubou' vete iga' ado' do molo lovo osa'mune.

Nene nanitekumu' ve. Laza lovo oga' noune' inite' nene me misubou' initedunu' lovo amo asi O'moso'mi amuzosi minine' inite' ado' biluva' alete molo-ngedeline' gamazi'ine nene hupu' ize hulilido' o minine' amuzo nene do none.

Ee, gamazi'ine bele hulo ido' O'moso'mi monovomu' ningi gililizani' aka hize tilaa' neine' amuzo malehe gamazi'ine naba nesi nene ha belo do'mo lemaa' noune. Ido' evenelite ga'ine gilaa' inite'ine muki' nesi nene doosa a'mine ga'ine gilaa' inite'ine nene Kilisitoda do gelekele' o-ngedaa' noune.
Ido' ingine nene mudise lelito' gelelekele' gehepeve ikevo ma laza nene evene' linge ma gamazi gili hulika' hulika' ado' ado' nene golo hizo lihime ngemeloningumu' nene mo do va'va' ogo none.

Lengi' vetido' soto' mene soto' o neine' inite' nene ningahe ningamave. Alo' ningilo. Evene' ma zaho nolihe aza eikumu' nene naza Kilisito' evenele nouve lo gele ele'vole' o minelive ne'mo lelikumukisi nene naza Kilisito' evenele nouvoni' ne'mino inginesi nene Kilisito' evenele nizave lo gele minelido' o neive.

Ido' Kilisito' evenele nouve lo noluvodo' nene imine' moloo loloni' votigile ivile' ivosa Guvelesi ve'mo nimine' amuzo nene do naba ma oloni' nemukisi nene novozo ma helamolosuve. A'mine amuzo Guvelesi ve'mo nimine' nene do goloso o-lengedelongumu' nene nimivoba asi monoku' hize ele' o-lengedelongumu' nene nimine' ve.

Ee, Guvelesi ve'mo nimine' amuzo nene novozo helamo ha do naba oloni'za naza luhuvo nite' gize-lengedaa' nouvongu' nene golise lengemeline' gamazivo' gizaa' nouvoni' gelalive losa nemu' nene gele nouve.

Nene evene' linge nete ti' li laa' nangumu' nene noluve: Aza luhuvo gizeline' nene amuzo malehe gamazi genivesi gamazi gizaa' neiha ei' omo neivo ningelone' nene oko'no gilizevo o vine' mino gamazi've line' nesi nene amuzo'vesi nomine' gamazi laa' neive laa' nave.

Ne'mine li laa' ave nene ti' li gili minilizave: Lengikisi maka' minamo luhuvo nite' gizeso' nene a'mine luhuvo niteku' gamazi amuzo molo gize nolone' ne'minosa laza linginela ogo hetelo ogo molo olone' nene a'mine luhuvo niteku' lolone' ne'mino gehepeve ogo molo olosune.

Lengita minave linge nete nene engi' oko'ine di dizi dizi' igi evene' ma ne none laa' nave. Laza engikisi lelikisi nene do milise' ogo ningo engito' lisihe' o none lo mo keke' lamolosune. Engikumu' nene lehelele izamine'za ingine nene engi' monovo ize' mili ningaa' nani' nene O'moso'mo line' gamazisi di milise' igi ningami angise'ine gilaa' nani' gamazisi nene di milise' igi ningi ize' mili mo evene' naba none li negi suno daa' nanako nemu' nene laza engito' lisihe' o none lamolosune.

Leli' monovotemu' do naba olone' nene lisihe' o neine' votigile nene ivile' ogo gohi ma do naba amolosune. Ido' leli' gono dalonido' nene O'moso'mo asi've laka'ni molo-lede neive. A'mine laka'nitelokovo' mino gono daa' noune' neemukovo' nene do naba ogo lolosune. Ido' lengita vo gono dune' ma nene a'mine O'moso'mo laka'ni molo-lidine' nene mo a'midasi vo do neivosa nene dune.

Ee, laza lengita ogo Kilisito' gamazi lamine' leli' neve gana' api' ogo lo-lingimune' nenako nemu' nene lengita gono dune' nene do naba oloningumu' O'moso'mo molo-lede neine' votigile nene ivile' amolosune.

Evene' atolite dani' gonomu' nene leli' okode do dizo O'moso'mo molo-lede neine' votigile nene ivile' amolosuune'za laza lengikumu' nene ti' lo gele mu'musi' o none: Lingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' ani' nene mo amuzo molo'mo vo neivo leli' gonote ne'mo lengita nene vauve elo vo naba ilive.

Ne'mine ogavo lengi' mehedida minine' misubolasi nene vo evene' gohi masi nene Kilisito' gamazi've lamine' nene lo-ngemelesune. Ne'mine olosune'za laza evene' malite vi gono dikengu' nene vo gono damolosune. Ido' evene' malite gono dangumu' leli' okode nene do dizamolosune.
Nemu' mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive: Ve ma aza ei' oko'nomu' olize noizeline' ne alamo Guvelesi ve neemukovo' nene olize izelive.
Mene noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve: Evene' gihile minelive nene ei' oko'no do dizaa' ive minelivoba asi Guvelesi ve'mo do naba o-dive ne'mo nene evene' gihile mineleseive.
Gamazi ngomo mene lo-lengemeloni' nene negi monovolo' e'metelesuha lingine nemu' gosele' lengebelamivo ha gopo gililizahoo lo gele nouze. Lingine gopo a'mine gamazi'ne nene gililo.

Ido' negi monovolo' e'meteloni' nene O'moso'mo lengikumu' ei' inite'vevo' minilisave lo amuzo molo gele minaa' neine' ne'mino nazasi lengikumu' a'mine'mine ogo amuzo molo gele nouvonako nemu' nene a'mine negi monovolo' e'meto neni' monovo'nemu' do naba ogo lolosuve. Ido' lengikumu' amuzo molo gele nouve noluvoni' nene lingine gopo monovolo' monesa'mine' alu ne'mine mini a'mine ve hamotokovo' vi gi'mizilizave lo Kilisitoda izeni o-lengedekuvoni' nenako nemu' nene lengikumu' nazasi nene amuzo molo gele nouve.

Gosiheli'mo Eva'ni do neu' manau' ogo golo izine' ne'mino evene' malite gotine izi lutine gatine di gopo igi lutine Kilisito' ei' hamoto' milaa' naadoti' nene lengele'mize gopo ikelizave lo gopo ga'ne nogiluve.

Ido' gopo ga'ne nogiluvoni' nene evene' mali'mo lengita ogo Izesu'nimu' lo-lengemeline' nene laza ezemu' lo-lingimunidi'mine lamo ato' gamazi lo-lengemaa' neihe ido' O'moso'mi Sikalahu' lingine gomu' dani' ne'mi emeni dameni've nene atoli'mine neivosa a'mine ve'mo dalizave lo lo-lengemeline' sikalahuli'mi emeni dameni've nene atoli'mine minaa' neihe ido' O'moso'mi gamazi lamine' gomu' gili dani' ne'mine minamo atoli'mine gamazi O'moso'mi gamazi lamine' ve lo lo-lengemaa' neihe ne'mine oga' neine' nene lingine a'minemu' gosele' lengebelamivo gamazi lamine' ve li gilingili igi gilaa' naani' nenako nemu' nene naza gopo ga'ne nogiluve.
Ne'mine ogo naza giluvoni' nene a'mine aposolo atoli'mine igi dizisa nizave lave engitoti' nene naza ngomo ne'minesi nene ma lemeti' ogo nouve lo gelamuve.

Lamine' naza nene gamazi do lisihe' ogo laakumu' nene sukulu ma lamuvoni' nenako ne'mo engi' nene gamazi laato' nivile' i nilisaha mono' monovo gelaa' nene gele nge lo gele nouve. Naza ne'mino nouvoni' nene laza ne'mine mana'mine gono nodunidoti' nene soto' gehepeve do soto' ogo lengelebizekune.
Naza nene lengi' do'mo dize-lengedelesa na'nise oko'ne do'mo lemo O'moso'mi gamazi lamine' lo-lingimuvoni' nene inele ogo haza gidini lo-lingimuvoni' neve nene goloso nite' dokuhe.
Ee, lengita neve gono dalongumu' nene noso' nite'ne nevo'mine nene lengitati' ma damo asi engita gono damo mino Izesu' evenele mulise atotati' nene gumine gidini dokuve.

Ne'mine noluvoni' nene naza linginesi minuvoni' gameneu' inite' ma vise' uvoni' inite' nene leze zuho Makedonia misubouti' ave nete nene mudise hizi ele' i-nidikevosa naza nene inite' vise' uvoni' ne'mi geni've nene lengita ve hamokisi ma gehe-damuvoni' nenako nemu' nene noluve. Ee, naza lengita evene' hamokisi ne'mine mana'mine geni nene gehe-lengedalove lo gizebo lekeseve ogo minuvoni' ve. Ne'mine ogo minuvoni' nenako mo ne'minevo' o do vo minelesuve.

Naza Kilisito' gamazi gihile nenita neive loloni' nene lingine gosoho' laane li ataize lamilisave. A'mine gamazi nene mo lamineto' nenako lingine mo gili nizave. Ido' a'mine'mine ogo gamazi mene ma loloni' nene mo lamineto' lolosuve. Ado' naza lengi' Akaia misubou' mono' gono daa' nouvoni' nene meni've nomine' haza gidini daa' nouvongumu' nolize izo do naba ogo laa' nouvoni' aka'ne nene evene' hamolitesi mo keke' hizi tili-nidamilisave. A'mida gono daa' nouvodo' meni've nene inite' hamokisi mo keke' lengitati' ma damolosuve.
Ido' lengitati' inite' ma damolosuve noluvoni' nene naza lu'ne lengi' lengemamosa noluhe. O'ove. Neni' lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' nene O'moso'mo ningo gele neive.

A'mine ve lelito' lisihe' o none li oko'ine di dizi laa' naavete laa' naani' gamazi nene gamazi gihile gelalive lo a'mine aka hize tile-ngedelongumu' nene naza idise do nouvoni' monovo'ne mene ha o'mo voovo' mino meni ne'mino inite' mo keke' ma damolosuve.

Nene noluvoni' nene nanitekumu' ve. A'mine ne'mine ve nene soza aposolo mini mono' gono daa' naani' nene evene' go'ine izisa di mini oko'ine losuvoloti' nene Kilisito' aposolo ne'mine lili' igi minaa' nave.
Ne'mine iga' naangumu' nene upuho' olonido' nomive. Nanitekumu' ve. Gamene ma asi've Satani ne'mosi nene do atoli'mine ogo angelo' lamine' labanalasi minine' ne'mine nene lolo' oga' neinako

nemu' nene eze gonolo' ve netesi nene di ato' igi monovo lisiheli'mi gonolo' ve ne'mine lili' ilizani' nene inite' naba nomine' nenako ha lili' ilisave. A'mine ve nene ingine gono dani' votigilelo' nene gamene nabalo' lihime dalisave.

Naza gomu' lokuvoni' ma nene gohi ti' lo nolo-lingimuve: Evene' hamolitesi nenikumu' nene negi ve li gilamilo. Ne'mine li gilamilizado' o neine'za lingine negi ve li gilili ma negi ningi mati ngimika' naani' ne'mine igi neni' nene ningi mati nimikavo nazasi nene monovo'nemu' ngomo ma do naba ogo lolove.
Ido' ne'mine gamazi loloni' nene Guvelesi ve'mi monovolo' e'metelovoba asi neni' monovo'nemu' gele ele'vole' ogo do naba ogo loloni' nene mo negi sunolo' e'metelesuha
evene' muki' oko'ine losuvoli'mi initekumu' nene di naba igi laa' naanako nazasi nene a'mine'mine ogo do naba ogo lolosuve.
Ee, lingine gamazi gele nge laa' nounive none li gilii negi aleve nene ha longolize izi ningi mati ngimika' naani' nenako naza nene a'mine negi sunolo' e'meto ha do naba ogo lolosuve.

Ee, evene' malite di gelekele' gehepeve i-lingidaa' nahe ido' lengi' initetine nene bili gizaa' naahe ido' lingimimise' igi gotine izaa' naahe ido' ingine evene' naba lili' igi di gize'ninguko i-lingidaa' naahe ido' a'ine gavoso gotine vetingu' lingibilahe ne'mine mana'mine ani' nene lingine ha ningi mati ngimika' naave.

Ingine ne'mine inite' i-lingidaa' naani' ne'mino laza a'mine ne'mine inite' o-lengedelonido' nene amuzoteu' lisihe' amive. Ido' ne'mine o-lengedelonido' nene amuzo molamune' nenako ne'mo nene lovozo helelonido' o neihe. O'ove. Ne'mine olonido' nomive lo noluve. Ne neiha evene' malite ngehelele izamivo engi' monovo'inemu' di naba igi lilizani' nene nani monovo'inemu' lilizahe nazasi a'mine'mine ogo nehelele izamivo neni' monovo'nemukisi do naba ogo lolosuve. Mene noluvoni' nene negi sunolo' e'metosa noluve.

Ingine Zuda ve leli' gulivete setohamo diti' igi Hebilaio' aleve none ido' Isilaele' aleve none ido' Abalahamu' a'vopilemo' zuhouti' nene none li laa' naha nazasi nene a'mine'mine ogo Hebilaio' ve ido' Isilaele' ve ido' Abalahamu' a'vopilemo' zuhouti' ve nene nouve.

Ido' ingine engikumu' nene Kilisito' gonolo' ve none laa' nahe. Mene loloni' nene godo'ningu' gamazi nomiveti sunolo' e'meto ti' lo noluve: Neni' nene engi' ngivile' ogosa Kilisito' gonolo' ve gehepeve ne nouve lo noluve. Gono neve nene engi' ngivile' ogo amuzo goloso molosa duve. Ido' monokumu' ve lo nala' numungu' nene gamene vai' goloso engi' ngivile' ogosa vo mineka' mineka' uvoni' ve. Ido' monokumu' ve li nibilani' nene engi' ngivile' ivosa gamene vai' goloso nibilani' ve. Ido' gamene muki' nene helaa' akalo' vaa' uvoni' ve.
Gamene faef nene Zuda vete nala' gavosotunu' sogo' saga' izi nibilani' nene gamene teoti naeni (39) ne'mine nene nibilani' ve.

Ido' gamene setohamo nene Loma vete lobuno gavosodunu' nibilani' ve. Ido' gamene sitohamo ne'mine nene sipiu' nomonuvo sipi izo itine' ve. Ne'mine ogo guvo nosolo' nene ha nouvo holuka' hamokisi holise' hamokisi ogo vine' ve.

Ido' gamene muki' goloso nene aka hota hota vai' monuve. Ne'mino monuvongu' nene noso'mo nibiline' hakaa' neive. Ido' lasikolite nibilani' hakaa' neive. Ido' neni' zuho Zuda ve nete nibilani' hakaa' neive. Ido' heta ato' ve netesi nene nibilani' hakaa' neive. Ido' numuno ebe' nabau' nesi nene ganala votene' oga' nouve. Ido' ebe' hadivela nesi ido' guvo nosolo' sipiu' monuvongu' nesi nene ganala votene' oga' nouve. Ido' Kilisito' evenele leze zuho none li soza laa' ave nete nene ganala di-nidilisa iga' naave.

Ido' naza nene nabuso'ne goloso ilivosa ato ato' gono muki' nene ele'vole' ogo duvoni' ve. Ne'mine ogo minuvongu' nene okise'nesi nene do guno ongosa'mo ido' noso' nitekumukisi nosomukisi nene ga'na helaa' ogo mino noso' nitekisi namo gamene vai' nene haza monaa' uvoni' ve. Ido' hepeku' nene oko'nelo' inite' nene hepeku' izo monaato' vo damivo hepe' novozo no'mo monaa' uvoni' ve.
Ido' neevo' nomive. Inite' gohi masi masi neine' lamuvoni' nesi ido' naza mono' mulise muki' gizebo o-ngedaa' geni nesi nene gamene gamene gehaa' nouve.

Ve mali'mo monoku' gilizevo ine' nene nenikisi a'mine'mi geni've nene gehesa'muvoba makato' gehe-lengedaa' nouvoni' ma neive. Ido' ve ma monokuti' limi ingani' nene naza engikumu' oko'ne hulosa'muvoba mo hulaa' nouvoni' ma neive.

Naza nenikumu' nene do naba ogo lolosa gelamuvoni'za nenikumu' do naba ogo lamo mineloni' aka nene ma nominako naza nene O'mosolo' lehete amo minelodo' nouvoba asi gilizevo o nouvoni' monovo'ne nemukovo' nene do naba ogo lolosuve.
Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' O'moso'vesi melehosi minive ado' opo'ni lo'mo vo nonivo osu' lamilive ne'mo me ve nene soza nomine' nemu' nene mo gele neive.

Damasiko numuno ebeku' nouvo a'mine misubo nabau' guvelesi ve naba Aleta' a'mine numuno ebeto' gizebo hulo-dive kiape' ne'mo nene pilisive ngimiselavo ingine neni' dalisa a'mine numuno ebeli'mi gatedo' nene gizebo igi nizavo
Izesu' evenelelite numuno ebeli'mi gesi ha'nau' viniduva' ma miningu' nene gosuvaha' goku' luhize nouvo nalato' nene huli heta i-nidikevo a'mine kiape' ne'mi anauti' nene golise vuvoni' ve.

Lelikumu' do naba oga' ne'mo nene evene' hize ele' o-ledesa'mine'za nenikumu' do naba ogo lamo mineloni' aka nene ma nominako nemu' nene neni' monovo'nemu' do naba ogo lolosuha a'mingu' nene Guvelesi ve'mo do soto' o-nedavo inite' ato ato' ve'nelo' o molangumukisi ido' atoli'mine inite' nelebizingumukisi nene lo-lengemelesuve.

Naza Kilisito' evenele mamu' gele nouve (neni' ve lo lo soto' oloni' nene edamilihe loo ve malo' lo nomuluvoni' gilivo noluve). A'mine ve aza nene kilisimasi fotini (14) ogo vine' ne olihe api' olosa idoti' nene okulumo' nama minaa' ani' nene hulo ho' ike'ni sonohi' minaa' ani' nesi nene hulosa O'moso'mo ei' minaa' idaa nene ele'mizo dizine' ve. A'mine ve nene oko'no've hulosa dizo vihe ido' oko'no'vesi dizihe nemu' nene gelamuve. Asi O'moso'movo' nene gele neive.

A'mine ve nene O'moso'mo Okulumo' ebe' lamine' Paladisiu' nene ele'mizo dizavo a'mida nene gamazi lamine' evene' laza lolonido' lisihe' amune' ido' lo soto' amaato' ve li li hukani' gamazi galau' giline' nene gele nouha oko'no've hulosa dizo vihe ido' oko'no'vesi dizihe nemu' nene naza ma gelamuve. Asi O'moso'movo' nene gele neive.
Ee, naza a'ne'mine vemu' do naba ogo ha lolosuha nenikumu' nene do naba ogo ma lamolosuha asi gilizevo o nouvoni' monovo'ne nemukovo' nene do naba ogo lolosuve.

Ido' lamine' naza nenikumu' do naba ogo ma lolove lo giluvodiniko mo gamazi gihile laminekovo' luvodinako neni' nene negi minamuvodine. Ne'mine minamuvodine'za evene' malite nenikumu' gililizani' nene angise'ine nene neni' monovo'nemu' ningi gilani' votigile ivile' ogo dizalive losa ne'mine olosa gelamuve.

Ido' Guvelesi ve'mo ato atoli'mine inite' gehepeve nelebizine' nemu' neni' nene oko'no do dizalive loo lokosolo' medeluvoni' gilivosa oko'neu' mene mulumo alumo do soto' o-nedeka' o-nedeka' ogo mineline' inite' nene ma nimine' ve. Ee, neni' nene oko'ne do dizeloni' aka hize tile-nedo a'mine inite' nene ogo lovo o nemelive loo Guvelesi ve'mo laavosa Satani'mo imiselavo a'mine inite' nene ogo lovo o nemeka' nemeka' neive.
A'mine ogo lovo o nemeka' nemeka' ine' inite' nene Guvelesi ve'mo do hulilive lo eita agae lo gamene setohamo luve.

Lokuvo Guvelesi ve'mo ti' lo lo nimine' ve: Evene' gilizevo minavela nene neni' amuzo'ne ngelebizeloni' aka gihile lamine' nene soto' o-nedaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene gei' nasahili' o-gedaa' nouvoni' ne'mo geita geni soto' o neine' nene ha gehe do dizeline' votigilelo' nesi nene ha vo do neive lo line' ve. Ne'mino neine' nenako nemu' nene inite' mamu' do naba ogo lamo asi Kilisito' amuzo've nenita soto' ogo minelingumu' ve lo neni' do gilizevo o-nedaa' neine' initekumukovo' nene nolize izo do naba ogo lolosuve lo gele nouve.

Nemu' nene naza Kilisito'nimu' nene gilizevo ogo minuvongu' nehe ido' evene' neni' divi ledivi' i-nidangu' nehe ido' lihitehe akalo' mine molo minuvongu' nehe ido' evene' malite goboni mala' mala' mili-nidangu' nehe ido' inite' mali'mo aka'ne gize gehepeve o-nidihe ne'mine ingu' nene mulu'neu' goloso gelamo ha lamine' gelo minaa' nouve. Nene nanitekumu' ve. Naza gilizevo o nouvoni' gameneu' neve nene Kilisitoda lehete o minuvodi'mo nene mo amuzo molo minaa' nouve.

Naza negi monovolo' e'meto gamazi mene lo minuvoni' nene lengi' lengemenitine'mo ivosa nene luve. Ee, lingine di naba i-nidilizado' o neine' nenako di naba ma i-nidadiniko naza nene neni' do naba olodo' ma minamuvodiinako neeve nene mo lengi' lengemenitine'mo ivosa nene do naba ogo luve. Ido' lingine di naba i-nidilizado' o neive noluvoni' nene naza haza nitekisi noluha a'mine aposolo dizi nizave laveloti' nene ngomosi' ma lemo minamuvoni' nenako nemu' nene noluve.

Ee, lengita minuvoni' gamenelo' nene geni gehe'mo ogo minuvongumu' nene gele hulo ato atoli'mine suno vodine vine' inite' amuzo nite' nene do soto' ogo aposololiti suno gehepeve nenita minine' nene lengelebizuvoni' ve.

Ido' lingine gilavo naza Izesu' evenele mulise linge muki' o-ngedaa' uvoni' inite' ne'mine nene lengi' ma o-lengedamuvo engi' nene lingivile' igi nizani' nehe. O'ove. Engi' o-ngiduvoni' inite' muki' nene lengikisi o-lengedosa inite' hamokovo' nene ma o-lengedamuvoni' ve. A'mine nene ado' lengitati' noso' nitekisi ido' initekisi nevo'mine ma damo minuvodi'mo nene geni ma gehe-lengedamuvoni' ma neive. Ne'mine amuvoni' nenako neeve nene lengita monovo goloso o-lingiduvoni' neivosa a'minemu' nene naza agae loo lihime'ne mene huli-nidilo lolodo' neihe. Ne'mine ma lolodo' nomive.

Gililo. Naza idise do va'va' ogo mino lengita gohi alosa nouvoni' nene mo gamene sitohamo ivosa nene nouve. Ido' aloni' nene a'mine'mine ogo geni ma gehe-lengedamolosuve. Naza gele nouvoni' inite' nene lengi' mili nizani' initetine nemu' nene gele nouvoba asi lengikumu' neeve nene gele nouve. Neve nene nanitekumu' ve. Izipaha'ine nete ize'ningine me'ningine inite' salani mili-ngidilizado' nene nizavoba asi ize'ninge me'ninge nete nene izipaha'ine inite' salani mili-ngidilizado' nene nizave.

Ido' naza a'mine'mine ogo lengikumu' nene nolize izo nenita minine' inite' nene hulosa neni' minevo' alevo'nesi nene hulo labuluvo gehepeve olosuve. Ne'mino naza lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' votigile do naba gidini okuvo ne'mo nene lingine lutine nimani' votigile nene di ngomo ilizani' nene lisihe' o neihe.
Ido' evene' linge ma nenikumu' nene ti' li nilave: Ei' nene geni ma gehe-lengedamo noline'za ei' nene tilikilo' ve mino gotine izo dani' noloseive.
Ee, evene' lengita ngimiselivela laavo ingine lengita igi initetine gotine izi diisa di vi imi nilisaave nilani' nene mo lamineto' neni' ngimiseluve hamoli'mosi ma ne'mine ido' nilahe. Mo o'ove.

Naza Tito'ni do ote-dekuvo lengita vine' nene leze zuho masi ezesi maka' imiselekuvo vasine' ve. Ne'mini vasingu' Tito' nene initetine ma tilikimi o-lengedo do nolihe. O'ove. Azasi laza nene lemeni dameni hamoli'minesi mino hamo' monovolo' e'meto hamo' gono nodune' nenako ngelo ne'mine amoloseive.

Gamazi ha'na gizuningu' mene lingine gilavo lengi' vetido' leli' monovote nene lamine' ilive losa a'mine monovote nene hize ele' ogo gizune' nehe. O'ove. Laza Kilisitoda gi'mizo mino O'moso'mi velelo' neve nene a'mine gamazi nene gizune. Ido' gizune' gamazi muki' nene lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' aleve lengi' nene monoku' do amuzo molo-lengedelesa nene gizune.

Ido' ne'mine o-lengedelesa gizuvoni' nene naza ogo lengi' ningeloni' nene lingine ne'mini minilisaaze lo giluvodi'mine igi minamavo ningelohe ido' lingine ningikevo neni' nene ne'mino minaalive li giladi'mine ogo minelohe lo gopo ga'ne nogelosa nene gizuve. Ee, naza lengita ogo lingine lovo lolize iga' ido' ge lukehe nebele ne lukehe gebele laa' ido' lingizebolo' molaa' ido' mine eza ema igi hizi ho'laa' ido' divi ledivika laa' ido' mehe'nida gamazi laa' ido' evene' naba gehesaa' ido' di gopo' napa iga' monovo ne'mine nene igi nizavo ogo ningelohe lo gopo ga'ne nogiluve.

Ee, gohi naza lengita ogo hetelekuvo O'moso'ne ne'mo lengi' vetido' lengi' monovotinemu' nene do leme-nedelihe lo gelo lengikuti' evene' linge mukilite monovo goloso gomu' dani' ado' lute do goloso oga' monovosi vene' vemoho' alu gipe gopo ingaa' monovosi ido' ne'mine mana'mine monovo goloso ngovozo hilami gopo iga' monovosi nene igi mili minaa' angumu' nene ingine lu'ine di velepe' izami minikevo naza engikumu' nene agae lo ive ga'ne dizelido' o minelihe lo gelo gopo ga'ne nogiluve.

Lengita alosa nouvoni' meve nene gamene sitohamo ivosa alosuuve. Ido' ogo gonitine geleloni' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizado' nene do molosa gele-lengedelesuve: Gamazi gono nidavo lihime dave'mi monovo li soto' ilizave nene sitape sitohamope ne'minete mini hamo' gamazivo' likevosavo' nene lamineto' likeve li gili ele'vole' ilisave.

Nemu' nene gomu' lengikisi gamene sita' vo minuvoni' gamenela nene lihime gomu' dani' alevesi ido' evene' linge mukikisi lo-lingimuvoni' gamazi nene idise lengikisi minamuvongu' nene gohi ti' lo hungo' molo nolo-lingimuve: Gohi aloni' nene isetine mo keke' izamolosuve.

Ne'mine oloni' nene Kilisito' nene nenita mine molo neivosa gamazi noluve noluvoni' nene mo lamineto' noluvoni' monovo lengelebizelongumu' nene lingine nilani' nenako nemu' naza ne'mi monovo do soto' ogo lengelebizeloni' nene isetine izamolosuve. Ee, Kilisito' lengito' gono daa' neine' nene gilizevo ogo daa' neivoba asi lengi' vovotingu' nene amuzo molo gono do minaa' neine' ma neive.

Lamineto' aza nene gilizevo ne'mine lolo' ogo neido' nene lohoto' zalo' bilani'za O'moso'mi amuzo eita gono do minine' ne'mo nene gohi vele gizo minevo' dovo' ogo neive. Ee, laza nene eikisi a'mine'mine ogo gilizevo ogo none'za O'moso'mi amuzo lelita gono ha do neine' ne'mo nene ezesi vete gizo minevo' dovo' ogo mino lengikumu' ve losa nene gono dalosune.

Lamineto' lingine nene mo mono' lulou' nene nizahe nizamahe ne'mi monovo di soto' ilisa langisetine monovotine nene emengu' mili ize' mili di ningilo. Lengi' lutingu' lutingu' Kilisito' mine molo neingumu' nene langisetine nene gili guni amahe. Ee, lingine nene O'moso'mo ninge mate-lengedelido' minamavo ma nene mo lamineto' Kilisito' nene lengi' lutingu' mine molo neive.
Ido' ne'mine o neinako lingine leli' ningavoo O'moso'mo ninge mate-ledamivo ha gono dalonido' minelesune losa nogiluve.

Laza lengikumu' nene monovo goloso hamokisi nene ma damilizahoo lo O'mosola laa' noune. Ido' ne'mine lo O'mosola laa' noune' nene lingine monovo goloso damii minikevo O'moso'mo leli' nene ningaavo gono dalonido' lisihe' o none' nene soto' ogo minelingumu' ve losa nene ma losa'mune. Asi leli' nene O'moso'mo ninge mate-ledavoo gono dalonido' lisihe' amune' gele noline' nevosi nene alamo lingine monovo lisihe' laminekovo' igi mili minilizangumu' ve losa nene laa' noune.

Ido' ne'mine noluvoni' nene laza inite' ma oloningu' nene gamazi gihile belo do'mo leme-deline' inite' nene mo keke' ngelo ma amolosune. Asi gamazi gihile hize ele' iline' initekovo' nene olosuunako nemu' nene noluve.

Ee, lingine monoku' amuzo mili minaa' ani' ne'mo nene laza amuzote do soto' olone' akate nomivosa gilizevo ogo minaa' olone' gamene muki' nene lolize izo minaa' noune. Ido' ma neemukisi nene O'mosola laa' noune: Ado' lengi' nene mudise di lisihe' igi minilizave losa nene laa' noune.

Ido' naza lengita olihe amo mino ne'mine gamazi mene nogize-lingiduvoni' nene lengita alongu' nene Guvelesi ve'mo neme neine' amuzo nene do soto' ogo lingine dovo gizevo' ogo lengelemalove lo gele minosa nene nogize-lingiduve. A'mine amuzo nimine' nene monoku' do'mo leme-lengedelongumu' ve losa nevoba asi do'mo dize-lengedelongumu' ve losa nene nimine' ve.

Neze zuhokizo, gamazi gize osu' lolosa lumola mene ti' lo nolo-lingiduve: Longolize izisa minilo. Ido' monoku' nene di lisihe' i'mi dizi minilo. Naza gamazi luvoni' mene gili diisa minilo. Ido' lutine gatine've nene hamoli'minevo' minivosavo' nene minilo. Ido' lengiku' nene hongu li laminiivo' minilo. Ne'mine ikevo lulo lemo do hongu lo-ledaa' neine' O'moso ne'mo nene lengikisi mine molo minelive.
Lingine nene O'moso'mi evenelelite ilizado' o minine' monovolo' nene igi ge nabuti' ize ne gabuti' ize li minaa' ilo. Ido' O'moso'mi evenele muki' nete nene longopo'ni nilave.
Guvelesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' nasahili've nene lengikisi mine molo neivo O'moso'mi lulo nesi lengita neivo ido' O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo nene lengikisi bizo minaavo minilizahoo lo noluve.
Modave.

Aposolo Paulo' naza ido' leze zuho Izesu' aleve ingine mukikisi none' nesi nene lingine Izesu' Kilisito' zuho mulise muki' Galatia misubou' mini'mi monangumu' nene luhuvo inite' gize lengemelone loosa naza mene nogize lingimuze. Ningilo. Naza aposolo gono daa' nouvoni' nene haza evenelite ne'mine gono nimi nele'mizi milani' nevoba asi Izesu' Kilisito' asi've nesi hilinguti' do ote-dive meleho O'moso nesi nele'mizi milasine' nenako nemu' aposolo nouve noluvoni' nene mo lamineto' noluve.
Ido' O'moso metehosi Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisitokisi engi' nasahili' i-lidaa' nasine' monovo'ine nesi ido' hongu lo lamino minaa' monovo'ine nesi nene lengita minelive lo O'mosola noluve.
Meteho O'moso'mo lavo ei' lulolo' e'meto Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' aza idise minani' alevetingu' goloso ogo noninguti' nene do lu' izelove lo eze oko'no hulo lihimete apaso hiline'.
Nemu' nene O'moso opo'ni lovo' lovo' ogo mino mo izo huko-ledamivo minevo' minevo' ogo minelive lo mo a'minemu' ne'minovo' miniliho lo noluve.

Lingine Kilisito' nasahili' o-lengedavo ne'mo O'moso'mo ei' evenele ve lo lengele'mize molavo minanguti' lite' li mehedine imi evenelite mono' gamazi lamine' ve li gamazi ato' li-lingimani' gili ngimaa' nani' nemu' nene naza upuho' ogo aizo lo nogiluve.

Ne neiha Kilisito' gamazi've lamine' ne'mine nene ato' ma nomine'za evene' ma ingine nene lengi' lutingu' hizi di gopo' napa i-lingidi Kilisito' gamazi've lamine' nene di ato' igi di goloso ilisa laa' nave.

Ingine ne'mine igi Kilisito' gamazi've lamine' gomu' vomila lo-lingimune' nene li-lingimami ma di gopo igi ato' ma li-lingimilizave ingine nene O'moso'mo usi' ize-ngedavo mo vi tolovo ilisave lo noluve. Mo nazasi ne'mine ma olonikisi nene mo vo tolovo olosuve lo noluve. Ido' Okulumokuti' O'moso'mi angelo' ne'mine'mosi ne'mine ma iline' nene O'moso'mi angelo' noliha a'minesi mo vo tolovo oloseive.

Gomu' lo-lingimune' nene idise gohi ti' lo nolo-lingimuve: Ve ma ingine laza mono' gamazi lo-lingimune' gili ele'vole' ani' gamazi ne'mine li-lingimami atoli'mine ma li-lingimilizave nene O'moso'mo usi' ize-ngedavo vi tolovo ilisave.

Ido' evene' malite nenikumu' nene aza lamineto' lamo ha evene' lanite' gililizadokovo' lo-ngemaa' neive laa' ani' nene naza ne'mine oga' uvodo' ladiniko idise evene' ma vi tolovo ilisave noluvoni' nene ngelo lo-ngimuvodibe. nGelo ma lo-ngemamuvodine. Nemu' nene evene' lanite' gililizadokovo' lo-ngemamo O'moso'mo ninge lamine' dalidokovo' lo-ngemaa' nouve. Ee, Kilisito' gelekele' ve lolo' oo minuvoni' ne'mo evenelite neni' ngeli ninge lamine' damilizado' nenako evenelite neni' ninge lamine' dalizave losa idisesi ne'mine ogo ha minuvodiniko Kilisito' gelekele' ve lolo' ogo ma minamuvodine.

Neze zuhokizo, naza Kilisito' gamazi've lamine' lo-lingimuvoni' mamu' lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. A'mine gamazi nene evene' malitidati' giluvoba evenelitesi apizi nimamavo Izesu' Kilisito' asi've lo soto' ogo lo-nimine' ve. Nemu' nene evenelite di soto' milani' gamazi nomive li gililizave losa nolo-lingimuve.

Ido' Kilisito' gamazi've lamine' nene evene' malitesi li-nimamavo Kilisito' asi've lo soto' ogo lo-nimive luvoni' nene nemu' luze. Gililo. Naza gomu' Zuda veti monovolo' e'meto mino ogo molo minaa' uvoni' monovo'ne nene lingine mo li-lingimikevo mo gili nizave. Naza nene ne'mine noogo O'moso'mi evenele zuho do goloso palasa ogo osu' lo-ngedelove lo ne'mine olosa do goloso ogosa goboni molo-ngedaa' uvoni' ve.

Ido' naza nene avotemotidati' monovo ngomo' naba' nene lemo ongalive lo a'mine avotemotidati' gamazi nene amuzo goloso molo gele do mino neze gono'nemote leli' Zuda veuti' minani' muki' nene ngivile' ogo Zuda veti monoku' nene dize veleto' oka' oka' o'mo vo minuvoni' nene lingine mo gili nizave.

Ne'mino mino ne'mine oga' uvoni'za ize'nehi mulunou' olihe ha minuvongu' do kegese-nedo nasahili' o-nidine' ne'mo aposolo lolo' iline lo nele'mize molave O'moso aza gala gelavo lamine' ogavo eze gamazi've lamine' nene do vo Zuda ve minama veti zuho ato ato' nene vo lo-ngeme'mo moneline lo ei' gipele'mi monovo nene lo soto' ogo nelebizavo naza ne'mi monovo nene imine' mili li-nimilizave lo a'mine gamazi nemu' evene' hamokisi ma lo gele ha gele amo

ido' Zelusalemi ebeta olihe aposolo lolo' amuvo gomu' mili aposolo lili' igi minave engitasi nene vamuvoni'za naza lite' lo evene' vai' minamani' misubo Alabia nela vo mino alinge' nene Damasiko numuno ebeta tine' molo vo minuvoni' ve. Ido' ne'mine ogo evenekisi gamazi lo gele ha gele amuvoni' nemu' nene naza mono' gamazi lo-lengemaa' nouvoni' nene evenetati' nomine' ve. Asi Kilisitodati' neine' neive li lingine gililizave losa nolo-lingimuve.

Ido' tine' molo Damasiko numuno ebeta vo hetelo mino kilisimasi seto hamo hulosa Petolo'ni ningo gamazi lo-emo eze gamazi gelelove lo Zelusalemi ebeta dizo vo salele sitakisi gamene hamokisi nene ezesi maka' minusive.
Ne'mino minuvoni'za aposolo linge ma nene ningamo Guvelesi ve Izesu' nakunolo minive Zakobo'nivo' nene ninguve.

Ido' naza a'mine me gamazi nogize-lingiduvoni' nene gosoho' nasaha' lo-lengemamo O'moso'mi velelo' lamineto' mono' gamazi lo-lengemaa' nouvoni' nene evenetati' gelamo Kilisitodati' giluvoni' nene nolo-lingimuve.
Neloti' Zudaia misubou' minamo gohi alinge' nene Silia misuboukosi Kilikia misuboukosi vuvoni' ve.
Vuvoni'za Zudaia misubou' Kilisito' evenele mulise ato ato' minani' ingine nene nenikumu' ma ningi gilamani' ve.

Ee, ingine nene neni' monovo'nemu' nene ve'inedunu' ma ningami ga'inedunukovo' nene evene' malite li-ngimikevo ti' li gilani' ve: Leli' mono' gamazite osu' lilive lo leli' goboni molo-ledaa' ive ma'mo idise nene a'mine mono' gamazi nene gamazi lamine' ve lo lo-ngeme'mo nomonive.
Nemu' nenikumu' nene O'moso opo'ni li minani' ve.
Neloti' kilisimasi fotini (14) ogo vavo Banabasikisi Zelusalemi numuno ebeta gohi dizo vusine' ve. Ido' dizo vusingu' nene Tito'nisi ele'mizo makato' vune' ve.

Ido' dizo vuvoni' nene haza dizo vamuve. O'moso'mo dizo vozo lo-nemavosa dizo vuvoni' ve. Ido' a'mida dizo vosa naza gono gomu' duvoni' nesi ido' gono idise noduvoni' nesi nene gopo soza inite' do minuvoni' gelalive losa Izesu' evenele guve'inesi ve minave engikovo' nene mulise mili minangu' nene a'mine gono daa' uvoni' monovo nene lo-ngimuvoni' ve. Ado' Zuda ve minamave heta ato' ve nene Kilisito'nimu' gamazi lamine' lo-ngemaa' nouvoni' nene ne'mine lo lo-ngemo ido' leli' Zuda veti monovo di ti' igi okodine lolovo huki hulilizave lo lo-ngemesa'muve lo a'mine lo-ngemaa' uvoni' gamazimu' nene lo soto' o-ngemekuve. Ne'mino lo soto' o-ngemekuvo ingine gilii lamine' ve lani' ve.

Ido' Zuda ve ma nete Tito'nimu' nene aza heta ato' ve nGiliki ve minine' nenako Mose' lou' gamazilo' e'meti oko'no lolovo huki huli-di Zuda ve lolo' i-dilizave lani'za Izesu' evenele guve'inesi ve nete gili ngimami Tito'nimukisi oko'no lolovo huki-dilizave lii ma li hukamani' ve.

Ido' a'mine Zuda ve nete Tito'ni oko'no lolovo huki huli-di Zuda ve lolo' i-dilizave lani' nene Mose' lou' gamazilo' gelekele' ogo a'mine'mi lulou' minunidoti' Izesu' Kilisito' aza evenele leli' do apase-lidine' nenako a'minemu' gilisa edamive li gili mo lamineto' nolihe li ningi gililisa ingine haleki suno' leli' vovoteu' igi gote izi Izesu' evenele minani' gili mini a'mine lou' gamazilo' gohi di gelekele' i-lidilizani' akamu' vise' igi minisa lani' ve.

Ee, ingine nete heta ato' ve nene oko'ine lolovo huki huli-ngidi Zuda ve lolo' i-ngidilizave li amuzo mili lani'za laza ingine Izesu'nimu' gamazi lamine' nene di gopo igi li-lingimikelizave lo a'mine gamazilo' gizebo lamine' okunivo gamazi gihile nene lamine' ha minelive lo engi' gamazilo' nene mo gele ngemamune. Ee, gamene ngomosi nene mo keke' gele ngemamo Tito'ni oko'no lolovo nene ma huko hulo-damune.

Ido' monoku' guve'inesi ve minani' gili minave ingine nene naza mono' gamazi lamine' lo-ngemaa' uvodo' nene gamazi ne'minesi imine' molo lo-ngemelesane li ma li-nimamani' ve. Ido' monoku' guve'inesi ve minani' gilivo minani' ve luve ingine nene mo guve'inesi ve minani' nolihe nani'mine ve minani' nolihe nemu' nene naza giluvo haza inite' lolo' ogave. O'moso ne'mo evene' ninge lamine' daa' neine' nene ingine dizi minangumu' ve losa ido' limi minangumu' ve losa ma nomive.

Ee, monoku' guve'inesi ve minani' nete gamazi ma ne'mino imine' molo lo-ngemeline li li-nidamani' ve. Asi monoku' evene' naba numuno langise ne'mini oti minave ve li li-ngidaa' ave Zakobo' ve Petolo' ve Zohane' ve nete lelikumu' nene lingine leli' daa' une' gono ma'mini daa' asive nene nizasive. Nemu' nene laza Zuda vetida mene gono nodunivo lingine nene heta ato' vetida vi gono dalisive li Banabasingisi adelo' dani' ve. Ido' ne'mine li adelo' dani' nene ti' li ningi gilani' nemu' adelo' dani' ve: Petolo' aza oko'ine lolovo huki hulaa' ave Zuda vela aposolo gono dangu' hize ele' o-daa' ive O'moso ne'mo naza heta ato' vetida gono do nouvongu' nene a'mine'mine ogo hize ele' o-nedaa' neine' nene soto' ogo minavo neloti' nene a'mine aposolo ingine Izesu'nimu' gamazi lamine' nene Zuda ve lo-ngemeline lo O'moso'mo Petolo'ni imiseline' ma'mino neze nene Zuda ve minamani' heta ato' vetida vo Izesu'nimu' gamazi lamine' nene lo-ngemeline lo O'moso'mo nimiseline' nemukisi ido' nasahili' o-nedo aposolo lolo' o-nidine' nemukisi nene ningi gilani' nenako nemu' nene heta ato' vetida vi gono dalizo li adelo' dani' ve.

Ingine gamazi gohi li-limami gamazi hamo' nene ti' li li-limani' ve: Lingine heta ato' vetida Izesu' aleve mono' li-ngimilisingu' nene ingine Zudaia misubouko goho' gahali' minave nene hize ele' i-ngidilizave li li-ngimilisingumu' nene gatine molamivoo. Ne'mine lani' nene naza mo ne'mine olosa amuzo molo minuvodo' lani' ve.
Ido' alinge' Petolo' aza neni' minuvoni' numuno ebe' Adiokiala ogosa a'mida inite' ma ogo molo minine' lisihe' amine' nene soto' ogavo nemu' nene naza neida vo lo soto' ogo elemuvoni' ve.

Ido' elemuvoni' nene ne'mine ogo molo miningumu' nene elemuvoni' ve: Aza nene a'mine Adiokiala ogo hetelo miningu' nene Izesu' evenele zuho mukiliti guvetesi ve Zakobo' aza Izesu' evenele Zuda ve linge ma ngimiselavo Adiokiala olihe igi hetelamavo Petelo' aza nene monovo lamine' apizo Izesu' evenele Zuda ve minamavesi nene gopo makato' noso' nite' naa' ani' ve. Aza monovo lamine' apizo ne'mine oga' ine'za Zelusalemi ebetati' Zakobo' ngimiselive ingine igi hetelikevo Petolo' aza nene ti' lo gelo golise giline': Zuda ve linge muki' nene engi' lou' gamazilo' amuzo mili gili mini ingine heta ato' ve gomu' oko'ine lolovo huki huli Zuda ve lili' igisavo' nene Izesu' evenele lili' ilisave laa' nave. Nemu' nene a'mine Zuda ve ingine nenikumu' nene gaza heta ato' vesi noso' nite' makato' nani' ne'mo nene Zuda ve leli' lou' gamazite nene avuto' ogane li nelemilizahe lo gelo golise giline'. Nemu' nene heta ato' vesi noso' nite' makato' naa' adoti' nene vo noka' mineka' ogo mino gohi vo namo hulo lamine' ine' ve.

Ido' a'mida Izesu' zuho Zuda ve linge ma nesi Zuda vemu' golise gilangumu' nene a'mine'mine igi monovo di goloso igi ingine lu'ningu' nene laza heta ato'vesi noso' nite' makato' naa' noune' nene lisihe' o neive li ha gili minani' nene di haleki heta ato' vesi makato' naa' ani' nene hulikevo ne'mo Banabasi' nesi engiku' vo gi'mizo a'mine monovolo' e'meto a'mine'mine ine' ve.

Ingine Izesu' zuho heta ato' ve minanikisi makato' noso' nite' naa' adoti' huli alamani' ne'mo Kilisito' gamazi lamineli'mi akau' lisihe' igi vamavo naza ningo Izesu' evenele linge mukiliti ve'nido' nene Petolo'ni ti' lo lo-imuve: Gaza nene Zuda veuti' soto' aine' mino Zuda veti monovo hulo heta ato' vela bizaa' anive neke nene heta ato' vela bizo noso' nite' makato' naa' adoti' hulo alamo minaine' ne'mo nene heta ato' ve ingine gilavo gomu' Zuda ve lolo' ikevosavo' nene laza Izesu' evenele Zuda ve minunekisi nene bizo minelesune laine' gelave. Nemu' nene heta ato' ve nene Zuda veti monovolo' ngele'mize molalosa iline' nene ngelo lisihe' ilihe lo lo-imuve.
Mo lamineto' laza nene Zuda ve minamani' heta ato' zuho Mose' lou' gamazi gilami gopo'napa minaa' aveuti' soto' une' nevoba Mose' lou' gamazi di minave Zuda veuti' soto' une' none'za

laza ti' lo gele none: Mose' lou' gamazilo' nene ngelo e'meto osu' lamolone' nenako a'mine lou' gamazilo' e'meto minelone' ne'mo do gamazite nomine' lolo' o-ledamo evene' hamokisi O'moso'mo do lu' izelido' do lisihe' gehepeve o-ledamoloseinako nemu' nene O'moso'mo evene' do lu' izelido' do lisihe' o-ledeline' nene lou' gamazilo' e'meti minangumu' ve losa nevoba ingine Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' angumu' ve losa do lu' izelido' do lisihe' o-ledeleseive. Nemu' nene laza lou' gamazilo' e'meto minune' ne'mo do lu' izelido' do lisihe' o-ledamivo Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' olone' ne'movo' nene do lu' izelido' do lisihe' o-ledeleseive lo laza Zuda ve lingela nene Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' une' ve.

Ido' Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' okunivo ne'movo' nene O'moso'mo do lu' izelido' do lisihe' o-ledeleseive lo gelo lou' gamazilo' e'metaa' akalo' vamune' ne'mo lazasi heta ato' ve ne'mine lou' avuto' oga' unive minune' gelavo nemu' Kilisito' aza nene evene' lihime daa' akalo' lele'mize molaa' ive neive lisa gililizaha o've mo keke' ne nomive.

Ido' lingine mo gili nizave. Petolo' aza heta ato' vesi noso' nite' ni minaa' adi'mo Zuda veti lou' gamazi nene mo hulo alamine' ve. Ido' alinge' heta ato' vesi noso' nite' maka' naa' ani' nene hulo haza minidi'mo a'mine gomu' hulokine' lou' gamazi nene gohi amuzo molalive lo gohi do oto e'metine' giline' ve. Ido' laza a'mine'mine ogo lou' gamazi'mi lulou' minaa' monovo mudise hulokune' nene gohi ma do oto e'metunidiniko laza lamine' mo lou' gamazi avuto' ogo lihime daa' unive minune' nene do soto' unidine.

Ido' ne'mine luvoni' nene nemu' luvoni' ve: Lou' gamazi nene ngenga lo gele damuvo a'mine ne'mo nebele hiline' gelavo ne'mo lou' gamazi'mi gesi mingu' minuvoni' nene osu' line'. Ido' osu' line' nene naza O'moso'mo lu'ne do ote-nede'mo vo minivo ei' lilidokovo' ezemu' gelo ogo molo minelove lo nemu' lou' gamazi'mi gesi mingu' nene gohi ma minamuvoni' ve. Kilisito'ni nene neni' lihime'nemu' lohoto' zalo' bilangu' nene nenikisi maka' nibili hilani' gelavo nouve.

Ne'mine ogo naza nene ve'nesi ha minevo' alevo' nouha Kilisito' ne'mo lu'neu' minevo' dovo' ogo minidi'mo nene nouve. Ido' idise me misubou' minevo' alevo' ogo nouvoni' nene O'moso'mi gipele aza lulo nemo nenikumu' lohoto' zalo' hilive eikumu' gele ele'vole' ogo nouve.

Ido' O'moso'mi lou' gamazi nene gele dokunivo lihimete nomine' minelonido' minidiniko Kilisito' nene hazamu' hilidine. Ne'mine idinako O'moso'mo nasahili' o-ledo Kilisito'ni imiselavo ogo lihimetemu' hiline' nemu' nene gele hulo naza Mose' lou' gamazilo' nene gele dosavo' lihime'ne nomine' minelesuve lamolosuve. Ne'mine ma oloni' nene O'moso'mo nasahili' o-ledo Kilisito'ni imiselavo lihimete nomivo minelone' akate vele-lidine' nene hazamu' vele-ledave lo mehe'ne imuvoni' geleleseinako nemu' nene mo keke' mehe'ne emamolosuve.

Agae, Galatia aleve lingine nene Izesu' Kilisito' lohoto' zalo' hiline' monovomu' nene do lanosa lo soto' ogo lo-lengemekunivo lingine gilani' nene mo vetinedunu' ningani' giline' nenako lingine negi ne'mine hizi Mose' lou' gamazi'mi gesi mingu' vilisa nani' nene zaho gatine hizo lengele'mize gopo ogavosa ne'mine nave.

Ne'mine nani' nemu' nene lingine mene ma longo' o-lengedelouze. Gililo. Lingine O'moso'mi Sikalahu' di ti' ani' ma nene Mose' lou' gamazilo' e'meti minisa dani' nehe. Ne nomive. Lingine Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' gilisa ezemu' gili ele'vole' igi minani' ne'mo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' nene di ti' ani' ma neive.

Lingine gana' nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' nene di ti' igi ei' amuzololo' minani' nene mo hulisa lingine lou' gamazi'mi gesi mingu' vo leli' amuzotelokovo' mino monovote mudise do lamine' olone li gilani' noline' nene mo negi gatine gehepeve gilani' ve.
Ido' lingine gomu' O'moso'mi Sikalahu' di ti' igi nizavo lengita ato ato' monovo vai' goloso soto' o lingimine' ma nene hazamu' nehe. E'e, hazamu' soto' o lingimine' nomive losa gele nouve.

Ido' lingine O'moso'mo Sikalahu' lehize-lengedo ele'vole' suno lengiku' do soto' oga' ine' ma nene lou' gamazilo' gili di gono di minangumu' ne'mine ine' nehe ido' Izesu' gamazi gili gili ele'vole' angumu' ne'mine ine' neve.
Mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Abalahamu' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogavo nemu' O'moso'mo gelavo ve lisihe' lihime've nomine' lolo' ine'.

Ido' O'moso'mo Abalahamu'ni inite' o-dine' nesi ido' lengiku' ele'vole' suno do soto' oga' ine' nesi nene hamo' monovo angumu' do soto' o-lingidine' nenako Abalahamu' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ine' ne'mine igi lingine Izesu'nimu' gili ele'vole' igi minangumu' ve losa ele'vole' suno lengiku' nene do soto' oga' ine' ve.

Ido' Abalahamu' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ine' nemu' nene O'moso'mo ve lisihe' ve lo-dine'za lengi' gatine hizave nene ti' li li-lingimi nilisave: O'moso'mi evenele zuho nene Abalahamu' a'vopilemo' oko'ine lolovo huki huli Mose' lou' gamazi'mi gesi mingu' minavevo' nene O'moso'mi zuho nizave. Ne'mine li li-lingimi nilisaha a'mine mono' godolou' neine' gamazi Abalahamu' monovomu' luvoni' maloti' nene lingine ne'mine li ningi gililisave: Abalahamu' zuho gihile nene eze a'vopilemo' minave nene nizavoba asi evene' ma ingine eze emeni dameni've di ti' igi eze oga' idi'mine igi O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' iga' ave nene Abalahamu' zuho gihile nene nizave.

Ido' Abalahamu' a'vopilemo' minamani' evene' heta ato' ve inginesi O'mosomu' alinge' gili ele'vole' ikevo nemu' nene O'moso'mo lihime'ine hulo-ngedo do lisihe' o-ngedeline' nene mo gele mino aza O'moso'mo a'minemu' nene Abalahamu'ni gamazi lamine' ti' lo lo-imine' mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Geitati' no'nohoka nene evene' zuho ato ato' mukita do soto' o-ngedelesuve.

Nemu' nene Abalahamu' aza gele ele'vole' oga' ive mine do vo minine' ne'mine igi gili ele'vole' iga' nave ingine nene O'moso'mo Abalahamu'ni no'noho' ize-do a'mine'mine ogo engikisi no'noho' ize-ngedaa' neive.
Ido' mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Ve ma ingine a'mine lou' gamazi gizi nizani' muki' nene gili dii osu' li'mi vi minami
a'minguti' ma hitilizani' nene O'moso'mo mudise vi tolovo ilisave lo engikumu' usi' ize-ngedo lo huko lo-ngede neive.
