A'mine mono' muliselo' gizebo ve nene monoku' olihe lodive amive evene' gosoho' ne'mine ele'mizi milalizani' nene ne'mine i-nidikeve loo oko'no do dizavo O'moso'mo Satani lihime molo-do mulumo gono emelesa neine' ne'mine ogo lihime molo-do mulumo gono emaalinako olihe monoku' lodive amive evene' gosoho' nene mono' gizebo ve lili' i-damilizave.

Ido' Izesu' evenele minamave nete ezemu' gamangi mili-daa' avevo' nene mono' gizebo ve lili' i-dilizave. Mono' gizebo ve nene ne'mine ve minamiline' nene evene' malite monovo goloso ogave li elemikevo Satani'mo emengu' molo ivile' ogavo lihime daalive losa noluve.

Ido' mono' muliselo' medeli mini ato ato' gono ado' goho' gahali' nasahili' i-ngidaa' gono nevo'mido' gizebo ve nete nene a'mine'mine igi mono' muliselo' gizebo ve ne'minisa mini evenelite gamangi mili-ngidilizado' i minave mini evene' go'ine izaa' ave minami noso geli geli igi naa' ave minami monovo goloso igi moni heneni vai' dalisa gilaa' ave minami
monoli'mi suno' gamazi O'moso'mo do soto' o-lede neine' nene di mini mono' gili nizado' nene ha e'metivo' minisa engi' lu'ningu' monovo goloso minivo ningisa'mave minilizave.

Ido' a'mine ato ato' gonolo' gizebo ve lili' i-ngidilizave nene gomu' engi' monovomu' ize' mili-ngidi ningavo engita a'mine e'metamilizave luvoni' initekuti' nene ma nomivo minilizanikovo' nene a'mine gonolo' dalizangumu' di oti-ngidilizave.

Ido' engikisi bizi minani' vene' neve nene evenelite gamangi mili-ngidilizado' lisihe' i minani' vene' minii divi ledivi' gamazi li-ngidisa'mani' vene' mini negi hizami monovo'nido' gizebo lamine' igi mini ne'mine mana'mine gono dalizani' nene monovo lisihetokovo' e'metisa di minilizani' vene' minilizave.

Ido' a'mine ato ato' gonolo' gizebo ve lili' i-ngidilizave nene vene' hamo' di minisa engi' izipaha'nidokisi engi' numu'ningu' ingaa' avelokisi nene gizebo lamine' i-ngidi ngele'mize akalo' iga' ave minilizave.

Ne'mine noluvoni' nene nanitekumu' ve. A'mine gono'ine nene laminisa ma di minilizani' nene evene' gilavo dizi minisa Izesu' Kilisitodo' gi'mizo mino gelaa' noune' monokumu' nene ngehelele izamivo livi kiselivi' ilisanako nemu' nene noluve.

Naza gei' nanida nene lite' lo alohe lo gele nouha lite' lo amuvo ma nene gaza ladani amo O'moso'mi evenele zuhouti' alevelite igi mili ilizani' monovomu' nene gaza gele mineline losa gamazi mene nogize-giduve. A'mine O'moso'mi evenele zuhomu' luvoni' nene minevo' minevo' oga' neine' O'mosola gi'mizunive leli' mulisemu' nene luve. Langise ne'mo numuno hize ele' ogo do minaa' neine' ne'mino gamazi gihile hize ele' ogo do minaa' neine' nene leli' O'moso'mi evenele mulise neve nene none.
Ido' suno' gamazi leli' monoteu' soto' ogo minine' nene gamazi naba neive lo lo soto' oga' noune' nene ado'
Kilisito' ei' nene leli' okode ne'mine do otuho soto' ogo minavoo
ei' monovo've nene mo lisihe' o neive lo
Sikalahuli'mo do soto' ogo lelebizavosa
angelo' ma netesi nene ningikevo
evene' zuho ato atotidasi gamazi've nene li soto' igi li-ngimikevo
me misubouko aleve linge netesi nene ezemu' gili ele'vole' ani' ve.
Ido' eze nene O'moso'mo Okulumo' ebe' laminekuko ele'mizo dizine' ve.

Ne neiha O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo ti' lo lo soto' ogo lo-leme neine' ma neive: Alinge' nela nene evene' ma ingine mono' gihile di mini minilizanguti' nene hulisa go'ine izaa' nani' sikalahuta nene vi gi'mizi sikalahu' golosolati' minine' mono' gamazi apizi ngimaa' naado' nene e'metilisave.
Ne'mine mono' goloso di soto' nave nete oko'ine losuvoloti' nene evene' lamine' gili minii sozalo' ve monovo goloso lamine' ize' mili ningi di kegesaa' ani' madu'ine di goloso ikeni' mini

vene' daa' velo' vaa' nene amilizave li ido' O'moso ezemu' gili ele'vole' igi gamazi gihile gili minave O'moso'mo ei' isaa' neve li-di di nalizave lo noso' nite' do soto' ine' linge ma nene malise ilizave li-ngidaa' nave.

Ido' naza O'moso isaa' neve li-di dalizave noluvoni' nene O'moso'mo do soto' ine' inite' mata' nene laminekovo' neine' nenako a'mine mukikumu' nene O'moso isaa' neve lo-dosa hamokumukisi nene o'ove lamo mo daakovo' olone' o neine' nenako nemu' nene luve.

Ido' naza di naakovo' ilisave noluvoni' nene nanitekumu' ve. O'moso'mo line' gamazi ne'mosi ido' laza isaa' neve lo O'mosola lune' ne'mosi a'mine noso' nite' nene do lamine' oga' neinako nemu' nene luve.

Gaza lo-giduvoni' gamazi mene leze zuho Izesu' evenele lo-ngedeline' nene mono' gamazi lamine' apize gimunido' e'meto minaine' ne'mo nene luka'mi noso' nite' lolo' ogo hize ele' o-gidivo mino mo Izesu' Kilisito' gonolo' ve gihile lamine' nene minelesane.

Monoku' vo damine' gamazi heluno ne'mine gihile've nomine' getipe gamazi laa' nani' nene mehenga emaa' ozo. Ne'mine oga' noogosa monoto' monovo do hehe lovo' ogo molo iliningumu' nene ele'vole' ogo a'mine'mi gono've do ninge' ninge' ogo doka' doka' o'mo vo minezo.

Ne'mine noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve. Laza okode amuzo molo ele'vole' ogo minelive lo ne'mi gono've doka' doka' o'mo vo eksesais ogo minaa' noune' ne'mo nene ngomo hize ele' o-ledaa' neive. Ne'mine oga' neiha monoto' monovo do hehe lovo' ogo amuzo molo ogo molo oga' ne'mo nene idise minevo' alevo' ogo nounidaa mene hize ele' o-ledelido' o neivosa ido' alinge' Okulumokuko minevo' minevo' ogo minelonidaasi nene hize ele' o-ledelido' o neive. Nemu' nene okode losuvomu' olone' inite' nene ivile' ivosa a'mine monoto' monovo do hehe lovo' oga' ne'mo nene mudise hize ele' gehepeve o-ledaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene noluve.
Ido' gamazi meve nene gihile lamine' neine' nenako mo mudise gele dalonido' nene lisihe' o neive.

Nemu' nene minevo' minevo' oga' neine' O'moso aza evene' muki' do ngu' izaato' minidoti' nene ado' leli' Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' oga' nounive nene do lu' izaa' ive gehepeve ne neive losa ezemu' gele mu'musi' ogo none' nenako a'nemu' nene zege' zege' goloso ogosa mulumo gono ne'mine do do dizo minaa' noune.
A'mine lo-giduvoni' gamazi muki' mene lo soto' ogo apize ngemezo.

Ido' gaza ve goso've ve li geikumu' gilikevo lemo minaaline. Nemu' nene Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' igi minave nene gei' monovokalo' e'metilizado' lisihe' ilido' ogo molo ozo. Gaza gamazi liliningu' nolihe ne'mine mana'mine inite' iliningu' nolihe evene' lute ngemaa' monovolokisi ido' Guvelesi vemu' gele ele'vole' oga' monovolokisi ido' monovo goloso hamokisi ogo molo amo minaa' monovolokisi nene gaza lamino e'meto nanivo ne'mo nene ingine a'mido' e'meti igi mili ilizani' aka'ine nene ngelebizelive.

Naza gei' nanida olihe amuvo nanido' nene mono' godolou' gamazi nene gate ngemaa' ido' lu'ine do oto ga'ine daa' gamazi lo-ngemaa' ido' mono' monovo apize ngemaa' gono ne'mido' nene luka amuzo molo molo minoosa do do vo minezo.

Ido' O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi geikumu' line' nene nilavo ido' mono' gizebo ve nene gonou' gele'mizi mili a'nine godokalo' nimilavo gonou' amuzo O'moso'mo lehize-gidine' nesi nene damanivo haza minaalive.
Mono' gonoka do lamine' o'mo novaine' nene evene' muki' ningilizangumu' ve lo a'mine lo-giduvoni' initeto' mene luka molo mino a'mine ne'mine monovo ogatokovo' nene minezo.

Gei' monovokalokisi ido' evene' apize ngeme ngeme' iline' gamazilokisi nene ninge lamine' gehepeve o minezo. Gaza a'mine gamazilo' nene mo gi'mize gili' lo mineline' ne'mo nene gasika lukuvo nalinido' gele'mize molosa gei' gamazika gililizavesi nene lukuvo nalizado' ngele'mize molalosainaze. A'mine gamazilo' nene gi'mize gili' lo minezo.

Gaza vemoho' ozoho ne'mine nene gamazi amuzonga lo-emamo gei' maho gehepeve gele neivosa gala do gamazi lo-emezo. Ido' izipe goso've nene nakuna gehepeve ne'mine gili minavosa ga'ine do gamazi lo-ngemezo.
Ido' vene' ozoho neve nene gei' izamote gehepeve gili nizavo ido' vene' alu ne'mine nene gaka do zovo' zava' izalize. Aluna gehepeve gili nizavosa nene ga'ine do gamazi lo-ngemezo.
Vene' gevono' mamu' ninganivo mono' mulise nete hize ele' i-ngidilizado' minikeve lo ningeline' nene mo guhalihali gehepeve i minani' venekumukovo' nene ningelesane.

Ne neiha vene' gevono' maliti izipaha'ine nehe nga'vopilemo' nehe ma minilizani' a'mine aleve nene inite' ato' ma amisa gomu' ilizani' inite' naba ado' mono' ne'mo ize'ningine me'ninginemu' ne'mine monovo ilizave lo neine' nene ningi gili a'mido' e'meti'mi vi engi' zuho gehepeve engi' ize'ningine me'ningine golo hizi-ngidi noso' nite' nevo'mine ngimi hize ele' i-ngidilizave. Ee, ne'mine ogakumu' nene O'moso'mo lamine' gelaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene izipaha'ine ingine a'mine ize'ningine gizebo i-ngidilizave.
Vene' gevono' guhalihali gehepeve ogo minaa' neine' ne'mo nene O'mosolo' gele mu'musi' o mino holuka' nehe holise' nehe gamene gamene hize ele' o-delingumu' nene O'mosola lo minaa' neive.
Ne'mine ogo minaa' neiha vene' gevono' ma oko'no losuvo'mo lanite' giline' initekumukovo' gelo monaa' ine' vene' nene mo velesi ha noliha lulo've nene mo hele osu' lo vine' ne neive.
Mene nolo-giduvoni' gamazi nene ma avuto' ikevo evenelite ngelemikelizaze. A'mine lo-giduvoni' gamazi meve nene lo-ngemezo.

Ve ma ingine engi' zuho di guni gizebo i-ngidami minilizave muki' nene monovo goloso igi mono' huli osu' lisa Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' amave nene ngivile' igi lihime daa' ave minilisave. Ne neiha ve ma engi' numu'ningu' ingaa' ave engi' zuho gehepeve di guni i-ngidami minilizave engi' neve nene engi' zuho gizebo i-ngidamaa' ave linge masi nene ngivile' igi lihime nene naba goloso gehepeve daa' ilisave.
Ido' mono' muliselite hize ele' i-ngidilizado' lisihe' i minani' vene' gonoliti gulive'ine gizelo ma nene kilisimasi fifti naeni (59) ivile' o noline' vene' vanahine hamoto' bizo minine' vene'

ado' evene' hize ele' o-ngedaa' gono lamine' ado' izipe do naba o-ngedaa' ine' nolihe ido' venenga ve ani' nasahili' o-ngedaa' ine' nolihe ido' eze oko'no do lemo mino gelekele' vene' ne'mine gelo O'moso'mi evenele hize ele' o-ngedaa' gono daa' ine' nolihe ido' geni initeli'mi lulou' minave hize ele' o-ngedaa' ine' nolihe ne'mine mana'mine gono lamineto' e'meto daa' ine' vene' lamine' noline' neevo' nene gulive'ine gizezo.

Ne neiha vene' gevono' olihe ozoho milami gosoho' gidini nizani' neti gulive'ine nene gizamozo. Nene nanitekumu' ve. Alinge' nene lu'ine Kilisitodokovo' mili minani' ma nene oko'ine losuvo'mo lanite' giline' initekumu' otavosa velo' gohi volone li amuzo mili gililizani' nenako nemu' nene gulive'ine gizamolosane.
Ingine gohi velo' ma vilizani' nene gana' lu'ine Kilisitodokovo' molo minelone lani' ma nene avuto' igisa lihime dalisave.

Ido' ma nene gono dami haza gopo minaa' monovo ningi diti' igi mini numuno mukiku' dizaa' limaa' igi moniivo' minaa' nave. Ne'mine niigisa gamazi lodonga hize eza ema igi gamazi di lulu izi evene' initekumu' dede' izi lamilizani' gamazisi nene li'mi monaa' nave.
Nemu' nene monoteli'mi biluva' ve nete ngemenga likelizave lo naza vene' gosoho' gevono' minani' nene velo' gohi vi izipe gidi mili numu'ine ebe'nido' nene gizebo igi minilizave losa noluve.
Ne'mine noluvoni' nene nanitekumu' ve. Vene' gevono' linge nene mo monokuti' limi vi Satani e'meti nivani' nenako nemu' nene noluve.

Ido' Kilisito' evenele mali'mi zuhou' nene vene' gevono' ma nizavo ma engi' hize ele' o-ngedaa' gono nene mono' mulise gehe-ngedamo asi've nene hize ele' o-ngedo vise' ani' inite' ngemo minelive. Ne nanitekumu' ve. Mono' mulise ne'mo nene guhalihali igi minaa' naani' vene' gevono' nene hize ele' o-ngedaa' neine' nenako hize ele' i-ngidilizani' inite' vise' ikelizave losa nemu' nene a'mine engi' zuho asi've hize ele' o-ngedelive lo noluve.

Ido' mono' gizebo ve linge gono lamine' di minaa' nave nene meni'nido' masi imine' mili ngimilizado' lisihe' o neize. Ne'mine igi ngimilo. Ne'mine noluvoni' nene mono' gono lamine' daa' ave mukito' nene vo do neiha mono' gamazi li soto' iga' naavelokisi ido' mono' monovo apizi ngimaa' naavelokisi nene vo do gehepeve o neive.
A'mine noluvoni' gamazi meemu' neve nene mono' godolou' ti' lo lo neine' ma mo gele none' ma neive:
Bulumakatinelite lengi' viti gihiletine nene
lisi di ledi' ledi' nii-lingidavo ma nene
a'minguti' nevo ha nalizado' o neize.
Ma nikelizave li ve'nido' nene inite' ma di tili-ngidamilo.
Ido' ma neve nene:
Gonou' ve ingine gono'nidoti' meni'ine dalizado' lisihe' o neine' nenako
mo meni'ine dalisave.

Ido' evene' mali'mo mono' gizebo ve mamu' monovo goloso dave lo goni' o-delesa ma nolivo ma nene a'mine monovo goloso do noline' nemu' nene evene' sitape setohamo he ne'minete mo ne'mine ogave li hamo' gamazivo' gehepeve lamavo ma nene alamo goni' o-damolosane.
Ido' lihime di'mi nave nene evene' mukiliti ve'nido' nene ngelemezo. Ee, evene' linge nesi nene nemu' golise gili lihime dami hazavo' minilizangisi evene' mukiliti ve'nido' nene ngelemezo.

Gaza lo-giduvoni' gamazi mene e'mete gehepeve iline losa naza O'moso'mi velelokisi Izesu' Kilisito' velelokisi ido' O'moso'mo do kegese-ngidine' angelo'veti ve'nidokisi nene nolo-giduze. Goni' gamazi'ine olihe gele-ngedamo bubu izo mo lamineto' lihime dikeve ido' damave lo mo lamo ido' goniku' sisitemi nesi nene mo amo goni' neve nene mo monovo lisihetokovo' do molo gele-ngedelesane.

Ido' gaza evene' ma do kegeso mono' gizebo ve lolo' o-ngedelo ma nene bubu izo anga godo'nido' hito do kegese-ngedamozo. Gaza bubu izo ingine monovo'ine golososi ma nolingumu' ne'mine oganivo engi' lihime nene geita dizalize. Lihimeka nomine' mineliningisi gei' monovokalo' nene gizebo lamine' ogosa minezo.

Ne'mine ogo minelesaine'za gaza haza nosovo' nonaine' nene hulo haza nosovo' namo gatungau' inite' gete' geto gize do' gize do' oga' naine' nene do lamine' o-gedelingisi vaini noso ngomo ha nite' nesi malasini ne'mino noka' noka' olosane.

Ido' gaza bubu izamozo noluvoni' nene nanitekumu' luvoba asi evene' malite monovo goloso di lihime daa' naani' ne'mi guvele nene geto buu lo vavosa alinge' gonito' ngele'mizi milii lihime ngimaa' naani'za ve ma neve nene monovo goloso di lihime daa' nani' ne'mi lihime geto soto' amivo mino alinge' soto' oga' neive.

Ido' a'mine'mine ogo evene' malite monovo lamine' igi mili iga' nani' nene mo sotokovo' minaa' neive. Ido' malite monovo lamine' igi mili iga' nani' nene idise soto' amo noline' nesi nene ngelo mudise halekamoloseinako nemu' nene bubu izamaa' iline losa nolo-giduve.

Evene' malitesi nene O'moso'mi gulive di'mi limi apize lengemaa' noune' monote nesi nene divi ledivi' ikelizaze. Evene' malite gelekele' gono gihi-ngidikevo engi' gonou' inite'ine ne'mine lili' i minave muki' ingine a'mine gelekele' gono gihi-ngidaa' avemu' nene gilunivo diziivo' minilizado' o neive li gili gelekele' lamine' i-ngidivo' minilisave.

Ido' ve ma gono gihi-ngidaa' ave gizebo ve'ine nene gili ele'vole' ave nilizani' nene engito' gono daa' ave nete nene a'mine gizebo vete nene Izesu' evenele leze zuho neive li gilisa engikumu' gilavo lemavosa gonou' nene alaha' alaha' igi dikelizave. Asi leli' gono dunidi'mo hize ele' o-ngidive nene Izesu' evenele leli' zuho lute ngimunive nene nizave lisa gono engito' dalizani' nene gohi ma amuzo milisa di mini gelekele' lamine' gehepeve i-ngidilizave.
Mene noluvoni' gamazi nene e'metilizave lo ga'ine do apize ngemezo.
Evene' malite mono' gihile lamine' Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' gamazi mono' monovo lisiheto' lele'mize molaa' neido' nene lu'ine milami gamazi ato' apizi ngimilizani' nene

engi' oko'ine di dizi otohato ve none li gilaa' naha inite' hamokumukisi ma gili lamine' amavete nene laa' nave. Mono' monovomu' nene gamazidunu' ge hulo ne hulo laakumu' nene naba goloso ngisaa' neine'za ne'mine oga' ne'mo nene inite' ne'mino do soto' oga' neive: Mumuzo' ogo goloso gelaa' lovo lolize oga' ido' dovo ledevo' gamazi laa' hazamu' ngemenga laa' ga'ine gilaa'

eze elemivo eze elemivo laa' ne'mine monovo nene do soto' neive. A'mine ne'mine monovo ne'mini di soto' iga' ave neti madu'ine nene goloso ogavo mini gamazi gihile nene damavo engita nomivo mini inite' gohi gohi dalone' aka nene mono' monovolo' e'metaa' nehe li gilaa' nave.

Ido' lamine' inite' gohi gohi dalone' aka nene neine'za ingine giladi'mine ogo me misubou' inite' nevoba asi laza do none' inite' nene leli' votigilelo' mo vo do neive lo hongu lo lamino minosa mono' monovolo' e'metaa' noune' ne'mo luteli'mi heneni nene vai' goloso do soto' o-ledaa' neive.
Ne'mine noluvoni' nene nanitekumu' ve. Laza izetehi mulunouti' soto' uningu' nene inite' hamokisi do amosa me misubo hulo volonidaa nene inite' hamokisi ma do vamolosune.
Nemu' nene noso' nitekisi okodelo' nitekisi do minelone' nene leli' votigilelo' mo vo do neive lo hongu lo lamino minelone.

Ne neiha ingine heneni ve lolo' olone li gilaa' ave nene Satani'mo ngemengu' molo ngimimise' ogavo negi hizi do goloso o-ngedaa' neine' inite' mukikumu' nene ma dunivo li gilaa' nani' ne'mo nene vi Satani'mi gelevusou' bilaa' nave. Ee, evene' di goloso i-ngidi ngele'mize tolovo iga' nani' initekumu' nene ngumo helavo monokuti' limi ingi goloso iga' nave.

Ne'mine noluvoni' nene lute monilo' molaa' ne'mo nene ne'mine mana'mine monovo goloso nene do soto' oga' neive. Evene' ma nene moni heneni dalisa gili mono' akaloti' vi gopo igi engi' oko'nido' nene mulumo geni inite' vai' angise'ine di gihaa' nanako nemu' nene noluve.

Ne'mine iga' nani'za O'moso'mi gonolo' ve gaza me luvoni' monovo golosoloti' nene golise ogo mehenga emo mene lo-gemeloni' monovo nene imiselo dalosa amuzo molozo. Ado' monovo lisihekovo' ogakisi mono' monovolo' e'metaakisi Guvelesi vemu' gele ele'vole' ogakisi lute ngemaa' monovo nesi ido' geni inite' soto' ilingu' zege' zege' ogakisi hongu monovo evene' ngelebizo minaakisi nene dalinge. Imiselezo.

Evene' malite meni dalisa ge hulo ne hulo li loti' izi vaa' nani' ne'mino gaza mono' lesisi lamineku' nene zege' zege' ogo loti' izo minevo' minevo' gemeni dameni nene do ti' ozo. Ado' ne'mine iline lo O'moso'mo elese molo-gedavo ogo evene' mukiliti ve'nido' do lamine' ogo Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' oga' naningumu' nene lo soto' aine' ma neive.
Ido' O'moso inite' muki' vetesi minaa' amuzo limive'mi velelokisi ido' ngamani naba Podio' Pilato' minidaa gamazi gihile lamine' lo soto' ive Izesu' Kilisito' velelokisi nene ti' lo nolo-giduze:

Gaza mono' gamazi lo-giduvoni' nene e'mete gehepeve ozo. Ne'mino gaza a'mine gamazi nene do gopo amanivo evene' nene ningi a'mine gamazimu' nene ningedo' hangedoka lamavo Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' soto' ilido' nene lihimeka nomine' minelesane lo nolo-giduve.

Ido' a'mine Guvetesi ve nene O'moso asi've molani' gamenelo' gehepeve nene do soto' o-deleseive. A'mine O'moso nene laminekukovo' minive dizo minine' gizebo ve hamo' minive guve'inesi naba mukiliti Guve'inesi ve naba minive

ei' hamokovo' nene helamaa' ive ado' evene' hamolitesi ngelo avitasi vamolone' o minine' labanali'mi lulou' minive evene' hamolitesi ningamani' mino mo ngeli ningamilizani' O'moso eikumu' nene gilunivo dizo minavo gizebo o-ledeline' amuzo've nene ele'vole' ogo minevo' minevo' ilive. Mo ne'mino minilihoo.

Ido' gaza idise mene gamenelo' moni heneni ve nizave nene ga'ine do lo-ngedezo. Angise'inemu' gilavoo dizi minisa a'mine do ngululubize-ledaa' neine' inite' moni henenilo' nene gili mu'musi' igi gili medeli minami asi lanite' gili minilizave lo inite' mata' muki' vauve elo lehize-ledaa' ive O'moso eikumu' neve nene gili mu'musi' igi gili medeli mini

gono lamine' di nizavo heneni'ine nene a'mine gono lamine' ne'mo nene lolo' ogavosa a'mine nene vauve ili dii mini engita minine' inite' nene inele panala igi evene' masi nasahili' i-ngidi minilo lo lo-ngedezo.

Ne'mine ilizani' nene alinge' gameneu' mine lamine' ilizangumu' hize ele' o-ngedeline' heneni'ine nene di milisa a'mine gameneu' inite' gihile minevo' minevo' ngemeni dameni nene dalizado' minilisave.

Timoteoo, gaza O'moso'mo do-nedeline lo gono gimine' malo' nene gizebo lekeseve ozo. Ido' haza mono' gihile nomine' gamazi evene' malite laa' nani' nesi ido' soza li gele vevesaa' monovolo' noe'metune li mono' gamazite bili laa' nani' gamazi nesi nene gelamo mehenga emaa' ozo.
Ne'mine oga' ozo noluvoni' nene evene' ma nene a'mine ne'mine gamazilo' vi gi'mizani' ne'mo mono' gihileloti' nene mo zovo' izi vikeve.
O'moso'mi nasahili' nene lengikisi miniliho.

O'moso'mo evene' ma ingine Izesu' Kilisitoda gi'mizilizadoti' nene minevo' minevo' ngemeni dameni dalisave lo lo huko lingumu' neni' nene Izesu' Kilisito' aposolo mineline lo gilido' aposolo lolo' uve Paulo' naza

luhuvo nite' mene gei' vo'nelo' gipe'ne minanive Timoteo'ni nogize-giduve. Ne'mine ogosa meteho O'mosolati' ido' Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisitodati' nasahilikisi ido' mulumote ningaa' monovosi ido' hongu lo lamino minaa' monovo nesi nene lehizi-gidikesivo geito' minivoo losa noluve.

Gamene gamene holuka' neiha holise' neiha O'mosola laa' nouvongu' geikumu' ga'ne molosa'mivo mino O'moso isaa' neve laa' nouve. A'mine O'moso nene avo'nemote gelekele' i-di opo'ni laa' adi'mine ogo lu'neu' monovo lisihekovo' neivo minosa nene gelekele' o-do opo'ni laa' nouve.
Ido' naza hulo-gedo mala volosa nouvo veka novozo do'mozine' mamu' nene naza ha gele mino okongalo' ma ningekuvo nenita nolize naba soto' iliho losa gelaa' nouve.

Gaza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' oga' naine' nene mo apa nite' amo lamineto' gele ele'vole' gehepeve nane lo gele minaa' nouve. Ee, gana' nene eleni izaho Loisi' a'mine'mine ogo O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo neivosa izaho Eunike' nesi a'mine'mine ine' nenako naza gei' nene a'mine'mine ogo gele ele'vole' o nolosane losa gele mu'musi' o nouve.
Nemu' nene naza a'ne hite-giduvongu' O'moso'mo gonou' amuzo lehize-gedavo geita neine' nene gaza amuzo molo do otezo lo gaka noduve.

Ido' naza O'moso'mo gonou' amuzo gimine' nene amuzo molo do otezo noluvoni' nene a'mine O'moso'mo leme neine' lemeni dameni neve nene laza evenekumu' lovozo helo golise gelaa' lemeni dameni leme neivoba asi evene' ve'nido' ele'vole' ogo ogo molo oga' amuzo do minaa' lemeni damenisi ido' evene' lute ngemaa' lemenisi ido' lute okodelo' gizebo ele'vole' oga' amuzosi nene lehize-lede neize.

Nemu' nene gaza govozo helamo mino Guvetesi vemu' gamazi've nene lo soto sotokovo' ozo. Ido' a'mine Guvetesi vemu' nalato' ve lolo' ogo nouve nenikumukisi nene govozo helamozo. Asi Kilisito' gamazi laminekumu' lelitokisi soto' o-ledaa' neine' mulumo geni inite' ne'mine soto' o gemeline' nene gazasi O'moso'mo amuzo geme neine' ne'mi votigilelo' do molo ha gehe'mo vo minezo.

A'mine amuzo gimive O'moso ne'mo leli' elese molo-ledo do lu' izo do eita o-lidine' nene evene' monovo lamine' uningumu' nene ne'mine ine' nevoba asi olihe inite' mata' do soto' amo asi'vevo' minida vomine aza nasahili' Izesu' Kilisitongu' lehize-ledelesuve lo ei' lulolo' do lisihe' okido' e'meto ine' ve.

A'mine eikovo' minine' gamene gozopo' vomila plenim ine' inite' nene idi'nise a'nene Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' soto' idoti' nene mo soto' ogavo ningekune. Aza nene soto' ogosa helaa' ne'mi amuzo've nene bele helosa helo gelesamo minevo' minevo' minaa' nene mono' gamazi laminekuti' nene do soto' ogo lelebizave.
A'mine gamazi lamine' nene lo soto soto' oga' ilinive mineline ido' a'mine'mi aposolo mineline ido' a'mine gamazi nene apize ngemaa' anive mineline lo O'moso'mo neni' neve nene nele'mize molave.

Ne'mine o-nidine' ne'mo naza idise mela mulumo alumo nite' mene gehe'mo nouvoni'za naza gele mu'musi' o-daa' nouve Kilisito' monovo've nene naza ningo gele minuvodi'mo aza gono nimine' nene do nouvo aza a'mido' gizebo lamine' iline' amuzo'vesi mino gizebo lamine' ogo neivo gamene naba aloseive lo gele ele'vole' o nouvoni' nenako nemu' novozo helamo mino a'mine gono nene daa' nouve.

Nemu' nene gaza nenitati' gelaine' gamazi nene gamazi gihile neine' nenaze. A'mine gelaine' gamazi nene gaza a'mine'mine ogo lo-ngemeliningumu' nene avazaha've ne'mine do mino Izesu' Kilisitoda minine' monovo ezemu' gele ele'vole' ogatokisi ido' lute ngemaatokisi nene e'meto mino gono've do mino
leliku' omo minive O'moso'mi Sikalahuto' nene lehete o mino O'moso'mo gono lamine' gimido' nene gizebo lekeseve o minosa do minezo.
Gaza mo gele nane. Asia aleve mukikisi ido' Higeloki Helemogeneki nesi nene mo mehe'ine nimi mine velepe' izikeve.

Ne neiha engi' zuho Onesiholo' aza nene gamene muki' lu'neu' do gehe gehe ize-nedo mino nalato' minuvongumu' nene ovozo ogavo golise gelamaa' ine' nenako nemu' nene Guvelesi ve'mo ei' Onesiholo' zuhola nene mulumo'ine ningivo lo noluve.
Ee, golise gelamo Loma ebeku' ogo hetelo mino nenikumu' nene amuzo molo vise' ogo ogosa ningine' ma neive.

Nemu' nene gamene nabala Guvelesi ve'mo gele emo mulumolo ningiliho lo noluve. Ido' Eheso numuno ebeku' nouvo aza vauve goloso elosa neni' nene hize ele' o-nedo minine' gasika mo ningo gele lamine' o nane' ma neive.
Nemu' nene gaza gipe'ne make, laza Izesu' Kilisitoda vo gi'mizekunivo O'moso'mo nasahili've lehize-ledaa' neinguti' nene amuzo do minosa nene amuzo molo minezo.

Ne'mine ogo minosa naza evene' mukiliti ve'nido' lo soto' nouvo nenitati' gelaine' mono' nene evene' masi apizi ngimilizangisi nene monoto' e'mete lamine' igi mini apizi ngimilizado' lisihe' i minani' eveneta nene ngeme molozo.
Gaza nene Izesu' Kilisito' ami've lolo' ogange. Ami laminelite mulumo gono ha gihaa' nani' ne'mino laza Kilisito'nimu' mulumo geni ne'mine gehaa' noune' ne'mino gazasi nene ha gehaa' ozo.
Ami hamolitesi nene ato' gono ne'mo adelo' do minaalive li haza gonou' ma vi hilalizavoba asi amiu' lele'mize molave ne'mo lelikumu' lamine' gelelingumu' ve li olovo' igi minaa' nave.
Ido' zohi' iga' nave nene zohi' i'mi vilizangu' zohili'mi lou' gamazi've ma avuto' ilizani' nene zohiku' vuni ikeve li palaisi ngimisa'mave.
Ido' ma neve nene ve ma mine zuho' ogo gono amuzo molo dalive ne'mo nene gomu' api' ogo noso' nite' o molaa' neine' nene do naa' neive.
Nemu' nene mene noluvoni' inite' mukikumu' nene Guvelesi ve'mo luka gaka do ngolo' lo-gedavo gele nge lo gelelesange. Nemu' nene ize' molo gelo minezo.

Ido' gaza Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' nene gele nge lo minezo. Aza neve nene guvelesi ve Davidi' a'vopilemo' zuhouti' mino hilinguti' oto neingumu' mono' gamazi lamine' lo-ngemaa' nouvoni' nene gele minezo.

Naza a'mine gamazi lamine' laa' nouvongumu' nene mulumo geni nite' nogihuve. Ee, naza nene gizengize ve nouvoni' gelavo nala' numungu' nesi nene huli-nidikevo nouve. Ne'mine ikevo nouha O'moso'mi gamazi nesi nene nalato' ma minamive.

Nemu' naza O'moso'mo ei' ve lo do kegese-ngede neine' alevemu' nene mulumo geni inite' muki' nene ha gehe'mo vo minaa' nouve. Ee, a'mine aleve Izesu' Kilisitoda igi gi'mizilizadoti' lukuvo ni labana've di ti' igi ezesi minivi' minivi' ilizangumu' ve lo nenita soto' oga' neine' mulumo nite' muki' nene ha gehe'mo vo mino mono' gamazi lo-ngemaa' nouvoni' nene hulosa'muve.
Gamazi meve nene mo gihile lamine' neive. Ado':
Laza nene mo lamineto' Kilisitolesi maka' helekune' noline' nene
ezesi maka' minevo' alevo' ogo minelesune.
Ido' laza geni muki' soto' ilingu' amuzo molo mineso' nene
Guvelesi ve naba lolo' ogo minelingu' nene
lazasi maka' gono'velo' gizebo o minelesune.
Laza eze aleve nomune lo ataize lo-delone' nene
azasi a'mine'mine ogo neze aleve nizamave lo lo-ledeleseive.
Ei' gamazi lo nolido' nene gele hulosa ataize ngelo lamiline' nenako
nemu' nene laza ezemu' gele ele'vole' ogo mino
e'metelone lolone' gamazilo' ma gele damolone' nene
aza neve olove liline' gamazilo' nene mo gele do ogakovo' oloseive.

A'mine noluvoni' gamazi mene lo ga'ine ogo lo-ngemo mono' gamazimu' nene lovo lolize amilizave lo O'moso'mi velelo' nene ga'ine do lo-ngedezo. Ne'mino lovo lolize oga' ne'mo nene inite' gihile ma do soto' amosa asi a'mine lolize gamazi gililizave nene ngele'mize goloso oloseive.
Gaza gei' nene O'moso'mo ningivoo gonou' ve lisihe' mino gono daa' monovo'nemu' novozo helamolodo' minelove lo gono amuzo molo do mino gamazi gihile nene do hehe lo ize' molo lo-ngemezo.
Evene' malite haza mono' gihile nomine' gamazi laa' nani' nene gele hulo mehenga emezo. Ne'mine gamazi li'mi vaa' naadi'mo nene mono' hulilizado' mini milikevo

a'mine laa' nani' gamazi ne'mo nene huso goloso okodelo' naba o'mo vo pelaa' neine' huso ne'mino evene' linge mukita vosa mo ngele'mize goloso oloseive. Ado' ne'mine gamazi laa' aveuti' nene Himenaeoki Hiletoki nene nizasive.

A'mine ve sita' netise nene hele noloninguti' otaa' nene luteli'mo mo otani' nenako nemu' nene gohi ma otamolosune lisa mono' gamazi gihileloti' nene zovo' izi visa evene' lingeliti mono'ine nene di gopo i-ngidikesive.
Ne'mine ikesiha O'moso'mo gamazi gihilelo' do lehete o-ngedo do ote-ngidiveti mulise nene ele'vole' ogo neivo inite' mali'mosi do gabe' osa'mive. Ido' a'mido' nene monovo've ti' lo gize neive:
Guvelesi ve aza ei' evenele nene mo ningo gele neive.
Ido' ma nene:
Guvelesi ve'mi gulive igi ei' evenele none laa' nave muki' nene
monovo golosomu' olovo' ilisave.

Guvelesi ve mali'mi numu've nabau' somo lapese nevo'mine inite' nene inite' lamine' ngolidunukisi siluvadunukisi lili' ani' initekovo' minaa' neivoba asi haza nite' zadunu' nehe misubodunu' nehe lili' ani' initekisi nene ha minaa' neive. Linge ma meni've dize minine' initetunu' lili' ani' inite' nene gono inite' laminekumu' neive. Ido' haza nitetunu' lili' ani' inite' nene haza gonolokumu' nene gopo minaa' neive.

Ne'mine oga' neinako evene' malite lo-gimuvoni' goloso nite' nene haza lapese gili minanguti' golovo' izi ma di hulilizani' nene ingine a'mine meni've dizo minine' lapese ne'mine lili' igi Guvelesi ve'mo ato ato' gono lamineto' ngele'mize molalido' di lisihe' igi mini ei' kekeize inite've gono daa' iline' inite've ne'mine mini mili minilisave.

Nemu' nene gaza umungive goso've lavo'ine lemaa' neine' initekumu' nene lavonga lemamivo golise ogo mehenga emosa gaza lu'ningu' goloso monovo nomivo mini Guvelesi vela lika' lika' igi ezelo' lehete i minave mukikisi nene maka' bizo mino lisihe' lamine' minaa' monovosi ido' Guvelesi vemu' gele ele'vole' oga' monovosi ido' lute ngemaa' monovosi ido' hongu lo lamino minaa' monovosi nene imiselo dalosa amuzo molozo.

Ido' gihile've nomine' getipe gamazi ado' gamazi monovo gilamavete laa' nani' gamazi ne'mine li mono' monovomu' gamazidunu' ge hulo ne hulo laa' ne'mo nene lovo lolize do soto' oga' neine' nene mo gele nane' ma neive. Nemu' nene gaza a'mingu' vo holamo mehenga emezo.
Guvelesi ve'mi gelekele' ve nene lovo lolize amilizado' i mini asi evene' mukita alaha' igi hongu gamazi li-ngimi mini apizi ngimiliza monovo'ine nene laminekisi mini gehe gehe izi ngimi mini

engi' gamazi'ine bililisa iga' ave nene hongu monovo di soto' i-ngidi minisa di hehe li-ngidilizani' o neive. Ne'mine ikevo lu'ine di velepe' izi gamazi gihile nene gili lamine' ilizado' O'moso'mo ngele'mize molalihe losa noluve.
Ne'mine ogavosa Satani aza ei' gelekele' i-dilizave lo do eita o minavo gelevuso'veli'mo do mininguti' nene apasisa lukuvo nalisave.
Ne neiha naza ma lo-gemeloze. Gele minezo. Alinge' gamenela nene lihitehe' inite' soto' o-ledeline' gamene gehepeve soto' oloseive.

A'mine noluvoni' nene ado' evene' engikumukovo' gilaa' ido' monimukovo' gilaa' ido' engi' igi mili iliza nitekumu' oko'ine di naba igi laa' ido' engikumu' gilavo dizaa', evene' dovo ledevo' o-ngedaa', ize'ningi me'ningi gamazi gili hulaa', inite' lamine' i-ngidavemu' gilavo haza nite' lolo' oga', mono' lu'ningu' nomine' minaa',

ido' engi' zuhomukisi ngumo helesa'mivo minaa', evene' mamu' lihime di minaa', ngemenga laa', oko'nine lu'nido' gizebo ami gopo minaa', ize gulo suno di evene' di goloso i-ngidaa', monovo laminekumu' ngumo helamivo minaa',

engi' zuho biluvaliti a'ningu' ngele'mizi milaa', inite' bubu izi di goloso iga', engikumu' gilavo dizaa', ido' O'mosolo' lu'ine milaa' nani' nene ivile' ivosa oko'ine'mo lanite' gelaa' neine' initeto' lu'ine milaa',

nevo'mine mana'mine monovo nene mo ha di soto' ilisave. Ido' mono' nene vi gilaa' ilizaha oko'ine losuvolotikovo' gili mini mono' nene lu'ningu' amuzo molo gihile've do soto' ilingumu' nene o've li monoli'mi amuzo nene vasa izilisave. Nemu' nene gaza a'mine ne'mine mana'mine vesi nene bizami olovo' ogo minezo.

Ne'mine luvoni' nene nemu' luve: Engikuti' nene ve malite evene' go'ine izi numu'ningu' dizi a'mingu' vene' monoku' lu'ine gilizevo o vivo mini oko'nido' lihime monovo vai' dizivo oko'ine'mo lanite' giline' inite' ato ato' ne'mo ngimimise' ogo do novivo minaa' ani' vene' nene lu'ningu' hizi di gi'mizaa' nave.
A'ne'mine vene' nene gamazi lamineli'mi monovo nene gelelone li gamene gamene amuzo milaa' nani'za gamazi gihile nene ngeli ma ningi gililizado' minisa'mave.

Ido' Halao' luso ve've seta' Zaneki Zabeleki ingine Mose' gamazi've di'mi limilisa asidi'mine igi noluve ingine mene gamazi gihile di'mi limilisa iga' nave. Ingine nene lu'ine ga'ine unuvo ogo goloso o vine' neivo mini ingine O'moso'mo gilivo lisihe' amine' monokumukovo' gili ele'vole' iga' nave.

Ne'mine iga' naha Zaneki Zabeleki monovo'ine soto' ine' ne'mino a'mine luve nesi negi hizani' monovo'ine nene soto' ogavo evene' muki' nene ningi gililisanako a'mine evene' go'ine izaa' ani' nene gohi go'ine izi'mi vilizado' minamilisave.

Ne neiha gei' neve nene neni' mono' apize ngemaa' ogo ogo molo oga' uvoni' monovo'nesi ido' gono do gihile do soto' olosa giluvongumu' nesi nene mo ningo gele'mo gele'mo nane. Ido' Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' o mino hongu lo mino lu'ne ngemaa' ogo mino mulumo geni ha gehe'mo vo minaa' nouvongumu' nesi nene mo ningo gele'mo gele'mo ogo nane.

Ido' evene' goboni mala' mala' i-nidi nizavo ne'mi mulumo geni naba Adiokia numuno ebekukisi Ikonio numuno ebekukisi Lisitila numuno ebekukisi gehe'mo vuvoni' monovo nene gasika mo gele nane. Ee, ido' a'mine geni inite' mukiliti lulou' minuvodoti' nene Guvelesi ve'mo alete molo-nedavo lukuvo nosa nouve.

Ido' evene' laza Izesu Kilisitoda gi'mizo mino mono' monovolo' e'metovo' minelone losa ne'mine ogo minelonive muki' nene goboni mili-lidavo a'mine ne'mine geni mulumo inite' nene gehamolonivoba mo gehelone' o neive.
Ne neiha evene' goloso soza mono' li evene' go'ine izaa' ave nene Satani'mo go'ine izavosa ingine a'mine'mine igi evene' go'ine izi'mi vi mini goloso naba i'mi i'mi vi minilisave.

Ne'mine igi minilisaha gei' neve nene a'mine gele nane' mono' apize gimunive lei' monovote nene mo ningo gele nane' nenako nemu' a'mine gei' gele mino gele mu'musi' o nane' mono' malo' nene do ngi lo do minezo.

Ido' ma mesi nene gele nane' ma neive. Ado' gomu' izipe ngomoloti' mono' godolouti' gamazi gele'mo gele'mo ogosa do madungau' molo osu' lo nane. Ido' a'mine mono' godolouti' gamazi ne'mo nene lukuvo nalinido' gele'mize molalido' o neive. Ee, a'mine gamazi do madungau' molanidi'mo gaza gamazi monovo gele vevesosa Izesu Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' ilinido' o neine' nenako ne'mo nene O'moso'mo do gu' izelido' gele'mize molaloseive.

Mono' godolouti' gamazi muki' nene O'moso'mo evene' madu'ningu' molo zatuho' o-ngedavo gizani' neine' nenako nemu' a'mine gamazi neve nene mono' monovo apize ngemelonidokisi ido' gopo ladani iga' avesi lihime davesi monovo'ine ngelebizo do lisihe' o-ngedo ngele'mize akalo' olonidokisi ido' monovo lisihekovo' igi mili ilizani' monovo api' napi' o-ngemelonido' nesi nene lisihe' lamine' o neive.

Ne'mine olonido' lisihe' o neine' nene O'moso'mi gelekele' ve laza nene do lisihe' gehepeve oko mino gono lamine' ato ato' muki' nene dalonido' mo lisihekovo' o mineloningumu' ve losa ne'minosa neine' neive.

Izesu Kilisito' nene tine' molo ogo Guvelesi ve naba lolo' ogo gizebo o-ledelingumu' nene naza ga'ne gele mino gaka dalove. O'moso'mi velelokisi ido' hilani' alevesi ido' ha minilizani' alevesi gonito' lele'mize molo ize' molo-ledelive a'mine Izesu Kilisito' ei' velelokisi nene gaka do ti' lo nolo-giduve:

Gaza gamazi lamine' nene lo soto' ogo lo-ngemezo. Ee, gili gimilizani' gamenelo' nolihe gili gimamilizani' gamenelo' nolihe ha lo-ngemovo' mino gosele' gebelamivo apize ngeme'mo vo mino ga'ine do mono' nene gihile neive lo ngelebizo lihime'inemu' nene ngelemo lu'ine do ngii lo-ngedezo.

Ido' gamazi ne'mino lo-ngemezo noluvoni' nene ingine mono' gamazi gihilemu' gosele' ngebelavo geleso' ngisamivo angise'ine lanite' gili gililizani' gamazimu' nene ga'ningu' huhu lavo a'mine lanite' gili gililiza gamazi nene apizi ngimilizave vai' ngele'mizi di igi hitilizani' gamene ma aloseinako nemu' nene luve.
Ne'mine igi gamazi gihile nene mehe'ine imi zovo' izi vi gihile've nomine' gamazi heluno ne'mine malo' nene gi'mizilisave.

Ne'mine ilisaanaze. Gei' neve nene negi hizo ladani amo gaka gele ngevo' lo mino monoli'mi geni mulumo soto' iline' nesi nene ha geho mino mono' gamazi lamine' lo soto' ogo lo-ngemaa' gono nene ha do mino gono geito' hulo neine' gono nene mo vai' doovo' minezo.

Naza ne'mine gamazi mene nolo-gimuvoni' nene neni' vanise'ne nene mo api' igi lepilisa navo neni' osu' lo voloni' gamene'ne nene mo alite neivosa noluve. Ido' vanise'ne ne'mino lepeloni' nene O'mosomu' ve li vaini noso lepi hulaa' nani' ne'mino lepe hulolosuve.
Naza mono' lesisi lamineku' nene amuzo molo loti' izo vo makilo' mo hetelekuve. Mono' gihileloti' nene zovokisi izamo mo e'mete osu' lokuve.

Idise meloti' alinge' neve nene monovo lisiheto' e'metaa' avete daa' nani' meni nene nenikumu' gizebo ogo neive. A'mine meni inite' nene monovo lisiheto' ize' molo-ledaa' neine' zasi Guvelesi ve ne'mo nene gamene nabala nemeleseive. Ido' nemeline' nene nenikovo' nemelivoba asi ei' alingumu' lu'ine mili minave mukikisi nene ngemavo dalisave.
Gaza nenita lite' lo aline' aka nene amuzo molo ma do soto' ogo ano.

Dema' neve nene me misubou' minine' initeto' lulo molosa neni' nene hulo-nedo Tesalonika numuno ebeta vavo ido' Keleseke' nene Galatia misubouko vavo ido' Tito' nene mo Dalamatia misubouko vavosa nene noluve.
Luka' nevo' nene nenikisi maka' nosive. Ido' Maleko' neve nene gelekele' ogo hize ele' lamine' o-nedaa' neine' nenaze. Aliningu' nene ele'mizo maka' alizo.
Ido' Tikiko'ni nene mo Eheso numuno ebeta imisele hulokuvo vogave.

Ido' gaza aliningu' nene naza Toloasi numuno ebeku' Kalipo' neida ponisa hulo uvoni' masi nene do-nedo ano. Ido' buku'ne masi nene do ano. Ado' a'mine buku'neuti' nene ize losuvolo' luhuvo gizani' pepa ma nene inite' naba nenaze. A'mine nene gaka molavo hulo ogaline.
Vapadunu' inite' ato ato' lolo' oga' ive Alekisadelo' ne'mo monovo goloso nene vai' goloso o-nidive. Aza ogo molo ido' nene Guvelesi ve'mo golo hizo lihime emeleseive.
Ido' aza leli' laa' noune' gamazite nene amuzo molo molovo' hitevo' ogo minine' nenaze. Geikisi nene gamazika molovo hitevo' ogalize. Eikumu' nene ehe' ogo gizebo lamine' ozo.

Gana' api' igi gonito' nele'mizi milani' gameneu' nene evene' hamolitesi neni' gamazi'nelo' hize ele' ma i-nidamave. Mukito' mo huli-nidi vikeve. Nemu' ne'mi lihime nene O'moso'mo do-ngede minamiliho losa noluve.

Ne'mine ani'za Guvelesi ve nene nenikisi mino amuzo nemo hize ele' o-nidine' ne'mo laza lo soto' oga' noune' gamazi nene naza lo soto' ogo lo-ngeme osu' lokuvo heta ato' ve muki' nesi nene gilani' ve. Ido' ne'mine ogo Guvelesi ve ne'mo Loma vete nibili hililisa anguti' nene alete molo do hulo-nedavo lukuvo nuve.

Ido' di goloso i-nidilisa ilizani' inite' mukikuti' nene Guvelesi ve'mo alete molo-nedo lukuvo nemo Okulumokuko ei' gizebo o neingu' nene nele'mize do voloseive. Nemu' nene eze opo'ni lo minelone' nene huko vamivo ha minevo minevo' ogo mineline' nene mo ne'mino miniliho.
Neni' nene Pilisikila'nisi Akuila'nisi ido' Onesiholo' numu'veu' ingaa' ani' aleve nesi nene ngopo'ni noluze. Lo-ngemezo.
Elasito' nene Kolidi numuno ebeta nene ha minive. Ido' Tolohimo' nene inite' gize do neivosa Mileto numuno ebeku' nene hulo-dosa uvoni' ve.
Hepe' gamene olihe amido' nene gaza aline' aka amuzo molo vise' ogo do soto' ogosa ano. Ido' Euboulo' nesi Poude' nesi Lino' nesi Kalaudia' nesi ido' leze zuho muki' nesi nene gopo'ni nilave.
Ido' Guvelesi ve nene gei' sikalahukasi minivo. Ido' O'mosolati' nasahili' nene lengita minivo. Moda a'nesi' ve.

Titoo, naza mono' akalo' gele'mize molokuvo nazasi gazasi hamo' mono' gele ele'vole' o nosinako gaza neni' gipe'ne gihile gelo minane' make, luhuvo mene nogize-giduve. Paulo' naza O'moso'mi gelekele' izipe Izesu Kilisito' aposolo've neni' nogize-giduze. Ningezo.

O'moso'mo a'mine gono nimine' nene eze do kegeso ningekine' evene' ingine monoku' ele'vole' ilizave lo ido' gamazi gihile lamine' monoku' ma neine' nene gili vevesi minilizave lo a'mine gono nimine' ma neive. A'mine gamazi gihile ne'mi monovo ne'mino neive: O'moso soza losa'mive ne'mo gozopo' gamene gala'muda vomine olihe Okulumo' misubo do soto' molamine' gamene neu' salani gamazi lo minevo' minevo' lemeni dameni nene lehize-ledelove lo lo huko lo molo-ledo lingumu' vode otavo gilingili ogo minaa' noune. A'mine lo huko molani' gamene ogavo a'mine gamazi've do soto' o-lidine'. Ee, do soto' o-ledo do lu' izaa' ive O'moso'mo nenikumu' gaza a'mine gamazi nene lo soto' ogo evene' lo-ngeme'mo vo mineline lo gono nemavo nemu' nene gono daa' nouve.
Ne'mine ogo luhuvo nite' mene gize-gedo meteho O'moso ido' do lu' izaa' ive Izesu' Kilisito' engitati' nasahilikisi hongu lo lamino minaa' monovo nesi geikisi miniliho lo O'mosola noluve.

Gono lumo ma ha minine' nene do veveso do apaseline lo Keleta ailaniu' hulo-gedo vuvongu' gono gamazi ne'mine lo-giduvoni' ma neive: Gaza numudo' namado' mono mono' ve linge ma do gizebo ve minilizave lo ngele'mize molalosane.

Gizebo ve ngele'mize molalo ma ve ne'minevo' ngele'mize molalosane: Evene' muki' gilavo lihime've nomivo vene' hamo' do ezesi bizovo' minavo izipahala zuho nete O'mosola gi'mizi minikevo evene' nete engi' monovo ningi gili zogo zogo izi mini gamazi gilamaa' ave nizave li lamilizado' minikevo ma ve ne'minevo' ngele'mize molalosane.

Ee, O'moso'mi gonolo' gizebo oga' iline' nemu' mono' gizebo ve minelive nene evene' ezemu' gilavo lihime've nomivo mineline' o neive. Ne'mine ogo mino evene' ngivile' ogo gamazi belaa' ive minamo izebolo' geto molosa'mive mino noso no sipaki amaa' ive mino lovo amaa' ive mino moni heneni mamu' mumuzo' amaa' ive ne'mine ve mineline' o neive.

Ne'mine ogo venenga ve ikevo ma nasahili' o-ngedo ngele'mize molaa' ilive mino inite' lamine' ogo molo ogakumu' umo helelive mineleseive. Ido' gala gele vevesaa' ive ma mino eze monovo've lisihekovo' o mineline' mino eze oko'no lulo do hamo' ogo gizebo oga' ive mineleseive.

Ne'mine ogo lo-ngeme ngeme' noune' gamazi gihile nene do gili' lo do minelive. Nene gamazi'mo eze hize ele' o-divo mono' gihile lamine' nene lo-ngemo ga'ine do hize ele' o-ngedelive. Ne'mine ogo leze mono' gamazi bilaa' aveti gamazi nene do peleseve' izo do gala'muda ilive.

Nanitekumu' ve. Evene' a'manapa igi gamazi bilaa' ave muki' nizanako nemu' ve. Ingine godo'ningu' gamazi nomivo gopo gamazi li evene' di gopo i-ngidi go'ine izaa' nave. Engikuti' Zuda ve ma Izesuda vi gi'mizi alinge' di gopo igi Izesu' monokovo' nomive li avotemoti lou' gamazi nesi gele dunivo O'moso'mo do lu' izelive li vauve ili ne'mine iga' nave.

Ne'mine iga' ave nete evene' linge ma vene' izipaha'inesi muki' nene ngele'mizi gopo iga' nave. Ee, ingine go'ine izekunivo moni limilizahe li gili lamilizado' o minine' gamazi nene li ladanga mono' apizi ngimi ngele'mizi gopo iga' nave. Ido' ne'mine iga' nanako nemu' nene engi' gamazi do'mo lemoo o've lo-ngedelone.

Keleta ailaniu' aleveti monovo'ine goloso minine' nene soto' o minine' ve. Ido' engikuti' ve ma gamazi monovo gelaa' ive'mo engi' monovo lo soto' ogo ti' lo line': Keleta aleve nene sozalo' ve mini ido' ize loposo ne'mine mini noso' nite' nalisavo' lamine' gili mini gono dalisa gosele' goloso ngebelaa' neive. Ee, gamene gala'mudati' ne'mine monovo'ine mine do dizo idisesi ha neive line'.

Engikumu' a'mine gamazi line' nene lamineto' line' ve. Nemu' nene Zuda veti heluno haza gamazi nene gohi gili dami haza evene' gamazi gihile nene mehe'ine imaa' avete li huki nizani' gamazi nesi gili dami mono' gili vevesi mini gili ele'vole' ilizave lo gaza amuzo molo ngelemo ga'ine dozo.

Ingine inite' mamu' nene di gililizanipe di nalizanipe ne'mo lutine goloduvo eleleseive li laa' nahe. Naza lo-gemelove: Evene' lu'ine lamine' o noline' nene inite' mata' do lamine' o-ngedeleseiha evene' mono' gili huli mini lu'ine goloso o noline' nene lu'ine ga'ine ngemeni dameni goloso ine' nenako nemu' nene inite' mata' do lamine' o-ngedamo gohi do goloso o-ngedeleseive.

Ingine O'moso'mi monovo gele none li ve'inedunu' laa' nani'za igi mili iga' ani' ne'mo lo soto' neivo gihile nomive. Ingine evene' goloso gamazi gili hulaa' ave gono lamine' hamokisi ngeli ma dalizado' nomive.
Ingine ani' ne'mine amo gaza neve gamazi lo-ngemeline' nene mono' gihile lamine' apize gimunido' vo milise' o mineline' gamazivo' lo-ngemelesane.

Ti' lo lo-ngemezo: Ve ozoho ingine ga'ine gopo amivo mini ngemeni dameni vevese minivo mini ga'ine gili hehe li lu'ine ga'ine gizebo igi mini monoku' minaa' monovo'ine di lamine' igi evene' lu'ine ngimi nasahili' i-ngidaa' monovo'ine di lamine' igi geni initeli'mi lulou' mini ma ele'vole' igi hongu li minaa' monovo'ine nene di lamine' igi minilizave.

Ido' vene' eleni nizani' nene lo-ngemanivo ingine a'mine'mine igi mono' vene' lili' igi mini evene' ngemenga lami vaini noso geli geli igi namilizave. Ne'mine igi mini monovo lamine' apizi ngimi minilizave.
Ado' ingine vene' gosoho' nesi va'ningine izipaha'ine lu'ine ngimi gizebo i-ngidilizani' aka ngelebizilizave.

Ido' ingine vene' gosoho' gili vevesi oko'ine lu'ine gizebo igi lu'ine hamo' ivo mini numu'ine ebe'ine gizebo lamine' igii numu'ningu' minaa' ave nesi nasahili' i-ngidi mini va'ningine gelekele' i-ngidi minilizave. Evene' O'moso'mi gamazi divi ledivi' ikelizave li ne'mine igi minilizave.
Ido' a'mine'mino goso'vesi ga'ine do lo-ngemanivo inginesi oko'ine lu'ine gizebo lamine' ilizave.

Ido' gaza neve monovoka do lamine' ogo mino evene' ingine inite' muki' iline' ningi gei' monovokalo' ge'metilizangumu' ve lo inite' lisihe' ogo molo mino aka ti' ogo ngelebizezo: Mono' apize ngemelo ma abeleni amo do veveso apize ngemezo.
Soza lo ladani ogane li lamilizani' gamazi laminekovo' lo-ngemezo. Ne'mine anivo lovo i limaa' ave ingine lelikumu' gamazi goloso lilisa vise' igi ngovozo hili hulilisave.
Ido' gelekele' gipe alu nene lo-ngemanivo ingine me'ningine mulu'ine di lamine' i-ngidi gamazi di tibizi li-ngimami inite' mata' mukito' nene gelekele' i-ngidi gamzai'ine diivo' minilizave.

Ne'mine igi me'ningi inite' mata' gumine dami inite' matato' gizebo lamine' igi gono di igi mili ilizani' ne'mo veveseleseive. Ne'mine ilizani' nene O'moso do lu' izaa' ive'mi mono' nene ne'mine mana'mine ogo do otelesune li ti' ilisave.
O'moso'mo evene' muki' do lamine' o-ledelesa nasahili' o-lidine' nene soto' ogavo ningekune.

Ido' nasahili' o-lidine' ne'mo lele'mize vevesavo O'moso mehede emo zogo zogo izaa' monovo nene hulo O'mosomu' gilamavete mene misubou' initekumu' ngumo helepele' iga' nani' nesi hulo idise gamene okode lute gizebo lamine' ogo inite' lisihekevo' ogo molo mono' lemeni dameni ogavo minelone.

Idise gameneu' ne'mine ogo mine do dizo gilingili ogo minaa' noune' inite' laminekumu' nene gizebo ogo minelesune. A'mine inite' lamine' ne'mino neive: Leze O'mosote naba do lu' izaa' ive Izesu' Kilisito' aloseive. Ogavo eze labana've ningelesune.

Aza neve goloso nite' gozopo' do'mo vune' akaloti' do tine' molo lele'mizo ogo do lu' izelesa lelikumu' ogo hiline'. Ee, lihime'ine apaso do lamine' o-ngedekuvo neze zuho lili' igi mini lu'ine a'mida mili inite' lisihe' laminekumu' amuzo mili gili igi mili ilizave lo lelikumu' ogo hiline' ve
Haza ve nabe li gilikelizaze. Ne'mine gamazi lo-ngemo ga'ine do ngele'mize veveso amuzo molo lo-ngemezo.

Gei' gizebou' minani' evene' nene gamazi do gosoho' ogo ti' lo lo-ngeme ngeme' ogo minezo: Ingine ngamanisi ido' ngamani gono di lelito' gizebo igi minaa' avesi gelekele' i-ngidi gamazi'ine gili dalizave. Alinge' gono lamine' atoli'mine atoli'mine nasahili' oga' gono ne'mine soto' iline' nene ha dalone li amuzo mili gili minilizave.
Evene' mamu' ngemenga lami lovo lolize hizami hongu ve mini evene' muki' nene nasahili' i-ngidi minilizave.

Lazasi gozopo' nene a'mine'mine ogo negi hizo ladani ogo gamazi gele hulo gopo minune' ve. Ne'mine ogo inite' goloso ato ato' lumo helaa' ine' ido' lanite' gelaa' une' inite' nemu' gelekele' o-do mino evene' igi mili iga' nani' ne'mine ogo molo mineloninako lo gituho' no mikile' oga' une' ve. Ne'mine ogo nonivo evene' muki' biluva' i-lidi minikevo lazasi biluva' o-ngedo minaa' une' ve.
Ne'mino nonivo alinge' lele'mize lamine' oga' ive O'moso'mo eze nasahili've nesi ido' lulo limine' nesi do soto' ogo lelebizo do lu' izine'.

Do lu' izine' nene laza inite' lisihe' ogo molo oga' noune' nemu' ve lo gilivoba asi've lelikumu' mulumo giline' nemu' do lu' izine' ve. Noso izo do izipe gosoho' soto' ani' ne'mine o-ledo eze Sikalahu've ne'mo lemeni dameni gosoho' limine' ne'mine ogo do lu' izine'.
Ee, do lu' izaa' ive Izesu' Kilisito' gono davo ne'mo O'moso'mo eze Sikalahu've vauve elo lehize-lidine'.

Nasahili' o-lidine' nemu' lele'mize lisihe' ogo ele'vole' ngemeni dameni disa minivi' minivi' ilizave lo eze Sikalahu've lehize-lidine' ve. Ne'mine ogo laza ezesi mino minevo' minevo' oloninako lo gilingili ogo dalosa gilune' inite' nene molo-lidine'.
Gamazi mene gihile lamine' line' ne neive.

O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi nizave ingine ga'ine hamo' gili inite' lamine' ato ato' evene' hize ele' i-ngidaa' ne'mine nene amuzo mili igi mili minilizave loo luvoni' gamazi mene amuzo molo lo-ngemeline lo nogiluve. Gamazi mene lamine' neinako evene' muki' hize ele' o-ngedelido' o neive.

Abelenga gamazi ido' haza gamazimu' vise' igi li volelo' melo' igi minaa' nani' nesi gele hulo mehenga emo ido' avo'ningi gulive'inemu' li naza evene' nabaliti nga'vopilemo' nouve li engi' oko'ine di dizi di naba igi di hutile' igi laa' nani' nesi gele hulo mehenga emo ido' Mose' Zuda vemu' lou' gamazi lo huko line' nemu' ato ato' gamazi li lovo lolize hizi minaa' nani' nesi haza gamazi gopo gamazi gihile nomine' nenako gele hulo mehenga emezo.
Evene' malite gamazi di gopo igi li mono' mulise hizi ho'li nizavo ma do vevese-ngedelesa ga'ine do gamene hamope setape lo-ngemanivo gilamavo ma ize' molo do hulo-ngedezo.
Gele nabe. Ve ne'mine ve nene peleseve' izaa' ave lu'ine gopo o vine' mini ingine igi mili iga' ani' ne'mo engi' monovo'ine do soto' ogave.

Naza Nikopoli ebeku' vo mino hepe' naba eleline' gamenelokisi nene a'mida minelove lo lo hukokuze. Atema'ni he Tikiko'ni he gei' nanida imiselekuvo vo hetelavo ma gaza nene a'mine mineloni' ebeta alove lo amuzo molozo.
Ido' ve seta' ado' Apoloki ido' lou' gamazi li hukani' gelaa' ive Zenaki mono' gono di vilisido' inite' mata' vise' ikelisize. Nemu' akalo' inite' mata' amuzo molo vise' ogo do soto' o ngemezo.

Inite' lamine' ogo molo ogali'mi monovo ningi gili lamine' ilizangumu' nene leze evenete zuho Izesu' evenele muki' ingine gono lamine' di'mi vilizado' nene lu'ine milalizave. Ne'mine igi evene' ma initekumu' vise' igi geni ngebelavo ma hizi ele' i-ngidilizave. Leze zuho engita monoli'mi gihile nomine' minikelizaze.
Nezesi maka' none' aleve ingine gopo'ni nilave. Monokumu' ve li lu'ine limaa' nave ngopo'ni nolo-ngiduze. Gaza lo-ngemezo. Nasahili' o-lengedelive lo O'mosola noluve. Moda ve.

Luhuvo nite' meve nene Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' ve lo nalato' nouve Paulo' nenitatikisi ido' leze zuho Timoteodatikisi nene novive. A'mine luhuvo nite' meve nene lelikisi hamo' gono daa' nounive lute geme nonive Hilemoni' geikumukisi
ido' leze zuho vene' Ahia'nimukisi ido' monoli'mi lovou' maka' zege' zege' oga' unive Alakipo'nimukisi ido' Kilisito' evenele gei' numungau' mulise milaa' naave engikumukisi nene nogize-lingiduve.

Nemu' nene luhuvo nite' mene nogize-lengedo O'moso metehosi Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' neesi nasahili' i-lingidikesivo ne'mo lengi' muludingu' nene hongu minivoo mine lamine' igi minilizave loo O'mosola noluve.

Hilemoni' gaza Guvelesi ve Izesu'nimu' gele ele'vole' ogo mino luka ezesi ido' O'moso'mi evenele mukikisi ngemaa' naningumu' nene gelosa naza O'mosola laa' nouvongu' nene geikumu' gamene gamene isaa' neve lo-daa' nouve.

Ido' a'mine O'mosola laa' nouvoni' nene gaza Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' ogo leliku' omo gi'mizo naine' ne'mo nene laza Kilisitoda mine molo inite' lamine' daa' noune' mukikumu' nene gele osu' lo mineline losa O'mosola laa' nouve.

Ido' neze zuho make, O'moso isaa' neve lo-daa' nouvoni' nene gaza luka O'moso'mi evenele ngeme naine' ne'mo lu'ine amuzo gohi dani' ne'mo nene lu'ne do ngi lo-nedavo mulu'neu' gulumo avile atoli'mine ogo lisivoo nouvoni' nenako nemu' nene O'moso isaa' neve lo-daa' nouve.
Naza amuzo molo lovo kiselevo' ogosa Kilisito' velemu' ogo gaza lisihe' o neine' inite' me'mine nene ozo lo lo-huko lo-gedelodo' o nouvoni'za

Kilisito' evenele laza lute ge neme ne geme lo minelonido' o neinako nemu' nene amuzo molo lo huko lo-gedamo asi haza nevo longo' ogo gele-gedelesa nene noluve. Ee, Paulo' naza Kilisito' velemu' medelo mino gamazi've lo soto' oga' uve ido' idise a'mine Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' ve li nalato' huli-nimikave neni' nene haza nevo longo' ogo gele-gedelesa nene noluve.
Ido' longo' ogo gele-gedelesa noluvoni' nene nalato' mene minuvongu' meleho lolo' okuvo aza izipaha'ne lolo' ive
A'mine ve aza gomu' geikisi minasida nene gonoka do-gedelido' lisihe' amo minine' ma neine'za idise gei' gonokasi neni' gono'ne nesi do-ledelido' lisihe' gehepeve ogosa neive.
Aza neve nene neni' ve'ne gihile gehepeve neine'za a'minemu' nene gele hulosa geita gohi noimisele huluve.

Naza Kilisito' gamazi've lamine' lo soto soto' ogo minaa' uvongumu' nalato' mela nouvongu' geito' medelo mino gono'ne do-nedaa' ilingumu' nene nenikisi ha minelive lo gele minuha ma imiselamuvodine'za

geitati' gamazi ma gele nemamo nolinido' nene inite' do ne'mine mana'mine uvoni' gelalive losa nene alamuve. Ido' ne'mino alamuvoni' nene Onesimo' gono'ne do-nedelingumu' nene o've lo-deline' aka hize tile-gedekuvosa gaza monovo do lamine' ogo a'mine gono dalive loo lo nemeline' nene edamiline' o neivosa gasika nene lukalo' do molosa neni' gono do-nedelive lo lo nemeline losa nene alamuve.
Ido' O'moso'mo lavo gamene li'nibemukovo' gei' hulo-gedo hota vo minine' nene alinge' tine' molo ogo geikisi mudise minivi' minivi' ilisive lo nemu' hulo-gedo vihe losa nene gele nouve.

Ido' tine' molo ogo geikisi mineline' nene ha gonou' ve ne'minevo' nene minelivoba asi Kilisito' evenele geze zuho luka emelinido' o minelivesi nene mineleseive. Ee, neze zuho lu'ne eme lamine' o nouve lolo' ogo neiha geita nene gonou' ve minosa ido' Guvelesi vela gi'mizo minosa geze zuho gehepevesi nene lolo' ogo mineleseinako neni' lu'ne eme nouvoni' nene ivile' ivosa gaza nene luka vauve elosa emelinido' mineleseive.

Nemu' nene gaza nenikumu' gelanivo zogo naa' olosive lamine' nane lo gele naine' nenako nemu' nene Onesimo' aza gei' nanida naavo ma nene naza nanida alodo' nele'mize lamine' iline' akalo' do molosa ele'mize lamine' ozo.

Ne'mine iline'za aza neve gomu' maka' minasida ma do goloso o-gede nolihe ido' geitati' inite' malo' golo hizo ma gemelido' o neivo ma nene a'mine inite' mukito' nene neni' golo hize-gedeloze. Neni' gehe-nedezo.

Ido' a'mine mene neni' golo hize-gedelove noluvoni' gamazi nene do amuzo molalosa luhuvo a'me ve nene Paulo' neni' a'nedunu' gehepeve nogizuve: A'mine neve neni' golo hizo gemelesuve. Gemelesuha nenitati' dina' naba geita nene ha neine' ma neine'za naza a'minemu' nene ha luvodine'za ma lolosa gelamuve. A'mine dina' nene ado' Kilisito'nimu' neni' lo soto' ogo lo-gemekuvo ezemu' gele ele'vole' ogo minevo' minevo' gemeni dameni daningumu' nene noluve.

Ne neiha neze zuho make, laza nene Guvelesi ve'mi evenele nosine' nenako geitati' inite' ma daloho lo nogiluve. A'mine nene ado' Kilisito' evenele nosingumu' ve lo neni' lu'neu' do lamine' o-nedo gele emanivo Onesimo' nenita alive losa noluve.

Ido' ne'mine lo nogizuvoni' nene gaza longo' o-gedeloni' votigile ivile' ivosa inite' lamine' gohi masi imine' molo olosane losa gele nouvoni' nenako gamazi'ne mene mo gele dalosane lo gele mu'musi' o minosa nene nogizuve.

Ido' gamazi hamo' gohi ma neine' neve nene ne'mine lo noluve: Lingine nenikumu' ve li O'mosola laa' naani' malo' nene O'moso'mo gele lengemo neni' neve nene lengita nimiselavo alosuve losa gele nouze. Ongaloni' numuno lulo nene ma do va'va' o nimikezo.
Ido' nenikisi maka' Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' nalato' nosive Epahala' ne'mo nene gopo'ni nolive.
Ido' maka' gono daa' unive ado' Maleko' ve Alisitako' ve Dema' ve ido' Luka' ve engi' nete nene a'mine'mine igi gopo'ni nilave.
Guvelesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' nasahili've nene lengi' lutingu' mine molo minivoo.
Gozopo' nene O'moso'mo gamazi've avotemotine lo-ngemelesa nene ato ato' gameneu' monovo do ato ato' ogo polohetela molavo ingine avotemotine li-ngimi ngimi' i'mi iga' ani' ve.

Ne neiha gamene alinge' idise mene none' gamenela nene O'moso'mo gamazi've nene leli' lo-lemelesa ei' gipele neve imiselavo ogo lo-limine' ve. A'mine gipele nene inite' mataliti me'nibo minelive lo ele'mize molo ei' gipelelo' a'mine inite' mata' muki' nene do soto' ine' ve.

A'mine gipele neve O'moso'mi monovo danava've atoli'mine goloso ogo lamine' neine' ne'mi gihile've gehepeve mino O'moso'mi emeni dameni ne'mido' lisihe' gehepeve o minive ne neive. Nemu' a'mine gipele ne'mo ei' amuzo'velo' molo gele mino laa' neine' gamazi ne'mo nene inite' mata' muki' nene hize ele' ivo laminekovo' minaa' neive. Ido' aza nene goloso initete apase-ledaa' aka've vele osu' lo-ledo veleta ve Guvelesi ve naba eitoti' lemo minive nenako ana hulaa' ida minine' ve.

Mino O'moso'mi gipele ve li li-dani' gulive've ne'mo O'moso gelekele' i-di gono've di-daa' ave angeloliti gulive'ine nene ivile' ogo mino a'mine votigilelo' lisihe' ogo ngivile' goloso ogo dizosa neive.

Ee, O'moso'mo gipelemu' line' gamazi nene angelo' hamokumukisi ma lo-ngedamine' nenako ne'mo nene aza angelo' ngivile' ogo dizosa neive. O'moso'mo ezemu' ti' lo line' mono' godolou' gizi nizani' ma neive:
Idise naza gei' maho lolo' ogo
neni' gipe'ne gei' nene nane lo do ote-giduvoni' ve.
Ido' ma line' gizi nizani' ma neive:
Naza nene ei' giduve melehine minekuvo
Eze nene neni' gipe'ne minelive.
Ido' O'moso'mo gana' gipele nene misubouko imiselelesa gohi line' gamazi ma ti' li gizi nizani' ve:
O'moso'mi angelo' muki' ingine gubi' izi imi opo'ni lilizave.
Ido' angelo've ingine gelekele' i-di minaa' avemu' nene O'moso'mo gamazi ti' lo line' luhuvo gizi nizani' ma neive:
O'moso'mo lavo
ei' angelo've nene hepe' ngemeni dameni di otuhaa' nave.
Ido' lavo
a'mine gelekele' i-daa' ave nene
olo' gulumo ne'mine ngemeni dameni di otuhaa' nave.
Ne'mine o neine'za gipelemu' neve mono' godolou' ti' lo line':
O'mosoo, gaza gizebo oga' mo'mosikau' gizebo ogo mineline' nene
huko vamo minevo' minevo' ogo mineleseive.
Mineleseinako Guvekasi ve lolo' ogo mineline' ne'mi monovo nene
monovo do lisihe' oga' monovo nene mineleseive.
Gaza nene monovo lisihe' laminetokovo' luka molo mino
goloso inite' daa' monovomu' gosele' gebelavo mehenga emaa' nane.
Ne'mine oga' nane' nenako
O'moso gei' O'mosoka ne'mo eveneka ngivile' ogo gaza golize izo mineline lo
a'mine mo'mosito' nene gele'mize molave.
Ido' ma nene O'moso'mo gipelemu' Guvekasi ve lo-do ti' lo lo neine' ma neive:
Guvekasi ve, gaza gana' nene me misubo do soto' molanivo
amuzo molo ha neive.
Ido' Okulumo' nesi gei' angadunu' lolo' aine' ve.
Ne neiha a'mine inite' nene vi osu' lilisasine'za
gaza nene minevo' minevo' ogo haza minaa' nane.
Ido' okulumo' misubo nene eveneliti oko'nido' inite' hulupovo ili
goloso iga' nani' ne'mine ilisasive.
Ido' a'mine okulumo' misubo nene litehe inite' di gangi milani' ma'mino
gango moloko gosoho' ha do soto' olosaba gaza neve ha minevo' minevo' ogo hazavo' nanivo
kilisimasi nene ogo voka' voka' ogo mineline' nene osu' lamoloseive.
Ido' gipelemu' ti' lo line' gamazi ne'mino nene angelo' hamokumukisi lo-ngemesa'mive:
Nezeloti' gei' nene nange. A'ne hulaa' uvoda nene minezo.
Mine do vo nanivo biluvaka nete gelekele' i-gidi minilizave lo
gizengau' do'mo leme-ngedelesuve.

Ne'mine ma lo-ngedesa'mine' nenako angelo' ingine gipele ne'minisa dizi minami ha Okulumo' ngemeni damenisi O'moso'mi gelekele' ve've minikevo O'moso'mo do lu' izelesa lele'mize molave leli' nene hize ele' i-lidilizave lo ngimiselaa' neive.

Ido' mono' gamazi nogilune' nene angelo' ngivile' ogo dize minive O'moso'mi gipele'mo lo-limine' gamazi nenako nemu' nene a'mido' e'meto novube lo zovo' izo mala valonge. A'mine nogilune' gamazi lamine' mene lute gate molo gele lamine' o mino e'meto volone.

O'moso'midati' gamazi ha angelolite lani' gamazi Mose' gizine' ne'mo nene amuzo'vesi miningumu' a'mine gamazi nene ma avuto' igi gili hulave engi' nene a'mine gamazi avuto' ani' votigilelo' nene di mili lihime ngimi mulumo inite' di-ngidaa' ani' ve.

Ido' a'mine amuzo've ngomosi minine' gamazi avuto' ave nene mulumo nite' ne'mine di-ngidaa' ani' nenako a'mine Mose' gizine' gamazi ivile' ogo dizo minine' inite' naba O'moso'mo lihimete hulo-ledo do lu' izeline' akate vele-lidine' ne'mi gamazi nene gilube gelamube ogo minelone' nene O'moso'mo lihime lemo mulumo nite' naba do-ledeleseive. Ido' a'mine mulumo nite' naba do-ledelinguti' nene mo ngelo olovo' amolosune. Ido' a'mine O'moso'mo lihimete hulo-ledo do lu' izeline' gamazi nene Guvelesi ve asi've ganatilise lo soto' ivo eze veleti' gilave nete lezela li hulani' ve.

Ido' lezela nili hulavo a'mine gamazi nene lamine' ve li ningilizave lo O'moso'mo ei' gala gilido' do molo ato' suno ogo amuzo malehe inite' ato atoli'mine do soto' ogo ido' a'mine gamazi li-limave nene Sikalahu'velati' amuzo ato ato' lehize-ngedo minine' ve. Ido' O'moso'mo ne'mine ine' nenako nemu' nene a'mine lihimete hulo-ledo do lu' izeline' gamazi nene lamineto' mo inite' naba goloso neive. Nemu' nene lute gate molo gele lamine' o mino e'meto volone.

Ido' idise lo-lingimuvoni' nene monovo gosoho' soto' ilingu' vi hilalizani' alevemu' nene lo-lingimuvoni' ve. Ido' a'mine monovo gosoho' soto' ilingu' vi hilalizani' aleve nene angelo' engito' neve gelekele' i-ngidi minikevo gizebo i-ngidilizave lo O'moso'mo ma lo-ngedamive.
Ido' mono' godolou' gamazi ma ve mali'mo O'moso lo-imine' gamazi ma ti' lo gize neine' ma neive:
Laza evene' ngomo haza nite' none' lelikumu' nene
gaka gelo minelinido' minamane'za
aizo, lelikumu' nene gaka gelo minaa' nane.
Ido' evene' lemeni dameni nene lamine' amivo
gaza gizebo o-ledelinido' minamane'za
gaza nene ha gizebo o-ledaa' nane. Ido' ne'mine o-ledaa' naningumu' nene naza aizo lo gelekuve.
Evene' nene angelo' engitoti' gamene li'nibevo' lemeti' igi minilizave lo
gaza evene' nene angelototi' do leme-ngedo molo-ngede nane.
Gaza evene' nene do hozi lo-ngedo guve'inesi ve lolo' o-ngedane.
Ido' ne'mine o-ngedo evene' nete
inite' mata' mukito' gizebo igi minilizave lo
a'mine inite' mata' muki' nene eveneliti gize'ingu' do leme-ngedaa' nane.

Ee, O'moso'mo inite' muki' nene eveneliti gize'ninguko do leme-ngedo molave. Ne'mine ogavo inite' hamokisi evenelite gizebo amilizave lo molani' inite' nene ma nizamave. Ne neiha idise gameneuko ningaa' noune' nene inite' muki' nete evene' nene olihe gelekele' i-ngidi osu' lamavo ningaa' noune.

Ido' ningo gelaa' noune' nene O'moso aza angelototi' gamene li'nibevo' lemeti' ogo minelive lo angelototi' do lemeti' ogo hulo-dive Izesu'nimu' nene ningo gelaa' noune. Ee, O'moso'mo nasahili' o-ledo evene' mukikumu' helelive lo imiseline' ve. Ido' a'mine ve Izesu' nene mulumo gelo hilingumu' ve lo O'moso'mo do hozi lo-doo Guvelesi ve lolo' o-dine' nemu' nene mo ningo gelaa' noune.

Ido' O'moso'mo Izesu'ni imiselo mulumo alumo gelo helelive line' nene nanitekumu' ve. Izesu' nene do lu' izeline' gono dalido' olihe lisihe' gehepeve amo minine' nenako nemu' mulumo alumo gelo heleline' ne'mo a'mine leli' do lu' izeline' gono nene dalido' do lisihe' gehepeve o-delingumu' mulumo alumo gelo helelive lo O'moso'mo imiseline' ve. Ido' izipahala vai' lele'mize molo atoli'mine ogo do lamine' o-ledelesa gono do'mo vo mininguti' nene O'moso aza leli' gomu' molo lemo akate velo do lu' izelive Izesu' mulumo alumo gelo helelive lo imiseline' ne'mo nene monovo do lamine' goloso ine' ve. Ee, inite' mata' muki' ei' inite've eikumukovo' mini di dizilizave lo do soto' molave evene' naba O'moso aza Izesu'ni nene do lu' izelido' do lisihe' o-delesa mulumo alumo gelo helelive lo imiseline' ne'mo nene monovo do lamine' goloso ine' ve.

Ido' evene' lute noso izo gilito do lamine' o-ledo do O'moso'mi evenele lolo' o-ledaa' ivesi ido' lute do lamine' o-lidine' alevesi leli' meteho nene hamo' minine' aleve none. Nemu' aza lelikumu' nene neni' aku'ne alu'ne zuho nizave lolosa ovozo helesa'mive.
Ido' aku'ne alu'ne zuho ve line' nemu' mono' godolou' O'moso lo-imine' gamazi ma ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Naza neni' aku'ne alu'ne zuho nene gei' guliveka nene lo soto' o ngemo
gei' guliveka do hozi lo leli' zuholiti muliseu' nene nama lolosuve.
Ido' leli' eveneliti lemeni damenisi minelingumu' line' gamazi gohi ma ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Naza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' o mino eito' lehete o minelove.
Ne'mine lo gohi ma ti' lo line' ma neive:
Ido' naza nene O'moso'mo neze izipaha'ne zuho nimine' mesi none' ningilo.

Ido' a'mine izipahala zuho laza nene hele vaa' okodesi none' nenako a'mine'mine ogo Izesu' aza heleline' ne'mo helaa' amuzo do minive Satani nene do goloso o-do ido' helakumu' ngehelele izaa' ne'mo gesi hizo hulo lulou' o-ngedavo ngehelele izaa' lulou' minave nesi nene aza helosa gesi kele hulo-ngedelesa hele vaa' okode ne'mine do otuho minine' ve.
Ido' ne'mine ine' nene angelo' aleve do ngu' izo ne'mine ine' nevoba mono' godolou' Abalahamu' a'vopilemo' zuho do ngu' izaa' neive li gizi nizado' e'meto ne'mine ine' ve.

Ido' nemu' nene eveneliti lihimete apase-ledelesa leli' hele vaa' okode ne'mine do otuho nakunolo alunolo zuho leli' gehepeve ne'mine lolo' iline' ogavo ido' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba nete eveneliti lihime apasaakumu' gono daa' nanako ne'mine ve lolo' ogo evene' muhelete ningo O'moso'mi velelo' monovo lisihetoti' O'moso'mo lidokovo' gono dalosa eze akunolo alunolo zuho leli' gehepeve ne'mine lolo' iline' ogavo lolo' ine' nenako aza nene leli' gehepeve ne'mine lolo' amidiniko a'mine gono nene dalido' lisihe' mo amidine. Nemu' nene leli' gehepeve ne'mine lolo' iline' ogavo lolo' ine' ve.
Ee, ido' emengu' milangu' mulumo gelo minine' nemu' nene mo ningo gele neine' nenako ve ma ingine ngemengu' nimilavo minilizani' aleve nene hize ele' noo-ngedo alete molo-ngedelido' o neive.

Nemu' nene neze zuho, O'moso'mo ei' ve lo Okulumoku' voloningumu' lengele'mize molave lingine nene leli' monoku' nene O'moso'mo ei' velemu' ogo imiselavo ave aposolo mino eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba ne'mine minive naba Izesu'nimu' nene gatine gili minilo.

Mose' aza O'moso'mi zuhola gono dangu' nene O'moso'mo lo-didokovo' e'meto monovo've lisihetoti' gono do do vine' ne'mine ogo Izesu' aza nesi a'mine'mine ogo gonolo' ele'mize molave O'moso'mi gamazi've nene ivile' amo lo-didokovo' e'meto monovo've lisihetoti' gono do do vine' ve.

Ido' evene' zuho maliti me'nibi guvele ne'mo a'mine zuholiti guve'ine nene ivile' ogo naba minaa' neine' ne'mino Izesu' gulive do hozi lolone' nene Mose' gulive do hozi laa' noune' nene ivile' ivosa do hozi lolonido' lisihe' o neive. Ido' lisihe' o neine' nenako nemu' nene ezemu' gatine gili minilo.

Ido' ne'mine lo O'moso'mi evenele zuholiti me'nibo nene Izesu'nimu' luvoni' giline' nenako nemu' nene lo-lengemelove. Evene' zuho ato ato' di soto' i-ngidave me'ninge nene minamani' nevoba ha minani' ma neive. Ha minani'za a'mine inite' mata' muki' do soto' molave nene O'moso'movo' do soto' molani' nenako ei' hamo' nene me'nibo neive.

Ido' Mose' nene O'moso'mo lo-didokovo' e'meto monovo've lisihetoti' O'moso'mi zuhola gono do do vine' nene ha O'moso'mi gelekele' ve'vevo' mino O'moso'mi gamazi've alinge' soto' ilingumukovo' gamazi lo ngeme ngeme' ogo gono do do vine'za

Kilisito' aza neve O'moso'mo lo-didokovo' e'meto monovo've lisihetoti' gono do do vine' nene mo O'moso'mi gipele mino eze zuholo' gizebo o-ngede mino gono do do vine' ve. Ido' eze zuho ve luvoni' nene laza Kilisito' do lu' izelive lo ezemu' gele ele'vole' o mino lolize izaa' noune' monovote nene ma hulamoso' a'mine zuho nene leli' minelesune.
Nemu' nene laza O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo gamazi ma ti' lo line' mamu' nene gele dalone:
Mose' aza ebe' hadivela ngele'mizo novivo
O'moso golo izani' gameneu' evene' ingine
O'moso'mi gamazi've gili huli gili dalisa gilami
a'manapa igi minani' ne'mine igi minami
lingine ei' nolo've idise a'mene ma nigili ma
lutine di a'manapa igi gili hulamilo.
Ido' a'mine ebe' hadivela nene avotinge ingine
inite' mata' muki' engita ogo molo uvoni' nene
kilisimasi foti (40) ne'mine nene mini ningi minani'za
ningi huli-nidi go'ne izi'mi igi minani' ve.
Nemu' nene naza a'mine alevemu' nene mulu'neu' goloso gehepeve gelo
engikumu' ti' lo luvoni' ve:
Engi' lu'ine ne'mo gamene gamene gopo akalo' vaa' ivo
neze aka'ne nene ningi hulani' ve.
Nemu' nene nizebolo' molani' nenako naza lamineto' nolo hukuve lo
ti' lo luvoni' ve:
Ingine nene neni' mine gelaa' ebe'neu' nene igi mini gilamilisave lo
noluve.
Nemu' nene neze zuhokizo, lengikuti' evene' ma nene lutine golososi mini O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' ami minevo' minevo' ogo gono daa' ive O'moso nene mehedine imikelizaze. Ehe' igi minilo.

Ido' lengikuti' evene' ma lingine lutine O'mosola molakumu' lutine a'manapa ogavo lihime daa' monovo goloso ne'mo lingimimise' ogavo goloso ikelizaze. Mono' godolou' idise gamene ve lani' nene ha neidokovo' monoku' nene ne lu'ne do ngi lo-nede ge luka do ngi lo-gede livo' minilo.
Laza gana' api' ogo Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' une' nene hulamo do gili' lo nonivo idise mene none' gamene osu' liline' nene a'ne'movo' Kilisito' evenele lolo' une' nene gihile mineleseive.
Nemu' nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' gamazi malo' e'meti minilo:
Evene' ingine O'moso'mi gamazi've gili huli
gili dalisa gilami a'manapa igi minani' ne'mine igi minami
lingine ei' nolo've idise a'mene nigili ma
lutine di a'manapa igi gili hulamilo.

Ido' mono' godolou' gamazi idise lo soto' uvoni' ne'mo nene lamineto' ti' lo nolo-limive: Laza O'moso'mi gamazi gele damo mehede emo minelone' nene O'moso'mo mine gelaa' lemelesa neingu' nene ngelo vo holamolosune. Ee, O'moso'mo gamazi nolo-ngimivo gili minisasi a'mine gamazilo' e'metami mehe'ine imave li mono' godolou' gizani' ma nene zamotinemu' luhuvo gizani' neve. Mose' Aigita misubouti' ngele'mizo ani' aleve muki' engikumu' nene luhuvo gizani' ve.

Ido' kilisimasi foti (40) ne'mi lulou' ma nene O'moso'mo zamotinemu' mulunou' goloso gehepeve giline' neve. A'mine hamo' aleve ingine kilisimasi foti (40) ne'mi lulou' lihime di ebe' hadivela hili gese' ani' aleve engi' nemu' nene mulunou' goloso gehepeve giline' ma neive.

Ido' O'moso aza evene' mine gelaa' ebe' ngemelesa nouvongu' nene ingine mini gilamilisave lo evene' zamotinemu' lo huko line' ma neve. A'mine hamo' aleve ingine O'moso'mi gamazi gili huli mehe'ine imave engikumu' nene mine gelaa' ebe' ngemelesa nouvongu' nene igi mini gilamilisave lo lo hukine' ve.
Nemu' nene ingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' ami mehe'ine imaa' ani' monovo'ine ne'mo nene mine gelaa' ebe' ngemelesa ingu' nene vamani' ve lo mo ningo gele none.

Ido' nemu' nene O'moso'mo evene' ma ingine mine gelaa' ebe'neu' nene vi hilalisave lo lo hukine' gamazi nene olihe ogo gihile izamivo a'mine'mi aka'vesi olihe tilamido' nene O'moso'mo lengikumu' gala gelosa lengikuti' evene' mamu' mo aka ivile' ikenako a'mingu' mo keke' vi hilamilisave lo gelalize. Laza ehe' ogo golise gelo minelone.

Ido' laza ehe' ogo golise gelelone' nene nanitekumu' ve. Mose' miningu' minani' aleve mono' gamazi lamine' li-ngimani' ne'mine igi lezesi li-limikevo none. Ido' a'mine mono' gamazi lamine' nene li-ngimi ngimi' avo gilani'za ingine a'minemu' gili ele'vole' igi e'metisa'madi'mo engita vo gihile izamo hize ele' o-ngedamaa' ine' ve. Nemu' nene laza engi' ani' monovo nemu' gelo golise gelo ehe' ogo minelone.

Ido' O'moso'mo ezemu' gili ele'vole' ami mehe'ine imaa' avemu' ingine mine gelaa' ebe'neu' igi mini gilamilisave lo lo hukokuve line' nenako nemu' nene a'ne'mine ve ingine mine gelaa' ebe'veu' nene vi hilamilizado' mini mili minikevo a'mine mine gelaa' ebe'veu' vo holalonive nene ezemu' gele ele'vole' ogo nonive leli' nene none. Ido' ingine O'moso'mi mine gelaa' ebe'veu' vi hilamani' nene mine gelaa' ebe've nomivosa nevoba asi aza okulumo' misubo do soto' ogo gono do osu' lidoti' nene mine gelo neine' nenako mine gelaa' ebe've nene mo neive.
Ido' O'moso aza mine gelo neive luvoni' nene O'moso'mo gamene sigisi (6) ne'mi lulou' gono davo gamene seveni (7) ine' nemu' nene mono' godolou' gamazi ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Gamene seveni (7) ogavo gono've osu' line' nenako
neu' nene api' ogo mine giline'.
Ido' mine gelo neive li luhuvo gohi gizani' ma ti' lo line' neuko mo lo-lengemekuve:
Ingine nene mine gelaa' ebe'neu' nene igi mini gilamilisave.

Ido' naza gomu' lo-lingimuvoni' gamazi maloti' nene evene' ma ingine O'moso'mi mine gelaa' ebe'veu' vi hilalizani' aka nene ha ngolokovo' lo minivo minine' nenako ido' gomu' minangu' nene mono' gamazi lamine' li-ngimikevo gilave engi' nene a'mine gamazi gili ele'vole' igi e'metisa'madi'mo O'moso'mi mine gelaa' ebeku' nene ma vamani' nenako

a'mingu' vo holalone' gamene ato' gohi ma do kegeso molo-lidine' ve. Ido' a'mine gamene nene idise mine do nodizune' gamene ne neive. Ee, Mose' evene' ngele'mizo vine' gameneloti' kilisimasi vai' goloso ogo vavo a'mine gamenemu' nene idise mine do noune' gamene ve lo O'moso'mo Davidi' veleu' molavo a'mine lo-lingimuvoni' gamazi ma nene Davidi' ti' lo line' ve:
Lingine ei' nolo've idise a'mene ma nigili ma
lutine di a'manapa igi gili hulamilo.

Ido' Mose' helavo Zosuva' ezelo' medelo Kanaha misubou' ngele'mizo vine' mau' nene ingine mine gelaa' ebe' nene dadiniko O'moso'mo mine gelaa' ebeku' vo holaa' gamene ato' gohi mamu' alinge' ma lamidine.
Nemu' nene O'moso'mo gono've do osu' losa mine giline' ne'mine ogo eze evenele zuho mine gelelone' gamene nene lelikumu' ha gizebo ogo neive.

Ee, O'moso'mi mine gelaa' ebeku' vo holalonive laza nene O'moso'mo inite' mata' lolo' ogo osu' lo gono've hulo mine giline' ne'mino lazasi gonotesi hulo a'mida mudise aka vo mine gelelesunako nemu' nene O'moso'mi evenele zuho mine gelelone' gamene nene lelikumu' gizebo ogo neive.

Nemu' nene laza Mose' miningu' minani' aleve O'moso'mi gamazi gili huli e'metami a'mine mine gelaa' ebeku' vi hilamani' ne'mine ogo engi' ani' ne'mine olone' ne'mo a'mine mine gelaa' ebeku' nene vo holamo zovo' izo mau' vogalonge. Mine gelaa' ebeku' voloningumu' nene O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo eze gamazi've nene amuzo molo gele do vo minelone.

Ee, O'moso'mi gamazi ne'mo nene gilizevo ogo haza minamo amuzo'vesi goloso mino gono dovo dovo' ogo mino bainati mite' velela ge'no mehenela ge'no gohe goloso minaa' neine' nene ivile' ogo gohe goloso neive. Ido' bainati mite' nene evene' hize sato sokulu' lo lulou' gehepeve vaa' neine' nene ivile' ogo a'mine O'moso'mi gamazi ne'mo luteu' vodeu' nene hize sokulu' lo vo holosa laza lute gateu' olosa gilune' initekumu' nene ize' molaa' neive.

O'moso'mo do soto' molani' inite' muki' nene haleki minilizado' ma minamavo aza ningesa'mine' inite' nene hamokisi mo keke' nizamave. Ee, leze monovote ize' molo-ledelive ei' velelo' nene inite' muki' hiti minami sotokovo' minaa' nani' nenako nemu' a'mine O'moso'mi gamazi nene amuzo molo gele do minelone.

Ido' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabalitevo' mono' numuno nabau' lavolavo izi hukikani' nene di veseme' ili O'moso'mi mo'mosi'vevo' ve langu' dizaa' ani' ne'mine ogo O'moso'mi gipele Izesu' aza eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive nabate dizo minive lolo' ogo okulumo' ivile' ogosa hozila O'moso'mi mo'mosi've gehepeve neida Okulumokuko dizo minine' nenako nemu' monote gele ele'vole' une' nene do amuzo molo do ngi lo do minelone.

Ido' monote nene do amuzo molo do ngi lo do minelone' nene eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ivete naba nene lemengu' ne'mi lulou' mino amuzote nomivo gilizevo ogo nonivo aza nene mulumote ningamo ninge mate-ledaa' ive minine' nevoba lelita lemengu' ato ato' muki' soto' oga' neine' ne'mino ezelasi nene emengu' ato atoli'mine soto' o-dine' nenako nemu' nene leli' mulumote ningelido' lisihe' o neive. Ee, lelita lemengu' soto' oga' neine' ne'mino ezelasi soto' ine'za aza neve lihime hamokisi ma damive. Ido' leli' mulumote ningelido' lisihe' o neine' nenako nemu' nene monote nene do amuzo molo do ngi lo do minelone.

Ido' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive nabate ne'mo leli' mulumote ningelido' lisihe' o minive aza nene O'moso neida leli' gamazite hize ele' olosa vo neine' nenako nemu' laza geni lebeleli gameneu' nene O'moso'mo isete izo ido' nasahili' o-ledo ha hize ele' o-ledeleseive lo a'mine geni lebeleline' inite' nemu' nene lovo' kiselevo' ogo lo-emeso' nene O'moso aza mo'mosi'velo' mino gizebo o-ledo nasahili' o-ledo minaa' neingumu' nene ha lo-emelone.

Ido' ne'mino geni lebeleli initekumu' O'moso lo-emelone' nene eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba'mi monovo ti' lo neingumu' nene gelo ma ne'mine ha olosune. Ne'mino neive: Eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave muki' ngele'mizi milika' milika' iga' nani' nene sipisipi nevo'mine inite' lihimete apase-ledelive li O'moso imilisa di ani' nene ngibili O'moso imani' inite' ato ato' muki' nesi oloku' gizika' gizika' igi minilisa evene' lelikumu' ve li O'mosola gono di hizi ele' i-lidilizave minilizave lo O'moso'mo lido' igi evene' engikuti' nene ma ngele'mizi milaa' nave.

Ido' a'mine eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba nene haza evene' mini inginesi nene evene' muki' amuzote nomine' mino aka laminetoti' zovo' izo vaa' noune' ne'mine nene ha ilizado' o neine' nenako nemu' nene mono' gili lamine' ami zovo' izi vaa' nani' ne'mino lazasi zovo' izo vunidine li ne'mine ani' aleve nene mulumo'ine gili hongu monovo ngelebizilizado' o neive.

Ido' a'mine eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nabasi nene amuzo'ine nomine' mini zovo' ha izi vilizado' i nizani' nenako nemu' evenekumu' nene lihime'ine apase-ngedelive li sipisipi nevo'mine inite' ngibili oloku' gizi O'moso imilizani' ne'mine igi angise'inemukisi ma imilizani' o neive.

A'mine eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba'mi gono nene dizosa neive. Ido' a'mine gono dalisa nene ve malite engi' lu'nido' di mili ma disa'mave. O'moso asi've nene Mose' uvoloho Aloni'ni nene do ote-davo ne'mine gono dani' ma'mine ogo evene' ma do ote-ngedavo a'mine gono nene daa' nave.

Ido' Kilisito' nene a'mine'mine ogo ei' gala gilido' do molo ei' oko'no do hozi lo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba lolo' amine'. Asi O'moso ne'mo ele'mize nomolo ti' lo lo-dine' ve:
Idise naza gei' maho lolo' ogo neni' gipe'ne gei' nene nane lo
do ote-giduvoni' ve.

Ido' mono' gamazi gohi mauti' Kilisito' nene Abalahamu'ni no'noho' ize-dive Melekisedeki' gono daa' ine' ne'mino a'mido' medelo do mino eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive minelive lo Kilisito'nimu' ti' lo line':
O'moso neni' nimani' inite' nene Melekisedeki' gono daa' ine' monovolo' ogo
eveneto' medelo mino inite' lehize-nedaa' anive
minevo' minevo' ogo minelesane.

Izesu' aza misubouko ve lolo' ogo minine' gameneu' nene aza helaa' akalo' novinguti' do ti'ne-do do u' izeli amuzo'vesi minive O'mosola nene vise naba' naba lo ido' O'mosola loo veleti' ive novozo limine'. Ne'mine ogavo aza oko'no do'mo lemo gelekele' o-nedaa' ingumu' ve lo O'moso'mo gele imine'.
Aza nene O'moso'mi gipele minine'za mulumo alumo giline' ne'mo nene O'moso gelekele' o-daa' monovomu' nene gele ngolo' lo giline'.

Ido' ne'mino gele ngolo' lo gilidi'mo eze nene gono dalido' lisihe' gehepeve ogo mino gelekele' o-daa' unive mukikumu' nene minevo' minevo' oloningumu' ve lo mudise do lu' izaa' ne'mi meleho nene aza lolo' ogavosa
O'moso'mo gaza neni' nimani' inite' nene Melekisedeki' gono daa' ine' monovolo' ogo eveneto' medelo mino inite' lehize-nedaa' anive naba minelesane lo ele'mize molani' ve.
