Ido' a'minemu' gamazi lo-lengemeloni' nene vai' goloso neine'za gatine gohi duu lo vivo nizani' ne'mo nene lo ngolo' lo lo-lengemelesa ge'nebe olosuve.

Ido' ge'nebe oloni' nene lingine Kilisito' evenele lili' igi gamene ha'na minani' nenako idise mene evene' ma mono' monovo apizi ngimilizado' i minilizanako ne'mine ami ve malite O'moso'mi gamazi nili-lingimavo gohi api' igi bina gili'mi gili'mi dizi alizado' mini mili mini mono' gamazi amuzo malehe ma gilami izipe amine naa' nani' ne'mine lapa nomine' gamazi neevo' nene gililizado' i nizani' ne'mo nene ge'nebe olosuve.
Ee, ingine amine naa' nave muki' nene ha izipe ngomo ne'mine nene nizanako ne'mo nene monovo lisiheli'mi gamazi've nene ningi di kegesami ladenivo' igi minaa' nave.

Ne neiha lute'mi amuzo malehe noso' nite've nalizani' nene lute gate do lamine' olone li di ningi' ningi' igi monovo lisihekisi golososi ningi di kegesisa monoku' lodive igi nizave engikovo' nene amuzo malehe noso' nite' ne'mine nene ha nalisave.

Nemu' nene lu'ine do ngi lo-ngedelingumu' ve li Kilisito' evenele idi'ne a'mene lili' ave gana' apizi ngimaa' ani' gamazi ado' lu'ine di velepe' izi labuluvo oga' akau' ngele'mize molaa' neine' monovo nene hulaakumu' gamazi nesi ido' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogali'mi gamazi nesi mono' noso holaa' monovo ato atokumu' apizi ngimaa' nani' gamazi nesi ido' a'ine evene' godo'nido' hitaa' nani' monovo ne'mi gamazi nesi ido' hele noloninguti' otaa' ne'mi gamazi nesi ido' O'moso'mo goni' o-ngedo lihime ngemelive mulumo alumo gili minivi' minivi' ilizani' gamazi nene gohi gelo gohi gelo minune' nene hulo gamazi monoku' do lodive o-ledeline' gamazi ma atokumukisi imine' molo gelo minelone.
Ido' gamazi gohi ma monoku' do lodive o-ledeline' gamazi mamu' imine' molo gelo gelo mineloningumu' nene mo O'moso'mo gele lemavo ma mo ne'mino imine' molo gelo minelone.

Mono' ne'mo ve ma ingine lu'ine hize labana' ele-ngedavo O'moso'mo eze evenele lehize-ngedaa' inite' nene lehize-ngedavo ne'mi lanite've gilaa' ido' O'moso'mi Sikalahu' engita ogavo minaa' ido' O'moso'mi gamazi nene lamine' neive li ne'mi lanite've gilaa' ido' alinge' gamene naba soto' iline' ne'mi amuzo engita soto' ivo lanite've gilaa' ave ingine ne'mine ve mono' mehe'ine imi hulilizani' ne'mo ingine O'moso'mi gipele nene lohoto' zalo' gohi bilani' gelavo evene' muki' eze di u'musupo lizi-dilizani' monovo di soto' ilizani' nenako ne'mine igi nizadoti' laza engi' nene lu'ine di velepe' izilizani' akau' ngelo ngele'mize tine' molamolosunako nemu' nene lutine di velepe' izilisave li gana' api' igi li-lingimaa' ani' gamazi bina nene hazamu' gohi lo gohi lo amo gamazi gohi mamu' imine' molo lo gelo minelone.

Ee, goline nene misubou' izeka' izeka' ivo misubo ne'mo ge'no nosa a'mine misubou' gono daa' ave nene do lamine' o-ngedeli noso' nite' nene do soto' oga' neine' misubo nene O'moso'mo no'noho' izo do lamine' oga' neine' ne'mino aza evene' ma engita eze gamazi limine' nene gili ne'mi gihile've monovo lamine' di soto' ilizave nene no'noho' ize-ngedaa' neive.

Ido' a'mine misubo ne'mo goline nene ge'no noosa a'mingu' nene gasavasi lilihe golosovo' do soto' iline' nene O'moso'mo a'mine misubo nene gohi ma do guno amoso' ogave lo usi' ize-delido' o neinako a'mine misubou' nene olo' enge vite' oloseinako nemu' nene O'moso'midati' gamazi nene engita lemavo mo gilisa monovo lamine' di soto' ami mudise mehe'ine imilizave nene mo oloku' vilisave.

Ne'mine ve nene oloku' vilisave luvoni'za lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' aleve lingine nene oloku' vaa' akalo' vilizave lo gele minosa noluvoba lengi' do lungu' izine' ne'mi gihile monovo lamine' nene lengita soto' o do vo minelive lo gele minosa nene noluve.

Lingine O'mosola lutine mili minadi'mo lingine ei' evenele nasahili' i-ngidaa' nani' monovotine nene lengita neivo ne'mine i di vi minaa' nani' ma neive. Ido' lingine ne'mine igi minaa' nangumu' nene O'moso aza gala molavo lengele'mize lamine' amidiniko eze nene monovo goloso oga' ive ne'mine minidine. Ne'mine idine'za monovo goloso oga' ive minesa'mine' nenako lingine ne'mine igi minaa' nangumu' nene gala molavo lengi' nene lengele'mize lamine' amilivoba ha lengele'mize lamine' oloseive.

O'moso'mo gamene nabala inite' lamine' lehize-ledeleseive li a'minemu' gapepe' igi minaa' nani' inite' nene dalizangisi lingine hamo hamo' a'mine igi mili minani' monovotine ne'minevo' nene igi mili mini amuzo mili minilizave lo gelo noluve.

Ido' evene' malite gosele' ngebelamivo O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi mini igi mili minaa' nani' aleve nene O'moso'mo eze evenele lemelove lo lo huko salani molo-lidine' inite' nene daa' nave. Lingine a'mine'mine igi monokumu' gosele' lengebelaa' ive lili' igi minami a'mine aleveti monovo'nido' nene nge'meti nivi igi mili minilizangumu' ve losa lingine O'moso'mi evenele nasahili' i-ngidi minani' monovotine ne'minevo' nene igi mili mini amuzo mili minilizave lo gelo noluve.

O'moso'mo salani molo-ngidine' inite' daa' nave luvoni' nene Abalahamu'ni salani gamazi lo molo-dine' nene gihile izingumu' luvoni' ve. Evene' eze O'moso ivile' ogo minive ma neivosa a'mine ve'mi gulivelo' salani gamazi lo huko lilive ma minamivo O'moso ei' gulivelo' salani gamazi ti' lo lo hukine':
Neni' nene no'noho' ize-gedekuvo
ga'vopilemo' vai' goloso soto' igi mini di vilisave losa
neni' noluve.

Ti' lo lo huko-dine' nenako a'mine nene geto gihile izamingumu' nene gosele' belamivo ha gele ele'vole' ogo gizebo ogo hazavo' neivo a'mine O'moso'mo lo huko-dine' gamazi nene Isaka'ni gedavosa api' ogo gihile izine'.

Evene' ingine nene gamazi lamine' nolune li engi' ngivile' ogo minive ei' gulivelo' likevo ne'mo evene' ingine lani' gamazilo' nene ve malitesi e'menga a'manga lisa'mave. Nemu' nene O'moso'mo gamazi lo hukine' nene ei' gulive'velo' lo huko line' ve.

Ee, O'moso ei' nene izipahala zuho leli' do lemelove lo lo hukine' initekumu' nene lulo do velepe' izo lemamilihe li gilikelizave losa a'mine line' gamazi nene mo lamine' lave li gililizangumu' nene amuzo molo gele mino ei' gulive'velo' lo huko line' ve.

Ido' inite' sita' a'mine gamazi lo huko line' nemukisi ido' a'mine gamazi lo huko lingu' nene ei' gulive'velokisi line' nemukisi nene aza lulo do velepe' izo mo amolosuve lo soza ngelo lamoloseive lo gelelone' ne'mo lute do amuzo goloso molo-ledavo laza alete molo-ledelive lo eze gizebo ingu' vo hulunive laza a'mine lo huko-lidine' inite' nene alinge' mo do soto' o-ledeleseive lo gapepe' ogo gizebo minaa' noune' nene hulamo do gili' lo do minelone losa a'mine gamazi nene ei' gulive'velo' lo huko-lidine' ve.

Ido' a'mine initekumu' gapepe' ogo gizebo minaa' noune' ne'mo nene lute do gili' lo-lede mino mo apasamiline' inite' sipi vo mala valive li di gili' li-daa' ani' inite' ne'minosa mo apasamiline' inite' nenako lute nene ngelo vo mala vamoloseive. Ee, mono' numuno nabau' nene O'moso'mi mo'mosi'veuko dizikelizave li evene' aka'ine hizi tili-ngidi lavolavo izi hukikani' nene di veseme' ili eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba ingine a'mine O'moso'mi mo'mosi've ve langu' dizaa' nani' ne'mine ogo a'mine O'moso'mo lo huko-lidine' initekumu' gapepe' ogo gizebo minaa' noune' lute gate ne'mo nene vo O'moso'mi mo'mosi've gihile neida nene nalava ize neine' gelavo none.

Ido' a'mine O'moso'mi mo'mosi've gihile neida nene Izesu' nesi nene Melekisedeki' gono daa' ine' monovolo' ogo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba lolo' ogosa leli' gamazite hize ele' olosa leli' nene gomu' molo lemo vo neive.

A'mine Melekisedeki' nene Salemi ebeku' guvelesi ve mino ido' eveneto' medelo mino veleta O'moso atoli'mine minive nene inite' lehize-daa' ive nesi lolo' ogo minine' ve. Ido' Abalahamu' aza guve'inesi ve ma minani' nene ngebele osu' lo tine' molo navo Melekisedeki' aza vavo akalo' di go'ine hizi Abalahamu'ni nene no'noho' ize-dine' ve.

Ne'mino Abalahamu'ni no'noho' ize-davo aza inite' mata've teni teni (10 10) ne'mine mininguti' Melekisedeki'ni hamo hamo' ma imine'. Ido' ei' gulive Melekisedeki' ne'mi monovo nene monovo've lisihekovo' ogo minine' guvelesi ve ve. Ido' ebe've gulive Salemi ne'mi monovo nene hongu monovo ve losa neine' nenako aza nene hongu monovo'vesi minaa' ine' guvelesi ve nene neive.

Ido' Aloni' monovo'velo' imine' mili eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nene lamine' Zakobo' gipele Levi' a'vopilemo' minani' nene ngelebizi avo'ninge ido' ize'ninge me'ningeliti gulive'ine li soto' ikevosavo' nene a'mine gonolo' ngele'mizi milaa' ani'za Melekisedeki' aza nene ne'minosa minamine' ve. Aza nene eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive minine'za mono' godolou' nene avolomote ido' izele mele neti gulive'ine nene gizavo ma gelamune. Ido' soto' ogo mine do ogo hiline' ne'mi monovo nesi gizavo gelamune' ne'mo Melekisedeki' nene minevo' minevo' ogovo' minine' gelavo O'moso'mi gipele ei' ne'mine mino eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive mine do vovo' vovo' ogo minaa' ive minine' ve.

Ido' Melekisedeki' aza nene evene' naba goloso minani' neine' nemu' mene gili'nalo: Avoteho naba minive Abalahamu' aza nene lovou' ngivile' ine' alevetidati' inite' teni teni (10 10) do anguti' Melekisedeki'ni nene hamo hamo' imine' ve.

Isilaele' aleve ma haza alevesi ido' Levi' a'vopilemo' linge ma eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave lili' ave nesi mukito' nene Abalahamu' a'vopilemo' mini hamo' zuho minani'za a'mine eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave ingine O'moso'mo lou' gamazi lido' nene e'meti engi' Isilaele' aleve linge ma inite' teni teni (10 10) di soto' iga' anguti' hamo hamo' nene daa' ani' ve. Ee, inite' ngimaa' ave ido' inite' daa' ave muki' nene mo Abalahamu' a'vopilemokovo' minani'za mo engitatikisi ha daa' ani' ve.

Ne neiha Melekisedeki' aza Levi' a'vopilemokuti' soto' amine' minine'za Abalahamu'nidati' inite' nene ha dani' ve. Ido' O'moso'mo salani gamazi lamine' Abalahamu'ni lo huko-daa' idi'mo nene evene' naba minine'za Melekisedeki' ne'mo nene no'noho' ize-dine' ve.

Ido' O'moso'mo salani gamazi lamine' nene Abalahamu'ni lo huko-daa' idi'mo nene Abalahamu' aza evene' naba goloso minine' nene gele none. Ne neiha Abalahamu' aza Melekisedeki'ni ivile' ogo naba minidiniko Melekisedeki' aza Abalahamu'ni nene no'noho' ize-delido' o minamidine. No'noho' ize-delido' o minamidine'za aza mo Abalahamu'ni no'noho' ize-dine' nenako Melekisedeki' aza nene Abalahamu'ni ivile' ogo minine' ve. Ee, ve mali'mo ve ma no'noho' ize-deline' nene no'noho' ize-dive nene dizo minavo no'noho' dave nene lemo mineleseive lo gele none' nene lamine' nenako malite soza gamazi ve li mo lamilisave. Nemu' nene Melekisedeki' aza Abalahamu'ni ivile' ogo minive minaani' neive lo gelelesune.

Ido' ma nene Levi' a'vopilemo' zuhouti' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nete evene'ineti inite' teni teni (10 10) mininguti' hamo hamo' daa' ave engi' nene hili vaa' ani' zuho nizave lo gele minelesune. Ne neiha a'mine'mine ogo evenetati' inite' daa' ive Melekisedeki' ei' nene hiline' ve li mono' godolou' gizamavo ne'mo Melekisedeki' nene helamo velesi hazavo' neine' giline' nemu' nene gelelone.

Naza giluvoni' mo ne'mine luvodine: Abalahamu' lovouti' inite' teni teni (10 10) do anguti' hamo hamo' Melekisedeki'ni imine' gameneu' nene Abalahamu' a'vopilemo' inite' teni teni (10 10) evenelite di minanguti' hamo hamo' daa' aveti avo'nibo Levi' nene olihe Abalahamudati' soto' amivo nenako azasi Abalahamukisi maka' mini a'mine inite' nene imasine' gelave. Nemu' nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave Levi' a'vopilemo' zuho nene Melekisedeki' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' gono daa' ine' ne'mo ngivile' ogo minine' ve.

Ido' O'moso'mo Mose'ni lou' gamazi've imingu' nene gamazi ma ti' lo lo-imine' ma lingine mo gili nizani' ma neive: Levi' a'vopilemokuti' O'moso neni' nimani' inite' eveneto' medeli mini lehizi-nidilizave lili' igi minilizave ingine nene a'mine lou' gamazilo' nene gizebo igi evene' ngele'mize akalo' ilizave. Ne'mine lo lo-imine' nenako nemu' nene a'mine eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nete evene' nene mudise ngele'mize akalo' ilizado' lisihe' gehepeve i minadiniko Levi' a'vopilemo' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive aza Aloni' gono daa' ine' ne'mino damo Melekisedeki' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' gono daa' ine' ne'mino daa' ive atoli'mine ogo minive Izesu'ni nene ma nanimu' do ote-didine. Levi' a'vopilemo' zuho ingine gono nene di pili di osu' ladiniko a'mine inite' lehize-daa' gono dalive gosoho' do ote-dive ne'mi gono've nene ma minamivo ma do ote-damidine.

Ido' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' gono daa' ave gomu' minado' nene medelo atoli'mine gosoho' soto' ogavo ma nene lou' gamazi nesi gosohokovo' soto' oloseinako nemu' nene gomu' lou' gamazi ne'mi gono've nene mo osu' lani' ve.

Ido' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive do ote-dingumu' atoli'mine ve ve luvoni' nene O'moso neni' nimani' inite' nene Melekisedeki' gono daa' ine' monovolo' e'meto lehize-nedaa' anive minevo' minevo' ogo minelesane lo O'moso'mo lo-dive nene Levi' a'vopilemo' zuhouti' soto' amo O'moso'mi holomolo' mili-dani' inite' lehize-daa' gono nene ma damaa' ave ato' zuhouti' soto' ogo minine' nenako nemu' nene luvoni' ve.

Ido' ato' zuhouti' soto' ive luvoni' nene Guvetesi ve aza Zuda' a'vopilemo' zuhouti' soto' ine' nene mukito' mo gele osu' lo none' nenako nemu' nene luvoni' ve. Ido' Mose' ne'mo lou' gamazi gizingu' nene Levi' a'vopilemo' zuhoutikovo' nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave lili' ilizave lo lo-ngidine'za Zuda' a'vopilemo' zuhoutikisi nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave lili' ilizave lo ma lo-ngedamine' ma neive.

Ido' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive atoli'mine soto' ine' nene lou' gamazi ma eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-dilizave nene Levi' a'vopilemo' zuhoutikovo' mini oko'ine laminekisivo' minilizavetevo' nene O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave lili' ilizave li lou' milado' nene lisihe' o nouve losa Levi' zuholiti gonolo' medelo soto' ine' nevoba asi minevo' minevo' ogo mino vo osu' lamaa' amuzo ezela miningumu' ve losa eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive Melekisedeki' gonolo' medelo soto' ine' nenako gomu' minine' lou' gamazi nene O'moso'mo do ato' ingumu' luvoni' gamazi nene ne'mo soto' ogavo mo lamineto' ningekune.

Ido' O'moso aza a'mine vemu' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-nedaa' anive lolo' ogo minevo' minevo' ogo minelesane lo lo-dine' gamazi ne'mo a'mine luvoni' gamazilo' nene vo daanako mo lamineto' lokuve.

Ido' O'moso'mo lou' gamazi gomu' minine' do ato' ine' ne'mi monovo nene ne'mino neive: A'mine lou' gamazi nene evene' hamokisi mudise lele'mize akalo' amivo evene' lisihe' lamine' minesa'mune' ne'mo amuzo've nomine' mino evene' hize ele' o-ledamivo O'moso'mo lavo a'mine lou' gamazi nene gohi minamine'. Ido' ne'mine ogo O'moso'mo a'mine eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive atoli'mine nene do soto' o-ledavo aza nene gomu' lou' nesi eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nesi nene ngivile' ogo lele'mize akalo' ogavo ne'mo lisihe' lamine' ogo O'mososi maka' minelonido' lisihe' ogavo ezela nene lehete ogo minaa' noune.

Ido' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive gosoho' atoli'mine nene O'moso'mo ele'mize nomolo a'mine gono do minevo' minevo' ogo minelesane lo ei' gulivelo' lo huko-damo haza do ote-dine' nevoba aza ei' gulive'velo' lo huko-do do ote-dine' ve. Ingine Levi' a'vopilemo' zuhouti' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave lili' ani' nene O'moso'mo ngele'mize nomolo lingine a'mine gono di minivi' minivi' ilisave lo ei' gulivelo' lo huko-ngedamivo haza di oti-ngidaa' ani'za
a'mine ve gosohokumu' nene mono' godolou' ti' lo minine' gamazi nene O'moso ei' gulivelo' lo lo huko-dine' ve:
Gaza nene eveneto' medelo mino O'moso neni' inite' lehize-nedaa' anive lolo' ogo
minevo' minevo' ogo minelesane lo Guvelesi ve O'moso aza ei' gulivelo' lo huko-dine' ne'mo
lulo ngelo do velepe' izo soza lamoloseive.

Ido' Izesu' aza minevo' minevo' ogo gono dalive lo O'moso'mo ne'mine ogo ei' gulivelo' lo huko do ote-dine' ne'mo leli' gele dalone' gamazi ve lo O'moso'mo minevo' minevo' gamazi lo huko-lidine' nene gihile izelingumu' hize ele' ilive izeleho nene Izesu' minavo ido' ne'mo nene a'mine idise lo huko-lidine' gamazi ne'mo gomu' aleve lo huko-ngidine' gamazi nene ivile' ogosa gamazi lamine' neive.

Ido' gomu' nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave minani' nene hilika' hilika' i'mi vaa' ani' ne'mo minivi' minivi' igi gono dalizado' minamavo evene' ato ato' muki' vai' nete nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave lili' ika' ika' i'mi vaa' ani' ve.
Ne'mine ani'za Izesu' aza helamo minevo' minevo' ogovo' mineline' nenako ezelo' medeli ma minamavo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' gono nene mo mudise dovo dovo' ogo mineleseive.

Nemu' nene Izesu' aza lelikumu' nene isete izelive lo O'mosola lo minevo' minevo' ogo minaa' neine' nenako Izesu'nimu' gele ele'vole' ogo O'mosola vo hulunive leli' nene Izesu' do lu' izo mudise lele'mize lamine' ilido' neive.

Ido' aza ne'mine ve'mo eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ivete naba mino goloso ogo minunidoti' lele'mize lamine' ilido' lisihe' o neine' nenako ha do lu' izo lele'mize lamine' oloseive. A'mine ve nene aza ve lamine' atoli'mine ogo mino lulo do gopo o-deline' inite' hamokisi eita ma nomine' mino lihime daa' nani' aleve ne'mino minamo atoli'mine gehepeve ogo mino okulumo' nesi ivile' ogo osu' lo dizosa neive.

Eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba ingine gamene gamene eveneliti lihime'ine apase-ngedelive li sipisipi nevo'mine inite' ngibili oloku' gizi O'moso lehizi-dilisa gomu' nene engi' lihime'ine apase-ngedelive li sipisipi ma ngibili O'moso imaa' nave. Izesu' aza dizosa mino engi' ngivile' ogo lihime'vesi nomine' lamine' minaa' neine' nenako ingine iga' adi'mine osa'mine' ve. Ei' nene gele ngemavo evenelite bili hilangu' asi've lulo oko'no've nene O'moso emavo leli' muki' lihimete nene mudise apase-ledelido' lisihe' ogavo ei' oko'no've nene gamene hamokovo' emavo osu' line' ma neive.

Ido' lelito' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ivete naba ne'mo gomu' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba minani' nene ngivile' ogo lamine' minive ve luvoni' nene ne'mino neingumu' luvoni' ve: Gomu' minine' lou' gamazilo' e'meti eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba minilizave di oti-ngidaa' ani' nene ha evene' muki' amuzote nomivo minaa' noune' ngemeni damenisi minave nene di oti-ngidaa' ani' ve. Ee, ne'mine vevo' di oti-ngidaa' ani'za O'moso'mo gomu' lou' gamazilo' medelo alinge' eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive mineline lo ei' gulive'velo' lo huko-dive ei' gipele nene do ote-dine' ve. Ido' a'mine gipele neve gopo haza neivosa do ote-dine' nevoba asi a'mine gono dalido' nene mudise do lisihe' o-davo neivosa nene do ote-dine' ve.

Gamazi noluvoni' ne'mi monovo ne'mino neingumu' nene gelelesune: Eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ivete naba ei' monovo've nene ne'mino neive lo lo-lingimuvoni' ma'mine monovo laminekisi minive nene lelikumu' soto' ogo neive. Aza nene O'mosoloti' lemo minive nenako Okulumokuko Guvelesi ve naba minive O'moso'mo gizebo ogo minaa' neine' mo'mosi'veuko nene ana hulaa' ida neive.

Ido' a'mida nene evenelite gizamani' numuno Guvelesi ve'mo do soto' molani' mono' numuno ne'mi avazahalo' seli numuno gele vine' mono' numuno avotemote gizi di monani' ne'mine mono' numuno lulou' gehepeve O'moso'mi mo'mosi've neingu' nene mino inite' O'moso lehize-daa' gono've nene do neive.

Ido' ne'mine gono do minaa' neine' nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave naba muki' di oti-ngidaa' nani' nene evene' O'moso imilisa di iga' nani' initekisi ido' lihimemu' sipisipi nevo'mine inite' ngibili oloku' gizi imilizave li di iga' nani' initekisi nene O'moso lehizi-dilizave li evene' di oti-ngidaa' nani' nenako nemu' nene azasi ne'mine gono do minaa' neive. Ido' ne'mine gono do neine' nenako nemu' nene azasi nene inite' O'moso ma lehize-delido' o minine' nenako mo nene lehize-dani' ve.

Ido' aza nene misubouko mene minidini Mose' gizine' lou' gamazilo' e'meti eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave nene mo minani' nenako aza nene eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive lolo' ilido' lisihe' amivo lolo' amidine.

Ingine misubouko eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' aveti mono' numuno'ine ido' gono daa' nani' nene Okulumokuko minani' initeliti avazaha ido' mumuno'inevo' nene minaa' nave. A'mine nene mono' numuno seli numuno gele vine' nene Mose' gizelesa neivo O'moso'mo Mose'ni ti' lo lo-imine' ma'mino nene neive: Gaza nene gololo' minusido' seli numuno gele vine' mono' numuno ido' a'mingu' miniliza inite' muki' neti avazaha gelebizuvoni' malo' nene e'meto ehe' ogo minosa do lamino lolo' ogo gizezo.

Ido' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave ingine gomu' gono daa' ani' nene Okulumokuko gono gihile minine' ne'mi avazahalo' nene daa' ani'za Izesu' nene a'mine gono gihile nene nodavo ne'mo gomu' daa' ani' gono nene ngivile' ogo hozila neive. Ido' gomu' aleve lo huko-ngidine' gamazi neu' nene O'moso'mo inite' lamine' o-ledelesa lo huko-lidine'za leli' lo huko-lidine' gamazi gosohoku' nene ivile' ogosa inite' lamine' goloso o-ledelesa lo huko-lidine' nenako Izesu' aza lelikisi O'mososi kuku holo-ledo gamazi hulo eza ema ogo leli' gele dalone' gamazi ve lo O'moso'mo lo huko-lidine' gamazi lo do ogo limine' ne'mo O'moso'mo gomu' aleve lo huko-ngidine' gamazi nene ivile' ogo neine' nene gele none. Ido' a'mine votigilelo' a'mine'mine ogo Izesu' gono do neine' ne'mo misubouko eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' avete gono di minaa' ani' nene ivile' ogosa lamine' neive.
Avotemote gili dalizani' gamazi ve lo lo huko-ngidine' gamazi ne'mo gono davo vo gihile ma izidiniko a'midoti' nene leli' gili dalizani' gamazi ve lo gosoho' ma do soto' ogo lo huko-ledamidine.
Ne'mine amidine'za avotemote igi mili iga' ani' monovo'ine goloso nene do soto' o-ngedosa Guvelesi ve'mo line' gamazi ma mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Guvelesi ve'mo ti' lo lave:
Gililo. Isilaele' zuhoti muliseukisi Zuda' zuhoti muliseukisi nene
gili dalizani' gamazi gosoho' ma lo huko-ngedo do soto' oloni' gamene nene
alinge' ma soto' oloseive.
A'mine gili dalizani' gamazi gosoho' ma lo huko-ngedeloni' nene
avo'ningine Aigita misubouti' ngele'mizo novosa gili dalizave lo
lo huko-ngiduvoni' gamazilo' nene e'metamadi'mo ingine nene
ninge mate-ngedo minuvoni' nenako ne'mo nene gomu'
lo huko-ngiduvoni' gamazi ma'minosa lo huko-ngedamo
atoli'mine ogo lo huko-ngedelesuve lo
Guvelesi ve'mo gohi ti' lo line':
Alinge' a'mine noluvoni' gamene nene ogavo neloti'
alinge' nene Isilaele' a'vopilemo' zuho mukilite gili dalizani' gamazi
ato' gohi ma lo huko do soto' o-ngedelesuve.
A'mine lo huko-ngedeloni' gamazi nene ne'mino neive:
Neni' lo huko loloni' gamazi muki' nene engi' ga'ningu' molo-ngedo
lu'ningu' nene luhuvo gizekelesuve. Ne'mine ogo engi' O'moso'ine lolo' ogo nouvo ingine nene
neni' evene'ne zuho lili' igi minilisave.
Ne'mine igi evene' dizi minani' limi minani' muki' nene
nenikumu' gili osu' li gili nilizani' nenako ve malite ingine zuho ga'ine di
Guvelesi vemu' gili minilo li ma li-ngidamilisave.
Ido' ne'mino lo huko-ngedeloni' nene goloso inite' dangumu' nene
ise'ine ize-ngedosa a'mine lihime'inemu' nene
gohi ga'ne gelamolosuvonako nemu' Isilaele' aleve nene
a'mine luvoni' gamazi nene lo huko-ngedelesuve lo Guvelesi ve'mo line'.
Ido' gili dalizani' gamazi nene gosoho' lo huko-ngedelesuve line' nenako ne'mo gomu' lo huko-ngidine' gamazi nene mo litehe iline' ne'mo nene mo geto vo haleke gehepeve ilido' ogave.

Ido' a'mine gamazi gomu' lo huko-ngidine' nene O'moso gubi' izi imi opo'ni laa' ido' inite' oloku' gizi imaa' nemu' nene lou' gamazi'vesi minivo minine' ve. Ido' a'mine lo huko-ngidine' gamazi nemu' nene misubouko mene mono' numuno ma minine' ve.

Ee, seli numuno gele vine' mono' numuno nene mo gizi di otani' ve. A'mine mono' numungu' gana' lumu izi hukikangu' nene lamu livi' di badaa' ani' zavasi ido' O'moso lehizi-di velelo' mili-dani' beleti nesi ido' tevoli'vesi nene minaa' ine' ve. A'mine izi hukikani' lumu nene kekeize lo minine' numuno lulo ve laa' ani' ve.
Ido' oduvo numuno lulo gohi ma izi hukiki lavolavodunu' izi tilikani' nemu' nene mo kekeize atoli'mine lo minine' numuno lulo ve likevo minaa' ine' ve.

A'mine numuno lulou' nene unuvo lamine' oga' ine' inite' O'moso gizi imaa' ani' holomo ngolidunu' lili' ani' nesi ido' evene' gili dalizave lo lo huko-ngidine' gamazi milikani' bokisi ngolidunu' asabu' izi lili' ani' nesi ido' a'mingu' go'zikani' inite' nene Okulumokuti' ngimine' noso' nite' gulive mana minine' somo ngolidunu' lili' ani' nesi ido' Aloni' hatuso sisive ho'line' hatuso've nesi ido' O'moso'mo lo huko-ngidine' gamazi luhuvo gizine' geheni nesi nene minaa' ani' ve.

Ido' a'mine bokisi veleto' nene inite' sita' ma evene' godo'ine ne'mino mino holoke'ne'inesi minasine' inite' gulive kelubu avazahalo' lili' ani' inite' nene minaa' asine'. Kelubu ingine hela hela mini holoke'ne'ine di pateli di hozi li hiti nizasivo oluso' nene O'moso'mo evene' lihime'ine apase-ngedaa' ine' mo'mosi've nene minine'. Ido' minine' nenako a'mine kelubu minasido' nene O'moso'mi labanala nene soto' ogo minaa' ine' ve. Ido' a'mine inite' neti monovo nene ato ato' vai' neine' nenako a'minemu' imine' molo gohi ma lo-lengemelodo' nomive.

Ido' a'mine inite' nene di va'va' igi osu' likevo eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave ingine mono' gono'ine nene nidi a'mine mono' numungu' gana' izi hukikani' numuno lulou' nene gamene gamene dizaa' naha

a'midoti' numuno lulo gohi ma izi hukikangu' nene eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba ne'movo' nene kilisimasilo' kilisimasilo' gamene hamokovo' dizaa' neive. Ido' dizeli gamene nene ei' lihime'vesi eveneliti lihime'inesi nene O'moso'mo apase-ledelingumu' ve lo ato ato' izeliti vanisesi nene damo dizo vaa' ine' nevoba ha do-dosavo' nene a'mingu' dizo vaa' ine' ve.

Ne'mine oga' ine' nenako neloti' nene ti' lo gelelesune: Gana' izi hukani' numuno lulo nene vo goloso amo hazavo' neivo ma numuno lulo gohi ma O'moso'mi kekeize atoli'mine lo minine' numuno lulo ve li izi hukikavo akalo' tile minine' lavolavo nesi nene ha mineline' nenako O'moso neida volone' akate nene olihe do soto' o-ledamive lo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo lelebizavo gelelesune.

Ido' mono' numuno ado' seli numuno gele vine' nesi ido' a'mingu' igi mili di soto' ani' inite' nene idise gameneu' igi mili iga' nani' inite' neti avazaha'ine do soto' ogavo ne'mi monovo ti' lo noningune: A'mingu' nene inite' ma O'moso imi ido' sipisipi nevo'mine inite' ngibili lihimete apase-ledelive li oloku' gizi O'moso imi minaa' nani'za ne'mo ne'mine iga' aveti lu'ine nene ma do lisihe' lamine' o-ngedesa'mive.

Ido' lu'ine do lamine' o-ngedesa'mine' nene oko'inevo' do lamine' o-ngedeline' lou' gamazilokovo' nene e'meti minaa' ani' nenako ne'mo lu'ine nene do lisihe' lamine' o-ngedesa'mive. Ee, a'mine lou' gamazi nene noso' nite' ido' noso avoso nalizangumu' ido' ato ato' monovomu' nosou' ingi oko'ine noso izi hulilizangumu' ido' nevo'mine initekumukovo' nene gamazi li gizi Kilisito' monovo gosoho' do soto' ogo inite' muki' do lamine' ilidokovo' nene mino osu' loloseive li gizi nizani' ve.

Ido' Kilisito' nene eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba mono' inite' lamine' idi'ne O'mosolati' soto' o'mo novine' nene do soto' ive lolo' ogo mo ogave. Aza nene mono' numuno ado' seli numuno gele vine' nene ivile' ogo lamine' goloso mino ido' ei' gono dalido' lisihe' gehepeve o minine' mono' numuno nene evenelitesi lili' amani' asi mo mene misuboukosi ma minamine' mono' numunomu' noluve. Aza a'mingu' nene dizo gono do

meme' ize ido' bulumaka' angale neti vanise nene a'mida do vamo ei' vanise've nene gamene hamokovo' mudise O'moso'mi mo'mosi've kekeize lo minida do vo minine' ve. Ido' ne'mine ine' ne'mo goloso ogo minunidoti' nene mudise do lu' izo O'mosola tine' molo vo minelone' akate vele-lidine' ve.

Ido' meme' ize ido' bulumaka' neti vanisemu' luvoni' nene monokumu' kekeize lani' inite' dikevosa monoku' dizilizani' akatine nene hize tile-lengedo okodida sihononi ne'mine inite' hiteline' nene gilite-lengedelive li meme' izeliti vanisesi ido' vemoho' bulumakaliti vanisesi ido' alungo bulumaka' gizi'votani' ne'mi lenehe've nesi nene O'moso imikevosa ne'mo okodida sihononi ne'mine hiteline' nene do hulavo lamine' oga' neine' nenako nemu' nene luvoni' ve.

Ido' neve nene inite' ngomoli'mo okodida sihononi ne'mine hitine' nene do lamine' oga' neine' nenako inite' naba Kilisito' vanise've ne'mo monovotine goloso labuluvo oga' akau' lengele'mize molaa' neine' neti lihime lutine gatingu' nene gilite hulo-lengedo minevo' minevo' O'moso gelekele' i-di gubi' izi imi minilizado' nene do lisihe' o-lengedelido' nene mo lisihe' gehepeve o neive. Ee, O'moso'mi minevo' minevo' Sikalahu've ne'mo Kilisito'ni hize ele' o-davo aza oko'nolo' lihime hamokisi minamine' mino oko'no've hulo O'moso imine' nenako ne'mo nene leli' lute do lamine' o-ledelido' lisihe' o neive.

Ido' Kilisito' vanise've ne'mo lihimete muki' gilite hulo-ledaa' neine' nenako Izesu' aza nene evenekisi O'mososi kuku holo-ledo gamazi hulo eza ema ogo leli' gele emelone' gamazi ve lo gosoho' gamazi O'moso'mo lo huko-lidine' nene do ogo limive lolo' ogo neive. Ido' ne'mine ine' nene O'moso'mo izipahala zuho minilizave lo elese molo-ledo lele'mize molave leli' nene minevo' minevo' inite' lemelove lo lo huko-ledo salani molo-lidine' inite' daloningumu' ve losa ne'mine ine' ve. Ee, O'moso'mo gomu' lo huko-lidine' gamazi nene avuto' ogo lihime duningumu' a'mido' golo hizo Izesu' hiline' ne'mo nene a'mine lihime nene apase-lidine' nenako ne'mo nene a'mine salani molo-lidine' inite' dalone' aka nene ngolo' lo neinako ha dalosune.

Ee, Izesu' nene ma helamidiniko O'moso'mo salani molo-lidine' initekisi ido' leli' dalizave lo lo huko-lidine' gamazisi nene gihile izelido' minamidine. Lingine mo gili nizave. Evene' malite alinge' hililizangumu' leli' monovolo' e'meti luhuvo ti' li gizi milaa' nave: Laza helekunivo ma mene alevete leli' initete nene dalizave li a'mine inite' dalizangumu' li huki-ngidani' gamazi nene luhuvou' gizi milaa' nave. Ido' a'mine inite'ine dalizangumu' luhuvo gizani' nene gizave hilikevo ne'movo' nene a'mine li huki-ngidani' gamazi nene gihile izelido' vo lisihe' iline' nenako nemu' nene luhuvo gizave hilami ve'inesi ha nizavo ma nene a'mine gamazi nene olihe gihile izamo ha minaa' neive. Nemu' nene ve mali'mo ne'mine luhuvo gize molosa mino helavo ma inite've dalizave ingine a'mine luhuvo gizive nene mo helanako luhuvo gizido' e'meto inite've ma nene ha dalosune lilisave. Lilisaha helave lilizani' gamazi nene mo lamineto' lahe ido' soza lahe nemu' nene gomu' ningi gilikevosavo' nene a'mine dalizave line' inite' nene ha dalisave. Helaa' ne'mo li hukaa' nani' gamazi nene do amuzo molaa' neive. Nemu' nene Izesu' aza helamidini O'moso'mo salani molo-lidine' initekisi' ido' leli' dalizave lo lo huko-lidine' gamazisi nene gihile izelido' minamidine.

Ido' helaa' ne'mo li hukaa' nani' gamazi nene do amuzo molaa' neine' nenako nemu' a'mine'mine ogo O'moso'mo gomu' lo huko-ngidine' gamazi nene haza do amuzo molani' nevoba helaa' ne'movo' nene do amuzo molani' ve. Do amuzo molani' nene bulumaka' ngibili hilikevo neti vanise'ine ne'mo a'mine gomu' lo huko-ngidine' gamazi nene do amuzo molani' ve.

Ee, a'mine lou' gamazi mininguti' gamazi godolo godolola nene Mose' lo soto' ogo evene' lo-ngemavosa ingine nene bulumaka' ma ngibilikevo Mose' aza vanise'ine do nososi do gopo ogo unuvo oga' ine' za ngomo ma gulive hisopu ve lo minine' ne'mi a'nava ma do a'mido' nene sipisipi zopovo gulehedunu' nene likosa vaniseu' nene lupizoo a'mine lou' gamazi'mi luhuvolokisi ido' a'mida evene' mukitokisi nene hibi' izo nohulo-ngedo

gamazi ti' lo line': Vanise mene O'moso'mo lou' gamazi gili dalizave lo lo huko-lingidine' nene do amuzo molaa' neine' vanise ma neive. Ido' Mose' ne'mine ine' nenako nemu' O'moso'mo gomu' lo huko-ngidine' gamazi nene vanisedunu' di amuzo mili-dani' ve luvoni' nene mo lamineto' luvoni' ve.

Ido' Mose' aza luhuvosi evenekisi vanise hibi' izo hulo-ngidine' ne'mino mono' numuno ado' seli numuno gele vine' nesi ido' O'moso opo'ni li gubi' izi imaa' angu' nene lapese gomise mite' inite' muki' a'mingu' milikevo minido' nesi vanise hibi' izo huline' ve.

Ido' gomu' lo huko line' lou' gamazi neu' nene naza luvoni' evenekisi ido' luvoni' initekisivo' nevoba inite' muki' gidini ne'mine ma goloso ilizahe lihime dalizahe ilizani' nene initeliti vanisedunu' nene do lamine' olosane lo lo hukine' ma neive. Ido' a'mine gomu' lo huko line' gamazi neu' nene ize nevo'mine gana' ma bili vanise'inedunu' nene hibi' izi O'moso'mi holomo'velo' hulamani' nene lihime nene mo keke' apase-ngedesa'mine' ve.

Ee, gomu' lou' gamazi ne'mo ne'mine ilizave lo lo neine' nenako nemu' a'mine seli mono' numuno nesi a'mingu' inite' muki' nesi nene Okulumoku' minine' avazahalo' lili' ani' inite' nene luvodi'mine igi bulumaka' ngibili O'moso imi vanisedunu' nene hibi' izi-ngidi di kekeize lilisave. Ne'mine ilisaaha misubouko mene avazaha inite' do lamine' o-ngedelive li bulumaka' ngibili vanise'ine hibi' izi hulaa' nani' nene Okulumoku' inite' do lamine' o-ngedelido' lisihe' o mineline' inite' ne'mo ngivile' ogo lamine' goloso mineleseive.

Ido' nene nanitekumu' luvoni' neve. Kilisito' aza mono' numungu' dizine' nene evenelite lili' igi di kekeize lani' mono' numuno ado' Okulumokuko minine' ne'mi avazahalo' minine' mono' numungu' nene dizine' nevoba asi mo Okulumoku' gehepeve nene dizo leli' hize ele' o-ledelesa O'moso'mi velelo' vo neive.

Ido' dizine' nene Zuda veti eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba aza ei' vanise've do dizamo ize ato atoliti vanise'ine nene O'moso'mi kekeize atoli'mine lo minine' numuno lulo'veu' nene kilisimasilo' kilisimasilo' do dizo O'moso lehize-deka' lehize-deka' oga' ine' ne'mine nene ei' Kilisito' ilido' o minidiniko O'moso'mo misubo do soto' idoti' api' ogo gamene muki' oko'no hulo'mo ogo mulumo geleka' geleka' ogovo' minidine'za a'mine Zuda veti eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba'mo oga' ine' ne'mine ilido' minamine' nenako nemu' aza gamene muki' eze oko'no hulo vanise've lepo O'moso lehize-deka' lehize-deka' ogo minelesa dizine' nevoba asi O'moso'mo molani' gamene nene osu' lolosa neivo Kilisito' aza gamene hamokovo' ei' oko'no nene hulo vanise've lepo O'moso lehize-do lihimete nene mudise hulo-ledelesa soto' ine' ve.
Ido' O'moso'mo lido' ogo evene' laza gamene hamokovo' helosa O'moso'mo goni' o-ledelido' volosunako

Kilisito' aza a'mine'mine ogo evene' mukiliti lihime geho oko'no've hulo hiline' nenako alinge' gohi aline' nene lihimetemu' amo eikumu' gizebo nonive nene mudise do lu' izo lele'mize lamine' olosa aloseive.

Ido' gomu' lou' gamazilo' e'meti ize ato ato' ngibili O'moso lehizi-dikevo ne'mi gihile've inite' lamine' soto' o ngemaa' neine' nene alinge' inite' lamine' lelita soto' o lemeline' nene inite' gihile ne'mine engita nene ma soto' o ngemesa'mine' ve. Asi mo alinge' soto' o-ledeline' inite' neti avazaha ne'minevo' nene soto' o ngemaa' neine' nenako ingine nene kilisimasilo' kilisimasilo' lihimete apase-ledavo lisihe' lamine' mineloningumu' ve li ize ato ato' di igi ngibili O'moso lehizi-dika' lehizi-dika' igi minaa' nani' ne'mo ngelo do lisihe' lamine' gehepeve o-ngedesa'mine' nenako nemu' nene a'mine inite' nene O'moso lehizi-dika' lehizi-dika' igivo' minaa' nave.

Ee, ne'mine iga' nani' ne'mo lihime'ine apase-ngedo mudise do lisihe' gehepeve o-ngididiniko a'mine inite' O'moso imi gubi' izi imaa' nave ingine nene lihimete nomine' minelesune li ize ngibili O'moso lehizi-dika' lehizi-dika' nani' nene huli alamadine.

Ne neiha vemoho' bulumaka' neti vanisesi meme' ize neti vanisesi ne'mo nene eveneliti lihime'ine nene apase osu' lo-ngedamilido' nenako kilisimasilo' kilisimasilo' ingine ne'mine inite' ngibili vanise'ine nene O'moso lehizi-daa' nani' ne'mo lihime dani' mamu' nene gohi gili oko'nido' gilaa' nave.
Nemu' nene Kilisito' misubouko mene lemelesa noogo mono' godolou' melehine lo imine' gamazi ma ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Gaza evene' isaa' neve li ize ato ato' bili gimi ido'
inite' gohi ato ato' nene gimika' gimika' igi minilizave lo gelamo
neni' nene gelekele' o-gedelongumu' ve lo
oko'ne nene do va'va' ogo molo-nedane.
Ee, ize ma bili oloku' gizi' voti gimi ido'
lihime apase-ngedelive li ize ngibili
vanise'ine gimaa' nani' nemu' nene lanite' gelesa'manivosamu'
ti' lo lo-gimuvoni' ve: O'mosoo, gelezo.
Naza mono' godolou' nenikumu' lou' gamazi gizi nizani' malo'
nene e'meto gei' lukalo' do molo gelekele' o-gedelesa uvoni' ve.

Ido' Mose' lou' gamazi'mo lido' e'meti iga' nani' initekumu' Kilisito' aza O'mosomu' line' nene ize ato ato' bili gimi ido' ato ato' inite' nesi isaa' neve li gimi ido' lihime apase-ngedelive li ize bili gizi' voti gimaa' nani' nene lanite' gelamosa nimika' nimika' igi minilizave lo gelesa'mane loosa

neloti' nene gei' lukalo' do molo gelekele' o-gedelesa uvoni' ve lo Izesu' lidi'mo lihimetemu' ize belo O'moso emaa' monovomu' nene gana' line' gamazi nene do hulo O'moso'mi lulolo' do molo gelekele' o-daa' monovomu' alinge' line' gamazi nene do otine' ve.
Ido' Kilisito' aza O'moso'mi lulolo' e'meto leli' mukikumu' nene gamene hamokovo' oko'no hulo helo O'moso imine' ne'mo lute do lisihe' o-ledo O'moso gelekele' o-do minelone' evenele lolo' o-ledave.

Ido' eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave muki' ingine nene go' laneme go' laneme mono' gono'ine nene di mini ize ato ato' ngibili gamene gamene hamo' initekovo' igi O'moso imi'mi vi minaa' nani'za eveneliti lihimete nene apase-ledelido' lisihe' amine' initekovo' imaa' nave.

Ingine ne'mine iga' nani'za Kilisito' aza gamene hamokovo' oko'no hulo helo O'moso imine' ne'mo eveneliti lihimete nene mudise apase-ledelido' vo daavosa O'mosolati' lemo minive ei' mo'mosi've O'moso'mo ana hulaa' ida neido' a'mida vo neive.

Ee, eze oko'no hulo helo mo gamene hamokovo' O'moso imine' ne'mo O'moso gelekele' o-do minelone' evenele nene mo mudise do lisihe' lamine' gehepeve o-lidine' nenako nemu' nene oko'no've gohi gohi hulo helo O'moso emamo vo O'moso'mo ana hulaa' ida ei' mo'mosi'velo' mino neloti' nene ei' Kilisito'ni biluva' i-daa' ave nene gelekele' i-dilizave lo O'moso'mo gizeneuko do'mo leme-ngedelingumu' nene gizebo o neive.
Ido' a'mine luvoni' gamazi nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mosi hize ele' ogave. A'mine Sikalahuli'mo ei' gamazi've lo-limine' mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Guvelesi ve'mo ti' lo line':
Gamene muluvoni' nene ogavo alinge' evene' mukilite gili dalizani'
gamazi gosoho' gohi ma lo huko do soto' o-ngedeloni' gamazi nene
ne'mino neive: Naza lo huko do soto' o-ngedeloni' gamazi nene
lu'ningu' molo-ngedo ido' ga'ningu' nene luhuvo ne'mine gize-ngedekuvo
mineleseive.
Ido' ne'mine lo neloti' alinge' gamazi gohi ma ti' lo line':
Ido' evene' engita lihime minine' mamu' nesi ido'
lou' gamazi avuto' iga' nani' mamukisi nene
gohi ga'ne gelamolosuve.
Ido' O'moso'mo lihimete muki' nene apaso osu' lo-ledavo ma nene lihimete apase-ledelive lo lihimetemu' ize ato atoli'mine belo oloku' gize emaa' une' ma nene gohi ma amolosune.

Nemu' nene neze zuho lingine Izesu' vanise lepo helo O'moso imine' ne'mo lihimete nene mudise apase-lidine' nenako nemu' nene golise gelamo O'moso'mi kekeize atoli'mine lo minine' numuno lulou' nene ha vo dizelonido' o neive.

Ee, Izesu' eze oko'no hulo hiline' ne'mo O'moso'mi kekeize atoli'mine lo minine' numuno lulou' nene evene' dizikelizave li mono' numuno nabau' lavolavodunu' akate hizi tili-limikani' nene mudise bele ngolo' lo-ledo O'mososi bizo minelone' aka gosoho' ele'vole' ogo minevo' minevo' iline' nene vele-ledave.
Ido' lelito' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ivete nene aza evene' naba mino O'moso'mi evenele zuho leli' nene gizebo o-lede neive.

Nemu' nene eveneto' medeli mini O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ave ngele'mize milalizangumu' a'mine ve nene di lamine' i-ngidi oko'nido' nene vanisedunu' hibi' izi huli-ngidi ido' noso' izi-ngidaa' ani' ne'mino aza leli' lute nene ei' vanise'vedunu' hibi' izo hulo-ledo a'mingu' monovo goloso minine' nene do hulo-ledo ido' okode nene noso laminedunu' noso ize-lidine' gelavo mino lute lisihe' lamine' minidi'mo O'moso golo izamo ido' gate seta' gelamo ezemu' gele ele'vole' goloso ogo O'mosola ogo ezesi bizo minuke'zo.

Ido' O'moso'mo inite' muki' ha olosuve line' inite' nene mo lamineto' oloseive lo mo gele none' ma nenako laza gele ele'vole' ogo O'moso'mo lemelove lo lo neine' initekumu' gizebo ogo minaa' noningumu' lo soto' oga' noune' nemu' nene golise gelo hulamo do gili' lo do minelone.

Ne'mine ogo lute ngemo nasahili' o-ngedaa' monovo ido' nevo'mine gono lamine' ato ato' daa' monovo lamine' nene lelita amuzo molo minelive lo ge luka do ote-gede ne lu'ne do ote-nede lolone' akamu' nene vise' ogo ningo ogo molo minelone.

Ido' evene' malite monokumu' do gese' oga' monovo hulaa' nani' ne'mine igi lingine hulami monokumu' di gese' i'mi vi mini monoku' ge hize ele' o-nede ne hize ele' o-gede li minilo. Gamene naba mo avito' navo lingine mo ningi gili nizani' nenaze. Nemu' nene lingine mo ge hize ele' o-nede ne hize ele' o-gede livi' livi' igivo' minilo.

Ido' laza Kilisito' gamazi've gihile laminekumu' nene mo gelo e'meto minaa' noolonivete lihime daa' initekumu' nene mo amolone' inite' neive lamo lihime doso' ne'mo Kilisito' vanise've lepo helo lihimete apase-ledeline' aka vele-lidingumu' nene o've lune' geleleseive. Ido' laza lihime daa' akalo' gohi volone' ne'mo O'moso'mo lihimete apase-ledeline' aka nene Kilisito' vele-lidingumu' nene o've lune' gelavo a'mine lihimetemu' golo hizo O'moso lehize-delone' inite' gohi ma minamoloseinako a'mine lihimete nene O'moso'mo ha do mineleseive.

Ido' a'mine lihime'ine do minelive nene O'moso biluva' i-daa' nanako aza olo' goloso lo neine' oloku' ngimiselavo a'mingu' vi tolovo ilizani' nenako laza golise volone' akate ato' ma nominako nemu' laza lihime daa' akalo' gohi ma volone' nene lehelele izivo golise goloso gelo O'moso'mo lihime lemo oloku' hulo-ledo ne'mine o-ledeline' gamenemukovo' nene gizebo ogo minelesune.

Ido' Mose' lou' gamazi avuto' ave nene mo ise'ine izisa'mani' ve. Ve malite a'mine lou' gamazi avuto' ani' nene evene' sitape sitohamolite he ningi goniku' li soto' i-ngidikevo a'mine lou' gamazi avuto' ave nene lihime ngimi ngibili hilaa' nave.

Ee, Mose' lou' gamazi've nene mo gili e'meti minaa' niigisa a'mine lou' nene ma avuto' ani' nene ngibili hilaa' ani' nenako Mose'ni ivile' ogo minive O'moso'mi gipele aza O'moso'mo lo huko-lidine' gamazi gosoho' nene do amuzo molo ido' engi' lu'ine do lamine' o-ngedo O'moso'mi evenele lolo' o-ngedo vanise've lepo hilingumu' gilikevo haza inite' ogavo eze nene lisi hupi' izi-dii ido' leli' nasahili' o-ledaa' ive O'moso'mi Sikalahu' nene di u'musupo lizi-dilizave nene Mose' lou' gamazi avuto' ikevo lihime'inemu' ngibili hilaa' nani' nene ivile' ivosa lihime nabalo' goloso ngemeleseive.
Mono' godolou' gizani' gamazi ma ti' lo livemu' mo gele none:
Lihime ngemaa' gono nene neni' gono nenako
lihime nene neni' ngemelesuve.
Ido' ma nene:
Guvelesi ve'mo zasi gono do eze evenele ize' molo-ngedeleseive.
Ido' a'mine gamazi live nene O'moso'mo line' nenako nemu' nene Izesu' monovo danavamu' mo gili minisasi avuto' iga' nave nene lihime ngemo mo ngebeleleseive losa mo gele none.

Nemu' nene laza ne'mino lihime do minelonidoti' lebelaa' amuzo'vesi minive minevo' minevo' O'moso'mi anau' alone' nene lihime atoli'mine ogo lemeleseinako agae mo nehelele goloso izo live. Nemu' nene lihime akau' vaalone lo ge hize ele' o-nede ne hize ele' o-gede lovo' lovo' ogovo' minelone.

Gomu' gameneu' lingine minani' monovomu' gatine molalize. A'minemu' gohi gili minilo. A'mine gameneu' nene Izesu'nimu' gilikevo ne'mo lutingu' hize labana' elavo minani' ne'mo goboni mala' mala' i-lingidi nizavo mulumo alumo gili'mi vi minisasi Izesu' mono've nene hulami amuzo mili di minani'.

Ee, gamene ma nene evene' mukiliti ve'nido' di oti-lingidi gamazi goloso li-lingidi di goloso i-lingidaa' ani' ve. Ido' gamene ma nene lingine zuhola a'mine suno nene soto' noo-ngidivo linginesi a'mingu' vi makato' a'mine geni nene gihaa' ani' ve.

Ne'mine noluvoni' nene Izesu'ni biluva' i-daa' avelite henenitine inite' matatine ipe' igi di vikevo lingine nene laza a'mine heneni nene ivile' ogo minine' lute'mi minevo' minevo' iline' heneni nene ha molo none li gili longolize izi ningi mati-ngimikavo dii vaa' ani' ve. Ido' lingine zuho Izesu' evenele linge nala' numungu' minani' nene mulumo'ine gili nasahili' i-ngidaa' ani' nemu' nene noluve.

Ee, lingine gomu' nene lengita geni inite' ato ato' muki' soto' ivo a'mingu' amuzo mili gili ele'vole' igi minani' nenako ne'mi gihile've dalizangisi idise lengehelele izavo a'mine gili ele'vole' ani' nene hulikelizaze. Ha gili ele'vole' igi di minilo. O'moso'mo lemelove lo salani molo-lidine' inite' nene dalone li ma a'mine geni inite' soto' o-lengemelinguti' nene olovo' igi limi ingami amuzo mili gili ele'vole' igivo' minilizani' nenako nemu' nene a'mine gili ele'vole' ilizani' monovotine nene hulami di gili' li di minilo. Amuzo mili gili ele'vole' igi minilizani' nene O'moso'mo menitine naba lengemeleseive.
Ido' geni lengebelelingu' nene olovo' ami ha amuzovo' mili gili ele'vole' igi minilizani' nene mono' godolou' Izesu' geto alingumu' ti' li gizi nizani' nenako nemu' ne'mine ilizave:
A'mine aloseive lave nene gamene ha'na ne'mine minosa alivoba
aline' gamene've nene mo li'nibe o neive.
Ido' O'moso'mo ti' lo line':
Ne'mine o neiha neze evene'ne zuho lu'ine lisihekisi minani' nete
nenikumu' gili ele'vole' igivo' minilizani' ne'mo
hazavo' ele'vole' igi ve'inesi mini-di vii minilisani'za
gili ele'vole' igi mini-di vilizanguti'
ve ma ingine olovo' igi velepe' izi vilizani' nene
naza mo lu'neu' goloso gehepeve gelelesuve.

Ne'mine lo line'za laza nene evene' ma ingine gili ele'vole' igi mini di vanguti' olovo' igi velepe' izi vii vi tolovo iga' nave ne'mine evene' minamo laza nene gele ele'vole' ogo mino mine do dizo minaa' lemeni dameni do minelonive nene none.

Gele ele'vole' oga' monovo nene ne'mino neive: Laza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' o noo ma aza lemelove lo salani molo-lidine' initekumu' gizebo o none' nene olihe damo ido' a'minesi nene ma ningamune' nenako nomihe ido' lemamilihe lo gate sita' gelamo a'mine inite' nene mo ha noloseinako lemavo dalosune lo a'minemu' nene gele ele'vole' ogovo' minelesune.
Ido' O'moso'mi evenele gomu' minani' nete a'mine'mine igi gili ele'vole' igi minaa' ani' nemu' nene O'moso'mo inginemu' ninge lamine' daa' ine' ve.

Ido' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' o none' ne'mo okulumoku' ido' misubouko inite' mata' muki' soto' ogo neine' nene O'moso'mo lavosavo' soto' ogo neine' nene mo gele none. Ido' ningaa' noune' inite' mata' muki' nene ningesa'mune' initedunu' do soto' molani' nenako nesi nene mo gele none.

Ido' Adamu' gipele Kainiki Abeliki ingine inite' oloku' gizi O'moso imasinguti' Abeli' aza nene O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo uvoloho Kaini'ni nene ivile' ogosa monovolo laminekisi minidoti' inite' lamine' oloku' gize imine' ve. Ne'mine ogavo O'moso aza mo lamine' ve lo dani' nenako ne'mo Abeli' aza ve lisihe' minine' nene mo lelebizavo ningo nogilune. Ido' Abeli' aza nene mo helani' ma neine'za O'mosomu' ne'mino gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo gamazi've nene ha minivo gelaa' noune.

Ido' gozopo' aka'mila Enoku' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo olihe helamivo O'moso'mo ele'mize do vine' ve. Ido' ele'mize do vine' nenako ezemu' nene evene' ingine vise' igi ma ningamani' ve. Nemu' nene ei' monovomu' mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive: O'moso'mo olihe ele'mize do vamine' gamenelasi nene O'moso'mo ninge lamine' do-daa' ine' ve.

Ne neiha O'mosola vo gi'mizelone li minilizave ingine ezemu' nene ti' li gili gili ele'vole' igi minilizado' o neive: O'moso nene nomine' nevoba mo neive. Ido' eze vise' igi ezela vi gi'mizave nene meni lamine' ngemaa' ive ma ne neive. Ido' ne'mine li gili gili ele'vole' igi minilizado' o neine' nenako ma gili ele'vole' amilizani' nene O'moso'mo engi' ninge lamine' daline' aka nene ma minamoloseive.

Ido' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' oga' ive gohi ma Noa'ni nene O'moso'mo evene' ngebeleleseive line' noso nene olihe soto' amivo a'mine noso soto' ilingumu' nene lo soto' ogo lo-emavo Noa' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo aza vene' izipesi goloso ogalone lo O'moso'mo lido' gele lamine' o mino sipi ma lolo' ogo noso velo angu' nene gipele zuhosi vene' izipesi nene do ngu' izine'. Ido' ne'mine ogo O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo misubouko aleve linge engita monovo goloso minine' nene ngelebizine'. Ido' O'moso'mo ezemu' gili ele'vole' igi minaa' ave mukiliti lu'ine nene do lisihe' o-ngedaa' neine' nenako Noa' aza ne'mine ogo O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo nene ei' Noa' lulosi do lisihe' o-dine' ve.

Ido' Abalahamu' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' nenako nemu' nene O'moso'mo naza gelebizeloni' misubola ga' lo vozo lo lo-davo aza a'mido' gele do vine' ve. Ee, aza vo heteleline' misubo nemukisi nene ningo gelamo gopo eze misubo've hulo O'moso'mo a'vopilemo' zuholiti misubo minelive lo alinge' imine' misubola nene ga' lo vo minine'.

Ido' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' oga' ive minine' ne'mo a'mine vozo lo-dine' misubolo' nene vo hetelo a'mida nene gopo venenga ve ne'mine gelo mino O'moso'mo a'mine misubo salani molo-lengedekuve lo lo huko-ngidive sita' ei' gipele Isakaki ido' Isaka' gipele Zakoboki nesi nene a'mida seli numungukovo' ingi monani' ve.

Ido' seli numungukovo' ongo minine' nene O'moso'mo gala gelo luhuvo izo do soto' ine' numuno ebe' minevo' minevo' ingu' nene alinge' vo holalove lo gala gelo a'minemu' gizebo ogo mino seli numungukovo' ongo minaa' ine' ve.

Ido' Abalahamu' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' oga' ive minine' ne'mo nene O'moso'mo gipa ma gedelesane lo lo huko-dine' nenako nemu' aza go'ne ngelo izamoloseinako mo gedelesuve lo gelo gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo elenaho Sala' aza gohuno vene' neivo ido' Abalahamu' aza ozoho molo izipe gedeli gamene osu' lavo ne'mini minasido' nene O'moso'mo Sala'ni izipe molo emeline' amuzo emavo Isaka'ni gidine'.

Ne'mo Abalahamu' eze nene mo ozoho molo vani goloso molo minidoti' nene a'vopilemo' mukiliti avo'nibo lolo' ine'. Ei' hamokuti' nene a'vopilemo' vai' goloso soto' igi okulumoto' sonohi' ne'mine ido' noso gahevela gepe ne'minisa soto' igi evenelitesi gati nanike' nilizahe li ningamilizado' ne'mine minani' ve.

Ido' a'mine mene lo-lingimuve muki' ingine nene O'moso'mo ngemelove lo salani molo-ngidine' inite' nene olihe engita soto' amivo hili vani'za a'mine inite' soto' iline' gamene nene olihe hoto' ha neivo mo soto' oloseive li ningi gili lanite' gili gili ele'vole' igivo' mini hilani'. Ido' ne'mine igi mini hilani' ne'mo ingine nene me misubou' mine gili' lo minelonive minamo ha venenga ve ne'minevo' gelo minelonive nene none li li soto' igi minani' ve.
Ido' evene' ma ingine gamazi ne'minevo' nilavo ma nene ne'mo ingine mo mini gili' lilizani' ebe'ine atokumu' vise' igi gizebo igi nizave lo gelelesune.
Ido' ingine gomu' mini mili minaa' ani' misubo'ninguko tine' mili gohi ma vilisa giladiniko tine' mili viliza aka'ine nene ha ngolo' lo minivo mo tine' mili vikedine.

Vikedine'za ingine minani' misubo ivile' ogo minine' ebe' Okulumoku' neine' nela lu'ine nene vavo a'mine misubou' nene ha gopo minani' ve. Ido' ingine ne'mine igi minaa' ani' nemu' O'moso aza engi' O'moso'ine minine' nemu' nene O'moso'ine nouve loo lo soto' olosa ovozo helaa' ine' nevoba olize izo lo soto' oga' ine' ve. Ido' aza nene engi' alinge' miniliza numuno ebe'ine do soto' ogo molo-ngidine' nenako ne'mo nene engi' O'moso'ine minine' nemu' ovozo helamaa' ine' nene mo gele none.

Ido' O'moso'mo Abalahamu'ni nene nenikumu' gele ele'vole' ihe amihe lo emengu' molo gipele Isaka'ni nene belo oloku' gize nemezo lavo Abalahamu' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ine' ne'mo gipele Isaka'ni nene belo oloku' gize emelesa ine'. Ee, gomu' nene a'mine Isaka'nimu' nene Abalahamuda O'moso'mo gamazi ato' ato' lo lo huko-do ti' lo line': Gei' guliveka di mini soto' igi mini-di dizilizani' ga'vopilemo' zuho nene a'mine Isakadatikovo' soto' ilisave lo lo-emavo Abalahamu' aza gele lamine' ogo a'minemu' nene gele ele'vole' ine'za Isaka' aza helaavo ma O'moso'mo gohi do ote-do lo huko lo nimine' gamazi nene ha do gihile izelido' o neive lo gala giline' nenako O'moso'mo lavo aza nene a'mine gipele hamo' Isaka'ni nene belo oloku' gizo O'moso lehize-delesa ine' ve. Ido' Abalahamu' Isaka'ni belelesa gamuno' neivo O'moso'mo geto o've lo-damidini Abalahamu' aza belavo mo heladinako nemu' nene hilinguti' O'moso'mo do tine' molo-davo ele'mizo ani' gelave.
Ido' Isaka' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo gipele Zakobongi Esaungi engita alinge' soto' o-ngemeline' inite' nemu' nene lo-ngemo no'noho' ize-ngidine'.

Ido' Zakobo' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo helelesa mininguti' nene Zosehe' gipele sita' nene hamo hamo' Zakobo' no'noho' ize-ngidine'. Ne'mine ogo zalo' do oto gubi' izo O'moso opo'ni line'.

Ido' Zosehe' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo vani molo helelesa minine' gameneu' nene Kanaha misubo nene O'moso'mo ngemelove lo salani molo-ngidine' nenako neze zuho Isilaele' aleve ingine Aigita misubo nene huli Kanaha misubola tine' mili vilisave lo gala gelo gele ele'vole' ogo a'minemu' lo-ngemo ido' neni' amuzo'ne nesi nene di vii a'mine Kanaha misubola galese izilizave lo lo-ngimine'.

Ido' Mose' soto' ogavo izelehoi melehoi ningasine' nene izipe lamine' goloso soto' ogavo ingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi minasine' ne'mo Aigita aleveti guve'inesi ve Halao' aza Isilaele' alevelati' gipe'ine ma soto' ikevo ma mo ngibili hili'mi vivo' minilisave lo lo huko-ngidingumu' nene golise gilami gili huli a'mine gipe'ine nene di haleki di minasivo ike'ni sito hamo vine'.

Ido' Halao' aluvo'mo Mose'ni nene do mongizavo minine' nenako aza nene ei' gipele gelo mino Aigita vetingu' evene' naba mino ne'mi lanite've ato ato' gelo minidine'za aza lodive ogosa O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo O'moso'mo ei' evenele meni ngemelingu' nene nezesi nemelive lo nemu' lulo molo minine' nenako nemu' nene Aigita ve nete Isilaele' aleve ingine Kilisito' zuho ne'mine lili' igi minadi'mo di u'musupo lizi-ngidavo minangu' nene nazasi vo holo engikisi mulumo gelo mineloni' nemu' O'moso'mo meni'ne nemeline' ne'mo Aigita misubou' heneni nganeni minine' nene ivile' o neive lo gelo ido' naza nene Aigita aleveti monovo golosolo' nene e'meto ne'mi lanite've nene nazasi ha gelo mineloni'za a'mine lanite've nene geto osu' liline' nenako nemu' nene ne'mine amo naza nene O'moso'mi evenele Isilaele' aleveu' nene vo holo engi' goboni mili-ngidangu' nene makato' mino mulumo alumo gelo minelone lo O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo Halao' aluvo'mi gipele ve li-nidamilizave lo o've lo golise vine'.

Ido' O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo guvelesi ve Halao' ne'mi golise've gelamo Aigita misubo hulo vine'. Ee, O'moso nene vetedunu' ngelo ningamolonido' o minine'za Mose' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo aza nene O'moso ninge neine' gele minivo minine' ne'mo nene Aigita misubo hulo O'moso'mo imine' gono nene hulamo geni bilingukisi ha amuzo molo do'mo vo minine'.

Ido' Mose' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minive minine' nenako ne'mo nene aza ne'mine ine' ve. O'moso'mo angelo' ma imiselavo ogo Aigita aleveti gana' gipe'ine ngebelelingu' nene Isilaele' aleve leze gipetesi ngebelalive lo Mose' aza angeloli'mo ise'ine izeline' akalo' ngele'mize molo O'moso'mo lido' e'meto evene' lo-ngedavo Isilaele' aleve ingine sipisipi angale nene ngibili vanise'ine nene numu'ine gatedo' gatedo' nene noso mili hibi' izi hilika' hilika' ani' ve.

Ido' Isilaele' aleve ingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' ani' ne'mo guvo noso ma gulive Gulehe' Noso nene izo huko eza ema ogo goko' misubo ne'mino minine' gele minivo a'mingu' liki vani'. Ido' Aigita aleve inginesi a'mine'mine ogo volone li nivavo guvo noso ne'mo ihe' ogo do su'mize-ngedavo noso nii hilani'.

Ido' Isilaele' aleve ingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi minani' ne'mo O'moso'mo lido' e'meti Zeliko numuno ebeli'mi gesi gehenidunu' gizani' gesi ha'na nene go' laneme go' laneme nene gamene hamo hamo' di vodo vodo i-dika' i-dika' igi nizavo gamene seveni (7) ogavo a'mine gamene seveni (7) ne'mi lulou' nene gohi gamene seveni (7) ne'mine di vodo vodo i-dikevo a'mine gehenidunu' gizani' gesi nene ngululubizo lemo ongavo Isilaele' aleve a'mingu' dizi Zeliko aleve ngibili gese' ani'.

Ido' Isilaele' aleve lovo di Zeliko ebeku' olihe alisa navo a'mine ebeku' minine' pasidia' alu Lahaba' aza api' ogo O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo minine' ne'mo Isilaele' ve sita' a'mine numuno ebe' Zeliko nene amamaka' mili ningi alisa vasive nene do lamine' o-ngedo numu'veu' ngele'mize molavo nemu' nene alinge' Isilaele' aleve nete igi Zeliko aleve O'moso'mi gamazi gili hulani' ngibili gese' angu' nene Lahaba'ni nene bilami iseve izi-dani' ve.

Ido' a'mine luvoni' evene' ingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi minani' ne'mine igi evene' linge muki' ingine a'mine'mine igi O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' ani'za naza nGideoni' ve Balaka' ve Samusoni' ve Zehita' ve Davidi' ve Samueli' ve ido' O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi li soto' iga' ave polohete linge muki' engi' neti gamazi lo osu' lo lolosa luvodiniko lo do vo nouvo ha'na idine. Nemu' nene gamazi linge nene ngelo ma lo osu' lamolosuve.

A'mine ve ingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi minadi'mo O'moso'mo hize ele' o-ngedo neivo engikuti' linge ma nete amuzo mili misubo mala mala vi O'mosomu' gilamave nene lovo i ngimi ngivile' igi engita di gelekele' i-ngidani'. Ido' engikuti' linge ma nete engi' misubo'ningu' nene monovo lisihe' laminekovo' minelive li evene' di lisihe' i-ngidaa' ani' ve. Ido' O'moso'mo ne'mine mana'mine inite' do soto' o-ngedelove lo lo huko-ngidine' gamazi nesi nene engita gihile izaa' ine' ve. Ido' engikuti' evene' linge ma nete loposo gulo laioni nete ngibililisa ikevo ma a'mine laizoni nete libilikelizave li evene' nete aka'ine nene hizi tili-ngidaa' ani' ve.

Ido' engikuti' linge ma nete ololi'mo lo'vote-ngedelesa ine' amuzo've nene di hongu li-daa' ani' ve. Ido' linge ma nene lovo ve nete bainati mite' nedunu' ngibilaa' ani'za ingine olovo' lamine' ikevo bainati mite' ne'mo ngebelamaa' ine' ve. Ido' linge ma ingine gilizevo minanguti' nene amuzo ve lili' igi minaa' ani'. Ido' misubo mauti' ve igi lovo i ngimaa' angu' nene linge ma nete amuzo mili mini ngimiseli di vaa' ani' ve.

Ido' vene' linge ma nene izipaha'ine hilikenguti' nene O'moso'mo do ote-ngedavo gohi ize'ningida igi gi'mizaa' ani' ve. Ido' linge ma ingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi minani' ne'mo ve malite gavoso ngibili goboni mili-ngidi ti' li li-ngidaa' ani' ve: Isetine izo gavoso lengebelamoloniko lingine O'moso mehedine imi mono' nene hulilizave li ne'mine li-ngidaa' ani'za alingeta hele noloninguti' gohi oto minevo' minevo' lemeni dameni lamine' doso' ma nenave li gili huli nizavo ngibilikevo hilaa' ani' ve.

Ido' linge ma nene evenelite gamazi goloso palasa li-ngidi gize zohi' i-ngidi amuzo malehe nala' izi lobe tobe' ani' nedunu' nene ngibilaa' ani' ve. Ido' linge ma nene gize'nido' a'nido' seni nala' izi-ngidi huli nala' numungu' i-ngidaa' ani' ve.

Ido' linge ma nene gehenidunu' huli huli' igi ngibilaa' avo hilaa' ani' ve. Ido' linge ma nene ngibili giti seta' iga' ani' ve. Ido' linge ma nene bainati mite' nedunu' ngibili hilaa' ani' ve. Ido' linge ma O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' ani' nemu' ngimiseli hulikevo oko'nido' inite'ine nomivo sipisipi losuvo ido' meme' losuvo nedunukovo' oko'nido' ngili moni oko'ine losuvo'mi inite' noso' initekisi ido' genegana'inesi muki' nene nomivo nimonavo goboni mili-ngidi di goloso i-ngidaa' ani' ve.

Ingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi evene' lisihe' lamine' minadi'mo evene' linge muki' nene engito' lisihe' igi minamani'za a'mine aleve nene evenelite vasa izi-ngidikevo guhali hali igi vi evene' nizamada ebe' hadivela ido' golola geheni muliku' ido' misubo luloukisi gopo ingaa' ani' ve.
A'mine mene aleve muki' ingine ezemu' gili ele'vole' ani' nemu' O'moso'mo ningivo lamine' ine'za lehize-ngedelove lo evenele zuho lo molo-ngidine' inite' nene olihe dami hilani' ve.

Ido' a'mine O'moso'mo ngemelove lo lo molo-ngidine' inite' nene olihe dami hilani' nene nanitekumu' ve. O'moso'mo leli' olihe soto' amunivo engi' lehize-ngedeloni' inite' nene gomu' mili mudise dalizado' lisihe' i nizaha gizebo igi nizavo lelikisi makato' dalone' nene lamine' oloseive lo gomu' gele minine' nenako nemu' nene ingine olihe dami hilani' ve.

A'mine O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogali'mi monovo di soto' mili lelebizave muki' ingine nene limuso ne'mini vai' goloso mini hizi vodo vodo i-lidi vonu' libili nizani' giline' nemu' nene laza okodela lihitehe' inite' vai' nene do hulo ido' lihime initeli'mo gizedelo' izo do mine' mine' iline' inite' nesi nene do hulo hazala ogo O'moso'mo aka lelebizidokovo' nene inite' mali'mo a'mine aka hize tile-ledamivo ido' ahukisi mo lamo lotikovo' izo vo minelone.

Ido' ne'mino loti' izo novo O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' oga' monovolo' nene gomu' molo lemo a'mine monovolo' e'mete osu' losa aka lelebizive Izesu'nivo' nene e'meto volone lo eitokovo' nene vete hulo-do volone. Aza nene alinge' nolize izo minelongumu' ve lo gelo evenelite ve goloso ve li gili lohoto' zalo' bililizangumu' ovozo helo minelingumu' nene haza inite' ve lo gele hulo golise vamo a'mine lohoto' zalo' bilangukisi nene amuzo molo minine' ve. Ne'mine ogo O'mosolati' lemo mineline' mo'mosi'velo' O'moso'mo ana hulaa' ida vo neive.

Ido' Izesu' monovomu' gililizani' nene aza mo hize ele' o-ledeline' nenako nemu' nene lingine monoku' amuzo molaakumu' gosele' lengebelavo lutine nene vo gilizevo ogalive li lihime daa' ave nete Izesu'ni biluva' i-daa' angu' amuzo molo minine' mamu' nene gili minilo.
Lingine goloso inite' ne'mo do ongo-lengedelesa neivo amuzo mili lovo i imi a'mine'mi lulouti' nene lingine olihe vanise lepi hilamave.
Ido' lingine O'moso'mo muludingu' do lamine' ogo gipe'ne ve lo gamazi ma mono' godolou' ti' lo lo-lingidine' mamu' nene gatine molahe. Olo:
Gipe'nee, Guvelesi ve'mo evene' ma lulo ngemo minelive nene
ve'ine zopovo si'zi monovo lisihetokovo' monilizangumu' ve lo
geni initeli'mi lulou' ngele'mize molaloseive.
Ee, gipe'ne ve lo ningaa' ive muki' nene
ve'ine zopovo si'zilizave lo ngebeleleseive.
Ido' ne'mine oloseinako nemu' nene gaza Guvelesi ve'mo
veka zopovo si'zo monovo lisihetokovo' moneline lo
do lisihe' o-gedo geni initeli'mi lulou' gele'mize nomolavo ma
gaza nemu' gelanivo haza inite' lolo' amivo.
Ido' lihimeka nogimivo ma nemu' gosele' gebelamilive.

Geni initeli'mi lulou' mini ma nene Guvelesi ve'mo lele'mize akalo' neive li a'mine inite' nene gosele' lengebelamivo ha gihi minilo. Me'ninge nete gipe'ine ma ve'ine zopovo si'zilizave li ngibili di hehe li-ngidami huli-ngimikavo minani' nene ma minamavo mukito' nene ngibili di hehe li-ngidaa' nani' nemu' nene O'moso'mo linginesi gipe'ne nizave lo ne'mine o-lengedo noloseive.

Ee, me'ninge muki' nete gipe'ine ve'ine zopovo si'ziliza inite' di-ngidi di hehe li-ngidaa' naanako lengikisi O'moso'mo ne'mine o-lengedo minamine' neidiniko ei' izipahala zuho minami akalo' izipe ne'mine minadine.

Ido' a'mine gamazilo' imine' molo ma lolove. Ha okode losuvosi none' mene gidave metemote nete leli' vete zopovo si'zilizave li di hehe li-lidavo gelekele' o-ngedo mino lamine' gilune' nenako nemu' nene ne'mine o-ngedaa' noune' nene ivile' ogo vode lute lemeni dameni do soto' o-ledaa' ive metehine nene nabosa gelekele' o-duke'vo. Olo. Ee, laza ne'mine ogo ezelati' minevo' minevo' lemeni do minevo' minevo' olosunako nemu' nene gelekele' nabo o-do minelone.

Ee, me misubou' metemote di hehe li-lidavo gelekele' o-ngidune' nene ingine engi' lu'nido' lamine' oloseive li gilado' gamene li'nibevo' di hehe li-lidaa' ani'za O'moso ei' ne'mino lihimete goloso daa' monovote nene nomivo monovote lisihekisivo' minelone lo lele'mize lamine' iline' inite' do soto' o-ledo do hehe lo-ledaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene gelekele' nabo o-do minelone.

Vete zopovo si'zeloningumu' ve li di hehe li-lidi geni initeli'mi lulou' lele'mizi milikevo a'mingu' minelone' gameneu' nene lolize izo lanite' gelo minelonivoba ha mulumo alumo gelo minelesune'za ne'mine olone' ne'mo lele'mize akalo' ogavo ma alinge' ne'mi gihile've nene monovo lisihe' laminekovo' ogo molo nonivo lute nene zou lo minaa' neive.

O'moso'mo vetine zopovo si'zilizave lo geni initeli'mi lulou' lengele'mize molaa' neine' ne'mo nene lengele'mize lamine' oloseinako nemu' nene lingine lutine gopo o vivo lutine'mi gizene ana've nene gulu' gelo izo bele vivo lutine gilizevo ogo minaa' neine' nene gohi di oti-di gonou' ele'mizi milalo.

Ne'mine igi lutine ne'mo mono' akalo' volosa neivo ma lengiku' ve ma lingine lutine'mi gizene've goloso o vivo minave lingine nene gopo aka mili vami a'mido' lamini nivi lamine' ilizangumu' nene aka lamine' di hehe li vi minilo.

Ido' lengiku' lovo lolize nene soto' ogalive li evene' mukita hongu monovo nene igi mili ngelebizi minilizangumu' nene amuzo milalo. Ido' ve ma ingine O'moso'mi evenelelite di minilizani' monovo lisihe' lamine' nene engita nomivo minaa' nave nene Guvelesi ve mo ningamilizani' nenako lingine hongu monovo igi mili ilizadoti' nene O'moso'mi evenele nounako li monovo lisihe' laminetokovo' e'meto volone li amuzo mili minilo.

O'mosolati' nasahili' lamine' nene lengi' zuho malite ningi huli aka malo' vikelizave li ge gizebo o-nede ne gizebo o-gede li minilo. Ido' lengi' zuho mali'mo lengi' vovotingu' mino za mali'mo gihile ekese' ine' izaa' neine' ne'mino mino monovo goloso ato ato' do soto' ogo lengita geni do soto' o-lengedo neivo lengikuti' evene' lingela muki' nene a'mine'mine igi monovo goloso dikevo lutine do gopo ogalive li gizebo lekeseve igi minilo.

Ido' lengikuti' vene' vemoho' gopo'napa ingi monikelizave. Ido' lengikuti' evene' ma Esau' ne'mine mini O'mosomu' ga'ine molavo me misubou' initekumukovo' gili minikelizave li ge gizebo o-nede ne gizebo o-gede li minilo. Esau' aza nene Isaka' gana' gipele mino melehido' medelo mino melehi inite'velokisi nene medelo minelido' minine'za gamene ma a'mine uvoloho Esau' aza ga'na helo nakunolo Zakobo' noso' nite' gize vata' ogo minine' nenako a'minguti' nene linge ma nemavo nalongisi ve lo haza misubou' inite' noso' niteto' nene melehido' medelo mineline' mo'mosi've nene nakunolo Zakobo'ni eme molani' ve. Ee, Esau' aza O'mosomu' gala molavo me misubou' initekumukovo' gele minive mino haza noso' nite' nene gamene hamokovo' nalosa ido' nene inite' naba melehido' medelo mineline' mo'mosi've nene Zakobo'ni imine' ve.

Emavo Zakobo' ezelo' medelo minavo alinge' meleho aza gana've no'noho' ize-deline' no'noho' nene Zakobo'ni ize-davo Esau' aza me'neho no'noho' nene do tine' molo neni' no'noho' ize-nedelive lo ive ogo lulo do velepe' izeline' aka vise' ogo minine'za ma ningamivo meleho aza Esau' gamazi've gele huline' nene lingine mo gili nizani' ma neize. Nemu' nene lingine eze ine' ne'mine amilo.

Lingine O'mosola igi gi'mizani' nene Isilaele' aleve leli' avotemote Sinae golola lou' gamazi lo huko-ngidine' dalisa vangu' soto' ogo minine' inite' ne'mido' nene lingine ma amave. Ingine ha ve'inedunukovo' ningi ido' ga'inedunukovo' gililizani' inite' nevo'minevo' neido' ani' ma neive. Ee, ingine Sinae golola vado' nene olo' gulumo ogo minivo ido' liti'muso goloso izo minivo ido' hepe' naba mumu gehe gehe ogo elo minivo
ido' pikuli ne'mo nolo naba molo minivo ido' O'moso'mo gamazi livo gilave nete nolo nene gilangumu' golise gili gamazi gohi ma lelito' lisihe' ogo lo lemamilive li amuzo mili Mose'ni li-imani'.

Ido' O'moso'mo ti' lo lo huko-ngidine' nemu' ngemengingi goloso izine': A'mine Sinae golola vi lisi gililiza initepe evenepe nene mo geheni huli huli' igi ngibili hililizave. Ido' evenekovo' nevoba ize gulo nesi a'mida vi lisi gililizani' nene mo ngibili hililizave lo line'.
Ee, ingine ningani' inite' nene ngemengingi izaa' inite' atoli'mine goloso minavo Mose' aza nehelele goloso izavo luvoluvo zalo' do nouve lo lo-ngimine'.

Ee, lingine nene avotemotida Sinae golola ngemengingi inite' soto' o ngimine' ne'mido' nene ma vamave. Asi a'mine ngemengingi inite' ivile' ogo lamine' goloso minine' initeto' ikeni' neive. Ido' Zelusalemi numuno ebeku' minine' golo Zaioni ne'mine minevo' minevo' O'moso'mi numuno ebe' Zelusalemi ne'mino Okulumokuko minine' numuno ebeku' Zaioni golo mala nene lingine mo imi hilikeve. Ido' angelo' tauseni tauseni ne'minete zege' zege' igi ngolize izi minadasi

ido' O'moso'mo no'noho' ize-ngedeline' izipahala Okulumo' ebe' ngemelingumu' gulive'ine Okulumoku' gize molave engi' muliseukisi nene mo imi hilikeve. Ido' evene' mukiliti O'moso leli' zaasi naba minidasi ido' ve lisihe' ne'mine mo hilikevo sikalahu'ine O'moso'mo mudise ngele'mize lamine' ogavo nizada nesi nene mo imi hilikeve.

Ido' lelikisi O'mososi kuku holo-ledo gamazi hulo volelo' melo' o-ledo O'moso'mo gamazi lamine' gosoho' lo huko-lidine' lo-do ogo limive Izesuda nesi imi hilikevo vanise've lutido' hibi' izo huline' gelavo minikeve. Kaini' aza Abeli'ni bele hiline' vanise've nene misubou' do'mozavo O'moso'mo ningo Kaini'ni nene lihime imine'za Izesu'ni bili hilani' vanise've nene ningo lihime lemamo isete izine' nenako a'mine vanise've ne'mo gono dani' nene Abeli' vanise'mo gono dani' nene ivile' ogosa gono lamine' dani' ve. Ne'mo lingine nene mo a'mingu' imi hilikeve. Ido' lingine a'mingu' nene mo imi hilikenako nemu' nene O'moso'mo nasahili' o-ledo hize ele' o-ledaa' neine' nene lengikuti' ve malite ningi huli monovo goloso lengi' vovotingu' di soto' ikelizave li gizebo lamine' igi minilo.

Ee, O'moso'mi gamazi Izesu' lo-lingimine' nene hulikelizaze. Gizebo lamine' igi minilo. Ingine O'moso'mi gamazi misubou' mene Mose' lo-ngimine' gili hulave nene O'moso'mo ngebelelinguti' olovo' igi golise viliza aka'ine ma minamivo aza lihime ngemaa' neine' nenako nemu' O'moso'mi gamazi nene Okulumokuti' lo-limine' nenako gele hulolone' nene laza O'moso'mo lihime lemelinguti' nene mo keke' ngelo olovo' amolosunako nemu' nene a'mine gamazi nene gili hulikelizaze. Gizebo lamine' igi minilo.

Mose' Sinai gololo' dizo minine' gameneu' nene O'moso'mo gamazi nolo-imivo nolo ne'mo misubo nene do mo'mongo' ine' ve. Ido' O'moso'mo idise ti' lo lo huko neine' ma neive: Ihe' inite' muki' nene gamene hamokovo' ma do mo'mongo' olosuve. Ido' misubovo' nevoba okulumo' nesi do mo'mongo' olosuve lo line' ve.

Ido' inite' mata' nene gohi do mo'mongo' olosuve lo line' nene aza inite' mata' muki' do soto' muluvoni' nene do mo'mongo' ogo do hulokuvo mo'mongo' ami minilizani' initekovo' nene ha minivi' minivi' ilisave lo gele mino do mo'mongo' ilingumu' line' ve.

Ido' laza O'moso'mo gizebo ingu' mo'mongo' amiline' ebe' minevo' minevo' ilingu' nene vo holokune' nenako nemu' nene O'moso isaa' neve lo-do opo'ni lo-delone' nene mulunou' lamine' gelelidokovo' o-delone. Ido' ololi'mo inite' lo'voto osu' liline' ne'mino O'mosote ne'mo evene' goloso ngebele osu' loloseinako eze opo'ni lolone' nene ezemu' lehelele izivo golise've gele mino ne'mine ogo minelone.
Lingine monoku' nene hamo' zuho lili' igi mini lutine nene ne geme ge neme li minaa' nani' nene lengitati' huko vamivo mini di vi minilo.

Ido' evene' malite venenga ve ma engi' minada ikevo ngele'mize lamine' igi haza evene' nene ne'mine noo-ngidube li gili angelo' nene ngele'mize lamine' ani' nenako nemu' lingine venenga ve ngele'mize lamine' ogakumu' nene gili hulikevo gatine molalive.

Ido' Izesu' evenele ma nala' numungu' huli-ngidikevo minangu' nene lingine engikisi makato' nala' numungu' mini mulumo alumo gili nizani' gilivosa engikumu' gili mini hize ele' i-ngidi minilo. Ido' lingine ha vetinesi mini olihe ma hili vamanako lengikisi nene a'mine'mine igi goboni mili-lingidilizani' nene agae ma hize ele' i-lidavoo li minilisanako nemu' nene goboni mili-ngidavo minaa' navemukisi nene gili mini hize ele' i-ngidi minilo.

Ido' vene' vemoho' gopo' napa ingalizani' nene O'moso'mo lihime ngemeleseinako evene' muki' nene vene' vemoho' lili' iga' monovomu' nene gili lamine' i mini di gopo ami lisihe' lamine' igi mini eledingesivo' ido' vadingesivo' ingalizave.

Ido' Guvelesi ve aza lengi' mo keke' hulo-lengedo vo haha amolosuve lo line' nenako nemu' lingine lutine nene moni henenilo' vaalive. Inite' gohi ma daloinako li mumuzo' ami lingine di minani' inite' nene leli' votigilelo' lisihe' o neive li gili hongu li lamini minilo. Ee, Guvelesi ve aza lengi' hulo-lengedamolosuve line' nenako
nemu' nene laza gopo gate gelamo ezemu' gele ele'vole' ogo mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' gamazi ma nene ha ti' lo lolosune:
Guvelesi ve aza hize ele' o-ledaa' neinako
laza inite' mamu' lehelele izelido' nomivo
ido' evene' nete ma di goloso i-lidilizado' minamune.

Ido' O'moso'mi gamazi li-lingimave gizebo vetine ingine mono' akalo' nivi hilani' engita nene gili mini gizeka'nido' nene ningi hehe li mini nge'meti nivi ingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi minaa' ani' monovo'ine ne'mido' nene lingine api'napi' igi di minilo.
Izesu' Kilisito' aza nene gomu' minine' monovo'vesi hazavo' mino monovo've nene do ato' amo idisesi nene mo a'mine'mine ogovo' mino mine do voo mineleseinako

nemu' nene evene' ma mono' gamazi ve li soza gamazi ato ato' li-lingimilizani' ne'mo gatine hizalize. Lute hize ele' oloseive li noso' nite' naakumukisi li-lingimilizani'za lute hize ele' o-ledaa' neine' inite' nene noso' nite' nevoba asi O'moso'mo nasahili' o-ledaa' neine' ne'mo lute amuzo molavo ne'mo nene lamine' iline' nenako a'mine noso' nitekumu' li-lingimilizani' gamazi gili daa' nave nene a'mine initeli'mo ngele'mize lamine' amaa' neine' nenako ne'mo gatine hizalive.

Ee, O'moso imani' noso' initekuti' nene ha nalisave li li-lingimilisani'za nemu' lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. Sipisipi ize nevo'mine bili O'moso'mi holomolo' mili gizi imisa naa' nani' ne'mine inite' gelo minivete Kilisito' nene leli' sipisipi nevo'mine initete lolo' ogo lelita mine molo neive. A'mine Kilisito' nene O'moso belo gize emaa' sipisipi ize ne'mine lolo' ogo neivosa laza nene ei' Izesu'nimu' gele ele'vole' ogo minaa' noune' ne'mo ei' Izesu' oko'no naa' noune' gelave. Ne'mine oga' noune'za Zuda veti mono' numuno ado' seli numuno avazahalo' gizani' miningu' nene vi hili mini sipisipi nevo'mine bili O'moso imanguti' naa' nave ingine nene leli' sipisipi izete ne'mine lolo' ogo neivo laza eze oko'no nene naa' noune' gilivo minaa' noune' ne'mine igi ingine gohi Izesu' oko'nosi nene nalizave lo O'moso'mo gele ngemamine' ve.

Ido' gele ngemamine' nene Kilisito' avazahalo' ingine nene ize ma bilikevosa eveneto' medelo mino O'moso inite' lehize-daa' ive naba aza a'mine izeliti vanise'ne nene eveneliti lihime'ine apaselingumu' ve lo O'moso'mi kekeize atoli'mine lo minine' numuno lulouko nene do dizo hibi' izo O'moso emavo sikizapovo nene mo keke' nami di vi numuno ebe' heta gizi'votaa' ani' nenako nemu' a'mine'mine igi ize ne'mi avazahalo' minive bilangutikisi nene ingine mo nani' gilivo minilizave lo ma gele ngemamine' ve.

Ido' a'mine ize ne'mi vanise've nene O'moso imi sikizapovola nene di vi numuno ebe' heta gizi'votaa' ani' nenako ne'mo Izesu' aza ei' vanise'vedunu' eveneliti lihimete apase-ledo O'moso'mi evenele lolo' ogo minelonido' do lisihe' o-ledelesa Zelusalemi numuno ebeli'mi gesi gatedoti' lemo heta ogo mulumo gelo hiline'.

Nemu' nene Zuda veti gesi minguti' lemo vida nene lazasi lemo vo heta ogo ezela gi'mizo mino eze ovozo hiline' inite' i-di minaa' ani' ma'mine igi leli' lovozo helelone' inite' i-lidi minilizani' nene gopo gehe do vuke'zo.

Ido' ezemu' lovozo helelone' inite' geho Zuda veti gesi minguti' lemo vo heta olone' nene minevo' minevo' iline' numuno ebete me misubou' nene ma minamivo minevo' minevo' numuno ebete nene alinge' soto' o-ledelingumu' gelo a'minemu' gizebo ogo ne'mine olone.

Nemu' nene eze evenele nene none lo leli' veteti' eze gulive oga' noolonivete a'mine gulive nene do oto minelonido' o neine' nenako nemu' nene Izesu' akate vele-lidido' nene e'meto O'moso ize bili imaa' ani' ne'mino laza nene gamene gamene veteuti' O'moso opo'ni lo-emo minelone.

Ido' evene' nasahili' i-ngidi inite'ine nomivo nizani' aleve nene inele i-ngidi minilizani' ne'mo ize ato ato' bili O'moso gizi imaa' ani' inite' ne'mine lamine' ma imani' gelavo mulunou' lamine' geleleseinako nemu' nene ne'mine ogakumu' gatine molalive.

Lengi' monoku' gizebo i-lingidaa' nave nete di minaa' nani' gono'ine ne'mi monovomu' nene alinge' gamene nabalo' O'moso'mi velelo' li soto' ilisanako nemu' gili mini ingine nene lengi' monovotido' gizebo lamine' igi di lisihe' i-lingidivo' minaa' nave. Nemu' nene lengikumu' geni ngebelamivo gono'ine nene ngolize izi lu'ine laminetotikovo' daa' ilizave li lingine engi' gamazi lilizado' gili di mini gelekelekovo' i-ngidi minilo. Ee, ingine lengikumu' gosele' ve li geni ngibilivo gono dalizani' ne'mo lengi' lengele'mize lamine' amilizado' o neine' nenako nemu' liliza gamazilo' nene gelekelekovo' i-ngidi minilo.

Laza gamene gamene monovo lisihekutikovo' ogo molo minelone lo gelo minaa' noune' nenako laza gilune' leli' lute nene O'moso'mi velelo' lisihe' goloso o neive losa gele none. Nemu' nene lingine O'mosola lelikumu' ve li li minilo.
Ido' O'mosola nenikumu' li-nidikevo ne'mo nele'mize lamine' ivo lengita lite' losa tine' molo alove lo amuzonga noluve.

Ido' O'moso nene zou lo minaa' monovo do soto' o-ledaa' ive mino aza nene ei' evenele sipisipi ize ne'mine gelo minunive leli' gizebo vete naba Izesu' Kilisito' aza vanise've lepo leli' gele daloningumu' ve lo O'moso'mo lo huko-lidine' minevo' minevo' iline' gamazi do amuzo molavo gohi hilinguti' do ote-dine' ne'mo

O'moso aza nene lingine ei' lulolo' e'meti gili dalizangumu' ve lo ne'mine ilizado' do lisihe' o-lengedo monovo lamine tamine' muki' nene lehize-lengedo Izesu' Kilisito' amuzo ne'mo lutingu' gono do eze ninge lamine' iline' monovo nene do soto' o-lengedelive lo ido' eze opo'ni livi' livi' igi mini izi hukamavo minevo' minevo' ilive lo mo ne'mino miniliho lo noluve.
Neze zuhokizo, lutine do ngi lo-lengedo luhuvo inite' mene do li'nibe ogosa gizuvoni' nenako nemu' nene gosele' lengebelamivo gati gili minilizave losa lengita amuzo molo noluve.

Ido' ti' lo nolo-lingimuze. Gililo. Leze zuho Timoteo'ni ma nene nalato' minidoti' mo imiselikeve. Ido' mo imiselikenako aza lite' lo nouvoda ogo heteleline' nene ninge-lengedelesa lengi' nizada nene makato' ogo hetelelesusive.
Ido' lengi' gizebo vetine nesi O'moso'mi evenele muki' nesi nene longopo'ni noluze. Gati li-ngimilo. Ido' O'moso'mi zuho Italia misuboukoti' minani' ingine netesi longopo'ni nilave.
O'moso'mi nasahili' ne'mo nene lengita mine do vo miniliho lo noluve.
Moda a'nesi' ve.

O'moso ido' Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' engi' gelekele' izipe Zakobo' naza luhuvo nite' nogizuve. Isilaele' veti avoteho Zakobo' gipele zuho tuvelu engi' nga'vopilemo' mulise'ninguti' mulise'ninguti' ma hutile' igi misubou' misubou' mini'mi vanguti' Izesu' evenele zuho lili' ave lengikumu' luhuvo nite' mene nogizuve. Longopo'ni lo nogizuve.

Neze zuho mate, lengemengu' molaa' inite' nehe mulumo nite' ato ato' nehe ne'mine inite' lengita soto' iline' ne'mo nene O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' iga' nani' nene do amuzo molo gili ele'vole' igi di gili' li minilizani' monovo do soto' iline' nene mo gili nizave. Gili nizanako mulumo nite' ato ato' ne'mine lengita soto' neivo ma muludingu' goloso gilami longolize izivo' minilo.
