Mulumo initeku' mini O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi di gili' li minani' nene hulami a'mingukovo' minilizani' ne'mi gihile nene ne'mino soto' oloseive: Lengita mono' monovo lamine' mine osu' lavo nominekisi minami minilisave. Nemu' nene ne'mine ogo minelone li gili ele'vole' igi di gili' li minilo.
Ido' lengikuti' ve mali'mo gala lamine' gelaa' monovomu' nene vise' ogo ma O'mosola lilive. Liline' ha emeleseive. O'moso neve evene' muki' nene balu o-ledo lukehe amo inite' ha lemaa' neive.

Nemu' nene a'mine ve O'mosola lilingu' inite' dalohe damolohe lo gala seta' gelamo gele hamo' o mino O'mosola lilive. Ga'ine sita' gilaa' nave nene ga'ine gili nge lami guvo noso mine guno amivo hepeli'mo do mone mone oga' neine' ne'mini minaa' nave.
Ve a'ne'mine ve lu'ine ga'ine taza vo vine' nete zovo' izi di monaa' nanako Guvelesi velati' inite' ngeli damilisave.
Neze zuhokizo, linginela evene' ma limi nizave ingine nene O'moso'mo ningivo dizi nizanako nemu' ngolize izi minilizave.
Ido' heneni ve nete heneni'inemu' ngolize izami ingine O'moso'mo ningivo limi nizani' nemu' ngolize izi minilizave. Guvise navise'mi guvovo suludani' ne'mine igi suludilisave.

Ee, ho' dizo amuzo molo lavo a'mine guvise navise goko' loloseive. Ido' goko' lavo guvovo suludo'mozavo emeni've gonolise've lamine' nene goloso oga' neive. A'mine'mine igi heneni ve ingine gono beze'ningu' moni minilizadoti' vi tolovo ilisave.

nGemengu' molaa' initeku' nehe mulumo initeku' nehe mulumo inite' ato atoku' nehe ne gilizevo ami amuzo mili minilizave ingine ngolize izi minilisave. Amuzo mili mini a'mine inite' ivile' ikevo ne'mi meni've nene O'moso'mo minevo' minevo' ngemeni dameni nene lehize-ngedeleseive. Ee, lu'ine O'moso imi nizave engi' ngemelove lo salani molo-ngidine' inite' minevo' minevo' ngemeni dameni nene lehize-ngedeleseive. Ido' lehize-ngedelingumu' ve li ngolize izi minilisave.

Inite' mali'mo emengu' molalosa lulo hizo eze gelelehe' ogo do vavo ma a'mine ve aza lihime dosa O'moso'mo nemengu' molave lamilive. Lihime daakumu' nene O'moso aza lulo otesa'mive. Ido' lihime dalizave lo O'moso'mo nene lemengu' molosa'mive. Nemu' nene nemengu' molave lamilive.
Leli' goloso nite' ogo molo ogakumu' lumo helaa' neine' ne'mo gate hizo limimise' oga' neive.
Lumo helaa' neine' ne'mo izipahala mino gedeline' ne'mi gulive nene lihime ve. Lihime ne'mo naba ogo izipahala mino gedeline' ne'mi gulive nene helaa' ve.
Neze zuho lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' mate, ladani gatine gilamilo.

Inite' mata' lamine' ido' lele'mize lamine' oga' inite' lamine' nene O'mosolati' neive. Meteho O'moso Okulumoku' labana' elaa' neine' inite' do soto' molave aza a'mine molani' inite' nene ne'mino do velepe' alepe' izesa'mive. Gamene gamene do lamine' o-ledovo' neive.

Laza nene ei' do soto' ine' inite' muki' ngivile' igi mini evenele zuho gosoho' gana' api' igi lili' ilizave lo O'moso'mo asi've gala gelo gamazi've gihiledunu' do soto' o-ledo lemeni dameni gosoho' lemave.

Neze zuho lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' mate, gamazi mene gililo. Lingine muki' nene gamazi gelaakumu' lite' li di nene igi minilo. Ne neiha gamazi laakumu' nene zou li gili minisa lilo. Ido' linginela lite' lo lingizebolo' molamivo.
Evene' lizebolo' ne'mo O'moso'mi monovo lisihe' nene ngelo do soto' amoloseive.

Nemu' nene lutine do goloso oga' inite' muki' ido' goloso nite' pata' buu lo minine' nene huli hokolize' ami okodine di'mi limi mini O'moso'mi gamazi lutingu' molani' nene di gili' li dalo. O'moso'mi gamazi ne'mo nene do lungu' izo do lamine' oloseize. Di gili' li dalo.
Ido' ne'mine igi O'moso'mi gamazi nene haza gatinedunukovo' gili minami gili di e'metilo. Haza gatinedunukovo' gililizani' nene langisetine lutine golo izilisave.
Evene' malite O'moso'mi gamazi gili gili damilizani' nene ve ma gapogapoku' ningi engi' go'ine ve'ine ningaa' nani' ne'mino neive.
Go'ine ve'ine ningi vikevo a'mido' lite' lo ga'ine molaa' neive.

Nene neiha O'moso'mi gamazi lo huko-lidine' nene gamazi gihile lamine' mino goloso niteli'mi gelekele' ve minuninguti' apase-ledaa' neive. Ne'mine oga' neine' nenako a'mine gamazi neuti' nene O'moso'mi monovomu' vise' ogo gate molamivo gele dovo' minelone' nene O'moso'mo a'mingu' hize ele' o-ledavo inite' muki' olone' nene lamine' ogavo muludeu' lamine' gelelesune.
Evene' malite O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo mono' ve none li lilizani' nete gamazi laa' ado' gizebo isa'mani' nene evene' a'ne'mine ve mono' ve nobe li engi' lu'ine golo izi soza lilisave.

Lodomulo' izipe ido' vene' geto' muhele' igi minani' nene ngele'mize lamine' olone' ido' me misubou' evene' O'mosomu' gilamaveti monovo'ine dokunivo lute do goloso ogalive lo gizebo ogo minelone' nene O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo mono' ve gihile minelonidi'mo Meteho O'moso'mi velelo' hehe lamine' lo mineleseive.
Neze zuho mate, lingine labana'vesi minive Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' i nizanako evene' di kegesi evene' mamu' siza li-ngidi evene' mamu' ningi hulaa' nani' nene nanitekumu' ve.
Lingine mono' gililisa di gese' igi nizavo ve mali'mo inite' lamine' ngolo analo' ngolidunu' lili' ani' lini lamine' izo nodizivo ve goho' gahali' ma genegana've litehevo' izo dizeline' nesi nene

lingine inite' lamine' ngolo nodizive ma ne ningi siza li-di gaza holomo lamineta me ogo minezo li-di ve goho' gahali' nene gaza aka' volela vo ote minezo ido' mehe'neko ogo minezo li li-imilizani' nene
lingine evene' di kegesi-ngidi gatine goloso gili evene' gizeka' iga' nave.

Neze zuho lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' mate, gililo. Evene' me misubou' minanguti' linge mamu' ve gohi' gahali' nizave li laa' nahe. A'mine ve nene O'moso'mo neze zuho lili' ilisave lo do kegese-ngidine' ma ve. Ee, ezemu' gili ele'vole' ikevo nemu' O'moso'mo gelavo gili ele'vole' ani' ne'mo heneni'ine lolo' ogavo heneni ve gililisave. Ido' lu'ine imilizavemu' O'moso'mo inite' ma ngemelesa salani molo-ngidine' neive. A'mine inite' nene a'mine goho' gahali' engi' ngemelove lo do kegese-ngidine' ma ve. Ido' ngemeline' inite' nene ne'mino neive: Ingine O'moso'mo gizebo o neingu' vi hilalisave.
Ne neiha lingine neve ningikevo goho' gahali' nene haza nite' minani' ve. Heneni ve neve ingine goboni mili-lingidi gonito' lengele'mizi di moni' moni' i-lingidaa' nave.
Ido' Izesu' gulive lamine' lingine di nizani' nene inginesi di hozi laa' ilizanako a'mine heneni ve nete divi' ledivi' iga' nave.
Mono' godolou' Guvetesi ve naba'mo lo huko line' gamazi ma ne'mino neive:
Geikumu' gelaa' naine' ne'mino gei' nanida nizavemu' gelo luka ngemezo lo lo neive.
Lingine a'mine ele'vole' gamazi gili dalizani' nene inite' gihile dalisani'za
evene' ma siza li-ngidi evene' ma ningi gosele' ilizani' nene lihime dalizani' o neive. Ido' ne'mine ilizani' nene O'moso'mo lo huko line' gamazi avuto' iga' ave minikeve loloseive.
Ve mali'mo O'moso'mo lo huko line' gamazi muki' gele do mino hamokovo' ma gele huliline' nene muki' avuto' ine' geleleseive.
O'moso'mo vene' longo' amilo ido' evene' ngibili hilamilo nesi line' ma neive. Nemu' nene gaza vene' longo' amaba evene' ma bele heleline' ne'mo mo lou' gamazi avuto' oga' anive lolo' olosane.

Ido' O'moso'mo evene' muki' ize' molo-ledelesa nene lihime monovolo' gelekele' ogo minuninguti' apase-ledaa' ine' lou' gamazi've nene gili di minahe gili hulahe lo ize' molo-ledeleseive. Ne'mine ilingumu' nene gilii lingine gamazi lilizadokisi inite' igi mili ilizadokisi gizebo igi minilo.

Ido' ve mali'mo evene' ise'ine izesa'mivo ma O'moso'mo goni' o-do eze iseve ize-damoloseive. Ido' evene' ma nete evene' ise'ine izaa' nave nene a'mine'mine ogo O'moso'mo engi' ise'ine ize-ngedeleseive. Ise'ine izaa' ne'mo goni' oga' nene ivile' oloseive.

Neze zuho mate, ve mali'mo monovo lamine' ogo molo minamo naza Izesu'nimu' giluvoni' nene gele ele'vole' okuve lo liline' nene haza nite' lolo' oloseive. Ne'mine ogovo' gele ele'vole' o do vilidoti' nene O'moso'mo do u' izamoloseive.
Ve ma he vene' ma he oko'nolo' inite' nomivo noso' nitekisi vise' ogo neivo

lengikuti' mali'mo a'mine vise' ine' inite' ma emamo geita hongu minivo vozo. Mu'mu lo-gidivo mino no gatunga ogo minezo lo lo-emeline' nene lamine' ilihe. A'mine haza gamazi line' ne'mo evene' ha do lamine' o-delihe. Haza ngelo do lamine' o-damoloseive.

Ido' a'mine'mine ogo a'mine gamazi line' nene haza nitekovo' minine' ne'mino monovo lamine' ogo molo minamo haza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' oga' nesi haza nite' neive. Evene' ma ingine gili ele'vole' igisa monovo lamine' nesi igi mili minamilizani' nene O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' ani' nene hele osu' lo haza nite' lolo' ogave.

Ne neiha lengikuti' ve mali'mo ti' lo lilihe lo gele nouve: Evene' malite O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' iga' navo ido' evene' ma nete monovo lamine' igi mili minaa' nave. Ido' ve ma ne'mine lo liline' naza ti' lo lo-emelesuve: Monovo lamine' ogo molo amosa O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' o naine' nene nado do soto' anivo ningelove. Ne neiha naza monovo lamine' ogo molo nouvoni' ne'mo O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' o nouvonikisi nene do soto' ogavo neloti' ha ningelesane lo lo-emelesuve.

Lingine O'moso hamokovo' neive li gili ele'vole' iga' nahe. Ne'mini gilaa' nani' nene mo lamine' neiha Satani'mi zuho sikalahu' goloso ingine nesi a'mine'mine igi O'moso neive li gilii gili ele'vole' iga' nave. Ee, ingine gili ele'vole' iga' nanako nemu' nene lihime lemeleseive li golise gilivo' minaa' nave.
Monovo lamine' ogo molo minamo O'mosomu' gele ele'volekovo' oga' olone' nene haza nite' neine' nenako gaza gelamabe. Ve negi mene naza gelebizelove.
Avoteho Abalahamu' aza gipele Isaka'ni O'moso gize emelesa ogo monovo lamine' ine' nemu' O'moso'mi velelo' ve lisihe' gehepeve lihime'vesi nomine' minine' giline' nene lingine mo gili nizave. Olo.

Nemu' nene aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ogo mino monovo lamine' nesi ogo molaa' idoti' nene monovo lamine' oga' monovo've ne'mo O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' oga' monovo've nene hize ele' ogo do gihile izo do soto' ine' nene ningi gilamahe.
Ne'mine ogavo mono' godolou' minine' gamazi ma nene gihile izine' ve. A'mine gamazi nene ne'mino neive:
Abalahamu' aza O'mosomu' gele ele'vole' ine' nemu' O'moso'mo gelo
Abalahamu' nene lihime've nomive ve lisihe' ve line'
Ido' evene' ingine ezemu' O'moso'mi zogo ve neive li lani'.

Nemu' nene O'moso'mo ningivo lihimete nomivo ve lisihe' minaa' noune' ne'mi monovo mo ningi osu' li nilisave. Ne'mi monovo ne'mino neive: Evene' haza gili ele'vole' iga' nanikovo' nene O'moso'mo ningivo lisihe' osa'mive. Ido' evene' ezemu' gili ele'vole' igi monovo lamine' nesi igi mili iga' nani' nene ningivo evene' lisihe' lihime'ine nomine' minaa' nave.

Ido' a'mine'mine ogo pasidia' vene' Lahaba' aza monovo lamine' ogavo O'moso'mo ezemu' gilivo lisihe' ine' ve. Isilaele' aleve Kanaha misubo dizi dalisa nizavo guve'inesi ve Zosuva' aza evene' ma misubo amamaka' mili ningilizave lo ngimiselavo vi a'mine Kanaha vene' Lahaba' neida vikevo aza ngele'mize numu'veu' molo Kanaha evene' nete ningi ngibilikelizave lo aka atota ngimiselavo vani'.

Ve ma sikalahu've nomivo oko'no losuvovo' mineline' nene mo hele neive lolosune. A'mine'mine ogo ve ma aza haza gele ele'vole' ogo mineline'za monovo lamine' ogo molo minamivo ma eze gele ele'vole' oga' neine've nene ezela mo helave lo lolosune.

Neze zuho mate, laza tisa' lolo' ogo nonivete ladanga gamazi lolone' nene O'moso'mo a'minemu' goni' o-ledo haza evene' goni' o-ngedeline' nene ivile' ivosa leli' nene goni' nabalo' o-ledeline' nene gili nizave. Gili nizanako nemu' nene lengikuti' evene' muki' tisa' lili' amilo.

Evene' muki' laza ladani vai' oga' noune. Evene' hamo' hamolite gamazi ladanga lamilizani' nene ingine ve lisihe' gehepeve minilisave. Ve'nido' gizebo lamine' igi gopo gamazi lisa'manako oko'nine mukito' ha gizebo lamine' ilizado' i nizave.
Hosi ize ingine inite' naba nizani'za oko'ine di zovo' izi vilizangumu' ve li sitia' inite' ainidunu' lili' ani' ngomo lasolo nene ve'ningu' di ingihi-ngidikevo ne'mo gamazi gilaa' nave.

A'mine'mine ogo sipi nene inite' naba' naba neivo ido' hepe' naba ne'mo do vaa' neine'za sipilo' daa' ive aza sipi'mi sitia've ngomolo' gelelehe' ogavo inite' nabali'mo a'mido' gele do zovo' izo vaa' neive.

A'mine'mine ogo vete nahuno nene inite' ngomo lasolo neine'za a'minetunu' gamazi lokunivo ne'mo inite' naba ma soto' oloseive. Olo' vele ngomo ne'mo gulumo ogo za zuho inite' mata' muki' lovotaa' neive.

Ido' vete nahuno nene olo' ne'mino neive. Okodela inite' vaikuti' vete nahuno nene misuboko monovo goloso mukiliti ize'nibo nene neive. Vete nahuno ne'mo okode lute do gopo' napa' oga' neive. Olo' vele nene gulumo ogo za zuho inite' mata' muki' lovotaa' neine' ne'mine ogo misubou' evene' mukiliti vete nahuno nene olo' ebekuti' ve Satani ne'mo do velepe' alepe' ize-ledavo gamazi goloso losa a'midoti' ogo molo oga' noune' inite' nene golosovo' o do vaa' neive.
Ize gulo gaha nama, gosihe', nosou' nama gaha ato atoli'mine muki' nene ha di ga'ine lilizado' o neive. Ido' di ga'ine laa' nani'za
vete nahuno nene ve mali'mo ngelo do gala lamoloseive. Vete nahuno nene inite' goloso do velepe' alepe' izo mino hazasi minesa'mive. Vete nahuno nene zahemede goloso helaa' inite' ne'mine neive.
Vete nahunodunu' Guvetesi ve Metehine opo'ni laa' noune. Ido' O'moso eze gidini do soto' ine' evene' nene a'mine vete nahunodunu' gamazi goloso lo-ngedaa' noune.
Vete hamokuti' opo'ni laa' noune. Ido' do velepe' izo gamazi goloso nesi laa' noune. Neze zuhokizo, nene edamine' suno neive.
Noso hinipini' hamokuti' lingela nene naa' limivo ido' lingela nene ekese' limivo ilihe.

Za ato' za dize nolingu' za mali'mi gihile've ngelo izamoloseive. Vaini nala' malo' gohuno gihile ngelo izelihe. Ido' guvo nosoti' naa' noso ohizelibe. nGelo ma ohizamolosane. Nemu' nene veka hamokuti' gamazi laminekovo' lemelive.

Lengikuti' ve ma gamazi monovo gelaa' ive mino gala gele veveso oga' ive noline' nene hokolize' amo gele vevesaa' monovo ne'mo do soto' oga' neine' monovo ado' okode do'mo lemo minaa' monovo ogo molo minelidoti' nene a'mine gamazi monovo gelo gele vevesaa' monovo've nene do soto' ilido' o neive.

Ne neiha lingine lutingu' lukehe ekese' ngibili mini ge hulo ne hulo li mini okodine di dizi laza gate gele veveso oga' nonive ne none li lilizani' nene mo gamazi lamine' lami sozasi lilisanako nemu' ne'mine lamilo.
Ne'mine ilizani' nene O'mosolati' neine' gele vevesali'mi monovo nene dalisave. O'mosomu' gili hulaa' ave me misubou' ve ingine iga' nani' ne'mine Satanilati' neine' monovo nene dalisave.
Lu'ningu' lukehe neivo ge hulo ne hulo li minilizada evene' lu'ine bizamivo gopo' napa' mini monovo goloso ato atoli'mine muki' di minilisave.

O'mosolati' gele vevesaa' monovo di minave engi' monovo'ine nene ne'mino neive: Inite' naba nene lu'ningu' goloso initekisi nomivo lu'ine laminekovo' minaa' neive. Ido' a'midoti' nene ve hongu vevo' mini gelekele' igi evene' muhele'ine ningi di lamine' tamine' i-ngidi ido' evenekumu' gili mamu' ngumo hilivo mamu' gosele' ngibilivo ami di kegesi-ngidami mini ve'ine avileloti' soza lamilisave.
Ido' hongu ve evene' kuku hili-ngidi hongu li minaa' nani' ne'mi gihile nene lisihe' lamine' minaa' nene soto' ogavo dalisave.

Ido' gamazi gohi ma lo-lengemeloze: Linginela lingizebolo' molavo lovo hizi minaa' nani' nene naniteli'mo ve. Lingine lanite' gili ahu' lani' inite' nete lutingu' lovo di soto' ikevo ne'mo lovo hizaa' nave.

Inite' mamu' lungumo hiline' nene dami evene' ngibililisa gilaa' nave. Ido' a'mine initekumu' mumuzo' igi ngeli ma damilizani' ogavo ma gililinga li lovo hizaa' nave. Inite' ma damani' nene O'mosola voku' lisa'madi'mo nene disa'mave.
Ido' inite' mamu' O'mosola voku' lani'za gatine goloso gili langisetine a'mine initeli'mi lanite' gililizangumukovo' voku' likevosa nene O'moso'mo lengemesa'mive.

Lingine nene vene' ma va'ningine huli ve gohi malo' vaa' ave ne'mine mini O'mosomu' lungumo hiline' nene huli me misubou' ve O'mosomu' gili hulani' alevemukisi ido' engi' inite'inemukisi lungumo heleline' ne'mo O'moso mehedine imaa' ido' lovo i imaa' o neine' ne gilamahe.
Ido' mono' godolou' gamazi ma ne'mino neive:
O'moso'mo leze luteu' molani' sikalahute ne'mo inite' ato' atokumu' umo helavo
a'mine nene dalongisi lo ahu' laa' neive.
A'mine gamazi nene hazamu' neive li gilahe. O'ove. Hazamu' nomive.
Ne neiha lumo helaa' inite' goloso nene gele emamoloningumu' ve lo O'moso'mo vauve elo hize ele' o-ledaa' neive. Nemu' nene mono' godolou' gamazi ma ti' lo neive:
O'moso'mo hokolize' iga' ave lovo o ngemo limi minave hize ele' o-ngedaa' neive.
Nemu' nene O'moso gelekele' i-di Satani nene o've li-di gili huli-dilo. Ne'mine ikevo hulo-lengedo golise vohaha oloseive.

Lingine O'mosola vi gi'mizilizani' nene aza linginela a'mine'mine ogo gi'mizeleseive. Lingine goloso inite' daa' nave a'mine inite' alo' hulilo. Ido' O'mosola volohe goloso initeta volohe li ve'nehe' ka'nehe' nilani' nene huli lutine noso izi di lamine' ilo.

Lingine monovotida gili evene' goloso none li agae agae li longovozo hili mulumo gili ive ilo. Ee, gize zohi' igi longolize izaa' nani' nene huli mulumo gili muhele' igi ivevo' igi agae agae li minilo.
Ne'mine igi Guvelesi ve'mi velelo' langisetine lutine di'mi limilo. Ne'mine ikevo Guvelesi ve aza do'mo dize-lengedeleseive.

Neze zuho mate, lengiku' ge dovo ledevo' o-nede ne dovo ledevo' o-gede lamilo. Ve mali'mo gonolohi monovo ize' molo dovo ledevo' ogo lihime molo-deline' nene ezevo' ne'mine o-damoloseive. Lou' gamazi nesi ne'mine o-do dovo ledevo' ogo ivile' ogo ize' molaline' nene lou' gamazi gele daa' anive minamo lou' gamazilo' gizebo ogo ize' molaa' anive lolo' ogane.

Ido' O'moso'mo asi've hamo' lou' gamazi do soto' ogo ize' molaa' ive neive. Asi'vevo' do lu' izaakumu' ido' lele'mize tolovo ogakumu' laa' ive neive. Neine' nenako gasika O'moso noosa gonahi monovo ize' molo lihime molo-delibe.
Lingine nene O'moso ivile' igi idise nehe aize' nehe ebe' mala vo kilisimasi hamo' mino bisinisi gono do moni heneni do soto' olone li laa' nani' aleve nene gamazi ma lo-lengemeloze.

Aize' inite' ne'minesi ne'minesi ogo molo ogo minelone laa' nani' nene lingine aize' soto' iline' inite' nene gili niisa laa' nahe. Lingine mo gilamave. O'mosovo' gele neive. Lengi' minivi' divi' igi nizani' nene olo' sokile ne'mino neive. Olo' sokile nodizivo nodizivo evene' gamene ngomo ningi nizavo gete geto osu' laa' neive.
Nemu' nene ne'mine li lilo: Guvetesi ve'mo gelavo lamine' o neivo ma mine do dizo inite' ne'minesi ne'minesi ogo molo minelone li lilo.
Idise lingine monovo goloso di lihime nidave. Hokolize' igi O'moso ivile' igi inite' ne'minesi ne'minesi ogo molo minelone li okodine di dizaa' nave.

Ido' inite' veveso lisihe' ogali'mi monovo ningi gili minisasi a'mine monovo lisihe' amilizani' nene lihime dalisave. Nemu' O'moso ivile' ami O'moso'mo gelo gele lemavo ma inite' ne'minesi ne'minesi ogo molo minelone li lilo.
Heneni nganeni ve lingine gililo. Mulumo nite' naba linginela soto' ilingumu' geke' geke' li ive nama igi minilo.
Henenitine di nubo nubo ani' nene mo hulupo elavo geneganatine lamine' nene gi'ningoni nete mo huki nikeve.

Ido' monitine nene gaba hitine' ne'mo moni di gili' li minani' monovotine nene do soto' ogavo ne'mo mulumo gono dikevo okodine ololi'mo lovotine' geleleseive. Heneni di nubo nubo igi milani'za misubou' inite' osu' liline' gamene mo alitave.

Lengi' midingu' gono dave ingine gohise hili minamuno dolizi-lingidikevo lingine meni'ine lingela di haleki ngimamavo nemu' gono daa' ave ive nama ikevo inite' mukito' gizebo oga' ive amuzo'vesi minive O'moso aza gelave.

Lingine me misubou' mini noso' nitetine vai' ivo nivi' nivi' igi mini lanite' ato atoli'mine gili ize ne'mine gehesani'. Ne'mine igi gehesi minikeni'za O'moso'mo lengebeleline' gamene nene mo noalitive.
Lingine nete evene' vevesi lisihe' i minani' goni' i-ngidi ngibilani'. Ido' lingine ningibilavo ingine di tibizi lingibilami haza hongu li minaa' nave.

Neze zuho mate, gosele' asele' ami Guvetesi ve alingumu' gizebo igi minilo. Lingine gili nizave. Mine zuho' iga' avete mine zuho' ani' nene gomu' golinesi alinge' golinesi izavo minamuno o molavo mine lamine' nalone li gosele' asele' ami gizebo igi minaa' nave.
A'mine'mine igi lingine gosele' asele' ami lutine mili ele'vole' igi minilo. Guvetesi ve aline' gamene nene mo alitelesa neize.
Neze zuho mate, goni' o-ledelive mo avito' ogave. Goni' ikelizaze. Lingine ge nemenga laani ne gemenga loku lami lamini ha minilo.

Ido' O'moso'mi velemu' igi eze gamazi li soto' iga' ave polohete ingine evenelite goboni nimili-ngidavo nemu' nene gosele' asele' ami ele'vole' igi minani' nene gili nizave. Ingine mulumo initeku' mini gosele' asele' amo ele'vole' ogo minali'mi monovo nene lelebizikenaze. Ingine adi'mine ilo.

Gili nizahe. Ingine mulumo initeku' mini hongu li ele'vole' igi minave engikumu' nene O'moso'mo mulunou' lamine' gelo do lamine' o-ngedaa' neinako nemu' lamineku' minave ve lo laa' noune. Satani'mo goboni molo-davo Hizobe' aza mulumo alumo gilingukisi hongu lo ele'vole' ogo minine' ma gili nizave. Ido' alinge' Guvetesi ve inite' mata' lamine' lehize-dine' nesi mo gili nizave. Nemu' nene Guvetesi ve'mo muhelete ningo muluno hukavo hize ele' o-ledaa' neive lo gelelone.

Neze zuho mate, amuzo gamazi ma lo-lengemeloze. Gililo. Lingine gamazi ma lilizani' nene lamine' nolune li lilisa Okulumoto' li mili adine dizi li hukamilo. Ido' misubolo' ido' inite' malo' malo' li mili li hukamilo. O'mosola goni' ikelizaze. Lingine inite' mamu' oo. Mo lamineto' nolune lili ma nene laminetokovo' lilo. Ido' o've. Ne'mine amolone lili ma nene laminetokovo' lilo.
Lengikuti' ve ma mulumo geni initeku' mino ma O'mosola lilive. Ido' mali'mo mulunou' lamine' goloso gelo mino ma O'moso opo'ni nolo nama lilive.
Ido' lengikuti' ve ma inite' gize do ongo mino ma mono' gizebo ve mamu' elese molavo igi heteli O'mosola li Guvelesi ve'mi velemu' igi uveli noso hili-dilisave.

O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' i mini O'mosola lilizani' nene Guvelesi ve'mo do lamine' o-davo inite' gize dave aza lamine' geleleseive. Lamine' gelavo lihime've ma mineline' nene O'moso'mo a'mine lihime've hulo-deleseive.

O'moso'mo do lamine' o-lengedelingumu' ve li lihime di mini' mini' ani' nene ingine li soto' avo lingine li soto' avo di bizi O'mosola li ge numuna lo-nede ne numuna lo-gede laa' ilo. Ve lisihe' vevesi minavete O'mosola lilizani' nene amuzo malehe inite' neive. Ne'mo O'moso'mo gelavo inite' gihilevo' soto' oloseive.
Elia' nene leli' gidini ve'mo asi've nene goline izamilive lo amuzo molo O'mosola lavo kilisimasi setohamosi ike'ni lumo sigisi vivo misubolo' goline izamine'.
Alinge' nene gohi goline izelive lo O'mosola lavo Okulumokuti' goline izavo misubou' inite' mata' muki' nene gala ho'li dizani'.
Neze zuho mate, lengikuti' mali'mo mono' gamazi gihile hulo aka zovo' izo gopo novivo ma mali'mo ele'mize tine' molaline' nene

aza gamazi ti' lo geleleseive: Ve mali'mo lihime'vesi ve ma aka golosolo' novidoti' do tine' molo-deline' nene a'mine lihime'vesi ve'mo emeni've nene mudise do u' izo lihime've muki' do hulo-dine' geleleseive. Modave.

Izesu' Kilisito' aposolo minuve Petolo' naza lingine Izesu' Kilisito' gamazi've gili diivo' minilizangumu' ve losa ido' vanise've ne'mo noso ize-lengedo Kilisito' gelekele' ve lengele'mize molalingumu' ve losa ei' O'moso'mi Sikalahu've ne'mo nene do kekeize lo-lengedelive lo O'moso'mo gomukuti' vomine gele minido' e'meto do kegese-lengede neine' aleve lingine venenga ve ne'mine gili mini gamene li'nibemukovo' Podo misuboukisi Galatia misuboukisi Kapadokia misuboukisi Asia misuboukisi ido' Bitinia misuboukisi mini'mi monave lengi' nene luhuvo nite' mene nogize-lingiduve. O'mosolati' nasahili' nesi ido' hongu lo lamino minaa' monovo nesi nene lengita mine vai' lo'mo vo miniliho.

Ido' Guvetesi ve Izesu Kilisito' ei' O'moso've mino ei' meleho minive nene opo'ni lolone. Opo'ni lolone' nene ado' O'moso'mo mulumote naba gelosa lemeni dameni nene do gosoho' o-ledo gohi do soto' o-ledave. Ido' ne'mine o-lidine' nene laza minevo' alevo' lamine' daloningumu' upuho' ogo gilingili ogo mino a'minemu' gele mu'musi' ogo none' akalo' nene lele'mize nomolosa lemeni dameni nene do gosoho' o-ledo gohi do soto' o-lidine' ve. Ido' ne'mine o-lidine' nene Izesu Kilisito' hilinguti' do ote-didi'mo nene ne'mine o-lidine' ve.

Ee, ido' ne'mine ine' nene aza Okulumokuko salani molo-lengede neine' inite' ado' geleso osu' lamaa' ido' goloso'vesi minamaa' ido' emeni dameni've gopo amo gosoho' laminekovo' minaa' inite' nene dalizangumu' ve losa lengemeni dameni do gosoho' o-lengedo gohi do soto' o-lengedave.

Ido' lingine a'mine salani molo neine' inite' dalizave noluvoni' nene lingine ezemu' gili ele'vole' igi minaa' nani' nemu' nene O'moso'mo do lungu' izelingumu' ve losa ei' amuzo've ne'mo alete molo-lengede minaa' neingumu' nene noluve. Aza do lungu' izelesa do nene ogo neine' nene gamene nabala do soto' ogo mudise do lungu' izeleseive.
Nemu' nene lingine longolize izilizado' o neive. Ee, O'moso'mo gelavo idise nene gamene li'nibemu' mulumo geni ato ato' ma gihi nilizangukisi nene longolizevo' izi minilizado' o neive.

Ido' a'mine mulumo geni gihaa' ilizani' nene nanitekumu' ve. Lingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi minaa' nani' nene aza mo gihile lamine' nehe lo ne'mi monovo do soto' o-lengedelesa nene lengemengu' nomolave. Ido' evenelite gilavo ngoli ne'mo inite' mata' muki' ngivile' ogo inite' lamine' neiha ngoli nene ngoli lamine' nolihe li ningilisa oloku' gizikevo lo'votamo ha minaa' neiha alinge' ngoli nesi nene vo osu' loloseive. Lingine O'mosomu' gili ele'vole' igi minaa' nanitine nene gihile lamine' noline' nene mo ngoli nene ivile' goloso ivosa inite' naba neive. Nemu' nene ne'mino O'moso'mo lengemengu' molaa' ilidoti' gele ele'vole' ogatine gihile lamine' neine' nene soto' ogavo Izesu Kilisito' gohi soto' o lemeline' gamenela nene aza longopo'ni lo gulivetine do hozi lo do naba o-lengedelingumu' nene a'mine mulumo geni ato ato' nene gihaa' ilisave.

Izesu Kilisito'ni nene lingine mo ma ningamani'za lutine imi minikeve. Ido' idisesi mene oko'nolo' ma ningami nizangukisi nene ezemu' gili ele'vole' i mini lutingu' gulumo avile lisivo longolize izi minani' nene laza evenelitesi ngelo monovo ma lamolonido' o minine' longolize ado' Okulumokuti' atoli'mine ogo minine' ma ne neive.

Ido' ne'mine igi longolize izi nizani' nene Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' igi minani' ne'mi gihile've nene O'moso'mo lutine lukuvo emelido' mini mili nizani' nemu' nene lutingu' gulumo avile lisivosa longolize izi nizave.

O'moso'mo leli' lehize-ledelesa gele minine' nasahilikumu' li soto' ika' ika' iga' ave gozopo' minani' polohete nete nene a'mine a'me luvoni' gamazi ado' O'moso'mo lukuvo lemeline' nene nado lemelive li ne'mi monovomu' nene gelelone li vise' ika' ika' i'mi vi minani' ve.

Ee, Kilisito' Sikalahu've ne'mo a'mine polohete engiku' omo mino Kilisito' mulumo geni ato ato' gehelingumukisi lo soto' ogo ido' ne'mine ilidoti' Guvelesi ve naba gehepeve lolo' ogo mineline' makilo' mine do dizelingumukisi lo soto' ine' nene a'mine polohete nete a'mine mulumo geni gehelive zaho nolive li ido' a'mine Sikalahuli'mo lo soto' ogo lo-limine' inite' nene nani gamenelo' soto' ilizave li ne'mi monovo nene vise' ika' ika' iga' ani' ve.

Vise' ikevo O'moso'mo ti' lo ngelebizine' ve: Ingine Kilisito' geheline' initekumu' li soto' igi gono dani' nene angise'inemu' dami asi lengikumu' dani' nene O'moso'mo ngelebizavo gilani' ve. Ido' a'mine Kilisito'nimu' lani' gamazi nene idise lingine mo gilikeve. O'moso'mo Sikalahu' Okulumokuti' lelita imiseline' ne'mo do ote-ngedavo Kilisito'nimu' gamazi lamine' li soto' igi li-lingimave nete nene mo li soto' igi li-lingimikevo gilikeve. Ido' a'mine li-lingimani' gamazi laminekumu' nene angelo' netesi nene ma ningo geleloinakoo li gili minaa' nave.

Ne'mine o neine' nenako nemu' nene lutine gatine nene gono dalido' di nene i-di mini lingine negi hizami monovotido' ha gizebo lamine' igi mini Izesu Kilisito' soto' o lemelido' nasahili' gohi o-ledelingumu' nene mudise gili mu'musi' i minisa minilo.

Lingine O'moso'mi izipahala mini ei' gamazi've gili dalizado' o neine' nenaze. Nemu' nene lingine gomu' ezemu' gilami haza minani' gamenela vomine lanite' gilaa' ani' inite' malo' nene gohi mini milamilo.
Asi mono' godolou' nene O'moso'mo line' gamazi ti' li gizi nizani' ve:
Naza nene monovo'ne golososi nomine' nouvoni' nenako nemu' nene linginesi monovotine golososi nomine' minilo.

Ido' ne'mine line' gizi nizani' nenako nemu' nene elese molo-lengedo do eita ive O'moso aza monovo goloso'vesi nomivo neine' ne'mine igi linginesi nene inite' mata' muki' igi mili ilizangu' nene monovotine golososi nomine' minilo.

Ido' lingine meteho ve li O'mosola laa' nani'za evene' muki' ize' molo-ledaa' iline' nene gopo evene' mala ninge lamine' o-ledoo mala ninge goloso o-lede minosa nene ize' molo-ledeline' nevoba asi leli' hamo hamo' nene ogo molo olonido' olonido' do molo meni lamine' lemelihe goloso lemelihe iline' nene mo a'mine o nolone' inite' lisihe' o nolidokovo' nene lisihe' ogo golo hizo lemeleseive. Ne'mine iline' nenako lingine olihe goto' numudine Okulumokuko vi minami venenga ve gili me misubouko minilizani' gameneu' nene ezemu' lengehelele izivosa mini monovo lisihe' laminekovo' igi mili minilo.

Ido' ne'mine igi minilizani' nene lingine ti' li gili nizani' nemu' nene ne'mine igi minilisave. Lingine lengi' avotingidati' di minani' dingani monovo igi mili minanguti' nene do eita ogo meni hize-lingidine' nene me misubou' inite' hulupo eleline' siluva' nehe ngolimoni nehe nevo'mine inite' nedunu' nene meni hizine' nevoba

asi mo Kilisito' vanise've lamine' nedunu' meni hizine' ve. Ee, Kilisito' aza lihimetemu' belaa' noune' sipisipi angale oko'nolo' inite' goloso hamokisi nomine' ne'mine lolo' ogo neivo biladoti' vanise've lamine' nedunu' nene meni hizine' ma neive.
Ee, O'moso'mo me misubo nene olihe do soto' amosa gozopo' vomiloti' nene ne'mine ilingumu' ha mo ningo gele minine'za ha minosa alinge' gameneu' mene lengikumu' ve losa do soto' o-dine' ve.

Ne'mine o-davo a'mine Kilisito' gono dadoti' nene lingine Kilisito' hilinguti' do ote-do do naba o-dive O'mosomu' nene gili ele'vole' ani' nene O'mosomu' neve nene gili ele'vole' igi ezemu' gili mu'musi' igi minaa' nave.

Lingine gamazi gihile di minadi'mo lutingu' monovo goloso minine' nene di huli lutine di guluvi' lisa lingine lengi' zuho Kilisito' evenele lutine ngimilizani' nene abeleni ami asi lutine ngimi gili' lilizado' nene lisihe' i nizaze. Mo lutine laminetoti' nene amuzo mili lutine ge neme ne geme li minilo.

Lingine nene lengemeni dameni gosoho' ogavo gohi soto' ani' ve. Ido' gohi soto' ani' nene helosa osu' lilive'mo zuho molavosa nevoba asi helosa osu' lamaa' neive'mo zuho molavosa gohi soto' ani' ma neive. Ee, minevo' minevo' ogo mino minevo' minevo' ogali'mi monovo do soto' o-ledaa' neine' inite' O'moso'mi gamazi ne'mo lengi' lutingu' gono dadoti' nene lengemeni dameni do gosoho' ogavo gohi soto' ani' ma neive.
Ido' mene noluvoni' gamazi nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' gamazilo' vo milise' o neivosa nene noluve:
Evene' muki' leli' nene guvise navise ne'mine nene none.
Ido' leli' do soto' oga' noune' inite' lamine' tamine' ato ato' muki' nene
ha a'mine guvise naviseli'mi guvovo ne'mine nene neive.
Guvise nene ga'nuvo elo osu' lavosa
guvovo've nene suludo'mozaa' neive.
Ne'mine oga' neiha Guvelesi ve'mi gamazi nene mo ele'vole' ogo
minevo' minevo' ogovo' mineleseive.
Ido' a'mine Guvelesi ve'mi gamazi nene ado' a'mine li soto soto' igi li-lingimani' gamazi lamine' nene neive.

Nemu' nene lingine goloso monovo ato ato' muki' ado' evene' go'ine izaa' ido' lutingu' monovo goloso haleko neivosa evene' lamine' gili monaa' ido' evene' maliti initekumu' lavodine lemavo muludingu' goloso gilaa' ido' gamazi di goloso igi laa' monovo ato ato' muki' nesi nene ogalone li mudise huli osu' lisa mini
O'moso'mi gamazi ne'mo lute do naba ogavo lukuvo naloningumu' ve li izipe namunolite aminemu' ngisavo iga' nani' ne'mine igi lingine a'mine lutine'mi noso' nite' aminemu' nene lingisivosavo' minilo.
Ne'mine igi minilizave lo noluvoni' nene lingine Guvelesi ve'mo mulumote ningo do lamine' o-ledaa' neine' monovo've'mi lanite've ningi nigilani' nemu' nene noluve.

A'mine Guvelesi ve nene numuno gizaa' geheni sikalahu'vesi minine' ne'mine ne neive. Evene' nete ei' nene di ningisa goloso neive li di hulani'za O'moso'mo eikumu' gilivo dizo neivosa do kegese-dine' nenaze. Eita nene igi gi'mizi minilo.

Ne'mine igisa lingine nene numuno gizaa' geheni sikalahu'vesi minine' ne'mine lili' igi minikevo O'moso'mo ei' Sikalahu've'mi numu've lolo' o-lengedelize. Guvelesi vela igi gi'mizilo. Ido' ne'mine igisa lingine O'moso'mi numungu' gono di-dilisa kekeize li minani' zuho lili' igi mono' numuno nabau' O'moso inite' lehizi-daa' ani' ne'mine igi O'moso'mo Izesu Kilisito' gono dangumu' gelosa ninge lamine' daline' inite' nene lengi' lutinguti' nene di soto' igi lehizi-dilizave.
Mene noluvoni' nene mo lamineto' mono' godolou' O'moso'mo line' gamazi ti' li gizi nizado' nene e'meto noluve:
Lingine gili'nalo.
Naza numuno gizaa' geheni mamu' nene giluvo dize neivosa
a'mine geheni nene numuno do amuzo molaa' geheni minelive losa
do kegeso neni' evene'ne zuhoti ebe'nine Zaioni golo neu'
ado' engi' vovo'ningu' gehepeve nene nohulo-duve.
Ido' ezemu' gili ele'vole' ilizave muki' nene
gili ele'vole' ilizani' ne'mi gihile nene soto' amivo
ngovozo ma hilamilisave.

Ido' a'mine geheni nene mo dizo neive noluvoni' nene lingine ezemu' gili ele'vole' i nizave nene ezemu' gilavo dize neivosa nene noluha evene' ma ezemu' gili ele'vole' amavela nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizani' gamazi malo' nene mo gihile izave:
Numuno gizilizani' geheni mukikuti' nene geheni ma
numuno gizaa' avelite ningisa goloso o vive li di hulani' geheni ne'mo
geheni muki' ngivile' ogo numuno do amuzo molaa' geheni lolo' ogave.
Ido' ma nene:
A'mine geheni nene evene' lodoho' izi limi pou' li
ingalizani' geheni gehepeve ne neive.
Ingine lodoho' izi limi ingaa' nani' nene O'moso'mi gamazi gili damadi'mo nene limi ingaa' nave. O'moso'mo ingine mo ne'mine ilizave lo gele neido' nene ne'mine iga' nave.

Ne neiha lingine neve nene mo O'moso'mo ei' ve lo do kegesine' zuho mini Guvelesi ve naba'mi mono' gono di-di inite' lehizi-daa' aveliti muliseuti' mini O'moso'mo ei' ve lo do kekeize lo-lengede neine' zuho nene nizave. Ido' ne'mine nizani' nene vode vavo lehelele izeline' labana'veu' nene liti'musouti' elese molo-lengedo lengele'mize molavemu' nene opo'ni li guvele li soto soto' ilizangumu' nene ne'mine aleve nene nizave.

Gomu' lingine evene' numuno gulivetine minamivo gopo minani'za idise nene numuno gulivetine O'moso'mi evenele zuho ve lisa nene nizave. Gomu' nene O'moso'mo isete izo nasahili' o-ledaa' ine' monovo've nene lengita hetelamivo minani'za idise nene mo lengita ogo hetelavo a'mine'mi lulou' nene nizave.

Lingine lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' alevekizo, me misubou' aleve minami gamene li'nibemukovo' a'mida mene minilizani' nenako okodine'mo me misubou' initekumu' lanite' giline' nene gili hulilo. Okodine'mo ne'minemu' giline' ne'mo lutine nene ivile' olosa lovo o emaa' neinaze. Lingine gili hulilo lo nolo-lingiduve.

O'moso'mi evenele minamaveti zuhoti vovo'ningu' minilizangu' lingine igi mili ilizani' nene mo monovo lisihe' laminekovo' nene igi mili minilo. Ee, ingine lengikumu' evene' goloso ve li divi ledivi' i-lingidi laa' naha ne'mine i-lingidi minilizangukisi monovo lamine' igi mili iga' ilizani' nene ningi mini' mini' ilizadi'mo O'moso'mo monovo'nido' ogo do ningeline' gamenelo' ingine nene a'mine monovote laminekumu' O'moso opo'ni lilizangumu' ve li monovo lisihe' laminekovo' igi mili minilo.

Guvelesi ve'mo ningivo lamine' ilingumu' ve li lingine evenelite amuzo ato ato' ngimani' aleve muki' nene gelekele' i-ngidivo' minilo. Ado' evene' linge muki' ngivile' ogo minive guvelesi ve naba gehepeve nolihe

ido' a'mine guvelesi ve naba ne'mo ingine evene' monovo goloso ilizave lihime ngemaa' gonosi ido' monovo lamine' ilizave ngopo'ni laa' gono nesi nene dalizave lo ngele'mize molave ngamani naba nilizahe muki' nene gelekele' i-ngidivo' minilo.

Ido' lingine gelekele' i-ngidivo' minilizave noluvoni' nene O'moso'mo ti' lo gele neingumu' nene noluve: Ado' lingine monovo lisihe' lamineto' e'meti minilizadi'mo evene' negi ado' gamazi monovo gilamavete divi ledivi' i-lingidaa' nave neti ve'nido' nene humo izi-ngidikevo gohi lamilisave lo gele neive.

Lingine Mose' louli'mi gesi mingu' mini nalato' ve gili minanguti' kuluhizi nizani'za a'mine louli'mo adelo' damivo fili o none' nenako nemu' nene monovo ato ato' muki' nene lihime've nomivo gopo ha olosune lisa monovo goloso dikelizave. Ne'mine amilo. Asi O'moso'mi gelekele' ve mini ei' lulolokovo' igi mili minilo.

Ado' evene' mukikumu' gilavo dizivo mini Kilisito' evenele leli' zuho muki' nene lutine ngimi mini O'mosomu' golise gili mini a'mine me misubou' guvetinesi ve naba minive nene di naba i-di gili imi minilo.

Gonolo' gipe alu lingine lengehelele gehepeve izivo mini metinge gizebo vetine nene gelekele' i-ngidivo' minilo. Ado' gizebo vetine ve lamine' hongu ve ne'mine minilizanikovo' gelekele' i-ngidi minilizavoba asi metinge gasava ve minilizani' nesi nene ha gelekele' i-ngidivo' minilo.
Ee, evene' ma inite' ma do goloso amilido' hazamu' mulumo gono imikevosa aza hongu lo mino a'mine mulumo nene O'mosomu' gele mino ha geheline' nene O'moso'mo ezemu' gelavo lamine' oloseive.

Ne neiha lingine inite' ma di goloso ikevo a'minemu' lihime lingimi gavoso nilingibilavo lingine hongu li mini ha gihilizani' nemu' nene longopo'ni lilizado' minilizahe. O'ove. Longopo'ni lamilisani'za lingine inite' lisihe' lamine' ma ikevo gavoso nilingibilavo lingine hongu li ha gihilizani' nene O'moso'mo ningivo lamine' oloseive.

Ido' ne'mine ilizave lo noluvoni' nene O'moso'mo ne'mine ilizave lo elese molo lengele'mize molani' nenako nemu' noluve. Ido' O'moso'mo ne'mine ine' nene Kilisito' azasi lingine neni' ogo molo uvodo' api' napi' igi igi mili minilizave lo avazaha pikisa ne'mine bele molo lengito' medelo mulumo gono gihine' nenako nemu' nene O'moso'mo linginesi ne'mine ilizave losa elese molo-lengedave.
A'mine ogo molo minido' api' napi' igi e'metilizave Kilisito'
aza nene lihime ma damine' ma neive.
Ido' go'ine izo soza gamazi veleuti' livo evene' hamoli'mosi ma gelamine' ve.

Evenelite divi ledivi' igi elemado' nene do velepe' izo aza a'mido' do goloso o-ngedo ngelemesa'mine' ve. Ido' mulumo nite' i-dado' nene golo hizo golise gililiza gamazi lo-ngedamo asi goni' do lisihe' ogovo' gelaa' ive O'moso'mi anaukovo' molosa ezelo' lehete o minaa' ine' ve.

Ido' leli' nene lihime mudise hulisa monovo lisihe' laminekovo' igi mili minivi' alivi' ilizangumu' ve losa asi've nene leli' lihimete ei' oko'nolo' geho a'minemu' nene lohoto' zalo' hiline' ve. Ei' biladi'mo lingine nene mo lamine' ikeve.

Ido' naza ne'mine noluvoni' nene lingine sipisipi ize ne'mine mini vi gopo igi minani'za idise mini velepe' izi lengi' lutine'mi noso nite' eme'mo vo a'mido' gizebo o-lengedelivela igi gi'mizikeni' nizani' nenako nemu' nene noluve.

Ido' gomu' noluvoni' ne'mine igi vene' nete vadingine gelekele' i-ngidivo' minilo. Ee, ne'mine ikevo vadinge engikuti' linge ma Kilisito' gamazilo' gili dami nilizani' nene vene'ine lingine ha lengehelele izivo mini monovo goloso lengita nomivo monovo laminekovo' igi mili nizavo ingine a'mido' ningi mini' mini' ilizani' ne'mo nene lingine gamazi li-ngimamavosi Kilisito'nimu' gili ele'vole' igi eze zuhouko ha di imine' mili minilizahe. Nemu' lengi' nene ha gelekele' i-ngidivo' minilo.

Ido' gonolisetine nene okodine losuvolo' mineline' inite' ado' madudine zopovo nalava izi di ma'mine ma'mine iga' nehe, ngolidunu' lili' ani' inite' nehe, okodido' inite' lamine' tamine' nehe, nevo'mine inite' neve nene minelivoba
asi lengemeni dameni lutinguko haleko minaa' neine' ado' hongu lo alaha' ogo minaa' lengemeni dameni ne'mo nene litehe elo osu' lamo gonolisetine gihile mineleseive.

Ee, ido' gomu' vomila O'mosola gi'mizi mini ezelo' gili mu'musi' igi minaa' ani' vene' nete nene lute'mi gonolise've minelive li a'mine ne'mine monovolo' e'metisa va'ningida gelekele' i-ngidi minani' nenako lengitasi ne'mine monovotine mineline' nene lamine' oloseive.

Mene noluvoni' nene ado' Sala' aza Abalahamu'nimu' nenito' gizebo ve ve lo gamazi've gele do'mo vo minaa' ine' ma'minemu' nene noluve. Ido' lingine monovo laminetokovo' e'meti mini ne'mine mana'mine initekumu' golise gilami minilizani' nene ei' aluvo gidini mini ei' gili vani' minilisave.

Ido' va'ninge lingine eledinginemu' luvodi'mine ogo ti' lo nolo-lingimuve: Lingine nene O'mosola laa' olone' akate nene goloso ogalive li eledinginemu' nene ingine amuzo damani' mini lelitoti' nene limisa nizave li ngele'mize lamine' igi mini O'moso'mo lehize-ledavo minevo' alevo' oga' lemeni dameni nene engikisi lelikisi makato' dalonive ne nizave li ele'vole' i-ngidami asi gili nge li mini zou li makato' lamini bizi minilo.

Naza gamazi lo osu' lo do vo no'novo molalosa ti' lo nolo-lingimuve: Lingine lutine gatine nene hamoli'minevo' minivosa minilo. Ido' ge mulumo'ne ninge-nede ne mulumoka ninge-gede lisavo' minilo. Ido' lengi' nene hamo' zuho nizanaze. Ge luka neme ne lu'ne geme lisavo' minilo. Ido' ezemu' mulunga hukivo hukivo gezemu' muluno hukivo hukivo lisavo' minilo. Ido' hokolize' ami okodine di'mi limivo' minilo.

Ido' lengi' di goloso nii-lingidavo ma a'mido' golo hizi di goloso i-ngidamilo. Ido' a'mine'mine igi lengi' nene gamazidunu' gizi'voti gamazi ma nili-lingidavo ma nene a'mido' golo hizi lingine gizi'voti li-ngidamilo. Asi O'moso'mo lengi' vise lo do eita ine' nene eitati' nene no'noho' dalizave losa ne'mine ine' nenako nemu' nene ne'mine nii-lingidavo ma a'mido' nene O'moso'mo no'noho' ize-lingidivo lisavo' nene li-ngimilo.
Mene nolo-lingimuvoni' gamazi neve nene mono' godolou' gamazi ti' li gizi nizani' malo' nene vo nodave:
Ve ma aza minevo' alevo've lamine' minivo
laminekovo' mine do dizelesa gelelive nene
vele'mo gamazi gosoho' nasaha' lo gamazi goloso lalive lo
velelo' nene gizebo lamine' ilive.
Ido' monovo golosomu' nene olovo' o mino monovo laminekovo' ilive.
Ido' hongu lo lamino minaa' monovomu' nene vise' ogo
imisele do vo dalive.
Ee, Guvelesi ve'mi vele nene evene' lisihetokovo' hulo mino
gizebo o-ngedo mino
ezemu' lilizani' gamazi nene gelelesa gapepe' o minaa' neiha
evene' monovo goloso daa' avela nene gololo' ninge-ngedo minaa' neine' nenako
nemu' nene a'mine minevo' alevo' lamineku' minelesa gelelive nene
a'mine meuko luvoni' ne'mine nene ilido' o neive.
Ido' lingine monovo laminekovo' igi mili ilisa amuzo mili minilizani' nene evenelite ma di goloso i-lingidilizado' o neihe. Mo o'ove.

Ne neiha monovo lamine' igi mili ilizangumukisi mulumo gono ma gihi-lingidilizani' nene O'moso'mo ninge lamine' o-lengedeleseinako lamine' oloseive. Lingine evenelite lengehelele izeline' inite' i-lingidilizani' nene muludine badavo golise gilamilo.

Kilisito' nene lengi' lutine'mi Guvelesi ve minelive li ele'mizi milalo. Ido' lingine Kilisito'nimu' gili mu'musi' i nizangumu' evenelite longo' i-lingidika' i-lingidika' ilizado' nene a'mine gili mu'musi' i nizani' ne'mi monovo nene li ngolo' li li-ngimilizado' di va'va' ikisavo' minilo.

Ido' ne'mine igi li-ngimili ma nene humedame ami hongu gamazi laminekovo' li-ngimilo. Ido' lingine Kilisito' evenelelite ilizado' o neine' monovo lamine' igi mili minaa' naangumu' divi ledivi' igi laa' nave nene a'mine lengemenga langumu' nene ngovozo hililizangumu' ve li monovo lisihe' lamine' gehepeve neive li lutingu' gili nizadokovo' nene e'meti minilo.

Ido' O'moso'mo gelavo lingine mulumo geni gihilizado' o noline' nene lingine monovo laminekovo' e'metilizadoti' a'mine mulumo geni gihilizani' nene lamine' oloseiha lingine mulumo geni gihilizani' nene mo monovo goloso dalizadoti' gihilizani' neve nene mo goloso oloseive.

Ee, Kilisito' azasi nene mulumo alumo gelo hiline' ve. Aza nene ve lisihe' minine'za O'mosola do bize-ledelesa evene' goloso leli' lihimetemu' lelito' medelo hiline' ve. Ido' a'mine gamene hamokovo' hiline' a'ne'mo nene leli' mukiliti lihimete nene mo osu' lilido' vo dani' ve. Aza neve nene evene' leli' okode ne'minesi neivosa nene bili hilani'za sikalahu've nene O'moso'mo do upuho' o-davo vele gizosa
a'mine sikalahu've nesi mino nene vo nala' numungu' minani' sikalahu' nene mono' lo-ngimine' ve.

A'mine mono' lo-ngimine' sikalahu' nene gomu' Noa' minine' gameneu' Noa' aza sipi lolo' neivo O'moso'mo evene' engikumu' izebolo' molavo geto ngebelamo ha gizebo o minine' gameneu' eze gamazi gili hulave engi' nene mono' lo-ngimine' ve. A'mine sipiu' nene evene' ngomosi' eiti a'ne'minevo' dizikevo O'moso'mo nosodunu' do ngu' izine' ve.

Ido' a'mine noso velo ani' nene noso holaali'mi avazaha ne'mine nene soto' ine' ve. Ee, noso hilaa' naadoti' nene O'moso'mo do lungu' izaa' neive. Ido' noso holaa' noune' nene okodelo' goloduvo gilite-ledelive losa nevoba asi O'moso'mo lute do guluvi' lo-ledavo guluvikovo' lo minaa' ilive losa ezela lo noso holaa' noune. Ido' a'mine O'moso'mo do lungu' izaa' neine' nene Izesu' Kilisito' hilinguti' otidi'mo ve losa do lungu' izaa' neive.

Ido' Kilisito' ei' neve nene idise Okulumokuko dizo O'mosoloti' lemo mino ana hulaa' idaa neivo angelo' nesi ido' ato ato' amuzo'inesi mini'mi monani' nesi nene gizeneuko limi gelekele' i-di nizavosa gizebo o-ngede neive.

Nemu' nene Kilisito' oko'nolo' mulumo geni gihidi'mine igi linginesi mulumo geni gihilizangumu' nene lutine gatine di amuzo mili di va'va' igisa minilo. Nene nanitekumu' ve. Ve ma oko'nolo' mulumo geni gehe nolive aza lihime daa' monovo nene mo hulosa noloseinako nemu' nene noluve.

Ido' ne'mine ma ilizani' nene idise meloti' nene haza okodesi minevo' alevo' o'mo dizelone' gameneu' nene haza alevete lanite' gilaa' naani' monovo nene laza gohi amo asi O'moso'mi lulolokovo' ogo molo minelone lisa ne'mine ilizani' o neive.

Ee, gomu' lingine O'moso'mi evenele minamave heta ato' velite ngumo helaa' ine' monovo goloso igi mili'mi dizani' nene mo moda ve lo noluze. Gohi amilo. A'mine goloso monovo nene ado' ne'mine mana'mine monovo goloso longovozo hilami gopo iga', inite' goloso mamu' lutine otaa', nosolo' moni sipaki goloso iga', noso' nite' naba ni zohi' igi noso ni sipaki iga' ido' noso naa' pati di soto' iga' ido' soza o'moso nge'metaa' monovo goloso iga' ani' mamu' nene noluze. Mo hulilo.
Lingine a'mine heta ato' vesi nene a'mine monovo golosou' nene vili vivi' vivi' igi minani' ma'mine nene gohi amavo ingine ningi upuho' igi lengi' nene divi ledivi' igi lengemenga laa' nave.

Ne neiha a'mine engi' nene vetesi ha nonivesi hilavesi monovotemu' goni' o-ledo ize' molo-ledelesa do va'va' o neive ne'mo nene ne'mine angumu' nene lingine nanitekumu' ave lo goni' o-ngedo lihime ngemeleseive.

Nemu' nene mono' gamazi lamine' nene hilavetidasi vo heteline' ve. Ingine haza oko'inesi minani' gameneu' nene O'moso'mo evene' muki' o-ledaa' neine' ne'mino engikisi goni' o-ngedo lihime ngemavo hilani'za ingine sikalahu'inesi mini O'moso'mo minevo' minevo' oga' neidi'mine igi minivi' minivi' ilizangumu' ve losa a'mine mono' gamazi lamine' nene engitasi hulavo vo heteline' ve.
Ido' inite' mata' muki' osu' liline' gamene nene mo avito' ogaze. Lingine nene O'mosola lilizado' lisihe' i minilizangumu' nene lutine gatine gopo amivo di vevesi minilo.

Lute ngemaa' monovolo' e'metilizave nete nene evenelite di goloso i-ngidilizani' lihime muki' nene di halekisavo' apasi-ngidilizani' nenako nemu' nene lingine igi mili ilizani' inite' mukikuti' ma dizo neine' nene lingine lutine ge neme ne geme li minilisa nene amuzo mili igi mili minilo.
Ido' evene' numudingu' alizangumu' nene lingine nulu nulunga li lihiteheka lami numudingu' numudingu' nene ne do lamine' o-gede ge do lamine' o-nede lisavo' minilo.

O'moso'mo lengi' nene nasahili' o-lengedo gono daa' amuzo ato ato' vai' nene lehize-lengede neize. A'mine lehize-lingidine' amuzolo' nene gizebo lamine' igi minilizangisi lingine hamo hamo' a'mine di nizani' amuzodunu' nene ge hize ele' o-nede ne hize ele' o-gede li minilo.

Ado' mono' lo-lengemelive neve nene O'mosolo' medelo mino ei' O'moso'mi gamazi'vevo' nene lo-lengemelive. Ido' nasahili' ogo hize ele' gono do-lengedelive neve nene O'moso'mo amuzo emaa' neine' votigilelo' nene do molo a'mine gono nene do-lengedelive. Ido' ne'mine ilizani' nene lingine Izesu' Kilisito' hize ele' o-lidivo laza olone' inite' mata' mukitoti' nene O'moso'mi gulive nene do naba o-delone lisa nene ne'mine ilizave. Ezela nene guvelesi ido' amuzo nesi nene mo minevo' minevo' ogovo' minelive. Mo ne'mino minilihoo.

Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' alevekizo, lutine do ningelesa lengemengu' molo ololi'mo longolaa' neine' ne'mino mulumo geni gihi-lingidilisa naavo lengi' soto' o-lengedelesa neingumu' nene lingine leli' soto' o-ledamilido' o neine' inite' atoli'mine ma soto' o-ledelesa neihe li upuho' amilo.

Asi Kilisito' mulumo geni gihine' ne'mine nene linginesi gihi nilizani' nenako nemu' nene lingine Kilisito' labana'vesi gohi soto' iline' gameneu' nene luteu' gulumo avile lisivo mino lolize naba izeloningumu' ve li longolize izi minilo.

Ido' lingine Kilisito' evenele lili' igi eze gulive di minangumu' lingilimaa' navo ma nene guvelesi neine' O'moso'mi Sikalahu' neve nene lengito' omo mino mine do viline' nenako nemu' nene lingine longolize izi minilizado' o neive.

Ido' lengikuti' linge ma mulumo gono gihi-lingidilizani' nene lingine evene' ma ngibili hililizahe ido' gumine damine ilizahe ido' monovo goloso atoli'mine ilizahe ido' evene' maliti initeku' gavakavato' monaa' ilizahe ilizadoti' mulumo gono lingimilizani' nene mo edamoloseize. A'ne'mine monovo nene mo amilo.
Ne neiha evene' ma aza Kilisiteni lolo' ogo minelingumu' mulumo geni inite' gihi-dilizani' nemu' nene ovozo helamo asi Kilisiteni gulive've miningumu' nene O'moso do naba o-do minelive.

Ne'mine mana'mine monovolo' e'meti minilizave lo meuko noluvoni' nene O'moso'mo eze evenele zuho gonito' lele'mize molo-ledeline' gamene mo alitingumu' nene noluve. Ido' ei' evenele lelitoti' api' ogo evene' lihime lengeme'mo viline' nene aizo, alinge' nela eze gamazi've laminekumu' gili ele'vole' amave goni' o-ngedo lihime ngemo do nadi' o-ngedelido' o minelivoo. Mo mulumo gono goloso gehepeve ngemeline' o noloseive.
A'mine neve nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizi nizado' nene vo do neive:
O'moso'mo evene' lisihe' lamine' do lu' izelesa nene
ge'nebe ogosa do lu' izaa' neine' nenako
O'moso mehe'ine imi lihimelo' monaa' ave nene
lukuvo nalizado' o neihe.
Mo keke' ngeli lukuvosi ma namilisave.

Nemu' nene O'moso'mi lulolo' evene' ma mulumo geni gihi nilizave engi' minevo' alevo'ine nene engi' do soto' o-ngidive ado' gamazi've lavo haza ma osa'mive ei' anau' miliki eito' lehete' i mini monovo lamineto' nene e'meti minilizado' o neive.

Ido' lengikuti' mono' gizebo vetine minavemu' nene gamazi lolouze. Gililo. Lengi' ne'mine gizebo ve minuve ado' Kilisito' mulumo geni gehe'mo navo ningaa' ido' alinge' soto' o-ledelesa neine' inite' lamine' labana'vesi neine' nene makato' dalonivesi minuve naza gatine do ti' lo nolo-lingimuve:

Lengita O'moso'mi zuho mulise nizani' neve nene lu'ine'mi noso' nite' ngimika ngimika' igi gizebo lamine' i-ngidi minilo. Ne'mine i-ngidi minilizani' nene evenelite lutingu' hizavosa nevoba asi lutine'mo ne'mine olosa gele nolidokovo' nene e'meti ilo. Ido' ma nene moni heneni inite' ma dalone li gili minisa gizebo i-ngidilizani' ne'mo nene lovozo helaa' inite' goloso ilisaze. Mo ne'mine ami asi O'moso'mo lingine a'mine gonomu' lutine mili minisa gono dalizave lo gele neido' nene e'meti gono dalo.

Ido' gohi ma nene ti' lo nolo-lingimuve: A'mine gizebo i-ngidi nilizani' aleve nene amuzo mala' mala' igi gizebo i-ngidami asi O'moso'mi zuho engi' igi mili minilizani' inite' nene lingine avazaha pikisa ne'mine mini aka ngelebizi igi mili minilo.
Ne'mine ikevo gizebo ve naba aza soto' ogo heteleline' gameneu' nene lingine meni dalisave. Ado' geleso osu' lamiline' palaisi labana'vesi neine' nene dalisave.

Ido' mono' gizebo ve gono'ine neivo ha iga' naani' ne'mine igi goso'velite ilizani' o neine' inite' nesi nene mo ne'mino neive: Lingine nene gizebo vetinelite lilizani' gamazilo' nene ha gili ngimisa minilo. Ido' mono' godolou' O'moso'mi monovo ma ti' li gizi nizani' ma neive:
Evene' ma oko'ine di dizi minaa' nave nene
O'moso'mo biluva' o-ngedaa' neiha
evene' ma engi' oko'ine di'mi limi minaa' nave engi' nene
ninge lamine' o-ngedo nasahili' o-ngedaa' neive.
Aza ne'mine oga' neine' nenako nemu' nene evene' muki' lingine okodine di'mi limi mini ge gelekele' o-nede ne gelekele' o-gede li minilo.

Ido' O'moso neve nene ne'mine oga' neine' nenako nemu' nene lingine ei' molani' gamene soto' ilingu' nene do ote-ledelingumu' ve li lengi' okodine nene di'mi limisa O'moso'mi anau' vi mini ei' amuzo've nabalokovo' nene lehete i minisa
O'moso'mo lengikumu' mulumotine gele minaa' neine' nenako nemu' nene lingine gopo gatine gilaa' nani' initetine geni ne'mine vai' nene ei' anau' huli milalo.

Lingine nene lutine gatine vo gopo'napa amivo gatine gili nge li mini ehe' igi ningisa minilo. Ado' biluvatine Satani aza loposo gulo naba laioni ne'mo ga'na helo ngebelo naline' initekumu' viseto' monaa' neine' ne'mino lengebelelesa nomonize. Ningisa minilo.

Mulumo geni lengi' nigihi-lingidani' ne'mino nene lengi' zuho Kilisito' evenele misubo vaiku' mini'mi monave engikisi nene a'mine'mine igi nigihi-ngidani' nenako lingine nemu' gili mini Kilisito'nimu' gele ele'vole' iga' nani' nene di gili' li minisa a'mine biluvatine nene lovo i imivo' minilo.

Ne'mine igi a'mine mulumo geni nene gihi'mi vi nizavosa gamene ha'na amivo a'mine ato ato' initeku' mulumote ningo nasahili' o-ledaa' ive O'moso ado' Kilisitoda vi gi'mizisa labana'vesi minevo' minevo' oga' neine' mo'mosiku' nene imi hilalizave lo lengi' vise lo do eita ive ne'mo nene gohi do lamine' o-lengedo do ngi lo-lengedo ido' amuzo lengemo ele'vole' igi oti pehe li minilizado' lengele'mize molaloseive.
Amuzo muki' nene gamene gamene eitavo' minivo. Mo ne'mino minilihoo.

Naza gamazi noluvo ezelo' gele medele minelodo' o neive lo giluve ado' leze zuho Siluvano' ne'mo hize ele' o-nedo luhuvo mene nogizivo naza a'mine gamazi noluvoni' meve nene O'moso'mo nasahili' o-ledaa' neine' monovo gihile'mi gamazi ve lo lo-lengemelesa naza hize ele' ogosa lengi' lutine nene do ngi lo-lengedo luhuvo nite' li'nibe mene nogize-lingiduze. A'mine O'moso'mi nasahiliku' nene mini gili' li minilo.

Ido' lengi' ne'mine aleve O'moso'mo maka' do kegese-lingidive Kilisito' evenele Babelonia numuno ebeku' mela mulise milaa' nave ingine longopo'ni nilavoo neze gipe'ne Maleko' azasi nene longopo'ni nolize.
Lingine nene isetine ve li lute ngemaa' monovo di soto' igi ge nabuti' ize ne gabuti' ize li adido' disa minaa' ilo.
Hongu lo lamino minaa' monovo neve nene Kilisito' evenele minave lengi' mukita minivo.
Moda a'nesi' ve.

Ado' Izesu Kilisito' gonou' ve ido' aposolo've minuve Simeoni' gulive'ne gohi ma Petolo' naza lengi' luhuvo nite' mene nogize-lingiduve. Ado' O'mosotesi ido' do lu' izaa' ivesi minive Izesu Kilisito' aza ve lisihe' minidi'mo nene lelikisi lengikisi do milise' ogo do lisihe' o-ledosa hamoli'mine monovo ado' ezemu' gele ele'vole' oga' monovo lamine' nene leli' limine' ne'mino lengikisi lehize-lengedavo di nizave lengi' nene nogize-lingiduve.

Ido' lingine O'mosomukisi Guvelesi ve Izesu'nimukisi gili lamine' igi gili minaa' ilizadoti' nene O'moso'mi nasahili' monovo nesi ido' hongu lo lamino minaa' monovo nesi nene lengita mine vai' lo'mo vo miniliho.

O'moso'mo leli' nene monoto' e'metovo' mino minevo' alevo' ogo minelonido' do lisihe' o-ledeline' monovo muki' nene lehize-lede neive. Ido' a'mine lehize-lede neine' monovo dalone' nene aza leli' vise lo-ledo do eita ive eikumu' nene laza ningo gele lamine' ogo gele minaa' olonidoti' nene dalosunako nemu' nene lehize-lede neive. Ido' a'mine vise lo-ledo do eita ive'mo ne'mine o-lidine' nene ei' labana'vesi ido' ei' monovo've lamine' atoli'mine ogo neine' nesi nene di ti' ilizave losa vise lo-ledo do eita ine' ve.

Ne'mine ogosa aza lo huko-ledekine' gamazi ma nene do gihile noizo monovo lamine' goloso dizo minine' nene lehize-lede neive. Ido' ne'mine ine' nene me misubou' aleveti lu'ine otavosa lanite' gilaa' naani' monovo iga' nadi'mo lu'ine do goloso oga' neine' initekuti' lingine olovo' ilizadoti' nene O'moso'mo ei' emeni dameni ne'mine nene ize' molo lengemavo di minilizangumu' nene ne'mine ine' ve.

Ido' ne'mine ine' nenako nemu' nene lingine ezemu' gili ele'vole' iga' naani' monovotido' nene imine' mili mo lamine' goloso gehepeve minaa' monovolo' nene monokumu' gatine' gili vevesaa' monovo nesi igi mili minilisa nene amuzo goloso milalo.

Ido' a'mine gatine gili vevesaa' monovolo' nene okodine lutido' gizebo iga' monovo nesi igi mili minilisa nene amuzo goloso milalo. Ido' a'mine okodine lutido' gizebo iga' monovolo' nene monoku' amuzo mili geni gihi di dizi minaa' monovo nesi igi mili minilisa nene amuzo goloso milalo. Ido' a'mine monoku' amuzo mili geni gihi di dizi minaa' monovolo' nene mono' avazahasivo' igi mili iga' monovo nesi igi mili minilisa nene amuzo goloso milalo.

Ido' a'mine mono' avazahasivo' igi mili iga' monovolo' nene lengi' zuho Izesu' evenele lutine ngimaa' monovo nesi igi mili minilisa nene amuzo goloso milalo. Ido' a'mine lengi' zuho Izesu' evenele lutine ngimaa' monovolo' nene evene' ato' ato' vai' lutine ngimaa' monovo nesi igi mili minilisa nene amuzo goloso milalo.

Ne'mine monovolo' amuzo goloso mili igi mili ilizave noluvoni' nene a'mine ne'mine monovo lengita mine hutile' ogo mineline' ne'mo nene lingine Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' ningi gili minaa' naani' nene hazamu' neivo ne'mi gihile lengita izamilivoba asi mo ize lamine' oloseinako nemu' nene noluve.

Evene' ma ingine meuko luvoni' monovolo' igi mili minamilizave neti lu'ine'mi vele nene mo ngenge ogosa like minaa' neive. Ne'mine ogavosa O'moso'mo gomu' lihime'ine dani' gilite-ngidine' mamu' nene mo ga'ine molani' gele vivo gopo nizave.

Nemu' nene neze zuhokizo, O'moso'mo lengi' do kegese-lengedo vise lo-lengedo do eita ine' nene di ele'vole' gehepeve ilisa lingine amuzo gohi gohi mili'mi dizivo' minilo. Ne'mine ilizave lo noluvoni' nene nanitekumu' ve. Lingine nene ado' meuko luvoni' inite' igi mili minilizani' neve nene mo monokuti' mo keke' ngeli limi ingamilisave.
Ee, ne'mine ilizani' neve nene Guvetesi vesi ido' do lu' izaa' ivesi minive Izesu' Kilisito' gizebo o-ledo minevo' minevo' ilingu' nene vi hilalizani' amuzo vauve elo lehize-lengedeleseive.

Ne'mine o neine' nenako nemu' nene naza meuko nolo-lingimuvoni' initekumu' nene gohi lo gatine oka' oka' olosa gele nouve. Ee, a'mine initekumu' nene mo gili mini ado' lengita omo neine' gamazi gihilelo' nene mo gi'mizi gili' li nizani'za a'mine initekumu' nene ha mo lo gatine oka' oka' olosa gele nosa nene noluve.

Ee, naza gamene li'nibemukovo' me misubou' oko'nesi nouvoni' gamenela mene a'mine meuko luvoni' initekumu' nene gohi lo gatine ogo lutine do ote-lengedeloni' ne'mo nene lisihe' oloseive lo gele nosa ne'mine nouve.

Ne nanitekumu' ve. Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' aza heleloni' monovomu' lo soto' ogo lo-nimine' malo' nene do gihile izo a'mine me misubou' oko'ne do huloloni' gamene nene mo avito' ogave lo gele nouvoni' nemu' nene noluve.
Naza osu' lokuvo lingine a'mine luvoni' inite' mene gamene gamene omo gatido' gatido' ivo ha gili minaa' ilizangumu' ve loo aka vele-lengedelesa nene amuzo molalosuve.

Laza Izesu' Kilisito' amuzo'vemukisi ido' alingumukisi lo-lingimune' nene heluno gamazi ma gili nge li mini lado' nene e'metosa lo-lengemamune. Asi a'mine amuzo've atoli'mine minine' monovo've nene leli' vete gulo ne'mo ningavosa nene lo-lingimune' ma neive.

Ado' labana've naba' nabasi minivelati' gamazi ti' lo ezela limine' gamenela nene laza a'mida mino ningo gele minune' ve: Neni' vo'nelo' gipe'ne hamo me ve nene neive. Eikumu' nene naza lanite' lamine' nogiluve lo meleho O'moso'mo do naba o-do opo'ni line' ve.
Ido' a'mine O'moso'mi labana've soto' ine' gololo' nene Izesukisi minunido' a'mine Okulumokuti' limine' gamazi nene leli' gehepeve aposolo' lingesi gilune' ve.

Ido' ne'mino gilunidoti' polohetelite lani' gamazilo' gele mu'musi' oga' une' malo' nene gohi nabosa gele mu'musi' gehepeve une' ve. Ne'mine une' nenako linginesi nene a'mine'mine igi polohetelite lani' gamazilo' ma gili dalizani' nene mo lamine' oloseive. A'mine gamazi nene liti'muso ebeku' lamuli'mo labana' ele neine' ne'minosa ne neive. Ne'mino labana' elo neivo go' lolosa go' nuvonuvo neivo sonohi' ganangome' dizaa' neine' ne'mino Izesu' nene gohi soto' ogo lutingu' hize labana' gehepeve eleleseive.

Ido' lingine polohetelite lani' gamazi gili dalizani' o neine' nenako naza ti' lo lo-lengemeloni' gamazi nene inite' naba neize. A'mine gamazimu' nene gili minisavo' polohetelite lani' gamazi nene gili dalisave:

Ee, polohetelite laa' ani' gamazi ne'mine nene haza eveneliti lutelo' nene e'meto mo keke' soto' osa'mive. Asi evene' O'moso'mi gamazi laa' ani' nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo zatuho' o-ngedavosavo' nene O'moso'mi veleuti' gamazi laa' ani' ve.

Ne neiha gomu' nene O'moso'mi eveneleliti vovo'ningu' nene soza polohetesi soto' igi minaa' ani' ve. Ne'mine iga' ani' ne'mine igi lengi' vovotingukisi nene soza mono' apizi lingimilizave soto' igi minilisave. Engi' nene monovo'ine di haleki mini lengele'mize goloso ilido' o mineline' soza mono' nene li soto' igisa engi' meni hize-ngidive Guvelesi ve nesi nene mehe'ine imilisave. Ido' ne'mine ilizadoti' nene O'moso'mo upuho' nite' ngiso do goloso o-ngedeleseive.
Ido' ingine ne'mine mana'mine monovo goloso gopo iga' ilizani' monovo'nido' nene evene' muki' nge'metilisave. Nemu' nene evenelite mono' aka gihile nene divi' ledivi' ilisave.

A'mine soza mono' apizi lingimilizave nene inite' gohi gohi dalone lii soza gamazi li-lingimilizadoti' nene lengitati' moni gelelehe' ilisave. O'moso'mo gozopo' aka'mila a'mine ve lihime ngemelesa line' nene hazamu' ma lamive. A'mine gamazi lokivo neine' nene okise ongamo ha neivo mo do goloso gehepeve o-ngedeleseive.

O'mosomu' nene ti' lo gele none: Angelo' linge ma lihime dani' nene ise'ine izivoba asi seni nala' ize-ngedosa lihime ngemeloni' gamenemu' gizebo igi liti'musoukovo' minilizave lo galese naba mo homiu' gehepeve ngimisele neive.

Ido' ma nene ti' lo gele none: Gamene aka'mila minani' alevesi ise'ine izamo evene' goloso misubo vaiku' mini'mi monani' muki' nene nosodunu' molo hite-ngedo ngebele gese' ine' ve. Ne'mine ine'za a'mine gameneu' nene evene' eiti (8) ado' monovo lisihekumu' lo soto soto' oga' ive Noakisi ido' evene' gohi sevenisi nene alete molo do ngu' izine' ve.

Ido' ma nene ti' lo gele none: Sodomi alevesi nGomola alevesi ido' numuno ebe'ine nesi nene O'moso'mo lihime ngemo do velepe' izo lenehevo' miniliza akalo' ngele'mize molavo ne'mine ani' ve. Ne'mine ine' nene ezemu' gilamave soto' o-ngedeli initeli'mi avazaha ne'mine do soto' ine' ve.
Ne'mine ogo aza ve lisihe' Loti'ni nene a'mine ve goloso ingine monovo goloso i'mi angumu' nene muluno hukidi'mo lulo zovo' izo mininguti' nene do u' izine' ve.

Ee, a'mine ve lisihe' engi' vovo'ningu' mino ingine monovo lamine' avutokovo' i'mi i'mi vi nizangumu' nene ningo gele'mo vine' ne'mo eze lulo lisiheku' nene gamene gamene mulumo geni naba bele'mo bele'mo vo minine' ve.

Ido' O'mosomu' ne'mine lo gele none' nenako nemu' nene laza ti' lo gelelesune: Guvelesi ve aza evene' lisihe' ngemengu' soto' o ngemelinguti' do ngu' izaa' monovomu' nene gele mino evene' goloso nene lihime'ine abeleni ogo ngeme'mo vo mino mukito' goni' o-ledeline' gamenemu' gizebo ogo lihime'ine do minaa' monovo nesi nene mo gele neive.

Ido' a'mine lihime ngemelive engikuti' nene oko'ine'mo lanite' giline' monovo goloso gehepevelo' e'meti mini evene' naba'mi gizebolo' mini gamazi've gili di minaa' monovomu' gosele' iga' ave nene lihime naba ngemeleseive.

A'ne'mine ve ado' a'mine soza mono' laa' ave engi' nene gamazi gilami hokolize' igi engi' lu'nidokovo' iga' ave mini hozila dizi minave nabamu' nesi nene ngehelele izamivo mini engi' nesi nene divi' ledivi' i-ngidaa' nave.
Ne'mine iga' naha O'moso'mi angelo' nete a'mine nene ngivile' igi mini evene' naba amuzo'inesi nizani'za ingine neve nene divi' ledivi' i-ngidi Guvelesi vela goni' i-ngidisa'mave.

Ne neiha a'mine ve nene ize gulo ido' nama gaha ga'ine nomivo minani' ado' evenelite ngimiselo ngebelaa' ido' ngebelaa' olonido' soto' igi minaa' naani' ne'mini mini ingine gilamani' initekumu' nene divi' ledivi' igi laa' nave. Nemu' nene ize gulo nama gaha ngebelaa' noune' ne'mine ogo O'moso'mo a'mine ve nene do goloso gehepeve o-ngedeleseive.

Ee, evene' di goloso ilizado' nene O'moso'mo golo hizo do goloso o-ngedeleseive. A'mine soza mono' laa' avete gilavo labana' ele minine' gamenelo' noso' nite' naba nii noso ni'mi vi minaakumu' nene lanite' goloso ve li gilaa' nave. Ingine lengikisi maka' noso' nite' ni mini di gopo'napa i-lingidi gotine izaa' naangumu' nene ngolize izi mini lengi' muliseu' nene longovozo hililiza nite' goloso lili' ikeve.

Ingine vene' ma ningani' nene ma duvo lii gumine dika' dika' igi lihime daa' monovo nene engitati' osu' losa'mivo monoku' amuzo'ine nomive nene lihime monovou' ngimimise' igi di vaa' igi mini mumuzo' oga' monovomu' api'napi' igi save naba di minani' nenako nemu' nene O'moso'mo usi' ize-ngedelido' i nizave.

Ingine aka lisihe' nene huli vi gopo igi nimonani' nene Bosole' gipele Balaamu' vine' akalo' nene e'metikeve. Ado' monovo golosoloti' meni dalingumu' umo hilive ma'mi monovolo' e'metikevosa nene noluve.

A'mine Balaamu' ne'mo nene monovo lamine' avuto' ingumu' O'moso'mo elemine' ve. A'mine elemine' nene gamazi lamaa' ine' inite' dongi ize ne'mo nene evene' laa' noune' nolouti' gamazi lo-emo a'mine poloheteli'mo negi inite' olosa inguti' nene do o'ove lo-dine' ve.

A'mine soza mono' laa' ave nene noso hinipiniku' goko' lavo haza galesevo' minaa' neine' ne'minesi ido' hepeli'mo limuso hubu lo do vavo goline izamaa' neine' ne'minesi nene nizani' nenako ne'mo nene monoku' ma hize ele' i-lidisa'mave. Nemu' nene O'moso'mo liti'muso atoli'mine ogo ize minine' ebeku' vi hilalisave lo a'mine liti'muso ebe' nene salani molo-ngede neive.

Ne'mine noluvoni' nene nemu' noluve: Ingine gamazi naba gele vine' gihile've nomine' gamazi li evene' ma ladeni igi igi mili minaa' nave engikuti' idise a'mene olovo' nave nene okode'mo lanite' gelaa' neido' gopo geligeli igi e'meti minaa' monovo nedunu' nene gohi ngimimise' iga' nave.

A'mine ve ingine a'mine ngimimise' ani' aleve nene ti' li li-ngimaa' nave: Leli' le'metilizani' nene lingine inite' mali'mosi nene igi mili ilizani' akatine nene hize tile-lengedamivo goboni ve ne'mine ma minamilisave. Ne'mine li li huki-ngidaa' naani'za engi' neve nene lele'mize tolovo oga' inite' monovo goloso ne'mo nene a'nido' davo ne'mi goboni ve mini milikeve. Ido' goboni ve minikeve noluvoni' nene inite' mali'mo zatuho' o-ngidivo a'mine inite' igi mili iga' ilizave neve nene mo a'mine initeli'mi goboni ve lili' i nizani' nenako nemu' nene noluve.

Ee, evene' malite Guvetesi ve do lu' izaa' ive Izesu' Kilisito'nimu' giladoti' nene me misubou' minine' monovo goloso evene' lute do goloso o-ledaa' neidoti' nene olovo' igisa gohi a'mine monovou' vi hili mutuho ngatuho igi minilizani' nene gomu' goloso igi minilizado' mini milani' ma nene ivile' ivosa alinge' nela nene di goloso gehepeve igi minilizado' mini mili minilisave.

Ee, O'moso'mo lo-lidine' gamazi ma li-ngimikevo gilisa a'mine gamazi gili huli mehe'ine ma imado' nene golo hizo lihime atoli'mine ogo ngemelido' o neine' nenako ingine nene a'mine aka lisihekumu' nene ma gilami minadiniko a'mine lihime do dizo ngemeline' votigileloti' nene lemosa lihime ngemelido' minadinako ne'mo nene mo lamine' ngomo ma idine.
A'mine ne'mine ve nene mono' godolou' ti' li gizikani' malo' nene vo milise' ogave:
Gulo ne'mo muso velo do huline' inite' nene gohi vo naa' neive.
Ido' ma nene:
Ize nene nosou' ongo-dekunivo gohi vo gohiku' gomo gomo izo ongaa' neive.

Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' alevekizo, luhuvo meve nene gohi naba tuu luhuvo nene nogize-lingiduve. A'mine luhuvo sitaku' mene lingine lutingu' gatingu' gilaa' naani' nene mo lisihe' laminekovo' gililizangumu' nene gamazi ma lutine do ote-lengedo lo gatine nouve.

A'mine gamazi nene O'moso'mi polohetelite alinge' soto' iline' initekumu' li soto' ani' gamazi nesi ido' Guvetesi ve mino do lu' izaa' ive minive Izesu Kilisito' lo-lidine' gamazi lengi' aposolotinete li-lingimani' nesi nene gililizave lo lo gatine nouve.
Inite' naba nene ado' ti' li gililizangumu' noluve: Gamene alinge' nela nene evene' engi' lu'nidokovo' e'meti mini monokumu' gize abelenga laa' ave ma igi ti' li

lilisave: Aza tine' molo alosuve lo lo huko line' ne'mi gihile've ma nene zaa' soto' ive. Ado' metemote nesi nene gizebo igi mini hilikeni'za inite' muki' nene ma do atoli'mine amivo Okulumo' misubo gana' soto' idoti' nene hamoli'minevo' ogo mine do novine' nenako ngelo alihe.

Ne'mine laa' naani'za ado' mene lo-lengemeloni' gamazimu' nene gelalone li ga'ine hizi ngi likeve: Ado' O'moso'mo lavo Okulumo' nene gozopo' aka'mila soto' ivo misubo nesi nene nosouti' soto' ogo noso veleta gala'muda minavo oluso' minine' ve.
Ido' a'mine noso ne'mo nene a'mine gamenelo' minine' misubo nene molo hito do goloso ine' mamu' nene ga'ine molavo inite' muki' nene ma senisi amave laa' nave.

Ido' a'mine O'moso'mo lo neine' gamazi ne'mo nene a'mine idise nizasine' Okulumokisi misubosi nene ololi'mi minani ne'mine mini mono' gilamave lihime ngemeline' gamene nabamu' nene gizebo ha nizasive lo neine' ve.

Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' alevekizo, inite' hamo' a'mene lo-lengemeloni' gamazi nemu' nene gilami minikelizave: Ado' Guvelesi ve'mo gamenemu' gelaa' neine' nene do ato' ogo gelaa' neive. Aza neve nene gamene li'nibe gamene hamo' ne'minemu' nene gelavo gamene ha'na goloso kilisimasi vanu tauseni (1,000) ne'mine minine' gelaa' neive. Ido' gamene ha'na kilisimasi vanu tauseni ne'minemu' nene gelavo gamene li'nibe gehepeve gamene hamo' ne'mine minine' gelaa' neive.

Evene' malite Guvelesi ve alosa lo huko line' gamazi do gihile izelingumu' nene zou zou gohi lave li gilaa' nani' nene ladani igi gilikeve. Aza nene zou zou lamive. Asi evene' hamokisi vi tolovo ilizave lo gelamo mukito' nene lu'ine di velepe' izilizahoo lo lengikumu' nene goseleka lamo ha gizebo o neive.

Ne'mine ogo neiha guminelo' ve alisave lo gelamune' gamenelo' igi hetelaa' nani' ne'mino a'mine Guvelesi ve aline' gamene've nene soto' oloseive. A'mine gameneu' Okulumo' neve nene gugu lo vo haha oloseive. Ido' a'mingu' inite' mata' muki' nene ololi'movo' lovo' lovotevo' o-ngidivo haza nite' gidilisave. Ido' misubo nesi ido' a'mingu' di soto' naani' inite' muki' nesi nene ololi'mo ningeleseive.

Ne'mino ololi'mo inite' mata' muki' nene ninge osu' lavo apile osu' lilido' o neine' nenaze. A'mine O'moso'mi gamene nabamu' gizebo igi minilizangu' nene a'mine gamene nene geto ogo hetelelingumu' ve li O'moso'mi evenele gehepeve mini monoku' monovo laminetokovo' e'meti minilizado' o neive. Ado' a'mine Okulumo' nene ololi'mo lovo apilevo' neivo a'mingu' mini'mi monani' inite' mata' nene lala lilizani' gamenemu' nene noluve.

Ido' ne'mino lo osu' loloseine'za aza lo huko lo-lidine' gamazi do gihile izo monovo lisihe' laminekovo' mineline' Okulumo' atoli'mine gosohokisi misubo atoli'mine gosohokisi do soto' o-ledeleseive lo a'minemu' gilingili ogo gizebo ogo none.

Nemu' nene lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' alevekizo, a'mine initekumu' gilingili igi gizebo igi minilizangu' nene Guvelesi ve ogo ningeline' nene laza luteu' goloso monovo nomivo ido' okodelo' gamazi nomivo mino hongu lo nonivo ningelive li a'midokovo' amuzo mili minilo.

Ido' Guvelesi ve aza geto amo gizebo ha ogo neingumu' gililizani' nene aza evene' gohi ma do lu' izelingumu' nene ne'mine ogo neive lisa nene gili minilo. Leze zuho lute eme nonive Paulo'ni O'moso'mo gele nge lo minaa' monovo lehize-dido' do molo azasi nene a'mine mene luvoni' gamazi ne'minesi nene mo luhuvo gize-lingidine' ma neive.

Ido' luhuvo nite' muki' ei' gizingu' nene a'mine ne'mine initekumu' gizidaa gizida nene a'mine hamoli'mine gamazi memu' nene mo azasi hamo' gamazivo' gize'mo vo neive. Ido' a'mine luhuvo nite' gize'mo vingu' nene gamazi linge ma monovo've geto gele lamine' amolonido' o minine' gamazi nesi nene gize neive. Ne'mino neine' nenako mono' monovo gili vevesami lu'ine amuzo molamive ingine mono' godolou' gamazi linge'mi monovo nesi nene di zovo' zava' izaa' naadi'mine igi a'mine Paulo' gamazi've nesi nene a'mine'mine igi di zovo' zava' izaa' nave. Ne'mine iga' naadoti' nene angise'ine meni'ine goloso nene di soto' iga' nave.

Nemu' nene lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' zuhokizo, lingine a'mine ne'mine ilizangumu' nene mo gili nizani' ma neize. Lingine monoku' lamine' mine ngi li nizanguti' nene mono'ine nomivete di zovo' zava' izaa' naani' monovo'ine ne'mo nene gelelehe' o-lengedavo limi ingikelizaze. Ehe' igi ningisa minilo.

Ne'mine igi mini Guvetesi ve do lu' izaa' ive Izesu' Kilisito' ninge lamine' oga' neine' monovolo' e'metaa' naani' nene gohi di naba i'mi vi mini eze monovo danava've nesi nene gili ngolo' li'mi vi minilo. Eita guvele soto' oga' neine' monovo've nene minevo minevo' ogo idisesi alingetasi mine do vo minilihoo. Mo ne'mino minelive.
Moda a'nesi' ve.

O'moso'mo olihe api' ogo inite' mata' do soto' amivosa a'mine gamenelo' aka'mine ha minivemu' nene luhuvo nite' mene gizo nolo-lingimuze. Ningilo. Ee, a'mine gilune' ido' vetedunu' ningo ninge'mo vo minune' ido' adedunu' do gilune' nemu' nolo-lingimuve. Ado' minevo' minevo' minaali'mi meleho ne'mi monovo've laa' ivemu' nene nolo-lingimuve.

A'mine ve nene minevo' minevo' ogo minaa' do soto' ine' nene ningune' ve. Ningune' nenako a'minemu' lo-lengemaa' noune. A'mine minevo' minevo' ogo minaa' nene metehida minidoti' soto' o-ledavo ningune' nemu' lo soto' o-lengemaa' noune.

Ee, linginesi lazasi a'mido' lute do hamo' ogo bizo minelone lo inite' ningune' ido' gilune' nene lengikisi lo-lengemaa' noune. Ido' laza nene lute do hamo' ogo bizo minaa' noune' nene Meteho O'mososi ido' gipele Izesu' Kilisitokisi bizo minaa' noune.
Ido' linginesi ne'mine ogo lute do hamo' ogo bizo mino lolize izo minelone lo nene gamazi nogize-lingimuve.
Ido' ezelati' gilune' gamazi nene ne'mino neive: Eita inite' goloso liti'musou' inite' hamokisi mo keke' nomive. Nomivo O'moso ezela neve inite' lamine' labanakovo' neive.
Nemu' nene liti'muso monovo golosou' nomonosasi laza ezesi do hamo' ogo bizo none lo lolone' nene sozasi lokunivo ogo molo olone' nene inite' gihile nomoloseive.

Ne neiha aza nene labanaku' neine' ne'mino lazasi a'mine'mine ogo labanaku' minevo alevo' olone' nene lute do hamo' ogo lamine' bizo minelesune. Ido' ne'mine okunivo gipele Izesu' vanise ne'mo nene goloso nitete mudise gilite lede'mo vo neivo laminovo' minelesune.
Ido' lihime lelita nomive lolone' nene soza lo leli' lute nene golo izelesune. Ne'mine okunivo gamazi gihile nene lelita minamoloseive.

Ne neiha laza lihimete lo soto' olone' nene aza a'mine lihimete nene hulo-ledo goloso nite' lelita neine' vai' nene gilite-ledeleseive. Ee, aza nene ve lisihe' mino gote izesa'mine' nenako nemu' lihimete lo soto' okunivo lihimete hulo-ledeleseive.

Ne neiha goloso nite' daa' nave lo lo-lemaa' neine' nenako laza goloso nite' ma damaa' noune lo lolone' nene O'mosomu' sozalo' ve ve lo lo-dune' geleleseive. Ido' ne'mine olone' nene eze gamazi leze luteu' minamoloseive.

Izipaha'ne zuho mate, goloso nite' ma dikelizave losa luhuvo nite' mene nogize lingimuve. Ido' mali'mo lihime nite' ma daline' nene Metehida a'mine lihime'vemu' goni' ogavo leze hize ele' o-ledelive ve lisihe' Izesu' Kilisito' nene a'mida neive. Aza nene a'mine lihime ma dalive nene hize ele' o-deleseive.
Asi've Izesu' gono do lihimete apase-lidine' ma ve. Ido' leli' lihimetevo' nomive. Evene' muki' misubou' misubou' mini'mi monaveti lihime'ine nesi apase-ngidine' ve.

Ido' eze nene ningo gele none lo gelaa' noune' nene lamine' nehe. Nado gelelone. Leli' monovote do ningosa gelelesune. Eze gamazi lo huko-lidine' nene gele do minaa' noolone' nene eze ningo gele none lo gelaa' noune' nene lamine' gelaa' noune lo gelelesune.
Ido' evene' lingelite eze ningo gele none li gamazi've gili disa'mani' nene ingine sozalo' ve minikevo gamazi gihile engita nomive.

Ido' evene' linge ma O'moso'mi gamazi gili di minani' nete ingine lu'ine imani' nene apa nite' nomive. Laminetokovo' imi gili' li imaa' nave. Ido' ingine O'mosola gi'mize none laa' ave nene Izesu' ogo molo minidi'mine igi inginesi a'mine'mine igi mili minilizani' o neive. Laza ne'mino ogo molo ogo mino ma ne'mo ezela gi'mize none lune' nene gamazi gihile ve lo gelelesune.

Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' mate, lou' gamazi gosoho' ma lo soto' ogo gize lengemamuve. Litehe lou' ado' gamene gozopo' aka'milati' gili minani' mamu' nogize-lingimuve. A'mine lou' gamazi litehe nene nado neve. Nene mono' gamazi li-lingimikevo gilaa' nani' nene neive.

Ne neiha mene luhuvo niteku' nogizuvo a'mine lou' nene gosoho' neine' gelave. Ee, mo lamineto' gosoho' neive. Izesu' aza a'mine lou' nene do gosoho' ogavo linginela gono gosoho' nodavo liti'muso izo minine' nene vovo' vovo' neivo labana' gihile nene mo api' ogo noilive.
Ne neiha evene' linge ma evene' mamu' mulu'ningu' goloso ogavo lukehe ngibili minisa laza labanaku' none li laa' nave nene ingine olihe labanaku' ami liti'musou' ha nizave.
Nizani'za evene' linge ma ingine evene' muki' lu'ine ngimi nasahili' i-ngidaa' ave nene lamine' labanaku' nizave. Ingine evene' ma ngele'mizi gopo amilisave.
Ido' ingine evene' mamu' mulu'ningu' goloso ogavo lukehe ngibilaa' nave nene liti'musou' ha nizave. A'mine ve nete liti'musoukovo' moni liti'musoli'mo ve'ine likavo vilizani' aka nene ningi gilamave.
Izipaha'ne zuho mate, Izesu'nimu' ve lo O'moso'mo lihimetine hulo-lengede neive.
Nemu' luhuvo nite' mene nogize-lingiduve.
Ido' me'ninge lingine O'moso'mo olihe api' ogo inite' mata' do soto' amivosa
a'mine gamenelo' aka'mila ha minive nene ningi gili nizave.
Nemu' luhuvo nite' mene nogize-lingiduve.
Ido' ve goso've lingine goloso meleho Satani mo ivile' igi nizave.
Nemu' luhuvo nite' mene nogize-lingiduve.
Izipekizo, lingine Metehine ningi gili nizave.
Nemu' luhuvo nite' mene gize-lingiduvoni' ve.
Ido' me'ninge lingine O'moso'mo olihe api' ogo inite' mata' do soto' amivosa
a'mine gamenelo' aka'mine ha minive nene ningi gili nizave.
Nemu' luhuvo nite' mene gize-lingiduvoni' ve.
Ido' ve goso've lingine amuzo mili minavo O'moso'mi gamazi nene lutingu' neivo
goloso meleho Satani mo ivile' igi nizave.
Nemu' luhuvo nite' mene gize-lingiduvoni' ve.

O'moso gelekele' o-damo misubouko minevo' dovo' oga' sunolo' nehe ido' me misubou' minine' inite' golosolo' nehe nene lutine milamilo. Evene' ma ingine lu'ine a'mido' milani' nete lu'ine nene Meteho O'moso imisa'mave.

Misubou' veti monovo danava muki' nene goloso nitekumu' lumo helaa' ido' inite' mata' ninge lamine' tamine' ogo mumuzo' oga' nehe ido' evene' ve'nido' heneni nganeni do soto' soto' ogo gonolise gonolise ogo okode lute do dize dize' oga' nehe ne'mine monovo nesi nene Metehidati' nomive. Misuboukotikovo' neive.
Ido' misubou' neve a'mingu' lumo helaa' ine' inite' mata' nesi nene osu' lo'mo novive. Noviha ingine O'moso'mi gamazi gili di minaa' nave nene vi osu' lami minivi' minivi' igivo' minilisave.

Izipaha'ne zuho mate, gamene nene mo li'nibe ogave. Nemu' Kilisito'ni lovo o emaa' ive mo soto' oloseive li li nizani' nene mo gilikeve. Ido' gilado' nene lovo i imaa' ave muki' nene mo soto' ikeve. Nemu' nene gamene mo li'nibe ogave lo gele none.

A'mine ve nene lezesi maka' minuninguti' leze huli-lidi vani'za leze aleve gihile lili' igi minamave. Leze aleve gihile lili' igi minadini leze huli-lidi vamavo maka' minunidine. Ido' ingine huli-lidi vani' nemu' ingine muki' leli' zuho minamani' nene soto' ogavo gele none.
Emeni dameni've lamine' atoli'minesi minive ne'mo Sikalahu've lehize-lingidivo mini lingine muki' gamazi gihile nene mo gili nizave.
