Luhuvo nite' mene gizuvoni' nene lingine gamazi gihile lamine' nene gilamave lo gizamuve. Gamazi gihile lamine' nene mo gili mini a'mine gamazi gihile laminekuti' nene soza gamazi ma soto' osa'mine' nesi nene gili nizave lo gizuvoni' ve.

Ido' sozalo' ve ve lo ne zamotinemu' lolone. Ingine Izesu'nimu' ataize li aza O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live minamive li laa' nave nene ingine sozalo' ve ve lolone. Me ve nete Melehingi gipelengi ataize li-ngidisa Kilisito'ni lovo i imaa' ave nizave.
Ingine gipelemu' ataize li-daa' nave nete Melehosi maka' bizi minamaa' nave. Ido' ingine gipele gili imaa' nave nete Melehosi maka' bizi minaa' nave.
Lingine gozopo' gamene aka'mila gana' gilani' gamazi nene gili di minilo. A'mine gana' gilani' gamazi nene gili di minilizani' nene Melehingi Gipelengi inginela gi'mize lamine' ilisave.
Ido' Izesu' aza inite' ma lehize-ledelove lo lo huko line' nene minevo' minevo' ogo minaa' lemeni dameni nene lehize-ledelove lo molo-lede neive.
Me gamaziu' nene lengi' lengele'mize gopo ilisa gili minaveti monovo lo soto' ogo gize lingimuvoni'za

lingine neve Kilisito' lehize-lingidine' Sikalahu've nene ha di mini'mi vi nizave. Di mini'mi vi nizanako evene' laza inite' matakumu' apize lengemelonido' nomive. A'mine Sikalahu've lehize-lingidine' ne'mo inite' matakumu' apize lengemaa' neive. Ido' gamazi lo-lengemaa' neine' nene sozasi nomive. Laminetokovo' lo-lengemaa' neine' nenako lido' nene gili di Kilisitoda gi'mizi minilo.
Ee, izipaha'ne zuho mate, Kilisito' ogo heteleline' gamene soto' ilingu' nene laza eze velelo' mino lovozo helepele' ogo lehelele izamivo minelone li ezela gi'mizi minilo.
O'moso aza nene ve lisihe' lamine' neive li lingine gili nizave. Gili nizanako evene' ingine monovo lisihe' lamine' igi mili minaa' navemu' nene O'mosolati' soto' ani' ve li gililisave.

Vekizo, Meteho lulo atoli'mine ogo leme neine' nene gili nizahe. Ee, lulo atoli'mine ogo limidoti' nene izipaha'ne zuho ve lo lo-ledaa' neive. Ido' lamine' izipahala zuho none. None'za me misubou' ve O'moso gelekele' i-damani' ingine nene O'moso ningi gilamani' nenako lezesi a'mine'mine igi ningi gilamaa' nave.

Ido' lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' aleve mate, laza idi'nise nene O'moso'mi izipahala zuho ne none. Ido' mino nani lemeni damenilo' soto' olone' nehe ne'mi monovo nene olihe ma soto' o lamine' amine'za laza mo ti' lo gele none: Guvetesi ve soto' iline' gamenelo' nene ei' emeni dameni've ningo lazasi ei' emeni dameni ne'mine gidinisi minelesune losa gele none.

Ido' ogavo eze ningo emeni dameni ne'mine gidinisi minelone li ezemu' gili ele'vole' igi minaa' nave muki' ingine nene ei' lulo lamine' minine' ne'mino leze lute nesi lamine' minelive li engi' lu'ine di lamine' igi minaa' nave.
Goloso nite' daa' ne'mo O'moso'mo lou' gamazi line' nene avuto' oga' neine' nenako ingine goloso nite' daa' niilizani' nene O'moso'mo lou' gamazi line' nene avuto' ikeve.
Avuto' ikeni'za Izesu' aza goloso nite' do hulolosa soto' ine' nesi ido' ezela goloso nite' ma minamine' nesi nene lingine gili nizave.
Nemu' nene ezela gi'mizi minaa' nave ingine goloso nite' di minisa'mave. Goloso nite' daa' nave nete nene eze ningi gilisa'mave.

Izipaha'ne zuho mate, ingine monovo lisihe' lamine' igi mili i minaa' nave nene Izesu' aza ve lisihe' lamine' minine' ne'mini evene' lisihe' lamine' nizave. Nemu' malite ato' gamazi li lengele'mize gopo ikelizave.

Ido' malite goloso nite' di minilizani' nene ingine Satani'mi zuho minilisave. Satani aza goloso nite' gozopo' aka'milati' do'mo ogo minaa' neive. Ido' goloso nite' do'mo ogo minine' nenako O'moso'mi gipele aza Satani'mi gono nene bele helo ize huko-delesa soto' ine' ma neive.

O'mosolati' soto' igi izipahala lili' igi nizave ingine goloso nite' mo di minisa'mave. Ee, O'mosolati' emeni dameni've engita mine molo neivo ingine ezelati' soto' igi ei' izipahala lili' i nizanako goloso nite' ngeli di minamilisave.

O'moso'mi izipahala zuho ido' Satani'mi izipahala zuho engi' monovo danava ti' lo do kegeso ningelesune: Evene' ma ingine hehe li lamine' minamilizani' nene ingine O'mosolati' soto' igi minamave lo ningelesune. Ido' a'mine'mine ogo evene' ma ingine evene' muki' lu'ine ngimi nasahili' i-ngidamilizani' nene ingine O'mosolati' soto' igi minamave lo ningelesune.
Nemu' nene mono' gamazi api' ogo gilunidoti' gamazi ti' lo gele'mo gele'mo ogo minune: Laza lute ne geme ge neme lo bizo minelone.

Gozopo' vomila minive Kaini' aza ine' ne'mine amolone. Aza nene ve goloso Satani'mi gipele lolo' ogo akunoloine bele hiline'. Ido' bele hiline' monovo nene nanitekumu' bele hilive. Ei' Kaini' ogo molo minine' monovo've nene goloso o vivo ido' nakunolo'mo ogo molo minine' monovo've nene lisihe' lamine' minine' nenako nemu' bele hiline' ve.

Leze zuho mate, me misubou' ve ado' O'moso gelekele' i-damaa' ave nete lengikumu' mulu'ningu' goloso ogavo lukehe lingibilaa' nangumu' nene lingine gosoho' suno ma ve li gilii upuho' igi gatine muki' gilamilo.

Laza lute evene' muki' ngemaa' noune' nenako lelikumu' ti' lo gelaa' noune: Hele noninguti' tine' molo ogo ele'vole' ogo minevo' minevo' ogo mineloningu' vo holokune' ma neive. Evene' malite evene' ma lu'ine ngimami minaa' ave ingine nene lu'ine hele vine' nizave.

Malite evene' mamu' mulu'ningu' goloso ogavo lukehe ngibili minaa' nave ingine nene evene' ngibili hilaa' ave nizani' gelaa' neive. Ido' evene' ngibili hilaa' avemu' lingine mo gili nizave. Ingine minevo' minevo' ngemeni damenisi minamave.
Izesu' aza lelikumu' ve lo minevo' alevo've hulo lute ngemali'mi monovo lelebizavo ningo gele none. Nemu' laza a'mine'mine ogo evenekumu' nene minevo' alevote hulolonido' o neive.
Ne neiha evene' ma me misubo'mi heneni di minave ingine evene' ma inite'ine nomine' minave ma ningi mulumo'ine gili inite' ma ngimami minilizani' nene ingine mo keke' lu'ine O'moso imisa'mave.
Izipaha'ne zuho mate, laza lute evene' ngemaa' noune lo ma haza gamazi've vetedunukovo' lalone. Lute ngemaa' noune lo ma ne'mi gihile've do soto' iline' gono nene dalone.
Ne'mine ogo minaa' olonidoti' nene laza gamazi gihile lamineli'mi zuhouti' none' nene ningo gelelesune. Ne'mine ogo O'moso'mi velelo' lute do hongu lo minelesune.
Ido' goloso nite' daa' unive ve lo lutedunu' gelo lovozo helo ma ti' lo gelelesune: O'moso nene lute ivile' ogo mino inite' mata' muki' nene gele ngolo' lo gelaa' neive.
Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' mate, goloso nite' daa' unive ve lo lutedunu' gelo lovozo helamo ma O'moso'mi velelo' nene gele olobo' ogo minelesune.
Ne'mine ogo laza nene lo huko line' gamazi nene gele do mino nemu' eze mulunou' lamine' gelaa' neine' inite' ogo molo minaa' nounako ezela inite' nanitekumu' lube nene haza lemavo daa' noune.

Ido' a'mine lo huko line' gamazi nene ti' lo neive: Izesu'nimu' nene aza O'moso'mi gipele mino O'moso'mo do lu' izelive lo imiselelesa live nene neive lo laza gele ele'vole' ogo lute ge neme ne geme lo mineloningumu' lo-limido' e'meto olosune.

Ido' lo-huko line' gamazi nene gele do noolonive laza O'mososi bizo lamine' maka' minekunivo O'moso aza luteu' minevo dovo' ogo minaa' neive. Ido' eze Sikalahu' lehize-lidine' ne'mo lo-lemavo O'moso aza luteu' minevo' dovo' neive lo gelaa' noune.

Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' mate, O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' oga' unive polohete none li sozasi laa' ave muki' soto' igi misubou' misubou' nimonanako nemu' engikuti' ve ma lengita igi soza gamazi li-lingimikevo gili ngimikelizave. Nemu' nene linginela igi Sikalahuli'mo lele'mize akalo' o-lede neive li mono' li-lingimaa' ave muki' gopo gili-ngimaa' nani' monovotine nene hulilo. Gopo gili ngimami gamazi muki' nene O'mosolati' nehe atokuti' nehe li gili ningilo.

O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo ngele'mize akalo' o-ngedaa' ivemu' nene ti' li ningilisave: Ve ma ingine Izesu' Kilisito' aza evene' okode ne'mine lolo' ogo soto' ine' ve li li soto' milalizave nene ingine O'mosolati' nizave li ningi gililisave.

Ido' ve ma Izesu'nimu' aza evene' okode ne'mine do otuho soto' ine' neive li lamilizani' nene O'mosolati' nizamave. Ingine Kilisito'ni lovo o emaa' ive'mi gamazi laa' ave nizave. A'mine Kilisito'ni lovo o emaa' ive misubouko soto' oloseive li likevo gili nizave. Ido' idi'nise mo soto' ogo omo neive.

Izipaha'ne zuho mate, lingine O'mosolati' soto' igi O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' oga' unive polohete none li sozasi laa' ave nene ngivile' igi nizani' ma neive. Lengi' lutingu' minaa' neive ne'mo me misubou' ve ado' O'moso gelekele' i-damaveti lu'ningu' minive nene ivile' o neive. Nemu' lingine a'mine Kilisito'ni lovo i imaa' ave nene ngivile' i nizave.

Ingine misubou' ve O'moso gelekele' i-damaveti ngemeni damenisi minaa' nanako a'mine ngemeni damenilo' vo milise' iline' gamazivo' laa' nave. Likevo misubou' ve ingine lani' gamazi gili lanite' gilaa' nave.

Laza nene O'mosolati' soto' une' nenako ingine O'moso ningi gilaa' ave nene leze gamazite gili daa' nave. Ido' O'mosolati' soto' amave nete leze gamazite gili hulaa' nave. Ne'mine iga' nanako nemu' O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo do soto' ine' gamazi gihile lamine' nesi ido' gopo gamazi ado' O'moso'mi Sikalahuli'mo do soto' amine' gamazi nesi nene do kegeso ningo gelaa' noune.

Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' mate, lute ngemaa' nene O'mosolati' neine' nenako nemu' laza lute ne geme ge neme lo minuke'zo. Ingine evene' lu'ine ngimi nasahili' i-ngidi minilizave nene O'mosolati' soto' adite ilisave. Ingine O'mosomu' mo ningi gili nizave ve.
O'moso aza lute ngemaa' monovo'mi meleho neine' nenako nemu' evene' ma ingine lu'ine evene' ngimami minaa' nave nete O'mosomu' ningi gilisa'mave.
O'moso'mo gipele hamo' leli' do lu' izo minevo' minevo' lemeni dameni do soto' o-ledelive me misubouko imiselavo lemo ani'. Nemu' nene O'moso'mo lulo limine' nene soto' ogavo ningekune.
Lute ngemali'mi monovo ti' ogo neive: Laza lute O'moso emamunivosa asi've gomu' lulo lemo lelito' medelo mino oko'no hulo helo lihimete apase-ledelive lo gipeleine imiseline' ve.
Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' mate, O'moso'mo lulo atoli'mine ogo lemaze. Nemu' laza a'mine'mine ogo lute ne geme ge neme lo minelonido' o neive.
Evene' hamolitesi O'moso mo ningamune. Lute ne geme ge neme lo minelone' nene O'moso'mo lezesi bizo luteu' neivo lute imune' nene apa nite' amivo laminetokovo' lute eme gili' lo minelesune.
Ido' O'mosola bizo none' ido' O'moso'mo luteu' minevo' dovo' ogo neine' nene ningo gele none. Ido' naniteli'mo ningo gele none. Eze Sikalahu've leli' limidi'mo nene ningo gele none.
Meteho aza numudo' namado' ve do lu' izelive lo gipeleine imiselavo lemo ani' nene la'lisete vetedunu' ningune' nenako ne'mi gamazi lo soto' oga' noune.
Ido' evene' malite Izesu' aza lamine' mo O'moso'mi gipele neive li li soto' ave nene O'moso'mo engi' lu'ningu' minevo' dovo' ogo neivo ingine O'mososi bizi nizave.
Ido' O'moso'mo lulo lemaa' neine' nene ningo gele ele'vole' o none.

Lulo lemo nasahili' oga' monovo nene O'moso'mi emeni dameni gihile neine' nenako ve ma ingine lu'ine ve ma ngimi'mi vi minivi' divi' i'mi vilizani' nene ingine O'mosola bizi nizavo O'moso nesi engi' lu'ningu' minevo' dovo' ogo mineleseive.

Ido' Izesu' mene misubouko minevo' dovo' idi'mine ogo lazasi a'mine'mine ogo minevo' dovo' ogo nounako nemu' gamene nabau' O'moso'mo lihime ngemeline' gamenela nene lamine' minelone lo gele olobo' ogo none' ne'mo nene lute imune' nene apa nite' amo laminetokovo' eme gili' lolosune.

Lute ve ma emo ma a'mine vemu' golise gelamolosune. Lute emo gili' lune' ne'mo golise nene ehuso' oga' neive. Nemu' nene evene' O'mosomu' golise gilave ingine lihimete lemelihe li ezemu' golise gilani' ne'mo lu'ine imani' nene imi gili' lisa'mave.
Laza nene O'moso'mo gana' lulo limine' nenako nemu' O'mososi evenekisi lute ngemaa' noune.

Ve malite ve mamu' mulu'ningu' goloso ogavo lukehe ngibili minaa' niigi lute nene O'moso emaa' noune lilizani' soza lilisave. Ve ma ingine ningi nizave ma lu'ine ngimamilizani' nene ningamave O'moso nesi mo lu'ine imamilisave. Nemu' lute O'moso emaa' noune lilizani' nene soza lilisave.
Ido' Izesu' lo huko lo-lidine' gamazi ma ti' lo gelaa' noune: Lute nene O'moso emo ma evenekisi ngemelone' o neive.

Ve malite Izesu'nimu' nene aza do lu' izelive lo O'moso'mo imiselelesa live neive li gili ele'vole' ilizani' nene O'mosolati' soto' igi izipahala zuho lili' igi nizave. Ido' ve ma ingine lu'ine me'nibine imi ma izipahala zuhosi ngimilisave.
Ido' lute O'moso'mi izipahala zuho ngemaa' noube ngemamaa' noube. Lute O'moso emo lo huko line' gamazi gele do mino ma nene mo lamineto' lute ngemaa' noune lo ningo gelelesune.
Lute O'moso emali'mi monovo ti' ogo neive: Lo huko line' gamazi gele dalone' nene mo lamineto' lute emaa' olosune. Ido' O'moso'mo lo huko line' gamazi nene geni'vesi nominako ngelo livizamoloseive.

O'mosolati' soto' unive laza nene O'moso gelekele' i-damani' misubou' aleveti monovo nene damo a'mine monovo nene amuzo molo do leme'mo ogo minunako O'moso'mo lo huko line' gamazi nene livizesa'mive. Ido' a'mine misubou' minine' monovo nene gele damo amuzo molo'mo ogo minaa' noune' nene naniteli'mo ve. Izesu'nimu' gele ele'vole' ogo none' ne'mo ve.
Ido' zamote a'mine misubouko minine' monovo di limi'mi igi amuzo mili minilizave. Ingine Izesu'nimu' aza lamine' O'moso'mi gipele neive li gili ele'vole' i nizavetevo' ne'mine ilisave.

A'mine ve Izesu' Kilisito' aza nene nososi vanisesi soto' ine' ve. Nosovo' nomive. Soto' ine' nene mono' noso holanikisi vanise lepo hilinekisi ne neive. Ido' Sikalahu' ne'mo aza a'mine gamazi nene hize ele' o-daa' neive. Sikalahu' aza gamazi gihile'mi meleho neinako a'mine gamazi laa' neivo gihile izaa' neive.

Nemu' nene Sikalahu' ne'mo ido' mono' noso holani' ne'mo ido' vanise lepo hiline' ne'mo Izesu' monovo hize ele' i-di gono daa' nave. Sikalahu' ido' noso holani' ido' vanise've ingine setohamo nete gamazi lani' nene hamo' gamazi neive.

Haza evene' nete gamazi ma hizi ele' ikevo ma nene laza a'mine gamazi mo lamineto' neive lo gelaa' noune. Ne neiha O'moso'mo gamazi liline' nene haza eveneliti gamazi ivile' ogo gihile lamine' izeleseive. Nemu' nene O'moso'mo gipele hize ele' o-do line' gamazi neine' nene gele ele'vole' olosune.

Ingine O'moso'mi gipelemu' gili ele'vole' iga' nave nene lu'inedunu' gilikevo ele'vole' oga' neive. Ido' ingine O'moso'mo line' gamazi gili ele'vole' ami nizave nete O'moso'mo gipele hize ele' o-do line' gamazi nene gilikevo gihile izesa'minako nemu' O'mosomu' sozalo' ve ve lani' gelaa' neive.
Ido' gipele hize ele' o-do line' gamazi nene ti' lo neive: O'moso'mo minevo' minevo' oga' lemeni dameni nene mo leme neive. Ido' a'mine minevo' minevo' minaali'mi meleho nene ei' gipele ne neive.

Nemu' nene ingine O'moso'mi gipele di gili' li nizani' nete nene minevo' minevo' oga' ngemeni dameni nesi di nizave. Ido' ingine O'moso'mi gipele di gili' li di minamave nete minevo' minevo' oga' ngemeni dameni nesi mo damave.
O'moso'mi gipelemu' gili ele'vole' i nizave lingine minevo' minevo' lengemeni dameni nene mo do none li gili ele'vole' igi gililizave lo mene gamazi nene nogize-lingimuve.
Laza ti' lo O'moso'mi velelo' gele olobo' o none: O'mosola inite' mamu' voku' lunivo ei' gele neido' vo daline' nene gele lemeleseive.
Ido' ne'mine mana'mine initekumu' voku' lunivo gele lemeleseive lo gele ele'vole' o none' nenako inite' mamu' voku' lo-delone' nene lemavo lite' lo daa' noune lo gele none.

Ve mali'mo eze zuho ma goloso nite' nodavo ningivo a'mine ne'mo mudise helaa' akau' vilido' nomivo ma nene a'mine vemu' O'mosola lilive. Lavo O'moso'mo minevo' minevo' emeni damenisi mine do dizo mineline' akalo' ele'mize molaloseive. Mudise hilaa' akau' vilizado' nomine' goloso nite' davemukovo' noluve. Goloso nite' ma neine' nene a'mine dalizani' nene mudise hilaa' akau' vilizado' o neive. Ne'mine inite' davemu' O'mosola lilizave lo lamuve.
Goloso nite' muki' nene lihime daa' nitekovo' neive. Neine'za goloso nite' ma dalone' nene vo mudise helaa' akau' volonido' nomive.
Laza ti' lo gelaa' noune: O'mosolati' soto' unidite nene goloso nite' do minamolosune. O'moso'mi gipele ne'mo gizebo o-ledavo goloso'mi meleho aza gelelehe' o-ledo do goloso o-ledamoloseive.
Laza nene O'mosolati' soto' ogo none lo gele none. Ido' me misubou' ve O'moso gelekele' i-damani' muki' nete goloso melehida vi gi'mizi gelekele' i-di nizani' nesi gele none.

Ido' ti' lo gele none: O'moso'mi gipele aza misubouko lemo ogave. Ogo gate do ngolo' lo-lidine' nenako O'moso gihile nene ningo gelaa' noune'. Ee, O'moso gihile nesi bizo none. Gipele Izesu' Kilisitokisi bizo none. Me ve nene O'moso gihile ido' minevo' minevo' ogo minaali'mi meleho neive.
Izipaha'ne zuho mate, lingine avazaha o'moso nite' O'moso gihile minamani' nene gelekele' i-ngidikelizaze. Monovotido' gizebo lamine' igi minilo.
Moda ve.

O'moso'mo do kegeso ei' ve lo gele'mize molani' vene' make, gizebo ve naza gezesi ido' izipaha zuhosi lu'ne lamine' lengeme nouvoni' aleve lengikumu' luhuvo nite' mene nogize lingimuve. Ido' nenikovo' lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' nevoba gamazi gihile gili lamine' i nizave mukikisi a'mine'mine igi lu'ine lingimaa' nave.
Ido' laza lute lengemaa' noune' nene a'mine gamazi gihile ne'mo leli' luteu' mino lelita minevo' minevo' ogo mineline' nenako nemu' nene lute lengemaa' noune.
Ido' Meteho O'moso ido' eze gipele Izesu' Kilisito' ingine lu'ine limi nizasinako lamine' muhelete ningi nasahili' i-lidi mulude di hongu li-lidilisive.
Ido' izipaha zuho linge ma meteho lo huko-lidido' gili di gamazi gihile've nene di mini nizavo ne'mi gamazi gelo mulu'neu' lamine' goloso gelekuve.

Ido' vene' make, O'moso'mo lo huko-lidine' gamazi ma lo-gemekuvo geleline losa noluve. A'mine gamazi nene gosoho' nomive. Litehe ma monovolati' vomine gele'mo gele'mo ogo minune' nene ti' lo lo-gemelove: Laza muki' lute ne geme ge neme lo minelesune.

Lute O'mososi evenekisi ngemaali'mi monovo ne'mino neive: Laza O'moso'mo lo huko line' gamazilo' gele do'mo ogo minelesune. Ido' lingine lo huko line' gamazi nene monovolati' vomine gili'mi gili'mi igi minani'. Ti' lo neive: Lingine lutine ngimi'mi vi minilisave.

Soza mono' li evene' ngele'mize gopo iga' ave muki' soto' igi misubou' misubou' nimonave. Ingine Izesu' Kilisito' aza leli' haza eveneliti okode ne'minesi soto' ine' ve li gili imisa'mave. A'ne'mine ve nene soza mono' li evene' ngele'mize gopo iga' ave mini Kilisito'ni lovo i imaa' ave nizave.
Gono lengita dune' nene vo gopo ogo haza ogalive. Monovotido' gizebo lamine' igi minilo. Ne'mine igi mini di dizikevo O'moso'mo ne'mi gihile've lengemavo muki' nene dalizave.

Malite Kilisito' gamazi've apizi ngimangu' minami ivile' igi ato' gamazi lilizani' nene O'moso di minamave. Ido' malite ato' gamazi lami Kilisito' gamazi've di minilizani' nene ingine metehingi gipelengi nene di minaa' nave.
Evene' malite Kilisito' gamazi've di minami mono' apizi lingimilisa nilavo ma lingine ngele'mizi numudingu' milamilo. Ido' mese' aseka li-ngidamilo.
Mese' aseka li-ngidilizave nete a'mine ve gono goloso dalizani' nene hize ele' ilisave. Nemu' nene mese' aseka li-ngidamilo.
Gamazi lo-lengemeloni' nene muki' ha neiha luhuvo niteku' gizelove lo gelamuve. Lengita vokuvo vetedunu' lo volelo' melo' ogo muludeu' lamine' goloso gelelone lo gelekuve.
Aluna O'moso'mo do kegeso ei' ve lo ele'mize molani' ne'mi izipahala zuho nete gopo'ni nilave. Moda ve.
Zogone lamine' Gaio gaza lu'ne gimuve make, gizebo ve naza luhuvo nite' nogize gimuze. Ningezo.
Zogone, luka do lamine' ogo nanivo okongasi a'mine'mine ogo ha lamine' minavo minevo' alevoka laminekovo' o-do vo minelive lo O'mosola laa' nouve.
Leze zuho malite igi gamazi gihile'mi akalo' vaa' nane li ido' gamazi gihile do gili' lo minaa' nane li gei' monovoka li soto' igi li-nimikevo mulu'neu' lamine' goloso gelo minuvoni' ve.

Inite' ne'mine mana'mine initekumu' mulu'neu' lamine' geleloni'za neni' izipaha'ne zuho gamazi gihile'mi akalo' vaa' nave li likevo gelo ato' nitekumu' lamine' gelaa' nouvoni' nene ivile' ogo mulu'neu' lamine' goloso gelaa' nouve.
Zogone, Gaza leze aleve Izesu' zuho ma venenga ve minanikisi lengita iga' iga' avo ngele'mize lamine' olosa gono daa' naine' nene monovo gihile lamine' daa' nane.

Luka ngemaningumu' nene a'mine aleve nete Izesu' evenele mulise milangu' li soto' igi gopo'ni laa' nave. Ido' a'ne'mine aleve lengita igi nivavo ma O'moso'mo gelavo lisihe' lamine' ilido' do molo akala vilizangu' inite' ma vise' ilizani' inite' nene do soto' ogo ngemo ngele'mizo viline' nene lamine' oloseive.
Ee, Izesu' guvele monelingumu' gono dalone li engi' misubo'ine huli vi Izesu'nimu' gilamavetida gono di engitati' meni disa'manako hize ele' o-ngedeline' nene lamine' o neive.
Nemu' nene gamazi gihile di hutile' ilizangu' lazasi gono makato' dune' gelavo mineloningumu' ve lo a'ne'mine ve hize ele' o-ngedelone' o neive.
Lengi' muliselo' luhuvo nite' ma gizuvoni'za lengi' vovotingu' ve naba lolo' olosa amuzo molaa' ive Diotelehe' aza nene neni' gamazi'ne gele hulaa' neive.

Nemu' nene aza oga' ine' initekumu' vo lo soto' ogo eita gamazi gono dalosuve. Lelikumu' gamazi goloso gehepeve lo soza gamazi lo-ledaa' neive. Ido' neevo' nomive. Leze zuho Izesu' aleve ma lengita ngimiselekunivo vi hetelikevo aza mese' aseka lo-ngedesa'mive. Ido' malite mese' aseka lo-ngedelone li lilisa naavo o've lo-ngedo mono' muliseuti' hulo heta o-ngedaa' neive.

Zogone lamine, evene' ma goloso nite' di nizavo ma a'mido' nge'metamozo. Inite' lamine' di nizavo ma nelokovo' nge'metezo. Ingine inite' lamine' di minaa' nave nene O'mosolati' soto' ani' ve. Ido' ingine goloso nite' di minaa' nave ingine mo O'mosomu' ningi gilamave.
Demetelio'nimu' evene' muki' gamangi mili-daa' navo gamazi gihile ne'mosi gamangi molo-daa' neive. Nazasi ezemu' gamangi nomolo-duve. Ido' gamazi laminekovo' noluvoni' nene gele nane.
Naza gamazi lo-gemeloni' nene muki' ha neine'za gizeso' ga'ne nisamive.
Naza gamene ha'na minamo gei' vo ninguvo vetedunu' gamazi lo volelo' melo' ogo minelosive losa noluve.
O'moso'mi hongu geita mine'mo vo minelive. Zogole zuho gopo'ni nilave. Ido' zogole zuho a'mida nizani' nene vo lo-ngemezo. Engi' hamo' hamokumu' ngopo'ni noluve. Moda ve.

Ado' Izesu Kilisito' gonolo' ve Zakobo' akunolo Zuda' naza luhuvo nite' meve nene O'moso'mo lulo lengeme mino vise lo do eita o-lengedavo Izesu Kilisito' gizebo o-lengede neive lengi' nene nogize-lingiduze.
O'mosolati' mulumote ningaa' monovosi ido' hongu lo lamino minaa' monovosi ido' lulo lemaa' neine' monovo've nesi nene lengita vauve elo vai' lo'mo vo miniliho.

Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' alevekizo, naza O'moso'mo nenikisi lengikisi do lu' izine' monovomu' nene luhuvo nite' ma gize-lengedeloho lo amuzo molo nogiluvodo' mene O'moso'mo eze evenele mudise levo levo lo mineline' mono' lehize-lidine' nene lingine zege' zege' igi hizi ele' ilizave lo luhuvo nite' lutine do oto ma gizeloni' ogavosa mene nogizuve.

Ne nanitekumu' ve. Evene' ma nene helele' igi vovoteu' ma dizikeve. Ingine nene monoto' e'mete lamine' ami mini O'mosote'mo nasahili' o-ledo lihimete hulo-ledaa' neine' monovo've nene di zovo' izii a'mine monovo've ne'mo nene monovo goloso gopo geligeli ogo daa' nene asabu' izaa' neive li evene' nabate hamo' minive Guvetesi ve Izesu Kilisito'ni nesi nene mehe'ine imaa' nave. A'mine ne'mine ve nene O'moso'mo goni' o-ngedo lihime ngemeleseive li gozopo' aka'milati' li huki gizi nizani' ma neive.

Lo-lengemeloni' gamazi mukikumu' mene lingine mo gili nizaha a'minemu' nene lo gatine olove lo gele noosa nene noluve: Ado' Guvelesi ve ne'mo nene Isilaele' aleve Aigita misubou' minanguti' gana' nene do ngu' izo ngele'mizo vine'za alinge' nene ezemu' gili ele'vole' amave ngebele gese' ine' ve.

Ido' angelo' linge O'moso'mo ngimine' mo'mosi'nido' nene mini gili' lami a'mine gono'ine hulani' angelo' nene gamene nabala goni' o-ngedelove lo levo levo lo mineline' seni nala' nene ize-ngedo liti'musou' hulo-ngedeko gizebo o-ngedo neive.

Ido' a'mine angelo' nete lihime dani' ne'mino nene Sodomi nGomola ido' a'mida mine'mo monine' numuno ebeku' aleve lihime dani' nene ado' vene' vemoho' gopo' napa ingaa' igi minaa' ido' vene' nene huli vemoho' angise'ine oko'ningu' inite' iga' ani' ve. Ne'mine igi minangumu' O'moso'mo olo' gize' vote-ngidine' ve. Ne'mine ine' nene evene' ma a'mine'mine ogo lihime ngemo lihizami oloku' hulo-ngedeline' avazaha nesi do soto' ogo lelebizine' ve.

A'mine mono' di gopo igi laa' avemu' mene noluvoni' nene ingine a'mine'mine igi lihime disa vamu' ne'mine ningaa' naadoti' nene engi' oko'ine di goloso igi mini ido' ve naba'mi gizebolo' mini gamazi've gili di minaa' monovomu' nene gosele' igi hozila dizi minave naba angelo' nevo'mine nesi nene divi ledivi' i-ngidaa' nave.

Ingine ne'mine iga' naha gonoso Mose'ni nene zaho dalive li a'minemu' nene angelo' naba Mikaelekisi Satanisi gamazi gono dasingu' nene Mikaele' (Maikoli') aza Satani dovo ledevo' gamazi lo-do elemelodo' nomuve lo gelo ne'mine amine' ve. Asi Guvelesi ve'mo gelemivo lo a'neevo' nene ma lo-imine' ve.

Ne'mine ine'za me noluve nene gili hehe lamilizado' o minine' initekumukisi nene ganu' li gamazi goloso laa' nave. Ido' ingine inite' linge mamu' gilaa' nani' nene nama gaha ize gulolite haza oko'ine'mo lanite' giline' initekumukovo' gilaa' nani' ngemenilo' nene di milisa gilaa' nani' nenako nemu' nene a'mine gilaa' nani' initelite nene ngele'mize goloso iga' nave.

Agae, engi' nene mo mulumo gono dalisave. Ee, ingine Kaini' eikumukovo' gelaa' ine' monovo malo' e'metikeve. Ido' moni heneni dalone li Balaamu' aka laminetoti' zovo' izo vo monilo' lulo molani' ma'mine monovolo' amuzo mili e'metikeve. Ido' ma nene Kola' ine' ne'mine igi ingine nene O'moso'mo line' gamazimu' nene o'ove li biluva' i-daa' nani' nenako labuluvo ine' ne'mine igi labuluvo ilisa nave.

Lingine lutine ge neme ne geme li minaa' nangumu' nene di nubo igi makato' noso' nite' naa' nangu' nene a'mine ne'mine ve ingine imi mini ngovozosi hilami mini noso' nite' sau sau li naa' nani' ne'mo nene a'mine noso' nite' nalisa mulise milaa' nani' mulisetine nene di goloso iga' nave. Ido' engi' neve nene hepeli'mo limuso hubu lo do vavo goline izamivo ma hize ele' o-ledesa'mine' ne'mino monoku' nene ma hizi ele' i-lidisa'mave. Ido' ma nene za ma gihile izaa' naani' gameneu' malite gihile izamaa' naani' ne'mino monoli'mi gihile di soto' amavo za ma luhive gili hulikevo mo goko' laa' neine' ne'mino engi' lu'ine nene mo mudise hele gehepeve ogave.

Ido' engi' neve nene hepe' naba elo guvo noso velo gituho' galakala' ogo noso hemuvoloti' pipia' do ogo gahevela hutile' ogo hulaa' neine' ne'mine nene minaa' nave. Ido' ma nene sonohilite vilizani' aka'ine hulisa zovo' izi mala vaa' naani' ne'minisa nene nizave. A'mine soza mono' apizi lingimaa' nave engi' nene vi liti'muso atoli'mine gehepeveu' minevo' minevo' ilizave lo O'moso'mo salani molo-ngede neivo engikumu' ha gizebo o neive.
Ido' a'mine soza mono' laa' avemu' nene Adamudoti' mini di aveuti' naba seveni minive Enoku' ne'mo gomukuti' O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi ma ti' lo line' ma neive:
Me gililo. Guvelesi ve nene eze angelo've mulise naba tauseni tauseni ne'mine ngele'mizo ogo
mono' monovolo' e'metamave muki' ingine
monoku' nomine' monovolo' e'meti igi mili ani' inite' mukikumukisi
ido' monoto' e'metamave lihimelo' ve
ezemu' gizengize gamazi li-daa' ani' mukikumukisi nene
goni' o-ngedo lihime ngemelove lo alosa neive.

A'mine mene noluve ne'mine nete nene inite' mukikumu' lihiteheka li mulu'ningu' lite' lite' li goloso gilaa' ave mini engi' oko'ine'mo lanite' gilidokovo' e'meti mini gamazi'movo' i vani' mini inite' ma dalobe li go'ine izi ngopo'ni laa' nave.
Lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' alevekizo, lingine Guvelesi ve Izesu Kilisito' aposolo'velite gomukuti' lani' gamazi mamu' gatine molalize. Gili nge li minilo.

Ado' ti' li li-lingimani' mamu' nene noluve: Gamene alinge' nela nene monokumu' gize abelenga laa' ave engi' lu'nidokovo' di mili monoku' nomine' monovo golosolo' e'metilizave ma soto' ilisave li li-lingimave.
A'mine aleve nene O'moso'mi evenele hizi ho'li-ngidaa' ave nene nizave. Ingine me misubou' initekumukovo' gelaa' neine' ngemenisivo' minikevo O'moso'mi Sikalahu' nene engita minesa'mivo ma damave.

Ne neiha lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' alevekizo, lingine neve nene monotine gili ele'vole' iga' nani' ado' O'mosolati' atoli'mine gehepeve o neido' nene mine gili' li mini monoku' naba ilizangumu' nene ge hize ele' o-nede ne hize ele' o-gede li mini O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo amuzo lingimivo minilizadoti' nene O'mosola li mini

O'moso'mo lulo lengeme'mo vo minelido' mini mili minilizangumu' nene lengi' monovotido' gizebo lamine' igi mini Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' mulumotine gelo ogo minevo' minevo' lengemeni gihile do otuho-lengedelingumu' nene gili mu'musi' igi a'minemu' gizebo igi minilo.
Evene' linge ma monokumu' ga'ine seta' sata' gili minilizave nene mulumo'ine gili hize ele' i-ngidilo.

Ido' linge ma neve nene oloku' vaa' akalo' mini mili nizanguti' nene singeli huli-ngidi di ngu' izilo. Ido' lingine mulumo'ine gililizado' i minilizani' aleve linge nene oko'ine'mo lanite' giline' monovo goloso nene oko'nido' mineline' nenako nemu' nene a'mine oko'nido' nite' nemukisi nene gosele' i minisa lelitasi gi'mizalive li golise gili ehe' i minisa mulumo'ine gili hizi ele' i-ngidilo.

Guvetesi ve Izesu' Kilisito' gono dadoti' do lu' izaa' ive minive O'moso hamo' aza lengi' alete molo-lengedo neivo lodoho' izi limi ingami okodido' gamazisi nomivo longolize naba izi nizavo ei' labana'vesi minive'mi velelo' nene lengele'mize molalido' lisihe' o neize. Eita nene guvele've nabavo' mino gizebo ve minaa' amuzo've gozopoti' minine' nene idisesi alingekisi minevo' minevo' ogo mine do dizo minelive. Mo ne'mino miniliho.
Moda a'nesi' ve.

Gizeloni' gamazi mene O'moso'mo Izesu Kilisito'ni lo soto' ogo elebizine' initekumu' nene gizelouve. A'mine inite' elebizine' nene geto soto' ilido' o minine' initekumu' mene eze gonolo' ve ngelebizelive lo O'moso'mo elebizine' ve. Ne'mine ogavo aza leli' gililizave losa gonolo' ve neni' Zohane'ni nelebizelesa angelo've nenito' imiselo a'mine gamazi nene do soto' o-nidine' ve.
Ido' a'mine do soto' o-nidine' inite' muki' ninguvoni' nene naza lo soto' ogo a'mine O'moso'mi gamazi Izesu Kilisito' hize ele' ogo lo soto' ido' nene naza hize ele' ogosa nogizuve.

A'mine inite' soto' iline' gamene nene mo alite neine' nenako nemu' nene evene' ma a'mine O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi gizuvoni' mene gati ma li-ngimilizave nesi ido' gati li-ngimikevo gilisa a'mingu' gizuvoni' gamazilo' e'meti gili dalizave nesi nene O'moso'mo no'noho' ize-ngedeline' nenako nemu' nene ngolize izilizani' akalo' mini milalisave.

Zohane' naza Asia misubou' mini'mi monani' mono' mulise seveni lengi' nene luhuvo nite' mene nogize-lengedo ti' lo noluve: Idise mino gomukuti' mino mine do dize'mo alive ezelatikisi ido' aza gizebo o-ledo minaa' neine' mo'mosi've'mi velela minaa' nani' Sikalahu' seveni engitatikisi ido' Izesu Kilisito' ado' O'moso'mi gamazi lamine' lo soto' o-ledaa' ive ezelo' gele medelelonido' o minive gomu' molo-ledo hilinguti' oto minive ido' misubou' misubou' mini'mi monani' guve'inesi ve naba muki' engi' guve'inesi ve naba minive ezelatikisi nene ado' nasahili' oga' monovosi ido' hongu lo lamino minaa' monovosi nene lengita minivo.
Ado' lulo've leme neive ne'mo nene ei' vanise've hulo hilidoti' nene lihimete apase-ledo

ei' gizebou' lele'mize molo mo'mosite naba lemosa ei' O'moso've ado' ei' melehinemu' opo'ni lo inite' lehize-daa' olonive lolo' o-lidive eita nene guvele minivo gizebo o-ledeline' amuzo've nene minevo' minevo' ogo mine do dizo minelive. Mo ne'mino miniliho.
Me gililo. Limuso avilelo' nene alosa neive.
Ido' aline' nene evene' muki' nete ve'inedunu' ningilisave.
Ado' bilii losonou' hizi ngolosave inginesi nene ningilisave.
Ido' misubou' misubou' mini'mi monani' evene' zuho ato ato' muki' ingine
eikumu' nene agae agae li ive nama igi minilisave.
Neve nene mo lamine' ve. Mo ne'mino soto' iliho.

Guvelesi ve O'moso ado' inite' mukito' gizebo ve minaa' amuzo'vesi minive idise mino gomukuti' mino mine do dize'mo alive ne'mo nene ti' lo nolive: Neni' nene inite' mata' muki' minamangu' gomu' molo mino alinge' ma osu' lilizani' nene naza ha minevo' minevo' ogo minelove nene nouve.

Lengi' zuho lengikisi maka' Izesuda gi'mize mino ei' gizebou' vo holo nonivo goboni mili-lidangu' mino mulumo geni ha ele'vole' ogo gehe'mo vo minaa' nounive Zohane' naza O'moso'mi gamazi lo soto' ogo Izesu' gamazi hize ele' ogo lo soto' ogo minuvongumu' nene lihime nimi ailani ma Patimosi ve laa' angu' nene mineline li nimiseli hulikevo vo minuvoni' ve.

A'mida minuvongu' nene Guvelesi ve'mi gamene ve lo holise' minaa' noune' gamene mau' nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo zatuho' o-nidivo nouvo mehe'nelati' pikuli nolo molaa' neine' ne'mino nolo nabauti' soto' ine' nene gamazi

ti' lo line' giluve: Gaza ningeline' inite' meve nene bukuu' gizosa Izesu' evenele mulise seveni ado' Eheso numuno ebetamukisi ido' Similina numuno ebetamukisi ido' Pelegamoni numuno ebetamukisi ido' Tiatila numuno ebetamukisi ido' Saladisi numuno ebetamukisi ido' Hiladelehia numuno ebetamukisi ido' Laodikia numuno ebetamukisi nene gizo hulo-ngedezo.
Ne'mine lavo naza a'mine ne'mine nolo molo gamazi lo-nimive nene ningelesa mine velepe' izuvoni' ve. Ne'mine ogo ninguvoni' nene ngolidunu' lili' ani' lamu seveni nene ningo

a'mine lamu neti vovo'ningu' nene evene' oko'nosi minive ma ninguve. A'mine ve'mi genegana've nene ha'na ha'na gizenelo' leme pele minine' nene ngolo mino losonolo' nene ngolidunu' lili' ani' inite' leti ne'mine izekine' minine' ve.
Ido' godolo zopovo nene mokono' hego gehepeve elo minavo vele gulo nesi nene olo' gulumo ne'minosa minine' ve.
Gizene've nene ngoli gele vine' inite' oloku' gizi di lamine' ikevo ve'ne ve'ne elo minaa' neine' ne'mino ve'ne ve'ne elo minine' ve. Ido' nolo've nene noso naba'mi gugu ne'minosa minine' ve.

Ido' ana zamela nene sonohi' seveni ne'mine do minine' ve. Ido' veleuti' nene bainati mite' velela ge'no mehenela ge'no gohe goloso minine' nene omo hetele minivo golo vele nene ho' amuzo molo silingenge'ne hulaa' neine' ne'mine labana' nene soto' ogo minine' ve.

Ne'mine ogo neivo naza ningo gizeneu' lemo pou' lo ongo hiluve ne'mine gelo minuvoni' ve. Ne'mine ogo nouvo ana zame nedunu' nene oko'nelo' nodo gelo ti' lo line' ve: Gaza golise gelamozo. Naza nene inite' mata' muki' minamangu' gana' minuve alinge' osu' ma lilizangu' nesi nene ha minevo' minevo' ogo minelove nene nouve.

Minevo' minevo' oga' nemeni damenisi nene nouve. Gomu' nene naza hiluvoni'za aizo, idise nene naza gohi ve'ne gizo minevo' minevo' ogovo' nouve. Ido' neni' neve nene hili vilizangumu' akahe si'zaa' kii' nesi ido' hilisa minani' ebekuti' oti vilizangumu' akahe si'zaa' kii' nesi nene nenikovo' do nouve.
Nemu' nene gaza ne'mine olosane. Gaza idise soto' o neine' initekisi ido' alinge' soto' olosa neine' initekisi nene ningelesange. A'mine inite' nene ningosa luhuvo gizezo.

Suno' minine' inite' ado' a'ne zamela nene sonohi' seveni do nouvo ningaine' ne'mi monovo nesi ido' ngolidunu' lili' ani' lamu seveni minine' ne'mi monovo nesi nene ne'mino neive: A'mine sonohi' seveni nene evene'ne mulise seveni neti angelo'nido' nene medeli avazaha ne'mine nene nizave. Ido' a'mine lamu seveni nene a'mine evene'ne mulise sevenilo' nene medeli avazaha ne'mine nene nizave.
Ne'mine losa Izesu' ti' lo lo-nidine' ve: Eheso numuno ebeku' evene'ne mulise'mi angeloli'mo engi' lo-ngemeline' gamazi nene luhuvo ti' lo gizezo:
A'ne zamela sonohi' seveni do mino lamu seveni neti vovo'ningu' mono minaa' nouve ne'mo nene gamazi ti' lo noluve:

Lengi' monovotine nene mo ningo gele nouve. Ado' amuzo mili mono' monovolo' e'meti mini mulumo geni ele'vole' igi gihi'mi vi minaa' nani' nemu' nene mo ninge minaa' nouve. Ido' evene' golosomu' gili gosele' iga' nani' nesi ido' aposolo gihile minamaha aposolo none laa' avemu' nesi nene lingine monovo'ine ize' mili ningi sozalo' ve minani' monovo'ine nene mo ningi di soto' igi gilani' nemukisi nene mo ningo gele nouve.
Ido' lingine nenikumu' ve li mulumo geni amuzo mili gihi'mi vi minaa' nangu' ahu' lamaa' naani' nemukisi nene mo ningo gele nouve.
Ne neiha lengita monovo ma neine' nene mo edamive lo gele nouve. Ado' lutine idise nimaa' nani' nene gana' lutine vauve ili nimi minaa' ani' votigilelo' nene nimisa'mave.

Gomu' monovo lamine' igi mili minaa' ani' nene huli mo limi ingikeve. A'mine gomu' monovotinemu' nene gohi gililo. Lutine di velepe' izii gana' iga' ani' suno nene gohi igi mili minilo. Ne'mine amilizani' nene naza ogo lengito' medelo minine' lamutine nene mo'mosi'veloti' do hulolosuve. Lutine ma di velepe' izamilizani' nene ne'mine olosuve losa nene nolo-lingiduve.

Ne neiha lengita monovo ma ne'mino neine' nene lamine' ve. Naza gosele' gehepeve oko minaa' nouvoni' monovo ado' Nikolao'ni e'metaa' navete iga' nani' monovo nemu' nene linginesi gosele' gehepeve iki minaa' naave.

Gatine ngolo' live ni ma nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo eze evenele mulise minika' minika' angu' nolo-ngimine' gamazi meve nene gililo. Monoli'mi lovou' Satani ivile' ilizave nene gele ngemekuvo ingine neve nene O'moso'mi mi've paladisi za zuhou' vi mini minevo' minevo' ngemeni dameni do otuho-ngedeline' za've'mi gihile nene ili nalisave.
Ne'mine losa Izesu' gohi ma ti' lo lo-nidine' ve: Ido' Similina numuno ebeku' evene'ne mulise'mi angeloli'mo engi' lo-ngemeline' gamazi nene luhuvo ti' lo gizezo:
Inite' mata' muki' minamangu' gana' minuve alinge' a'mine inite' osu' lilizangu' nene minevo' minevo' ogo minelove ado' mo hiluvoni'za gohi ve'ne gizo otuve naza nene gamazi ti' lo noluve:

Lengi' goboni mili-lingidi nizavo geni gihi'mi vi nizani' nemukisi ido' goho' gahali' nizani' nemukisi nene mo gele nouve. Ido' ne neiha mo monoku' heneni ve lili' ikeve. Ido' O'moso'mi evenele Zuda ve none laa' naaha O'moso'mi evenele gihile minami Satani'mi evenele mulise nizani' nete lengi' divi ledivi' i-lingidaa' nangumukisi nene mo gele nouve.

Ido' mulumo geni gihi-lingidilisa navo lingine mo gihilisa nangumu' nene mo golisesi gilamilo. Lingine gililo. Ve goloso ne'mo nene lengemengu' molo do ningelesa evene' ma do ote-ngedavo ingine lengikuti' evene' linge ma nene nala' numungu' huli-lingidilisa naaze. Mulumo geni inite' nene lengito' soto' ogo neivo gamene li'nibe gamene teni a'ne'minevo' nene mineleseive. Ne neiha nenito' gi'mizi minilizangumu' lingibili hililisa ilizangumukisi gili huli nenito' nene ha gi'mizi gilikovo' li minilo. Ne'mine ma ilizani' ne'mi meni've nene naza minevo' minevo' minaa' lengemeni nene lehize-lengedelesuve.

Gatine ngolo' live ni ma nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo eze evenele mulise minika' minika' angu' nolo-ngimine' gamazi meve nene gililo. Ve ma ingine monoli'mi lovou' Satani ivile' ilizave neve nene gamene nabala mono' gilamave gohi hililizangu' nene gohi hilamavo a'mine gohi helaa' ne'mo nene ma ngele'mize goloso amoloseive.
Ne'mine losa Izesu' gohi ti' lo lo-nidine' ve: Ido' Pelegamoni numuno ebeku' evene'ne mulise'mi angeloli'mo engi' lo-ngemeline' gamazi nene luhuvo ti' lo gizezo:
Ado' bainati mite' velela ge'no mehenela ge'no gohe goloso minine' do minuve ne'mo nene ti' lo noluve:

Lingine minaa' nani' ebetine'mi monovo've nene mo gele nouve. Ebe' goloso Satani'mi mo'mosi've gehepeve minine' ebe'veu' nene nizave lo mo ningo gele nouve. Ne neiha neni' gulive'ne lengita neine' nene di gili' li mini neni' hulo-nedamo gamazi'ne hize ele' ogo lo soto' oga' ive Adipasi'ni bili hilani' gameneukisi lingine nenikumu' gili ele'vole' i minani' mamu' nene ne'mine ma osa'mune li ataize lamave. A'mine ve nene ado' lengi' vovotingu' Satani'mo minevo' alevo' oga' neine' ebeta gehepeve nene neivo bili hilani' ve.

Ne neiha lengita inite' linge ngomo ma neine' nene edamive lo gele nouve. A'mine nene evene' linge ma Balaamu' gamene gomuta apize ngimine' monovo ha di minaa' nave nene lengiku' ma nizave. A'mine monovo nene ado' Balaamu' ne'mo guvelesi ve Balaki'ni aka elebizavo aza Isilaele' aleve ngimimise' ivo ingine soza o'moso ngimani' noso' nite' nisa vene' vemoho' gopo' napa ingaa' ani' ve.
Ido' a'mine'mine ogo lengiku' nene evene' linge ma Nikolao'ni e'metaa' avete apizi ngimani' monovo goloso di minaa' nave nene nizave.

Nemu' nene lingine lutine di velepe' izilo. Ne'mine ma amilizani' nene naza lengita geto ogo hetelo ve'neuti' bainati mite' omo hetele neine' nedunu' nene a'mine monovo golosolo' e'meti minave nene lovo o ngemelesuve.

Gatine ngolo' live nii ma nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo eze evenele mulise minika' minika' angu' nolo-ngimine' gamazi meve nene gililo. Ve ma ingine monoli'mi lovou' Satani ivile' ilizave nene naza Okulumokuti' noso' nite' haleko minaa' neine' mana nene ma ngemekuvo nalisave. Ido' ma nene geheni mokono' ngemelesuve. A'mine gehenilo' nene gulive gosoho' mineka' mineka' ine' ngemekuvo dalizave netevo' nene a'mine gulivemu' nene suno' gili minilisave.
Ne'mine losa Izesu' ti' lo lo-nidine' ve: Tiatila numuno ebeku' evene'ne mulise'mi angeloli'mo engi' lo-ngemeline' gamazi nene luhuvo ti' lo gizezo:
O'moso'mi gipele naza ve'ne gulo nene olo' gulumo ne'minesi mino gize'neloti' nene ngoli gele vine' inite' bolonisi ne'mino ve'ne ve'ne elo minine' gize'nesi minuve naza nene ti' lo noluve:

Lengi' igi mili iga' nani' monovotinesi ido' lutine ngimaa' monovotinesi ido' nenita gili ele'vole' iga' nani' monovotinesi ido' hize ele' oga' gono lamine' di minaa' monovotinesi ido' mulumo geni ele'vole' igi gihi'mi vi minaa' nani' monovotinesi nizangumu' nene naza mo gele nouve. Gelo mino alinge' igi mili iga' nani' monovotine ne'mo nene gomu' igi mili iga' ani' monovotine nene ivile' ogo lamine' neingumu' nene mo gele nouve.

ne'mino mo gele nouvoni'za lengita monovo ma neine' nene mo edamive lo gele nouve. A'mine monovo nene ado' vene' Zezabele' aza polohete nouve lo neni' gelekele' evene'ne ma nene ngele'mize gopo ogo vene' vemoho' gopo' napa ingi'mi monaa' monovolokisi ido' soza o'moso ngimani' noso' nite' naa' monovolokisi nene apize ngemaa' neine' vene' neve nene ningi gosele' i-dami ningi mati-daa' naangumu' nene noluve.
Ido' a'mine ne'mino gopo monaa' monovomu' nene lulo do velepe' izelihe lo lihime emamo ninge mate-miko gamene imuha lulo ma do velepe' izelesa gelamive.

Aizoo, me gili'nalo. Ei' neve nene mo mulumo alumo gili ingaa' initekuko nene mo ongokelive losa do nohulo-duve. Ido' ezesi maka' lihime daa' niilizave ingine ezesi iga' ani' monovo'inemu' lu'ine ma di velepe' izamilizani' nene inginesi mulumo gono naba gihilizado' do hulo-ngedelesuve.

Ido' ei' izipahala zuho nene mo ngebele gese' okuvo hililisave. Ne'mine okuvo neni' evene'ne mulise muki' nete nenikumu' nene gilikevo neni' neve nene evene' lu'ningu' ga'ningu' minine' initekumu' vise' ogo ningo gelaa' ive ve li gililisave. Ee, lingine igi mili iga' ado' gehepevevo' nene golo hizo hamo hamo' meni lengemelesuve.

Ido' neni' evene'ne Tiatila numuno ebeku' nizanguti' linge ma lingine a'mine veneli'mo apize lengemaa' neine' gamazilo' ma gili dami ido' evene' malite SAtani'mi monovo danava luhise've ve laa' nani' monovolokisi nene gili damaa' nave lengi' nene geni gono gohi ma gehe-lengedamolosuze.
Asi idise lingine ma di nizani' monoto' nene ha di gili' li di minilo. Ne'mine i nizavosa tine' molo aloni' nene mo lamine' oloseive lo neevo' nene nolo-lingiduve.

Ve ma ingine monoli'mi lovou' Satani ivile' igi neni' sunolo' mudise e'meti igi mili nizavo gamene osu' liline' nene naza me'nehidati' do nouvoni' amuzo ne'mine nene O'mosomu' gilamani' evene' zuho ato atoto' gizebo i-ngidilizani' amuzo nene ngemelesuve. Ido' ne'mino ngemekuvo ingine a'mine O'mosomu' gilamave ngibililizani' gavoso ainidunu' lili' ani' nene di minisa amuzo mili gizebo i-ngidi mini misubo somo ngibili itaa' nani' ne'mine igi a'mine aleve nene izivi' itivi' i-ngidilisave. Ido' ma nene nedenga' holukati' dizaa' neine' sonohi' ganangome' nene ngemelesuve.
Gatine ngolo' live nii ma nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo eze evenele mulise minika' minika' angu' nolo-ngimine' gamazi meve nene gililo.
Ne'mine losa Izesu' ti' lo lo-nidine' ve: Saladisi numuno ebeku' evene'ne mulise'mi angeloli'mo engi' lo-ngemeline' gamazi nene luhuvo ti' lo gizezo:

O'moso'mi sikalahu' sevenisi do mino sonohi' seveni do minuve naza nene ti' lo noluve: Lingine igi mili minaa' nani' monovotine nene mo ningo gele nouve. Ado' lutine nene mo oto minevo' alevo' o neive likevo nemu' guvetine nene nomonine'za lutine nene hele vine' neingumu' likeni' neivo mo ningo gele nouze.

Upuho' igi otilo. Lengita monotine linge nene ha neiha mo helelido' o neine' nene hize ele' igi di ngi lilo. Nanitekumu' ve. Lingine igi mili iga' nani' monovotine nene neni' O'moso'ne'mo ningine' nene ei' gele neine' makilo' olihe vo damine' nemu' nene mo ninge nouve.

Nemu' nene li-lingimikevo ganakuti' gili dani' monokumu' nene gohi gatine gilisa a'mido' e'meti mini lutine di velepe' izilo. Ido' ne'mine ami upuho' igi ma otamilizani' nene naza guminelo' ve alizani' gamenemu' gilamavo iga' naani' ne'minosa nene alosuve. Lingine nene naza aloni' gamenemu' ma gilami nizavosa nene lengita ogo hetelelesuve.

Ne neiha Saladisi numuno ebetingu' nene evene' linge ngomo ma nizani' nene geneganalo' goloduvo elaa' neine' ne'mino oko'nida goloso nite' dizo gi'mizamive ma nizani' ingine nene mo lisihe' i nizani' nenako goloduvosi nomine' mokono' initekovo' ngili minavo nenikisi maka' monelesune.

A'mine'mine igi ve ma monoli'mi lovou' Satani ivile' ilizave nene genegana'ine mokonokovo' ngili minikevo minevo' minevo' ngemeni dameni dalizaveti gulive'ine minine' buku neuti' engi' gulive'ine nene gilite hulamolosuve. Asi me'nehi velelokisi ido' angelo'veliti ve'nidokisi nene neni' evene'ne nizave lo engi' gulive'ine nene lo soto' olosuve.
Gatine ngolo' live ni ma nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo eze evenele mulise minika' minika' angu' nolo-ngimine' gamazi meve nene gililo.
Ne'mine losa Izesu' ti' lo lo-nidine' ve: Hiladelehia numuno ebeku' evene'ne mulise'mi angeloli'mo engi' lo-ngemeline' gamazi nene luhuvo ti' lo gizezo:

O'moso'mi emeni damenisi mino monovo gihile ne'mi meleho minuve guvelesi ve Davidi' gizebo ine' numuno ebe've'mi avazaha minine' numuno ebeli'mi kii've do minuve ado' akahe si'zekelodo' nene ve malitesi ma gizamilizado' o minuve ado' akahe gizekelodo' nene ve malitesi ma si'zamilizado' o minuve naza nene ti' lo noluve:

Lingine igi mili iga' nani' monovotine nene mo ningo gele nouve. Me gililo. Lengi' vilizangumu' akahetine nene mo do godeko lehize-lengede nouve. A'mine akahe nene ve malitesi ngeli mo gizamilisave. Ido' lingine amuzo di nizani' nene ha ngomo neingumu' naza ningo gelo lingine neni' gamazi'ne nene gili diivo' mini neni' gulive'ne di minangumu' ataize mo lamangumukisi nene ningo gele nouve.

Ido' gililo. Ve ma ingine Satani'mi mulise'veuti' mini O'moso'mi evenele Zuda ve minilizado' lisihe' i minamaha Zuda ve none laa' ave nene naza lokuvo ingine igi lengi' gizedingu' gubi' izi lingimisa neni' lu'ne lengeme nouvoni' nemu' nene mo ningi gililisave.

Neni' gamazi lo-lingiduvoni' nene gili disa mulumo geni ele'vole' igi ha gihi'mi vi minani' nenako nemu' nene me misubou' aleve lutine do ningo misubo mukita lengemengu' soto' o-lengedelesa neine' nene soto' iline' gameneukisi lengi' nene alete molo-lengedo minelesuve.
Naza nene mo geto alosuze. Evene' malite menitine nene lengito' medeli dikelizaze. Monotine ma di nizani' nene mo di gili' lisa di minilo.

Ve ma ingine monoli'mi lovou' Satani ivile' ilizave nene neni' O'moso'ne'mi kekeize lo neine' numu'veu' nene za langise ne'mine minilizave lo ngele'mize molokuvo a'mingu' mini gohi ma heta limi vamilisave. Ido' vamii nizavo engito' nene neni' O'moso'ne'mi gulivesi gizo ido' a'mine O'moso'ne'mi numuno ebe've ado' Okulumokuti' neni' O'moso'nelati' lemo aline' Zelusalemi gosoho' ne'mi gulivesi nene gizo ido' neni' gulive'ne ado' gulive'ne gosoho' nesi nene engito' gizelesuve.
Ido' gatine ngolo' live ni ma nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo eze evenele mulise minika' minika' angu' nolo-ngimine' gamazi meve nene gililo.
Ne'mine losa Izesu' ti' lo lo-nidine' ve: Laodikia numuno ebeku' evene'ne mulise'mi angeloli'mo engi' lo-ngemeline' gamazi nene luhuvo ti' lo gizezo:

Gamazi'ne do gihile izaakovo' oga' uve O'moso'mi gamazi hize ele' ogo lo soto' oga' uve gihile nenito' gili medelilizado' o minuve ado' O'moso'mo do soto' ine' initeliti ize'nibo minuve naza nene ti' lo noluve:

Lingine igi mili minaa' nani' monovotine nene mo ningo gele nouve. Ado' lingine monokumu' gilikevo mu'musi' oti' amoti' ido' hepe' loti' lamoti' oga' neingumu' nene mo ningo gele nouze. Lingine monokumu' gilavo mu'musi' gehepeve ogavo minilizahe ido' hepe' lize neivo minilizahe ilizani' ne'mo nene mo lamine' o neive lo gele nouve.
Lingine monokumu' gilavo mu'musi' oti' amoti' hepe' loti' lamoti' oga' neivo oluso' goto' nizani' nemu' nene mo muso ga'ne dizikenako muso vele hulo-lengedelesuve.

Lingine ti' li laa' nave: Laza nene mo heneni vai' do molosa heneni aleve mino inite' matakumu' vise' olonido' minamune. Ne'mine laa' naha lingine neve nene mo mulumotine gelelonido' gehepeve mini monoku' goho' gahali' lili' igi lutine'mi vele like vine' mini okodido' inite' nomivo baka' minaa' naani' ne'mine igi monotine nomine' minaa' naani' nemu' nene ma gilamave.

Ne'mine igi nizani' nemu' nene naza gatine do ti' lo ma nolo-lingimuve: Lingine monota heneni ve gihile minilizangisi nenitati' nene oloku' gizi di lamine' ani' ngoli nene meni hizilo. Ido' okode nene baka' soto' o neivo evenelite ningilizani' nene lovozo helalone li okodido' inite' ngili minilizangisi nenitati' genegana mokono' nene meni hizi ngilalo. Ido' lutine'mi vele nene ningelingisi a'mingu' hilalizani' malasini nenitati' meni hizi hilalo.
Naza lu'ne ngeme nouvoni' aleve muki' nene ve'ine zopovo si'ze-ngedo ngelemo lihime ngemaa' nouze. Nemu' nene lingine monokumu' nene gilingili igi minisa lutine di velepe' izilo.

Gililo. Naza nene lutine'mi gatedo' nene ote mino dizo alosa okoho' okoho' izo nouve. Ido' lengikuti' malite no'ne gili akahe ma si'zi-nidilizani' nene naza nizangu' dizekuvo noso' nite' nenikisi engikisi makato' nalosune.

Ve ma ingine monoli'mi lovou' Satani ivile' ilizave nene naza gele ngemekuvo naza Satani ivile' oko me'nehosi maka' mo'mosi'vela eveneto' gizebo o nosine' ne'mino ingine nenikisi maka' mo'mosi'nela eveneto' gizebo ogo minelesune.
Gatine ngolo' live ni ma nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo eze evenele mulise minika' minika' angu' nolo-ngimine' gamazi meve nene gililo.

Ne'mine gamazi nene lo-nemo osu' lavo neloti' ninguvoni' nene Okulumoku' akahe nene gode neivo ninguve. Ne'mino ninge nouvo a'minguti' gomu' giluvoni' nolo ado' pikuli nolo gele vine' nolo ma'mo nene ti' lo lo-nimive: Gaza nene melo' dizo ano. Ne'mine oganivo naza idise neloti' alinge' soto' oka' oka' iline' initekumu' nene gelebizelove.

Mo ne'mine noline' velesi O'moso'mi Sikalahu' ne'mo zatuho o-nidivo mino Okulumoku' ninguvoni' nene guve'inesi vetevo' minaa' ani' mo'mosi' nene neivo ido' a'mingu' nene evene' ma mito' neivo ninguve.

A'mine mo'mosito' minive'mi emeni dameni've nene meni've dizo minine' geheni zasipalotikisi ido' koneliani geheni gulehetotikisi silingenge'ni hulaa' neine' ne'minosa minine' ve. Ido' a'mine mo'mosito' vodo vodo ogo gini' huzebe hize minine' nene ve'ne ve'ne elaa' ine' geheni emeladi ne'minosa nene zavile elo minine' ve.

Ido' a'mine Guvelesi ve'mi mo'mosi'velo' vodo vodo ogo mo'mosi' gohi tuvedi fo'a (24) minavo a'mine mo'mosito' nene gizebo ve tuvedi fo'a (24) genegana mokonokovo' ngili mini godo'nido' inite' ma kuvanadi ne'mine ngolidunu' lili' ani' gihikani' nene mito' minani' ve.

Ido' Guvelesi ve'mi mo'mosi'veloti' nene go' pa'na pa'na neivo nolo nolo molo go' lete lete lo minine' ve. Ido' a'mine Guvelesi ve'mi mo'mosi' ne'mi velela nene olo' livi' seveni ado' O'moso'mi Sikalahu've sevenilo' medeli minani' nene livi' livi' igi minani' ve.
Ido' a'mida inite' ma minine' nene ado' guvo noso ngalasidunu' lili' ani' gele vine' mo kilia gehepeve o minine' inite' ne'mine nene minine' ve.

Ido' olusoku' Guvelesi ve'mi mo'mosi'velo' vodo vodo ogo nene ele'vole' igi ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' inite' seta've seta've nene ma minani' ve. Ido' oko'ine'mi velelasi mehenelasi nene ve'ine gulo'movo' nene bize minine' ve.

A'mine ve'inesi ha minaa' ani' initekuti' ma neve nene laioni gulo gele vine' minine' ve. Ido' ezeloti' minive nene bulumaka' ne'mine gele vine' minine' ve. Ido' ezeloti' minine' inite' nene evene' gote vete gele vine' ne'minesi minine' ve. Ido' a'midoti' neve nene nolise naba patelo nomonine' emeni damenisi minine' ve.

Ido' a'mine ele'vole' igi ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' inite' seta've seta've ingine muki' hamo hamo' nene holoke'ne'ine sigisi sigisisi minani' ve. Ido' oko'ine mukito' ado' holoke'ne'ine luloukosi hetasi nene ve'ine gulo'movo' bize minine' ve. Ido' gamene gamene go' liha liti'muso iziha mo matesi ami ti' li li minaa' nave:
Guvekasi ve O'moso amuzoka vai' golososi minanive,
gomu' mino idise mino mine do dize'mo alinive gei' nene
mo kekeize atoli'mine gehepeve losa nane.
Ido' a'mine ele'vole' igi ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' initelite ne'mine li a'mine mo'mosi'velo' mino minevo' minevo' minaa' neive di hozi li-di opo'ni li isaa' neve li-dani' gamenelo' gamenelo' nene

a'mine gizebo ve tuvedi fo'a (24) ingine nete nene mo'mosi'velo' minive'mi velela nene limi ingi mini a'mine minevo' minevo' minaa' ive nene opo'ni lisa ingine di minani' amuzo'mi maki've minine' inite' kuvanadi angili'ine nene apasi mo'mosi' minine' velela milisa ti' li laa' nave:
Guvetesi ve mino O'mosote minanive gei' nene
inite' mata' muki' do soto' aine' nenako
ee, soto' igi minani' nene gei' lukalokovo' soto' igi minani' nenako
ne'mo gei' nene a'mine amuzokamu' gopo'ni lo do hozi lo-gedelonido' nene
mo lisihe' o nane.

Ido' neloti' ma ninguvoni' nene a'mine mo'mosi'veu' minive'mi ana zamelati' nene pepa avile ha'na ha'nalo' luhuvo velela gizi mehenela gizikani' buku nene haza vete si'zi gatikelizave li di gangi nala' seveni izi humo izikani' nene do neivo ninguve.
Ido' angelo' amuzo'vesi minive mali'mo vise naba lo ti' lo nolivo ninguve: Evene' ma zaho ma'mo buku me'mi nala've nene huko apaso gatelido' lisihe' o minosa ne'mine ilive.
Ne'mine line'za Okulumoku' nehe ido' misubou' nehe ido' misubo lulou' nehe evene' ma a'mine buku si'zi ningilizani' amuzo'inesi minave nene mo keke' hamokisi ma minamani' ve.
Ido' a'mine buku si'zi ningilizave nene hamokisi ma soto' amavo nemu' nene naza ive nabalo' goloso uvoni' ve.

Ne'mine nouvo gizebo ve mauti' hamoli'mo nene ti' lo lo-nimive: Gelezo. Zuda' a'vopilemo' zuhouti' amuzo ve ado' laioni gulo ne'mine gele vive Davidi' zuhouti' Davidido' medelo mino ei' mo'mosi've dave ne'mo nene monoli'mi lovou' vuni gehepeve oganako a'mine buku'mi nala've seveni nene huko apaselido' lisihe' o neize. Gaza nene ive amozo.

Ne'mine lavo sipisipi angale ma mo bili hilikeni' gele vine' nene ado' gizebo ve vodo vodo igi minikevo ido' ele'vole' igi ve'inesi hazavo' nizani' inite' nene vodo vodo igi minikevo Guvelesi ve'mi mo'mosi've miningu' gehepeve nene ote neivo ninguve. A'mine nene godololo' komu've seveni mino ido' vele gulo seveni mino ine' ve. A'mine vele gulo seveni neve nene O'moso'mi Sikalahu' seveni misubo mukiku' ngimisele huline' ma nene minave.
A'mine sipisipi angale ne'mo nene ogo a'mine mo'mosiku' minive'mo ana zamela buku do minine' ma nene dave.

Ido' a'mine buku nene do anau' ogavo a'mine ele'vole' igi ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' inite' seta've seta've nesi ido' gizebo ve tuvedi fo'a (24) nesi nene a'mine sipisipi angale'mi velela nene limi go'ine hizi ingani' ve. Ingine hamo hamo' nene musiki molaa' inite' gulive hapu nesi ido' ngolidunu' lili' ani' luduno lapeseu' nene gizikevo unuvo lamine' oga' ine' inite' vai' lo minine' nesi nene di minani' ve. Ido' a'mine unuvo lamine' oga' ine' inite' nene O'moso'mi evenelelite O'mosola laa' naani' gamazi neve nene minine' ve.
Ido' a'mine velela limi pou' li ingave nete nene nama gosoho' bili mili ti' li lani' ve:
Gei' nene gibilikevo gei' vaniseka hulo helanidi'mo
evene' zuho ato ato' no'ine ato atokisi oko'ine ato atokisi
misubo ato ato' mukiku' mini'mi monani' aleve ma nene meni hizo
leli' O'mosete'mi gizebou' ngele'mize molo mo'mosi'ine naba ngemosa
O'mosomu' opo'ni li inite' lehizi-daa' ilizave lolo' o-ngedanivo
ingine misubolo' gizebo oga' gono di minilisave.
Ido' ne'mine aine' nenako ne'mo nene gaza a'mine buku nene dosa
nala've huko apaselinido' nene mo lisihe' gehepeve o nane.

Ne'mine ikevo ninguvoni' nene Guvelesi ve'mi mo'mosi'vesi ido' ele'vole' igi ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' initekisi ido' gizebo ve tuvedi fo'a (24) nesi nene angelolite di vodo vodo i-ngidi vai' goloso tauseni tauseni ivile' igisa minani' nene naza ningo mukito'
no'ine naba di nubuho igi ti' li nilavo giluvoni' ve:
Sipisipi angale gibilikeni' gaza nene
amuzo ve minaningumukisi ido' heneni ato ato' vai' do minaningumukisi
ido' gele nge laa' naningumukisi ido' ele'vole' ogo minaa' naningumukisi
ido' dizo minaa' naningumukisi ido' guveka monaa' neingumukisi nene
gopo'ni lolonido' lisihe' gehepeve o naningumu' nene
gei' gopo'ni nolune.

Ne'mine li nilavo ma giluvoni' nene O'moso'mo do soto' ine' inite' Okulumoku' nehe misubou' nehe ido' misubo lulou' nehe ido' guvo nosolo' nehe a'mingu' minani' inite' muki' nete nene nama ti' li nilavo giluve:
Mo'mosi'veu' minivesi sipisipi angalesi ingine nene
amuzo'inesi ve mini dizivo' minikesivo guve'ine monaa' neingumu' nene
do naba o-ngedo ngopo'ni nolune' nene mo huko vamo minevo' minevo' ogo
minelive.

Ne'mine likevo ele'vole' igi ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' inite' seta've seta' ve nete nene mo ne'mino minilihoo li li hulikevo gizebo ve ingine limi go'ine hizi ingi a'mine ve seta' nene di naba i-ngidi ngopo'ni lani' ve.

Ido' ma ninguvoni' nene sipisipi angale ne'mo buku'mi nala've api' ogo hamo' ma huko apasavo ele'vole' igi ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' inite' seta've seta'veuti' hamo' mali'mo nene go' ngilili ne'minosa nolo molo ti' lo nolivo giluve: Ano.

Lavo ninguvoni' nene aizo, ve'nela mokono' hosi ma omo neivo ninguve. A'mine hosilo' mino daa' ive nene kebili do neivo godololo' nene lovou' ngivile' avete gihaa' ani' angili' nene ma di gihi-dikevo biluva've ngivile' olosa vo ngivile' o'mo vine' ve.
Ido' sipisipi angale ne'mo buku'mi nala've naba tuu ma nene huko apasavo ele'vole' igi ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' initekuti' naba tuu ma'mo nene ano nolivo giluve.

Ne'mine lavo hosi gohi ma soto' ogo ani' nene olo' gulumo ne'mine gulehe' hosi ani' ve. Ido' a'mine hosilo' daa' ive nene evene' ge nebele hele ne gebele hele li minilizangumu' nene misuboukoti' hongu lo lamino minaa' monovo nene ipe' ogo do vilive lo O'moso'mo gele emosa bainati mite' naba ma emavo dani' ve.

Ido' sipisipi angale ne'mo buku'mi nala've naba tili nene huko apasavo a'mine ele'vole' igi ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' initekuti' naba tili ne'mo nene ano nolivo giluve. Ne'mine lavo ve'nela nene gonobu' hosi gohi ma omo neivo ninguve. Ido' a'mine hosilo' minive ne'mi anau' nene sigeli ma do minine' ve.

Ido' a'mine ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' inite' seta've seta've engi' vovo'ninguti' nene nolo ma ti' lo soto' ine' ma giluve: Ga'na gamene ogavo noso' nite' meni've dizo vavo noso' nite' viti meni hizilizani' nene moni naba
Ido' buku'mi nala've naba fo nene huko apasavo a'mine ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' initekuti' naba fo ne'mo nene ano nolivo giluve.

Ne'mine lavo ve'nela hosi ma omo minine' nene oko'nolo' lani gise holo neine' gele vine' minine' ve. Ido' a'mine hosilo' minive'mi gulive nene Helaa' ve lo minine' ve. Ido' ve ma gulive Gonoso Galese ve lo minive nene mo avito' mehenela ezesi maka' vasine' ve. Ne'mine nasivo engi' nene O'moso'mo misubou' aleve mulise seta've seta've minanguti' mulise hamo' nene ngibililisingumu' amuzo ngemekuvo ingine a'mine amuzo di mini a'mine aleve nene lovo'mo ma ngebelelive ido' ga'na'mo ma ngebele helelive ido' siki initeli'mo ma ngebele helelive ido' loposo initelite nene ma ngibili hililizave likesivo ngibili hililizangumu' nene O'moso'mo a'mine amuzo nene ngimine' ve.

Ido' buku'mi nala've naba faef ma nene huko apasavo ninguvoni' nene evene' ma O'moso'mi gamazilo' gili di mini a'mine gamazi hizi ele' igi li soto' iga' angumu' ngibili hilikevo vo'inehaza nene O'moso imaa' nani' inite' milaa' ani' holomo alata ne'mi gala'munguko nene nizavo ninguve.

Ido' a'mine vo'inehaza nete nene no'ine nabauti' vise li ti' li lani' ve: Guvekasi ve naba kekeize lo minine' gemeni damenisi mino monovo gihile ne'mi meleho minanive gaza nene leli' libilani' vanise malo' nene golo hizo misubou' minaa' nani' aleve nene goni' o-ngedo lihime ngemamolaniko nanihe' lihime ngemeline.

Ne'mine likevo a'mine evene' vo'inehaza minani' hamo hamo' nene veletati' gize'nida leme minine' genegana mokono' gehepeve nene ngemeka' ngemeka' ogo ti' lo lo-ngimine' ve: O'ove, lengi' ne'mini neni' gonolo' ve minave lengi' zuho linge nesi nene lengi' lingibilani' ne'mini igi ngibililizado' o neine' nene ngibili osu' gehepeve lilizangumu' nene lamini mini gili mini gizebo ngomo ma minilo.

Ido' ne'mine lo-ngemavo naza ninge nouvo sipisipi angale ne'mo nene buku'mi nala've naba sigisi ma nene huko apasavo mimi' naba goloso ine' ve. Ido' ho' nene gonobu' elo lihizine' nene vene' gevonolite gonobu' initekovo' ngilaa' naani' gele vine' ne'mine ine' ve. Ido' ike'ni'mi velelo' nene vanise ne'mino gulehe' elo osu' line' ve.
Ido' hepe' nabali'mo gohuno za do mo'mongo' ogavo gihile've di'mozaa' naani' ne'mino okulumoto' minani' sonohi' nene misubouko di'moze' moze' ani' ve.
Ido' okulumo' nene mati di gangaa' nani' ne'mino gango vo haha ine' ve. Ido' golo muki' nesi ido' ailani muki' nesi nene minani' ebe'ine hulisa ebe' mala vi minani' ve.

Ido' misubou' misubou' mini'mi monani' guve'inesi ve naba nesi ido' evene' naba' naba nesi ido' amilo' gizebo ve naba nesi ido' moni heneni ve nesi ido' amuzo ve nesi ido' evene' muki' gonou' ve limi minave nizahe haza ve nizahe nesi nene vi geheni gavulo golou' vi halekaa' ido' geheni muliku' vi halekaa' ani' ve.

Ne'mine igisa golomukisi geheni gavulomukisi ti' li li-ngidani' ve: Laza nene mo'mosi'velo' minive O'moso'mi velelo' soto' ogo minamoloningumukisi ido' sipisipi angale'mo izebolo' molavo lihime lemelinguti' olovo' ogo mineloningumukisi nene lingine limi mili hiti-lidi di haleki-lidilo.
Nene nanitekumu' ve. Ingine evene' lihimetemu' ngizebolo' molangumu' nene lihime limilisine' gamene naba nene mo ogani' nenako ne'mo nene evene' hamokisi ma libilami ha huli-lidikavo minamolosune.

Neloti' ma ninguvoni' nene angelo' seta've seta've misubo lumola lumola oti'mi vi nizavo ninguve. Ingine misubolo' nehe guvo nosolo' nehe za mukito' nehe ne hepe' elo do goloso ogalive li a'mine misubolo' hepe' eleline' hepe' seta've seta've nene di gili' li mini' mini' ani' ve.

Ido' gohi ma ninguvoni' nene angelo' gohi mali'mo minevo' minevo' oga' neine' O'moso'mo ei' inite'velo' noso molaa' neine' inite've nene do mino ho' dizaa' idati' nene soto' ogo navo ninguve. Ne'mine ogo a'mine'mo nene a'mine angelo' seta've seta've ado' misubosi guvo nososi di goloso ilizave lo O'moso'mo gele ngimivemu' nene nolo nabauti' vise naba lo

ti' lo lo-ngidine' ve: Laza O'mosote'mi gonou' ve'veti golihi'nido' O'moso'mi noso olihe molo-ngede osu' lo-ngedamuningu' lingine nene misubo nehe guvo noso nehe ido' za'nala' nehe neve nene olihe di goloso amilo.

Ne'mine lavo O'moso'mi noso mili-ngidani' aleveti naba'ine nene mo li-nimikevo giluvoni' ve. Ado' Isilaele' gipeleti nga'vopilemo' zuho mukikuti' nene evene' vanu hadeti foti fo tauseni (144,000) nene noso mili-ngidani' ve.
Ado' Zuda' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidi
Ido' Lubeni' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidii
Ido' nGadi' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidii
Ido' Aseli' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidii
Ido' Nahatali' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidii
Ido' Manase' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidii
Ido' Simeoni' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidii
Ido' Levi' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidii
Ido' Isakala' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidii
Ido' Zebuloni' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidii
Ido' Zosehe' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidii
Ido' Benizamini' a'vopilemokuti' nene tuvelu tauseni (12,000) noso mili-ngidani' ve.

Neloti' ma ninguvoni' nene evene' vai' goloso ngelo gatamolonido' i minani' nene ado' misubou' misubouti' evene' zuho ato atokuti' oko'ine ato atokisi no'ine ato atokisi nene a'mine O'moso'mi mo'mosi've ado' sipisipi angale ote minine' velela nene oti mini mokono' initekovo' ngili zavile davile ledi di mini
no'ine nabauti' geke' li ti' li lani' ve:
Lukuvo nune' nene mo'mosi'velo' minive O'mosoteli'mosi
sipisipi angale ne'mosi nene lukuvo limikesivo lukuvo nune' ve.

Ido' ne'mine likevo angelo' muki' nene O'moso'mi mo'mosi'vesi ido' gizebo vesi ido' ele'vole' igi ve'inesi ha minaa' nani' inite' seta've seta've nesi nene di vodo vodo i-ngidi oti mini a'mine O'moso'mi mo'mosi've'mi velela nene limi go'ine hizi ingi O'moso opo'ni li
ti' li lani' ve:
Mo lamine' likeve.
Nemu' nene leli' O'mosote aza amuzo ve mino ido' ele'vole' ogo mino
ido' gala gele nge lo minaa' ive dizo neivo guvele monaa' neingumu' nene
isaa' neve lo do naba o-do opo'ni nolune' nene
mo huko vamo minevo' minevo' ogo minelive. Mo ne'mino miniliho.
Ido' a'mido' nene gizebo ve mauti' mali'mo ti' lo longo' o-nidive: Oko'nido' inite' mokonokovo' ngili minave mene zamote nizave. Ido' zaalati' ani' neve.

Ne'mine lavo naza ti' lo lo-imuve: Ve nabo, Naza ma gelamuve. Asi gasika nene gele nane' ve. Ne'mine lokuvo ti' lo lo-nimive: A'mine aleve meve nene goboni mili-ngidi nizavo a'mine geni ato ato' soto' ine' gameneu' ele'vole' igi geni gihi mini lukuvo nave ma nene nizave. Engi' genegana'ine nene sipisipi angale'mi vanisedunu' noso' izisa di guluvi' li di mokono' ilani' ve.
Nemu' nene
O'moso'mi mo'mosi've'mi velela mini
gamene gamene go' liha liti'muso iziha kekeize lo neine' numu'veu' nene
eze gono've di-di nizavo
mo'mosi'velo' minive aza engikisi maka' mino alete molo-ngedaa' oloseive.
Ne'mine ogavo ingine noso' nite' nehe haza noso nehe
nevo'mine inite' nene gohi ma vise' ami ga'nasi hilamilisave.
Ido' ho' ne'mosi nene oko'nido' olo' lo ma do goloso o-ngedamoloseive
Nene naniteli'mo ve:
Sipisipi angale O'moso'mi mo'mosi'veu' minive ne'mo nene gizebo o-ngedo mino
minevo' minevo' ogo minaa' neine' noso hinipinita nene ngele'mizo vaa' oloseive.
Ne'mino neivosa O'moso'mo nene ve'ine novozo lemali' lemali' lo-ngedo mineleseive.
Neloti' nene sipisipi angale ne'mo buku'mi nala've naba seveni nene huko apasavo Okulumoku' minani' inite' nene no'inesi milamavo elese' iki nizavoo gamene haf aua ne'mine nene ga'me pize minine' ve.
Ne'mine ogavo neloti' ninguvoni' nene O'moso'mi velela minaa' ani' angelo' seveni'a ma nene ninguve. Engi' nene pikuli seveni'a ma ngemavo di minani' ve.

Ido' angelo' gohi ma neve nene unuvo lamine' oga' ine' inite' milaa' ani' lapese ngolidunu' lili' ani' nene do mino ogo alata neida ote minine' ve. Neivo ngolidunu' lili' ani' alata O'moso'mi mo'mosi've'mi velela minido' nene a'mine angelo' ne'mo a'mine unuvo lamine' oga' ine' inite' nene O'moso'mi evenelelite O'mosola lani' gamazisi nene oloku' gizo O'moso emelive lisa vai' goloso nene imani' ve.
Ido' ne'mine ogavo a'mine unuvo lamine' oga' ine' initeli'mi sokile nene O'moso'mi evenelelite eita lani' gamazisi a'mine O'moso'mi velela minine' angeloli'mi anauti' nene dizo vine' ve.

Ido' ne'mine ogo a'mine angelo' ne'mo alataloti' olo' vele ma do a'mine do minine' lapeseu' nene molosa hulo misubouko ogavo go' ngilili ngilili lo nolo nolo molo go' pa'na ne'mo lede ogo vogo ivo mimi' ine' ve.
Ido' neloti' nene pikuli seveni di minani' angelo' seveni mate nene a'mine pikuli di nolo milalisa gamuno' i minani' ve.

Ne'mine igi minadoti' naba vani angelo' ne'mo nene pikuli hubu lo do nolo molavo osupo gihilesi olokisi nene vanisesi gopo' napa o minine' nene soto' ogavo misubouko mili hulikevo do'mozine' ve. Ido' do'mozine' ne'mo nene misubo laka'ni seto hamo mininguti' linge hamo' nene lo'voto osu' lavo ido' za lingelatikisi nene a'mine'mine votigilelo' ma lo osu' lavo misubolo' guvise navise ngomo' naba' muki' nesi nene lo osu' line' ve.

Ne'mine ogavo angelo' naba tuu ne'mo nene pikuli hubu lo do nolo molavo golo naba ne'mine gele vine' inite' nene ma olo' lo neivo guvo nosou' di hulani' ve. Ne'mine ikevo guvo noso laka'ni seto hamo mininguti' lingela hamo' nene vanise nosovo' lolo' ine' ve.
Ne'mine ogavo guvo nosou' ve'inesi minani' initekuti' nene a'mine'mine votigilelo' nene hili osu' lani' ve. Ido' a'mine guvo nosolo' monani' sipiuti' a'mine'mine votigilelo' nene vi goloso ani' ve.

Ne'mine ikevo angelo' naba tili ne'mo nene pikuli've nene hubu lo do nolo molavo Okulumokuti' sonohi' naba goloso livi' ne'mino lo minine' nene misubou' noso hinipinikisi noso mukikisi minani' nene laka'ni seto hamo minanguti' hamo' malo' nene limine' ve.
A'mine sonohili'mi gulive nene Ekese' Malasini ve lo minine' ve. Ido' noso linge seta' ha nizasivo noso linge ma ne'mo ekese' malasini lolo' ine' ne'mo nene evene' muki' goloso hilani' ve.

Ido' neloti' nene angelo' naba fo ne'mo nene pikuli hubu lo do nolo molavo ho' nene laka'ni mili seto hamo minanguti' linge hamota nene belavo liti'muso izine' ve. Ido' a'mine'mine votigilelo' ike'ni mininguti' lingela nene belavo liti'muso izine' ve. Ido' a'mine'mine votigilelo' sonohi' linge setata nene ha nizasivo hamota nene belavo liti'muso izine' ve. Holise' hamoku' gamene seto hamo mininguti' linge hamota nene labana've nomine' minine' ve. Ido' a'mine'mine ogo liti'muso hamoku' ize gito seto hamo mininguti' linge hamota nene labana' ngomosi minamivo liti'muso gehepeve ize minine' ve.

Ido' ninge minuvoni' nene nolise naba ma hamokovo' minidi'mo nene okulumo' veleta oluso' gehepeve hozene patelo nomonine' nene ninge nouvo nolo nabauti' ti' lo nolivo giluve: Agae, agae, agae. Angelo' lumo seto hamo nizani' nete pikuli'ine hubu li di no'ine milalisa naani' ne'mo nene misubou' alevela mulumo geni atoli'mine ogo soto' o-ngedelesa neive.

Ido' ne'mine ogavo angelo' naba faef ne'mo nene pikuli've hubu lo do nolo molavo ninguvoni' nene okulumokuti' sonohi' ma misubolo' do'moze minine' nene ninguve. A'mine sonohi' neve nene hemuvosi nomine' galese ha'nali'mi veleloti' kii've nene imikevo do minine' ve.

Ido' a'mine kii' nedunu' nene a'mine galese'mi akahe've nene si'zo godavo a'minguti' nene sokile vai' goloso hosoni vite' ikevo sokile dizaa' ine' ne'mino dizo okulumotokisi ido' ho' velelokisi molo hito do liti'muso izine' ve.
Ido' a'mine sokileuti' nene ma'nabuso gili vani' inite' nene misubou' limikevo misubouko nizani' gazehe ga'muko' ne'mineti amuzo'ine ne'mine nene O'moso'mo ngimine' ve.

Ne'mine ogo ti' lo lo-ngidine' ve: Lingine nene guvise navise nehe za' nala' nehe nevo'mine inite' nene di goloso i-ngidami asi O'moso'mi noso golihi'nido' milamani' alevevo' nene di goloso i-ngidilo.

Ne'mine lo a'mine ngimine' amuzo nene a'mine aleve ngibili hililizani' amuzo ngimine' nevoba asi ike'ni faef ne'mi lulou' ngibili'mi vi nizavo mulumo ekese' goloso gili minilizangumu' ve losa amuzo ngimine' ve. Ido' a'mine mulumo gili minilizani' nene gazehe ga'mukolite evene' ngibilikevo mulumo ekese' goloso gilaa' nani' ne'minisa nene gili minilisave.
Ne'mine igi mulumo ekese' gili minilizani' gameneu' nene evene' nete helaa' akamu' vise' ilisaha mo ma ningamilisave. Ee, mo helelobo li gili minilisaha helaa' ne'mo nene olovo' o-ngedeleseive.

Ido' a'mine ma'nabuso gili vani' inite' nene hosi gili minani' ve. Ado' lovou' di vilisa di nene i-ngidikevo minani' hosi gili minani' ve. Ido' a'mine ma'nabuso gili vani' initeliti godo'nido' nene kuvanadi angili' ngolidunu' lili' ani' gele vine' nene gihi minani' ve. Ido' go'ine ve'ine nene evene' gote vete ne'minesi minani' ve.
Ido' madu'ine zopovo nene ha'na ha'na venelitine ne'minosa minine' ve. Ido' ve'ine gavulo nene laioni gulo neti ve'ine gavulo gasava ne'minosa minine' ve.

Ido' loso'nido' lepese ne'mine izikani' nene ainidunu' lili' ani' gele vine' izikani' ve. Ido' a'mine inite' pateli nivavo holoke'ne'ninguti' nolo molani' nene hosi vailite lovou' kali ma gelelehe' igi loti' izi di nivavo gilili ngilili lo minaa' neine' ne'minosa minine' ve.

Ido' gazehesi ido' gazehe ne'mini minani' inite' masi ingine avasuvo'ningu' nene evene' ngibilaa' ani' inite'inesi minaa' naani' ne'mini a'mine ma'nabuso gili vani' inite' nene avasuvo'ningu' evene' ngibilaa' ani' inite'inesi minani' ve. Ido' ne'mini minani' nenako nemu' nene a'mine ike'ni faef neu' evene' di goloso i-ngidi minilizani' amuzo'ine nene a'mine avasuvo'ningu' nene minine' ve.

Ido' engi' guve'inesi ve nene a'mine hemuvosi nomine' galese ha'na ha'nalo' gizebo oga' neine' angelo' neve nene engi' guve'inesi ve minine' ve. A'mine angeloli'mi gulive nene Zuda veti gamazi'ninguti' nene Abadoni' ve li laa' nave. Ido' nGiliki veti gamazi'ninguti' nene Apolioni' ve li laa' nave. A'mine gulive setalitisi monovo nene inite' do goloso oga' ive ve.
Agae, mulumo geni inite' naba hamo' ma nene mo vaaha mulumo geni naba lumo seta' nene mo olihe soto' ilisa nasive.

Ido' neloti' nene angelo' naba sigisi ne'mo nene pikuli've hubu lo do nolo molavo ngolidunu' lili' ani' alata O'moso'mi velela minine' ne'mi gatu'muvo seta've seta'vela komu minanguti' nene nolo hamo' ma soto' ogosa
a'mine pikuli di minani' angelokuti' naba sigisi mamu' nene ti' lo nolo-divo giluve: Noso naba Zupalati nela angelo' seta've seta've nala' izi-ngidikani' ma nene vo vakese-ngedezo.

Ne'mine lavo vo a'mine angelo' seta've seta've ado' O'moso'mo a'mine gamenemu' gehepeve do va'va' o-ngedavo minani' ma nene vo apase-ngidine' ve. Ne'mine lavo vo apase-ngidine' nene evene' laka'ni seto hamo minanguti' lingela hamo' nene ngibili hililizave lo O'moso'mo ne'mine i-ngidilizani' gamene'mi kilisimasi'vesi ido' ike'ni'vesi ido' holise' gamene'vesi ido' aua'vesi nene gamene molo hulo-ngedekivosa ha minani' nene vakese-ngidine' ve.

Ido' a'mine angelo' fo'a neti gizebo'nido' mini hosilo' monaa' ani' ami nene tuu hadeti milioni (200,000,000) ne'mine nene minani' ve. Ido' a'mine tuu hadeti milioni ne'mine minave noluvoni' nene mo naba'ine li-nimikevo mo gelosa nene noluve.

Ido' a'mine hosilo' minani' amisi hosi'inesi ve'nelo' i milangu' nene ne'minisa nizavoo ninguve: Loso'nido' lepese nene olo' gulumo ne'mine gulehe' ilinekisi ido' sahila geheni gumi kala ne'minesi ido' salfa geheni ne'mine gihungo' ilinekisi nene izikani' ve. Ido' hosi'ineti madu'ine nene laioni guloliti madu'ine gele vine' nizavo ve'ninguti' nene olo' gulumosi sokilesi salfa gehenisi nene leme heta ogo minine' ve.

A'mine evene' di goloso i-ngidaa' ani' inite' seto hamo ado' a'mine hosiliti ve'ninguti' leme minine' inite' olo' gulumosi sokilesi ido' salfa geheni nesi nete nene evene' seto hamo seto hamo minanguti' hamo hamo' nene ngibili hilani' ve.
Ee, a'mine hosiliti amuzo'ine nene ve'ningukisi avasuvo'ningukisi minine' ve. Avasuvo'nine nene gosihe' ne'mine madu'inesi minikevo a'mine avasuvo'inedunu' nene evene' di goloso i-ngidaa' ani' ve.

Ne neiha a'mine evene' di goloso i-ngidaa' ani' initelite ngibili hilamavo evene' lumo ha minave nete nene lu'ine di velepe' izisa igi mili iga' ani' monovo nene hulilizanako hulamave. Ado' ve'ine ningisa'mani' ido' ga'ine gilisa'mani' inite' ido' aka monamilizado' i nizani' inite' soza o'moso ado' ngolidunu' nehe siluva' gehenidunu' nehe ido' ngoli gele vine' inite' gohi madunu' nehe ido' gehenidunu' nehe ido' zadunu' nehe nevo'mine initetunu' engi' a'inedunu' gono di lili' ani' inite' nene ngopo'ni li minaa' ido' sikalahu' goloso ngopo'ni li minaa' ani' nene hulamani' ve.

Ido' lu'ine di velepe' izi engi' monovo'ine goloso linge ado' evene' ngibili hilaa' ani' monovo'inesi ido' poisini gamazi'inesi ido' vene' vemoho' alu gipe gopo ingaa' ani' monovo'inesi ido' gumine damine iga' ani' monovo'inesi nene mo hulamani' ve.

Neloti' ma ninguvoni' nene amuzo malehe angelo' gohi ma nene Okulumokuti' limusoli'mo do asabu' ize-de minivo nolimivosa ninguve. Godololo' nene gini' huzebe hize neivo golo vele nene ho' hulaa' neine' ne'mino minine' ve. Ido' gizene hela hela nene olo' gulumo ne'mine gelo mino za langise ne'mine ha'na dizo minine' ve.
Ido' anau' nene di gangaa' ani' buku ngomo ma di patelikani' neine' nene do mino gizene zamelati' nene guvo nosolo' lisosa gizene adavalati' nene misubolo' lisine' ve.
Ne'mine o mino nolo've nene laioni gulo ne'mo nolo molaa' neine' gele minivosa nolo nabauti' vise line' ve. Ido' vise lavo go' ngilili seveni'a nete a'mido' no'ine mili gamazi lani' ve.

Ido' a'mine go' ngilili seveni'a nete ne'mini gamazi likevo naza lani' gamazi nene gizelesa nouvo Okulumokuti' nene nolo ma ti' losa soto' ivo giluve: A'mine go' ngilili seveni'alite lani' gamazi nene gelo do halekekezo. Mo gizamozo.
Ne'mine lavo a'mine angelo' ado' guvo nosolokisi misubolokisi lise neivo ninguvoni' angelo' ne'mo ana zamela nene Okulumota do otine' ve.

Do otosa ei' liline' gamazi do amuzo molalosa nene minevo' minevo' ogovo' minaa' ive ado' Okulumokisi a'mingu' nizani' inite' matakisi ido' misubosi a'mingu' nizani' inite' matakisi ido' guvo nososi a'mingu' nizani' inite' matakisi do soto' ivelo' nene lo molo ti' lo live: Gamene gohi ma ogo vamoloseive.

Asi angelo' naba seveni ne'mo pikuli've hubu lo do nolo molaline' gamene ilido' gehepeve nene O'moso'mo eze gonolo' ve've polohete gomu' lo soto' ogo lo-ngimine' gamazi nene do gihile izo inite' suno' neine' olosa gele minaa' neine' nene do soto' ogo do peleleseive.

Ne'mine lavo Okulumokuti' nolo soto' ogavo gomu' giluve ne'mo gohi gamazi lo-nemo ti' lo live: Gaza nene vo guvo nosolokisi misubolokisi liso ote neine' angeloli'mi anau' do neine' buku di patelikani' ma nene dozo.

Ne'mine lo-nedavo a'mine angelo' neida vo buku nene nemezo lo-dekuvo aza ti' lo lo-nimive: Gaza buku mene dosa no mikile' ozo. A'mine ne'mo nene gatungau' lemo neivo gatunga ne'mo nene lanite' gelamoloseive. Ne'mine oloseine'za nonanivo vekauko nene himoni novozo ne'mo lanite' oga' neine' ne'minosa lanite' oloseive.

Ne'mine lavo a'mine buku ngomo nene a'mine angelo' ma'mi anauti' dosa no mikile' okuvo ve'neuko lanite' ine' nene himoni novozoli'mo lanite' ine' gilive. Ne'mine ine'za no mikile' okuvo gatu'neuko limine' nene mo lanitekisi amive.

Ne'mine ogavo nouvo ti' li li-nimave: Gaza nene evene' zuho ato ato' oko'ine ato atokisi no'ine ato atokisi minani' mukikumukisi ido' guve'inesi ve naba mukikumukisi nene a'mine soto' o ngemeline' initekumu' nene O'moso'mi veleti' gamazi nene imine' molo gohi lo soto' ogo lo-ngemelinido' o neive.

Ido' neloti' gohi ma neve nene inite' maki milaa' ani' gavoso gonoukumu' minelive li milikani' angaba gavoso ne'mine ha'na ma nimii ti' li li-nimani' ve: Gaza oto vo a'mine gavosotunu' maki molo ningo O'moso'mo do ngu' izeli inite've ado' kekeize numu've nesi ido' a'mingu' alata've minine' nesi nene naba'ine do ningo ido' a'mingu' O'moso opo'ni li minaa' nave nesi nene naba'ine do ningezo.

Ne'mine iline'za maki molalo ma nene si'mingala gesi vodo vodo ogo neine' nene maki molamosa asi a'midoti' lulou' vodo vodo ogo neine' gesi neloti' nene api' ogo maki molo hulo lulouko ogosa nene do ningezo. Ne nanitekumu' ve. A'mine makimi amiline noluvoni' ebe' nene O'mosomu' gilamave heta ato' velite di minilisave lo O'moso'mo gele ngemavo di mini O'moso'mi numuno ebe've nene lisi di goloso i'mi vi nizavo ike'ni foti tuu (42) ne'mine ogo voloseive.

A'mine gameneu' nene neni' gamazi'ne hizi ele' ilisive seta' nene amuzo ngemekuvo a'mine gamene vanu tauseni tuu hadeti sigisiti (1,260) ne'mi lulou' nene alinge' mulumo soto' iline' nemu' evene' mulumo'ine gilisa ne'mi avazaha nene vene' gevonoliti genegana ne'minevo' ngili mini neni' ve'neuti' gamazi nene li soto' soto' igi minilisasive.
A'mine ve seta' neve nene gomu' polohete Zekalia' line' oliva za setakisi ido' lamu livi' seta' misuboli'mi Guvelesi ve'mi velelo' minaa' nasive ma nene nizasive.
